neighborhood_overview: This hotel is one of the most popular locations in Waikiki because it is so close to the beach and all Waikiki attractions.  It is convenient to everything you will want to see and do during your vacation. Outdoor activities are countless from this location. Restaurants and international shopping are bountiful nearby. Fast food to 5 star dinning is available. Enjoy the unique Kuhio Ave. for dinning and shopping with the locals. Hawaiian food, Hawaiian artifacts and Hawaiian clothing are all available withing walking distance.
notes: Confirmation and ID must be presented upon check in.  Names of people staying in the condo are required.  Check in time is any time after 3:00 PM and check out time is at ll:00 AM Owners State of Hawaii Tax ID #TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: TRANSPORT By Bus--One of the best deals anywhere, TheBus will take you around the whole island for $2.50 ($1.25 for children age 6–17)—if you have time. To get to the North Shore and back takes 4 hours, twice as long as a car. But for shorter distances, TheBus is great, and it goes almost everywhere almost all the time. If you’re planning on sticking to the Waikiki–Ala Moana–Downtown region, go with TheBus, which will save you a lot of car hassle and expense. The most popular route is no. 8, which arrives every 10 minutes or so to shuttle people between Waikiki and Ala Moana Center (the ride takes 15–20 min.). The no. 19 (Airport/Hickam), no. 20 (Airport/Halawa Gate), and no. 40 (Waipahu/Ala Moana) also cover the same stretch. Waikiki service begins daily at 5am and runs until midnight; most buses run about every 15 minutes during the day and every 30 minutes in the evening. By Taxi--Oahu’s major cab companies offer 24-hour, islandwide, radio-dispatched service, with multilingual drive
access: You will have full access to this apartment, plus access to the common area swimming pool, gym, BBQ's and other amenities located on the 7th floor
interaction: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in, and a Property Manager is available by phone, text or email and 24 hour answering service to take messages, and alert for emergencies. You will also receive our Welcome Packet Email with all of the contact information needed, plus instructions to call our Guest Host when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport.

NO DAILY MAID SERVICE - While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate.  Beach towels are provided for your convenience. 5.	PET POLICY - Pets are not permitted without prior notice. Pet must be approved by the property manager. There is an additional $20 per night per pet if approved. Must be a service animal. 6.	REFUND

host.host_about:
We've been helping clients list, buy, and sell beautiful real estate of every kind throughout the Hawaiian Islands, with a focus on Oahu and Maui and now Kauai and the Big Island. Our professional doors are open 24/7 for you to contact me: online via our website or by email or by phone message at any time. I would love to work for you and find you the best sell or buy deal you desire and which I know I can find you in Hawaii!

I am Mark G. Howard, the Principal Broker, President and founder of Hawaii Americana Realty, located in beautiful Waikiki, Hawaii. For years we've been serving all the real estate needs of our customers in Hawaii and beyond. And it gives us great joy to do so! Our focus has been high-rise, condo, townhouse, and the single-family home market throughout Oahu and Maui, and now also the Big Island and the garden island of Kauai. We handle buying and selling of all kinds of real estate in Hawaii, however, including business and commercial property. We can find it for you or sell it for you, but always we make sure you get the best and most lucrative deal possible!

I don't mind saying that For the past 14+ years I have practiced my skills and expertise as a licensed Realtor in Santa Fe, New Mexico, then Las Vegas, Nevada, and am very proud to now own and operate Hawaii Americana Realty, in Honolulu, Hawaii. I have gained a very respected reputation and competitive edge in the Hawaii real estate market and accomplished this by earning my status as a company Broker and Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR).

I have known much success in what I do. And that success I can't wait to share with you! This I will accomplish by providing you the topnotch, unequaled real estate service you desire and deserve. I will find and facilitate the best sell or buy deal possible. The smile on my face will reflect your own... and it will be one of mutual success!

Our professional doors are open 24/7 for you to contact me: online via our website or by email or by phone message at any time. The Hawaiian real estate market I excitingly remind you is the place to sell, buy, and invest in now. Be it a condo or small family home, a huge estate or upscale commercial property, you name it! No matter where you live in the world, you can contact Hawaii Americana Realty and we can find you the property of your dreams, or help you sell or invest in a prime piece of island real estate paradise!

reviews.comments:
Everything went smoothly and the apartment was great. The cleanliness and all the small touches, from the bathroom items to the coffee in the kitchen.

The apartment complex has an excellent location and great ammenities.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed here in a group of 10 for 4 nights for a wedding. We were on a tight budget and found the condo great value for money, with amazing views from two large balconies, a very short walk to the center of town, a bus stop right in front of the building, and plenty of towels and linen for use. Mark was also flexible with check in and graciously allowed us to check in very early after a horrible overnight flight which landed at 7am! We were there during a rare storm, however, and the windows in the bedroom with the balcony did not keep the strong winds out completely. Also, the dining table and sofas did not fit all 10 of us. Otherwise, we very much enjoyed our stay and would recommend this condo for other large groups.

This is a roomy condo in a good location with spectacular views of the ocean and the mountains. We had a great time! The condo is clean and well-appointed. We had five adults staying here, and we never felt cramped. The place is well stocked with plenty of linens, including a generous supply of beach towels. The kitchen had plenty of dishes for virtually any cooking need, including a tea kettle and two types of teapots. The building also has a recreation deck with a pool, exercise room, sauna, ping-pong tables and more.

The check-in process was incredibly easy. We texted the host when we left the airport and were met at the condo by a guest host who showed us around and helped with our bags. In an unexpected complication, one of our party had broken their leg before the trip and was in a wheelchair. We hadn't booked the location with handicap accessibility in mind, but it turned out great. For anyone traveling with mobility issues, this is a good location. With an elevator and ramp out front, the wheelchair was no problem. The bathrooms are a bit too tight for a wheelchair if that's a requirement for you, but that's normal for any place that hasn't been specifically designed to be wheelchair accessible.

The only downside I'll list is that the foldout couches aren't that great. There are five beds in the bedrooms, but one of our party snores and was going to sleep in the living room on one of the foldout couches. It turned out that the mattress was very thin and after a very short discussion we decided we could wear earplugs because an adult would probably not get a good night sleep on the couches. That said, the five of us slept great in the five beds (two are bunkbeds, but were fine even for adults). The place isn't brand new and has signs of wear around the edges, but no more than one would expect in a vacation property. 

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and we'd both recommend it and go back there again!
위치뿐만 아니라, 청결도 안전까지 굉장히 좋은 곳이었습니다 :) 중간에 문제를 해결해주시는 것도 아주 빨랐고 좋았습니다 ^^ 없는 게 없을 정도로 완벽했어요 ! 주변에 쇼핑과 먹을 곳이 굉장히 많이 아주 좋았습니다 ! 다음에 또 가고싶을 정도였어요.

We have enjoyed Mark's apartment immensely.  All the rooms were clean, well-kept, everything was in working order and well prepared.

The view of the ocean from the balcony was spectacular and soothing at the same time.  The location was a short walk to the central Wakiki, even my 80+ aged in-laws did not find difficult to walk.

I would highly recommend Mark's place and if you are planning a family get together on Wakiki as I was, give Mark's large apartment a look-in.

Cheers from Peter

Fantastic place!!! It was way more beautiful that the pictures posted. The A/C worked great in all the rooms (which is what we needed), absolutely LOVED the Guest bathroom shower. Perfect location. Never used my car, walked everywhere we needed to go. Also an ABC Store, Starbucks, and a McDonald's either literally across the street or a block away. Will DEFINITELY request this room for our next Staycation in Waikiki. Thanks, Mark!!!

So we actually got upgraded to a different room d/t some plumbing issues #3506 so this review will be that room. 

Location was fantastic, right in the middle of where you want to be. About 5-min walking distance to the beach. The place was spotless and the ocean view from the bedroom with the double beds was absolutely incredible.

The place had a sofa bed, an ottoman that turned into a single bed, and extra blankets/bedding in the closets. 

The place was very comfortable, felt like Home. The second bedroom with the full bed and bunk beds was very comfortable as well, it’s just a bit cramped as there isnt much space other than the beds and a small closet. But we were able to store luggage under the beds which helped, and not to take away from how great this place is, just to give an idea of what the room is like.

However there are so many other options for sleeping such as the two beds in the living room plus extra mats/bedding in the closet so if the one room feels cramped there is plenty other space to either sleep or store luggage.

This place would be perfect for a bigger family and even has items there for a baby like a high chair and some other things too.

There were also boogie boards on one of the balconies which was very nice to have.

Overall I️ highly recommend this space, and I️ actually wish I️ had the chance to stay and relax in the room more because I️t was really that nice and comfortable.
Mark was great to work with and responded very quickly. He was sure to get in contact if there was anything he needed.

This apartment is fabulous. The views are spectacular, it was clean and nicely decorated. There was a booklet with tons of great local information. The AC was much needed. I would recommend this place if you want to be right in the heart of Honolulu and Waikiki. Shopping and Restaurants are right there, bus system is everywhere, there's 1 free garage parking space that fits 6'5" and under. The check in process was easy and fast.

This apartment is incredible! Two balconies with breathtaking views, full kitchen, two bathrooms and TVs in every room. We all had our own space and not to mention access to all hotel facitilies. Great communication with our host and great location. Can’t recommend this apartment enough.

Samuel was truly a wonderful host. He was welcoming and helpful. He gave suggestions on where to go and showed us how to get there. He also kept himself available to contact if we needed help just in case. His place was homey and comfortable, in a very picturesque neighbourhood. Thank you Sam, for such a pleasant stay!

The room is simple, spacious, and clean. It's in a great neighborhood with easy parking. I never actually met Samuel but we kept in touch by phone. He and his roommates were very polite and helpful. This was a great deal for me that worked out exactly as I hoped it would.

reviews.comments:
Beatrice's place was great. Can't complain about anything at all. Location was great, the place was spacious, the bed was comfortable, the kitchen had everything you need to cook and serve a full meal (I did not get a chance to use it). 
At first I was skeptical about the place because it had no reviews and the main contact number on Airbnb is not a local one. But there was really no reason to as Beatrice provides you a direct contact number to her mother, who handed me the keys. 
They were both very accommodating on check-in times. Marie is very sweet, she told me what was around the area and ways to get around. She made sure I had everything I needed before she left. 
I would definitely stay again, it would be my first choice if available on my next trip back to Montreal.
Great location just off St. Laurent blvd and yet the apartment is quiet and very comfortable. The back patio is a great place to sit back and relax. We'll be back as soon as we can.
A nice place in a nice neighbourhood, nice cafes and bars around and close to the metro. I would come back anytime.

I loved Beatrice's spot! Location was amazing, the apartment was clean, comfortable, and spacious. The kitchen was well  equipped (however I didn't get a chance to use it). The backyard was beautiful and Beatrice was communicative and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again!

Thank you Beatrice, the stay in Montreal was really nice. The Appartement has everything inside. I will surly join you again. 
Your recommendations were great and you were really helpful!
The apartment is great. We loved to stay there. In the near there are a lot of shops, bars and cafes. We felt very comfortable. Cheers Marcus, Katja and Ben

reviews.comments:
LOCATION: This apartment is well located close to the beach of Leme, and just by the Copacabana beach. The neighbourhood is very safe, and you can find several supermarkets, just around the area.
It´s also close to the metro station Cardeal Arcoverde.

APARTAMENT: It´s a little bit old, but it´s big, 3 rooms, and 2 bathrooms. It´s very well equipped, so we didn ´t need anything else.

SERVICES:The building has a24 hours doorman, so he´ll help you.

Mayra and her mother were very nice.

Nacho

This is a really great apartment in a very good location. Just a block from the beach but in a safe quiet area. The doorman and cleaning lady were very helpful our whole stay and we felt totally at home and safe in the apartment and the apartment building. The furniture and interior are not super new but everything is nicely decorated, comfortable and well take care of. I consider it to be a really good deal and I would not hesitate to recommend it as a place to stay for your vacation. Mayra was very helpful too.

I rented Mayra's apartment to spend Carnival holidays in Rio with five other friends. The building couldn't have been more well located! It's right next to two big avenues where you can easily find buses and taxis, there are three (if not more) supermarkets in less than 5 minutes walking, plenty of restaurants.. And it's just a block away from the beach, which is beautiful, fully equiped and always proper for bathing! The apartmant is bigger than what six people need so it's very comfortable to be there. The kitchen has everything one may need and the main bathroom is huge! The shower is great and everything was tidy. There was even a laundry machine and plenty of room to hang the clothes, and also an auxiliary small bathroom that was very handy for when someone else was showering. Even though we never met Mayra in person, she would always answer any doubts promptly and the doormen would help us with anything we needed. We had a great stay! I would definetly go back next year!

Thank you so much for your prompt response to our requests and the opportunity to enjoy this beautiful well located condo.  We had a blast!  Lucienne was absolutely terrific!  Kind, hard-working, honest, straight forward, intelligent and an awesome cook! Mayra was very generous on advise and local tips.  The location of the apartment is terricfic as it is at walking distance from the beach and close to bus stops to Botafago, Lapa, ipanema, Leblon and Pan de Azucar.  10 out of 10.

El apartamento de Mayra es estupendo, excelente ubicación a solo dos cuadras de las playas de Leme justo al lado de Copacabana, el apartamento muy limpio y totalmente equipado, camas confortables y buen espacio, aunque no conocí a Mayra estuvo muy atenta para que mi estadía fuera satisfactoria.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Muy bueno y cómodo todo
A anfitriã tentou resolver os problemas, ou melhor, transferiu para a sua mãe, mas deveria antecipar esses problemas antes de chegarmos.
El apto es tal cual las fotos, cualquier problema Mayra y Bill estan a las ordenes. Estas a nada de la playa, tenes varios supermercados a la vuelta como farmacias y lugares para comer.

Mayra foi uma excelente anfitriã! Muito solícita e sempre de fácil comunicação! O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Excelente localização, prédio tranquilo e ainda podemos contar com a ajuda do porteiro Bill, sempre muito educado também! Esperamos poder retornar no seu apê próximo ano!

name: Cozy Apartment near Charley Young Beach in Kihei
summary: Enjoy the convenience of this cute apartment near the beaches! Hosted by an experienced Superhost, this comfortable one-bedroom first-floor apartment is a 1-block walk to Cove Park Beach and a 2-block walk to Charley Young Beach. Surfing, shopping, dining, bars, grocery stores are all just blocks away. The apartment's location is a convenient home base for many activities you can walk to in Kihei or drive to elsewhere on Maui. Includes AC, free Wi-Fi, free parking spot, full size washer & dryer!
space: Aloha, I'm Thomas your host! If you are looking for a comfortable easy place to stay in Kihei, this would be the spot for you.  Perfect for traveling couples or singles who don't need the hassle of a large condominium complex, but instead want a convenient location from which to explore Maui's beaches and activities! OVERVIEW This apartment is 500 square feet plus a patio in the back.  Includes air conditioners both in the living room and bedroom, full kitchen, King size bed in the bedroom, pull-out sleeper sofa in the living room, large flat screen TV, your own private full-size washer & dryer, free convenient designated parking spot, and free Wi-Fi Internet.  THE INTERIOR This cozy one-bedroom one-bath ground-floor apartment is located in a basic but charming older two-story apartment building that has a character that is more residential than busy resort complex.  The inside of the apartment features tiled flooring throughout, plus granite countertops in the kitchen and bathroom.  N
description: Enjoy the convenience of this cute apartment near the beaches! Hosted by an experienced Superhost, this comfortable one-bedroom first-floor apartment is a 1-block walk to Cove Park Beach and a 2-block walk to Charley Young Beach. Surfing, shopping, dining, bars, grocery stores are all just blocks away. The apartment's location is a convenient home base for many activities you can walk to in Kihei or drive to elsewhere on Maui. Includes AC, free Wi-Fi, free parking spot, full size washer & dryer! Perfect for traveling couples or singles who don't need the hassle of a large condominium complex, but instead want a convenient location from which to explore Maui's beaches and activities!
