neighborhood_overview: This charming apartment building right on South Kihei Road in Kihei is perfectly situated within one and two blocks of scenic sandy beaches in either direction: Charley Young Beach on the south side, and Cove Beach on the north side.  Connecting these two beaches on the ocean side of Iliili Road across the street is a lovely green lawn elevated over the water providing a perfect setting for watching nightly sunsets.  Cove Park is the premiere spot in Kihei for surfing and stand-up paddling, and the entry area for this calm ocean inlet is also located a half block away at the north end of the street.  The neighborhood is well located for enjoying easy access to a large variety of fun activities, restaurants and shops all nearby within walking distance. Another block away is the large oceanside Kalama Park, which is the site of annual festivals such as Whale Day in February and Earth day in April. Kalama Park has jogging and bicycling trails, volleyball courts, tennis courts, covered gaz
notes: There is a free Wi-Fi internet connection for this apartment, (subject to rare but possible outages, like any other internet services that can go down...) The name of the wireless network and password are provided on a card inside the apartment.   In the living room there is a TV with a selection of streaming internet television channels and it is also useful for watching movies with streaming apps or the DVD player. The interior of the apartment is updated and modern, however the property is basically a no-frills older building with no pool or hot tub or landscaped grounds, but it has a private patio and the apartment includes its own designated parking spot, and it's in an awesome location!
transit: The apartment building is located right off South Kihei Road, right within very easy walking distance to scenic beaches, the best surfing and stand-up paddling spot in Kihei, plus excellent restaurants, bars, shopping, food stores, surfboard and paddleboard rental shops, bicycle rentals, scooter rentals, and more. Taxis and Airport Shuttles can easily find this road and the bus stop for public transportation on the Maui Bus is less than half a block away on South Kihei Road. Nearby are towns to explore including Wailea, Makena, or further away Maalaea, Kahului, and Lahaina.  La Perouse Bay, which features an impressive landscape dominated by Maui's 500-year-old lava flow, is also a great drive to take when driving past the resort areas of Wailea and Makena. To explore a wider range of destinations on the large island of Maui, a rental car is highly recommended for comfort and convenience, and parking is free in a designated spot that is for your exclusive use during your stay.
access: Guests have full access to all of the amenities of the apartment plus a designated parking spot.
interaction: Your experienced Airbnb Super Host ensures that apartment is ready for you prior to the check-in time, so normally there is no need for the host to interact with guests in person.  The host for this apartment is on call and available via text messaging or phone calls or Airbnb messaging for any issues that arise before, during, and after a guest stay.

host.host_about: Thomas is a longtime resident of Maui and enjoys providing guests with comfortable vacation rentals in Kihei on the sunny South Shore of Maui. He is an experienced Airbnb Superhost who operates several vacation rentals all near the Charley Young Beach area of Kihei, Maui, each of which have earned a lengthy set of positive reviews from pleased guests.

reviews.comments:
First of all, Thomas is truly a Super Host! He is communicative, polite, and detailed with the itinerary. Thomas answered all of our questions quickly and made sure everything was good. We stayed in his lovely apartment for the weekend after extending our trip a couple more days. His home is clean, nicely decorated and a 5 minute walk around the block to Charlie Young Beach. He provided beach chairs and towels. I love that his apartment feels like you're staying in a hotel! 

The apartment is also close to restaurants and stores in Kihei. Thomas was very kind enough to send his personal favorite list of places to visit/eat in Maui! If you want a home away from home, this is the place to stay.
Good place to stay, Thomas made sure we were confortable and satisfied!

Sehr gute Ausgangslage für Ausflüge auf der ganzen Insel. Die Wohung war perfekt für 2 Personen und sehr nahe an einem tollen Strand.
Supermarkt sowie Bars und Restaurants gut zu Fuss erreichbar.
Reservierter Parkplatz direkt vor der Wohnung.

We enjoyed two wonderful weeks in this well equipped, great location apartment in Kihei. Thomas is an excellent and attentive host. Communication from the very start was fast and detailed. Every question was answered, and our request to start our trip a little early was accommodated without any fuss. He also sent us a PDF guide with lots of pages on tips for restaurants, beaches, snorkeling, driving adventures etc. A lot of them we followed.

The apartment itself is exactly as advertised. Comfortable, well equipped with all the essential kitchen appliances and accessories. Air conditioning in the main living room, and portable air conditioning in the bedroom which worked a treat during our stay. The added extras such as beach chairs, beach mats and a drinks/food cooler was very much appreciated, and used every day. Parking is right at the front and easy to access. 

The location is to die for. Having explored every part of this amazing Island we agreed that our favourite location was Kikei. The locals were very friendly, access to restaurants and supermarkets was just minutes away, and many of the Island learn to surf clinics (highly recommend doing this!) were run from a beach 5 minutes walk along the street. Every day we swam with turtles at the beaches immediately in the area of the apartment. You can literally walk out of the apartment, across the road and watch the sunset over the ocean every day. Amazing!

I highly recommend this apartment and Thomas as a host.

The apartment is really nice and perfect for a couple or a small family. Perfect location within walking distance to Charlie Young Beach (children-friendly) and Cove Beach (Surf Spot). Grocery store (Foodland & others), restaurants and markets are also within walking distance. Would definitely return here.

The flat is in a great location, clean and with all you need to have a comfortable stay. I didn't meet Thomas in person but he is for sure a great host.
Thanks for you space Thomas!

Great location, apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Loved the list of local attractions to visit while in Maui. 
Thomas was very helpful, he came to help us find the apartment the night of arrival. Thank You!

Thomas was an excellent host - from responsive, quick communication before our visit, to the nice little touches and treats in the apartment, all the way through our stay. 

His apartment was magnificent - very chic and nicely furnished, with a great kitchen and dishes, pans, and tupperware for making meals and cooking up local farmer's market produce. It's in a terrific location in Kihei with reserved parking, in close walking proximity to two great beaches for easy sunset viewing. He also sent us wonderful tips and .

Service above and beyond the norm: Thomas was even willing to receive a package and hang onto it when I realized I'd left ordering a bit late for it to make it all the way to the mainland before our trip. Truly outstanding service!

Thomas, thank you for your outstanding hospitality and beautiful space. I will be wholeheartedly recommending your apartment to friends!

What an incredible find:?)  Close to the beaches, very clean, plenty of amenities (laundry, well-stocked kitchen, comfy king sized bed and a private lanai!)  Thanks to our host, Thomas for accommodating us on short notice!  Your hospitality and aloha will not be forgotten!

If you are looking for a great place to stay with an excellent location to multiple beaches, dining, and shopping look no further! Thomas was a great host and his place was super clean and up to date with everything we needed plus more.
Very nice and clean apartment! Thomas is an amazing host and communication was excellent. Very flexible check in process.

The location was great and the space was exactly as described. Clean with well thought out details and all the best amenities.

The only issue was we found the bed to be a bit on the soft and lumpy side, that's about the only area that could be improved in this very nice space.

Location exceeded my expectations!
Great walking distance beach, shops and restaurants.
Quiet nights sleep and really appreciated the hair products in shower since I neglected to pack any. The place itself was clean and comfy!

Great location! walkable to some nice shops and great places to eat - but just far enough away from the “resort scene”. The beach is across the street, which makes catching a sunset or doing some spontaneous snorkeling quick and easy. The condo itself is roomy and a perfectly good spot to close your eyes. It is well suited for someone that likes to get out and doesn’t plan to spend a lot of time inside. Thomas is very responsive and even provided some local tips. Great spot!

This was my first time using Airbnb! And I’m converted! Thomas was awesome! He made me comfortable by assuring that the place is reserved and gave me specifics on how to find the it, parking, getting in, etc. This is the perfect location to explore the Kihei area. Exactly what we needed. Thank you so much!

Thomas’ place was easy to find and conveniently located...made a great starting point for our adventures. Cute and clean. Thomas also provided a couple of nice surprises and good suggestions for places to go.
Thomas was awesome!  Excellent communication, amazing location & nice touches.  I look forward to visiting again :)

Very good central location in Kehei, easy to get around from there to all the beaches.  Well equipped kitchen for cooking your own meals if you want.  Nice space, we spent several days there and were very comfortable.  Front room just a bit noisy because it's close to a busy road.  But the bedroom was very quiet and we slept great, super restful!  Excellent natural ventilation, air flow through was quite pleasant.  Thomas was very welcoming and helpful, we'd love to stay here again!
The apartment was good! We had a great time and everything was organised perfectly! Thank you!

Thomas’ apt was a comfortable place to relax and he had some very sweet touches for us when we arrived. Check in was seamless and he had 2 bottles of water for my husband and I in the fridge. He also laid out some snacks and candies for us, and had coffee and tea for us. We thought it was very kind of him to do that. The only con was that the air conditioner is in the bedroom closet, and when the closet door is closed it’s okay. But when you open the closet door to let that cool air into the room, the AC is loud. So this made it a bit difficult to sleep through at night. We were also bummed we never got to meet our host and we called him to inform him we were checking out and he never got back to us. Other than that he was communicative throughout our stay and we enjoyed our trip to Maui. :)

First of all, amazing host. Besides initial communications before check-in, I had to get in touch with Thomas quite  a few more time looking for advice and he was always very quick to get back to me and very thorough and informative with his answers. The only reason I did not give the place 5 stars is because the view from the living room is on the driveway where resident of that building park also. Basically, if you will bring up the bamboo shade curtain in the living room,  you might see people walking right by your window. Otherwise, everything that it says in the description is 100% correct. This is the best spot for the best beaches on Maui. Thank you, Thomas.

Thomas’s place was great! Close to the beach and places to eat and markets. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Lots of thoughtful little touches as well! 

Thomas was really helpful, accommodating and attentive. He let us keep our stuff there while on a snorkel trip! Great experience. Such a fun little town, wish we could have stayed longer! 

Thanks Thomas!
We loved the place. Walking distance to the beach, the apartment has everything you need. If i ever get to go back I’ll definitely stay here again. Thomas was very welcoming and helpful in every way.
Thomas’s place is a great deal! Very close to shops and restaurants and walking distance to the beach. Air conditioning was awesome as well! I would definitely stay again.

Thomas was so great! We had to book a last minute airbnb due to change in plans and he was so easy and amazing to work with. His directions were very clear and he went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable. (We appreciate all the little details!). The location really cannot be beat, you are seconds away from the beach. the apartment is beautiful, clean, and functional. Would definitely recommend or stay here again.
Great place to stay! Excellent host!
This place is indeed a rare find. Thomas is a good host and provided best service.
A real nice and convenient location was provided. Checking in was easy and texts were replied to promptly. The value and placating can’t be beat, the host can’t be replaced. Thanks again
Thomas’s Place was perfect! Great central location for exploring the island. He was a great host!

Thomas was an excellent host! I’m super picky so it was comforting to have a very clean and comfortable lodging space. The bed was super comfy and the shower was awesome.  If there had been a TV in the bedroom or the couch converted into a bed we may have never left the apt. It’s walking distance to everything Maui is. We would definitely stay here again.
Clean place, prompt response from host, no complaints!

Great location, quiet and spacious. None of which I was sure of from the outside, but it delivered. Far preferred the shopping and restaurants here to further south. Thomas is a very welcoming and responsive host.

The place is great! A winning note to all untanned people coming into Hawaii - they did have aloe vera in the bathroom. May not seem like a big deal but when it's 11pm and you're uncomfortable because of a bad sunburn, it seems like a touch of heaven! Great place and great location! We walked to restaurants (omg - the happy hour at Three's Bar - wish we had known the first night vs the last night...AMAZING!). Beach nearby wasn't great but we couldn't complain, as we drove to so many other breathtaking places. If this place is available, grab it and enjoy the time in Maui!

The location of this space is incredible. Nestled near plenty of restaurants, shops, and beaches, it was an excellent home base to explore the island of Maui from. Having a dedicated parking spot was especially useful, and the space itself is comfortable and convenient. Communication with Thomas was easy and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was an ideal choice and we’d be happy to stay in the space again!
Great apartment in a great location!
Thomas's place was just as advertised - close to the beach, nearby shops and restaurants on Kihei. It was comfortable and fit our needs well for our trip
This was a great place to stay. Spacious and clean. There were many beaches in walking distance as well as a lot of places around there that had great food. I would definitely stay here again.

Great place to stay and within a short walk to the beach.  

The host was quick to respond to all communications and was very friendly.  The accommodations were comfortable, modern and clean.

I would recommend for anyone staying in Kihei.

Large over rated all inclusive resorts are nice however, one doesn’t park themselves inside a hotel room for the entire duration. Thomas’ 1 br in Kehei, sits smack dab in the middle of every outdoor activity you could ask for. Full kitchen and laundry are smartly appointed, with comfortable furnishings.

Clean, quiet comfortable unit. We had three in our party and it was just enough space. Walking distance to a cute market with lots of restaurants. Host was very friendly and attentive to any questions during our stay.
great place awsome service. i definately recomend it 100%

Thomas apt is very comfortable and convenient given the location.  Everything you need is walking distance such as beaches, restaurants, bar and groceries.  I highly recommend this place for the best experience of Kihei and Maui.  Also the apt was clean, equipped with AC in every room.

Thomas has been very accommodating and kind since the very first time.  He has suggested to us several places and tips to enjoy as best as possible the island.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Thomas’ place in Kihei for a week and we loved it. Our favorite beach in Maui turned out to be Charley Young (which is a 2 min walk away). It’s also walking distance from some excellent restaurants and bars. Thomas was a great and responsive host. The place also comes with beach chairs and a beach umbrella which we found to be very clutch. It was definitely a welcoming environment for our vacation in Maui.
Thomas service is great. Easy to get ahold of, goes above and beyond, and makes for an excellent stay!

Great place to stay and Thomas was an amazing host. He definitely thinks of the little touches that make a great stay and make you feel welcome. We came in later in the evening. Knowing we were coming in late, he turned lights on for us and had cold waters in the fridge. Great to come in the door to after a long day of traveling. Will definitely look to rent from Thomas again on our next trip to Hawaii.

Thomas definitely holds the title of "Superhost" (honestly, if there was a title even higher than that, he deserves it)! Not only is he incredibly gracious and communicative as a host - when you get to your AirBnB, count on it being absolutely spotless and quite stylish with a "island getaway/Tommy Bahama" kinda vibe. We were stocked with towels, soap, shampoo, conditioner, even two bottles of water with a small welcome note! Such a sweet touch to an already wonderful stay! My boyfriend, who is hard to impress a lot of the time, now insists that we book only with Thomas whenever we're able to visit Maui, haha! We were sad to have only spent one night at the condo, but we were so glad it was in Thomas' AirBnB. We'll be back soon!
EXCELLENT location, wonderful host!

The rental was exactly as it was advertised. Extremely clean and convenient, and it had all the necessary amenities. Thomas was so welcoming and extremely responsive. I would say this rental had great value!
Great location close to the beach and restaurants!

The outside looks a bit shabby but the interior is very clean and modern. The proximity to Charley Young beach as well as good restaurants and shops is also a great benefit! We were very cozy and had a parking spot right outside the room. Thomas was very helpful and informative about places to visit in Maui. Would recommend!
Thomas's place is excellent. He provided local tips on places to check out and included a few things in the airbnb to make it feel like a home. I would 100% recommend.
Great hospitailty and lovation

What a great place! The value can’t be beat. Great location in Kihei. Walking distance to the shops and restaurants and bike shop. Beach has easy access nearby. The place is perfectly sized and has a big bathroom. Would absolutely stay here again when visiting Kihei. Don’t miss out. Book with Thomas now!

We loved the place! My husband and I spent the most vacation ever at Thomas place! It has everything shampoo, Soap,Bath towels and Even Beach towels, this place has all dishes you need coffee, spices all kitchen stuff, even Aloe Vera was available for us. Thomas is the Host everyone needs in Maui he put a lovely note for us to welcome us with A couple cold water bottles in the fridge with an Enjoy note as well!!!
The AC was in the Living room and the Bedroom which was very nice in the summer here! 
Another reason why Thomas is the best is our flight wasn’t until 8pm the day we were leaving but the checkout was 11am and of course Thomas found us another place to stay for another 6hours which gave us more time to play in the water and shower get ready for our flight. Yes I would recommend Thomas places to anyone wanting to have a relaxing vacation in Maui! We had the best week here. Thomas is the Best in this Island please book with him he deserves the 5 Stars and all the stars in the world.. 
Thank you Thomas for your best service! We love you and we’re sure coming back!!!
You will not be dissapointed.

The inside space was great! Nicely decorated, large size, good location, spacious new shower and comfortable bed! The bedroom AC was new and quiet, and the neighbourhood relatively quiet. It’s conveniently located a few blocks from a market, food trucks, beaches, Foodland, and the Kihei “Triangle” (a collection of bars, pubs and restaurants). Thomas was a good host - providing little welcome notes, local tips, and timely communication!! We enjoyed our stay!
Beautiful clean space, close to many beaches and Thomas gives amazing  local recommendations! Also very flexible with check-ins!

Die Unterkunft war ca. 5 Autominuten von diversen Restaurants, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Stränden entfernt, deshalb sehr gute Lage. Die Unterkunft selbst von aussen nicht sehr einladend, jedoch das Apartment selbst war sauber und willkommen, leider wenig tageslicht. Der Vermieter war sehr zuvorkommend und stets verfügbar bei Fragen. Können es weiterempfehlen

Thomas’ place is minutes away from quite a few beaches by walking, as well as great food options, parks, beach volleyball, markets, and shops. While it doesn’t have a view from the room, you can see the ocean and the sunset right outside of the villa. We enjoyed additional amenities, such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, blender, beach mats, cooler and lounge chairs. We could have stayed here longer for sure! Thank you!!

Mit der guten Beschreibung haben wir das Airbnb auf Anhieb gefunden. Mit kleinen Gesten hat es der Gastgeber geschafft uns willkommen zu heissen. Toll ausgestattete Küche, grosses Bad, alles in allem stimmt die Preis-Leistung sehr gut! Perfekt für 2 Personen.
The place was great and Thomas responded within minutes when we needed him.

Amazing place and Host! Thomas is a wonderful Host. His place is a great stay! He is quick to respond and provided vacation suggestions and tips for us! We were very grateful for the waters he left for us when we arrived!
 The location is central to many restaurants, shopping areas, and beaches! They are all within walking distance which is very convenient! The apartment is easy to find and the parking spot is great for quickly slipping in and out!   The couch and bed are both very soft and comfortable! There is plenty of drawers and closet space to store your things! The shower is also very nice and spacious! 
 When we were relaxing in the apartment, we enjoyed the refreshing Ac, large TV, and that it was quiet and peaceful! There is a full kitchen stocked with all dishes and utensils! We were able to cook some meals to save on eating out the whole time! Plus there’s a washer and dryer Incase you need to wash clothes! 
There is also a quaint outdoor area with a table and chairs under an umbrella to sit outside and enjoy a meal! At night there are decorative lights lining the  umbrella for some evening fun! 
Overall this place has everything you’d need and a little more for fun and relaxation! We will definitely stay here again!
Thomas place has all the amenities!
Good for value

The location of this place is amazing.  The Charley Young beach as well as the Cove are right there.  There are nice places to eat and shop close by as well.  The unit is nicely furnished.  Definitely recommended.

Nice little apartment, exterior doesn’t do the interior justice so don’t let that fool you. The complex is placed kind of awkwardly if you’re trying to get to and/or from the apartment by way of taxi/Uber but it’s not a big problem. Big TV in case you spend too much time under the sun and end up burnt. Modern kitchen with up to date appliances. More than enough room in the bathroom with a nice shower. Only thing that was lacking was a view but that’s a 30 second walk until you reach the beach. Overall good place to stay and enjoy Hawaii in.
Great hospitality and detailed information for local hot places. House is much beyond the expectation! Much more spacious and cleaner ! Best Airbnb that we have stayed at.
Easy access, soft bed, very clean bathroom, entire apartment was very clean! We enjoyed our one night stay here. Would stay again.
The apartment and the kitchen were fully equipped and we had a great stay. We really enjoyed it.

Thomas is a super host!  Much more comfortable than expected for the price. Very clean and accommodating to our unique situation. 

5 stars
Awesome location. Clean and great value. Definitely a “hotel” vibe but nice and super easy process!

We contacted Thomas as after a disastrous first attempt at another Airbnb.  He was so quick with his response that we were able to get in there right away.  He even had a special welcome note for us.  It's a great place in the perfect spot.  He responded quickly to questions regarding the TV(we're old folks who have an issue with technology).  The bed was super comfy.  Perfect location within walking distance of the beach.   Loved everything. Highly recommend this Airbnb.  We will definitely be back!

Thomas was an amazing host with very rich experience which could ensure your stay will be perfect, always super quick response and always consider questions from your side, not him. The condo has great location, and everything inside the house is NICE. Thank you Thomas

Thomas's place was perfect! Great location, right across the street from a beach with sunset views and walking distance to Kihei's "downtown" plus a number of restaurants and bars. The apartment itself is stocked with everything we thought we needed (towels, dishes, etc.) and things we didn't even think about (cooler, beach chairs, coffee and chocolate. etc) Absolutely recommend this place and will hopefully be back soon
Good place to stay, felt homely. Thomas was very prompt in responding.

Thomas's place was fantastic. Great location to beaches and restaurants. Super convenient parking. It was a very comfortable crash pad with all the perfect little details that make a great Airbnb. Thomas provided some bottles of water for quick access, there were USB plug ins everywhere, and lots of information about things to do on the island. Overall, I really enjoyed my brief stay.

Thomas' place was exactly what we needed. Fully furnished, great location and, most importantly, A/C working really well :)
Bonus points for the fast WiFi and yummy welcome treats when we checked in (chocolate, chips, water, etc.). We had a fantastic time and would definitely stay there again. Highly recommended!

There's a reason this place has so many five star reviews. The location is perfect, just a short walk to several beaches, restaurants, and activities. The description is correct - it doesn't look like much from the outside but the unit itself is very nice and has everything we needed for our stay. We took advantage of the beach chairs, snorkels, and Thomas's tips. Highly recommend!

Thomas was extremely accommodating and helpful. We arrived earlier than expected and Thomas helped get the room available sooner for us!  He provided an excellent PDF filled with tips about beaches and restaurants and it was easy to get in touch with him via the Airbnb messenger app or his personal cell phone number, which he included. His place was very spacious and clean... and very close to the beach! His TV is also very large and delivers a crisp picture for this that want to relax and watch a flick. I want to say it was either 65-70 inches. He also had a pair of flippers and 2 pairs of snorkeling gear.  Overall a great experience with Thomas!
Thomas has everything you need in his place—even the things you don’t think of.  Amazing host in a beautiful spot. He is very responsive to text messages and phone calls. Super awesome!!!
Thomas is a great host, but I did not expect dirty kitchen and bathroom.
Thomas was all the way super nice and helpful. His place is close to the beach and many bars in Kihei. The apartment was clean and perfectly equipped. We loved the terrace!
Thomas is great, super accommodating , we arrived into town a bit early and Thomas made preparations for us to snag an earlier check in. The best service available!

Very central location - 5 minute walk to the beach, 10 minute walk to shops and restaurants. My husband and son were unfortunately sick and spent a lot of time hanging out at the apartment. It’s not the best for that, as there is a decent amount of road noise and the living room looks out on the parking lot/busy road. However, if you plan to use this place as a home base for tons of exploring, it’s great. The laundry, full renovated kitchen, tons of bath and beach towels, bottled water, super clean make for a great place to sleep and head out for the day.
Very clean place, close to beach/restaurants and bars. Everything looks recently remodeled with a very cozy back deck. Would highly recommend and would stay again.
Perfect place great location. Great neighborhood. Would definitely stay again.

name: Gorgeous Apartment with Balcony & Terrace
summary: Brand new and modern apartment on a quite street in Williamsburg. It is only a couple blocks from the L train which takes you to Manhattan in 10 minutes. Both the bedroom and the living room have floor to ceiling east facing windows. You will have tons of sunlight and bright mornings! There is a specious balcony and access to a rooftop with spectacular Manhattan views and a BBQ. If you plan on staying longer or have a different price in mind, please send a message with what you have in mind.
space: The apartment has a beautiful kitchen has a huge countertop, oven & stove, microwave and has all the basics for cooking and eating at home. We also a Nespresso machine, which you can use to whip yourself espressos. We'll be leaving a sleeve of capsules for you. Some other amenities provided or available: large smart tv with Netflix, Youtube, etc, hair dryer, fresh linens and towels. Last, but not least, the balcony has newer furnitures than the ones in the picture. There is a love seat and an Acapulco chair now, so it will be much more comfy than the wooden chairs you see in the picture. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I want to make sure that you enjoy your stay!
description: Brand new and modern apartment on a quite street in Williamsburg. It is only a couple blocks from the L train which takes you to Manhattan in 10 minutes. Both the bedroom and the living room have floor to ceiling east facing windows. You will have tons of sunlight and bright mornings! There is a specious balcony and access to a rooftop with spectacular Manhattan views and a BBQ. If you plan on staying longer or have a different price in mind, please send a message with what you have in mind. The apartment has a beautiful kitchen has a huge countertop, oven & stove, microwave and has all the basics for cooking and eating at home. We also a Nespresso machine, which you can use to whip yourself espressos. We'll be leaving a sleeve of capsules for you. Some other amenities provided or available: large smart tv with Netflix, Youtube, etc, hair dryer, fresh linens and towels. Last, but not least, the balcony has newer furnitures than the ones in the picture. There is a love seat and an Acapu
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the best part (ok it's hard to be objective :)) of Williamsburg. You are close to the center of activity on Bedford street (about 15 minutes of walking or 2 stops on the subway), but you are remote enough that you have a quite space for yourself and a more spacious apartment. The neighborhood is an old Italian neighborhood, so you will have traditional Italian grocery stores, restaurants (il passatore is awesome) and pasta shops. You are also close to the best ramen places in Brooklyn like Okonomi or Suzume, or great Korean food in Greenpoint (Little Dokebi).
notes: The apartment is on the 3rd floor, so guests will have to go up 2 flights of stairs.
transit: The apartment is 5 minutes away from the subway (L line), which goes into Manhattan in 3 stops. So getting to downtown Manhattan doesn't take longer than 20 minutes. If you want to take an Uber / Lyft to anywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn that will also be a decent option.  Street parking is very easy in my neighborhood. Guests with cars have not had any trouble finding a spot.
access: Either I meet you or I leave the keys for you in a lockbox out front. I send you the code prior to your arrival. To assist check in and check out, guests can arrive and depart anytime of day or night I usually give a quick orientation to the space and the neighborhood. I am always available for advice and recommendations for dining, shopping and other services.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: This trip was for my Dirty 30!  Eytan's place was perfect for our NY trip celebrating the last of my 20s!  A short trip from the airport and great access to the subway made getting around so easy.  Next to local cafes and shops we were set.  My Husband and I spent most of the little time we were at the apartment  on the roof top where we witnessed beautiful sunrises and sunsets over the breath- taking Manhattan skyline, while we grilled some local foods we discovered.  The apartment itself is as advertised; modern/NY feel with a great window wall that opens letting you take in the sounds of the neighborhood on a cute little balcony.  Our host was away but available by phone for anything we needed.

Eytan's place was great. An awesome host! Available when needed and really helped us out in a pickle of flying in a day early. He was so great to extend our stay. Couldn't of had a better time. Place was just as listed. Clean and sleek.

We can absolutley recommend Eytan's apartment. We stayed for 5 weeks as an interim before we could move to our own apartment. We really felt home and had all we need. The apartment is super nice/stylish/modern, clean, in a quite neighborhood but in a great location with everything you need and close to the subway. In 15 minutes you are in Manhattan with L train. The best thing was Eytan's reachability. In case we had questions he answered really quick to make sure we are fine. He also texted sometimes just to check if we needed something.

I enjoyed my stay here. It was conveniently placed, in a quiet neighbourhood, yet fairly close to restaurants and cafes (walkable distance to those closer to the Lorimer Ave stop). Eytan was friendly, and checking in and out was easy.

My sister and I had a lovely long weekend at Eytan’s apartment. This place looked exactly like it did in the pictures – lovely. 

The only issue that we had was that it was only about 90% clean – there was hair on the toilet, the floor could have been swept, and if the shower curtain had been changed, this place would have been perfect. I understand that Eytan doesn’t charge a cleaning fee so it’s kind of understandable that the place wasn’t sparkling. Otherwise, it was just great. The bed and towels were clean. 

In terms of location, the apartment was near to public transportation and we felt safe walking at night in the neighborhood. 

My sister and I have to commend the host on his communication – he was just superb! It was never hard to get in contact with him and we really appreciate that. Thank you very much Eytan!!

Eytan was an extremely gracious host. He was very good about communicating everything to me in advance about check in and then throughout my stay to make sure everything was going well. When I arrived at the home It was even more beautiful then the pictures posted. Clean, comfortable, and accessible. It’s located in a wonderful neighborhood, close by public transit, with all the shops, markets, restaurants, and nightlife you need. I would absolutely return to stay at Eyton’s place on future trips to NY.
I enjoyed Eytan’s place. Lovely home, very clean. Definitely recommend. Check in/Check out were extremely easy. Responses were fast. Plenty of places in the area for grocery shopping and eating.

name: Historic Home Retreat
summary: The historic home is 15 minutes down the mountain to Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall and close to central Honolulu without getting on the freeway, yet the house is in a rain forest with many well-maintained hiking trails nearby.  Home offers spectacular views of Diamond Head & ocean. Unique Craftsman style architecture with sunrise/sunset views. A book describes the missionary family who built the house and feel you are living a part of Hawaiian history. Three  bedrooms (2 Queen beds, 1 full bed).
space: This is a registered historic home.  The owner can share stories of the missionary family and the building of their cool summer home in the days before air conditioning.
description: The historic home is 15 minutes down the mountain to Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall and close to central Honolulu without getting on the freeway, yet the house is in a rain forest with many well-maintained hiking trails nearby.  Home offers spectacular views of Diamond Head & ocean. Unique Craftsman style architecture with sunrise/sunset views. A book describes the missionary family who built the house and feel you are living a part of Hawaiian history. Three  bedrooms (2 Queen beds, 1 full bed). This is a registered historic home.  The owner can share stories of the missionary family and the building of their cool summer home in the days before air conditioning. The lot is 3 1/2 acres of wooded rain forest and terraced gardens.  There is guest parking up a long private drive lined by a bamboo forest. The house is on a sloped lot with limited disability access and small children should always be accompanied around the property since the property is in a rain forest. The owner lives in the
neighborhood_overview: If you've ever dreamed of living in a real rainforest jungle, now is your chance.  There are many well maintained hiking trails through the surrounding hills and forest.
notes: 1) The house is located in a conservation rain forest district. Utility water is provided through a catchment system from the rain which is not potable but used for showers, cooking, laundry, brushing teeth, etc. Potable drinking water is provided through bottled water which is kept filled daily and left at the doorstep. 2) There is wireless internet connection via fiber cable for TV viewing and to connect to devices. The home has cable TV; DVD player; no phone landline is in the house.  3) The house has a security monitoring system. 4) The house and property are maintained for the historic quality. The grounds are on a hill with limited disability access; children are welcome but should be accompanied at all times because the property is located in a hillside rain forest. 5) Fireplace has an electric built-in unit that provides heat. 7) Small space heaters in two bedrooms. 8) Parking for 1 vehicle with additional parking negotiable. 9) A car is necessary to access the property because
transit: Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall are a 15 minute scenic drive down the mountain.
access: The lot is 3 1/2 acres of wooded rain forest and terraced gardens.  There is guest parking up a long private drive lined by a bamboo forest. The house is on a sloped lot with limited disability access and small children should always be accompanied around the property since the property is in a rain forest.
interaction: The owner lives in the home next door and can offer advice on where to go in Oahu and make your stay more personalized.
house_rules: Like most private homes  in Hawaii, guests are asked to not wear shoes or slippers in the house. Shoes can be left inside the front door at the entry foyer. The historic home is in a neighborhood therefore are requested to minimize noise after 10 PM. Children are welcome but because the property is located in a hillside rain forest, children should always be supervised. For parties and events, noise level should be kept to a minimum after 10 PM out of respect for the neighbors.

host.host_about:
Professional.  I live in the adjoining home and take care of the property and grounds myself.  Interests are travel, hiking, sailing, wheel-thrown ceramics.  Favorite destinations are Bhutan and Antarctica.  Since the AirBNB home is a historic home, I love to tell the history of the important 19th century family who built it and their connection to the Hawaiian Kingdom.  There is a published book about the family's history in Hawaii and guests can read the book and hear stories of the family.  One chapter is about the construction of this house.  
Motto:  Life is too short not to be happy.

reviews.comments: From the moment we arrived until we left we LOVED our experience here!  Not only did the hosts go above and beyond by decorating the house beautifully (they even set up a Christmas tree!) but they were prompt to respond to any needs or questions we had about the house (we were lucky enough to have Stanton come over and tell us about the rich history of the house and the family that built it).  It is the perfect place if you love having a quiet retreat with gorgeous views and plenty of space to relax and take in the Hawaiian natural environment.  Because we were here for Christmas vacation we did a lot of cooking and the appliances are all top of the line.  The sleeping space is very comfortable in two of the bedrooms; the third bedroom has a pullout mattress that would work well for kids, but probably not ideal for most adults.

Our hosts Stan and Bruce were welcoming and accommodating.  They were quick to respond to our needs and inquiries. 
Quite a unique experience to have stayed in their beautifully restored historic home. Ample space with large rooms to comfortably accommodate our family of 3 adults and 3 teens.  The electric fireplace was a nice touch on chilly January nights.  The views were breathtaking! Great location !
It was a small surprise that the tap water was not potable but the drinking water is delivered to your doorstep  everyday.. There were a few geckos living inside(?)

This is a very large, updated historic home.  It is perfect if you want to be a little distance from the city.  There are hiking trails and a state park nearby. The kitchen is nicely furnished with modern appliances.  The beds had nice linens and were comfortable.  Our group was there to visit a relative who happens to live on the same road so it was very convenient for us. It is rather far from groceries, restaurants, tourist sights, etc.  There is a beautiful view of Diamond Head and the city, especially at night. There is no TV but some other electronic equipment which we did not attempt to use. The owners are very cordial and helpful.
Beautiful home with gorgeous views.  Very responsive, kind and helpful hosts.  Extremely highly recommended!
Great views.  Secluded.  Responsive host lives near by.

This historic home perched on a glorious hilltop overlooks Diamond Head and the ocean with views from every room. From the moment we arrived we were comfortable and happy. Our hosts were exceptional, the house is inviting, comfortable and has a terrific kitchen, and the little touches make you feel at home. Could not more highly recommend this hidden gem, but almost hate to share it because it is so wonderful. If you want a hideaway away from the crowds and traffic, if you love nature and hiking, birds singing and your own slice of paradise, this is your place.

Staying at the Wilder House is an opportunity to experience living in a historical Hawaian home, with the perks of a modern kitchen and baths.  Located high on a quiet mountainside, it offers spectacular views of Diamond Head and Waikiki.  The location provides a beautiful relaxing retreat, but is only 15 minutes away from the city.

Stanton and Bruce’s home is a rare and special find. We were in awe of the views, constantly changing with the prevailing winds. A fabulous home with even more fabulous hosts. I will stay there again!

Staying at the Wilder House is an experience. The history will grab you. The beauty will enthrall you. Peace will overcome you. The daily, intense rainbow will delight you. You will sleep deeply in the cool mountain air. The house will fulfill your every need. 

When you’re done with the hustle bustle, heavy traffic, crowded tourist spots, you come “home” to a home that is quiet, peaceful, breathtakingly beautiful. The view of Diamond Head will greet you every morning. The birds will amuse you and the gardens will occupy you for hours as you notice tropical beauty on tropical beauty. 

Read the book provided by Stanton and Bruce called “The Wilders of Waikiki .”  You will be immersed in the intricate intertwining of the Wilders into the workings and government of Hawaii, first with the royalty and then with the territorial government. You get swept up in the parties held at the house in the clouds. You realize how important the people that lived there were and now you are living there for your vacation. In this house you are a resident. A part of its history. Important to it living on by the energy you bring.

I will come back to the Wilder House hoping it remembers my energy and welcomes me again. I’ll gladly drive up the mountain with its hair raising, hair pin turns and drop off cliffs. The higher you go, the more rain forest you twist through. You see bamboo, eucalyptus, orchids, vines and banyons seemingly holding up the forest canopy. It’s a world separated from the usual reality. 

I hope you decide to stay at the Wilder House. You will be very happy with the experience. It’s as far from a hotel room you could ever get.   ALOHA OE

This place is unique with spacious rooms and areas for various activities. you would want to spend more time here to enjoy visiting with your friends and family. The views are spectacular. A very nice place to stay for the value.

Beautiful location with unmatched views. Plenty of room inside. Spotless rooms and complete cooking supplies. Washer/dryer much appreciated after traveling. Site matched or exceeded its description and photos.
Beautiful home.  Spacious.  Airy.  Incredible views.  Wonderful hosts.  This place is a real gem!

After a long flight from New Zealand, this beautiful historic house was a delight - comfortable, clean, interesting decor and all the extras to make our stay relaxing and comfortable. The house restorations have added to what was a stunning place to begin with, with lots of quiet spaces for reading, amazing views, and a lovely section to explore. We were traveling with a 2 year old, and he just loved the house and the garden. Stanton & Bruce are charming and interesting hosts, who added special touches to our visit. We thoroughly recommend this as an oasis away from the bustle of Honolulu, yet very accessible.

Stanton and Bruce's historic house is incredible and breathtaking.  My family and I absolutely loved it and truly appreciated the house's majestic mountain surroundings.  In addition to the priceless views that the house offers, Stanton and Bruce are wonderful and gracious hosts.  They were attentive to our needs and immediately responded to any inquiries / requests we had.

This may be the best place to stay in all of Honolulu.  The house is jaw droppingly beautiful with a storied history in every corner and with views of the valley and ocean that are one of a kind.  Stanton is a caring host, ready to fix problems, tell stories, and share genuine hospitality as the situation arises.  It really would be impossible to overstate what an incredible house and caring, thoughtful host this proved to be.  Much thanks for the amazing stay!

World Class location! Spectacular views! Caring hosts! Historic, comfortable home!  Hawai'i doesn't get any better. This location, high up on curvy Round Top Drive, will give you the best of both worlds: an historical home, once owned by the scions of Waikiki, kept in close to original condition, yet with all the updates one needs to fully enjoy the house, away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Honolulu, yet a quick drive to any venue in the area. Shower in soft rainwater while looking out at the lush foliage surrounding the house. Sit on the meditation bench on the terraced yard while observing the grandeur of Diamond Head and Waikiki. Watch the beautiful tropical birds, including bright green parrots, as they flit through the trees. Your stay at The Wilder House will be one of the most memorable you will have in Hawai'i!
Great views and super neat house. Loved the sunroom and the giant lounger in the living room.
The superlative reviews that other guests have written about this place and it’s hosts are all spot on. I doubt there is a better Airbnb location in all of Hawaii.

This home was unbelievably beautiful and the perfect place for our family retreat. With the views and privacy that it offers, we didn't want to leave! It is even better than all of the photos and all of the living and personal spaces are beautifully maintained and historic. What a treat to be able to walk the same steps as others have for over 100 years. We will be back!

An opportunity to stay at Stanton's house should not be missed! The house has been impeccably restored and cared for with modern comforts added to the historic charm. Walking into the house and catching the view is absolutely breathtaking! The house is only a short drive from town (and Lyft accessible!) but feels worlds apart from the chaos of Waikiki. It is the perfect space to share family meals, bird watch, write your next novel, or simply unplug for a while. I wish I could stay for months at a time!

The views! Oh my goodness, the views. You won't find a lovelier view of Honolulu. It's a bit of a trek to get to the house (and you may find that Ubers are reluctant to take you up the winding hill, so would recommend a rental car), but it's worth it. We experienced some slight problems with the electricity due to some uncharacteristic storms, but the hosts very graciously worked with us to resolve the issue and make us whole for our stay. The home itself is lovely, and is great for hosting a large group (amazing living space on the top floor, spacious kitchen). Highly recommended!

Beautiful house with a fantastic view. We greatly enjoyed the sunrise every morning with our coffee. The house is clean and well kept up. Convenient to Waikiki/Honolulu (about 20 mins drive) but quiet since the house is located up on the mountain. Stan greeted us and provided information on the history of the house as well as suggestions for local restaurants to try.  The house also is located very close to a State Park with a great lookout point and hiking trails.

Expect an AMAZING view of Diamond Head and the Honolulu skyline any time of the day. The private backyard was a great place for our group of 6 to bond and experience Oahu’s nature first-hand as birds gathered early in the morning to feast on the feeder (a very small, but very nice touch!). The kitchen, dining, and living room spaces were also terrific hangout places between our adventures to Oahu’s attractions/destinations, of which many of them were approximately 30 minutes, making this house a central location for visitors. At least 15 of those minutes are dedicated to going down a mountain road (about 4 miles). So to the designated driver, be prepared! This was our 3rd time in Oahu and this house was by far the greatest living experience we’ve had in this island when compared to our previous stays at Waikiki hotels.

name: Spacious double room with balcony
summary: El piso tiene una habitación (cama doble) con un salón proprio, sofás y su bonito balcón. El piso está  ubicado a 15 minutos caminando del passeig de gracia y 10 minutos de la sagrada familia. SE HABLA ESPAÑOL / ON PARLE FRANÇAIS / WE SPEAK ENGLISH / PARLIAMO ITALIANO Hay 1 estación de metro y bus a 5 minutos caminando de casa.  El piso está a la cuarta planta sin ascensor. Le entregaremos el código de wifi para utilizar Intenet.
description: El piso tiene una habitación (cama doble) con un salón proprio, sofás y su bonito balcón. El piso está  ubicado a 15 minutos caminando del passeig de gracia y 10 minutos de la sagrada familia. SE HABLA ESPAÑOL / ON PARLE FRANÇAIS / WE SPEAK ENGLISH / PARLIAMO ITALIANO Hay 1 estación de metro y bus a 5 minutos caminando de casa.  El piso está a la cuarta planta sin ascensor. Le entregaremos el código de wifi para utilizar Intenet.
house_rules: - Main rule is RESPECT - No guests without host consideration - No Noise before 9.00 and after 22.00  - Help us to keep the house clean - 40€ fees for lost keys

reviews.comments:
On ne peut pas imaginer mieux pour un séjour.
Johan est disponible, bienveillants et remplit de gentilles attentions !
La chambre est belle et confortable le rooftop encore plus !
Mention spéciale pour le petit déjeuner copieux et complet 
Je recommande !

Johan was an amazing host, super friendly he speaks many languages an and very helpful with advice on Barcelona. The room was very comfortable for my boyfriend and I. The flat and roof terrace were lovely and quirky great hangout to relax in ! I can't wait to visit again. ❤️

We loved staying at Johan's. Johan is such a nice guy and made sure that we had everything we needed to enjoy our stay and totally relax. The apartment itself is lovely, and exactly as it looks in the pictures. It's also really close to the metro so you can get everywhere you need to get to super speedy, but also walking distance to most places. The roof terrace is also an amazing bonus about his place. Would totally recommend staying with Johan!!

El departamento está ubicado en una de las mejores y más lindas Partes de Barcelona, alejados del kaos de los turistas pero a 10 minutos caminando de plaza Cataluña. La habitación era hermososima!! Con un balcón y una cama gigante no necesitábamos más nada. 
Johan siempre fue muy amable con nosotros desde el primer día, es muy gracioso y da mucho gusto pasar tiempo con él charlando y disfrutando una cerveza desde su terraza. 
Lo recomendamos 100% y esperamos poder volver a alojarnos allí.

Johan was super accommodating, friendly, and helpful. He gave us a bunch of excellent suggestions on where to go for food/nights out and was more than happy to help us with anything we needed.

The room was spacious and comfortable and the location was just a short walk from the Gothic Quarter (my favourite area). 

Nothing but good things to say, loved it!

Johan is a great host! Super welcoming, warm hearted and knowledgeable. He helped us a lot to plan our trip. The location is also pretty good. Walkable to the city centre. If you don't like long walks, bus or subway are all very easily accessible

Johan è stato un ottimo padrone di casa, è molto socievole e disponibile. La casa è vicino alla Sagrada familia e alle fermate dei mezzi pubblici con i quali si raggiungono spiagge e le principali attrazioni turistiche. La stanza e la casa in generale sono accoglienti e ben tenute. Ci siamo trovati davvero bene !

What a wonderful stay! Johan is the most friendly, cool and helpful host ever, his place felt like home straight away. The room is large and comfy and has lots of extra little touches, and the roof space great if you want to have a drink up there. Location is fantastic too, you can walk to a lot of places like El Born for food and drink, and there is also a Metro station really close. Would definitely recommend!

Very friendly guy, easy to contact and quick to respond which makes things simple when finding the place.
Upon arrival we shared a bottle of wine and talked for a few hours, we were made to feel very welcome.
The flat is lovely and kept clean, with a central location easily walkable to all the main areas of barcelona.
Very happy with our stay and Johan as a host would highly recommend to anyone wishing to visit.
Gorgeous room in a super funky apartment. Johan and Sammy are so cool and super nice, made us feel completely at home. Nicest Airbnb I've been to, couldn't reccomend it enough!!

Johan et Sam sont vraiment très accueillants, agréables et ouverts à la discussion. Ils sont pleins de bons conseils et peuvent vous donner de bonnes adresses !
La chambre est très spacieuse, lumineuse, propre (tout comme l'appartement). Elle est située dans un passage donc c'est vraiment calme ! Une terrasse atypique et au top sur le toit :)
L'appartement est très bien situé, dans le centre, proche de la Sagrada, des transports et du reste (ramblas, place de Catalogne, tour Agbar, plage à environ 20/30min à pied). Parfait pour découvrir Barcelone !
Il faut juste savoir que l'appartement est situé au 3e sans ascenseur.

On recommande vraiment cet chambre, tout comme Johan et Sam ! Merci pour tout !!!

We walked in as strangers and now a larger family sits in our hearts. In their Truthfulness Johan and Sami make you feel at home and at total ease in their small bohemian apartment, placed in the most strategic of spots, a quiet little street 5 minutes (walking distance) from Arc de Trionf. The room is charming and full of details, the house full of plants that Sami saves from the street :)
If you love Life in its widest, deepest, most authentic definition, this is certainly the place for you.

My partner and I stayed in this apartment for 4 nights in early October and had a fantastic overall AirBnB experience. This was the first time we had rented a room - rather than an entire place - so we were a little apprehensive before arriving. Our nerves were soon settled however as Yohan checked us in (late in the evening!) with a nice glass of Cava (or two), as well as showing us around the flat and making sure we knew where everything was.

The flat is in a good area if you are willing to walk - 10 minutes from the Sagrada Familia, 10-15 minutes from the L'arc de Triomf, and probably another 10 minutes further until you reach the Gothic Quarter. All in all it suited our needs and can be accessed via the Metro (subway) if necessary (Girona - 5 minute walk). There may have been other stops closer but we didn't pass them!!

Yohan and Sammy (spelling?) were fantastic hosts and made us feel very welcome from the start to the end. They kept the flat really clean and tidy, were hospitable and friendly, and ensured we had a great experience in beautiful Barcelona!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Because of my flight, I had to check in too late (1:00am). But, Johan waited for us, and he was sooooo kind :) His kindness made our trip more valuable. And then, Sami and Johan provided coffees and snacks :) If I had a chance to visit Barcelona again, I will meet them definitely. I recommend this place !

name: A place just in the heart of beşiktaş.
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: Şair Leyla Bistro. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: insanlar, ortam, semt ve dış mekan. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar, kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar, aileler (çocuklu) ve tüylü dostlar (evcil hayvanlar) için uygundur.
description: Mekanım şuraya yakın: Şair Leyla Bistro. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: insanlar, ortam, semt ve dış mekan. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar, kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar, aileler (çocuklu) ve tüylü dostlar (evcil hayvanlar) için uygundur.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Thanks to Aytaç for his hospitality, responsibility, good communication skills, good personality,  perfect location of home and many many things.  

He is a person that should be met in life.

I consider staying again.   Location is in a perfect place and very close to public transport stations. Also so close to restaurants and pubs. 

Please don't forget that this place is his home, not a five star hotel and he is offering very reasonable price.

You cannot ask for a better location as this place is right in the hub of Besiktas where every thing is so accessible: Bahceshir university, ferries, busses, shops and cafes of all types, banks, even a mall and a  mosque, all literally around the corner within a short walking distance. The apartment is clean and the small balcony in one of the two bedrooms, overlooking a nice garden, is a definite plus. The large comortable  bed  was the main feature of the bedroom. I was unable to get the TV going and a small desk and chair would be a useful addition in the bedroom if it was to be  used by a student. a couple of extea pots and pans in the kitchen would'nt hurt either.

Aytac was an excellent host since the beginning. The place might not be the nicest place in Istanbul, but it serves it's purpose really well.

Aycan also cared enough as I have issues with smoke (most people in Istanbul seem to smoke). Aycan was kind to move to another area in the house so smoke wouldn't get into my room.

Really recommended for anyone who needs a quick cheap place to stay

Aytac is a really nice guy. He replies to messages quickly. My check in to his house was really smooth even though I arrived late at midnight and he still ordered pizza upon my arrival. He recommended me great places to go in Istanbul. He is always up for a chat and could talk just about anything.

Aytac’s place is really convenient to get to places around Istanbul. Just a few meters outside his place, there are a lot of eateries and cafes which open up till late. There is also a grocery store about 3 mins walk from the house. The neighborhood seems safe.

The house is clean and the room is spacious. Hot water for the showers running 24/7. The bed is comfortable and the room has a heater.

Well Aytac has a good heart and tries to help as much as he can. I arrived late and he was kind enough to receive me. The apartment is well located close to everything. The room well.... has to work a bit on it. I can understand his lack of experience but im sure he will get better with future guest.
Perfect location, cozy, convenient, nice, and Aytach is the perfect company

name: Apt 2 quartos e 3 banheiros, sofa cama na sala.
summary: Apt completo com maq. de lavar e secar com ar condicionado nos dois quartos, fica a 10 min do parque olímpico com estacao do BRT em frente e supermercado com farmácia, lotérica ao lado. 10min das praias  do Recreio, Macumba, Prainha e Grumari. 5 min de dois shoppings Americas e Recreio shopping.
space: Condominio com segurança e vagas de garagem coberta e garagem para visitantes. Piscina e quadra de tênis e poliesportiva.

reviews.comments: Nós amamos o apartamento e o condomínio. Foi uma experiência bem legal. O Carlos deixou deu todo o suporte que precisamos há todo instante. O condomínio também é bem legal. Ambiente familiar. Foi incrível.

name: Unit 414 Luxurious Top Floor Condo Great Views
summary: If you prefer high-end living, this condo is for you!  It is fully renovated and gorgeous with amazing ocean and courtyard views!   Kana'i A Nalu is a quiet resort on the ocean front away from the road.  This complex sits  on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. Wonderful for romantic sunset strolls or for a beach run.   This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and centrally located between South and North Maui.
space: The condo is elegant and luxurious in decor and comfort!  This property is stunning and the views are spectacular.  You may not want to leave the condo. Welcome to Kana'i A Nalu a quiet resort that sits on the ocean away from the road.  This complex sits directly on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. This setting is wonderful for romantic sunset strolls. For the more active person this is a great beach to run on as you can do so for miles in peace away from the crowds. The west end of the beach is Haycraft Park and Ma'alaea Harbor. If there is a big south swell, the wave off the harbor, "Freight Trains," can be one of the best in the world attracting expert surfers. Towards the east of Ma'alaea is a great spot for windsurfing, during both trade and Kona winds. This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and it is centrally located on the island between South and North Maui. Three miles of quiet sandy beach w

Kana'i A Nalu is a quiet resort on the ocean front away from the road.  This complex sits  on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. Wonderful for romantic sunset strolls or for a beach run.   This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and centrally located between South and North Maui. The condo is elegant and luxurious in decor and comfort!  This property is stunning and the views are spectacular.  You may not want to leave the condo. Welcome to Kana'i A Nalu a quiet resort that sits on the ocean away from the road.  This complex sits directly on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. This setting is wonderful for romantic sunset strolls. For the more active person this is a great beach to run on as you can do so for miles in peace away fr
neighborhood_overview: Hidden gem in terms of location and the long expansive beach!  This complex is quiet and away from the busy roads.  Plus it is only a 20 minute drive to Lahaina and 20 minutes to Wailea and 15 minutes to the airport. This lovely resort sits on Sugar Beach!  You can walk for miles on the soft sandy beach! There are other boating trips that depart from other harbors and Maalaea Harbor is less than a mile from our other beautiful rentals Kanai A Nalu and Island Sands. Many dive/snorkeling excursions and sunset dinner cruises take off from here.  Maalaea Harbor has wonderful dining experiences for all budgets and a variety of cuisine choices to whet the appetite!  There are fun activities for the kids and adults visit Maui Golf and Sports Park.  You can play miniature golf, X-treme trampoline, rock wall climb, and bumper boats.  If you want to venture under water and stay on dry land visit the Maui Ocean Center!  Named one of the Top 25 Best Aquariums in the U.S. by TripAdvisor, the Aquari
notes: A short walk down the quiet, tree-lined road will lead you to Ma’alaea Harbor with its great restaurants and shops, including the Five Star rated waterfront. Just steps away is the Maui Ocean Center Aquarium, a putt-putt golf course, rock climbing wall, trampoline and bumper boats. Fun for the entire family!    The lanai is the perfect place to enjoy morning coffee or tea as you watch the whales playing (December-March) or boats going in and out of the harbor. The ocean front heated pool is set in a tropical landscaped courtyard that will inspire you to relax.  If you’re not into swimming there are plenty of lounge chairs for reading and sunning. There are charcoal barbecues and a gas grill for you to use. This 950 sq ft condo has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, both have identical walk-in showers one has an added bench for sitting.  This lovely home is a highend remodel suite  for guests who want to stay in luxury and comfort.  Enjoy the tropical décor, three flat screen TVs, and
transit: Maui offers public bus system less than a mile from the complex.  We also have UBER and taxis.  We include a reserved parking spot for your rental car.
access: The entire condo is for private use for guests
interaction: We live here on Maui and are available by telephone and e-mail Please follow the rules in the check-in documents that you will receive by email less than 60 days prior to check-in date
house_rules: MVFA LLC dba Maui Vision Rentals (Agent) Cancellation, Deposit & Booking Policies Rental Rules: Guest agrees to abide by the Rental Rules.  Guest shall cause all members of the rental party and anyone else Guest permits on the property to abide by the following rules at all times while at the property including rules posted at the condominium complex.  By accepting this reservation and paying for the rental, guest enters the condo agreeing to all terms and conditions of this agreement and accepts responsibility for all guests of the property. Guest shall not permit any use of the pool by unsupervised children.  An adult Guest must accompany children and be present at all times. Guest and other invitees shall use the pool at their own risk.  Please respect the posted rules. Mandatory Occupancy Disclosures: You must disclose to us the exact number and names of guests (subject to maximum) who will be occupying the Property during the rental term.  You must immediately notify us, by phone

host.host_about:
I am the owner of Maui Vision Rental. Maui Vision became a reality and a business starting with my personal condo at the Kihei Akahi Resort C618.

Maui Vision is a business I love because I get to share the Aloha Spirit, the beauty of the land, and talk story with people from around the world. It is nice to know that we can contribute to someone’s Hawaiian vacation experience in a positive way. We love to hear back from our happy guests.

I used to live on the island of Oahu with my US Navy family when I was young.  We later moved to Southern California.  I knew one day I would return to Hawaii, the place I fell in love with long ago. I took a leap of faith and purchased my Maui condo June 2002 this was the beginning of fulfilling her prophecy to once again return to Hawaii soil.

I am a tropical expression artist who paints on canvas and etched metal.  My work is inspired by the beauty of the islands and has been displayed in several Maui art galleries over the years.  I am a writer and have my first book on Amazon.  I recently took up hula dancing and love to immerse myself in the culture and grace of this island.

I have over 25 years of business administration and customer service experience working for large corporations and high tech startups.

If you are in need of a caring Realtor here on Maui, please contact Kathy McCartney RS#77317 of La Costa Realty Hawai’i, LLC Brokerage Lic #18349 .

reviews.comments: This is a beautiful condo!  The unit is exactly as seen in the pictures.  Very nicely renovated with all the needed condiments and supplies.  Unit is on the 4th floor so it has a beautiful view.  Location is perfect.  Right in the middle of the island and central to all the things we wanted to see and do.  Building is nice and quiet.  Beach is beautiful for taking long walks and the breeze keeps things nice and cool.  Kathy was fantastic to work with.  She provided everything we needed in advance along with recommendations for things to see and do and places to eat.  She responded extremely quickly to any questions or concerns during our stay.  Would highly recommend and would definitely return!  Thank you for making our stay in Maui so enjoyable!
Description was spot on, quiet building, excellent aminities. Will stay again!

The house is simply amazing. The location is perfect, in the middle of th Island, and the condo is literally by he ocean. The sound of the ocean at night... We'll miss that! 

It's also fully equipped. I can't think of anything we needed that wasn't already there: beach towels, swimming pool noodles, picnic bag, kickboards... You name it! 

Same thing with the kitchen. High-end appliances and enough pans and tableware to cook and serve a full thanksgiving meal.

100% recommended!

Beautiful condo, location is great for anything you want to do on Maui, kitchen has everything you could possibly need to prepare meals.  We had extra towels and blankets.  Towels for the beach and pool.  Kathy has thought of everything.  Wifi access and TV were also awesome when we returned from  a fun filled day to relax.

Excellent Property and Excellent location.  I secured this property for a client.  They enjoyed their stay immensely.  Host reported a carpet stain afterward, however I cannot pursue compensation without photos.  So other than that----excellent experience.

This was my first trip to Hawaii and having used Airbnb successfully before, I was looking forward to our stay! While I can usually overlook most shortcomings, the list was too many to ignore here. Wide angle pictures & professionally written listing descriptions will impress most - however, here are some takes from my REAL customer experience at the 414 condo:

"We will provide you with a special code to access the condo after you are booked and paid in full."

- After a 13 day stay, we were charged a "half day rate" for a late checkout for 5 hours over our contracted stay. During our last day, we ended up being locked out of the condo. Thankfully the late checkout fee was refunded due to this situation. Not quite the goodbye from our paradise as we hoped for.

"This unit includes a window A/C in the living room should you need it although we find it is rarely needed because the tradewinds keep you comfortable."

- The AC unit is a measly 12" by 32" window unit that had trouble keeping even the living room & kitchen areas cool. If 86 degrees in your bedroom while sleeping is "comfortable", then this might be the place for you.

"This setting is wonderful for romantic sunset strolls. For the more active person this is a great beach to run on as you can do so for miles in peace away from the crowds."  -- "Three miles of quiet sandy beach will entice you to walk, run, or build sand castles."

- Haycraft Park is roughly 500 feet away from the beach directly in front of this condo, and it was filled with people every day. Half the time we were here, there were campers there who stayed all day and over night with big fish lines across the entire beach. There may be other listings with better seclusion. 

"This unit is spacious and bright."

- Spacious? That's a stretch. But bright? You're absolutely spot on. If you enjoy sleeping in the dark, this place might NOT be for you. Waking up at 530am is ideal for the lighting of this condo, ever with the window shades (which many times had trouble coming down since they are on automatic motors). 

A POSITIVE NOTE:
One thing I cannot get over is the real Mahalo spirit of everyone staying and living at the Kana'i A Nalu resort. While my mother in law and 16 month old daughter got locked out on the last day, many guests there offered help, water, and to hang in their condos while we tried to wait patiently to get back in. The resort has an amazing location and even better spirit within its guests.
Beautiful condo. Fully renovated. Very responsive. Wonderfully stay

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. It is just as pictured and so much more!  I couldn’t imagine staying anywhere else when visiting Maui. The location is convenient to get to many of the must-sees in Maui. The beds are amazingly comfortable. Kathy was great to work with. I highly recommend you consider staying here.

This unit was very cozy and had a great location.  It has been updated and was very nice in the accommodations!  The host was great to work with and the overall experience was a vacation of a life-time!

The condo is set up very nice. The kitchen is equipped very well and has all amenities. Bedrooms and bathrooms have a good size for a vacation. It would be nice to have a full size dining table, but we've used the kitchen counter instead, which worked for us.
Note that Maalaea is probably the most windy spot on the island and you'll have wind noises from the trees all day and night long. The condo complex features a nice courtyard with grass and a small pool and direct access to the beach and ocean.

Beautiful space in a nice quiet location to unwind and relax.  Our family had a very nice time unwinding and relaxing at Kathy's place.  Beds are very comfortable, the updated kitchen is beautiful and accommodating for preparing meals.  The condo and the building are well maintained and very clean.  The easy access to the beach is a plus.  In condo washer and dryer is also a plus for light packing.  Host was very responsive when there was an issue with the cable box.  You can't go wrong with booking Kathy's place.

name: Privately Gated Oceanfront Estate
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). A Piece of Maui Paradise HAWAII TAX ID is #W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) We do not rent for weddings or large gatherings but we are happy to make suggestions to our booked guests (URL HIDDEN)
space: Enclosed by 30-foot tropicals on property lines to ensure privacy. Behind our gate is a sprawling property that is perfect for your Maui stay. This property is something dreams are made of.  There is a separate ohana (guest house) which can also be rented. Please ask if interested as it is not included and is rented out separately. Nestled right on the ocean in Maalaea Bay, the gentle sounds of the waves will lull you to sleep every night.  Sunrise and sunset views of Haleakala are directly in front of you. Relax on the king sized swinging bed on the lanai and read a book or on one of the hammocks on property.   During whale season they come in to this bay to give birth and play, so close sometimes you don’t need binoculars but we provide them just in case. Our Property offers, our rooftop deck has large sun beds that are pretty spectacular day or night, stargazing like you’ve never seen before.  Try our in-ground trampoline to keep everything moving or relax in the 12 seated Jacuzzi w
