neighborhood_overview: We are centrally located on the island and close to almost everything
notes: There is a guest house on property that also rents. If you are interested in a completely private stay please inquire about renting both. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING IN THE UNIT OR ON THE DECK. SMOKING MUST BE DONE IN THE PARKING LOT. WE DON'T DO CHECK IN/OUT'S ON THANKSGIVING, CHRISTMAS EVE, CHRISTMAS DAY, NEW YEARS EVE, NEW YEARS DAY OR JULY 4TH. IT ALLOWS OUR SMALL STAFF TO ENJOY THE HOLIDAYS WITH THEIR FAMILIES. PLEASE NOTE IF YOU BOOK ON THESE DAYS THE RESERVATION WILL BE CANCELLED
transit: We recommend renting a car We also recommend Turo website for car rental.
interaction: Our office is on Maui and we are available 24/7 to help with any issues or requests
house_rules: PLEASE REMEMBER THIS IS A SHOE FREE HOME, LIKE MOST IN HAWAII ☺ ON YOUR ARRIVAL HAVE A LOOK AROUND AND IF YOU FIND ANYTHING UNSATISFACTORY PLEASE INFORM ME IN THE FIRST 24 HOURS OF YOUR STAY WITH US.  WE WILL WANT TO RECTIFY IT IMMEDIATELY SO YOU CAN ENJOY YOUR STAY. CHECK OUT TIME IS 11AM LATE CHECK OUTS CAN BE ARRANGED FOR A ½ DAY RATE CHARGE, JUST ASK US. IT WOULD ALLOW YOU TO RELAX AND STAY UNTIL YOUR FLIGHT WHATEVER TIME THAT MAY BE. PLEASE WASH YOUR SANDY FEET WITH ONE OF THE HOSES OUTSIDE BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE.  PLEASE DON’T PUT DIRTY FEET ON THE SOFA MASTER BATHROOM LOCKS BY LIFTING THE HANDLE UP, YOU CANT TELL FROM INSIDE ITS LOCKED BUT IT IS. DO NOT LEAVE THE HOME UNLOCKED WHEN YOU ARE NOT HOME. WE ASK THAT YOU LEAVE OUR HOME IN SIMILAR CONDITION AS DELIVERED All dishes, pots, pans, silverware and glasses returned to their places All opened food discarded, items in sealed containers may be left All trash is taken out to the trash bins.  	All air conditioners are turned of

reviews.comments: Amazing property.  Could not be happier with this stay.  The house is beautiful, the surrounding front and back outdoor area is very spacious, interior is tastefully decorated, and the ocean is just yards away.  This was a perfect stay for our 2 yr old daughter who had lots of room to run around and absolutely loved the outside trampoline. The location is central to driving to Kihei, Lahaina, Paia or Kahalui. One of the best places my family has stayed.  There are charming ducks and chickens roaming around on the property - the only slight downside was the great amount of duck poop on the porch every morning but it was an easy cleanup with the outside hose.  It was a small thing compared to our wonderful stay.

Despite the fact that there is not that much in the walking distance (yes, there is a beach and some small stores), this location is a great one as you are in the central position of the island and nothing is more than 20 minutes away. Property itself looks even better than in the pictures and it is quite large. House is very nice and you will probably find everything you need even though if you plan to cook every day you might be somewhat limited. Biggest problem we encountered is something that looked cool at the beginning - ducks walking around the property. They would constantly poop at the front deck and the deck would quickly become disgusting and unusable. Even if you wash it out with the hose, it will take them no time to make the mess again. However, somehow they decided to leave the back (ocean side) deck alone so we were able to truly enjoy the beautiful view.  I would recommend the place to couples or families with older children - not babies or small kids as the bedrooms are awkwardly placed (one is right at the entrance door) so you have to walk through the whole house to get to second bedroom. The host vas very helpful and responded quickly to all our questions.
Awesome place! Rented as two couples and had a blast.

This house is amazing. The view, style and amenities suited our family of four for relaxation, cooking, and fun. All in a great location. The Ma'alaea General Store nearby, which Kristine also owns, is a great stop for food, smoothies and basic supplies. The only downside is the duck poop on the front porch, but everything else well made up for that small detail. We had a great time and would do it again.
Absolutely beautiful property.   Even on an extremely cold and stormy day, the house was a beautiful place to relax.  Communication with Kristine was great.  We had a wonderful stay.

A beautiful quiet and relaxing home away from the crowds and walking distance to the beach. A perfect home for our family of 4.  We all enjoyed the in ground trampoline, the resident ducks, and the turtles swimming along the shore. We hope to return soon! ❤️

The home is perfect, exactly what I dreamed of from every aspect. Central location, right on the water, great areas to hang out from hammocks to daybeds to loungers and couches. Incredible open kitchen has everything a chef needs with a great floor plan that keeps you part of the action in the house and still connected to the ocean. 
The bedding was exquisitely comfortable, especially with the sound of the oceans outside the window.
Very tastefully decorated with old and new, laid back and luxury touches. The outdoor direct entryway to the shower is a genius idea. 

We will be back!

This home is spectacular in every way. The view, the space, the amenities and surprises, the proximity to attractions, the privacy, and the adorable ducks! We saw sea turtles from the bay right in the backyard. We snorkeled, kayaked, grilled out, relaxed in the hot tub (we also rented the guest house on the property) and hammocks, and cooked in the gourmet kitchen. It was heartbreaking to leave. Many great memories were made! Thanks Kristine!

Elegant.
Tranquil.
Little piece of heaven.
This home is a must stay for for anyone thinking about traveling during whale watching season. We saw tons of whales in the bay. Great location too close drive to the airport as while as many other must see sights.
Waking up to watch the sunrise every morning with tea on the deck overlooking the ocean was the most wonderful highlight of our stay here.
You will be greeted by the birds on the property every morning they are so friendly and will come right up to you.
Kristine is an amazing and thoughtful host they have thought of everything and have a binder filled with info about the house places to visit and places to eat be sure to look thru it because it sent us some amazing places we never would have thought about otherwise.
There are tons of amenities for the water on the back deck, a cooler cane in handed for day trips to the beach, aloe and aftersun lotion for those sunburn recovery days, all bathroom amenities you could ever need of vacation. The bed were so cozy and bathrooms were pristine. This is one of the best and most accurate Airbnb ever and I highly recommend staying here. 
To put a little icing on the cake communication with our host was prompt and very helpful they really want your stay to be the best possible!

This place was amaxing!! My fiancee and I had the pleasure of staying here for our enganment. From the fresh flowers to the extremely accomadating host Kristine, this experience could not have been better. Everything was truly perfect!

Great place, very beautiful home. I really loved hanging bad outside of the house. Home has ducks and chickens, my girlfriend had great time feeding them. Location is great as well. Very good house, amazing ocean view. Great place!
This house is a wonderful place to experience the luxury Maui life.

One of the most beautiful places I have ever stayed - the location is perfect, with the beach 2 mins away and turtles feeding in the water right next to the property!

The house itself is stunning, with lots of little extra touches like sunscreen and snorkel gear and kayaks available to borrow. Oh and there are adorable pet ducks and a trampoline!! A truly idyllic location for a vacation.
One of the most beautiful homes and locations. I’d definitely recommend this for anyone visiting Maui. Very classy and picturesque.
This was an amazing place to stay. Pictures do not do justice, you have to be there!!! We will definitely stay here again. It is a 5+ star for sure.
This house is beautiful.  The pictures are accurate.  The place looks even better in person.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay in paradise and are planning to go again in the future.
This place is flawless really offering an amazing experience that only supplements the beauty of Maui! Came here for our honeymoon and we can't wait to be back again!
We had an excellent stay.  The photographs were accurate and Kristine was very responsive to our questions and requests.  Highly recommend.

The view, the house and the surrounding property is truly beautiful. In addition to the view, we also loved the large yard with lush green grass, beautiful tropical plants & trees, a bunch of large hammocks on the property and a huge trampoline to play with. The ducks and chickens were a fun addition to the property (though they did poop all over the entryway). 

Unfortunately, there were some difficulties that were hard to overlook particularly at this price point. The general house cleanliness was quite poor.. floors were super dusty and needed a good mopping. Some of the kitchenware had crusty dust or rust on them. Other things were broken.. kitchen/scissors/blenders/glassware/kitchen gas downdraft. Also, only the living room ac worked, the bedrooms got rather hot. We really weren't expecting these issues at this price point hence the 3* review. 

The house had a lot of geckos. We expected these outside or on the deck- but we spotted these just about everywhere you don't want to see one... in the bathroom, on our towels, on our clothes, on the chair, on the bed.

This place is heaven!   We stayed for 9 days and I think it may be my favorite place to stay ever.  The place is so much better than the pictures.   You can jump in the water if you walk down the rocks and we used the kayaks.   The outside bed is amazing and the upstairs sun deck is cool.  The location is good- the town is meh (no good restaurants), but you are right in the middle of Kihei and Wailea- both are 15 minutes away.  The kitchen is perfect for cooking and is well stocked.  It says it has a hot tub and it does, but it is attached to the other unit on the property and we felt weird as their outdoor shower is right there.  I was concerned about the other unit on the property as we didn’t rent it, but we never saw anyone (just their car)- and it is a huge property so you don’t even realize it is there.  

Honestly if you are looking for a beautiful home right on the water- this place is more than perfect.
Loved the ducks.  Relaxing. Beautiful landscaping. Comfy bed.

House was AMAZING. Perfect location. Right on the water. Great value in terms of the size of the house. 
Air conditioning in master did not work. There was a heat wave and it made it extremely difficult to sleep. We have a 5 month old and he got dehydrated to the point where we had to contact his pediatrician. It gets toasty in the master.

My daughter and I LOVE this home!  I would live here!  The photos do not do it justice. The beds were some of the most comfortable we’ve ever slept in! We LOVE (and already miss) the ducks (and chickens too). We were only bummed we couldn’t really swim in the ocean from the house and the nearby beaches were not good.  We didn’t like the neighborhood overall- but could just enjoy the lovely house for many days weeks or months!! Kristine was a very responsive host & we’ll be back !

Absolutely a beautiful home with amazing views - you’re 20 feet or so from the ocean! Though no true beach (there are beautiful rocks), there are beaches on either side you could access.  There’s a huge swing bed outside, great outdoor table as well as huge dining room table and a very spacious living area not to mention a lanai on the ocean side as well as the front yard/garden side.  The home is very secluded behind lots of vegetation and a sliding wooden gate across the driveway entrance.
Kristine’s place is absolutely gorgeous! It has everything you need. We really enjoyed waking up there every morning and taking in all of the lovely views. Would love to stay there again soon!
Wonderful home.  Perfect location to explore the entire island.  The ducks are so friendly.  Thanks for a memorable stay!

This is a wonderful house in a great location. It really couldn’t have been any better. You won’t regret staying at Kristine’s gorgeous house. Sea turtles and good snorkeling right out front. Close to the harbor for day trips, central to everything the island has to offer. Thanks Kristine for a great stay.

name: Charming Bedroom in East Village
summary: Our spacious pre-war apartment has the true city feeling, with exposed brick, modern appliances and great light! In the heart of the East Village, you'll have access to of New York's most happening neighborhoods, and just a short walk from Union Square, location and subway access are unbeatable!
description: Our spacious pre-war apartment has the true city feeling, with exposed brick, modern appliances and great light! In the heart of the East Village, you'll have access to of New York's most happening neighborhoods, and just a short walk from Union Square, location and subway access are unbeatable! Two other roommates are late 20's, open-minded professionals.
access: Two other roommates are late 20's, open-minded professionals.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
The apartment was very nice, it had everything we needed, and the roommates (Fayth & Carter) we're great, very helpful, and we barely saw each other. We felt very comfortable in our stay. Emily was in another country at the time of our stay but she was always ready to help us if we needed anything. I would recommend this place without any doubt. 

El apartamento es muy lindo, tenía todo lo que necesitábamos, y los roommates (Fayth & Carter) fueron muy amables, y prácticamente no nos cruzábamos. Estuvimos muy cómodos en toda nuestra estadía. Emily estaba en otro país pero siempre respondía nuestras consultas rápidamente y nos ayudó con un problema con la aerolínea por la pérdida de mi equipaje. Recomendaría este lugar sin ninguna duda.

Emily's apartment was amazing! It was located in the most prime location and the apartment room itself was very clean and cozy. Emily was super friendly and gave us several recs to check out which was great!

Emily is the most wonderful host I've ever met. She has the brightest energy and is very attentive and caring. I was fortunate to meet her before returning home. Communication with her before, during, and after the trip was excellent. In fact, she was extremely helpful. Our trip was amazing, and it would not have been so without her as our host. We also had a chance to meet Carter and Fayth, the Emily's roommates, and they too, were adorable people. 
       More so, the room was lovely and clean, with cute details and a very thoughtful welcoming note she left for us. The bed was super super comfortable. The apartment was beautiful and spacious, very stylish and hip and cute. The living room was great. My boyfriend and I would sit there to have our tea at the end of a long day. We enjoyed it so much. The bathroom was great, too! The whole apartment was sparkling clean. We were so comfortable. And the building itself was the most beautiful on the block. We really felt like we lived there.
     The neighborhood, East Village, is amazing! It is our favorite. If we moved to New York, we would move there. It is very vibrant and has a cozy, local feel. We even went to a Russian Bath that is a couple of blocks from the apartment. It was fun! Everything is walkable to, and the metro is a couple of blocks away. There are tons of shops, cafes, and restaurants so that just walking around is an experience. Two of our favorite spots were a Bean cafe nearby and Strand Bookstore; we would stop at these every morning on our way to the metro. If you don't like the metro and love walking, you can literally walk anywhere from Emily's. We walked to Greenwich, to Soho, to Midtown, to Little Italy, and even all the way to Brooklyn! 
    Overall, our stay at Emily's was a most wonderful a experience.Nothing I can write here can do it justice. We fell in love! Best room! Best apartment and building! Best location in Manhattan! Lively, lovely neighborhood with so much to discover! And the greatest host you can imagine! Emily has everything taken care of and is very professional, but she is also kind, well-mannered, and sweet.  If you go to New York, do not hesitate booking with Emily! You'll love it!

Emily a su être d’un grande précision concernant notre arrivé à New York, de l’aéroport jusqu’à notre arrivée.
Très accessible et réactive aux messages, nous n’avons eu aucun mal pour communiquer avec elle. 
La position de l’appartement est parfaite. 
A notre arrivée tout était propre et en ordre.
Les colocataires d’Emilie ont été très agréables. 
Nous recommandons cette Hôte.

name: OCEAN FRONT KA'ANAPALI DREAM GETAWAY
summary: Get ready to "Practice Aloha!" at our Hawaiian home away from home!  Whether you enjoy lounging by the pool, sunbathing on the beach, or watching whales, our space at the Westin Ka'anapali North Resort has something for everyone. This reservation comes with coveted access to ocean-front views and balcony, not to mention a spacious living, dining, and kitchen space. Combining the conveniences of a five-star resort with the comfort of home, we can't imagine spending time in Maui anywhere else!
space: Your reservation features an ocean-front view and balcony over the gorgeous Ka'anapali beach. In addition to the incredible setting, your room contains updated amenities, kitchen, living room and cozy king-size bed.
