host.host_about:
Nos gusta mucho viajar, conocer gente y compartir birras, vinos, o bebidas raras que se toman por el mundo.
Disfrutamos mucho del tiempo compartido con nuestros amigos y familia.
Fanáticos de hacer deporte y de comer asado

reviews.comments: Отличная квартира и отличные хозяева! Очень радушный и теплый прием! Рады, что не бронировали отель, а выбрали снять квартиру, так как атмосфера была домашняя и нам было весело провести все эти две недели с ребятами) Обязательно приедем ещё, и не один раз!  Скучаем по вам и ждем в Москве!!!

¡Hola! La verdad que el lugar es espectacular, estuvo por encima de todas las esperanzas. Además de estar situado el barrio y lugar muy grato, además de haber sido acogidos como en casa, fue cautivante alojarse ahí. ¡Nos ha encantado todo-todo mucho-mucho :-), muchísimas gracias! ¡El espíritu de España por el precio tan agradable!

Место на самом деле суперское, превзошло все ожидания. Оно не только располагается в приятном районе и хорошем месте, нас не только приняли, как своих, но и остановиться там было очарованием. Нам всё-всё-всё очень-очень-очень понравилось, большое спасибо! Дух Испании за такую приятную цену!
Very nice guy, thanks for your help
la casa è in una buona posizione,ordinata e pulita, Neiguel  è stato davvero fantastico e gentile. siamo rimasti soddisfatti e contenti di averlo contattato.
Neiguel was a great host. We had great time in Barcelona.
Neiguel and his flatmate are really easygoing people. The flat was nicely located near Camp Nou (only 2 blocks away!) and for the cheap price, we get what we paid. Recommended! Thanks Niguel! :)

Nos encantó nuestra estancia! Excelente relación precio calidad!

Nahuel, gracias por la buena onda y por recibirnos en tu departamento.
La pasamos muy bien y esperamos vernos de nuevo.

Abrazo
Pame y Salva

We enjoyed our stay,  it was super easy to communicate and Very nice apartment with such nice Guys to host us! Everything was perfect,  so close to the metro station,  and to almost  20 supermarket!  Thank you a lot! :)

L'appartement était bien et propre ! La chambre aussi et elle était juste assez grande. Les hôtes étaient gentils et nous avions du rangement dans la cuisine et dans le réfrigérateur pour nos trucs. l'ambiance était plaisante. Ils nous aidaient et nous conseillaient pour certaines choses là-bas et c'était apprecié!The apartment was nice and clean and the room was good. The hosts were nice and we had enough place to put our things in the kitchen and the fridge. We don't regret our choice for staying there! They help us when we had questions.

It was a good stay in Barcelona city. Comfortable room - that exactly on the picture you see. Perfect view from the window. Five minutes to famous Camp Nou. Thousands of necessary shops. Close to metro.  Two minutes and you have all you want. What more do you need? :)
Its impossible not to mention the host of that flat.Neiguel -  good, easy-going, communicative man. He is eager to help you in any situation. Explain the easiest way and give important marks of Barca. We were happy to stay at his place and suggest you to choose that flat - you will not be dissapointed. We will come back. And now its your time to visit Minsk!

Уже во второй раз остаюсь у Наеля, настолько у него все замечательно, тепло и уютно. Как человек он прекрасный, разнасторонни развитый! К тому же расположение дома очень удобное, рядом с метро, через дом стадион Барселоны Камп Ноу, во время матчей очень хорошая атмосфера создается!)
Un placer haber estado en casa de Nahuel, fue una estancia agradable y sin ningún problema. Si volvemos a Barcelona sin duda volveremos a su casa.

We stayed one week at Nahuel’s flat and he is a great host. We could use everything we liked in the kitchen and Nahuel always said: It’s all inclusive ;-) The other (Hidden by Airbnb) are also very friendly and help you whenever you have questions!

My stay at Nahuel's place was fantastic!  It was the 1st place I stayed in Barcelona, and I was deffinitely a bit overwhelmed when I arrived.  Nahuel, and Juaquin, couldn't have been nicer, or more hospitable!  Made me feel right at home immediately, shared stories, some wine, helped me translate some things;), always helped with directions, they just made their home feel like my home:)  So laid back, so genuinely nice.  It was a total pleasure staying there, I'd suggest them to Anyone!

This is a very nice place, near to the fc barcelona stadium. And not so far of the center. Nahuel is very pleasant person. He is welcoming and he had help us to find the better place to visit and more. Don't worry about language ! He speak spanish, english and... may be french in near future :) . We have take a nice trip to barcelona ! See you soon friend ! you can come to france when you want ! ;)

Jérôme & Marie from France

Здраствуйте. Были у Nahuel неделю,все очень понравилось. Квартира находится рядом с метро. Район очень спокойный, но когда играет ФК Барселона на улице творится праздник жизни)) ведь стадион всего лишь в двух кварталах от дома. По возможности посетим Nahuel еще.))

Hola. Fueron a Nahuel semana, todos mucho. El apartamento está situado al lado del metro. La zona es muy tranquila, pero cuando se juega en el FC Barcelona en la vida de la calle de irse de vacaciones)) debido a que el estadio está a sólo dos cuadras de la casa. Si es posible, visite Nahuel aún.))

Nahuel is a great host. The house is clean and tidy. The house is also really close by to Camp Nou, Barcelona FC Stadium. There is a supermarket and also a pizza shop just below the house. The metro is also really close by. Nahuel will tell you where are the tourist attractions in Barcelona. You will definitely enjoy your stay at Nahuel's house. I would recommend him to be your host at Barcelona.

Our trip in Barcelona was really short and fast but we enjoyed it alot :)
The flat looks exactly like in pictures, clean, colorful and with a nice view. It is close to the metro station and there are many shops nearby.
It is sad that we didn't have the chance to meet Nahuel, but we met his flatmate and he is really friendly and willing to help. 
We would definitely stay again. Thanks!
Well worth the money. It was exactly what we needed for the one night in Barcelona for a Champions League match.

Nahuel e Joaquin sono stati molto disponibili con me e la mia ragazza , ci hanno fatto sentire come a casa nostra , ideale per una coppia . il quartiere molto carino e non molto distante dal centro ,ben collegato ( stazione metro a 5 minuti). esperienza da ripetere , la prossima volta a barcellona già so chi contattare

Nahuel is fantastic host. Even if we met only at our last day of stay, we enjoyed that very much. Flat was nice and clean, you can have acces to everything you need on holidays. In neigbourhood you can find many shops and restaurants. Other (Hidden by Airbnb) were also nice so we recommend that place very much. Hope we can meet again

Nahuel y Joaquín son muy acogedores y sympatiques . Usted puede cocinar en casa y el metro está a 3 minutos del apartamento. 
¡gracias

Our stay in Barcelona was great! The bathroom and room were very clean.Nahuel and his roommate were friendly and answered all of our questions! The apartment is very close to the metro station and the restaurants nearby are delicious
We had a great time in Barcelona and nuhel was a wonderful host. The apartment was well situated with easy metro access. We were able to cook dinner. We had no complaints.
The reservation was canceled 61 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nahuel is our first experience with airbnb and it's positive experience. Even before the meeting Nahuel was helpful and spoke in detail how easier to find a house, and how to get to it cheaper, because time was past midnight. Nahuel very friendly, at his flat, we felt like at home, his advice on Barcelona were very useful to us. It's a pity that in these brief 3 days in the city we were in a hurry to see as much as possible and to communicate with the host time was little.

We very much enjoyed our stay with Nahuel. He and his housemate were very friendly and helpful, made us feel right at home. Was very generous and let us use anything we asked for and was very inexpensive.

Would definitely recommend Nahuel for somewhere to stay in Barcelona and if I need somewhere to stay if I visit again i would definitely go back.

Great place to spend time in Barcelona. Not so far from places of interest. We had a 15 minutes walk to Placa Espana from which you can walk anywhere you want. And it is really cool itself! Weekend markets with craft beer and local food just near you. Also some nice cafes and restaurants just around the corner. Hosts are great, friendly and ready to help with everything you need. Everything was just great!

Everything was fine, Nahuel was very friendly, helped us in everything we asked. The apartment is very near to the subway who connects you to the whole city. the room was fine, comfortable and clean. We manage independently. Thank you for everything and would undoubtedly staying. Thank you very much!
We were very satisfied with the stay at Nahuel. Nice and friendly people, good communications and we also got a fan which were great!! Thank you for the week!

Nahuel is a nice and friendly guy who took the time to talk with us about himself and what he does, moreover gave some good insider tips for bars and restaurants. So, we had a good time at his place.
He has a very cool balcony to relax and have a drink and meal. The flat is located near to Sants station in a neighbourhood with cheap supermarkets and bars, not in a tourist district :-)
Nahuel is a great host. His place is nice and clean and close to Badal metro. He is also great to talk to.

I had a perfect time at Nahuel's flat. Our host was very helpful both with the flat and with siteseeing Barcelona. The flat was very neat and clean with an awesome balcony to eat at and sit down and talk. The flat in general has a very nice atmosphere and it was a pleasure to stay there. I really recommend this place to everyone who wants to stay a while in Barcelona.

Wir hatten neun Nächte im wunderschönen Barcelona. 
Ermöglicht hat das Nahuel durch tägliche Insider-Tipps, wodurch wir ein paar Einblicke in das catalanische Leben bekamen.

Das Appartment ist in der Nähe vom Stadion des FC Barcelona Camp Nou gelegen.
Die Metro erreicht man in ca. 5 Minuten. 
Zusammenfassend eine perfekte Lage mit Balkon im nicht von Touristen überlaufenem Viertel.

Nicht nur duch die Stadteindrücke, sondern auch wegen Nahuel kommen wir gern wieder.
Staying at Manuel's was great such a friendly guy house was clean and tidy and we felt right at home in a good location right near the metro and main station definantly recommend

Los diez días que yo y mi hijo hemos pasado en el puso fueran muy buenos y tranquilos, cómo en nuestra propia casa. Lo recomiendo para quien venga a Barcelona para conocer la ciudad,  Nahuel es um anfitrión muy atencioso y sus indicaciones fueran de buena ayuda. Muchas gracias.

Nahuel was very hands on as a host and available 24x7 for any discussions. We arrived very late in the night, close to 0030 but he waited up for us and was always open to discussions. He always wore a smile and was very friendly. The building is slightly dated, but the warmth in the host and the fact that you are away all day more than makes  up for it.

I and my boyfriend had a great time at Nahuel's flat. He is a friendly guy and helpful with our questions! The flat is well located close to the metro station, bus, supermarket, restaurants and there are all think needful! We can do how if we are in our apartament. I really recommend this palce to everyone who want to stay a  while in Barcelona.

We arrived late on a Monday night and Nahuel was so welcoming. He gave us easy directions to find the flat. The apartment is exactly as described and he assured us we can feel at home which we do! It is a great neighborhood with the metro right around the corner. It is easy to get anywhere in the city within about 10-15 minutes, but far enough away from the madness of the tourists streets in the center. He stays across the way in front of this flat and visits each day to make sure everything is perfect! In between visits we say hello from our flat to his with a friendly wave! He has given us tips for great restaurants, bars, markets and sites in the area. I recommend for anyone to stay here as Nahuel is an excellent host!
Very nice place. Love the balcony. Felt very at home, use of kitchen was great, was clean, had towels all good :). Would recommend .

Все было отлично! Нас встретили, все рассказали, показали, дали карту города. Хозяева милые гостеприимные ребята=) В квартире было все необходимое.Комната на фотографиях выглядит несколько уютнее, чем на самом деле, но если цель вашей поездки - прогулки по Барселоне, то вполне неплохо.

Good room in a nice and cosy apartment, loved the terrace. Our roommates were very nice and made us feel very welcome. Nahuel took the time to provide us with a map and show us where everything was located. The area is nice with loads of restaurants and cafes.
The flat was clean and well presented. It's in a convenient location next to the Badal metro stop and Nahuel was a pleasant host. Thanks!

Estuve 4 dias en casa de Nahuel y la verdad, es un sitio cómodo y agradable. Nahuel me dio todas las indicaciones necesarias para la estancia y puso a mi disponibilidad todo lo que necesitaba para que la estancia fuera lo mas parecido a estar en mi casa.
   La descripción es totalmente honesta y es un sitio como para repetir!

It was wonderful to stay in Nahuels room. He was very kind, gave us everything for good living. Gave many good advices and was very friendly. We could use the kitchen and living room, so feel like at home. The room is very good location. two metroes near, two supermarkets and one of them 24 hours. So, thank U very much, happy to meet!!!!))))

We only saw Nahuel for like five minutes but he was nice enough and showed us everything we needed. After that he left to Argentina and we didn't see him or his girlfriend Alexandra at all. The neighbourhood was nice, safe and easy. Flat was otherwise ok but it was hard to keep track of all the people who were there and who weren't because they came and went randomly (or so it seemed to us).
The kitchen was good. There were shops near.
If you want to see the sun when you wake up, I suggest you pick one of the other rooms because the only window was to the elevator shaft.
All in all, our stay was nice enough!

E un bellissimo appartamento molto equipaggiato è molto rilassante, se senti come fosse a casa tua 
È situato in un quartiere tranquillo è vicino a tutto Metropolitana, autobus Supermercati..e x gli amanti dello sport e a due passi dal Camp Nu 
Nahuel era via ma il suo amico Jorge è stato sempre presente e molto gentile, 
Semplicemente è stato un soggiorno meraviglioso

Everything was as we expected. Nahuel is very nice and friendly. Hes always willing to help you out and cares about your well being and hes always checking the state of the apt and rooms. The apt and rooms are in very well shape. The location is perfect: Metro and bus stations closeby. Supermarket, bakery, laundry, atm, etc. Very close to camp nou and university zone. This place and the host rocks. Gracias che

Il soggiorno da Nahuel è stato eccezionale, lui è una persona fantastica che si mette a disposizione per qualsiasi cosa, ti accoglie come foste amici da sempre! La casa rispecchiava l'annuncio e il quartiere è tranquillo con la fermata metro a pochi passi! Lo consiglierei a occhi chiusi :)
Excelente ubicación, muy cerca del metro, el barrio muy bonito con varios lugares para comer,  y excelente atención por parte de nahuel.

Ciao,  sono stato ospite nell'appartamento di Nahuel da martedì 17/2/2015 a sabato 21/2/2015. 
Premetto che qualche giorno prima avevo già comunicato con lui per comunicargli il mio arrivo e il mio orario, lui si é dimostrata subito una persona corretta leale e disponibile. 
Essendo arrivato a Bcn alle 23,lui mi ha aspettato e al mio arrivo mi ha spiegato il funzionamento della casa,  praticamente lui mette a disposizione tutto.. Un po come essere a casa propria.  Non manca veramente nulla!!!  Inoltre ha preso subito la cartina e mi ha spiegato dove andare a mangiare per poter spendere poco ma con qualità,  mostrato i luoghi da visitare ecc.. L'appartamento ě silenzioso, si trova al 7 piano di un palazzo ordinato in un quartiere (non centralissimo ) tranquillo in una strada principale,  appena esci dal portone hai tutto a disposizione, supermercati bar ristoranti ecc..  E davanti a casa si trova una fermata del bus,  prendendo il numero 54si arriva direttamente in centro (nel cuore della città) bastano 10minuti di tragitto, ticket € 2.15 e per la sera prendere bus N3.
NAHUEL é una persona molto disponibile ad aiutarvi per qualsiasi cosa, comodo perché lui abita nel palazzo difronte al vostro,  inoltre il prezzo dell'appartamento  é veramente ottimo!!   Appartamento pulito ordinato luminoso  con spazi comuni molto vivibili e con un bel terrazzo!! Lo consiglio a tutti!!!  Un posto dove sentirsi a casa!!!  Grazie NAHUEL

Nahuel contacted me before arrival and was pleasant and accomodating. The room was not perfect but an excellent low cost option (a very very soft bed and very very hot shower!) the neighbourhood was well connected to public transport. Overall would recommend for a short stay. Wifi worked excellently and kitchen was well equipped.
Everything ok, good value for price.

Nahuel is a excelent host! He is very good guid in Barcelona..Room is clean and same as on the pictures. We recommend Nahuel all people!
Thank u for good tips in Barcelona! Klara and Martin.

Nice room, nice owner. 
One disadvantage - in this room there is no a window that faces the street. Very dark room. Although this is offset by a shared balcony with wonderful views.

Our stay in Barcelona was fantastic! Nahuel & his girlfriend are very nice hosts & helped us with whatever we needed. The bed was VERY comfortable in our room! Nahuel provided us with every necessity we needed & also offers a great guidebook with many suggestions. We also loved the living room area & patio! All in all Barcelona was our favorite city & we can't wait to visit again.

Mi compañero de viaje y yo tuvimos suerte de encontrar alojamiento el mismo día y de que Alexandra (su pareja) nos pudiera recibir. El piso en general es muy agradable y el barrio muy cerca del metro, lo que lo hace accesible al resto de la ciudad. Ambos nos regalaron una noche de pizzas y cerveza. Es una gran oportunidad de conocer Barcelona y relacionarte con personas de todos lados del mundo.  :)

My mother was visiting me in BCN and I suggested her to stay in a airbnb flat. Even though it was a very spontanous idea, Nahuel managed it.
What I really liked was his variability in case of meetings. Everything was well organized, seemed uncomplicated and that how vacation should be. No worries.
So for his absence he gave us a number from a friend in case of emergencies.

The flat is old but clean. Everybody got his own fair space like in a shared flat. The most I liked was the living room combined with the balkony. Very confortable and friendly, welcoming. It represented Nahuel in the same fact, that he is a social person and cares for his guest as a host should be.

Our staying in Nahuel's place was great. His girlfriend receipted us very helpful and polite. The place is very close to a metro station and the room was warm and cozy. We met Nahuel a couple of times and he was very helpful as well, they advised us about their favourite places to eat and to visit and we felt as we were in home. We would come back for sure.

Науэль - очень классный хозяин, готов помочь во всем, очень отзывчивый, помогает ориентироваться, выбирать рестораны, оказывает мелкие услуги типа написания смс, и т.п. Район тоже прекрасный, близко к метро, близко к вокзалу куда приходит поезд из аэропорта, спокойно, много ресторанчиков и магазинов. Квартира хорошая, только комната очень темная. Но краем глаза видела что остальные комнаты светлые, так что это только нам не повезло :) Но если вы приехали  с тем, чтобы бегать по городу с утра до вечера, то вам может быть все равно, так что дерзайте!

Nahuel is very nice hoster, he give us a city map when we arrive at. he said: he spend 10 min. but we can save 1 hour at least, that for sure. we stay their for 6 days, everything are perfect. good location, area, of course good hoster.

Merci à Nahuel qui a été particulièrement accessible et tolérant envers nous (il faut vraiment que j'apprenne l'espagnol ou l'anglais !)
Un séjour découverte et culturel vraiment agréable.
catherine
Ambos fueron de gran ayuda. Nos entregaron un mapa al llegar y nos recomendaron varios sitios. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado lo que hizo llegar a cualquier parte sencillo. Recomendado

Très agréable séjour d'une nuit lors d'un week end à Barcelone.
Appartement bien situé, calme. 
Très bon accueil de la part de l'hôte qui expliques tous les détails du logement (partie privée et communes).
Tout est fait pour nous aider : plans, wifi, cartes de restaurants, etc ... Tous les ingrédients de base pour vivre sont présents. 
L'hôte prend bien le temps de nous indiquer les bons plans (pour manger, se garer, circuler en métro). 
L'appartement étant 3 chambres louables, on aurait pu avoir des colocataires bruyants ou autres mais cela s'est très bien passé !
Adresse à conserver pour nos futures virées à Barcelone :)

Esta foi a nossa primeira estadia no air b and b e, apesar de receosos ao início, demonstrou-se uma experiência muito agradável! Nahuel foi um ótimo anfitrião desde de explicar todo o funcionamento da casa, a ter tudo acessível até nos dar alguns conselhos sobre os locais que ele próprio gosta e frequenta. 
A casa tinha tudo organizado e facilmente acessível. A varanda do 7º piso é muito agradável e é um sitio ideal para relaxar e descansar.após a visita a esta incrível cidade.

If you're looking for a simple but nice room in a very friendly and genuine neighbourhood, that's definitely your kind of accomodation. Alexandra welcomed us and gave us all the information we needed, always with a huge smile.

The apartment is clean and comfortable. It's location is very good and safe. Of course the beautiful balcony is perfect, we had great time in the apartment and Barcelona. Nahuel and his girlfriend Alexandra are nice people, Alexandra received us kindly. The last night in Barcelona, we held a small food party in the apartment. Everything is wonderful. If we go back to Barcelona, we will choose Nahuel's apartment again.

Nahuel is really very friendly host who is always ready to give an advice and recommend good routes and places to see in Barcelona. He takes care of his guests, in house there is everything for comfortable stay. The location of the house is perfect, really well connected to the city centre (15 minutes) and one more advantage is local market near the house where you will find freshiest vegetables, fruits, fish and so on. Near the house there are also some good supermarkets. Recommend Nahuel and his house for comfortable staying in Barcelona!

Nahuel is a brilliant host, very welcoming, understanding and helpful. He did not mind our late arrival, welcomed us in the flat and gave us great starting tips for getting around Barcelona. The apartment was great with all essentials you could need and a nice add on - the balcony! The location is perfect - away from all the noise but still very well connected via public transport. Following Nahuel's advice we also visited two nearby tourist places - Sitges and Montserrat, which were both AMAZING! All in all you can ask him anything and he will always manage to help you either with advice, navigation or even reservation ;) We really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona thanks to Nahuel and we would definitely be coming back some day :))

My friend and I stayed for 5 nights at Nahuel's flat. Very cozy and comportable. Nahuel and his girlfriend, Alexandra were very friendly and kind. I think they did their best. They were willing to help us always. 
I can say just thank for everything.

Nahuel is a great host, very communicative and who provides a lot of useful information regarding Barcelona. The room was quite small, but clean, and it's worth living in it for a few days considering its price. Bottom line, I felt comfortable in his house, and I will book it again if the price will remain the same.

Nahuel es excelente host, nos dio muy buenas rutas de cosas que podíamos hacer en la ciudad para exprimirla al máximo. El piso es grande y con un balcón increíble. Muy cerca del metro y con líneas de autobús a los alrededores es muy fácil llegar a todos lados. Volvería sin duda.

Nahuel se preocupo de todos los detalles. Es un anfitrion fantastico y lleno de pequenhos detalle que hacen la vida mucho mas agradable.
El apartamento esta bien ubicado cerca del Camp Nou y la ciudad Universitaria ademas de ser una zona tranquila, segura y bien comunicada. Es un apartamento sencillo pero bien pensado y organizado. La habitacion interios es muy calida pero ofrece aire acondicionado si es necesario.
Altamente recomendado!

Ноэль-прекрасный хозяин!!! Встретив нас,он показал нам все достопримечательности на карте,как до них добраться и как все работает. Так же порекомендовал много классных ресторанчиков рядом,многие действительно очень хороши! Он очень дружелюбный,рад поговорить и помочь в любой момент. Район нам понравился,тихий и чистый. Квартира находится очень близко к метро,в самой квартире есть абсолютно все,что нужно туристу. Комната чистая, кровать очень мягкая и удобная. Только было немного душновато по ночам. Общие комнаты также чистые. Очень порадовал балкон, мы с удовольствием сидели на нем вечерами!
В общем мы остались довольны всем!

We had a nice stay in Nahuel's flat. It was clean and the balcony was great. Nahuel and his girlfriend were welcoming and very helpful. 
However, we didn't realise that he lives across the street and the whole flat has 3 airbnb rooms so there were people coming and going. Next time, we would prefer to stay with a host.

The room was excellent!
Nice bed,  good view and wifi!
The host was very welcoming. 

5 stars!

Everything was great. The flat is clean and comfortable, but the balcony we liked the most. The location is excellent, metro is close, so we could easily get wherever we wanted. We highly recommend this flat, it had everything we needed and more!

We had a great time in Barcelona! We where kindly received by a friend of Nahuel who took us in. The apartment was shared with other people who rented the other two rooms. The place was spacy, we had everything we needed and it was nicely decorated. The balcony was great for eating dinner and drinking wine. The location was perfect; the metro stop Badal is nearby, a supermarket and several places to get a quick bite. We also found this small coffee place with good service where we went almost every day.

Nahuel was just a perfect host! We were really lucky we found him in the last minute. He prepared a short presentation about the city and the surrondings which made it easy for us to visit many places and sights  in Barcelona. He was always helpful to us and his attitude allowed us to feel comfortable at his house. The flat had a very good connection to metro and bus and it was quite easy to get anywhere in a short time. We truly recommend Nahuel as the host to everyone who don't want to spend fortune on hostels or hotels in the city centre. Thank you Nahuel for this experience!
Great host, great location, great apartment! :)

Nahuel was very friendly and easy going, getting to the house was very smooth and simple thanks to his advice on getting to the house. The house itself was adequate, however my boyfriend and I felt that the price was a little too high considering we stayed in a room that looks over an elevator shaft. It made a lot of noise and let in a lot of night. The walls are very thin and the other guests in the house kept us up/ woke us up pretty much every day. Apart from that the house was fine.

Nahuel was a fantastic host, he went out his way to help me ! Really friendly and kind :) thank you !
I would definetly recommend it

Nahuel made our stay as comfortable as possible. Positive and friendly person who made the vacation brighter. 
The neighborhood was also good.
Recommended host at Barcelona!
The hosts made us feel very welcome.
Muy bien!!, se esmera para que este todo en orden. Muy atento y preocupado. Totalmente recomendable.

Nahuel was helpful when I arrived. He gave me some tips about places to see and transportation. The house was clean and is shared with other people from AirBnB. Checkout time is flexible and room okay for couple of days.

Nahuel me recibió inmediatamente y siempre pendiente, me explicó todo sobre el apto, es lo que dice la página, organizado con las otras habitaciones, muy acogedor y bien ubicado. Él te da tips de lugares y restaurantes. Pendiente siempre en (Hidden by Airbnb) . Buena experiencia, recomendado 100% en cuanto a costo beneficio. Gracias por todo, no me pude despedir.
Nahuel is a very friendly host, plus the place is good, clean and very well located. the camp nou is very close. and the centre is too easy reachable.
Nahuel es muy amable. La ubicación muy buena y el piso tal como se ve en las fotos. Totalmente recomendable.

The room and the apartment were very nice. The apartment is very well connected to downtown Barcelona by metro. The room is nice and spacious but just note that because the only window goes to a light well it can be quite dark in the room. Nahuel was a perfect host and always willing to give tips and advice about his city!

Nahuel es super amable.  El departamento es muy lindo y cómodo,  especialmente ubicado para los que vamos a Barcelona a ver fútbol y perfectamente conectado al resto de la ciudad.  Está muy bien organizado para que sea un departamento compartido sin problemas. Lo recomiendo y volvería sin dudas
Excelente anfitrion, muy amable, piso muy limpio y bien conectado
My first Airbnb experience was great! Big thanks to Nahuel and Alexandra for all the help and tips!!! Our trip went smooth, Barcelona is the place to be nowadays!

Nahuel has been a really good host - nice, helpful, with wide knowledge about the city atractions, offering lots of different tips how to spend time (not only) in Barcelona. The flat was as described: quiet and cosy,  with lovely spacious balcony. We find it  close to the metro station, in the safe neighborhood. The time we spent in Barcelona was very pleasant, our accomodation was a good choice :)

We have been in Nahuel's house for 7 days, he was very helpful and friendly. The apartment was clean and tidy, with everything you need.
The apartment is in a great location, very close to the subway  from where you can easily reach any place.  There is a bus stop that takes you straight to the beach.
We recommend it.
The location of the house is great. It is about 2-3 minutes walk to Camp Nou Stadium, 4-5 minutes walk to Metro station (Badal) and 2 minutes walk to supermarket.
Very well organized. Everything went well and Nahuel is a nice guy and super host. Me and my girlfriend enjoyed our stay and recommend this place!! Thank you again.
Great and kind host, an amazing place. Very comfortable and close to the metro. I REALLY recommend it! )

I recommend staying at Nahuel's place any time! Very good and helpful host, full of very good tips what to see and where to eat. Any question you might have, he is always available and willing to help out. The place itself is also great and clean. Very close to metro and bus station. Grocery shop, restaurants, bakery, everthing a minute away. Safe neighbourhood. Great experience!!

My Boyfriend and I had a really nice stay by Nahuel! We felt at home and the exchange for the keys was uncomplicated. Nahuel gave us a lot of travel information and was really helpful, we can recommend him! Thanks to Nahuel and Alexandra for this nice trip

Nahuel was very very helpful and organized. The flat had 3 rooms there for we were sharing it with 2 other couples. Everything was exactly as it should, every room had there own room and everything was label to avoid any confusion. Everything was clean and the balcony was beautiful! We are very new to AirB&B and to Barcelona and we loved it! When leaving the city we found out there was a strike with the train we were taking, Nahuel helped us try to find an alternative to were we needed to go! I would 100% recommend!
Everything was perfect and Nahuel helped us so much for planning a nice trip of Barcelona.. Thanks for everything!!
Excelente lugar, muy cómodo y excelente ubicación, Nahuel es muy amable, recomendable al 100%

Great host,appartment is exactly like on the pictures.We were sharing a flat with a couple in one room and two girls in other room,and we felt like in ours.Neighborhood is great,a lot of shops and groceries stores around.There is a bus station just in front of the building and there is a metro 10 min walking that goes to center of the city.This was my first travel with airbnb and i would totally reccomend Nahuel as a host to everybody.Thanks again Nahuel.

11/10 Stars :  My friend and I had been reluctant in the idea of booking a room on Airbnb, but after staying at Nahuels, I can surely say, I will definitely do it again. We were unable to meet Nahuel, but we were greeted by his girlfriend, Alex, brought us in and made us feel incredibly welcome. She was really helpful and gave us enough information to see the best Barcelona has to offer. 

The room is big enough for two people and I never felt like I was restrained by the space. The apartment had an amazing view of a more local Barcelona where we could really get an idea of what it is like to live day by day here. The location is great, you are a 3 minute walk to the metro and about 5 minute walk to the airport metro line. 

Overall, it has been an amazing experience to stay here and I recommend it to anyone who wants to have a great time in Barcelona. Nahuel and Alex have been the perfect hosts and I will be sure to book this room the next time I visit Barcelona.

Everything was just great. Nahuel was very helpful, polite and friendly. He helped us finding a parking spot late in the evening and he did everything to make us feel welcome at the apartment. The people we shared the apartment with were also very sweet, we shared our travel and life experience and had interesting conversations in the evening. I would recommend this apartment to everyone. Thumbs up Nahuel and Alexandra! :)

I really recommend staying here. The flat is close to the metro station and it is quite easy to get there from the airport. Nahuel and Alexandra were very hospitable and explained everything we wanted to know about the city and Catalunia.

We've spent one week at Nahuel's flat,and definitely recommend to stay here.  You will be sharing the flat with other  airbnb guests (3 bedroom). Our room was a bit dark,but you don't go to Barcelona to stay at home the whole day... Nice balcony,living room, and a very helpful host is waiting for you.
Everything was great! Thanks, Nahuel!
Excellent apartment!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place to stay. Very close to the metro which can take you anywhere from the beach to the zoo and etc... The host nahuel was very friendly and very open to questions and seggestions. 



Un maravilloso lugar para quedarse. Esta cerca a la parada del metro, la cual te puede llevar a todos lados. El host nahuel fue muy amable y servicial.

Nahuel is a great host. He was always was aware of all the needs and it is very easy to get in touch with him. However respects your times and spaces very much, it is very easy to feel at home. He also makes recommendations and is very very kind. The place was always clean. The neighborhood is very quiet and is 5 minutes from the camp nou. Widely recommended! 

Nahuel es un estupendo anfitrión (un capo, muy chido) . Siempre estuvo al tanto de todas las necesidades y es muy fácil ponerse en contacto con él. Sin embargo respeta mucho tus tiempos y espacios, es muy fácil sentirse en casa.  Además te hace recomendaciones y es muy muy amable. El lugar siempre estuvo limpio. El barrio es muy tranquilo y esta a 5 minutos del camp nou. Ampliamente recomendable!

Guys, this flat is really cool. It is really close to get to any sight. Closely to Camp Nou!!!!!!! Nahuel and Alex are very good hosts they keep flat clean. They suggest you going to places. You can use anything in this flat.

Мы жили у Ноэля две с половиной недели. Он сам был в командировке, нас встретила его девушка Алекс, показала квартиру, рассказала о ближайших магазинах. Квартира полностью соответствует фотографиям, очень уютная, с домашней обстановкой, нет ощущения, что ты находишься в съемном жилье. В каждой мелочи заметно, что хозяин заботится о своих гостях - общие пространства разделены на подписанные по комнатам полки, а в гостиной много различной информации для тех, кто приехал в город впервые - карты, путеводители, указания где можно вкусно поесть. Ноэль и Алекс крайне отзывчивые и гостеприимные хозяева и что крайне важно, всегда на связи и всегда готовые прийти на помощь и помочь с любыми проблемами и вопросами. Так что останавливайтесь у них, точно не пожалеете! :)
It's close to public transit and Camp Nou. Had no problem with late check out. Nice owner and easy to communicate with.
Nahuel es muy atento y la casa esta muy organizada. El salon y la terraza son muy amplios y comodos, pero la cocina, baño y el cuarto son algo antiguos.

Nahuel is a perfect host and I really recommend his place. He has provided a good guidance for travelers which is really helpful.
He allowed us to put our stuff in the home common area that halped us to use our last day in an efficient way.
Good neighborhood!  Right by Camp Nou with the FCB museum.  Several bus and metro stops nearby.  Plenty of decent dining options.

Die Kommunikation mit Nahuel war optimal. Er ist ein sehr netter und freundlicher Mensch und antwortet innerhalb kürzester Zeit. Die Wohnung haben wir uns mit zwei weiteren Reisenden geteilt. Wir hatten ein kleines Zimmer, das recht einfach gehalten war. Da wir jedoch wirklich nur zum schlafen dort waren, war es vollkommen ausreichend. Die nächste Metrostation war nur 5 Minuten entfernt.

jeg har ønsket at var et sted hvor man kan låse hans ting eller nøgler til dørene.

mvh
Kaies Abdulla
The apartment was really nice, cozy balcony, nice location great coffee places for breakfast.

Excelente! Muy atentos y preocupados por ayudarnos con el check in y demás. El apartamento es precioso y la ubicación excelente. Solo recomiendo si se puede elegir alguna de las otras habitaciones porque tienen más luz y mejores camas, pero está todo muy bien y ellos son muy buenos anfitriones!

Great place to stay and great host. Nahuel met us on our way to the appartment and helped us settled in. 
The appartment was set up for travellers with suggestions to go, and a computer was available. 
Very recomentable and affordable.
excelente un lugar super recomendable, muy limpio, mucho orden pero con la libertad de manejarte tranquilo excelente acceso a todos lados en colectivos o subtes, muy seguro el barrio

Thank you so much for your hospitality, Nahuel.
Everything was as described and you have an amazing comfortable flat!

muy linda casa y muy linda gente! 
muy acogedora y cómoda

Everything fine. Great location, close to all transport you'll need. Big and bright living room, spacious balcony. Space is clean. Room is ok for this money. Nahuel is a great guy, he can help you with everything during your trip.

name: Sunny appartment on the Plateau
summary: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province!
space: Nice and cozy room in a 2-bedroom appartment on the Mont-Royal Plateau.  The apartment is close to a wide variety of services and conveniences: bakery, fish and meat markets, bars and restaurants, parks, metro et bus services. Nice balcony and lots, lots of light inside the apartment.
description: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province! Nice and cozy room in a 2-bedroom appartment on the Mont-Royal Plateau.  The apartment is close to a wide variety of services and conveniences: bakery, fish and meat markets, bars and restaurants, parks, metro et bus services. Nice balcony and lots, lots of light inside the apartment. Access to kitchen, living room, balcony, bathroom (with towels & shampoo)  I am around mostly in the evenings or later at night...  i  will be happy to share a meal or share with with you my favorite places in town :) Le français est ma langue maternelle Hablo espanol Very central, green, lots happening within a walking distance! Lots of options!! most popular is the 97 bus (east) from Metro mont-royal. Other than that the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) bus li
neighborhood_overview: Very central, green, lots happening within a walking distance!
transit: Lots of options!! most popular is the 97 bus (east) from Metro mont-royal. Other than that the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) bus lines are all at a walking distance)
access: Access to kitchen, living room, balcony, bathroom (with towels & shampoo)
interaction: I am around mostly in the evenings or later at night...  i  will be happy to share a meal or share with with you my favorite places in town :) Le français est ma langue maternelle Hablo espanol
house_rules: no smoking and no pets allowed

host.host_about: From Montreal, Sabrina works as a trainer and consultant with non-profit organisations. On a more personal level, she cultivate a secret passion for social change theatre, traveling, yoga, cycling, cooking, harmony and... social gatherings! Marc-André adores sciences but spend the majority of his free time cycling, travelling and enjoying what the city has to offer!

reviews.comments: Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neigborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and I for us to go to such as trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment is in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived she had placed us in the less apealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more then happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom.  She let us use her condiments which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking.  Overall the price was awesome the area was great Sabrina was very cool and so is her decor in her home!  Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in the Montreal downtown. The apartment is in a calm and quiet street. However by 5 minutes walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafe bistros, restaurants, bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying in her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and in a great neighborhood (it is very close to downtown, old montreal, etc.) She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall staying with Sabrina was hassle free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details of places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It is near Park LaFointaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Merci beacoup Sabrina! : )

The apt is very comfortable. I have everything I need even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate, inspiring host. With a art history degree and humain system invention degree, she has extend knowledge of cuture difference which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank a lot Sabrina.

Foi excelente a minha hospedagem no apartamento de Sabrina, ela é bastante acolhedora e foi muito gentil, me apresentou um pouco da cidade e do bairro. Eu não conhecia Montreal e Sabrina me ajudou muito, passeando comigo em algumas ruas e me dando atenção e informações importantes!  
Recomendo a todos (as) hospedarem-se em seu apartamento, o qual é muito limpo e fica em uma rua tranquila.

Isabel Lima - BRASIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apt is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminder or how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and whatnot. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!) Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super endroit Sabrina est une hôte sympa et très gentille et l'appartement est très bien calme et bien situé
Stylish apartment in a good location! Perhaps the only downside was the smell of cigarette smoke that filtered into the apartment. Sabrina was friendly and made check in/out easy.
Accueil super sympa! Très belle appart!

Bonjour,

Pendant ces 4 nuits chez Sabrina, on se sentait vraiment chez nous. Quand elle était là, on avait possibilité de discuter et de nous informer sur plein de choses à Montréal. 
Elle nous a bien aidé à préparer notre année ici et nous a même convié à aller faire du sport avec elle!

Merci Sabrina,

Lauriane et Julien

Sabrina et sa colocataire sont vraiment sympathique.
La chambre est super confortable et l'appartement a tout le nécessaire.
Très bon séjour pour nous.

Super séjour chez Sabrina !

L'appartement est fantastique, la chambre est assez grande, confortable.
Sabrina a été une hôte très prévenante et grâce à ces indications j'ai trouvé l'appartement vraiment très facilement.
Il est très bien situé, et très accessible, à 15 min du métro en marchant et 5 min avec le bus 97 qui passe toutes les 10 minutes.
Tous commerces à proximité.

Je recommande !
This place is great! Perfect place to stay in Montreal. Thank you Sabrina!
Wonderful apartment - even better host!! Absolutely recommend!
My experience Sabrina Mc Fadden was awesome I really enjoy it. She is a great Host.

I have spent an all week at Sabrina's home. It was a wonderful time in Montreal for me. The flat is really looks like as at the photos, it is well connected to the city centre. The zone is amazing with all the beautiful stairs which you find at almost every building.
Sabrina was very kind and helpful, she answered all my "important" questions when she returned home at the evening, gave me some very valuable tips. A rainy day, she left me an umbrella, too!! :)I am sure if I have the opportunity to return to Montreal, I will choose this appartment again :-) Thank you very much again, Sabrina! Cheers ;)

Sabrina's place in Montreal was cozy, comfortable and in a great location. Sabrina is a warm and accommodating host, which was perfect for our 11pm arrival in Montreal! She provided us with clean linens, a lovely calm room to stay in, and plenty of space in her kitchen for our own food. Apartment is beautifully decorated, and was no problem sharing a bathroom! Location-wise, just outside of the main attractions of Montreal and very easy to grab a Bixi or bus to wherever we needed to go. Lovely neighborhood, lovely stay and lovely host!

Sabrina was an awesome host - accommodating, quick to respond, and very friendly. The apartment is lovely, the room is cozy, and the bed super comfy. The neighbourhood is in a great location and fun - lots of breakfast places, cafes, parks, and close to Metro. Thanks for a relaxing weekend!!

The location of the apartment is very nice and the district is beautiful with small cafes. You can reach almost everywhere by metro which is in 15 minutes walk. The apartment is very cozy and the host is very friendly, we enjoyed our stay in Montreal.

Séjour parfait! La chambre est propre et confortable, l'accueil chaleureux, Sabrina est adorable et disponible pour répondre à vos questions et donner des conseils.
A conseiller vivement! :)
Beautiful apartment with a nice host in a trendy neighbourhood: close to perfect :) Sabrina was very welcoming, the room spacious and the bed comfortable even for a longer stay.

Sabrina was very helpful and she handled the check in and check out times very flexible. Her apartment is a real treasure, we felt very cozy there. The area of the apartment is also very good and safe and the public transportation is good, with bus and metro you can easily be at the main sites. We enjoyed really our stay in Montreal and Sabrina's place contibuted to feel like that.

The apartment was awesome! Great location with lots of restaurants, bars,  super markets and shopping stores, just 5 minuts away by bus from the metro station. Sabrina was very nice with us, i really recommend this place!

We had a great time at Sabrinas place! She welcomed us very friendly and made it easy for us to feel at home. Because Sabrina went on vacation, we had the whole apartment for ourselves. That was just so nice! =) Anyway, having Sabrina stay with us would have been fun too, that's for sure. 

We also liked: the great neighborhood (many cute cafes, restaurants, boutiques), the quiet building, the big comfy bed, easy access to bus/metro, being able to cook in the evening, the easy communication with Sabrina and Montreal in general! =)

Thanks for the great stay, Sabrina!

Appartement tres sympa, tranquille, bon quartier a 10min du metro Mont royal ! acceuil chaleureux, par contre il serait judicieux d investir dans une couette ou une bonne couverture pour la chambre d amis, car le petit dessus de lit ne suffit pas, surtout a partir de debut octobre !!!

Mi estadía en Montreal con Sabri no pudo haber sido mejor. Su departamento es igual que las fotos, o aún más bonito. El barrio Plateau es uno de los más lindos y preferidos en Montreal, con muchos árboles y casitas con escaleras. Realmente me sentí como en casa. No solo porque en el departamento tuve todo lo que necesitaba, sino porque Sabrina es una gran persona y una excelente host. Me ayudó con unos trámites personales, siempre con mucha alegría y afecto. Además habla español per-fec-to. Me hubiera gustado quedarme mas tiempo, la verdad.

The apartment was awesome! Great location with lots of restaurants, bars, super markets and shopping stores, just 5 minuts away by bus from the metro station. Sabrina was very nice with me, i really recommend this place!

Sabrina's home is just lovely and a perfect place to stay in Montreal. As she had to leave for the first two weeks of my stay, I did not get to see her the whole time, however when she was there she was really nice and made me feel very welcome. Her place became nearly a second home. The pictures are true, it is just so nice as they show it. Her place is in the plateau the best place to be when you like being close to restaurants, coffees and alternative stores. Sabrina explained me where to buy organic food and where to go out! I absolutely enjoyed my stay in Montreal. My Highlight was defiantly when she showed me how to do homemade granola and an delicious lentil soup. I am looking forward to see her again and to share a swiss meal. I can only recommend to stay with her and I will certainly go back. 

Thank you Sabrina!

Sabrina was very accommodating on our arrival even though we arrived quite late.  The apartment and room were very comfortable and clean.  She greeted us on arrival, and then was not in the apartment the rest of our stay.  Location was great.

Sabrina is super nice and sweet person! I absolutely enjoyed staying at her house. The house is well decorated and clean and I felt very comfortable every time I came home :) when I come back to Montreal, I would love to stay here again ;) 
About the location of the house, I found it very convenient to go anywhere. It is quite close to center of the city or anywhere. However, it's probably a good idea to have the bus schedule with you all the time so that you wouldn't need to  walk for 20mins to the metro (especially in the winter :P) besides that, there are lots of stores around to get anything so you wouldn't have any problems! over all, I absolutely loved there :) thank you Sabrina <3

everything was perfect!
thank you Sabrina !:)

Sabrina est très accueillante et très généreuse à mon égard. Il y avait de la place pour moi déjà toute prête dans le garde manger et le frigo et elle m'a offert à prendre ce dont j'avais besoin pour cuisiner. C'est une hôte du tonnerre!

Notre séjour chez Sabrina a été très agréable. Toujours de bons conseils, accueillante et à l'écoute. 
L'appartement est fidèle aux photos et proche de tous les services. Le quartier est calme et résidentiel. L'avenue Mont-Royal offre son lot d'animations (bars, restos). 
Nous recommandons.

Sabrina's apartment was even better than we'd expected- so sunny, so comfortable, and so beautiful and quirky at the same time! We loved spending the weekend in Montreal having Sabrina's apt as our home base. The location was great, near many fun bars, restaurants, and the bus that takes you straight to the top of Mount Royal. She was also very friendly and accommodating. I'd recommend her place to anybody!

Sabrina was a great host! The flat was nice and cosy. When I arrived she showed me the way to my room and explained what is where. Sabrina advised me where to go and what to do in the city :) We did not have much time to spend together, but whenever we had an opportunity we had a wee chat - she was happy to speak with me in French which I liked a lot :)
Sabrina was really friendly and even gave us a list of her favourite restaurants, cafes, bars etc for us.

Great location in The Plateau.. handy bus and Metro from the main street only a minute away.

The outside of the building is run down but the surrounds are pretty and the inside of the unit was a nice style.

Sabrina is an excellent host, so friendly and respectful! The apartment has a great location in The Plateau and there are very good connections by bus and Metro. There are many stores, bars and parks around. I absolutely enjoyed staying at this place and I'd recommend it without a doubt!

Vous désirez passer du bon temps à Montréal ? L'appartement de Sabrina est la place qu'il vous faut! Spacieux, ensoleillé, bien placé dans le quartier du Plateau, ce logement est une perle où j'ai eu beaucoup de plaisir à apprécier mon séjour dans cette magnifique ville.
Sabrina a été une hôte parfaite (: . Vous allez vous sentir comme à la maison!
Sabrina is a wonderful host. She makes sure your stay is pleasant in any way. The apartment is even better than the photos. I'll recommed it .

Notre première expérience avec Airbnb fut une totale réussite. L'appartement, bien situé,est agréable,propre, bien agencé et effectivement ensoleillé.  Quant à notre hôte nous avons beaucoup apprécié ses qualités d'accueil, sa discrétion et son dynamisme. Adresse à recommander.

Visited Montreal for the first time, and my friends and I, spent the weekend at Sabrina's quaint and cozy apartment. The space was very neatly organized and kept, and located in a lovely part of neighborhood. The location was very accessible to the city's core. The apartment is as exactly displayed through the posted pictures. Although Sabrina was not around during my stay, she made sure to leave instructions, and kept in contact with me throughout my time there. I also appreciated the list of places Sabrina suggested to visit, and activities that could be done throughout the weekend. Thank you again for your hospitality!

Sabrina was on vacation when we visited and was still able to make us feel comfortable and welcome.  Little notes were left for us with info on Montreal and the different places she recommended us to go and see. We loved the location too it was close to main bus routes, parks, and in an older neighbourhood in Montreal (the architecture was beautiful!).  We had a chance to meet Sabrina as we were leaving and she was friendly, and kind and down-to-earth. We loved our stay and already miss Montreal!

Sabrina was a great host. We stayed at her place for 3 days. The place' situation is nice in the Plateau. Sabrina showed us where to go and what to visit. I would recommend people going to Montreal to stay at her place.

My wife and I stayed with Sanrina for two nights. It was an excellent stay with nice accommodation that is close to several fun areas. The apartment itself is very nice and clean. Sabrina is a really nice host that will make you feel comfortable

Sabrina was very friendly and easy to chat with. Offers some good ideas and materials for sightseeing. Apartment is convenient for tourists since it is close to the bus and metro stations with a supermarket nearby.
Accueil très chaleureux, séjour agréable et échanges intéressants avec notre hôte. Appartement situé dans un quartier calme et bien desservi par les transports en commun.

Sabrina's place was exactly how it is pictured, and what I expected. She was very accommodating for my check-in and check-out time, making it so easy for me as a traveller. The neighbourhood is great, with lots green space, coffee shops, and restaurants recommended by Anthony Bordain himself. The only thing that could make Sabrina's place better were if were closer to the subway, but there is a bus that goes by often enough to take you there.

My friends and I stayed at Sabrina's place when we were in Montreal for osheaga and it was great!!! She was so helpful leading up to our trip. Her place was exactly like the pictures and we all had a great time!

L'accueil fut chaleureux et sympathique. Sabrina était charmante.
l' appartement correspond aux images . Mais le quartier et le bâtiment  sont un peu différents à ce qu'on pourrait imaginer. Il est calme et près des commerces quotidiens. Tout s'est très bien passé.
Encore grand merci à Sabrina pour sa gentillesse.

Sabrina contacted me prior to our arrival to ensure she'd be there upon our arrival.  Upon our arrival she had everything ready for us and didn't leave until she was satisfied we had everything we needed. She had maps, sticky notes, tour guides, key, tea, granola, spices, laundry machine, you name it she had it covered.  She even contacted me on day two to make sure we were all set.  The location is two blocks from Mount Royal.  Wonderful boutiques, groceries, cafes, and restaurants. Our only issue was the walk to the metro.  We tried the bus, but there wasn't always one. For avid walkers, the 20 minutes walk to and fro would not be an issue. I resorted to parking on the street near the metro then walked. Not a big deal.

Très bon accueil de la part Sabrina.
Appartement confortable pour 4 personnes.
Quartier tranquille un peu éloigné du centre accessible par Bus et plus loin du metro (20 minutes).Le batiment et la rue ne correspondaient pas à ce que nous attendions (3 eme étage d'un immeuble) alors que nous imaginions une entrée typique du plateau Mont-Royal avec accès directe par escalier de la rue.

Sabrina was a very nice host.
We had a few contacts before my arrival in Montreal. She contacted me to inform me where to find the keys for the apartment in case she was not there at the time of my arrival. As it turned out, she was there to meet me and thank God for that, because on my own I would not been able to carry my 23 kgs bag  3 floors up. The place was neat and tidy, the neighbourhood was ok and Sabrina was a very warm and friendly person.
The location of the apartment was a few metro stops from the city of Montreal .
My 5 day stay there was comfortable and pleasant. Thank you Sabrina for all your help.
Stephanie - Sydney Australia

Sabrina was a very laid-back and friendly host and it was a pleasure to stay at her place.  She was flexible about check-in and check-out times and made our stay even better by providing recommendations of places to eat and visit in her area.  The neighbourhood was very vibrant, with shops, restaurants, cafes, a big park, and a fabulous bakery all within a 10-min walk.  Her place is close to bus routes and we found it to be a great home-base for our stay in Montreal.  The photos and description on her Airbnb post are accurate, and her place is very clean, stylish, and welcoming.  Thanks for a nice experience, Sabrina!

When we arrived, Sabrina provided us a tour of her apartment and then sat down and mapped out all the metro, bus stations, recommended eateries, etc. After that she went on her way and we didnt see her the remainder of our trip. The apartment itself was in a quiet neighborhood in the Plateau and we were two blocks from small shopping and food places. Overall her place was nice. Note their is no A/C so it was nice that she had plug in fans in each room. The only downside was the guest bedroom bed was not that comfortable (but if you like firm mattress you will be okay) and the kitchen had ants (which is due to the time of the year).

Sabrina is an excellent host! She contacted me a couple of days before arrival to make sure I could get in. She and her boyfriend even helped me carry bag up the stairs. She was very friendly and immediately gave me a map and some tips for Montreal. The appartement is luminated, clean, charming. The room is big with lot's of storage room.  Also nice bathroom. Apartment was in a quiet neigbourhood but close to the centre. Lot's of bars and restaurants in the Mont Royal street closeby. To be recommended!
She is friendly, warm. Her house is very good, I like here! Around to have a meal very convenient also!

Excelente anfitriona ... Es muy fácil llegar al departamento el cual está en un barrio muy interesante con muchas opciones de mercados, restaurantes y pocas estaciones del centro de Montreal. Sabrina y su novio me dieron muchos típs de al ciudad los cuales aproveche al 100 %. Saludos

Sabrina's place is really nice. It is around the Plateau area, so it is very convenient to go around.
Sabrina is super friendly and very helpful in getting me to feel at home.
The host canceled this reservation 148 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment was just about as advertised, save for a few things. Free parking was listed, but there was no parking to be found. We ended up getting a ticket the first day. We eventually found a lot in the city (15mins away by über) to leave the car for the week, but that was a hassle checking up on it all the time. Also, while there is a washer and dryer it is the basement of the apartment for the use of all the tenants which cost money, so timing is key. We ended up walking to a laundromat a few blocks away and isingnthat instead. Apart from that, stay was pleasant and the apartment was comfortable. Several easy restaurant options nearby.
We felt very welcome during our stay with Sabrina. The apartment is in a beautiful neighborhood and the location made it easy to explore Montreal.

Sabrina was an amazing host. The apartment is beautiful, and just around the corner of Rue du Mont-Royal, which is home to a plethora of shops and restaurants - meaning if you choose to stay here, you have plenty of options for food and shop. Each morning I went for a walk down the beautiful street and stopped at some coffee shops on the way. It's also just a few minutes walk to the Metro, which is great if you'd like to explore the rest of Montreal. Or you can hop on a Bixi bike close to the apartment and ride downtown. But the best part of the apartment is how close it is to (what I believe to be) the best poutine spot in Montreal - La Banquise. The location is perfect for both young folks looking to have an exciting night out and families alike. Sabrina's apartment was clean, fresh and easy to access. Overall very pleased with my experience. Thank you, Sabrina!

Sabrina provided a welcoming stay in Montreal. Her apartment is cozy and she made sure that I felt at home, although I only saw her a couple of times. The neighborhood does have great access to public transportation, but is also walkable. Great restaurants and pubs a short distance away. A great place to stay and you can't beat the price!

Best place to stay when youre in montreal! Very nice neighborhood, youre really fast in downtown, good restaurants around. And the most important thing: sabrina is very helpful and such a nice person! When you have time: just join her and visit montreal!
Beautiful apartment, great location and great value! Highly recommended!
Great host, location and value! Highly recommended!
À recommander

It was a really good experience in Sabrina's place, she was so kind and open to my comments and to talk with me about anything, she was always looking after me if I needed something else.
Great communication in English and if you know Spanish she will be glad to practice with you.
There are several bus routes that can take you wherever you want, and they all connect with the metro system with the same boarding card.

Sabrina was so great. She had these little maps and cool places to go check out in the city. I stayed here while looking for a more permanent place to live and she was incredibly helpful! She even translated my resume for me as my french is a little weak. Anyway, i would definitely recommend!

Sabrina was great! The check in process was super easy, she was very accommodating for my check in time. The room was very nice and spacious. Her place is close to a lot of major bus routes which made transportation very easy. She also had lots of suggestions for places to go and experience. Overall a very good stay.

Sabrina is beyond lovely & so is her home! She was very flexible for my late check in/late check out. The home was clean, quiet & beautiful with lots of natural light (apt building does not have an elevator). It is located in a very nice area close to bus routes a block or two away in every direction, convenience store on the corner, a handful of restaurants very close by, as well as Mont-Royal Ave a block away which has tons of shops, cafes, restaurants, grocery stores, bars, pharmacies, metro station & access to the top of Mont-Royal Park much further down. She provides the essentials, water/towels, space in the hallway closet, space in the cupboard/fridge in the kitchen, wifi access, ability to adjust the temperature of the room & washing machine to do laundry if needed (hang dry only though). Communication was easy & I appreciated the help/suggestions when I had questions but also the privacy I was given other times. I would 150% stay here again & highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to stay in a nice neighbourhood out of the city but still with access to MANY things to do! Thank you again Sabrina!
Really nice place!
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very nice place, charming and comfortable. I had a very good stay. The place is also stocked with everything you might need.

Sabrina’s place is very clean and comfy, the location is very close to downtown and within walking distance  to public transportation. There are many shops and restaurants around the corner that I would recommend to explore. I stayed during wintertime and enjoyed very much the comfortable environment that the host and the city had to offer. I would defiantly will be coming back during summer time!

name: Quarto amplo em Copacabana. Rio 2016
summary: Quarto em Copacabana, ótima localização. Portaria 24h, wi-fi e segurança  Aconchegante, arejado, limpo e silencioso.  Acesso a cozinha: microondas , máquina de lavar roupas, internet. Próximo ao metrô estação Siqueira Campos e 3 quadras da praia de Copacabana.  Quarto individual, casal, 3 três solteiras (os), até 4 pessoas.  Cama de casal e/ou solteiro (a) . Outras acomodações a combinar.  Nossa Casa de portas abertas. Sejam bem vindos. :)
description: Quarto em Copacabana, ótima localização. Portaria 24h, wi-fi e segurança  Aconchegante, arejado, limpo e silencioso.  Acesso a cozinha: microondas , máquina de lavar roupas, internet. Próximo ao metrô estação Siqueira Campos e 3 quadras da praia de Copacabana.  Quarto individual, casal, 3 três solteiras (os), até 4 pessoas.  Cama de casal e/ou solteiro (a) . Outras acomodações a combinar.  Nossa Casa de portas abertas. Sejam bem vindos. :) A praia, a comodidade de ter tudo por perto! Comércio farto, restaurantes, metrô! duas quadras do metrô. Acesso fácil para todo o Rio de Janeiro via ônibus, metrô e demais conduções.
neighborhood_overview: A praia, a comodidade de ter tudo por perto! Comércio farto, restaurantes, metrô!
transit: duas quadras do metrô. Acesso fácil para todo o Rio de Janeiro via ônibus, metrô e demais conduções.
house_rules: **necessário apresentar documento de identidade original e/ou passaporte e me deixar uma cópia da mesma documentação no horário de chegada (check-in)** *** hóspedes não recebem visitas. Parece claro, mas necessita explicitar aqui. *** *Não pode subir ao apartamento com areia de praia. No prédio há um local com torneira d'água para se lavar os pés e corpo se necessário com trajes de banho/praia na garagem do mesmo.* O hóspede não pode fazer fritura na cozinha ou em qualquer lugar do apt.  Bom senso e respeito ao próximo.

host.host_about:
Sou jornalista de formação, professora de culinária e atualmente funcionária pública do Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística. Resido na Região dos Lagos e por vezes em Copacabana com meu filho. Trabalhei em importantes revistas deste país como a Pais & Filhos, Desfile e outras da Bloch e extinta rede Manchete.  Empreendedora também por natureza. Mãe e, há agora também, me divirto sendo avó de um guri de 4 anos completos em julho. :)
Adoro esportes, boa leitura, música, culinária, viajar, bem-estar, educação, respeito ao próximo e viver. Sou uma jovem "senhora de chapéu", como brinco com meus filhos. : )

Me encanta viajar e conhecer pessoas novas. Espero ver você nessas férias e Rio 2016. 

o/

Bons dias =)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Quartos para Olimpiadas em Copacabana
summary: O apartamento localiza-se em frente à Praça do Lido, em Copacabana, próximo à bares e restaurantes, e à 2 minutos da praia. A casa possui 4 quartos, sendo 2 disponíveis para locação. Opção 1 - uma suíte com 2 camas de casal, descrita nas fotos por Cama 1 - Suite (Foto 1) e Cama 2 - Suite (Foto 2) e o Banheiro Suite (Foto 3). Opção 2 - um quarto com 2 camas de casal, descrito nas fotos por Quarto 2 (Foto 5) e banheiro compartilhado (Foto 6). O quarto pode ser ocupado por até 4 pessoas.

Welcome!
