house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment’s equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment’s appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and !0h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is at 11h. If requested and possible, check in could be made ear

host.host_about:
I'm from Porto and I'm happy to live here.
I like to read, go to the cinema or to the beach, be with my family and friends.
I often go to concerts at Casa da Música and art expositions in Serralves.
Also like to travel and meet new people from other countries.
Hope to meet you soon!

reviews.comments: Excelente experiencia. Apartamento muy acogedor, tranquilo, decorado con gusto. Magnifico. Es mejor apartamento y más amplio de lo que aparece en las fotografías. Tiene de todo. Manuela fue muy atenta siempre, generosa y detallista. Nos hubiera gustado estar más tiempo. Experiencia inolvidable y muy recomendable.

Excellent séjour à Porto chez Manuela. Nous sommes arrivés à quatre français, Manuela parle français et nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse. 
Appartement propre, plutôt luxueux et calme dans un quartier résidentielle mais à 2 stations de métro du centre. 
Stationnement gratuit dans la rue  donc un plus encore pour les voyageurs en voiture. 
En bref je recommande, hôte très sympathique et appartement agréable à vivre.

Appartement très proche du centre ville, dans une rue au stationnement gratuit très pratique ! Un très bon accueil 
Je recommande !!!

Le logement est parfaitement conforme à la description dans une rue au stationnement gratuit. Manuela est un hôte accueillant de très bon conseils sur ce qu'il faut visiter en priorité et comment y accéder. Rien à redire bien au contraire à conseiller. 
Merci Manuela.

Manuela ist eine großartige Gastgeberin, war flexibel bei unserer eher späten Anreise und hat uns mit Brot, Wein und Früchten in ihrer sehr geräumigen und sauberen Wohnung begrüßt. Sie ist für alle fragen offen und hilft wo sie kann, inclusive Empfehlungen zu Restaurants, Sehenswürdigkeiten und Ausflügen.

Rundum perfekt, jederzeit wieder!!!
Hôte très sympa, elle nous a donné de très bonnes adresses. Appartement confortable. Mise à dispo de carte de métro. Supérette à deux pas. Très bon lit même pour les grands (je mesure 1,98)

Thanks for hosting us here. It was a wonderful stay. We spent good time in Porto. We also enjoyed the ice cream at santini and the cidade barbecue. Thanks for helping us suggesting good tastes of Porto. We are happy with the stay at your place and the way you received us.

Manuela was very helpful, she picked up us from aiport and told what to see in Porto, where to eat. She is great and very nice host. 
In the apartment you will find everything you need!

Muy bien la acogida de Manuela!
Agradecemos su excelente disposicion antes del viaje y hasta el final de nuestra estadia en este muy agradable departamento.

Como sugerencia : cambiar las fotos porque el departamento e mejor en la realidad!

très bon accueil de Manuela!
Nous remercions sa disponibilité depuis la préparation du voyage et jusqu'à la fin de notre séjour dans cet très agréable appartement.

Comme suggestion : changer les photos car l'appartement est beaucoup mieux en réalité!

Tudo bém, muito obrigada e muito obrigado !!
Gloria, la chilena y Luis, el luso-frances

The apartment are excellent.  It has an good geographical location.  No parking problems. The hostess met us very warmly. She gave us a full consultation about the main tourist point in the city. She provided us with a permanent information support.  And she kindly agreed to give us a transfer to the metro station with all our suitcases)) I recommend this apartments for tourists.
Thanks for everything.

Manuela was a great host, very friendly and the communication with her was easy and fast. She also gave us great tips about Porto. The apartment is very big and clean, there is everything you need to feel at home. We hope to be back soon!

the apartment is delicious, is located in a great area close to the center and very quiet but the nicest thing about our stay was Manuela: really kind and helpful troughout. I'd like to live in her apartment! Soon!

The apartment is much bigger than the photos suggest. It was perfect, very spacious and very clean. It was only a five minute walk to the metro. Manuela was so friendly and waited for us despite our flight being delayed. She gave us some great information about Porto and some delicious suggestions for places to eat. Her 'extra' touches such as toiletries, coffee, fresh fruit and treats from the bakery were a really nice touch. We had an amazing time here and highly recommend. 
FYI we ate the most amazing meal at Moules & Jugs, you have to try!

La gentillesse et la disponibilité de Manuela nous a vraiment permis de nous sentir accueillies, attendues et bienvenues! De multiples conseils et petites attentions nous ont donné l'impression d'échanger avec une amie! Un contact précieux à garder... Un appartement situé à proximité de restaurants, boulangeries, métro très pratique et agréable! Merci
This place looks just as great as the pictures show it to be and Manuela goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome. If we are ever in Porto again, we would definitely stay here again!

Manuela was a really nice host ! Gave us the perfect places to visit and to eat . We totally recommend. The apartment is in a good and walkable location . Cleaned apartment and well equipped. Thank you again Manuela ! We had a good time :) 
.....
Manuela, a dona da casa e uma excelente pessoa. Disse-nos os melhores lugares e restaurantes para visitar , e sem duvida foram perfeitos ! O apartamento e numa boa localização e perto do centro. O apartamento e limpo e bem equipado. 
Obrigada de novo Manuela, nos tivemos uma ótima estadia.

Manuela has been really generous and open minded from the first moment of our contact. She prepared the apartment nicely for us and gave us lots of tipps and information which inspired our plans. The bed has been unbelievably cosy like sleeping on clouds :)
The public transport was close although everything has been reachable more or less on foot.
We'd come back at any time! 
Obrigada!!! :)
Muito amável

Manuela´s place is absolutely stunning! We loved it a lot, it was like a four star hotel. Manuela is extremely helpful and nice and gave us many great tips to explore Porto and the surroundings. This was the best Airbnb experience we have had so far! We recommend this place to everyone :-)

Hospitalidade fabulosa! 
O apartamento é óptimo! 
Zona sossegada, fácil acesso.
Recomendo!

The staying was perfect, we definitely want to stay here once again. The flat is well located, near to metro and 15min walk from a city center. Furnished the same as photos, comfortable, clean and cosy and offers everything you need. Manuela was always helpful and easy to communicate with, answered for all our questions. We highly recommend for everyone and hope we’ll come back soon! :)

Manuela did an amazing job at providing all accommodation needed. The apartment is very nice and in a great location of the city, close to the metro and a 15 minute walk from city centre. Her hospitality was above and beyond and she was always willing to provide great advice as to which sites or restaurants to go to. Overall, she helped make this trip to Porto a wonderful experience and I would highly recommend travelers to Porto to stay at her location.

We had a great time in Porto after Manuela gave us a warm welcome. The apartment was okay, when the electricity went down Manuela bought us some chocolates which was very nice of her. We recommend a trip to Porto.
Excelente anfitriã. A Manuela é uma graça. Simpática, gentil e atenciosa. Pensou em cada detalhe para tornar nossa chegada muito confortável. 100% recomendado.
Manuela gave us a warm reception and was always helpful. Good location and apartment for a small family.

Staying at Manuela's appartement was great - it's Well equipped, Very spacious and comfortable. The location of the apartment is very convenient, either a nice walk through 'real porto' away from the historical city centre, or just a few stops by metro. Manuela was super friendly and greeted us enthusiastically and professionally when we arrived - not to mention the special Christmas pastries she got us. Also, Porto is just a real gem of a city to wander around and discover. Thanks Manuela!
Wonderful flat just like the pictures, close to the metro and a short walk from the centre. Manuela was amazing and went above and beyond to make us comfortable during our stay.
Apartamento confortável a menos de 5 minutos do metro. A D. Manuela é muito simpática e prestável.

We had a wonderful stay at Manuela's home. She is a great host and very worm person. She was so kind to wait for us to check-in until midnight because we missed our connecting flight. Apartment is clean and spacious, kitchen is well equipped so you can cook if you want. Manuela even left us some food, coffee and tea. She gave us all important information about Porto, what to see and how to get there, what to eat and drink and even suggestions where to go at night. If we ever come back to Porto we would stay at Manuela's place again for sure. :)

Manuela's apartment was perfect and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend a stay there if you are visiting Porto. It is situated close to a Metro stop which helps as the city is very hilly. Manuela was incredibly helpful and wanted to make sure we had an enjoyable stay. The apartment itself is a good size and has everything you need.

Where can I possibly begin... Manuela was the most incredible host. She was kind, gracious, attentive and made herself available if anything was needed during my stay. Nothing was needed, as everything was provided at the onset. Upon my arrival, she greeted me warmly, even arriving early to reserve a space for my car directly in front of the apartment building. She gave me tour of the flat and provided information about the city, how best to get around it and what hotspots to check out. 

The apartment was quite charming; it was spacious with a sweet balcony overlooking the street. Manuela was kind enough to stocked the fridge with juice, water and milk and left pastries for the morning. 

The flat is very conveniently located just 2 blocks from the Metro, which will take you immediately into the "Sao Bento" city centre. 

You absolutely will not go wrong booking this space. I look forward to returning to it and Porto soon!

Sehr herzlicher Empfang. Manuela gab viele nützliche Tipps für Porto. Sie ist eine umsichtige Vermieterin, sogar ein Leih-Regenschirm stand zur Verfügung. Danke! Wohnung ausgesprochen sauber. Küche komplett eingerichtet mit Grundausstattung (Salz, Gewürze, Zucker, Essig, Öl u.s.w.). U-Bahn, viele Geschäfte, Cafés, Bäcker, einfache (und preiswerte) Restaurants in unmittelbarer Umgebung. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und können die Wohnung uneingeschränkt empfehlen.

Apartamento bem localizado, possibilidade de ir a pé para os principais pontos turísticos. Suficientemente grande para 4 pessoas. 
Gostamos da nossa estadia e recomendamos.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto et cela en partie grâce à Manuela qui nous a accueilli chaleureusement et nous a donné des conseils précieux. Manuela est d'une gentillesse incroyable!
Le logement est bien situé (à moins de 2 minutes à pied de la station de métro Marques), dans un cartier calme et dans un immeuble très propre. L'appartement est spacieux et correspond totalement aux photos.
Bref, je recommande vivement cet Airbnb !
Encore merci Manuela !

El apartamento está genial.
Mucho más amplio de lo que parece en las fotos, con zona de aparcamiento en la misma puerta, sitio que nos tenía preparado Manuela a nuestra llegada, al igual que detalles de pan, leche y algún detallito para nuestro peque.
Está muy bien situado, a un
Par de minutos andando de la parada de metro de Marques.
Respecto a Manuela, un encanto. Ha estado pendiente de todo y nos ha tratado genial.
Volveremos seguro.

Excelente casa, bem decorada e consegue facilmente passar como se fosse a nossa própria. Localização igualmente boa, com metro a 3 minutos ou até mesmo 10 minutos até aos Aliados. Se quiserem qualidade e acessos fáceis este é certamente a casa indicada. A Dona Manuela é uma simpatia de pessoa e deixou-nos totalmente a vontade.

Manuela est adorable de gentillesse et très accueillante. Nous avons suivis la plupart de ses conseils culinaires et de visites et nous ne sommes pas du tout déçues. Le logement est spacieux et bien situé. C'est une de nos meilleure location !

Nous avons passé un tres bon sejour a Porto grace a Manuela. Elle nous a attendu jusqua 23h pour nous remettre les clés et nous donner de precieux conseils pour visiter la ville. L'appartement est tres lumineux, dans un immeuble de standing, probre, bien éauipé et la literie est bon. Il est proche de la station de metro Marques, qui est a seulement à quelques stations du vieux Porto. Je recommande vivement l'appartement de Manuela.
Logement et accueil agréables.
The Apartment was Really nice, clean and comfortable.

Manuela is really a warm and lovely person, she was very very well prepared. Whatever you need, she has it :) Appartment is not centrally located but really easy to find and perfectly accessible by metro, in a quiet and safe family neighbourhood. The appartment itself is very spacious, clean and comfortable. The only thing that could be improved is better lightning in all rooms. 
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto.
Highly recommended.
Tout a été parfait. Manuela à été un hôte exceptionnelle.

El apartamento está genial. Muy bien situado,en un barrio tranquilo a 10/15 min del centro y con una parada de metro justo al lado. Por dentro es muy bonito y acogedor con todo tipo de comodidades y utensilios para facilitar la estancia. 

Manuela es una anfitriona inmejorable,muy atenta y pendiente en todo momento para ofrecerte lo que necesitas. Realmente merece la pena visitar Porto y escoger este sitio!

I enjoyed the lovely nice prepared Appartement of Manuela very much! It was clean, lots of space, kitchen with all you need and as a warm welcome, some fruits and jus said hello to us on arrival 
It was easy to reach metro and in a couple of minutes you are in middle of Porto! And so if you like to have it a bit less busy beside the trips and walks through porto, then it is a perfect stay to be! And Manuela is well caring to make you a great stay in Porto, thank you Kaspar

Manuela's apartment is so spacious and a convenient trip by train to the city center. She arrived just in time to greet us as we arrived, and she took the time to show us around the apartment and provide some recommendations for things to see and places to eat. The apartment also has two balconies so it was nice being able to soak up some sun and eat breakfast out there. I highly recommend staying here if you're in Porto!
Nice, comfortable and very clean apartment 5 minutes from subway. Perfect choice for stay in Porto and big thanks to Manuela, she is superhost! :)

Nice place to stay; sunny spot! Close to the subway "Marquès". We rich the center by walk in 20 minutes... the way to go is going down so easy. To come back it's easier to take the metro.
Manuela is very welcoming and smiling... very reactive

This is my second time staying at Manuela's flat in Porto. And the second time was the charm! Manuela and her lovely place are a must for a short or long stay in Porto. Manuela's amazing hospitality along with her sweet flat simply cannot be beat!!

It's a large apartment with all the home comforts you would expect. There is plenty of wardrobe space. The welcome included a comprehensive insight to sight seeing and restaurants, the one we visited were spot on. There are lots of leaflets in the apartment relating to visitor attractions.
The location is excellent, Marques metro station is literally a 5 minute walk and there are lots of shops and eating places in the square. 6 days isn't enough to enjoy what on offer in and around Porto.

Once again, Manuela is a fantastic host! She's extremely thoughtful, courteous and will go out of her way to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The flat is cosy and conveniently located close to the center of the city and many major tourist sites. You won't go wrong booking this adorable apartment!

Manuela was a great host! My boyfriend and I stayed here for four days and it was a wonderful experience. Communication was amazing, Manuela was always available and responded quickly to all our questions. Would definitely come back to her place if we're ever back in Porto. Beautiful city and a lovely stay at Manuela's. 

Obrigada, Manuela!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Gil Vicente ! L'appartement est superbe, très propre et lumineux, conforme aux photos !
Manuela nous a très bien accueillis et donné de précieux conseils ! Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse pour tout séjour à Porto !

Le logement est proche du métro et bien équipé. Manuela est une hôte formidable , d une gentillesse remarquable et de très bon conseil. Nous sommes ravis de notre sejour chez elle. Nous recommandons son logement.

El apartamento de Manuela es genial para una estancia en Oporto. Está situado a unos 15min andando del centro de Oporto y tiene una parada de metro al lado. Manuela nos recibió y nos recomendó visitas y sitios donde comer. Recomiendo este apartamento sobretodo para dos o 3 personas.

Nice, spacious Apartment with good connection to the Airport and city center, nicely decorated and equipped with everything you need. Manuela is very quick and helpful with any kind of problem and has good information on the city. We enjoyed our stay!

Relación calidad-precio, muy bien y Manuela muy amable y simpática, nos ayudó mucho a planificar nuestra visita en Oporto.
además Mandela tuvo el detalle de comprarnos pan fresco y cosas para desayunar.
Quizás algo alejado del centro para caminar, pero muy bien comunicado con transporte público. Zona muy tranquila.
Manuela is a really kind and interested person. She

The apartment of Manuela was conform to the description.

We decided a time to meet at the apartment but I was very late. Yet, Manuela was very understanding and welcomed me and my father very warmly.
I'm French and Manuela speaks French very well, even though she never lived in France.

Manuela is very nice. When arriving at the apartment, she took all the necessary time to explain everything about the apartment, and she also gave us advice about the places to visit in the city.
Manuela left in the apartment several maps, guide books or magazines and also lent us 2 Porto transportation cards to use for buses, metro and tramway.

In the apartment, Manuela left also in the kitchen some drinks and some bread.

The apartment was clean, nicely decorated and rather quiet, except for some cars which pass in the street during the night.

Thank you Manuela !

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto grâce à Manuela. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du centre et très spacieux. Le plus : les terrasses pour des petits déjeuners ensoleillés. 
Nous avons bien profité de Porto grâce à toutes les bonnes adresses que nous a donné Manuela.

Nous recommandons fortement !!
Manuela helped us a lot, being a great host. Appartment exactly as described; tips and advices provided by Manuela made our stay easy and great.
Una amistosa, preocupada y generosa anfitriona, el aspecto exterior del alojamiento puede desilusionar un poco.

Nuestra estancia en la casa de Manuela ha sido fantastica.
Manuela es una mujer maravillosa, muy atenta a todo. La casa tiene todos los detalles y ella se preocupa porque todo sea perfecto. 
Recomiendo que si van a Oporto se alojen en casa de Manuela pues aunque haya que caminar un poco para llegar al centro, merece la pena, por Manuel a y por la casa
Appartamento comodo e pulito a parte una finestra che non si chiudeva bene, posizione ottima, Manuela persona splendida, cortese e molto disponibile, consigliatissimo.

Que experiência fantástica ! A casa é muito agradável com localização previligiada, bons acessos e perto do metro.
Um bairro calmo e simpático.
A casa tem muita luz natural, com uma sala grande e ampla equipada com bons materiais.
Tudo muito limpo e arrumado
Foi uma experiência fantástica e fomos super bem acolhidos e recebidos pela Sr Manuela que nos pôs á vontade e deu-nos um "guia" da cidade do Porto que foi simplesmente fantástico! Entre locais de interesse a visitar, como locais onde comer, sentimos-nos em casa...
Devo dizer que voltarei
Obrigado

Logement spacieux et propre.
Agréable séjour.
Merci Manuela pour votre accueil et votre amabilité.
Manuela is great and so helpful with everything,and the flat is cosy and nice as well. It's definitely a place worth tourists to try.

Cet appartement est génial : grand, beau, propre et bien situé (le métro est à moins de 5 minutes à pieds et le centre-ville n'est pas très loin, nous y allions souvent à pieds). De plus, Manuela est vraiment adorable !! Elle a été aux petits soins avec nous et nous a fait plein de suggestions de lieux sympas où aller. Bref, allez-y les yeux fermés :)
Estadia muito agradável! Manuela sempre gentil e atenciosa, nos deu boas dicas de lugares e sempre acessível. O apartamento é bem aconchegante e bem localizado. Recomendo!

L'appartement était tel que décrit sur les photos, très beau, lumineux et grand. Il est a 15 minutes à pie du centre ville dans une zone assez tranquille et proche d'un arrêt de métro.
Manuela a été une hôte incroyable, elle nous a donné des conseils sur des endroits pour se promener, manger, visiter, etc. Quelqu'un de très gentil qui parlait très bien anglais et français.
On va sûrement retourner.

Hôte très accueillante, aux petits soins. Appartement propre et spacieux à 2 min du métro mais qui mériterait quand même quelques travaux. Merci encore à manuela pour sa gentillesse. Nous recommandons
Very close to metro. Comfortable room.

Incredible hospitality from Manuela. She really went above and beyond to make sure the stay was comfortable. The location is perfect if you want to relax in peace after a day exploring. Metro stop is only a few minutes walk and there's bakeries and supermarkets nearby. Thank you again!
Super weekend passé chez Manuela. La gentillesse incarnée. Appartement trés pratique, propre, lumineux et bien situé. Je reviendrais avec grand plaisir.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Manuela's place. Manuela really went the extra mile as a host with lots of suggestions on restaurants, a well stocked fridge and toiletries. Manuela was charming and very responsive -helping with a taxi, how to buy metro tickets and checking in with us to make sure all was well. The apartment was quiet and located only a few minutes from the metro. We have stayed in Air BnBs in 10 countries and Manuela is the best host. We think Manuela can provide seminars to other hosts!

Bonne accueil de l'hôte, mais logement vétuste, chauffage avec bouteille de gaz! (l'électricité était trop chère), lumière défectueuse cuisine, une des plaques de cuisson faisait sauter l'électricité. Salle de bain vieillotte, champignons aux interstices des carrelages. Je déconseille ce lieu.
Es un apartamento amplio muy bien ubicado, está cerca de la estación de metro y a dos paradas del centro. Manuela es muy atenta y servicial.
Estupendo apartamento, Manuela una anfitriona muy atenta y pendiente de nosotros. Aunque está un poquito alejado del centro merece la pena ir.
You will have a good stay in a good neighborhood in a good flat.
Una excelente anfitriona. Hace la estancia agradable a cualquiera.

Os dias que passamos no apartamento de Manuela em Porto foram ótimos. Manuela sempre atenta, responsiva, cuidadosa e atenciosa. Apartamento corresponde as descrições e fotos, localizado numa rua tranquila do bairro, próximo a Praça Marquês onde havia estação do Metro. Duas estações já era a Estação Trindade que agrupava todas as 6 linhas do metro. O apartamento todo arrumado e finamente decorado. Banheiro espaçoso, banho com água quente, chuveiro forte. Tinha secador e demais produtos (sabonete líquido, shampoo, condicionador, etc). As toalhas no entanto poderiam ser maiores e mais macias. Mas estavam limpas e cheirosas, nada que tenha atrapalhado. Cama grande, boa, confortável. Infelizmente para nós que somos do nordeste do Brasil a temperatura estava bastante fria, e um dos dias no meio da noite o aquecedor parou de funcionar. Por sorte o quanto estava aquecido e tínhamos cobertores no armário. No dia seguinte Manuela rapidamente providenciou o conserto e disponibilizou um aquecedor elétrico de reserva. Nossa salvação! Sugiro que já deixe avisado que tem um outro aquecedor de reserva! Ao chegarmos, além de toda paciência e amabilidade nos dando todas as informações de restaurantes, (no próprio bairro tem alguns), pontos turísticos, transportes, etc. A wifi funcionou super bem! Como choveu muito e fazia muito frio não deu para conferir a distância de ir até o centro caminhando como é dito no anúncio do apartamento. Manuela ainda nos deixou com alguns mantimentos na geladeira, pão, frutas (maçãs e laranjas), cápsulas de café, chá, água mineral, além de uma garrafa de vinho, e que não consumimos, pois ao sairmos pela manhã já comíamos fora e chegávamos tarde após já termos jantado. Bairro bem servido com farmácia, padaria, restaurante, lojas, e fácil acesso a transportes tanto ônibus, como metro e também taxi e uber. Não fica muito distante do aeroporto nem da Estação de Trem Campanha. Usamos todos os meios de transporte da cidade com bastante tranquilidade. E para completar toda a hospitalidade e o acolhimento de Manuela, ela ainda deixava seu carro estacionado na frente do prédio segurando vaga para nosso carro, quando fomos pegar na locadora e voltávamos dos passeios bate e volta para Braga, Guimarães e Aveiro... Uma observação: a indicação do local para comer a Francesinha, nós particularmente, não achamos que valeu o custo benefício. Entretanto o restaurante indicado por Manuela em Matosinhos, valeu nossa ida até lá, mesmo no frio, só para almoçar. O único ponto que realmente eu daria nota baixa , no nosso caso foi a falta de elevador, pois como já não somos jovens após um dia de andanças pela cidade chegávamos exaustos de cansados e ainda tínhamos que enfrentar escadas. E com malas grandes, o que salvou foi meu marido ser forte e carregar as malas pra cima e pra baixo. E se tivesse um computador ou notebook para livre acesso dos hóspedes seria perfeito... E ao final da hospedagem ainda nos deixou uns docinhos folhados deliciosos que comemos na estrada. Enfim, foi uma hospedagem que recomendo e espero voltar, mas não no...

A hospitalidade foi muito acolhedora. A anfitriã nos deu dicas sobre a cidade, deixou na acomodação alguns mimos e se colocou à disposição sempre que precisamos! Quem ficar neste imóvel com certeza não se arrependerá!!! Manuela foi para nós mais do que uma anfitriã, se tornou uma amiga!!!

숙소는 노란 (Hidden by Airbnb) marques 역에서 가깝습니다. 근처에 mini preco 마트도 있구요 ^^ 3월에 리스본과 포르투 3주 있었는데 포르투의 3월이 춥고 비가 마니오고 바람도 많이 불어서인지 집이 춥습니다 . 목욕할 때 따뜻한물이 오래 나오진 않아요. 여자분들은 아마 샤워오래하시다보면 찬물 나올거에요. 수건은 한사람당 두개 주셨는데_ 알아서 세탁기돌려서 사용하라고 하시더라구요. 주방요리기구가 후라이팬이랑 냄비가 좀 오래되고 막 써서 그런지 바닥이 벗겨져있었어요. 조명이 어두워서 낮에는 괜찮은데 밤에는 좀 어두워요 집이. 그 외에는 집도 넓구 호스트분도 정말 친절하시고 지내기에 불편함 없었습니다. 호스트분이 추천해준 식당 맛잇어요 _ tri로 시작하는 가게인데 매일 포장해와서 저녁에 숙소에서 먹었습니다 ^^ 여행하며 지내기에 좋은 숙소였어요 ^^

O apartamento está muito bem localizado, a poucos minutos a pé do centro e com paragens de metro  e autocarro muito perto de casa. Mas o que ganha mesmo é a hospitalidade da Manuela, que ultrapassou todas as expectativas! Fez-nos sentir em casa.

Manuela went above and beyond. The place was wonderful and loaded with extra amenities. She made it feel like a little home-away-from-home. We were given extensive advice on the area and were welcomed with open arms. We would love to stay here again! I might mention the location was a little loud with traffic and locals at night but nothing terrible. Still 10/10 recommend!

Great host, meeting Manuela was like connecting with a long lost dear friend. Clean but dated apartment. Nice bed. Location four quick stops by subway to downtown. A bit too much street noise, though.
Eu e minha esposa passamos 10 dias maravilhosos no espaço da Manuela!! Bem montado com tudo que precisamos. A Manuela nos deu boas dicas e sempre (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza iremos voltar.

Manuela's hospitality was great. She waited for us and the check went smoothly. She left drinks and fresh bagels for us. For the kids, we had the baby bed and feeding chair, which was great. In the kitchen we had everything we needed. However, the apartment could be renovated - everything was a bit old, the bath tub as well, the balcony door could hardly be opened.

Beautiful and big apartment. Three minutes walk to next metro station and twenty minutes walk to city center.
Will come back when I am the next time in Porto.

Hemos estado 3 días en Oporto y han sido unos días estupendos.
El alojamiento no ha podido ser más perfecto y ha contribuido a que la estancia en esa estupenda ciudad, haya sido superior! . Cama comodisima, limpieza, detalles que Manuela, la anfitriona, se encargó de tenernos preparados...
La ubicación es muy buena. A dos paradas de metro del centro, y con servicios como supermercados, bancos, cafeterías, (Website hidden by Airbnb) lado.
A destacar sin duda, la anfitriona!! 
Recomendable 100% !!!
Gracias Manuela por todo!

Manuela is definitely a SUPERHOST! Very helpful, gave us all the information on what to see, where to go, what to eat. The apartment is located on a small and quiet street, very close to metro station and is spacious and very clean. Manuela was so kind to provide us with some water, juice and freshly baked bread. Will definitely try to book again next time, when in porto. Thank you, Manuela! ❤❤❤

We had a very pleasant stay in Porto. Manuela was a great host, giving us an endless amount of suggestions on what to do. Also she made us feel very welcome by leaving us some sugar bread and beers in the fridge. The apartment was like described and very neat. You must like yourself because it has mirrors everywhere!

Manuela was an amazing host. Our train was running late, and she accommodated our late arrival without hesitation. And she even gave us a map and marked all of her recommendations and suggestions! Loved my time in Porto - totally recommend!

If you want to stay in Porto this is the Flat you definitely looking for! Close to the city Center and public transport, located in a nice area with many different restaurants around . The Flat itself it’s big , have lots of space , modern and clean . We had everything what we needed during our stay . Manuela , the host it’s what to describe a “ perfect host “ very nice , friendly and always smiling , she welcomed us with snacks and cooled drinks , she gave us plenty of tips where to go , eat and where to shop . She talked us through about the typical Portuguese  traditions , food and wine . Even after our stay , we still stayed in contact . We were very satisfied! Definitely worth coming back again .
Thank you, it was amazing to stay at Manuelas apartment. It was very nice to stay there. Highly recommend. Tganks Manuela
Отличный приём! Мануэла много посеветовала , что посетить ! Квартира хорошая, местоположение отличное метро рядом, маркет, Детская площадка

Dona Manuela foi impecável! Tratou a mim e minha filha como se fossemos muito próximas. O local do apartamento é muito bom, próximo ao centro em uma zona muito tranquila! Nada faltou, só sobrou elogios para esta, que foi uma estadia muito prazeirosa!

Hemos estado 10 días en Oporto: ciudad que sorprende a cada momento, con cantidad de lugares que descubrir y actividades para realizar.

      El apartamento de Manuela está situado, en nuestra opinión, en un lugar ideal: próximo al centro y muy cerca de la parada del metro y autobuses. En un calle tranquila, donde dejamos el coche aparcado a la puerta de forma gratuita durante toda la estancia.

      Manuela fue siempre muy atenta, generosa, detallista, ofreciéndonos todo tipo de información que pudiésemos necesitar.

Apartamento y anfitriona MUY RECOMENDABLES. 
Una vez más, gracias por todo Manuela.
Ótimo apartamento, perto do centro!
nice and friendly

My husband and I drove to Porto and we needed a parking space during our stay. I let Manuela know beforehand, and she told me she would ‘reserve’ a space for us. On the day when we checked-in, we parked exactly in front of her place’s entrance, it was because she parked her car on spot the night before so when we arrived, we could take her spot. I was very touched. 

Manuela is a very nice and friendly host, not only did she get all the things we need as guests, but also the info we need as tourists! Her place is located near the Metro, bus stops, and some local restaurants. Anyone who would like to experience Porto as a local, Manuela’s place is a good place to start with.

Perfect hospitality with some really nice touches such as a fresh bun from the local bakery. Sitting in the local park having a cool beer at the end of the day was a real treat. The flat is ideal and you can access anywhere in the city but remember Porto is hilly. As with any city accommodation you may need to get used to the city noises. There is no air conditioning so at the height of summer it may be a touch hot in the flat. We really enjoyed our stay and for 2 people it's far better than a hotel room having much more space and the kitchen is well attired for cooking

Es war alles in allem sehr gut. Die Wohnung ist gemütlich und für eine Reise mit Kind gut ausgestattet. 
Wer Lärmempfindlich ist sollte sich Ohropax mitnehmen, da die Straße recht stark befahren ist. 
Zu Fuß ist man innerhlab von 15-20 Minuten um Zentrum und die Anbindung an die Metro ist direkt um die Ecke. 
Gemütliches Appartement.
Manuela was a great host ! Gave my sister and me a lot of tourist information.... thanks
Lugar excelente, muito bem localizado, com várias opções ao redor. Muito próximo ao metrô. Silencioso e aconchegante.

Minha mãe e meu padrasto ficaram hospedados neste apartamento durante sua visita à Porto e não poderia ter sido uma experiência melhor!
Manuela foi extremamente simpática e acolhedora!
O apartamento é lindo e espaçoso e estava super limpo e organizado.
Manuela deixou mimos de comer e beber para eles e eles amaram!
Obrigada, Manuela, pela incrível hospitalidade!
Espero te conhecer em breve!
Beijinhos

Manuela is a very friendly and caring host. She even made sure everything was all right during our stay. She gave useful tipps for sightseeing and places to eat. The apartment is nice and clean as expected. It may be a little bit cold in the winter time, so one could not be wrong to bring a pair of extra socks, but there is also a mobile radiator. The apartment is very close to the  Metro Station. I can recommend a stay at Manuela's place.
A Manuela é um doce de pessoa, sempre disponivel e disposta a ajudar. O apartamento é muito bom, num local calmo e perto de tudo, bonito, limpo e bem arrumado... Muito recomendado!

Manuela, no solo tiene un piso estupendo, limpio, amplio y decorado sencillo pero con buen gusto; sino que además es un encanto de mujer y una anfitriona espectacular! Al compartir profesión con ella, nos dimos cuenta de que todas sus recomendaciones fueron maravillosas!!

Manuela is a great host, always charismatic and giving attention, and making sure we are not in need. The apt is great, has a high value, and its confortable, near points of interest, like metro, market, square, and 10 min from shopping street. Thanks!

- apartment was clean, big and easy to find
- location is central, in a safe area, many shops around and everything you need is just few mins walk
- Manuela is amazing super nice good-hearted host that waited for us at night, greeted us and took the time to give us in depth explanations and tips about all possible worthy things to do in Porto. She was even nice enough to equipped the fridge with Milk, fruits, water, bread, fruits, it very uncommon and exceptional experience as an Airbnb user.

Would def recommend,
Thank you!

name: TOP ROOM
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: sultanahmet. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: insanlar, dış mekan, ortam ve semt. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar, aileler (çocuklu) ve büyük gruplar için uygundur.
description: Mekanım şuraya yakın: sultanahmet. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: insanlar, dış mekan, ortam ve semt. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar, aileler (çocuklu) ve büyük gruplar için uygundur.

name: Stunning Queen bedroom with Balcony
summary: Our place is located in the quiet North Bondi, walking distance to local shops and cafes, and the famous Bondi beach! The apartment is decorated in a beach-chic style with all the modern amenities you would need. The bedroom has a queen bed, along with space in the wardrobe to hang clothes. From the bedroom you're able to see the sea, fall asleep to the sound of the waves, or sit on the balcony for morning/evening drinks and look at the blue!
space: Bedroom has queen bed, wardrobe and mirrors. Balcony off the bedroom has a small table and chairs and also a chaise long. Kitchen fully stocked with fridge, dishwasher, cooker and oven. Bathroom has shower and bath options. Laundry room in the apartment includes washer and dryer, along with iron and ironing board. WiFi is available throughout the apartment, living room has 2 sofas, and a dining table for meals. TV has normal cable channels, along with HDMI cable if you want to plug in laptop.
description: Our place is located in the quiet North Bondi, walking distance to local shops and cafes, and the famous Bondi beach! The apartment is decorated in a beach-chic style with all the modern amenities you would need. The bedroom has a queen bed, along with space in the wardrobe to hang clothes. From the bedroom you're able to see the sea, fall asleep to the sound of the waves, or sit on the balcony for morning/evening drinks and look at the blue! Bedroom has queen bed, wardrobe and mirrors. Balcony off the bedroom has a small table and chairs and also a chaise long. Kitchen fully stocked with fridge, dishwasher, cooker and oven. Bathroom has shower and bath options. Laundry room in the apartment includes washer and dryer, along with iron and ironing board. WiFi is available throughout the apartment, living room has 2 sofas, and a dining table for meals. TV has normal cable channels, along with HDMI cable if you want to plug in laptop. Access to all rooms apart from 2nd bedroom. North Bondi
neighborhood_overview: North Bondi is the quiet end of Bondi beach, but has a bus stop, small supermarket, cafes, pharmacy, a few restaurants and liquor shop. The beach is 5 mins around the corner too ;)
transit: There is the bus station less than 5 minutes walk around the corner with buses which all go to Bondi Junction Train Station, and then onto the City.
access: Access to all rooms apart from 2nd bedroom.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: I had a fantastic stay in North Bondi thanks to Lucy. The room is lovely, with the sound of birds outside the big window and lots of space around the flat too. Lucy's home is beautifully decorated and clean, and located perfectly on the quiet streets of North Bondi, but still a moments walk  away from the beach and a couple of shops. Lucy is wonderful, so welcoming and even offered to cook me breakfast; amazing host!!
It was a pleasure to stay in this room. Lucy coordinated key exchange and welcome with her flatmate. The room itself has views of the beach and a comfortable bed.

name: Oba Hotel istanbul Quadruple Room
summary: My place is close to Sultan Ahmet Camii and İstanbul. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
space: Real Ottoman wooden house. Hand carved doors, furnitures from antic pine wood. Real istanbul neighborhood.
description: My place is close to Sultan Ahmet Camii and İstanbul. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups. Real Ottoman wooden house. Hand carved doors, furnitures from antic pine wood. Real istanbul neighborhood. All kind of info about places to visit. Help to organize your istanbul and Turkey tour. Help to buy tickets for airlines, buses. Entrance tickets for museums. Next to Sokullu Mehmet Pasha Mosque from Architect Sinan. Real istanbul street 280 meters away from Hippodrome but quiet and different than made up tourist street with full of hotels and shops. Local families living around. 400 meters from Sultanahmet Tram station. 18 Km from Ataturk Airport. 280 meters to Hippodrome where Blues Mosque, Saint Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Underground Cistern and Turkish and Islamic Arts Museum located. Grand Bazaar is 800 meters away. Lots of non touristic lo
neighborhood_overview: Next to Sokullu Mehmet Pasha Mosque from Architect Sinan. Real istanbul street 280 meters away from Hippodrome but quiet and different than made up tourist street with full of hotels and shops. Local families living around.
notes: 23 year of Tourism experience will be at your service 24 hours.
transit: 400 meters from Sultanahmet Tram station. 18 Km from Ataturk Airport. 280 meters to Hippodrome where Blues Mosque, Saint Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Underground Cistern and Turkish and Islamic Arts Museum located. Grand Bazaar is 800 meters away. Lots of non touristic local restaurants, Local park for kids and families with full of locals during warm summer evenings. Close by original sea food restaurants area Kumkapı where fun never ends.
interaction: All kind of info about places to visit. Help to organize your istanbul and Turkey tour. Help to buy tickets for airlines, buses. Entrance tickets for museums.

host.host_about: Tourism Professional

reviews.comments: Really good location 5 mins walk from the Blue Mosque and hippodrome. Ismail was a really good host, great with kids, helpful in all respects from sightseeing to tips on how to get around. Room was clean and cozy. Fresh towels linen etc every day. Highly recommended.

name: Stone House 2, com terraço e Wi-Fi
summary: Desfrute da luz e de um terraço para as suas refeiçoes. Na sala contemple a construção de paredes típicas do Porto, que deixamos visíveis para si. Localiza-se no centro do Porto, com ligação directa de metro ao aeroporto.  Casa do início do século.
space: The apartment has the charm of old traditional houses of Porto. Completely rebuilt / renovated with all modern equipment for your well being.
description: Desfrute da luz e de um terraço para as suas refeiçoes. Na sala contemple a construção de paredes típicas do Porto, que deixamos visíveis para si. Localiza-se no centro do Porto, com ligação directa de metro ao aeroporto.  Casa do início do século. The apartment has the charm of old traditional houses of Porto. Completely rebuilt / renovated with all modern equipment for your well being. A casa está inserida num bairro popular. Tem restaurantes, supermercados, lojas e a Praça Central "Aliados" ou o mercado do Bolhão muito próximos. Centro histórico e animação noturna, 10 minutos a pé. Contudo a casa está inserida numa rua calma. Aeroporto: Metro 30 minutos, Linha directa E ( cor violeta) AEROPORTO- TRINDADE (estação central).  Comboio: 10 minutos, linha directa E (cor violeta) Campanhã - Trindade (estação central).  Autocarro: a 50 metros.  Taxi: 100 metros.  Estacionamento: À porta.
neighborhood_overview: A casa está inserida num bairro popular. Tem restaurantes, supermercados, lojas e a Praça Central "Aliados" ou o mercado do Bolhão muito próximos. Centro histórico e animação noturna, 10 minutos a pé. Contudo a casa está inserida numa rua calma.
transit: Aeroporto: Metro 30 minutos, Linha directa E ( cor violeta) AEROPORTO- TRINDADE (estação central).  Comboio: 10 minutos, linha directa E (cor violeta) Campanhã - Trindade (estação central).  Autocarro: a 50 metros.  Taxi: 100 metros.  Estacionamento: À porta.
house_rules: . Só hóspedes com mais de 21 anos podem fazer a reserva. Estadia minima: três dias. Caução/depósito: 100 euros. De preferência não fumar. Adeptos de futebol não. Festas ou despedidas de solteiro não. Silêncio: das 23.00 às 08.00 h . Em caso de violação das regras o proprietário reserva-se no direito de terminar a estadia.

host.host_about:
Actividades ao ar livre. Gastronomia. Conviver com família e amigos.
Viajar, conhecer locais e pessoas novas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Nous avons passé un long week-end entre filles à Porto chez Patricio José. L'accueil a été parfait! Nous avons vraiment adoré l'appartement : tant au niveau de l'espace pour 6, que de la qualité de vie ( cuisine bien équipée et magnifique terrasse), que de la propreté et de l'état des locaux ( magnifique appartement avec beaux plafonds et pierres apparentes..) Et le prix est très raisonnable, surtout pour sa situation ( 15-20 minutes à pieds du Douro). On recommande +++

Very nice, clean, pleasant, functional and beautiful apartment center of of Porto.  We had a really warm welcome, with good informationstions and a quick  service. We recommend it !! Thank you very much and see you next time.

Superbe accueil, José était la pour nous accueillir et nous a donné beaucoup de conseil de visite, l'appartement en duplex est juste superbe et très bien placé et au calme. Plusieurs salles de bain sont disponibles ce qui est un vrai plus en groupe. 
L'appartement est très bien aménagé et très propre. On se sent comme à la maison.

Le logement est agréable, fonctionnel et tout à fait conforme aux images du site. Les hôtes nous ont fort bien accueilli. 

Rien à redire, c'était très  très bien

The host was really nice. He showed us everything about the house and also what to do downtown. We really liked the house and it was well located. The beds were comfortable. Also, there was everything to cook so we had two diners there. Really fun!
The only thing is that the house is a stone house so it is pretty cold. You have to wear shoes and maybe a hoodie. Otherwise, we really recommend this flat.
Muy buena casa. Grande, funcional y con todo lo que se precisa. Pasamos muy bien.

Jose was heel vriendelijk en heeft ons veel goede informatie over Porto gegeven. Hij wou ons een zo aangenaam mogelijk verblijf geven. Porto is een heel mooi stadje en het appartement heeft een goede ligging, op ongeveer 15 min wandelen van het centrum en de rivier. Er is geen zetel of living, maar wel een grote tafel.

Un espacio muy amplio, bien equipado, limpio. Casa antigua histórica. El trato y recibimiento muy bueno sin problema alguno. 
Céntrico a 10 minutos de la plaza del ayuntamiento.
Puedo recomedar el sitio.

Dit is echt een aanrader als je met een groep naar Porto wil gaan. Alle benodigdheden waren aanwezig in het appartement, het was schoon, en de bedden lagen lekker. Het appartement ligt op loopafstand van het centrum, op een fijne locatie, vooral voor de prijs die je betaalt. Jose is een hele vriendelijke man, die alle vragen beantwoord en tips geeft over de omgeving. Het appartement was alleen een beetje koud, dus een trui is handig om mee te nemen.

Emplacement idéal et confort.... 
Tous s'est très bien passé, de la prise de contact à la remise des clés.
Je recommande cet appartement.
Merci Jose !

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement de José. Celui-ci est tout à fait conforme à la description, très lumineux et bien équipé. Sa situation est bonne, nous avons juste eu du bruit le soir mais jusqu'à une heure correcte pour des vacanciers (23h). José est sympathique et nous a consacré du temps pour quelques conseils dans la visite de la ville.

Je recommande vivement ce logement.L'accueil de Patricio est chaleureux,il nous a attendu jusqu'à 23h30 et nous a donné des indications sur les choses à faire à Porto.Le logement est parfait pour 6 car il comporte deux salles de bain.L'appartement est propre et très bien entretenu.Merci Patricio

L'accueil de Patricio a été très chaleureux et ses conseils très avisés.
L'appartement est idéalement situé près du centre de Porto dans un quartier calme.
Pas de difficultés pour stationner.

We had a lovely weekend in this apartment. Jose welcomed us very friendly and was very helpful. The apartment is clean and light, with enough space for a group of 6. Location is good as well, about ten minutes walking to the centre of town.

Ravis de ce séjour à Porto. L appartement est idéalement situé. Proche de la station de métro Trinidad (accès direct à l aéroport) et proche du centre ville à pied. Le logement est fonctionnel, propre, identique aux photos. La petite terrasse est un vrai plus. José est très gentil et nous a donné d excellents conseils et astuces pour parfaire notre séjour. A réserver sans hésiter.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Porto dans les 2 appartement de José (nous étions 12). Ils sont très fonctionnels et tout près du métro ainsi que du centre ville. José est un hôte très gentil et très accueillant. Nous recommandons vivement.

très bon accueil de José qui nous attendait à l'appartement, quartier populaire et calme, appartement comme sur les photos tout confort avec clim, terrasse très agréable sous un magnifique bougainvilliers!
5 min à pied du centre et de la station de métro (ligne directe pour l'aéroport). Parfait!
Excelente anfitrión, el lugar es tranquilo y confortable

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement. Nous étions 6 adultes + 1 bébé et tout était parfaitement aménagé et conforme aux photos. Le métro est à 10 minutes à pied (pratique pour rejoindre l'aéroport) mais tout peut se faire à pied.
José nous a très bien accueilli et nous a procuré de nombreux conseils.
La terrasse est très agréable!

Perfect House! We were five people and we all loved the house, the location, it has everything one needs, just as the description. José is very attentions and helped us with tips how to arrive from the airport and everything. Muito obrigada por tudo! Tudo ocorreu as mil maravilhas! We highly recommend this place and will definitely come back!

Nous avons passé 10 jours dans l’appartement de José. L’appartement est très bien équipé, conforme aux photographies et très propre. La terrasse est spacieuse et très agréable. L’appartement est situé à 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro Trindade et 10 minutes des magasins du centre ville.
José nous a chaleureusement accueillit et donné des informations pour visiter Porto.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l’appartement de José et nous le recommandons.
Merci José pour ce séjour.

Appartement très agréable et idéalement situé pour découvrir Porto. Nous avons séjourné à cinq pendant trois jours.
L'accueil en français est très chaleureux.
Nous recommandons sans hésiter cet appartement.

Accueil très sympathique, nous sommes arrivés plus tôt que prévu et avons pu déposer nos bagages. La maison est conforme à la description , très bien équipée et propre. Le quartier est situé à proximité du centre. Très bon séjour.

L'appartement dans lequel nous avons logé une semaine à 7 (toutes de jeunes étudiantes) était très agréable, spacieux et lumineux. Un seul défaut, l'insonorisation laisse à désirer, mais le temps d'une semaine, cela ne pose aucun problème. 
Il y a 4 lits à l'étage, très cosy. Et deux chambres en bas. 
L'absence de salon est largement compensée par la terrasse très bien exposée où il fait bon petit déjeuner.
Immeuble très bien situé, près du centre, et calme.

L'appartement est grand et confortable. Il est bien situé pour visiter Porto. 
José nous a bien accueillis et nous a donné quelques conseils sur la ville. 
Tout s'est très bien passé, merci.

Hemos pasado unos días maravillosos en Oporto, el apartamento es perfecto para pasar unos días, muy bien situado en la ciudad  y muy cerca del centro. Todo está en muy buen estado y se corresponde con lo que se puede ver en las fotos. La información que recibimos por parte de José Patricio, nuestro anfitrión, nos ayudo mucho para el resto de los días que estuvimos en Oporto. Es un apartamento muy recomendable para pasar unos días en Oporto, se corresponde muy bien con lo que estabamos buscando,  La zona dónde está situado es muy tranquila y se puede andar sin problemas de ningún tipo. Felicito desde aquí a los anfitriones por el trabajo realizado en el apartamento y agradezco una vez más a José Patricio por su curso acelerado sobre los vinos de Oporto y de Douro.

Nous avons passé 5 nuits dans le logement de José, nous étions 6 filles, c'était très bien. L'isolation phonique est minime, donc attention au bruit, on entend les voisins, qui nous entendent aussi...José est très gentil, il nous a attendu à l'appartement et nous a conseillé sur les restos et les visites. Quartier calme, pas loin du Métro (10mn), et du Marché, ça monte quand même...Bon séjour dans l'ensemble.

José est un hôte particulièrement accueillant. Il nous a donné tout les bons plans de Porto! Avec mes copines nous avons passé un week-end extra à Porto dans la maison de José. La maison correspond aux photos, c'est propre, charmant et très bien situé. Encore un grand merci à José!

Jose был очень гостеприимным: помог решить проблему с букинком, отправил нам карту метро, и маршрут от метро до квартиры. На месте хозяин рассказал нам о местах, где можно вкусно поесть (и мы ходили туда каждый день!), супермаркетах, а также ресторанах, которые нас интересовали. Квартира находится в хорошем тихом районе, и при том недалеко от исторического центра и основных достопримечательностей. Поэтому мы пользовались транспортом только в том случае, если нужно было ехать далеко. 
Квартира полностью соответствует описанию: большая, просторная, светлая и чистая. Есть все необходимое, а также прекрасная терраса. Если еще когда-нибудь мы еще раз посетим Порто, то обязательно остановимся здесь.

Apartamento muy espacioso y confortable, muy cómodo y  cuenta con suficientes baños. Un poco frío pero soportable gracias a los aires acondicionados instalados. La conexión a internet muy rápida, la ubicación cercana al centro y la atención con el dueño muy fluida y muy atenta a todos los detalles.

José est très accueillant et donne de bons conseils pour la visite :-)
Porto est une très belle ville. 3 jours suffisent pour en faire le tour.
Points positifs du logement: spacieux et bien situé par rapport à la ville et au métro.
Points négatifs: les 2 chambres du 1er étage sont bruyantes une à cause du traffic de voiture et l'autre de la cour du voisin qui résonne quand il parle dehors!
Pour période d'hiver: Maison froide malgré les 2 airco chauffants (décembre 2015). Un seul truc manquant: un fauteuil dans la maison!
Merci José

Fuimos 7 personas y la casa estuvo perfecta. Con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. La casa estaba perfectamente localizada. Muy cerca del centro de Oporto. Jose nos dio orientaciones precisas y nos recomendó varios locales de donde salimos muy contentas.

We enjoyed having the entire house for ourselves during our stay in Porto. It is located in a very quiet neighbourhood, which is pretty close to the downtown. The house was clean and with the necessary amenities. The terrace was lovely and was our favourite spot for relaxing during the hottest hours of the day. The upper salon with 4 beds was quite small so we had to cosy up there. Jose was very helpful, sending us detailed directions to the place and answering all our inquiries. All in all, Stone House 2 is pretty awesome.

La casa de José es aún mejor que en el anuncio. Tiene todas las comodidades que se necesitan en un hogar y perfecta para vivirla y disfrutarla como si fuera tu propia casa.
La amabilidad y atención de José fue espectacular. Nos dejó mapas, explicó sitios y lugares que ver, dónde comer, comprar.... Todo! 
Está a 5-10 minutos del centro, en una calle tranquila, pero en las calles de al lado tiene todo lo que se necesita: supermercado, tiendas, bares y cafeterías...
100% recomendable. Una experiencia inolvidable.

Our stay at the Stone House was perfect! The host Jose was a very friendly person who gave us a warm welcome. He explained where we could find all the nice spots of Porto. When we had any questions during our holiday he was always ready to answer them. The location was really close to the citycentre and we recommend this residence to all of you.
El apartamento es tal como se ve en las fotos. Tiene todo lo necesario y es acogedor. La bienvenida de José muy buena, explicando todo de la casa y de comercios, zona turística, etc...
Netter Gastgeber mit guter Unterkunft. Zentrale Lage und gepflegtes Apartment.

L'appartement de José est superbe, avec des vieilles pierres apparentes, une jolie cours intérieure, je trouve que les photos ne lui rendent pas hommages, il est plus grand et plus sympathique que ça a quoi je m'attendais !
José parle bien français et a pu nous aiguiller sur les bons coins de la ville de Porto.
Nous avons séjourné à 5 dans cet appartement sans problème, nous ne nous sommes quasiment pas servi de la cuisine vu le prix des restaurants en ville mais elle contient tout ce qu'il faut !
José a été très flexible sur notre horaire d'arrivée puisqu'il n'y avait personne à n'y avait personne avant nous et a même pu s'adapter à la dernière minute au retard de notre avion.
Attention tout de fois pour la chambre du haut, les escaliers en colimaçon sont assez raides et étroits.

Je recommande cette appartement à qui veux découvrir Porto !

La casa de José es una maravilla para visitar Oporto si es que vas en grupo, como fue nuestro caso. Es tal y como la describe y se ve en las fotos. Solamente falta un sofá para descansar y charlar jeje. Además, José es un propietario World 0, servicial y atento que se preocupa por sus huéspedes en todo momento, y al que se le puede preguntar cualquier duda durante la estancia. Sin duda, volveríamos a repetir. Saludos, Iratxe

Super séjour à Porto avec une bande de copains. Dommage qu'il ait pas fait plus beau pour profiter de la terrasse. Autrement les bars, la vallée du Drouo et les plages sont à découvrir. José nous bien accueilli et donné de bons conseils.

José a été super acceuillant, malgré notre heure d'arrivée tardive il a passé du temps avec nous pour nous expliquer le fonctionnement de la maison et nous donner quelques tips sur Porto ! 
 
La maison est top ! Parfaitement clean, tous les équipements de base sont là, les pièces sont assez grandes et agréables.

Le gros plus c'est la terrasse qui a été très appréciée lors de notre séjour.
Le bougainvillier est vraiment magnifique, JE DOIS LE DIRE ! 

OBLIGADA José :)

6 of use stayed here for a long weekend. The patio is beautiful and a great space to hang out in. It is about a 15 minute walk from the centre of Porto, and about 5 minutes from the nearest supermarket. Jose had some great recommendations and was always on hand to answer any questions!

A casa do José é muito boa, com cômodos amplos, organizadora e limpos. A localização é ótima! Perto de mercado, padaria e do metro e estação de trem São Bento. Além disso, José é um anfitrião super prestativo. Nos indicando mercado, padaria, locais para visitar, comer e beber ; )

El lugar esta entre 5 y 15 mins caminando de la zona turística. Entrega lo prometido en el anuncio. José Patricio es muy amable, facilta mapas de la ciudad, aparcamientos y sus tarifas, restaurantes, y aconseja actividades. Muy recomendable.
The house is great! It has all the facilities you'll need to have during your stay in Portugal.

Accueil chaleureux de José, appartement propre, fonctionnel et disposant de tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer un séjour agréable à Porto. José parle bien  français et donne des conseils pertinents.

name: Sunny Private bedroom in Bushwick!
summary: - Sorry no Pets - Welcoming guests in my 2 bedroom apt. We are located in Bushwick by the Myrtle/wycoff LM Stations and halsy J train. Lots of near by restaurants and grocery stores. We also have a nice backyard and laundry in the basement.
space: Well the idea behind my home is just a place to relax and rest. Also a great place to get a lot of work done for the remote worker. I try to keep in stock everything I need.   The backyard is lovely during warmer months. The bedroom gets a decent amount of light.
description: - Sorry no Pets - Welcoming guests in my 2 bedroom apt. We are located in Bushwick by the Myrtle/wycoff LM Stations and halsy J train. Lots of near by restaurants and grocery stores. We also have a nice backyard and laundry in the basement. Well the idea behind my home is just a place to relax and rest. Also a great place to get a lot of work done for the remote worker. I try to keep in stock everything I need.   The backyard is lovely during warmer months. The bedroom gets a decent amount of light. You'll have access to all the common areas. TV in the living room. The dining room. Kitchen and refrigerator space. A quick tutorial on how to use the espresso machine. Bathroom. Laundry in the basement that is coin operated. Interact as much as you'd like lol. Lots of food and bar options for the local crowd here. YELP (app) is a big help for those looking around for food. Choose a restaurant based on high ratings/review and you wont be disappointed. house_rules: Please lock the gate door and front door when you come and go but do not lock the white doors dead bolt to the 1st floor apt. There is no key for that lock so in doing you lock anyone not inside the apt out. The apt door which is white is auto locking as well.  The main gate and black door are not.  Please be aware of bathroom use not exceeding 10 mins in the morning hours due to us perhaps rushing to go to work. Specifically during the times of 6am to 7am. Please do not leave any bags or towels inside of the bathroom. Please be respectful of noise after midnight to 6am.  Only guests on the reservation are allowed to enter the building. Violating this will result in termination of the remainder of the your stay.  Lost key fee - $20 Late check out fee - $50

Ruben's place was perfect for me.  Near enough to my daughter, near enough to hike to subway, a long block from amenities like restaurants, corner convenient store, etc yet the neighborhood was quiet.  I'll be recommending it to my other family when they visit our NYC girl.  
Ruben is extremely pleasant, we hardly saw each other as we both came and went so it was almost like having my own apartment in Brooklyn :-).

PROS
-Reuben is responsive through the app. He’s also a cool person to chat with. 
-Despite being near a school, several smaller restaurants, and small grocery stores, the neighborhood is generally quiet.
-There’s a washer/dryer in the basement.
-There’s a bus around the corner. There are other bus lines within six blocks. Within a 6-12 block radius, there are two or three train lines. 

Cons:
-There are neighbors above that can be noisy (at least during my stay they were active).
-The basement where the washer/dryer are is dark. Also, they washer/dryer is coin operated and there aren’t banks nearby. You have to hope that one of the supermarkets/bodegas give you change or come prepared.
-Buses and trains require some transferring and walking. Getting into the more popular parts of Brooklyn or Manhattan aren’t very easy, especially at night or during the weekend when there are service changes.
-I didn’t feel comfortable walking around the neighborhood past 5 or 6.
-I recommend driving or ubering if you’re in this area.

Only suggestion would be to get and groceries before you arrive as there isn't a supermarket close by.

Jason was super nice from the beginning! He answered all of my phone calls every time I had doubts with the housing. He was able to help me out and even tell me nice suggestions of where to go in Montreal.

Jason's place was great. The space is very large and the bathroom and kitchen were fabulous and well equipped. Very modern and recently updated. Ample storage space for your belongings and the area was away from traffic. Jason provided check in details in a timely manner. Would stay again.

Fantastic place, very comfortable. Very true to the pictures. Neighborhood typical and beautiful, only about a 15 minute drive from downtown and closer to other neighborhoods like Little Italy and Mile End.
Thanks Jason.
Comfy beds, great shower and lots of room and closet space.  Would recommend this place.   Neigbourhood is quiet.

Jason is an awesome host. Supportive and clear with communication. The place is close to transit and well equipped!! Much better than the presentation in photos!! 
We really appreciate his generosity!!
Great place would stay again
Apartamento amplo, bem decorado, belo banheiro com 2 pias e chuveiro fantástico, ótima cozinha. Bairro residencial, alguns minutos de caminhada até o metrô.
Nice place! Everything is clean! Near to the Subway & another buses! The grocery store is near to the place! The department has a lot of helpful services.
Grand logement, pas loin des transports en commun (bus, métro ...)
I will come again next time

The place is very nice, clean, stylish and spacious. We loved the shower because it was very cool and relaxing. We liked everything and including the amenities such as the washer and dryer. The location is about a 7 minute walk from the metro.
Bel appartement très bien équipé. Literie confort, etc. Quartier calme et tranquille : RAS
Great place!!

très bel appartement, calme, tout équipé, à 800m du métro commodités proches, propriétaire très réactif, la literie est bonne, la machine à laver et sèche linge sont un plus pour ceux qui arrivent en avion. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Nous reviendront
Appartement bien situé mais bruyant .

Logement bien situé, proche du métro, stationnement facile dans la rue, suffisamment spacieux pour 4 personnes. La climatisation nous a permis de passer de bonnes nuits durant cette semaine de canicule. Points à améliorer  : fournir plus de couverts (insuffisants pour 4 pers) rajouter de la déco sur certains murs vides.
Nous remercions Jason de nous avoir accordé un départ tardif pour pouvoir regarder le match de quart de finale de la coupe du monde de la France.

The reason I booked Jason's place is because I attended a conference at the Palais de Congres de Montreal. For the price, I would say that I made a good choice! My friend and I drove to Montreal and we didn't arrive until around 2 am. Jason gave very detailed instructions for self check in which made it really convenient as I wouldn't want to bother him at that time. After we had arrived in  Montreal, we commuted throughout our stay. It is a 7-min walk to the metro and I would say that the neighborhood is pretty quiet and safe (there were times when we went home around 1 am). Jason told me that we could park our car in the backyward which was a bit difficult to find since Jason did not respond when I asked him about it (not a big deal though because my friend and I figured it out eventually). The condo is just as how it looks like in pictures, and I especially loved the kitchen and the bathroom. There were essentials he left for us like soap, shampoo, towels etc. During our stay, we lost Wi-Fi for about a day and Jason fixed it as soon as he can. Overall, our stay was nice. I would book his place again. Thanks Jason!

My cousin and I stayed in Montreal for 5 days. The apartment location offered us everything we needed for those few days: easy access to bus and metro and convenience store.  The accommodations were lovely; offered a fully stocked kitchen that we decided to cook after a jaunt to the Marche Jean –Talon. On the evenings we enjoyed relaxing and cooling down in the really good AC. Wifi worked perfectly as (Website hidden by Airbnb) spottiness.  Highly recommend for anyone looking for a neighborhood experience, that’s very economical and still connects you to the city in less than 25 mins.
Great place to stay if you want to visit Montréal. Metro is a 8 min walk away and very doable. Very clean apartment and full kitchen if you want to cook. Definitely recommend.

El apartamento está equipado con todo lo que se necesita para vivir en una casa, además que es moderno, bonito y cómodo. 
Está a 10 minutos del metro Sauvé, con lo que se tarda unos 20-25 minutos al centro. //
The apartment is equiped with everything you need for living in it. 
It takes 10 minutes to the metro stop called Sauvé, so it tales like 10-15 minutes to the City center.
Beau logement très agréable et propre dans un quartier calme. Manque d'ustensiles et de couverts dans la cuisine. 10 minutes à pieds du métro. Belle réactivité du propriétaire à mes mails.

Notre séjour chez Jason s'est très bien passé, l'appartement est spacieux et plutôt confortable, la salle de bain est neuve et propre. L'appartement est à 8 min à pied du métro Sauvé sur la ligne orange donc pratique pour rejoindre le centre. L'entrée est autonome et donc permet une flexibilité pour l'heure d'arrivée. La communication avec Jason s'est également bien passée. Seuls petits bémols, le canapé qui était en mauvais état et ne permettait pas un autre couchage, le manque de décoration et d'investissement dans l'appartement et le manque de vaisselle, à peine assez pour 4.
Très spacieux et moderne. Facile d’accès et près de tout. Recommande fortement!
Jason was super nice to book with
tres bonne endroit et bonne. Communication avec Mr Jason

name: Just Remodeled Studio Condo, Modern, Clean--View!
summary: This just remodeled modern studio is the perfect getaway spot to enjoy your Waikiki vacation!  On the 36th Floor, you have incredible views of the city, the mountains, the Ala Wai Canal, and even some ocean between the buildings.  The condo comes with a kitchenette that includes hot plate, full size refrigerator and utensils.  The location in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel is perfect for exploring Waikiki, with the beach only about a 10 minute walk, and near shopping, restaurants, and night life.
space: SEE MY REVIEWS! Almost every guest raves about how CLEAN the condo is, the AWESOME VIEW and what a great LOCATION!  This private condo is for the discriminating traveler who wants to stay in a clean, cozy, and modern 212 sq.ft. studio with a kitchenette and an awesome view!  The furniture is new, with a queen bed,  and a new 40" flat screen TV. It's just a 10-minute walk to the beach and on the way you'll pass all kinds of fun stuff, restaurants, bars, shops! Our guests have described the view as 'Awesome".  The view is of the city, mountains, the Ala Wai Canal, and some ocean view also.  This condo is in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel, just a few blocks from Waikiki Beach.  There is a pool, Jacuzzi, coin laundry, car rental, great restaurants, sports bar and a night club on the premises.  This is a privately owned and managed condominium and please be assured that all your needs will be met conscientiously and professionally.  We want to make your stay a happy one!   You might want to che

On the 36th Floor, you have incredible views of the city, the mountains, the Ala Wai Canal, and even some ocean between the buildings.  The condo comes with a kitchenette that includes hot plate, full size refrigerator and utensils.  The location in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel is perfect for exploring Waikiki, with the beach only about a 10 minute walk, and near shopping, restaurants, and night life. SEE MY REVIEWS!
