neighborhood_overview: The location is easy walking distance to all of Waikiki's attractions.
transit: Yes there is parking in the building, operated by an outside company for $25/day.  Unfortunately parking in Waikiki is difficult and expensive everywhere.  In Waikiki a car is not needed, but it is nice for exploring other parts of the island.  Many people only rent one for the days they  are exploring the island.
access: You can use the gym for a $5 fee for your entire stay.
interaction: I will be happy to hear from you with questions or concerns anytime.
house_rules: - Guests under the age 20 must inquire before booking

host.host_about:
Hi, 
I have lived in Hawaii for over 20 years and I enjoy sharing my condo with travelers from all over the world.  I will do my best to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable.
I hope to see you soon!
Larry Wennick

reviews.comments:
I was about a week out from my Oahu vacation and my original host canceled at the last second. - not the best thing to happen on short notice! 

I needed someone reliable and last min tire personally. Larry nailed it. He made me and my lady comfortable and was very easy going/laid back. 

I stayed at his place for about a full week and it was fantastic for what we were doing. You get a great view of the city and can see the ocean from the window. It's super close to everything! Little did we know that Waikiki is a walking city! You don't need a car. So avoid renting a car unless it's just for a day or so. Parking nearby $25 which is under Larry's place. 

The Burger/Sushi place within the building is also amazing. They literally have everything you can think of. 

Conclusion: when I come back to Waikiki I'll be looking for Larry's posting!
It is a really comfortable unit! Larry is a really nice landlord. We're happy to stay in here!
Perfect !

Larry was very helpful and responsive to messages, checkin/checkout was quick and easy. The apartment is newly decorated and feels fresh. Everything you need is within walking distance and it provided a great base for exploring Oahu, Dollar car rental is just round the corner if you want to take a drive East to see Lanikai Beach or North to see the Northshore and Waimea Valley (recommended!). Would stay again!

The place was beautiful, we really enjoyed our stay. We had everything we needed. The location was close to all the restaurants and night life. I would recommend this place to (Website hidden by Airbnb) the same building we also rented a smart car and we only paid $10 a night since we were staying here. Overall I'm very pleased! 
This was our first time experiencing AIRBNB and I'm going to continue to use it. 

Thank you Mahalo!

Great pied-a-terre for Waikiki! Larry was an excellent help and made sure all was well upon arrival. Pics of studio are accurate, nicely renovated, and as described. Easy walk to the beach and all that Waikiki has to offer.

Super studio avec une magnifique vue. A quelque minutes de la plage Waikiki et de beaucoup de restaurants. On peut facilement se rendre à Pearl Harbor en bus ou en taxi. L'accès au studio était très facile avec les indications de Larry.
Merci

Larry's place is just as described in the listing. The location is accessible to everything on Waikiki and Larry was very responsive during our stay. Check-in instructions were also seamless, which added to our great experience. I would recommend this apartment without hesitation.

Cozy and clean studio with good kitchenette. Convenient location: short walk to good third wave coffee (Honolulu Coffee Experience Center is nearby and both local and superior to Starbucks for anybody who cares about good coffee), reasonable walking distance to the main Waikiki strip, and a convenient drive to other options.
Larry was very responsive and checked in at key points throughout the stay to make sure everything was going smoothly. The instructions were all clear and up to date.
Overall a very positive experience and a good value.

Larry is an amazing host! His airbnb was nice and clean and I will definitely stay in any of his Airbnb's again. I would recommend any of his Airbnb's to family and friends. His communication with me was excellent.
Cream pot cafe is so close and so good for breakfast. Easy walk to the shops and the beach. Very clean and modern bathroom.
Unser Aufenthalt bei Larry war super. Alles was wir benötigten war vorhanden,das Condo war sehr sauber und an einer top Lage! Sehr zu empfehlen!

Upon Arrival Getting to and access to the unit is easy. We were given instructions how to access the unit before our arrival and the instructions are really easy to follow. When we arrived to the condo, there was also a guestbook with house rules, information about the condo, instructions how to get around Waikiki and much more. We found this guestbook really handy and helpful. The Condo The building is older than most hotels nearby and probably needs some updating. The condo is privately owned and when we arrived to the condo, it was modern, very clean and well lit. The room made us feel welcome and comfortable. Everything is as what the pictures show. The view of the room is absolutely breathtaking. Partial beach view to the left, buildings in the middle, and a gorgeous mountain backdrop to the right. The room is a bit smaller than what we had expected but it was good enough for two people, myself and my husband. The room is complete with all necessities. He has a full kitchen (there are hot plates to cook your food in if you decide), microwave, fridge, dishes, cooking equipment, beach towels, cleaning supplies like soap detergent, broom, and that is more than most would think of, we were pleasantly surprised. It has extra paper supplies also should you run out. Larry was also very kind enough to supply us with beach chairs to take to the beach, because when we arrived the pool was being renovated until December 1st. The only thing I would recommend is having more drawers to put our clothes in, or a luggage rack to put our luggages on. Other than that, this room has everything you should need. The Location We were pleasantly happy with the location. It is a prime location with everything just a short walk away. Not to mention, the location had very good views from all directions. There are a few restaurants just steps from the condo. Then there are more places to eat, shop about 10 minutes away on both directions going east or west on Kalakaua and Ala Moana Streets. The closest beach access is 10 minutes away, then if you walk further down to the east, there's access to Waikiki beach there as well, near other shops and restaurants. The Host We had the pleasure of meeting Larry on our last day as we were leaving. He's very pleasant to talk to and very pleasant to deal with as well. He is professional and did his best to make us feel welcome. From the start of our booking, he is very accommodating and responsive with any questions we had. He is very communicative and updated us with the pool situation and made the situation better with providing us with beach chairs and umbrella so we wouldn't have to rent any equipment at the beach since the pool was closed for renovation. He also informed us of things going on in Waikiki on certain...

This condo is the perfect size for two people.  Very clean. Provides beach towels and chairs. Nice kitchenette.  Great location- 5-10 minute well to beach, restaurants,  and shops in Waikiki. We used the smart car rental service at this hotel.  It's a great deal, easy and staff are very helpful.  Larry responds quickly to questions.  Overall,  thoroughly enjoyed staying here.

This place was great.  Exactly what was depicted in the ad.  Check in and out was easy.  Larry was prompt in responding and communicated well.  I didn't get to meet Larry.  The bar in the bottom of the building gets a little rowdy and there was a guy being thrown out at 3 am cussing up a storm and trying to fight the bouncer but I probably wouldn't have known that if I hadn't been awake to catch a ride to go hiking at that hour.  I wasn't something I heard from the room just something I saw being down in the loading zone.  The parking is kind of expensive if you rent a car from the airport but very easy and worth it to be able to park the car in a lot attached to the condo building.  Overall, everything was great and I was well prepared from messaging Larry ahead of time what to expect, there were no surprises.
Larry was prompt with communication, allowed for an early check in. The place was nice and clean.

Larry was a great host! Everything we needed was in the room from beach towels and chairs to extra linens to bath soap. We felt very comfortable and the check in/out was smooth. Albeit we didn't get to meet Larry, we felt his gracious hospitality through the room which helped make our trip even better. Thanks Larry!

This place was very good to stay for us. We enjoyed shopping, gastronomy, nightlife, and Waikiki beach all the time, and the location is very close to all the places. It was a clean and cozy condo with great view from 36th floor. We enjoyed staying there.

Room was very clean and well stocked with amenities. Kitchenette was a plus! check-in and check-out was easy. Good communication with host. Location is close to beach and the mall, and close to abc store and 7-eleven. Would stay here again.
Larry's place is really nice and convenient. The view outside is awesome. Convenient place to stay in Waikiki area near Ala Moana.

I would recommend this condo to my friends. I value its cleanliness and good location. Most important, the host cares, sending a prompt reply every time. Of course, you should not expect the quietness of a residential area in a city like this. On the whole, I was satisfied with this studio. I would come back.

Small but functional studio with adequate equipment kitchenware, utensils, beach towels, beach chairs, bathroom towels and wifi!  Although we never met Larry himself but he has been very communicative and prepared instructions that made the whole experience very easy to go through.  Location is walking distance to shopping & beaches.  The view is great!  Great for the value and I would highly recommend it!

多分初めての日本人の宿泊かと思います｡Larryさんの英語はわかりやすく､中学英語ﾚﾍﾞﾙの私でもよく読めば不自由はありませんでした｡
景色は最高です｡
季節柄､沢山の虹が見えました｡

Larry was very prompt in returning all of my messages before our stay. The space is small but has all the amenities included in the unit. We felt very secure there from check in to check out. Hotel part is defiantly dated but the condo was updated. The pool was nice as well. Within a few minutes walk to the beach as well as anywhere you may want to go. Thank you Larry!

Great location apartment just a few blocks away from the main hotel areas. The apartment has been renovated nicely and was really clean and well equipped with what we needed. Being in a smaller apartment the air conditioner and fridge noises were quite noticeable at night although not a major issue. We had a great stay, lots of nice bars and restaurants close by!!
Nice & clean place, good value. Good size for two people for a short stay.

Larry's place is conveniently located- only a 10-15 min walk to the beach and restaurants/shops. We had an easy time communicating check-in/out. There are also all the basic essentials such as beach towels and sunblock ready for your trip to the beach. The place is small but has a great view of the city.

My wife and I celebrated our honeymoon in Waikiki and found Larry's condo to be the perfect stay for a great cost. Great location,  close to many shops and restaurants and an easy walk to the beach.  Cozy, newly remodeled condo with an amazing view! We will definitely be back!

Larry has a great place and provides all the necessary appliances. The only challenge is that the elevators are dated and take a long time - so be prepared to have patience to get to the great view that the Condo provides!

The location is perfect! Plenty of good food around, and a 10min walk to the infamous International Market.

Great little studio in walking distance to pretty much everything in Waikiki. 

We stayed a few days shy of two weeks. Would come back!

This place is very clean and comfortable. I love the view from the studio, the owner was very generous, he provided all the necessary items for you. He is very helpful and reply quickly. I would definitely book his studio again.

Fantastic location, breathtaking view, bed was really comfy with some kind of luxury topper on it, lovely powerful shower, elevators never too busy, jacuzzi beautifully hot and powerful. Larry always on hand and the room was really well equipped with little necessities and even deck chairs for the beach! Perfect decor throughout -as lovely as the pictures. You should choose this condo - and I'm generally the skeptical type!

In town for a wedding. Larry's home fit our needs perfectly (the suite even came with beach equipment -- umbrella, beach towels, etc). Restaurants and shops are conveniently located and within walking distance from the building. Larry has a flawless check-in and check-out system. Easy and fast, without the hassle of having to personally meet up. Building has security and front desk personnel. Great value for the price. Thank you for a comfortable stay.

Larrys place was exactly as described and worth the price. What I really liked about it was that you could tell Larry was a very good host and tried to think of little things you may need during your stay which he placed strategically around the condo. I used some of the aloe Vera myself!
Convenient, easy and clean. Quick communication.
Larry was incredibly facilitating. Check in information was very clear and everything went smoothly. Perfect location for the nearby conference centre.

Had a fantastic time in Waikiki, close to all ammenities within walking distance. Larry is a great host, kept communication at all times when required. The apartment is exactly like the pictures - very clean and tidy. Definitely recommend!

Good location away from the intense hustle and bustle but close enough to walk and enjoy. The room was perfectly as described and Larry was a very welcoming guest. Would highly recommend for a single person or couple. Thanks again.
Great location!
Larry is a great host... Quick to answer any questions and the studio was perfect

Larry is an excellent host, has great communication and the apartment is EXACTLY as it looks in the photo and is described. Easy check-in and also extremely clean! It's about a 10min walk to the beach and 10 min walk to both ala moana and waikiki downtown. One tip I'd suggest is to bring an eye mask to sleep as the curtains are very thin and the room is lit up at night which may affect light sleepers. Overall definatley recommend!
Very nice place and Larry was a great host!
I was attending a conference at the Convention Center. The location and the view are unbeatable!
Larry's place was a good base to explore the Waikiki. It was just remodelled and very clean. Communicating with Larry was also easy and fast.

Came to Hawaii to celebrate my best friends wedding.... with a limited budget. Larrys home was not only affordable, but nicer than half the regular hotels my friends were staying in. Nicely remodeled with great random amenities like beach umbrellas, chairs, and aloe (definitely needed that). Close to restaurants,and bars. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here the next time i'm in Hawaii. Thanks Larry!

Larry's condo was a great place to stay in. It was clean, cosy wi a beautiful view from a high level floor and had everything you might need: from utentils and microvawe to an iron, beach towels and even an umbrella. Would I stay in this place again? Absolutely! Perfect location, comfortable and great price/quality ratio. Thank you Larry for such a positive experience

Larrys place was walking distance to the beach and the main restaurants / shops. Larry is great with communication! Great little coffee shop called Malako (I think) great coffee and little bakery! Thanks again!
Larry's place was great, as advertised and he was a great host. Definitely recommend this place.
Larry is a fantastic host. The Communication from the moment you book is fantastic. You are always kept informed and up to date and he is very prompt with replies.
Larrys Unterkunft sieht genau so aus wie auf den Bildern. Super modern! Tolle Aussicht vom Zimmer. Lässiger Pool. Ca. 10min zu Fuss bis zum Strand. Perfekt!

Larry's place was perfect! Exactly like the description and super clean. Larry was very responsive and accommodating, even offered early check in as well due to the early arrival of our flight. Strongly recommend Larry's place!!

Great location although a bit of a hike to the beach. Lovely bright apartment and very comfy bed. Unfortunately there were a number of annoying and unexpected maintenance issues to contend with. Host communicated well about them and had them fixed straight away however they distracted from the enjoyment of the stay. What was worse was someone was smoking in an adjacent apartment which meant there was a very strong smell of smoke coming through the vents which was really disgusting. Once again host tried to resolve but little they can do.

Perfect location, walking distance 5 min, beach, restaurants, shops and great yoga studio. Couldn't be any better, nice room, well appointed,  amazing view. Larry is such a kind and helpful person, made our stay so easy and perfect.
Very comfortable and clean condo with easy access to the waikiki beach and its locations. Larry is helpful and questions are answered very fast. I highly recommend the condo.

The pictures were identical to what it actually was so there were no hidden surprises. The room was clean, and the view outside was great. The room runs on the smaller side, but the pictures do a good job of letting you know. It was more than accomadating for my husband and I as we stayed for a couple days. The location was nice. There were a lot of cool places around to eat at. Larry was a great host. He responded to anything we needed almost immediately. His directions were clear, and he makes the check-in/check-out process very easy. Overall we thought this place was great.
Definitely the most bang for your buck. Couldn't have imagined a better location or view.

Larrys place was ideal for my sister and I for our brief stay in Honolulu! The view is amazing! While the building itself is a bit dated the studio is recently remodeled and clean. We were able to easily hop on the bus right outside and it was a short walk to the. beach and a few local restaurants. Also there is a laundry room on site which we found to be helpful. Larrys instructions were spot on and super helpful. The only thing that became a bother was the slowness and having to wait for the elevator, other than that perfect place to stay when staying on budget in Honolulu!

Larry's place was conveniently located and clean, exactly as described. It's a perfect efficiency for a single person or couple. It's a short walk from the beach and a main shopping street (Kalakaua Ave.). Larry was extremely responsive through Airbnb messages and was very helpful in resolving a wi-fi connectivity issue. The condo is located inside a hotel, with a restaurant, bakery, corner store and car rental in the lobby. Would gladly stay there again.
Best bang for your buck! Super loved Larry's place! Walking distance to all the best spots in Oahu! This has got to be one of my favorite bookings in Airbnb ever. :) Very clean too!
The condo has good location and an amazing view. We stayed here for five days. All good, would stay here again.
Excellent location, privacy, cleanliness. Great WI-Fi and cable, excellent notes for guests about local activates etc. Thank you Larry.

Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen, es bietet neben einer tollen Aussicht auch diverse Möglichkeiten, ob Restaurants, Shopping oder Strand. Alles ist gut erreichbar.
Falls man mit dem Auto reisst stellt das Parken eine Schwierigkeit dar.
Die Unterkunft selbst war sehr sauber und auch die Kommunikation mit Larry verlief sympathisch und schnell.

This place had a great 36th floor view of Waikiki and was within walking distance of the beach. We could watch the sun set from the room too. Clean room stocked with cooking utensils. Larry was a great host as well and was always available to answer our questions with a quick text/call. Thanks!
Definitely worth to stay here with the room facilities and additional items include beach umbrella, beach towel etc. very convenient location with foods and short walk to Waikiki beach.

We had a really great stay, the flat is well located and the communication with Larry is very easy and uncomplicated!! In particular the check in and check out were very easy. The parking lot in the garage next to the apartment was very helpful. We recommend this stay for  a short vacation in Honululu!  information very helpful. In addition we really appreciated the extra beach towels. Best regards, Jennifer
If you want easy access to Waikiki.  This is it!  It is central and walkable...if you love walking and shopping.  If you need coffee immediately...7 eleven is just downstairs. Highly recommended.
Well situated place. Clean and everything you need. Good communication with the host. Accurate description and photos.
Everything was 5 stars!!! I highly recommend this studio!! Super nice and clean !! Thank you very much Larry!!
This a winderful place to stay, larry was awesome and place is as described. I'll recommend to anyone. Thank You Larry.
Can't thank Larry enough! Communication was fantastic, very clean, tidy, beautiful room! Would definitely stay here again during my next trip to Honolulu!
I can only recommend Larry's apartment. It's central located with a nice view and swimming pool.
Great stay! I would recommend staying at Larry's place any day. Its clean, well-kept and in a great location!

It was the best experience I’ve ever had. Apartment was very clean with unbelievable view and great location. Larry is so nice and polite!
I will highly recommend this place!

Larry was a great host. Very communicative before and during my stay, and also very understanding and flexible towards my needs, such as check in time. 

The condo is exactly as it looks in the photos. Bright, airy, clean, and with a terrific view. It came with all the things I needed and there were several amenities nearby. 

At first, it felt like it was a little far from the beach, but after a day or so, I realised this wasn’t the case and the 20 minutes walk to Waikiki Beach seemed breezy. 

The only thing which caused me a little disturbance was that it is located very closely to another condo, and so there would be noise from those other guests time to time. 

However, I had a great stay at Larry’s place and would recommend it to others.
Great location, Larry's studio has all what you need, from kitchen stuff to beach chairs, towels and even an umbrella. Breathtaking view and great attention from the host.
I really had a wonderful Time. The  condo was really Clean and confortable, very well situated. The gym was Nice too! Great deal

Larry was very quick to respond and flexible when we had some last minute travel issues. The apartment was perfect and very close to the beach and restaurants. We rented a smart car downstairs and that was also a great decision.
Nice place. All amenities were great. Great views, awesome location. Always a quick response from owner.
Checking in was a breeze.  Larry was very attentive to our stay.

Awesome value for the location. In the middle of Waikiki beach and Ala Moana Center. We walked everywhere in Waikiki and it is definitely manageable. There is street parking available but it is almost impossible to ever get a spot. We paid $25 cash only to pay in the parkade attached to the building. Building is run down and only one elevator seemed to work so getting to the 36th floor took some time but understandable and never was more than 10 minutes. Room was clean. Beach towels and mats are provided. AC cooled the room quickly. Full size fridge and hot plate made it easy for quick meals! Hallways and room had a strong smell when we checked in. Check in was super easy with Larry’s instructions. I would recommend this spot! Thanks Larry :)

It was wonderful! Everyone in the building was so nice, and you were great with communication. I would just add that you explain how to use the shower  I had to (Hidden by Airbnb) it, but it was the funniest post on (Hidden by Airbnb) that day! 

Many thanks,

Kirsty
Larry was a consummate host - always responded promptly to my queries ... you feel very at home in this cosy condo ... condo, amenities and view superb ... would definitely stay with Larry again!!

Very close walk to all the shopping areas of Waikiki and Ala Moana. Very clean and tidy space with nice air conditioning. The only downside is the elevator takes an average of 10 min to get on and down to the lobby.

Larry was a phenomenal host with great communication. We didn’t have any problems checking in or out, but he followed up every time to ensure we had what we needed. The place itself was conveniently located 10 min from Waikiki. The building has its own coffee shop and bakery right downstairs, which was perfect for grabbing a quick breakfast and coffee before an early day full of activities.
Larry was always so helpful and quick to get back to us. The location was perfect. It felt like we were at home!
My parents stayed here in April 2018 while on vacation. They loved the cleanliness, comfort, and location of Larry's place in Honolulu. They would stay here again on a return visit.

Amazing place to stay for a quick trip to Honolulu. A/C worked great and I was impressed that Larry provided snorkels, lawn chairs, beach umbrella, and beach towels, along with sunscreens in the rooms.
Larry's condo was impeccably clean and was conveniently located. Larry was easily contactable and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

This is a great place to stay. The exterior is a little run down but the apartment was very nice. While on the small side, it was comfortable apartment with a full-size fridge and microwave.

Larry was a wonderful host. He was helpful before and during the stay.

I would definitely stay again.
small but nice place

Larry was a great host who was very quick with his replies and communication. He provided many extra things that are perfect for a day at the beach (chairs, umbrellas, snorkel). We did not use the pool or BBQ but could see it out the window-it looked nice :) the photos are a true reflection of the apartment-the view of the city at night is wonderful. The location is great-a short walk into Waikiki,
And a lovely breakfast Restauraunt within the building. If you are a light sleeper you may struggle with the sheer curtains in the morning light (or the afternoon if you needed a nap), but it’s a lovely way to wake up. There is a laundry in the building but unfortunately you do not receive access to this. I have never felt towels as soft as the ones provided! They were amazing! I highly recommend this rental.
ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁからは少し離れてますが､お部屋は清潔感があり､ﾓﾅｰｸﾎﾃﾙの中にあるのでｾｷｭﾘﾃｨｰは万全です｡ｱｰﾘｰﾁｪｯｸｲﾝも快く受け入れくださいました｡お部屋からの景色は最高でした!何か疑問があれば､ﾗﾘｰさんはすぐに返信をくれます!ﾜｲｷｷで宿代を安く済ませたい方にはとってもおｽｽﾒです!
larry was awesome, this is a great place for a quick stay
Had a fantastic stay here! Perfect location would definitely come again

We had a wonderful stay at Larry‘s appartment. It was very nice, comfortable and clean and located in a convenient walking distance (10min max) to Waikiki Beach. There were towels and additional pillows available. Larry was also a great host and helped us a lot. Thank you very much Larry :)
Super convenient and squeaky clean. You will enjoy your stay. And the view from the room is breathtaking

Loved Larry’s place. It was clean and bright, lots of lights and natural lighting as well! Nice view, easy check in/out. Beach towels and mats are provided. Wish we would’ve seen the beach chairs under the bed, that would’ve been nice to use. We had issues with the key card working in the elevator, but not working to open the room one night, but it was an easy fix. It was almost 2AM so we didn’t contact Larry, but Moss from security helped us, with no issues. He even brought the key card back up to our room so we wouldn’t have to go back down with him. There’s a bakery and a little cafe located in the lobby if you want something quick in the morning. The coconut/pineapple muffin is delicious! We spent most of our time at the beach so we didn’t get to check out the pool. Overall it’s conveniently located and I would stay here again! Thanks Larry!
Had an amazing time. The condo is extremely clean and had a nice bathroom! Exactly as advertised.

Room was clean and more modern than some of the others I heard about it in the building :) little small but was perfect for what we needed for this trip. Parking is expensive, $25 for 24 hours, but pretty sure that’s all of Waikiki. Never did check out the pool area.
Great place and view of the city. A/C worked awesome.

I love Larry's condo very much, everything is the same as described, great view, very clean bedroom, bathroom, and refrigerator. Check in and check out process is simple and easy. It is very close to Waikiki beach, a perfect spot for staying. Larry respond very fast for any inqury.

급하게 결정된 여행이었는데, 호텔 컨디션은 기대이상이었어요. 욕실과 간이주방의 청결도는 매우 만족스러웠어요. 타월에 대한 요청에 대해 넉넉히 챙겨줘서 편했습니다. 숙소 전망은 예술이었습니다. 매일 전망을 사진에 담아두고 싶었어요. 간단한 세면용품, 세제, 푹신한 배게, 식기류, 비치타월과 파라솔, 다리미 등등 세심함이 돋보였습니다. 
위치는 해변까지 걸어서 10분정도, 호텔앞에 ABC마트와 편의점이 있습니다. 쇼핑중심지에서는 약간 거리가 있지만 한적하고 조용하게 지내는데 도움되었습니다. 래리의 빠른 응답과 친절함이 우리의 여행을 편안하게 만들어줬습니다.
다만, 침대에서 끽끽 소리가 났고, 옆방 사람들의 소음이 그대로 들렸어요. 여행 마지막날 옆방 투숙객이 바뀌었는데,  시끄러운 사람들이 들어와서 휴식을 방해했어요. 저는 피곤함에 지쳐 잠들었기에 크게 신경은 안썼지만, 예민하신분들은 참고하세요. 
저는 이 숙소를 강력하게 추천합니다.

Larry’s place was perfect for my boyfriend and I. It is as pictured. Small, clean, great view, walking distance to many nearby places and he did supply beach accessories (which was so convenient for us). We did have a rental and was lucky enough to have found street parking for all 5 days we were there. I would recommend this place for a couple who is on the go and often out exploring!
Place was very clean and tidy. Close to everything and Larry was great with responding to any questions we may had. Highly recommend this place for two people.

très beau petit condo, propre, bien situé et facile d'accès. Propriétaire qui  répond rapidement aux demandes. Si vous prévoyez louer une voiture, il y a quelques places de stationnement gratuit disponible le long du canal. Nous avons adoré notre séjour et recommandations cet endroit.

What a view!! If there was anything bad that I could say I didn't notice it because I was too busy looking out the window. However, everything was great. The room was nice and clean. The place is located close to everything we needed: beach, restaurants, shops and bars. The host was communicative and quick to respond. We highly recommend this place.

We really enjoyed the room and totally recommend it. Larry was one of the more outstanding hosts we've encountered on Airbnb. He was very friendly and professional in our correspondence and was very quick about replying back to us. We'd gladly book one of his places again.

Zentral gelegenes zimmer, 36.Stock, sehr sauber, einfaches check-in.
Gebäude sehr in die jahre gekommen, zimmer aber nicht.
sehr hellhörig, kein dampfabzug in der küche!
Larry's place was awesome, just as described! He was quick at responding to any of my questions. The view from the apartment is phenomenal! Overall, a great and smooth stay!

Amazing space! Very updated condo with clean decor, plush towels,  cozy pillows. Bed was really comfortable. Everything you could need provided.  The building was great as well, plenty of places to eat and a nice pool and lounging area. Highly recommend!
Smaller than expected but it was clean and in a good location
The location is great for walking downtown, room is bright and cheery, and host is very friendly.

The condo is really comfortable!
I really like it. And I appreciate your kindness.He take care of my stay.
Thank you.
Great place to stay in the Waikiki area. Close to restaurants and shops, highly recommend!
can't be any complaints. very nice Host; quick responses and always helpful. very nice views from the room.

Great place to stay and some incredibly friendly staff downstairs to help with everything. The building had great food, tourist information and car rentals. Location is great, but gets noisy being downtown, a lot of sirens going on all night! Besides that, the place is amazing, Larry is an incredible host.

name: Oporto beach duplex
summary: 40m from the beach (you really can smell the sea)... T3 Duplex (the  photo is taken from a great terrace nice to diner or breakfast)... Free Bikes... Private Car parking... Near Oporto and Espinho You can smell the sea...
space: Decorado con detalles y lujo. Completamente equipado. Bicicletas gratis.
description: 40m from the beach (you really can smell the sea)... T3 Duplex (the  photo is taken from a great terrace nice to diner or breakfast)... Free Bikes... Private Car parking... Near Oporto and Espinho You can smell the sea... I can show you the real Oporto city, and the great Douro River. Quiet, beautifull. Free parking, train station.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, beautifull.
transit: Free parking, train station.
access: Vélos
interaction: I can show you the real Oporto city, and the great Douro River.

reviews.comments:
Tiago is a very nice person and he was very helpful and attentive for us. Welcomed with some local food and wines, Tiago always checked our stay to verify everything was fine. He suggested also a lot of  visits during the stay and it was very helpfull for us.
The appartment is like in the photos and very well situated. We could see the sea every morning and smell it as well. The coast was amazing with hiking trails all along.
We enjoyed our stay, Thanks Tiago.

Je félicite Tiago, j ai souvent l l'habitude de voyager mais retrouver tout les ingrédients pour avoir des vacances de rêves est souvent difficile.
BRAVO Tiago votre hospitalié

Hemos pasado unos días fantásticos en el apartamento de Tiago, gracias a su atención e información de las actividades que podíamos hacer por la zona. 
El apartamento es aún más bonito de lo que parece en las fotos. Amplio, con vistas al mar y dotado de todo tipo de detalles. Muchas gracias.

Una estancia perfecta. Tiago es un magnifico anfitrion, pendiente de todo, con muchos detalles y recomendandonos todo tipo de cosas. La casa es genial, hemos estado muy a gusto, las camas son comodisimas y el barrio muy tranquilo para descansar, y que decir de las vistas desde la terraza!. La ubicacion perecta, al lado de la playa, con un carril bici muy chulo y muy bien comunicado para conocer Oporto. Cuenta con todo lo necesario y un poco mas para una estancia de 10. Esperamos poder repetir!

Un lugar perfecto para pasar unos días, el apartamento es amplio y luminoso, todo nuevo, y con todo tipo de  comodidades, a un minuto de las playas, perfectas para pasear e ir en bici, nos hizo sol todos los días, y si se quiere ir a oporto, hay una estación de  tren muy cerca, el tren te deja en el centro mismo en 15 min, y si vas en coche, tardas menos tiempo aún, y para mejorarlo todo, Tiago el anfitrión, agradable y siempre atento, te ayuda en todo, dándote sugerencias de que visitar, y actividades que haya esos días, siempre pendiente de que estés bien, la verdad que es un sitio para repetir :-)
El apartamento es perfecto para familias con niños. Muy bien comunicado con la ciudad y en la misma playa. Zona muy tranquila. Tiene todas las comodidades. Muy recomendable.
Todo muy bien  Recomiendo sin duda.

Nuestra estancia en casa se Tiago ha sido estupenda, comenzando por el trato, la amabilidad, la disponibilidad y el alojamiento que ha cumplido nuestras expectativas. 

La veracidad es total.

El entorno es precioso, la pena no haberlo disfrutado más dadas las fechas de nuestra visita a Oporto.

Por cierto, Tiago nos aconsejó muchos sitios tanto de restauración como para visitar. Súper atento!!!

Repetiremos seguro!!!

El apartamento esta genial. Muy comodo ,con instalaciones nuevas, muy limpio, mejor incluso de lo que aparece en las fotos.Muy muy recomendable. 

Pero lo mejor fue Tiago, el anfitrión. Su amabilidad, buen trato, recomendaciones, detalles, hospitalidad , su rapida respuesta y ayudarnos en todo lo posible marcaron nuestra estancia. Un 10 como anfitrión.

 Sin duda inmejorable. Muchas gracias!! Lo recomendaría al 100%
Una estancia, genial!!

O Tiago è uma pessoa muita simpatica. Ele estava presente a nossa chegada, com uma cesta de fruta/queijo/choriça e bolo da sua irma, e quando fomos embora.
O apartamento esta mesmo muito bem situado, ao lado da praia e 10 minutos do supermercado. E esta decorado com muito gosto.
O Tiago è uma pessoa muita atenciosa e que esta presente se precisarmos de qualquer coisa.
O apartamento tinha tudo para podermos passar umas boas ferias (toalhas, tachos, toalhas da praia, guarda sol e paravente, cama e cadeira de bébé).
Agradecemos o Tiago do seu atendimento e das suas atençoes
I highly recommend the accommodation and the host .
Pessoa confiável e sempre disponivel.
Casa confortável e limpa como esperávamos. Correu tudo bem.

name: Luxurious, bright, spacious Plaza Catalunya
summary: Magnificent apartment situated in the heart of Barcelona. Located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña, this apartment is the ideal choice to accomodate up to 6 people. The apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.  Tourist licence HUTB - 003179.
space: This magnificent apartment is situated in the heart of Barcelona, located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña and the famous street of Passeig de Gracia. This fully renovated property offers wide spaces and a sunny living room thank to its bay window. Ideal to accommodate 6 people, the apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms. Luxurious and decorated with exquisite taste, the apartment is an excelent choice for travelers looking for maximum comfort in the best central location in Barcelona.  Its high ceilings, high quality finishings and modern furniture, comfortable beds and the maximum attention to details will make your experience unique. Tourist licence HUTB - 003179.
description: Magnificent apartment situated in the heart of Barcelona. Located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña, this apartment is the ideal choice to accomodate up to 6 people. The apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.  Tourist licence HUTB - 003179. This magnificent apartment is situated in the heart of Barcelona, located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña and the famous street of Passeig de Gracia. This fully renovated property offers wide spaces and a sunny living room thank to its bay window. Ideal to accommodate 6 people, the apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood of Eixample is the best option for travellers interested in architecture, gastronomy and shopping. Nowadays Eixample is famous for being home to the majority of Barcelona's Art Nouveau masterpieces, and a high-class residential and shopping area. Passeig de Gràcia is the heart of Eixample, here you will find most of Barcelona's international designer shops such as Chanel, Louis Vuitton and MaxMara. Also along this road are located La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, two of Antoni Gaudí's characteristically dreamlike buildings. There are many interesting art galleries in the area, such as Fundación Antoni Tapies, which has a permanent collection of this Catalan artist's work. Eixample is a safe and residential part of the city but there is also a vibrant nightlife and a thriving café culture. Eixample is a beautiful “barrio” to wander round, take in the glorious architecture and watch people from one of the many terrace cafes. It is in Eixample that you will find some of the b
notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: The tourist tax is not included in the price of the accommodation and has to be paid upon arrival at the apartment. The cost is 2.52 euros per adult (above 16 years old) per night. It only has to be paid for the first 7 days of the stay. The amount of the stay for monthly rentals does not include expenses for supplies that are usually between 50 and 100 euros per month.
transit: You can easily walk to all tourist attractions in the city center. Subway: the subway station Passeig de Gracia is 50 mts. walk from the apartment (yellow line L4, green line L3, violet line L2). Aerobus: the stop of the Aerobus – Plaza Catalunya is 5 minutes walk from the apartment. The price of the ticket is 5.90€ per person per way and the duration of the trip is 25 minutes. (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Train: The train station of Passeig de Gracias (RENFE Cercanías) is 5 minutes walk away from the apartment and connects with Barcelona Airport- El Prat (Terminal 2) from 6 am to 11.30pm. There is a train every half an hour and the trip lasts approximately 40 minutes. For public transport we suggest buying the T-10 ticket, a ten trip ticket which is multi-personal and valid for all of the public transport, including the train that connects the city with the airport. For unlimited trips for 2 up to 5 days please check the travel cards HOLA BCN! Taxi: The price for a taxi from the airpor
access: Guests have access to all the areas of the apartment.
interaction: We are available 24 hours to assist our guests.

host.host_about:
We are owners of several apartments Tendency Group located in the city center of Barcelona and are proud of offering our guests a personalised service together with high quality apartments. 
We are travelers like you and understand and try to meet and exceed your expectations.

reviews.comments:
Lovely and very central apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It's position made exploring the city very easy either on foot or using public transport. Plenty of shopping areas and restaurants around and a lovely organic and vegetarian shop near by. 

The apartment is quite airy but unfortunately the blinds do not work in the rooms so there is no natural light. Even though the apartment is very central all the windows are on internal patios ( the living room windows are enormous and let lots of light) which makes it very quiet.

We had a lovely time and we certainly will use it again when we return to Barcelona.
Great neighbourhood, and very central.

Apartment clean, wide and cozy. Near to Casa Battlò, Placa de Catalunya and many restaurants, it's a perfect place for families. The host was kind and helpful, we didn't have any problem during our stay.

Bel appartement très bien placé et silencieux. 
Par contre pas de parking comme indiqué et pas de demodulateur pour avoir des chaînes françaises
the apartment has very central  location, near to Placa Catalunia. It is bright, beautiful and comfortable, with all the ecquipment one can need. good for 5-6 people. Thanks to Tendency!
Increíble! Súper buena la ubicación y un departamento de lujo!
Very well located and great looking place.

Very good location and flat. Everything was perfectly clean, bright and as described. We had a very nice stay. 
We use the bagages services company that the host advised us during our check in: for €5 they come to get your luggages and bring them later at the airport (because our check out was at 11am). 
I would just recommend to bring your own hairdryer (if you are coming for special occasion as us - we were in BCN for a wedding). 
I really recommend this flat
A lovely apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay there again.

très bel appartement situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble.
immeuble magnifique avec un gardien.
deux chambres sont plus sombres où il y fait plus chaud.
il manque juste un rideau opaque dans la grande chambre.
je recommande cet appartement spacieux.

The apartment is very close to Plaça de Catalunya giving very good access to all public transport. The neighborhood is very nice with cafés, restaurants and bars close-by. I stayed in the apartment for 5 days with 5 friends of mine and the apartment turned out to be very comfortable for 6 people with its 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms.
Excellent option when staying in Barcelona! I loved how close we were to a grocery store, restaurants, and major attractions. The space was comfortable for our family of 6 adults.

Everything is as described. It's central, a lot of supermarkets really close, one of them is 24/365. It's very confortable, amazing beds, amazing shower and well equiped kitchen. It's perfect for a few days to really see Barcelona.

Peaceful location steps from all the action. 

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona staying in the 3 bedroom flat we used though Tendancy. It had tons of space, good beds and was very clean. Being less than one block from Las Rambles, I was worried about noise, but once you enter the building, all the city noises go away. Check in was easy as a representative from our host met us at the door, let us in and showed us around. The location was awesome. Literally steps away were many restaurants, shops and other places to go. There is even a small food market 3 doors down on the same street. The main square was a 5 minute walk. When in Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Fantastic location, and the apartment had everything we needed.

Great location to access all parts of the city. Just a little north of Plaza Catalunya so a nice departure from the touristy Las Ramblas area. 

Sitting area is nice and spacious. Master bedroom is quite large but very bright from the floor to ceiling windows.  The other two rooms are a bit on the small size but not too cramped to fit 2 twin beds.

Had a really great time in Barcelona! Would stay at this location again!
Great apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything and highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment, brilliant position. Can't fault it.
Very spacious apartment in great location.  At corner is Las Ramblas.  Quiet, safe area. Coffee, bakery, market nearby. Modern, well equipped kitchen. Great for families and business travelers.
This apartment was gorgeous and in a perfect location. We had a very delightful stay and enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shopping areas. We highly recommend this listing!
Great apartment and location with easy access to local transport and walking distance to all landmarks
Prima appartement. Top locatie. 3e slaapkamer iets te krap.
Perfect location. Spacious and clean. Great prompt hosts! 5 star!
A beautiful apartment in a fantastic location. We booked this for a family wedding in Barcelona, and could walk everywhere we needed to go. Will definitely book again!

Location was perfect. Easy access and quick and clear communication. The apt was beautiful, neat and clean. Very bright living /dining room and master bedroom. The smaller two bedrooms did not have outside facing windows so they had very minimal natural light. Overall I enjoyed my stay, would definitely stay again and would recommend.
Apartment was great
This apartment is as excellent as it looks on the pictures, and the location is super central and perfect for a stay in Barcelona.
This apartment is very well located.  So many things to do within a 5 minute walk.  It is a lovely apartment with plenty of living space.  I highly recommend!!!
The apartment was lovely, perfect size space and amazing location! would definitely recommend!

Excellent location and amazing apartment. Walking distance to fantastic restaurants, shopping, museums etc.. The apartment itself was very spacious, especially for Europe. The building and the apartment had a lot of character as well. Fully stocked kitchen and comes with laundry machine/dryer if necessary. Overall was extremely pleased, and would stay again. Highly recommend!
Nice house, good locatie,
Beautiful and stylish apartment within short walking distance of the centre.  I would definitely go back
As the other visitors: near everything, clean, beutiful & modern, just perfect for a few days stay.

The apt is close to all major attractions and locations.  We walked everywhere everyday.  We felt the location was exceptional since we had no idea before we booked how close we would be to the attractions, restaurants, etc.  It is a short cab ride to the beaches and soccer stadium. 

The apt offered every amenity we needed for family of 5 adults. 

Tendency could not have been more accommodating and responsive.  They really take pride in making sure our experience was the best possible. 

Apt was clean, neat, and airy. 
Would highly recommend.

Amazing location, great communication, just a few niggles that could have made our stay better. Broken kettle, limited glasses, unable to use oven or TV, poor WiFi. But lovely and clean and would stay again.

We stayed in 2 different apartments during our stay in Barcelona. This was by far the better one. It is spacious, beautifully decorated and in a great location. We would strongly recommend it to other guests.

This apartment is a great location. Only a 10 minute location to Gothic quarter.  Beautiful apartment with great dining space.  Really close to restaurants, bars & cafes.  It will s a beautiful space with very comfortable beds

We stayed at the apartment for 4 nights and 4 days. We are family of 4 adults
(Parents and 2 daughters)
We were welcomed very nicely, on time, by very nice hostess and got
All the relevant information we asked.
The apartment is located on a great location, very close to  plaza de Catalonia . Exactly as mentioned on air b&b.
The apartment is as beautiful as seen in the pictures: one double room, and 2 more rooms with 2 beds each.
It is well equipped for everything we needed including the kitchen.
Although the apartment is in the center, it is completely silent , no sound from the outside, which was great.
We enjoyed it very much and highly recommend it.
Thank you for making our stay in Barcelona even better.
We will surly come back to this apartment again!

This apartment exceeded our expectations! Such a beautiful space inside an elegant building. Plus it is right in the middle of everything. Easy to walk to lots of restaurants and shops or grab a cab if you need to. 
The day of check-in, we were greeted by a representative who walked us through the apartment and answered all of our questions. 
We spent a lot of mornings and evenings sitting around the living room chatting and laughing. So many great memories made in that room. Cannot recommend this apartment enough.

This apartment is beautiful and in an excellent central location.  The apartment is on the opposite side of the bustling street below and it is in a lovely residential building so it was very quiet, which we loved.  The beds are extremely comfortable and the master bedroom shower is amazing.  It was fantastic to have a clothes washer and dryer.  We made this reservation at the last minute while we were in Barcelona and the quick and excellent customer service we received from this establishment was fantastic.  I highly recommend this accommodation!
Muy buen departamento, amplio, prolijo y muy buen ubicado. Lo recomiendo sin dudas
Very nice Appartment in a very good part of the City  - very quite and cosy.  Perfect communication with Mariela

This is my favorite Airbnb.  It was such a nice space.   My family of 5 had lots of room, it was stylish and clean and the master rain-shower was wonderful.  The location is fantastic, about 3 blocks off of Placa Catalunya, surrounded by restaurants and stores.  The kitchen was really well stocked.  It was also very quiet.
Beautiful clean large space very centrally located.  Taxi across the way for easy transport anywhere in Barçelona. Excellent communication with host.
Excellent apartment in a very central location, very clean, modern, comfortable beds and spacious. Hosts are very accommodating and quick in responding to requests. Would absolutely stay here again

The location of this apartment was incredible. Walking distance to shops and restaurants, close to public transport. We got around the city very easily. Tendency was very easy to work with, they responded to our questions quickly and allowed us an early check in. The apartment was stunning, clean and perfect size for my family of four.

Had a great time staying at this place. The location is simply the best, right next to the main streets. Less than a kilometer from La Rambla. The apartment is very nice, with great living spaces and bedrooms. Third bedroom is very small but we didn't need to use it so did not matter for us.
Ideal for group of 6+ people. Close to some yummy restaurants and shopping centers
Great space in a very good location. Very quiet.
Beautiful appartement in very nice location. Very clean.
The place was great. Just like the pictures. Nice area. Everything went smoothly. Would stay here again.

The location is amazing but there was only one towel to use the entire week per person. The washing machine did not work and no hot water. The worst part was trying to open the main door. Every time it was stuck and even locals that tried to help us could not get in. I had to call for help every night and on the last night it broke off. Very disappointing. But honestly the location can’t be beat and the building is beautiful.

An excellent location. Very clean apartment. We arrived early and were allowed to leave our bags at the apartment until check in time. Communication by the host was also excellent. We were in the middle of 3 weeks of travel so having a washing machine and dryer in the apartment was a treat. The apartment was spacious enough for a family of five. It only has one wall of windows that look out to the back of other apartments but they are not close. Two bedrooms only get natural light from windows opening into a light well. The bed linen and towels are a bit threadbare but that won’t concern everyone. Overall good value.
Great location but on the high end for the value.

Cannot ask for a better location.  So convenient to everywhere.  The hosts were very responsive and helpful.  comfortable beds and nice blankets/pillows.  We thoroughly enjoyed the stay.  The only thing to note was the stove was a bit hard to manage but we did at the end after the host sent us video instructions.  Highly recommend!
Really comfortable apartment and a wonderful location! Highly recommended!
Great location. Clean accommodation. Would stay again.

Super Lage und dennoch ruhig, sauber.
Dass zwei Schlafzimmer nur dunkle Innenhoffenster hatten, war nicht so schön, weil das Zimmer somit sehr dunkel und (ohne eingeschaltete Klimaanlage) sehr warm war.
This apartment was as stated and we found it great for 6 people.  It was very clean and the location is great, very handy to everything.  Communication was also very good.
Amazing location. Right in heart of city. Great communication & check in process. Very fair price for the quality of the apartment. Would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic location, clean and spacious apartment, secure building, and great communication from Mariela.

Place is just plain awesome!   Well appointed and has everything you need for a stay in the city.  Great location close to everything in Barcelona.  Highly recommend to all visitors.   Check-in was super easy.

Great stay. Nice interior. Very spacious. Clean apartment. Awesome location. Most important, very convenient to take our heavy luggage right to the unit without having to climb any stairs. Definitely recommended to anyone. Do not hesitate to book! You'll love it.
Great apartment in a great central location - just perfect
Great place
Apartamento hermoso con excelente localización, seguro, limpio, espacioso, con buenos enseres y decorado con gran estilo. 100% recomendado.

Excelente opção de hospedagem! Localização perfeita e profissionais muito atenciosos tanto no check in quanto nas eventuais necessidades de manutenção. O apartamento acomoda com conforto uma família de até 6 pessoas.
Muy buena ubicación y lugar muy lindo y cómodo!
Absolute great location and extremely quiet for being so centrally located to the city center. Very spacious apartment! Comfy bed. Beautiful dramatic windows!
This is a great apartment, in a very central location. It is easy to access all the main attractions, and the apartment was clean and well maintained. We would highly recommend staying here.
Apartamento muito bonito.  Ótima localização.
Incredible  location,  stylish and spacious  apartment, suitable for large groups  (we were 6 plus two babies and had plenty of comfort and room). Recommended 110%

name: Avarandado Souza Lima
summary: O apartamento é entre Ipanema e Copacabana, próximo ao metrô Gal. Osório. Você vai amar o espaço por ser avarandado e aconchegante. Possui Wi-Fi e TV com Sky. Porteiro 24 h em rua tranquila. Situado no Posto 6, a 2 quadras da praia de Copacabana e a 4 quadras da praia de Ipanema. Próximo a mercados, cinemas, restaurantes e bares. Rua arborizada, silenciosa.
space: O apartamento é arejado, confortável e moderno. Possui ar condicionado nos dois quartos e ventiladores na sala. Garagem a combinar.

Copacabana Posto 6 é o local ideal para diversão, praia e compras. Localiza-se próximo ao metrô Gal. Osório e a ruas com transportes públicos. O apartamento possui vaga de garagem, que poderá ser alugada diretamente com a proprietária.

host.host_about: Tenho 54 anos, moro em Muriaé-MG. Morei no Rio durante 25 anos, onde estudei Arquitetura, Marketing e Mestrado em Antropologia. Lecionei em diversas Universidades e hoje tenho Loja Multimarcas e trabalho com Cinema. Adoro viajar. Sou tranquila e tenho uma linda família, com marido, filha, mãe, irmãos e sobrinhos.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Espaço bom, com o essencial para estadia. Por ser em uma cidade muito quente, sentimos falta do ar condicionado na sala. Os quartos tem ar condicionado que funcionam muito bem. Tivemos um pequeno problema com a geladeira, mas que foi resolvido em seguida. No fim, a estadia foi satisfatória.
Lugar show!!! Experiência fantástica nesse lugar e o apê da Fernanda é incrível! Recomendarei a todos amigos aqui de Recife!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The beauty of New York start here.
summary: My place is close the subway, market, movie theatre, central park, Apollo theater, to Harlem Shake, Jazz clubs, cafes, restaurant. Will give you a new discovery about Harlem and easy access to manhattan.  You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the high ceilings, the views, the location, the large space, the exotic look, the neighborhood, the easy access to  Restaurants, caffes,  and transportation.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: I am on a trip, you will be in my room second floor. You will have access to kitchen, laundromat, and outside balcony.  The room got keys and its own bathroom you won’t need to come upstairs.  The Owner of  house will be there you will enjoy being around him  if you want to socialize or visit places in Harlem night if he’s free he will help you. Great host. Very kind, generous and very helpful. Mimie knows the area well and will give you advice of what to see and what to do. The room is huge and very comfortable. There is a small terrace in the back of the apartment which is lovely for having breakfast and relaxing. Harlem is a exciting area with lots of good restaurants and Jazz clubs and coffee places.

name: Yoga Apartment next to La Guardia and Manhattan
summary: Yoga Apartment is in a family friendly home. The room is perfect to students, tourists or couples. Come to our cozy room where after a long day in the city you can use WI-FI, do yoga exercises or just relax. We are close to the 7 train and the other lines. Manhattan (Grand Central, Roosevelt Island) is away  25 minutes from our apartment, makes convenient. The apartment is one block away from Northern Blvd. and two blocks from Roosevelt Avenue where you can find shops, restaurants.
space: Room Amenities 1 private bedroom  - has a queen bed - two window with at street level view, nice views - First floor and fast to enter to exit.  - 2 dressers - a closet with hangers  - stand mirror - hair dryer - fresh towels, skin cream. - High speed wiffi - Flexible luggage early /late check in/ check out - NY Subway - Kitchen: Fresh fruit , coffee machine and some items to prepare your breakfast, filter water in the pitcher - Dining Table: Extensive glass table with four chairs - Hallway: There are umbrellas in case of raining.
