neighborhood_overview: - The apartment is one block away away from Northern Blvd. where you can find many restaurants, supermarkets, and pharmacies.   - If you like to walk, you can walk in 34 ave and go the Traverns Park is on 34 ave and 79 st. - Meet the diverse culture of Latin American as Colombian / Peruvian food. - Go to Citifield where the Meets play. - Go to Flushing Park.
notes: If you need help to pick up from the airport, we can arrange it. Please let us know in advance. La Guardia: $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kennedy:     $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Also, you have questions what areas visit in New York, please send us a text or email.
transit: - The apartment is close to the 7 train or you can take the Q49 bus at the corner of the apartment to bring you to 74 Roosevelt Ave. Station, once there you can take many trains to Manhattan.   - We are located 10 minutes away from La Guardia Airport and 30 minutes from JFK Airport.
access: - kitchen : There is a breakfast station you find a coffee machine to prepare coffee or tea, ready your breakfast where you can find fresh fruits, bread and milk there is a space in the refrigerator to keep your food. - Dining table: You can sit down and eat your breakfast, lunch or dinner. - Bathroom:  fresh towels, use shampoo and toothpaste are in there.
interaction: If you need help to organize your trip, I will help you and also we keep New York Tourist book in the entrance of the apartment.
house_rules: READ THE ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE BOOKING MY PLACE. I expect my guests to respect my place. No parties or bringing extra guests not in the reservation and no young kids whom I haven't been informed before the booking. No cooking after 10pm and no frying or cooking with strong odors at all. Please clean up after yourself in the common areas by washing your dishes . Smoking is not allowed in the apartment. Bedroom: Not bring food or dishes

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I live in Jackson Heights, New York. I am entrepreneur and manage my own business. I am business administrator.
I started to travel since I was sixteen.  I like to meet people from all the world.
I like to cook peruvian and mexican food.
If you enjoy my home in New York, I will see you.
If you enjoy my place in Los Olivos, Lima Peru. My Mom Maria or my brother Manuel will welcome to you and facilitate everything to your accommodation.

reviews.comments: Ursula was a really nice, responsive, and responsible host. The room had everything I needed to be comfortable and was as described. The neighborhood is residential but not far from a lot of great food options, and it's a reasonable trip into Manhattan.
Ursula made me feel very welcomed when I arrived and provided me with all my needs. Room was nice and cozy, I had no complaints. Would probably stay there again.
Ursula is a fantastic host. She made everything easy and enjoyable. And this is the cleanest airbnb I've ever stayed in! Close to the subway—interesting, exciting neighborhood. Highly recommended.

La anfitriona siempre estuvo pendiente de nosotros, dándonos recomendaciones e indicaciones de como llegar a los sitios turísticos; un sitio muy cómodo para dormir; a un promedio de una hora en metro hasta Manhatan y con la opción de hacer desayuno para bajar costos; buen comercio supermarkets y restaurantes a sus alrededores.
Ursula, se mostró en todo momento atenta y amable con nosotros, el departamento es como se describe, muy confortable y la localidad  fue perfecta, mi mejor decisión sin duda

The place was very well connected with the transportation. The host's made me feel very comfortable and was given full privacy just like your own home. Very friendly people. 
Would really prefer to stay on my next visit.
Great room, easy commute from La Guardia and to midtown Manhattan. Very, very clean! Would recommend.

Très bon accueil de la part d'Ursula et de son conjoint dans leur appartement situé à 10mn à pied du metro. Ils ont été très arrangeants pour notre arrivée et notre départ. La chambre et la salle de bain sont très propres. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Ursula was a great host. She is very nice and accommodating, she provided everything I needed, the room and apartment were clean, and the listing was accurate. I would definitely recommend staying here! The only downside is that the room gets very warm during the winter, but you can open a window to let some cold air in.

Ursula fue una gran anfitriona, estuvo pendiente de nuestras solicitudes desde antes de que llegáramos y durante todo el tiempo de nuestra estadía. El cuarto es exactamente como estaba descrito.  El apartamento esta ubicado muy cerca de la estación del tren y del autobús, es una zona comercial pero muy tranquila y segura.  Con seguridad regresaríamos en una próxima oportunidad.Gracias Ursula!!!
Great host
Ursula was the best host.  Communication was impeccable and her genuine concern for me and asking what my needs were was very thoughtful and considerate.

Estar en casa de Ursula es exactamente como sentirse en casa...o mejor. Ella siempre esta dispuesta a ayudar y colaborar con uno. La habitacion es amplia la cama super comoda e inmaculadamente limpia. Gracias Ursula por tan finas atenciones. Volvere, por seguro
She was a kind and caring host and she  was also very accommodating. The room was tidy and she made sure that we had everything that we needed.

Ursula and her aunt are very kind for a guest.The room is clean.
The accessibility to Manhattan is good,spending time is about 20~30 minutes by Metro.
The room is very clean and tidy at the first floor. Ursula is pretty nice and good.
The host was very nice & always asked if we neede anything. Very comfortable stay.
This room is basic but comfortable and very clean.  Ursula was very respectful of the shared spaces and we were very happy staying here.

The stay was great. Ursula  was very kind and warm-hearted. The room was very very clean,and it is not far to subway, with this great value I'd like to recommend all the tourist to stay here for their NYC trips!

Staying at Ursula's home was one of the best AirBnB experiences. The home's location was only a few walking minutes from the train and shopping areas/restaurants. The entire home was very clean, the bedroom was large, had a comfortable bed, and a view of the neighborhood, and the shower had amazing water pressure. Not only was the home great, but the hostess was very personable and a pleasure to meet. We also got to meet her aunt, who is just as nice. Our flight landed before the check-in time and Ursula allowed us to drop our bags off so we didnt have to carry them around the city and even helped us search for a place to stay when our flight was cancelled (as she already had the room reserved for the next guests). Communicating with Ursula was easy, as she was quick to respond. If ever in NYC, would definitely stay here again.

Ursula was great! It was my first time in a private room AirBnB, as I usually have entire places, but this place was great value. She was very accommodating, and gave us a couple of ideas on how to spend a few hours in the area. I recommend Mama's Empanadas on Northern blvd. The room is bigger than I expected and very clean. Urusula is very respectful and quiet. Although we did get a chance to enjoy her aunt's singing the morning of checkout. It's a 10 minute walk to the subway, and lots of South American places to check out in the area, also just a couple train stops away from Roosevelt Ave Jackson heights station for connecting to other transit lines or trying out some south Asian cuisine! Only a 20 minute ride to the upper east side from there, 30 minutes to midtown.

We stayed at Ursula's for a week and were happy with our choice. The room is bigger than it looks in the photos, with a comfy bed, dressers, a desk, and a funky lamp. Ursula and her aunt Luz slept next-doors, they were there if you wanted to chat but also granted you privacy. Ursula was always keen to make our stay as comfortable as possible - thank you so much again for the Peruvian tamales breakfast, mmmh! Special thanks to Luz, who brightened our day with music, dance sessions and laughs.
The apartment is located near the subway line 7 (90/Elmhurst). Manhattan and Brooklyn can be reached within 40 minutes. The area is generally calm, perfect for when you come home from a fantastic yet exhausting day exploring New York.

Wer nach New York reist und auf der Suche nach einer Unterkunft ist, sollte unbedingt zu Ursula. Sehr fürsorglich und bemüht, es einem angenehm zu machen. Vorab fragte sie, ob sie einen irgendwo abholen soll und sie ist sehr, sehr nett. Das Zimmer prima und sauber, Wohnatmosphäre familiär. Kann ich nur weiter empfehlen. Die Lage ist ebenfalls top, sehr lateinamerikanisch geprägt dort, viele Möglichkeiten, irgendwo einen Kaffee zu trinken und viele Läden in der Nähe.

A small apartment but a good location near restaurants a block away. Bike lanes, on street parking, and a bus stop can all be found on this beautiful tree lined street. I was lucky enough to find on street parking right outside the building when I arrived midday during the week and left my car there for the night and took the 7 line to get around which was only 3 blocks south. The bed and room were comfortable and Ursula covered all the basic necessities. Check in and check out went smoothly. I would certainly recommend her place for anyone who needs a place to stay for a day or two in Queens.

Ursula is an amazing host, very graceful, helpful, and always kept in touch with me. It's been a pleasure staying at her place. The room is big, clean, nice comfy bed, and good wifi. The bathroom is nice and clean as well. The location is close to subway stops that takes you directly to Manhattan, accessible by bus, several ethnic restaurants, street vendors, shops and grocery stores. Overall great vibe around that area. I would highly recommend to stay at her place if you're looking for a place to stay near Queens and Manhattan. I would definitely book at her place again when I visit New York again.

Ursula is a charming and helpful host. Flat is basic with comfortable bed, computer, and access to the kitchen. Situated in Jackson Heights the garden city, it is much quieter than Manhattan which is 30 minutes away by  subway.
Great host.
Ursula is a great host!!! We were taken cared of as if we were family.

Der Aufenthalt bei Ursula in New York war herrlich. Alles war unproblematisch. Wir haben uns gut verstanden. Wir hatten schöne Gespräche und haben manchmal zusammen gegessen. Alles in allem war es sehr schön
Urusula is a great host- the place was tidy and quiet for a good nights sleep. I would be happy to stay there again.
Úrsula was a great host! She truly took care of me like I was family. The place is quite comfortable, clean and very conveniently located, just 3 blocks away from the Subway station.

Ursula was an amazing host! I really felt like at home during my stay in NYC. The place is really close to LaGuardia airport, and it was really convenient for me as I arrived at night. The room was rather simple but had everything I needed. It's definitely a place to stay!

Hassle-free accommodations.  Ursula is very hospitable and is dedicated to ensuring you are as comfortable as can be.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Would recommend to anyone needing a place to crash.

Ursula was an amazing host! Her home is very close to the subway stop, resturants, bars, and gorcery stores. She is a very kind and hospitable host and I would definitely recommend her home to anyone looking to stay in Jackson Heights. Thank you so much again for hosting us!

I would recommend that any person who is considering a stay at Ursala's should absolutely do it.  The room is comfortable, the neighborhood has good restaurants, and Ursala's place is close to LaGuardia and a few blocks to the subway.

As so many other guests have also mentioned, Ursala and Luz are both so nice, and they checked in on me and my girlfriend to make sure that we were having a nice trip since they knew it was our first time in the city.  

There is a reason Ursula is listed as a super host; she is truly amazing.

I stayed at Ursulas for just one night and it was a great choice! She made check in easy and the room was spacious and very clean, in a safe neighborhood only 3 blocks from the 7 train. Plus, the price was extremely good value, and would be plenty of space for a couple.  She is very pleasant and warm and even made coffee in the morning. I met her Aunt Luz too. If you are looking for a place in Queens, this is a great economical option.
Ursula was a great host.  She ran the key to us when we had a random time for check in.  They offered us food and a clean place to sleep.  It felt very safe and I would recommend her place to anyone.
I enjoyed my time at Ursula's place!

My stay at Ursula's place was really nice. Ursula and her aunt made me feel at home, and went out of their way to help me navigate NYC. Ursula was super sweet and helpful throughout my stay. She was quite interactive and we had some really great conversations. 

Her place is couple minutes away from the subway station and its very easy to get into the city. Grocery stories, restaurants, cafes etc. are all within walking distance. The area is quite nice and safe, and fun to explore. 

Although there are a lot of positives to the place, Ursula definitely gets the prize for making my stay comfortable and enjoyable. I would highly recommend staying at her place!
She is very helpful, the place was great! Enjoyed my stay
Ursula truly made my ny trip a breeze and she is so sweet and welcoming. Very easy commute in and out of Manhattan via the 7. Thank you for everything!

Ursula is a lovely and kind host!  Her  airbnb space is in the Jackson Heights neighborhood of Queens-very multi-cultural,  lots of shops, restaurants..very safe  and near the subway (approx 4 blocks).  She was so helpful when we initially had difficulties finding her apartment-she called back immediately and assisted us!  The bedroom space is very large and a bright, with adequate dressers and closet space for clothes.  It was very easy to share "her space" with her, and we never felt as though we were intruding!
It is a good place close to restaurants and Ursula  is a nice person

Ursula has done a great job of creating a comfortable place for lodgers to relax. The room was extremely comfy, and the bed was really nice. Any questions that I had she was able to answer pretty easily and the location is near loads of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, and the 7 train.

Ein toller Aufenthalt bei Ursula und Eduardo! 
Sehr hilfsbereit und immer für einen kleinen netten Smalltalk zu haben. Sehr nett war es, den peruanischen Cocktail "Pisco Sour" probieren zu dürfen. Sehr nette Atmosphäre an dem Abend, welcher auch spät geworden ist:) 

zur Lage: etwas Fußweg zur Metro und man ist in einer guten Stunde in Manhatten. 
Abends kann man auch ohne Probleme auf die Straße gehen, es macht zumindest einen sicheren Eindruck. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem ruhigen Viertel. 

Kleines Manko war, dass (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps uns nicht genau bis vor die Haustür bringen könnte.Allerdings war Ursula telefonisch erreichbar und hat uns von ihrer Ca 150m entfernt liegenden Wohnung abgeholt.
Uns hat es auf jedenfall gut gefallen, sodass wir Ursula und Eduardo gerne weiter empfehlen!
Ursula and Eduardo are really nice and attentive hosts, the place is near to the subway so it is convenient.

Ursula's place was easy and convenient to LaGuardia airport and the tennnis center for the US Open or Mets games. The 7 train to Manhattan or Flushing meadows is 3 blocks south on 90th St. Her place was clean and easy.

Ursula and her husband are wonderful hosts, who gave us space and welcomed us warmly. They were accommodating when we needed to drop off our bags early and offered to help us with anything we needed during our stay. They were very quiet in their room of the apartment with us. The bed was comfortable, and the room offered plenty of space for 2, with locks on the doors for going out. I felt very safe.
Clean & Quite. Perfect spot for a good night sleep. Thanks

We had a great time in Ursula's place. The apartment is fairly close to metro 7 which takes you to Manhattan. The neighborhood is full of life and we found some really nice food spots with cuisines from all over the world. Ursula mentions flexible check in and out and she really means it, both times they have done the extra mile of excellent hospitality. Overall we loved our stay there and will highly recommend it to anyone who wants to feel the vibe of the city.

The host is kind and will help you if you have any problem.
The house is clean and the space of the room is huge.
It take around 10 mins walking to the metro station.

I had a great stay with Ursula for 10 days. She's kind, thoughtful, and easy to communicate with. The room was big, clean and had special little thoughtful touches. She even shared a few meals with me! The bed was very comfortable as well. Close to the 7 train that takes you to the city quickly. It's also in walking distance to good food, especially South American fare. I felt super comfortable there and was sad to leave. Would stay there again in a heartbeat!
Ursula is very hospitable & approachable. Thank you for a great stay. Close to subway access, clean, and safe. I recommend this accommodation & would visit again myself.
I️ had a great time. Everything was perfect.

She was super sweet and tended to any needs I had. She even made me something to eat! :) The place was clean and comfortable. The people in the apartment above were pretty loud at night but other than that my stay was great.
Very good place for the price, near the metro and easy to get to touristic places. Ursula is very kind and caring for your well being before, during and after your stay
Had a great time there ! ,,
Excellent host!
A great place with a friendly host that will make you love New York even more!
Excellent
It was much better then i expected.
Muy amable, todo muy limpio
It is a very clean and comfortable place.
It was really nice to stay at Ursula’s place! The room was very clean, I had a good wifi connection to work with and slept very well. Its easy to come there by subway or bus. Gracias!!

A most excellent stay and a most excellent host.  Loved the room, super comfy, spacious to do my work and chill.  Also loved the touch with the yoga mats.  Helped with my daily stretching routine.  Ursula is a wonderful, warm and helpful host. Very relaxed about guests using the space.  She really helped me with check in and check out.  Oh and it’s a great location in a vibrant neighborhood near all the cool spots!

awesome experience !!!!!!!
for sure a place to recommand

La habitación es muy bonita, todo limpio y cómodo. El baño no es realmente privado. Lo compartes con el anfitrión. Todo bien en el departamento sin embargo el ingreso al edificio es feo y huele mal. Es incomodo llegar y salir a diario.

Úrsula is an amazing host. The room is really nice and clean. The apartment is at queen like 40 minutes from manhattan on metro, but the station is 7 minutes walking distance. She provide us all the necessary information and even help us with the metro card and the facilities around. Really good place, thank you Úrsula for everything
Lovely host. Ursula was very kind and thoughtful. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The place was clean with good amenities. Would highly recommended to anyone.

We enjoyed our stay at Ursula's apartment. Ursula is a very nice and friendly host, who helped us with a lot of tips and recommendations. Good location, close proximity to the train no. 7 which leaves you in Times Square.
Older NY apartment in Queens

A nice place to stay in a good residential neighborhood. 
And a good value for money. 

The nearest bus stop is less than 100 feet away. 
Takes around 15 mins to get to Jackson Heights/Roosevelt Avenue subway station by bus. And takes around 35-40 to get to Midtown Manhattan by public transit.

A very friendly host. I enjoyed my stay over here and would highly recommend this place.
Es alguien muy amable, lugar muy lindo y cerca a todo

Comfy spacious bed and  lovely quiet room.  Host is very accommodating.  Will hope to stay again next trip.  
Bath is old NY style but very clean and right off the bedroom.
Good value for money.

We had a great time staying with Ursula. The place was very clean and she offered lots of advice on where we should go, both nearby and in Manhattan. There are lots of services nearby (cvs, laundromat, subway, etc..) . The subway is about a 10 minute walk and leads directly to the heart of Manhattan. There are lots of restaurants nearby, we highly recommend Uncle Peter’s! The only issue we had was that the shower drain seemed to be a bit clogged.

name: SM71 - 1 minute from beach - 2-bedroom - balcony

Due to local legal requirements in Barcelona and Catalonia, we are obliged to sign a rental contract with attached inventory for your stay of more then 32 days.

name: MODERN PENTHOUSE ROOM/BALCONY AMAZING LOCATION :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am in the hospitality industry here in New York City and would be happy to customize your experience; whether you’re looking for the “it” places to dance the night away to cool jazz; I know the best inexpensive fine dining the city has to offer or can arrange for a private gourmet dining experience in front of the fireplace or al fresco, by one of New York’s finest chefs.

reviews.comments: Bella was awesome!!! loved her place too ! thank you Bella!!
It was great. Fantastic Appartement!

This host has a beautiful apartment, the most spacious of my eight experiences using Airbnb in Brooklyn, and it is in a great location.  But the host is not on the premises and is not particularly interested in you once she has your booking. There is nothing in writing in the apartment to tell you anything about the amenities, their use, their location, etc.  The host is at best lackadaisical about everything except the rent.
Great experience, very professional and private. Would do it again..
Great location and very cool space!

Mark and I really enjoyed staying    at The Pent House hosted by Bella and Meredith in Brooklyn. They were in touch with us the minute our plane landed and even accommodated our need to arrive a few hours early.  We received a very warm welcome which continued throughout our visit. They have a beautiful penthouse apartment with a lovely view. The easy access to coffee shops, restaurants and subway was perfect. Oh, did I mention the cleanliness and comfy bed??   Yep, all these things at a great price-we will definitely try to stay here again in our next visit to the Big Apple and recommend this place to other visitors!

Bella is a super relaxed and super flexible host. Everything was clean and as the profile looks. The host is quick to answer text, but not always home. This is great if you want freedom to do your own thing or a hands off environment.

Nice clean modern place
Great neighborhood and very close to subway station
Great place. Bella is a terrific and honorable host.
Great location in Williamsburg with easy connection to Manhattan and other locations. Comfortable,clean, neat and modern. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay

I felt welcome at this lovely apartment.  The neighborhood is charming and there is an awesome view to NYC.  I parked my car on the street right outside the front door of the building.  Once I gained access to the apartment and was welcomed by the host, I was pretty much on my own, which was fine by me.  I'd be happy to stay here on another visit to see family in Brooklyn.

Bella's place could not be in a better location - on a quiet street just a block from the subway. All the best Williamsburg restaurants, shopping & nightlife are in easy walking distance. The apartment is modern & well-equipped with a super comfy bed. Although I didn't get to interact with Bella much in person, she was easy to communicate with & made sure everything went smoothly.

I had a wonderful stay in this BEAUTIFUL modern apartment. My room was spacious and super comfortable....loved that bed. I was welcomed by Meridith during my stay. She made sure that I had everything that I needed and offered great insight about the area, and she also was very flexible with the check-in time, as I came a bit earlier than expected. I would definitely stay here again!

Perfect location - it's at the center Williamsburg, super close to where all the good food, cafes, and bars are, it's also only one block away from L & G train. The check-in was smooth, and the room was big, clean, and with a nice view of a penthouse. I definitely recommend staying at Bella's penthouse room.
great location and great home! definitely would stay at bella's again

The apartment was beautiful and the room was very airy and lovely. The neighborhood was very hip and I would definitely stay again. Bella was very courteous and accommodating (our check in had to be pushed back a bit due to commuting issues). Thanks for everything!

The apartment is ok, very well located, well furnished. The bed is very comfortable.
The only thing we didn't like is that there are many people living in the apartmente and you never meet the host as she doesn't live there. 
It's a good choice if you don't have issues with sharing the bathroom or you don't care if you don't feel very welcomed.
This is my second stay at Bella's place and I will stay here again. The location is awesome the space is great and Bella is so accommodating. Thanks Bella!!!
I had an excellent stay at Bella's place. The location was great and the room was clean and quiet.
Very user friendly and great location

Bella has a great apartment in a great location, but I don't think I'll stay again. Towels weren't provided until half way through my stay, and the host wasn't present at all throughout the trip, which was really only an issue when trying to find the apartment at the beginning. Overall, it was comfortable, the view is very impressive, and the dog is great company!

The apartment is in a new condo building, top floor, getting very good daylight, and super centrally located, literally 2 stops to Manhattan on L train. And on tired days, you can enjoy rich Williamsburg scene too, from restaurants to clubs, anything you can ask for, and more.. 

Apartment was clean, hosts were away most of the time, so it was like a full apartment rent than a private room. Internet was fast, hot water all the time, and access to washer/dryer helped a lot too.

Thanks Bella!

One of the most comfortable beds we've ever slept on in an airbnb.  And we were there for less than 12 hours, just to sleep.  So Bella's place was perfect for us.  I'd love to know where she got the bed linens - luxurious!  The small balcony right off our bedroom was fun to see the top of One World Trade in the distance.  The weather was delightful so we left the window open and it was noisy, but that was in the listing, and I didn't hear anything once I had my ear plugs in.  We were only there to get a good night's sleep, and we did, so Bella's place was perfect for us.
Overall had the most amazing stay at Bella’s. I felt welcomed, looked after and the apartment was amazing. Highly recommend.
This was the perfect situation for me.  Very clean and very quiet.  Thank you for letting me stay there!
Bella’s apartment was great! Fantastic location and the bed was extremely comfortable. Highly recommend!
Clean and spacious room in a great area of Brooklyn. Secure building with many amenities and close to a lot of night life.
Good stay, easy communication. Very friendly people.

reviews.comments:
We stayed in this location for 4 days. It was a very comfortable location. We were 4 adults and one toddler. 
 Place provided all the beach gear and toys which was a  life saver with the little one. Great location next to lots of shops and restaurants. There is a nightly Luau show next door at the Hilton which we would sit in the Balcony and watch. The Hilton has a small alley with lots of shops and restaurants. Downtown Waikiki is about a 15 minutes walk (little less than a while). Lots to see on the walk over.  It was a nice added touch. There are fireworks on Friday nights which was also pretty cool. Our toddler was in heaven.  

The home does not come with any condiments or cooking oils/butters but there is a small convenience store in the location and across the street. 

We did not use the pool since the beach is essentially in the backyard of this location.  Great place. Would stay again in the future.

Great experience for our family of 4. Super clean! This is important to me and difficult to get in so many places. Also, we really appreciated the fact that the place was so extremely equipped (from kitchen to beach chairs, boggie boards and a paddle board to beach bags!). Amazing.
Great location, close to Ala Moana Beach Park (15 minutes walk), close to restaurants and general stores. Twenty-minute walk to Waikiki beach! 
Thanks a lot,
Soledad
what a wonderful place to stay. wish i could stay longer and will def come back
Amazing condo and amazing location.
位置绝佳､风景超赞,host还配了块冲浪板和划桨,开始以为是SUP板,搞了半天始终站不起来,建议房东不要这样搞笑的混搭,要么配块桨板､要么把划桨扔了｡总体还是比较舒服的｡

name: Boqueria - Cosy studio in Born
summary: In the heart of Barcelona, just in front of Port Vell and the historic Post Office building of Via Laietana you will find a majestic building built in XIX century where our 1840 Serviced Apartments agency holds 25 apartments with a spectacular views of the city and the port. The combination of XIX majestic decorations of high ceilings and modernity gives a touch of elegance to each floor.
space: This apartment Boqueria is situated on the mezzanine floor of the building in Passeig Isabel II. The combination of antique and modern details as well as furnitures, creates a charming and unique atmosphere in the apartment. It has 1 spacious bedrooms (2 individual beds), 1 bathroom with a capacity of 2 people perfectly suitable for couples.
description: In the heart of Barcelona, just in front of Port Vell and the historic Post Office building of Via Laietana you will find a majestic building built in XIX century where our 1840 Serviced Apartments agency holds 25 apartments with a spectacular views of the city and the port. The combination of XIX majestic decorations of high ceilings and modernity gives a touch of elegance to each floor. This apartment Boqueria is situated on the mezzanine floor of the building in Passeig Isabel II. The combination of antique and modern details as well as furnitures, creates a charming and unique atmosphere in the apartment. It has 1 spacious bedrooms (2 individual beds), 1 bathroom with a capacity of 2 people perfectly suitable for couples. The client has access to all the apartment. Our office, which is open Monday to Friday from 10am to 7pm is located in the same building as our apartments, this way we ensure an immediate response and personalised attention to all our clients. Feel free to contact
neighborhood_overview: Without any doubt, one of the main advantages of 1840 Serviced Apartments Barcelona is its unbeatable location. In Barcelona, our serviced apartments are where the backstreets of the old city quarter give way to the Meditarranean light. From our apartments you will revel in the sights that will take you beyond the Gothic quarters, with the backdrop of the Montjuic castle, or gaze at the sailing boats and luxury yachts in Port Vell and the quiet immensity of the Mediterranean, with the beaches on one side and the harbour at your feet. Within a 10 minute walk you will find many places of tourist interest, shopping areas, museums, parks and beaches. You can also enjoy a staggering variety of entertainment, nighlife and gastronomy.
notes: Price includes: utilities (water, electricity, gas), high speed internet, weekly cleaning with a change of bed sheets and towels, and maintenance.
transit: For an easy access to any part of Barcelona in front of the apartment there are several bus stops that go up Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Las Ramblas. Among them buses V15, V17, D20… The other convenient option is to travel by metro which runs every 5 minutes, the closest stations are L4 Barceloneta or Jaume I in 5 minutes journey can take you to the sights such as Urquinaona Square or Paseo de Gracia. Despite the bus or underground, there is Estació de França train station which is 7 minutes away walking distance, and there trains depart every 15 minutes to the center of Barcelona (Sants or Passeig de Gràcia) as well as Sitges and many other destinations.
access: The client has access to all the apartment.
interaction: Our office, which is open Monday to Friday from 10am to 7pm is located in the same building as our apartments, this way we ensure an immediate response and personalised attention to all our clients. Feel free to contact us directly via email or our 24h telephone.
house_rules: To be refunded of deposit please follow our simple rules:  1) communicate to us if during your stay there is any breakage of the apartment belongings  2) Return the accommodation in a clean and tidy state or pay an extra cleaning.  3) Do not leave keys inside the lock or pay the locksmith 100€  4) Vacate the apartment by 11am (unless agreed differently) or pay 40€  5) Return all keys or pay 30€ for each key missing  6) Do not smoke in the apartment  7) Do not allow extra guests other than those in the booking

host.host_about:
We offer professional service and rent lovely refurbished apartments in Barcelona and Sitges for short and long term stays.

Our Serviced Apartments in Barcelona are located in one of the best areas of the city, right between the Barceloneta beach and the Gothic/Born quarter. Furthermore, they are in walking distance to major tourist attractions such as the Picasso Museum, the Old Port, Ramblas and the Santa Maria del Mar cathedral.
To round up the experience we invite all our guests to enjoy lunch and dinners in our Posta ristorante & pizzeria and Aperol Spritz Bar at the ground floor .

In Sitges our apartments enjoy a special location. Already leaving the house you can see the sea and you only need 1 minute to go to the beach. Moreover, everything is in walking distance, a perfect location to fully enjoy the town. Additionally, the Miramar restaurant, which is directly in front the house, offers you a great variety of healthy and delicious food and drinks.

reviews.comments: Great place to stay at. Right in the middle of everything. Walkable distance to Barcelonetta, and Las Ramblas. Restaurants and Bars everywhere around you. The place itself is modern, and bigger then it looks in the pictures.

Hola me llamo  Katia de 40 años 
Somo una pequeña Familia tranquila,  Sociables,  trabajadora responsable. es un placer  terner Huéspedes en nuestro apartamento Ofrecemos nuestra casa con mucho cariño a si mismo puedan pasar unas vacaciones inolvidables  Barcelona.

address.government_area: el Parc i la Llacuna del Poblenou

reviews.comments: Great location, city center. Vilma and her family - very friendly! Thanks!

Perfect experience ! Very nice and friendly people. Good situation with everything you can need very close from the apartment, I mean metro, parkings, supermarkets, places to eat... Everything was as expected, the room and apartment were very clean and confortable. Could be back any time for sure ! Muchas Gracias !
Vilma's place is very good location, near the beach and the center. The appartment is very clean and it smells good. It's the perfect place to visit Barcelona in a few days. Thank you Vilma !
Brilliant location!
Vilma is warm and helpful. But the room might be crowded so that bathroom is busy. Bedroom do not have air condition and it is too hot.
Great location close to everything, safe neighbourhood. Also, easy to communicate and fast response from the host! Value for your money.

Katia is a very kind person. Also location is great!. About 10 min walk to the beach, and ~20 min walk to Sagrada Família and other places. So if you want to spent few hours on the beach and then take a walk - it's a great place to stay
Great location.  Noisy room though ,not from tenants. More people living in apartment than i expected.
Everything was as expected! Very nice and friendly people :)
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The room is enough for 2 people. Good location and nice host!
Die Lage ist wirklich top und die Gastgeberin hat uns tolle Tipps gegeben ;)

Attention: pas de place de parking gratuite !

Chambre correcte, avec linge de bain, famille discrète, et communs corrects

Appart sympa, simple. Juste ce qu'il faut pour dormir. Ventilateur, WIFI, serviettes de toilette à disposition. Famille discrète et très accueillante ( parle espagnol et anglais ). Salle de bain commune avec la famille. Possibilité d'utiliser la cuisine. Quartier proche de tout ( 15-20 min à pied de tous les lieux touristiques ) et calme.
Katia est très sympathique. Son logement est bien placé et dans un quartier calme. Le seul bémol, le parking gratuit annoncé est  seulement gratuit entre 20h et 8h
Great location. Nice host.
Hijyene önem veren ve yattığı oda nefes almak isteyenlere kesinlikle tavsiye etmem

Atsevišķa ar piekaramo atslēgu slēdzama istaba. Budžeta ceļotājiem ar minimālām prasībām. 
3 stāvs, lifta nav. Skaņas izolācijas vispār nav.

name: My Home in OPorto
summary: Apartamento muito aconchegante, zona muito tranquila e com uma bela vista. Bem equipado com toda a comodidade para quem procura privacidade e conforto. A 100 metros do Metro, 8 minutos do Aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro, 20 minutos do Centro do Porto.  Supermercado, confeitarias, restaurante, bancos, faculdade, lavandaria, farmácia, take way, tudo à menos de 3 minutos à pé. Próximo das auto estradas que dão acesso as cidades de Braga e Guimarães.  Ideal para casais e viajantes à negócios.
space: O apartamento é muito luminoso e sossegado. Conservado como novo.

A Flávia é muito simpática, atenciosa e disponível, recomendo vivamente este espaço.
El alojamiento bastante bien sacando que la tostadora al utilizar saltaban los automaticos y que había bastante polvo!!

Estadia super tranquila.

name: SUPERB FLAT ,30 sec from metro, close to downtown
summary: Awesome location! Close to many things: Downtown Montreal, Verdun Metro station, restaurants ("Bring your own wine" style and with liquor licenses), Bicycle path, bakery, banks, a beer store called “Maltéhops”, grocery and convenience stores, boutiques, parks, the St-Laurent seaway shoreline, Bistros, Bénélux brewery, SAQ ( liquor store). Quiet, cozy, luminous and super clean! Don't forget to leave the place the exact same way! Towels, shampoo, soap and dish soaps, tea and coffee are provided.
description: Awesome location! Close to many things: Downtown Montreal, Verdun Metro station, restaurants ("Bring your own wine" style and with liquor licenses), Bicycle path, bakery, banks, a beer store called “Maltéhops”, grocery and convenience stores, boutiques, parks, the St-Laurent seaway shoreline, Bistros, Bénélux brewery, SAQ ( liquor store). Quiet, cozy, luminous and super clean! Don't forget to leave the place the exact same way! Towels, shampoo, soap and dish soaps, tea and coffee are provided.
house_rules: - No Parties , Leave the flat clean and respect the neighbors - Need to see me to have the key.

host.host_about:
I'm from Montréal, Québec, Canada and work as photographer since 2001.(fashion, home decor, food and advertising) I like wine, beer and drinks. I Iove to travel,to explore and discover new things, new people , new parts of the world... I love to laugh and i'm pretty good at it! :)

Anne

reviews.comments: Anne was such a warm and bubbly person! It being my first trip to Montréal, I was a little nervous. But, immediately upon meeting Anne all of the nervousness melted away! She even gifted me with delicious baked goods and maps of the area. The flat is only about a minute's walk to the Green line which was super convenient and the area is diverse and relatively quiet which makes for a nice contrast with the harried and noisy downtown areas. I would definitely stay here again and think that I have made a great friend already in Anne! I would recommend 500%.

name: Chambre Berri UQAM village
summary: Proche des stations de métro Berri UQAM et Beaudry, du Quartier gai, d'une galerie sous-terraine comprenant un IGA (supermarché), des Mac Do et bien d'autres lieux de restauration en tout genre sur la rue Sainte-Catherine (juste derrière le logement), l'appartement est à 5-10 minutes du centre-ville de Montréal. Vous l'apprécierez pour l'ambiance, la terrasse extérieure, la luminosité et le quartier. Il est vraiment parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.

reviews.comments:
This place was amazing! Deborah and her flatmate did an amazing job accommodating us throughout the entire trip.  They were very helpful with tips on what to do during the trip and made sure my girlfriend and I had the privacy that we needed, which was also a plus. 

For the location and accessibility of this place, we should have definitely paid higher.  We were located very close in between two train lines 5 min walking distance of that, a strip of clubs, stores, restaurants, etc while being right in the middle of downtown, so the value of this place exceeds expectations.  If you are a peace and quiet person and don't prefer the city life then this location is not for you because it is a non stop party area with plenty to do.

Deborah was even so kind to allow us to check in extremely early, as we had a very early arrival time from the states, which was also very kind and also flexible for checkout, this place exceeded our expectations, thanks again guys!

Merci Déborah et Sébastien ! En effet vous êtes des colocs de choc! Merci pour votre disponibilité, votre accueil, vos précieux conseils et surtout votre bonne humeur! Au plaisir de vous revoir! Aurélie, merci de nous avoir permis de découvrir Montréal avec une arrivée dans cette superbe ville tout en douceur!   Elise et Freddy.
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de voir Aurélie mais nous avons très bien été accueillis par Déborah ! Logement super bien situé.

Very nice Air BnB! Communication was very good and the room we had nice. The location of the accommodation is very good, in a walking distance to many sightseeing locations and close to a metro station. Would definitely recommend it.

name: Heart of Harlem Living - NYC to it's fullest!
summary: Large one bedroom studio with private bathroom and separate shared kitchen. Washer, dryer, full bathroom. 2nd floor of a small building. My place is close to Red Rooster Harlem, Chez Lucienne, The Studio Museum In Harlem, and Starbucks. You’ll love my place because of the location and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids).

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My name is Pascal, I'm an owner at a local vegan restaurant and have been living in Harlem for the last 5+ years.  I went to school in Atlanta and lived in there for 6.5 years before spending 1 in Greensboro, NC, and then moving to New York. When I travel I expect a clean, safe place to stay, and so I treat my hosting in that fashion.

reviews.comments: I stayed at Pascals for the weekend and he was friendly and punctual upon my arrival.  He showed me around the place which was very comfy, clean and told me if I needed anything he was right next door.  Luckily for us there was a deli downstairs which was very convenient and we had a great stay!
Excellent séjour passé chez Pascal ! Hôte très gentil, accueillant et à l'écoute ! Je recommande ce logement.
had a great stay. clean, comfortable. would def stay here again
Great place, thanks allowing me and my friends to stay! Great communication and very punctual.

Logement parfait pour visiter Manhattan, très proche du métro. Le logement peut accueillir 4 personnes, mais il n'y a pas beaucoup de place pour manger, malgré la cuisine très bien équipée. Proche du train, cela fait un peu de bruit.

El Dto para 3esta más que bien,el baño funciona perfecto igual que la (Website hidden by Airbnb) cómodo y tiene de todo.el anfitrión siempre estuvo para lo que necesitábamos y nos ayudó (Website hidden by Airbnb) zona es lejos del centro pero tiene una calle 125 cerca llena de tiendas!!!y el subte verde a 2cuadras.divino todo

Pascal was very warm and inviting. This was my first airbnb experience, and it set a great standard. The apartment was as advertised. Very clean and comfortable apartment. Would definitely stay here again.
Great host! Would definitely stay there again!

My wife, I and a friend stayed over Pascal's place and it was a great experience. The place was compatible with our (high) expectations and the price was fair. The host certainly exceed our expectations, and he made all the possible to make us feel well in his place and in the city (and by the way, we recommend to try his vegan restaurant, excellent food great atmosphere and affordable price) and he shared with us some of his experiences. We totally recommend his apartment to stay in Airbnb.

We enjoyed our stay at Pascal's place. Check-in was easy and he responds very quickly. The pictures are accurate to the place. It's small but very clean and the bed is comfortable. The only thing is if you don't like flat pillows you should bring your own.
It's very clean and comfortable. It's also easy to get to the transit station and shops in the area

Although the noisy commuter train runs along the street directly outside of the bedroom window, Pascal's place is a good value for folks who are deep sleepers. Even though we didn't sleep that soundly, we appreciate the great communication and recommendations from Pascal. The apartment is a short walk to Lenox Avenue and all the fun restaurants there.

Real talk. Nice apartment, decent host, terrible location. I had a 20 night stay for work and canceled after 3 nights due to the noise from the rail blasting it's horn as it approached the station half a block away and people leaning on their car horns at 5 am. I hardly slept. Also, advertised as pet friendly but there is actually a size/weight limit and was told to keep my dog out of sight as much as possible. I took the linens off the bed at the request of the host only to discover the mattress and pillows were stained yellow all over and almost vomited at the sight. Host is nice though and accomadated my late check. Apartment is clean and offers good privacy with use if private bathroom and shared kitchen.
Pascal's place is a great location in Harlem, close to both train stops 2/3 and the 4/5/6. Not to mention plenty of restaurants in the area.

Pascal let's you do your own thing, total privacy and thoughtful consideration.
Good value in Mr. P's relaxing guest space.
Pascal’s place was homey and comfy! 3 of us fit perfectly! Train outside was honestly barley noticeable and added great character. We felt like true New Yorkers! Would def book again!
Great place, met us at the door, great location.
Nice stay, clean appartment and close of the subway
Pascal’s place was great! Not far from Lenox Ave. He was very helpful with local tips and responding via text message or messages through the Air BnB App.

Pascal’s apartment is a great place, it was very clean and is central to most public transit. Super easy to get to from the train station. Pascal and his roommate were very friendly and accommodating hosts as well.
Awesome area in Harlem right by the Metro. Easy access to Randall's Island as well. Pascal was very welcoming and I'd recommend this spot to a friend
Great
Totally excellent place and Pascal was super great
Buen lugar. Regresaría.

Pascal is an amazing host! His apartment is sparkling clean...the floors shines! Communication with him was great. I really enjoyed my birthday weekend and appreciated Pascal accommodating all my needs. Definitely recommend booking here.

Até 4 hóspedes.  50m2 .  Somente dois aptos por andar.  Conforto e privacidade. Não são admitidas visitas de pessoas estranhas ao contrato. Observar horários check-in e checkout. neighborhood_overview: O Leblon é reconhecido mundialmente como possuindo a melhor qualidade de vida e segurança do Rio.  Tudo de mais moderno e vanguardista acontece aqui em primeiro lugar.  Você não vai se arrepender! Leblon es reconocido mundialmente por tener la mejor calidad de vida y la seguridad del Rio.  Todo el más moderno y vanguardista que sucede aquí en primer lugar. ¡No te arrepentirás! Leblon is well known all over the world for having the best life quality and security in Rio.  Everything new and modern comes from there in the first place.  You won't regret staying there! Leblon est reconnu dans le monde entier comme ayant la meilleure qualité de vie et la sécurité de la rivière. Toutes les avant-garde la plus moderne et qui se passe ici en premier. Vous ne le regretterez pas!
notes: NÃO possui vaga de garagem, prédio antigo. Cozinha totalmente equipada. Fornecemos roupa de cama e banho de ótima qualidade Microondas, geladeira e fogão. Ar condicionado em todos os cômodos. Privacidade e conforto. The building has no parking.  We provide linen. microwave oven, refrigerator and stove. Ar conditioning all over the place, privacy and comfort. No parking in the building.
transit: Perfeita malha de transportes com metrô a 200m do prédio e ônibus para todos os bairros do Rio (centro, Barra da Tijuca, Ipanema, Copacabana e muitos outros).  Podemos indicar um motorista com carro de luxo para conduzi-lo a outras cidades turísticas próximas. Hay transporte de malla perfecta con el metro a 200m del edificio y autobuses a todos los distritos de Río (en el centro, Barra da Tijuca, Ipanema, Copacabana y muchos otros). Podemos enumerar un conductor con coche de lujo que lo lleve a otras ciudades turísticas cercanas. Plenty of transportation wherever you wish to go by metro or bus.  We can provide a car with a reliable driver under request to take you to other nearby touristic cities. Dans le quartier a transport en maille parfaite.   Il y a du métro à 200m du bâtiment et des bus pour tous les quartiers de Rio (centre, Barra da Tijuca, Ipanema, Copacabana et bien d'autres). Nous pouvons citer un chauffeur avec voiture de luxe pour vous conduire à d'autres villes touristiqu
access: A três quadras ou 300m está a Praia do Leblon, a 100 metros do prédio estão os melhores bares e restaurantes da cidade.  A Lagoa está a cinco minutos a pé.  Barra da Tijuca via metrô - linha 4 está a 5 minutos a pé ou 200m.  Transporte farto para todos os lugares.  Dois shoppings a 10 minutos caminhando. ATENÇÃO: Importante lembrar que há um lance de escada até o elevador - não é acessível a cadeirantes. Español Tres bloques o 300 metros es la playa de Leblon, a 100 metros del edificio son los mejores bares y restaurantes de la ciudad. La laguna se encuentra a cinco minutos a pie. Barra da Tijuca a través de metro - la línea 4 se encuentra a 5 minutos a pie o 200 metros. Hay transporte para todas las partes. Dos centros comerciales a 10 minutos a pie.  ATENCIÓN: Es importante recordar que hay un tramo de escaleras hasta el ascensor - no es accesible para los usuarios de sillas de ruedas. English 300m or three short blocks from the beach, all restaurants very close to the building.  A s
interaction: Dou assessoria full time e sou quase superhost, leiam os comentários de quem já se hospedou.  Trabalho fora, mas moro a uma quadra do apartamento.  Posso estar presente a maior parte do tempo. Always around when needed!  I live one block from the apartment, though I work downtown everyday.  Reachable by cell phone 24 hours.  Please read the comments of the previous guest,  all of them love the place and feel comfortable, specially dealing with me in his own language. Chaque fois que nécessaire dans (Hidden by Airbnb) . Je travaille, mais je vis un pâté de maisons de l'appartement. Je peux être présent la plupart du temps.  Je parle un petit peau de français mais je comprend tout.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Muito bom

A estadia foi conforma o planejado e a Nilza nos deu todo o apoio necessário. A localização do apartamento é na melhor rua do Leblon e o imóvel é exatamente como nas fotos. Estávamos em 4 e foi ok. Recomendo e voltaria.

Check in was easy, communication very good, location great and the house nicely designed.
Room is noisy due to the street, other than that good value for money.
Estadia perfeita ! Recomendo 100%. A localizalicao não pode ser melhor !

O apartamento da Nilza é muito bom, limpo, confortável, organizado, bem decorado é bem fresquinho. Os ambientes tem ar- condicionado que funcionam perfeitamente, sem contar que a Nilza é uma excelente anfitriã, nos recepcionou super bem, nos acolheu e todas as nossas solicitações ela atendeu prontamente. Indicamos o apartamento dela como ela também como anfitriã. Ficamos super satisfeitos e esperamos retornar em breve. Obrigada Nilza por fazer da nossa viagem Ainda melhor. Esqueci de comentar que o apartamento tem ótima localização também, perto de restaurantes, bares e próximo a praia. Abraços Felipe e Raquel

Nossa estadia foi ótima, o apartamento é bem localizado, perto de restaurantes badalados no Leblon, uma lanchonete com sucos em frente, a umas 4 quadras da praia (bom que a gente caminhava todos os dias). O apartamento tem uma decoração atraente e acomodou bem duas pessoas. O box do chuveiro é bastante apertado, porém a ducha, o ar-condicionado e o wifi funcionavam bem. Senti falta de armários no quarto. Não tenho nada a reclamar da estadia, e a proprietária também foi muito simpática com a gente.
Depto cómodo, muy bien ubicado.
Foi ótima estadia! recomendo! Muito bem localizado. Ap pequeno mas super aconchegante. Como no anuncio. Nilza super atenciosa e a disposição. Sem problemas algum!
Nilza aide énormément.

Perfeito!!!
Super índico!!!!
Obrigada Nilza!!!!
Ro, Mi e Ana
Ótimo custo beneficio!!
Apartamento ideal para jovens, localização ótima! Excelente custo beneficio!
Ótima localização; apto muito bom; cama boa; ar condicionado funcionando bem; a Nilza também é super querida e atenciosa. Enfim, tudo de bom!

O apto. eh muito bem localizado, proximo de conducao e da praia, com muitos restaurantes proximos, mas o local eh bastante movimentado, e consequentemente barulhento. A decoracao eh simpatica, mas o apto. tem muitas diferencas de nivel o que nao eh muito adequado para quem tiver algum problema de locomocao.

Apartamento bem localizado e de fácil acesso.
Anfitriã muito atenciosa. Super indico.
Agradecemos muito o carinho no atendimento! Pertinho da praia, mercado, metro, bares e restaurantes! Muito legal! Um forte abraço e ate a próxima!

O apartamento é mega bem localizado, a limpeza e qualidade dos lençóis e travesseiros e etc são incríveis.
  É uma relação custo benefício melhor que qualquer outra hospedagem que já utilizei.
  Sem falar que a Nilsa é uma graça de pessoa, super atenciosa e prestativa.

O lugar é ótimo e super bem localizado, adoramos o bairro, tem tudo ao redor, muitos bares, botequins, supermercados, lancherias, lojas...
O apartamento é muito charmoso.
Nossa única observação é com relação ao chuveiro, pois o banho é morno, como pegamos umas noites de temperatura mais baixa, sentimos falta de um banho quentinho.
Recomendamos muito a todos!!!!!!!
Karina e Israel.

Ótima relação custo x benefício.
Excelente localização.
Ótimo custo benefício. Excelente localização.

O Ap da Nilza é muito bom, super bem decoradinho e confortável, perto de mercado, lanchonetes, barzinhos muito legais, muito bem localizado e isso facilitou o Uber. O bairro é ótimo e SUPER seguro, algumas vezes andamos durante a noite na praça que fica próxima. Gostamos muito da atenção, a Nilza foi solícita. Não tivemos nenhuma problema. Amamos a estadia!

A Nilza é muito atenciosa e cordial. Eu e minha mãe passamos bons momentos em seu apartamento e ela foi sempre solícita, com certeza recomendamos!
A localização é um bônus a parte! Muito perto da praia, numa rua onde tem diversos restaurantes e bares, num local seguro e de boa vizinhança.
Ótimo apartamento e muito bem localizado!

A casa é extremamente bem localizada, com absolutamente tudo próximo! Metro, mercado, farmácia, bares e restaurantes! Esse é o principal ponto positivo. A casa é bem arejada e a anfitriã bem solicita, nos emprestou seu ferro de passar roupa quando necessário. Existe apenas um banheiro, que fica dentro do quarto, então para um número maior de hóspedes a privacidade pode ser perdida. A cama de casal é bastante dura, então esse é o único ponto negativo. Recomendamos muito o lugar, pelo seu custo beneficio!
Ótimo apartamento. Ótima localização. Proprietária atenciosa. O banheiro poderia ser melhor iluminado, principalmente o chuveiro.
Ótimo apto, bem localizado e próximo a supermercado, lanchonete e vida noturna. Super indico.
bom apartamento para 2 pessoas com acesso fácil a tudo.

A Nilza recebeu muito bem. O apartamento é muito bem localizado. Há muitos restaurantes, bares e opções culturais a poucos metros.  A região é bem segura. A distância da praia é pequena. Foi uma boa escolha, e atendeu minhas necessidades.

Great apartment, perfectly located just minutes away from the beach. With a restaurant downstairs you don't even have to walk far to get a drink.
We enjoyed our stay in Rio!

O apartamento é muito charmoso e fica muito bem localizado, perto do metrô, da praia, dos bares e de supermercados, tem onde almoçar logo embaixo a um preço acessível e local para lanches também. A Dias Ferreira é uma rua repleta de opções. Recomendo para quem quer se sentir em casa. A anfitriã está sempre disposta a ajudar e tirar dúvidas. Nunca tinha visitado o Rio e já pretendo voltar para o apartamento da Nilza. Só tenho a agradecer pela experiência!
Apartamento bem localizado, limpo e aconchegante! Proprietária atenciosa! Adoramos!

Gostei muito de hospedar no local. Organizado, prático, limpo e bem organizado. Indico por ser bem localizado, 2 quadras do metrô, 3 quadras da praia do leblon, próximo de vários restaurantes, cafés e lanchonetes.
Nilza sempre muito atenciosa e prestativa, o apartamento é exatamente como as fotos apresentadas, super bem localizado e bem estruturado!

Na cozinha encontramos talheres sujos e o pano de prato com mal cheiro. 
Na sala o sofá cama estava com areia em cima e tive que limpar eu mesma antes de usar para dormir.
Na descrição do apartamento constava ferro de passar, que na verdade não existia.
O wi-fi era péssimo, não conseguia carregar vídeos de forma alguma. 
Anfitriã pouco solicita, nada do que pedimos foi atendido e sempre respondido com rispidez.

Eu e mais 3 amigas ficamos hospedadas no feriado de finados no apartamento.
O melhor de tudo: localização, principalmente para jovens e adultos que gostam dos barzinhos próximos.
Tudo limpo, desde o imóvel, quanto as roupas de cama e banho.
A Nilza da sempre o suporte quando precisa e é muito atenciosa.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Me hospedei , juntamente com a minha família, no apto da Nilza e foi tudo perfeito! A localização é excelente, o apto nos supriu em tudo e a Nilza foi sempre muito solícita e atenciosa em tudo o que (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos e recomendo a todos!
Excelente localização. Apartamento muito bom, funcional e confortável.

The location was great.  Very close to many restaurants.  It was on the fifth floor above two bars and on Friday night it was a little noisy but the other nights it was fine.

The elevator and shower were a little small, but adequate, and it is definitely not an apartment for mobility limited (but Nilza was careful to note that).

Given the location, price and great responses to our communications, I would recommend it.
O apartamento é muito gostoso e fica em uma boa localização!
La ubicación es muy buena, a 3 cuadras de la playa de Leblon. Sobre la calle Dias Ferreira hay muchísimos locales de comidas, el barrio es muy animado.
Estuvimos a gusto en el lugar.  la ubicación es inmejorable.  el depto es funcional.  para mencionar que el baño no tiene bidet y la ducha es muy pequeña.  por lo demás todo bien.

Bem localizado, limpo, ótimo, único problema é a internet que é muito fraca quase não carrega uma foto (demora) pra usar para trabalho é ruim, acho que poderia colocar um novo pacote para sim ficar 100% a estadia!
Otima localizacao, peca pelo sistema monofasico de energia nao dando pra usar chuveiro e secador ao mesmo tempo... No mais, vale a pena.
Local de fácil acesso, muito bem localizado. Espaço charmoso e anfitriã bastante atenciosa!
Apartamento lindo, bem cuidado, com tudo que precisamos. Prédio silencioso com localização perfeita! Adorei!

Eu e minhas amigas ficamos totalmente satisfeitas com nossa estadia..Apartamento show,limpo,aconchegante e com tudo que a gente precisava e tbm com ótima localização. Não podemos esquecer também da atenção da Nilza com a gente..muito educada e receptiva .Voltaremos com toda ctz!!!
No era como lo esperaba, estaba algo sucio y no nos sentimos cómodos del todo. Hacia mucho calor y menos mal que tenía ventiladores. Por solo tenía un baño, para tres personas es justo.
This is a great apartment at a great location. Next to shopping, bars,walking distance to the beach and a very safe neighborhood. Can not go wrong with this pick!
Ótima localização
Otimo
Apartamento com a localização ótima. Senti falta de utensílios na cozinha e a wi fi poderia ser melhor. A Nilza é super prestativa. Ótima estadia

The location is really good and everything run smoothly with the host. Just three small remarks: The doorman was almost never there (just for a matter of sucurity even if Leblon is a safe area) and I could not leave the luggage for some hours  after check out. Furthermore the toilet and the kitchen could have been a bit cleaner. I did not meet the host in person but everything else except these small things was good.
Ótima hospitalidade. Apartamento bem localizado e limpo. WiFi sempre com boa conectividade.
Muito bom lugar
O apt é bem localizado, porem muito pequeno e velho. Elevador nao cabe nem 2 malas. Espaco cheio de degraus (fui com bebe e nao foi nada pratico).

neighborhood_overview: For many, the Plateau is quintessential Montréal. Spiral staircases, bagels, Arcade Fire – it all started here in this rich and vast neighbourhood north of downtown. Hip, trendy and artsy, the Plateau – especially its famed enclave of Mile End – is known as much for its residential quaintness as its festive nighttime antics. By day, kids play in the parks and friends debate politics in cafés; by night, restaurants and bars teem with people.
transit: There is a Bus only a block away. Metro Mont Royal can be accessed from a 10 minutes walk away.
