name: Artist Loft Bushwick
summary: One bedroom with a comfy queen sized bed, built within an old factory with a spacious common area.  The loft is located in up-and-coming Bushwick, a neighborhood for artists/latino community/young professionals.  Close to food markets, hip bars and restaurants, art spaces, loft parties, bookstores and cafes.  18 mins to Williamsburg and 27 mins to Manhattan via the L train.
space: The loft is located in an old factory built in 1931 with soaring high ceilings and large factory windows, which gives it a very unique feeling.  It features an interesting build out within, years of different residents here have left their mark on the space, as have I as well.  These contributions over the years lends themselves to a very creative and playful atmosphere.  I've filled it with green living things, beautiful textures, and wooden things - it's the Brooklyn loft home of my dreams, a place where I work (currently working on an album) rest and commune.   New York City is a place where the energy constantly drives you forward; my loft is a great place to slow things down and recharge between exploring the city, and you'll find me there writing and working on projects.  :) Your cozy room is situated within the main common area and is connected to the space via a door and a window that opens and shuts into the common area.  It's a uniquely shaped space with a full-size bed, a po
description: One bedroom with a comfy queen sized bed, built within an old factory with a spacious common area.  The loft is located in up-and-coming Bushwick, a neighborhood for artists/latino community/young professionals.  Close to food markets, hip bars and restaurants, art spaces, loft parties, bookstores and cafes.  18 mins to Williamsburg and 27 mins to Manhattan via the L train. The loft is located in an old factory built in 1931 with soaring high ceilings and large factory windows, which gives it a very unique feeling.  It features an interesting build out within, years of different residents here have left their mark on the space, as have I as well.  These contributions over the years lends themselves to a very creative and playful atmosphere.  I've filled it with green living things, beautiful textures, and wooden things - it's the Brooklyn loft home of my dreams, a place where I work (currently working on an album) rest and commune.   New York City is a place where the energy constantly
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is a predominantly south/central american / puerto rican neighborhood, with an emerging presence of artists and young professionals from all over the world, which is shaping the neighborhood in new ways.  We have many cafes, vintage shops, bars, street vendors, clubs, restaurants, galleries, vinyl record shops - really, you name it, all within walking distance.  If you want to feel the real creative energy New York City has to offer, this is the neighborhood where everything is happening in the most dynamic way.   For green space, Maria Hernandez Park is just a few blocks away and it's full of life, trees, and locals hanging out and having a good time.   House of Yes is a super fun place to catch a unique show or dance party. Roberta's is a world-famous pizza place a short walk from my apartment. Cafe Bunna is a fun all-vegan Ethiopian restaurant and venue nearby.
notes: When I'm in town, I live, practice, and work out of this lovely sunny space and I like to keep busy, splitting my time between music, yoga, meditation, study, and work out in the city. My roommate Shiho is from Tokyo and is a yoga instructor.
transit: My place is a 3 minute walk to the Knickerbocker M stop and an  8 minute walk to the Dekalb L stop.  The L is notoriously fast and connects you to Williamsburg and all of Manhattan.   It's a very convenient train line that runs 24 hours a day.  The M train at the Knickerbocker stop is currently under maintenance and is therefore not currently running, but the L train leaves you fully connected to the city and getting around shouldn't be a problem.
access: - roof access -light-filled common space - kitchen - shared refrigerator - shared bathroom
interaction: I'm a social and giving person by nature, and I love equally to hold a conversation and to give space.  It all depends on the moment.  I keep busy when I'm at home - I'm a professional musician and I'm engrossed with various learning and creative projects, so please understand that this is a kind of zen environment conducive to creativity - but when I'm disengaged from that I'm happy to share conversation, a meal, a song, or a tea/coffee.
house_rules: - No guests.   - be mindful - This environment is a work/live space with a mixture of long term and short term guests (you, me and Shiho).   - Shoes off indoors, please.   - No smoking indoors.  You are welcome to make use of the rooftop or go outside the building to smoke.    - Wash dishes and wipe kitchen surfaces after use.

host.host_about:
Hi!  I'm Benny.  I hope you'll feel comfortable in my beautiful loft apartment and enjoy all of the amazing things Bushwick, Brooklyn, Manhattan and all of New York City has to offer!

A native New Yorker, I have deep roots in this city.  Both of my parents are New Yorkers, and my grandfather was born in Williamsburg!  I love sharing this city with guests, it's one of the most dynamic and exciting places in the world.  New York has character.  

I'm a singer, guitarist, and songwriter, focusing on bossa nova music from Brazil.  I love to make music, read, learn more about my Japanese and Jewish ancestral culture, discover new things and meet new people from all walks of life.  My goal is to provide the best experience possible in an inviting, relaxing, and creative environment.

reviews.comments: Жить у Бенни очень круто! И сам человек очень хороший, выручал пару раз в экстренных ситуациях. Жильё  понравилось, комната маленькая, но комфортная и уютная. Что не мало важно - есть кондиционер, удобная ванная комната. В общем 5/5
Benny is very nice person. He treats us as home. His Tea Loft is a warm and creative place, with an atmosphere of liberal arts. I strongly recommend you to stay there.

Benny is a great, friendly & caring host in a very lovely environment. It was a pleasure to live in his apartment for 10 days and to experience the neighbourhood with good food, drinks and nice people. Thanks Benny!

Benny is awesome! He is art by himself! Communicative, reliable, social, creative, with great sense of humor, great energy, spontaneous and easy going in the best way (also great bartending skills - :) ) Aslo he  
We highly recommend his place if you want to have real New York experience. Urban and artistic part of Brooklyn, with influence of various cultures,  close to subway station, it is easy to go anywhere from there. 
His place is comfortable,  warm and he will make it home for you. 
Thanks Benny! 
All the best from me and Jelena!
Benny is a great host, very kind and welcoming. He will try to make your stay the best possible and has great suggestions for things to do in the city. We had a great time.

Benny's home IS a home! And Benny a wonderful host. I won't forget the light and serene atmosphere in his living room, his generosity and the talks we had. Benny cares for his guests. Lovely to see how he's cultivating tiny bonsai and other rare plants under the bright windows. Last, but not least: good music's around at all times... 
The area is safe, traffic is calm, lots of markets around, two subway lines at easy walking distance. Benny's home is a living and vivid and at the same time peaceful place

Benny est un hôte amical et investi ...
L'appartement et le roof top étaient au delà de nos espérances !
Nous n'avions pas l'impression d'être des touristes mais de vrais New yorkais grâce aux super adresses que Benny nous a conseillés !

We had a great stay at Benny's loft! There was a private bed room area that my boyfriend and I stayed in and was able to open a window into the amazing morning light. The bathroom was kept very clean, as was the kitchen. He even provided some delicious coffee options :)

The neighborhood was definitely dynamic and full of life! We enjoyed walking down the street and people watching. There were food stands, pizza by the slice shops, and tons of Asian food restaurants. 

We were very glad we found this place and would definitely stay here again if we come back to Brooklyn.

Hi Benny, We've had an awesome time! Your apartment was a perfect base to start our activities from. Bushwick is an interesting place, representing NY in a complete different way. We found some nice bars, saw the Nets loose from the Bulls, and we ran over the Williamsburg bridge. I would definitely recommend other people to stay in your place.
cheers
Jan & Valentijn
Even though Benny was out of the country, he stayed in contact to make sure I had everything I needed for my stay. Thanks!

I stayed at Benny's place for a couple of nights during my trip to NY. The building was really unique and central to stores/restaurants as well as public transit. The apartment was clean and beautiful, with fast wifi and access to an amazing rooftop. Would have loved a longer stay there!

Benny'a loft is great and exactly as advertised. It's in my favorite part of Bushwick near some great cafes-- if you're an artist it's a great location. Your space will be very private with nice energy. I slept very deeply. Recommended!

My stay with Benny was amazing from start to finish. The place was stunning — such a cool, homey loft space and a comfortable, private room. Everything was also super clean. The place is also right next to several Subway stops, so it was easy for me to get into Manhattan for work every day. Finally, Benny is a great host. He left the keys for me to pick up at my convenience at a cafe down the road, welcomed me with a beer and a chat, left some recommendations for me in my room, and checked in every now in then over the course of my stay to make sure everything was going okay. Next time I am in New York I will be reaching out again. Highly recommend!
Cozy & comfy room in a lovely loft apartment space. Benny made an effort to show me around & make my stay special. Would stay again :)

Benny's place is amazing. It was very homely and had a really cool vibe/ambiance. 
I would definitely visit again.
Benny was a great host! He was always easy to get in touch with and prompt. Beautiful loft apartment!

It was a lovely stay with a great host. Good neighborhood where there are a lot of good restaurants and nice thrift shops, plus it was very easy to go to the city as there were 2 metro lines nearby. I would highly recommend this place :)

bennys place is great. convenient for transport, quiet yet close to great cafes bars and restaurants and not far by subway to manhattan. equipped with everything you need. benny is a great host and a great musician too! thanks alot benny

Mi experiencia en casa de Benny ha sido perfecta. Ha sido atento con nosotros todo el tiempo. Se respira un ambiente muy agradable dónde la comunicación es la clave.
Cada persona respeta su propio espacio. 
Es una experiencia 100% recomendable para conocer Brooklyn y alegre vida en el barrio latino.
Benny toca y canta Bossanova realmente bien, estar en casa y escucharlo de fondo te transporta a otro lugar.
Benny is a fantastic host. He was super responsive and everything was very thoughtfully prepared. The loft is as nice as it looks - it is cozy, clean, and comfortable!

Benny is a great host! It was our first stop in NYC. New contacts, new places, new friends, best experiences. Awesome place with positive energetic. High recommends for single travelers and couples, exploring Best city and Brooklyn side :)

Benny is a super interesting guy, easy going and really nice. At first glance the neighborhood looks a little bit shady but as you walk by, you realize is just an upcoming area of Brooklyn. There are a loft of nice places to go, from vegan places to cool craft beer bars, all of them with the most hipster vibe. Even though me and my s/o had a private room, the loft was very crowded almost always and we did not feel we had the privacy we wanted. As of cleanliness, the standard was ok but it could have been better. I would recommend this place to young travelers and easy going couples who are looking for a nice place to explore the most fun areas of Brooklyn and Manhattan (it was a 35 minute trip on Metro to Manhattan).

Benny is an amazing host and I've really enjoyed my stay in his place where I could feel like home!
The place is next to many sub stations, and there is a lot of thing going on around.

I really enjoyed the stay and all our conversation! I recommend for sure this place and I'll definitely come back if when I'll come back to New York!

Thanks for everything!

Super séjour chez benny. Appartement très bien situé, près des transports en commun. Benny et ses colocataires sont très gentils et très accueillants. Le quartier de Bushwick est dans l'esprit jeune et bohème donc ne soyez pas surpris parl'ambiance vivante et où rien n'est carré, très clean ou super organisé, c'est l'ambiance hipster mais c'est aussi ce qui fait son charme. En tout les cas nous avons passé un très bon séjour.
Benny is an awesome host, and the room was so cozy. I really enjoyed my stay.
Nice place to hang your hat. Communication and instructions were simple and well prepared.

Benny's place is relaxed, unpolished but friendly atmosphere, in apartment, building and neighbourhod. The room is all good for very good friends or a couple:) Bushwick is still a bit rough, nice for the change after a day Manhattan or Wiliamsburg. Nice places closeby for drinkink a good coffee or cocktails at night. It's close to subway and buses. Benny and his roommates are very hospitable, we had a great stay!

Great value for money.
The location is conveniently close to a few subway stations.
The place is lovely and Benny was extremely efficient and quick to reply to any message.
I will recommend this accommodation to my friends!

ﾙｰﾑｵｰﾅｰは非常に日本贔屓のｱﾒﾘｶ人で､部屋はﾃﾞｻﾞｲﾝのｱｲﾃﾞｨｱに富み､清潔で､静かで､ﾘﾗｯｸｽできます｡
ﾙｰﾑﾒｲﾄも皆優しくて親切です｡
泊まった部屋は､大きなｽﾀｼﾞｵの中に手作りで創られた2階建ての小屋の1階でした｡工夫と創造性に溢れた､素敵な空間です｡wifiもあります｡
ただ､もし一般的ﾋﾞｼﾞﾈｽﾕｰｽで考えるなら､この部屋に限らず､一般的なｼｪｱﾙｰﾑは避けたほうがいいでしょう｡日本人はなんだかんだで､仕事に集中したい時は完全に遮蔽されたﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄ空間を好みます(僕もそう)が､ｼｪｱﾙｰﾑでそれは無理です｡静かとは言え､3人が共同生活をしているので､会話は発生するし､料理や掃除も始まるし､風呂の順番だってﾏﾅｰを守らねばなりません｡あくまでくつろぐときに部屋を利用し､仕事はｶﾌｪなどでやるのが無難です｡
ちなみに､ｵｰﾅｰは日本語を話せますが､少しだけです｡基本的に英語でｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝする必要があります｡
ちなみにｱﾒﾆﾃｨはﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙ1枚なので､歯ﾌﾞﾗｼや石鹸など身の回りのものは自分で持っていくか近所のﾃﾞﾘなどで買いましょう｡
よい旅を｡

Benny was a wonderful host, as were all of his housemates. Everyone was very welcoming, helpful, and fun to be around. The place was comfortable, clean, and in a great location (and had a great rooftop). All around a great experience!
Benny was a very attentive and friendly host! I had a great stay at his loft which was very charming and comfortable.
Tot molt bé, cap queixa.
Great Place!
Really nice, quiet, cozy place in Bushwick. Room was small but comfortable. Benny is a good friendly host.
Amazing place. Really cute room. Benny provided clear instructions on how to check in. It was very close to transportation and easy to get to Williamsburg and Manhattan! Highly recommended!

Benny is a fantastic host, friendly and very welcoming. I was there for a business trip and he went the extra mile to make me comfortable. The space is exactly as you see it. The room was bigger than I thought it'd be.
Benny was a great host, and we were even lucky enough to catch him playing in a bar that he invited us to. The place was a good base to explore the city for a few days.

This place is awesome. It's a walk away from Bushwick, a really up and coming area. Nice bars and food joints are everywhere lus the metro lines and near by. To top it all off, Benny is a superb host. And a rooftop.

Benny is very kind, eclectic and cultured. He is a very interesting and warm host. His apartment echoes his eclectic and cultured nature. The room itself was a little different than we expected. The walls are really thin, and there's no ventilation so we had to keep the window open the whole time which opens to the living room. This made the room feel less private than we anticipated.

Bennys place is in a great part of Brooklyn a simple ride away from manhhattan. He hosts you in an artistic loft with a nice energy, cool common areas and decorated in a unique and lovely way. The rooftop is very cool , his advice is on point, place is clean and all the fun of Brooklyn close by. Great place to stay for a nyc visit!
The loft was very clean and easy to find. Convenient for getting to manhattan. We would stay there again if we go back to New York

Thanks Benny for sharing your lovely quiet loft with us. We really appreciated the time you spent chatting with us and your suggestions for places and experiences that interested us. Hope to see you playing in Australia some day.
Very funky and stylish house. Very peaceful and great artsy feel. Great landing block into one of the cooler areas of Brooklyn.

I can highly recommend Benny's place in Bushwick: His loft-like flat is very beautiful and calm, close to several bus and metro stations. The separate room is very cosy, the bed totally comfortable. And above all, Benny is a very nice and welcoming person. Thanks a lot for this wonderful week in Brooklyn!

Benny is such a great person! His place is super nice and has everything you need.
It's perfect for musicians and artists. You might even get a free concert!

Benny’s loft ist super. Wir haben uns total wohl gefühlt. Er ist ein unkomplizierter, netter Musiker. Wir würden sofort wieder bei ihm übernachten. Die Gegend (Bushwick) hat uns gut gefallen. Viele kleine Grocery Stores und leckere Sandwiches bis spät in die Nacht. Es ist der perfekte Ort um Brooklyn kennenzulernen. Von hier aus ist man in circa 30min mit der Subway in Manhatten.
Benny is awesome! His place is such a prime location and the apartment is incredibly clean and cozy. I'll definitely stay again when I'm back in Brooklyn.
We loved Benny's place. Very nice place! Benny is a great host! We would come back any time and highly recommend to stay with him.

Benny's place is as described: characterful with a spacious, colourful living area with lots of light. Less serene in winter due to the industrial living room heating system, but you won't be cold here. I didn't see much of Benny, but he responded immediately to notes/e.mails and kindly let me leave my bag later on the day of check out. It was a great location for Manhattan and Brooklyn and felt safe; just check JFK airport trains if arriving at weekends-services are erratic and there are replacement buses, changes and lots of steps and a general lack of communication overall about services.
Benny’s place was very comfortable and clean. He was very responsive, accommodating, and kind. The location is central and convenient. Would highly recommend!
Benny was a great host and I would happily stay here again. The area is a lot fun and it doesn't take long to get to Manhattan on the L train. Thanks again Benny!
Hey Benny, thank you for the warm welcome. Your flat is super great, well located. NYC is amazing. Hope to come back for spring time !
Beautiful, stylish apartment in a great area. Benny was a pleasure to stay with. Would highly recommend this air bnb. It exceeded my expectations.

Bennys Loft ist wirklich einzugartig. Auch das Zimmer mit dem bequemen Bett ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet. Man fühlt sich sofort wohl. Benny war absolut flexibel bzgl check-in und checkout Zeit und hat mich sehr freundlich empfangen.
Fantastic creative space and great check in procedure

Thank you Benny. Great meeting you, good luck with your music. 

Would recommend.
Highly recommend Benny’s place! Close to the subway, such a cool space, friendly hospitality, and a cozy bedroom! We also got to check out the rooftop of the apartment complex. No complaints!

one of the best airbnb experiences I have ever had, hands down; I would recommend staying here whole-heartedly. beyond the fantastic space and the tranquil energy, Benny's hospitality exceeded expectations and went far above and beyond. made for such a great first time stay in Brooklyn and I'm looking forward to staying here again in the future. 

additionally, in terms of pragmatics, the unit was extremely convenient. several 24 hour grocery stores, a laundromat on the same block, and a plethora of eateries which made for a trip filled with ease. definitely ask Benny for recommendations of places to eat / visit, all the spots he recommended were completely spot-on. cheers.

Benny's place is fantastic. It is exactly as described and provides a wonderfully peaceful space to take stock after a day wandering around New York City. The bedroom is so comfortable and the whole place very light and clean. Benny is extremely responsive to messages and questions, and we had some great chats over tea - he is a super friendly and fascinating guy. It felt like I was staying in a real home and felt welcomed like more than just a guest. The whole process worked extremely smoothly. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again. Thanks Benny!!

Right from the start , I was made feel like  a very welcome guest and greeted with warm hospitality and great vibes. This  place is extremely cool , comfortable, clean , and a quiet homebase in the heart of the city. Perfect for someone who wants a safe, seamless and stress free experience. I was loving all the natural light , eclectic art objects and positive energy.  I would recommend this place  for fashion models, photographers, and instagrammers , because it has tons of authentic character and interesting places to shoot. It feels like the dream New York studio only seen in the movies. It was very tidy and well taken care of. The kitchen was clean. but I never used it because there are so many amazing restaurants nearby.  I felt like I pretty much had the space privately to myself and well respected in every regard. This place has a awesome rooftop with panoramic view and is  very close to the subway.  I needed some recommendations and directions Benny was a great source of knowledgeable info. I look forward to YOU  having similarly wonderful experience with this fantastic host and place ! Thanks Benny!

Benny's loft was a great place to stay. I had spent the previous days in different parts of the city, and this was an excellent location for getting to know the bushwick neighborhood. 
The place has an amazing ambience, and it feels very relaxed. Benny himself is super easy to communicate with, and he was kind to let me leave my bags for a few hours more when i checked out. Perfect place to stay if you're looking for something special and unique that at the same time feels like home!

Felt at home and comfortable! We wanted to stay in one of the old factories converted into flats and this was perfect! An old tea factory with lots of character!

We spent most of our 10 day stay out exploring NY but the few interactions we had with Benny and roommate were great!

We would stay here again!
A stay at bennys place was amazing. He is so caring and the place was creative and perfect for a visit in New York City! I’m glad to stay there and can recommend anyone to visit his place.
Benny ist ein guter und unkomplizierter Typ. Ich hab mich gleich wohl gefühlt.

Staying at Benny's was wonderful. The room is cozy, comfortable and large enough for me to open my huge suitcase. I loved the art and Japanese aesthetics. Benny is an excellent host and awesome talented dude. I really enjoyed hanging out with him. Bushwick is a lively and creative area of Brooklyn with everything you need. I'm very grateful for my stay.
Awesome host and a great place! Not much to say that hasn't already been covered in the previous comments.

Benny is a great host -- warm, inviting, curious, spontaneous and fun. He went above and beyond to be a good host. The space is a calm and creative loft; the bedroom is small but the overall apartment is airy and spacious.

Bennys  beautiful loft is immediately eye catching with its beautiful high ceilings and tasteful decor . 
The space is welcoming and safe (2 pass key activated doors to enter the building and iron fire door to enter the unit  ) despite what some might tell you about the neighbourhood in Brooklyn being a bit risqué.  
Benny was very careful to set up the bedroom with fresh linen and towels .The loft is  easily accessable via the M J and L lines that runs 24/7 and we felt it was ideally located for a place to call home to come back to after a tiring day touring New York . 
 There  are plenty of corner stores/ deli's nearby to grab a breakfast to start off your day or to grab some beers on the way back in the evening to chill on the terrace and soak in the views of Brooklyn .
 I have absolutely no regrets about booking Bennys place and would highly recommend the space for anybody looking to visit the big Apple ! 
So don't give your money to the Hilton or the Marriott and live in a bland pistacio painted room with a shitty view.. support a local New Yorker and elevate your NY  experience by living/communting the way real New Yorkers do! 
Thank you once again Benny for your beautiful space and kind hospitality.
Benny’s place is very cosy. We had a great stay! Thanks!

The house is amazing, even better than the pictures! I absolutely enjoyed my stay. The area is perfect, close to bars, supermarkets and restaurants. I felt really welcomed and almost at home! If you are thinking about staying in bushwick, Benny's house is definitely the place to stay! Thanks for everything!! :)

Benny has created a wonderful space with much attention to detail. I had a great stay and felt safe & comfortable throughout. The loft is also conveniently located close to transport and several bars/cafes etc. 
Benny was really easy to communicate with and a really warm host!
A++++++ would stay again! Benny's a tremendous host/person and his loft is super cool and comfortable. Located right in the heart of Bushwick, you can't go wrong with this place!

Benny est un bon hôte , a l’écoute et très sympa , accueillant et souriant . 
C’était agréable de passer quelques jours chez lui :)

Benny is crazy hot, heard his roommate is too but those things don’t matter as much as the fact they turned a once traumatizing experience into me moving to New York next month. I have nothing but love for this city and the people in it. Stay here if you want respect, hospitality, gorgeousness, convenience, culture, art and a good price. (btw this was Si Si Dumas and not Brian giving this review)
The house was in a vibrant area with lots of great and affordable Mexican restaurants nearby. Benny was a nice host, we got to listen to some very nice bossa-nova music thanks to him :).

Benny was an amazing host with a beautiful space. The immediate area surrounding the loft is vibrant and has a lot going on! Benny gave me great recommendations for places to check out, as well as made me feel like an old friend. Highly recommend staying here if you decide to go to Brooklyn.
Wonderful experience in New York. Good location and comfortable environment, clean room and kind people. If I have chance to New York next time, I will choose Benny’s apartment again.

Great vibes in this spacious loft, lots of plants and good light. Benny is a through and through local with excellent knowledge of the city. Shiho is great too! I knew these are my people when I showed up and they were playing Brian Eno on the sound system.

name: Alugo Quarto Para Temporada de Olimpiadas
summary: Meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias (com crianças).
description: Meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias (com crianças).

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Cosy room in the Born district
summary: In the heart of one of the most central and attractive district (El Born). Near from the Picasso Museum, 15 min from the beach and the Rambla Catalunya, 3 min the parc of ciutadella. Perfect for couple, friends or families. Children friendly :) Au cœur d'un des quartiers les plus animés du centre (El Born), à deux pas du Musée Picasso, 15 minutes de la plage et de la Rambla. Appartement très lumineux, spacieux. Idéal pour les couples, les amis et les familles. Les enfants sont les bienvenus :)
space: Cosy, bright and clean appartment.
description: In the heart of one of the most central and attractive district (El Born). Near from the Picasso Museum, 15 min from the beach and the Rambla Catalunya, 3 min the parc of ciutadella. Perfect for couple, friends or families. Children friendly :) Au cœur d'un des quartiers les plus animés du centre (El Born), à deux pas du Musée Picasso, 15 minutes de la plage et de la Rambla. Appartement très lumineux, spacieux. Idéal pour les couples, les amis et les familles. Les enfants sont les bienvenus :) Cosy, bright and clean appartment. You can take the shuttle from the airport  (about 7 euros one way) and then walk 20 min from Plaça Catalunya or take a taxi (less than 10 minutes, about 10 euros). Will be happy to advice you ! There is a lot of restaurants and bars around the appartment. The Passeig del born is 1 minute from the here, it is a lovely place. Very well location, in the heart of the Born, near the gothic district and the beautiful parc of cuitadella. Most of the attractions of the
neighborhood_overview: Very well location, in the heart of the Born, near the gothic district and the beautiful parc of cuitadella. Most of the attractions of the city can be reach by foot from the house.
access: You can take the shuttle from the airport  (about 7 euros one way) and then walk 20 min from Plaça Catalunya or take a taxi (less than 10 minutes, about 10 euros).
interaction: Will be happy to advice you ! There is a lot of restaurants and bars around the appartment. The Passeig del born is 1 minute from the here, it is a lovely place.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments:
Staying with Sophie and Kenneth exceeded all expectations. The location is absolutely perfect; El Born is as cool as it is quaint, and we spent many hours wandering along winding side streets to check out different shops, bars, restaurants, and coffee shops. 
The apartment itself was also great! The room was so comfortable and had a balcony overlooking the street below. There's also a lovely rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. 
And as if icing on the cake was needed, Sophie and Kenneth were the most wonderful hosts. They were kind, hospitable, and gave us some of our favorite recommendations for restaurants, bars, and sites around Barcelona. 
I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

Very nice room, the whole appartement was cute and the location is perfect, it's near to the centre, there's a lot of shops around and the beach is also only 20 minutes walking (what really isn't a problem, since Barcelona is a beautiful city all over). Anne-Sophie is super nice, gave us tips, when we arrived and also when we needed anything. I would absolutely stay there again and would recommend this place to everyone. :-)

The room was superb - cosy, very bright and sunny; small balcony; good well-proportioned double bed; everything very clean and tidy; all in working order. The flat is is a older building, very beautiful and full of peculiar character features;  at the same time there is a unexpected convenient elevator to the floor; there is also an all-round access to the communal roof terrace with fantastic views across the city.

The location speaks for itself and is simply great - right at the centre of Born; plenty of adequately priced cafes and restaurants; small family shops, boutiques; many places of interest (e.g. Picasso Museum etc.) right at the doorstep. 

Anne-Sophie is fantastic as a host - easy to get in touch with; always ready to help and to answer any question.

In short, it was all very convenient, comfortable and relaxing.
Really nice couple! You feel at ease right away.

We stayed at Anne's place while our trip to Barcelona. 
Everything was great. The room and the flat were perfectly clean, sunny, comfortable and nice. Just like on the photos. We liked our view from the balcony - on the left> El Born, on the right> Tibidabo. The flat is located in a perfect place with beautiful architecture, many cafes and bars, 1 minute to the train station and few minutes to the beach! 
Anne's and her friend were always ready to help, they know much about the city and region, are friendy and intelligent. We highly recommend them and their flat to our friends and other tourists.

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona! Anne-Sophie's home was the perfect base to explore the city. The apartment is beautiful and the location perfect. She and her boyfriend are very kind and openminded folks. We enjoyed meeting them and felt very welcome and comfortable in their home. Thanks for hosting us! Give us a call whenever you stop through Vienna! Cheers + all the best!

Anne-Sophie and Martin's room was perfect for my wife and I. It was comfortable, sunny, and right in the middle of the great Born neighborhood. The couple were friendly and welcoming; I wish we had more time to talk! The rooftop terrace has amazing views of Barcelona and within a 10-15 minute walk you their apartment you see/do/eat so much. Thanks for a great stay!
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Merci beaucoup pour votre chaleureux accueil! Tres joli appartement et idéalement situé au cœur de El Born, nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Barcelone, c'était un réel plaisir de vous avoir rencontrés! A bientôt :)

We arrived in Barcelona late, but check in was not a problem. Anne-Sophie was out of town the days we were there but Martin did a great job showing us around the flat and providing a few nearby places that were good to for food and drinks.

The bedroom was as it is shown and described, we had a full bed, which was comfortable. You have doors with working shutters so you can adjust he amount of light/air/noise you want to let in independently.

The rest of the flat is shared; which was not a problem for us since everything was kept clean. As other reviews have mentioned: it's on the 4th floor with an elevator in the back and there's access to the roof which has some good views of the city.

We had a good experience at Anne-Sophie's and would stay again.

Excelente ubicación.  Enfrente del Born. Toda la zona donde hay muchos bares para salir de noche y restaurantes. 
Muy buena comunicación y   la dueña de casa es muy amable.
Lo recomiendo
Anne-Sophie's room is clean and comfortable. There is easy to acces to any place in Barcelona. She is so kind and cooperative person.Her boyfriend Martin is also niceguy.

The apartment of Anne-Sophie is very cozy. The room is bright and comfortable, but a bit noisy during the night - bring your earplugs! :) The location is amazing though, in the el Born quartier which is really one of the nicest parts of the old city. The communication with Anne-Sophie was great and Martin welcomed us very warmly during our stay. We would be happy to return!

La habitación es cómoda, la ubicación es genial! Está cerca de todo :) 
La cocina tiene todo lo necesario
Anne-Sophie es una excelente anfitriona, muy simpática! Y dispuesta a ayudar para lo que sea (incluso nos guardó el equipaje ya que nuestro ferry salía horas más tarde del check out)
Recomendamos alojarse aquí! Excelente opción!

Anne-Sophie’s beautiful home was the perfect place to stay in. Her place was very tidy, stylish and comfortable, and located right next to so many trendy bars and restaurants. Anne-Sophie was so attentive and sweet. I have nothing bad to say, everything was top notch. Thank you again!

Una ubicación perfecta para recorrer Barcelona a pie o con transporte público. El barrio tiene mucha actividad, y es muy seguro para caminar en la noche. Anne-Sophie y Martin fueron demasiado amables y el lugar realmente cómodo. Volvería sin dudarlo
Appartement très bien situé proche de la mer, du centre et de nombreux restaurants. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Barcelone.
Very nice appartment, clean and well located in a trendy and animated district. Sharing the common parts were not a problem, at the contrary it was really nice to talk with Martin !

The place is perfect for a couple who want to enjoy the city
It's clean and well located as it is said 15 min to beach, rambla and shops
the area is full of bars and pubs
Anne Sophie and Martin are nice and helpfful
I highly recommend this place :) :)
Had a really pleasant time at Anne-Sophie's: super nice hosts, clean place with a great location and all necessary amenities.  I definitely recommend!

La location au coeur du quartier d'EL Born est idéale. A quelques pas de la plage, du quartier gothique, de la plaça Cataluyna et avec de nombreux petits bars et resto dans les environs. Nous avons tout parcourus à pieds grâce à ça.
L'appartement était très propre, la chambre disposait d'un mini balconnet agréable et surtout d'une immense terrasse/toit avec une vue imprenable sur tout Barcelone. 
Anne Sophie s'est montrée disponible et nous a recommandé spontanément les bonnes adresses des environs.
Je recommande chaudement l'appartement d'Anne Sophie, merci encore :)
A lovely apartment in a great location. I enjoyed my stay here. It had everything I needed. Cosy, warm, with a spacious room and alot of natural light. I highly recommend this place.
Anne’s place is very central and close to everything. She is also nice and have auggest me many good restaurant nearby. The room have balcony look down to a walking street.
Everything was perfect, they were the best hosts

This was absolutely perfect for our stay in Barcelona!
It was a great location - surrounded by so many awesome cafes & food & drink & shops. And right around the corner from a park. With the bonus of an awesome rooftop.

They were so prompt to answer any and all questions and gave us great suggestions of places to go!

name: ORM - Cativo Apartment
summary: Apartment located on the 2nd floor front of a building totally rehabilitated outside and inside in 2016, maintaining the original facade. Located on Rua do Cativo, in the heart of Porto's historical center, the apartment is located near the Terço Church, within the Fernandina wall, 1 minute walking from the Sé and the Luis I. It has 1 double bed, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen and living room with double sofa bed. Ideal for 1 - 4 people. Prices vary according to the seasons.
space: If this apartment is not available on the required dates, check out our other apartments through our profile. See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city. This apartment is located on Rua do Cativo, close to the Terço Church whose construction dates back to 1759. It has as main points of interest the Igreja da Sé and the National Theater São João. Ideal for couples or groups up to 4 people who prefer to stay in the heart of the historic center of Porto, within walking distance of the main points of interest of the city.
description: Apartment located on the 2nd floor front of a building totally rehabilitated outside and inside in 2016, maintaining the original facade.
