Ideal for couples or groups up to 4 people who prefer to stay in the heart of the historic center of Porto, w
neighborhood_overview: Situated in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment. Points of interest: - Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)  - Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)  - Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)  - Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)  - Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)  - S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)  - Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)  - Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)  - Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
notes: Check-in: from 16h on Check-out: until 12h (We are flexible depending on availability and upon prior notice) Late Check-in (After 20h): additional fee of 15€. Let us introduce you that Porto, since 1st March haves a tourist fair, 2€ per night/person, which at the check-in we need to collect the total amount, as the City Hall will charges us at the end of every month. Please check the information at the link bellow:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
transit: The apartment has a great location with several alternatives to travel: -  S.Bento Metro Station (300m/ 4 min walk) It allows access to the metro network that covers the city of Porto. - São Bento Train Station (400 m / 5 min walk) It allows access to other points of the country (ex .: Braga, Guimarães, Aveiro, Lisboa, Coimbra, etc.) - São Bento Bus Stop (350m / 5min walk) It alllows access to various points of interest (STCP 200 - Crystal Palace, Botanical Garden, Foz, etc) - Paragem de Autocarro em S.Bento(400m / 5min a pé) Permite acesso a vários pontos de interesse (STCP 500 - Foz, Matosinhos, etc) - Paragem de Autocarro nos Aliados (500m/7min a pé) Permite acesso a vários pontos de interesse( STCP 200- Palácio de Cristal, Jardim Botânico, Foz, etc) - "Rede Expresso" Bus Stop (CAMPO 24 DE AGOSTO / 3 min by metro)) It allows access to other points of the country (ex .: Braga, Guimarães, Aveiro, Lisboa, Coimbra, etc) - Historic Tram Stop (100m / 1min walk) It allows access to Line 22
access: We offer great accommodation to enhance your experience. Therefore, we have at your disposal: - Fan (1 unit) - Heating radiator (2 unit, bedroom and living room) - TV (more than 140 channels, including international channels) - Wi-Fi (high speed) - Hair dryer (1 unit) - Fridge with freezer - Glass ceramic hob - Microwave - Dishwasher - Italian coffee machine - Juicer - Kettle - Toaster -  Blender - Ironing board and iron - Bath and hand towels (1 set per guest and per WC) - Bed linen Additional services: We offer several additional services, which we find useful to enrich your experience in our city. - Transportation from / to the airport: Preference of our guests. Taxi service, faster, less tiring. Driver waiting for you in the arrivals area. Sign with your name. No waiting time. Journey of 30 minutes. 1 car for 4 people. - Average cost of 25/30 €. - Baby pack (baby cot, bed linen, blanket, towel, high chair for meal and baby bathtub) - 30 € - Breakfast: Breakfast 1 - 3 varieties of m
interaction: We will be delighted to know our guests and we will always be available to give information, advice and help in everything you need.
house_rules: The perfect guests: - Turn off the air conditioner / heater and lights before leaving the apartment. The environment and we thank you! - Make a conscious use of water to avoid waste. The environment and we thank you! - Respect the quiet hours, avoiding noise after 22h. - Respect the common areas of the building, avoiding noise. - Only smoke on the balcony / window. On the street there is no problem smoking, but the tobacco smoke adds smells difficult to eliminate from the apartment. - Put the trash in the public container in order to avoid unpleasant odors in the apartment. - Before checking out, check if the building's entrance doors are unlocked. - If notice any abnormalities in the apartment, let us know immediately. - Enjoy tremendously our city, Porto! Thank you for being one! The ORM team Check-in: from 16h Check-out: until 12h (We are flexible depending on availability and upon prior notice) Late Check-in (After 20h): additional fee of 15€. We do not accept pets to prevent serio

host.host_about:
Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Appartement très bien situé , tout est neuf dans l'appartement et très propre ! 
Igor nous a très bien conseillé malgré une arrivée très tardive , avec des adresses de Resto géniales ! Je recommande vraiment cet appartement , rien à redire !

One of the most proffesional airbnb hosts that we have had a pleasure of staying with.

Place was ultra clean, with excellent location. Apartment was fully equipped, clean, and everything was brand new. 

We would recommend ORM to everyone.

Regards,

Hi you guys at ORM

We are very happy we got to stay in your appartment. We were very pleased by the interior. Like Lander said before, the designers are really talented. We also liked that there were a lot of tools, glasses, bowls and plates available in the kitchen. The city was very charming but lively and full of activities at the same time. Our location in it was just terrific. In the morning and at sunset the view from our windows was a great surplus too. If we wanted to cool down on a hot day or just rest for a while the walk back was never long and that made every day very comfortable. The couch was nice and for sure big enough. The floor in the bathroom was probably our favorite part. 
We would and will advice the city and your rental properties to our friends and family.

A few minor point of feedback we think will help you to improve the place are the following:

The toilet seat lit fell of after a few days with no particular reason and the bottom part was very loose aswell. Secondly you should take a look at the middle window because the fixing part of the blinds was loose at the bottom. 
Furthermore the drain of the shower was clogged. We pulled out some hair, maybe of the people that were there before us.
Lastly the power shut down when we wanted to use the waterboiler and more than one heating plate at the same time while cooking. This wasn't a big deal because it was easy to acces the fuse box but we figured it would be helpful to bring you up to speed. 

We hope our feedback will be useful!  
Kind regards
Lander & Annelie

Nous avons été très bien accueillis, le logement est très bien situé, équipė correctement, par contre il faut savoir qu'actuellement il y a de gros travaux dans la rue, le groupe électrogène de la grue est sous les fenêtres, l'appartement est difficilement pratiquable de 9h a 12h et de 14h a 18h, du fait du bruit 
Sinon tip top !!!!

Logement vraiment agréable, dans un quartier bien situé pour visiter Porto à pieds.
Equipement adapté et apparemment lumineux

Liebe Rose, wir haben eine wunderbare Zeit im Apartment Cativo verbracht. Das Apartment ist sehr schön eingerichtet und war super sauber. Sehr schön ist der Blick aus den Fenstern über den Dächern von Porto. Alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten haben sich in unmittelbarer Nähe befunden und es war toll von hier aus die Stadt zu entdecken. Das Apartment und die Agentur ORM können wir nur sehr empfehlen. Sehr gut...! Vielen Dank für Alles und bis auf ein Wiedersehen. Ulrike und Josef, Deutschland.

O espaço renovado e moderno, bem localizado no centro da cidade, tinhamos tudo a volta. Infelizmente o espaço para estacionamento é mais dificil próximo do apartamento, mas como já conheciamos a cidade, encontramos com mais facilidade um lugar ideal.
O ambiente é calmo e traquilo, faltava só um aquecedor pois a casa estava gelada....

Hote très professionnel, très bon accueil, l'appartement est très bien situé pour découvrir Porto a pied sans etre obligé d'utiliser les transports en commun. 
L'appartement est tout neuf, très propre, bien équipé. Les espaces sont très agréables et fonctionnels.
2 (tout petits) bémols: (i) la salle de bain ne dispose pas de VMC. Pas grave, mais il faut bien l'aérer après utilisation. (ii) lors de notre séjour, le chantier (un peu bruyant) dans l'immeuble voisin commençait à 9h. Cela ne dépend évidemment pas des hôtes mais nous aurions apprécier d'être prévenus.
bon séjour a tous!!

Merci à ORM pour ce beau séjour passé à Porto!  L'appartement est fidèle aux photos, neuf, moderne et cosy. La localisation est parfaite :  tout peut se faire à pied !  L'équipe est super sympa, avenante et réactive que ce soit avant (dépot de bagages anticipé) ou après la réservation !  À l'arrivée Bruno nous attendait. Il nous a indiqué sur un plan les sites à visiter et nous a conseillé des restaurants ou des bars !  Super !

Insgesamt ein schöner Aufenthalt, wenn auch die Ankunft etwas erschwert, da die angegebene Telefonnummern nicht gestimmt hat. Im Oktober kann es in Porto etwas kühl werden, daher war der eine Heizstrahler etwas wenig. Besonders in der ersten Nacht.  Ansonsten top Lage, modern ausgestattet und alles vorhanden.

El apartamento es ideal, está ubicado en el sitio perfecto para recorrer todo el centro caminando. Tiene los principales puntos turísticos alrededor. El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, acogedor y minimalista. Caben a la perfección cuatro personas aunque en este caso nos alojamos dos. Está equipado con todo lo que puedas necesitar: utensilios de cocina, tostadora, lavaplatos, ollas, cafetera... En el baño incluso hay secador de pelo. Se puede apreciar que en ORM se preocupan de los detalles ya que en la cocina podías encontrar café, té y azúcar y las sábanas y las toallas van etiquetadas con su logo, detalle que en sí no es importante pero que dota al apartamento de un toque más 'hotelero'. Por poner algún pero, y de cara a que los próximos inquilinos no tengan ningún problema, diré que las dos tapas del wc estaban sueltas y resultaba incómodo de utilizar (sobre todo siendo mujer). En resumidas cuentas, volvería a alojarme en este apartamento y lo recomendaré a mis amigos.
El apartamento nos encantó, muy buena zona, cerca de todo y el recibimiento genial! Sin duda repetiría!
Todo genial. Apartamento muy bien equipado y céntrico, ideal para conocer todas las partes de la ciudad a pie.

Zona muito central para a descoberta da cidade do Porto e junto de vários transportes. O apartamento muito agradável e que corresponde na totalidade ao apresentado nas fotos e na descrição. O anfitrião foi muito gentil e forneceu informações e dicas importantes para a nossa visita, com referência a locais a visitar e sugestão de alguns restaurantes.
Foram três dias excelentes que para além da cidade extraordinária foram brindados com a estadia num excelente e confortável apartamento. 
Apesar de existirem obras no prédio ao lado não nos sentimos incomodados com isso.

El apartamento es muy, muy nuevo, precioso, bien amueblado con todos los servicios, super bien ubicado y toda la gente de ORM (anfitrión) son encantandores.

El único pero es que el primer día de nuestra estancia pasamos bastante frio porque la calefacción se encendió el mismo día de nuestra llegada y ese fue el error. Debe hacerse el día de antes.

Se lo comunicamos a ORM (tania) y desde el primer momento estuvieron atentos e intentaron ayudarnos.

La experiencia la valoramos de 9/10 por el este problema de la calefacción porque sino sería de 10. Volveremos sin duda la proxima vez.

O apartamento corresponde às fotos, é moderno, limpo e bem equipado. Está numa ótima localização!
Foi dificil perceber qual o andar para onde tocar para o apartamento, uma vez que nao existe identificação. Aluguei o apartamento em dezembro e achei o muito frio, apesar dos dois aquecedores. O quadro eléctrico disparava sempre que tínhamos o aquecimento ligado + outro equipamento o que dificultava o aquecimento.
집 넓고 깨끗하고 좋아요 위치도 상벤투역 근처라서 좋구요. 체크인할 때 만났던 브루노는 아주 친절했습니다. :)

A ORM foi-me aconselhada por um amigo e desde o primeiro contacto estabelecido com os membros da equipa tudo correu lindamente. A disponibilidade, simpatia e amabilidade da equipa fizeram com que a nossa chegada e estadia corresse lindamente. O apartamento correspondeu inteiramente às expectativas, uma vez que as fotografias fizeram jus ao espaço. Tudo impecável, desde a limpeza, aos equipamentos e serviços disponibilizados. Ficámos muito satisfeitas e recomendamos este apartamento e a equipa ORM a todos aqueles que queiram visitar o Porto.
Agradecemos a vossa simpatia e empenho para que tudo corresse bem.
Voltaremos de certeza a utilizar os vossos serviços! 
Joana Zino

Aconselho este apartamento a todos os futuros viajantes pela cidade do porto. 
Sou arquitecta e por isso procuro sempre espaços que me cativem e me acolham da melhor maneira, e este foi sem dúvida um deles - a decoração clean e coerente entre todos os espaços, desde o momento de entrada no edifício até a todo o interior do apartamento em si. 
Apesar de estar a chover e algum frio, o ambiente do apartamento estava muito temperado e convidativo. 

Tudo isto é possível com uma equipa como os ORM, disponíveis e profissionais. 

Aconselho a todos esta equipa! 

Boas estadias.

We had a wonderful time in Porto- it's a magical city! The apartment is in a great location, walkable from the train station but not too close for comfort; the bridge, the cathedral and the bustling riverfront area are all a pleasant and short walking distance away. The flat is well-furnished and comfortable, with a good people-watching view from the big picture windows. We would definitely stay here again, and look forward to coming back to Porto soon!

Das Appartment war und ist für jegliche Urlaube, Städtetrips oder sonstige Aufenthalte perfekt und unbedingt weiter zu empfehlen. Die Lage ist ausgezeichnet. 
Bahnhof, Hafen, sightseeing hotspots, Cafe´s und Restaurants sind fußläufig zu erreichen.
Das Einchecken sowie Auschecken verlief reibungslos und der Kontakt zum Anbieter "ORM" war super.

Great place to stay in Porto. Walkable to all sightseeing places. The staff have been very helpful and attended to our need throughout. The apartment is newly refurbished  and well designed. The beds were comfortable. We had a good time there.

This apartment feels like home a real one. We stayed two nights and we really enjoyed. Just a short walk from Sao Bento station and so many other attractions. And the best part is that not only the apartment is clean but has a great design inside. I strongly recommend it.
Light and fresh apartment.

ORM har leveret en super service under vores tur til Porto. Da vi ankom til lufthavnen kontaktede vi værten som var super nem at få fat i, som kunne informere os at de ventede på vores ankomst i lejligheden. Da vi ankom til lejligheden blev vi mødt af en imødekommende vært der introducerede os til faciliteterne i lejligheden. Selve lejligheden var flot indrettet og ren, det eneste vi manglede var en proptrækker, hvilket kan undre en i et land som portugal.
Lejligheden ligger centralt i gå afstand til de fleste ting i Porto og broen til den anden side af douro floden ligger næsten rundt om hjørnet.

Vi vil klart anbefale et ophold i lejligheden der føles som et rigtigt home away from home.

Tusind tak for en god service og et dejligt ORM!
Apartamento increíblemente bonito y acogedor! Muy céntrico, en el meollo de Oporto, genial para disfrutar de la ciudad. Si volvemos a Oporto, repetiremos seguro. Trato excepcional!

La estancia ha sido muy agradable. El apartamento es muy nuevo y de diseño. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días de vacaciones y lo encontramos muy limpio. Bruno fue encantador a nuestra llegada, ubicándonos con mapa, sightseeings y muchas recomendaciones. Como puntos negativos, la tapa del WC está totalmente rota, cosa muy incómoda sobretodo para las chicas, que nos sentamos siempre. De no ser por ese fallo, ¡muy recomendable!
The apartment was exactly as you can see in the photos. It is in a perfect location to visit the city. They welcomed us with the smile and very kindly. I absolutely recommend it!

The apartment is in a perfect location, in a quiet road, but easy to walk anywhere in the Ribeiro, with plenty of restaurants and bars close by. Bright, spacious, well appointed and clean. Our checkin host was waiting to greet us and show us around the apartment. He also took time to recommend plenty of local sights and some of his favourite restaurants. We absolutely loved staying here, and the amazing city of Porto.

Recommendation! The apartment is very nice, modern, new, clean, comfortable and well equipped. It is exactly as you can see in the photos.

Our host was also very friendly, gave us many helpful tips and the communication was very good and quick.

The location is great, too. No need for a car or even metro. Most things are within walking distance of 2-10 minutes. There are also mini-markets just 10 m away, which is very convenient.

If we visit the lovely city of Porto again, we would be happy to stay at this apartment again.
우연히 발견하고 예약하였던 곳인데 생각보다 훨씬 좋았습니다. 중심지와도 가깝고, 호스트와의 커뮤니케이션도 매우 신속 정확하였습니다. 룸 상태 또한 깔끔하고 잘 정리되어있었습니다. 다음번에 방문한다면 또 머물고 싶습니다.

This is a stunning apartment in the heart of Porto. Nice, modern décor with all the amenities you need for a short break in the city.   The location is also great, with the apartment only a few minutes walk away from Dom Luís I bridge and the Cathedral.  It’s easy to walk to all the sights from here!  It’s also only a few minutes from the Sao Bento metro and train stations making it easy to reach the airport and explore outside the city.

The only negative during our stay was the significant noise disruption from the renovation work in the building next door. Noise from power tools would begin everyday at 08:00 and continue throughout the day until 18:00. ORM were very apologetic and did complain to the contractors.  They also kindly offered to move us to one of their other apartments. I’d recommend that guests ask ORM before booking to see if the renovation has finished.

Once those renovation works next door have finished this apartment will be perfect!

Notre séjour s'est très bien déroulé hormis des petits soucis de nuisance sonores dû à des touristes,voisins de palier, un peu trop bruyants à des heures tardives 3h du matin... Nous en avons référé à l'équipe d'ORM qui a géré le problème. 
L'appartement est très bien situé. Il est très bien agencé et équipé. La proximité de la gare nous a incité à visiter aussi BRAGA et GUIMARAES à une heure de train.

This place is within 10 minutes walking distant of almost everything you want to see in Porto. Especially after a night of drinking, the place is only about a 7 minute walk from the area with all the bars. It is cozy and suited us well for a short stay. For 2-3 people this place is perfect, clean, welcoming and everything that we expected. We really enjoyed our stay in Porto and the location and the comfort of the apartment really helped this.

위치는 구글지도를 통하여 따라가다보니 울퉁불퉁한 바닥인 골목길로 오느라 힘들었는데, 상벤투역에서 다리있는 방향으로 큰길따라 쭉 올라오면 조금 편한 인도로 오실 수 있어요. 생각보다 걸어서 다 갈 수 있는 길이었고, 근처에 작은 수퍼도 있어 생수나 음료는 그 곳에서 구입했어요. Alex는 정말 친절하게 안내해주었구요! 지도에 많은 곳을 표기해주며 설명해주었습니다. 옆 건물은 아직 공사중이긴 하지만 공사로 인한 소음은 잘 느끼지 못했구요. (오전부터 늦게까지 외출했었으니까요) 인부들이 앞에서 얘기하는 소리가 아침부터 좀 난다는 정도?? 건물 안부터 숙소안까지는 깔끔해서 좋았습니다. 다만 세탁기가 없었다는게 조금 아쉬웠구요. 전체적으로 깔끔허니 좋았습니다-!

Very beautiful appartment. We were recieved by a staff member Who gave us a lot of useful tips for visiting Porto. Orm also arranged our taxi from the airport and a boat tour on the river. Appartment was clean, nicely designed and comfortable. The shower was amazing! Hot and stong. Deffinatly recommend this appartment and ORM.

The apartment is huge, bright and clean; neighborhood is great; public transportation is so close. Support by the host is great and helpful.
Loved it!
非常细心的入住服务,步行去景点都非常方便,晚上很安静,房间布局合理 现代简洁又温馨,非常喜欢,下次还会选择

ORM 은 정말 친절합니다. 방의 실제 모습은 사진과 똑같아요. 집이 너무 맘에 들어서 이런집에서 살고 싶다는 생각도 들었어요. 깔끔하고 필요한 물건들도 다 있습니다. 상벤투역이랑도 가깝고 동루이스 다리랑도 가깝고 미니 프레코(슈퍼)도 10분 안쪽 거리에 있어서 위치가 정말 좋습니다. 동네도 엄청 안전해요. 메인 문 열때 엄청 고생 했는데 ㅋㅋ 문을 내 몸쪽으로 확 당긴채 열쇠를 왼쪽으로 살짝 30도 정도 돌려야 문이 열립니다. 저는 6월 22일까지 묵었는데 옆집은 아직도 공사 중이예요. 아침 8시부터 공사를 시작합니다. 집안에서 오래 휴식하실 분들이 아니라면 정말 정말 좋아요 ㅎ ORM 이랑 제휴 맺은 곳에서 도우루강 크루즈 50분 + offley 시음권 + porto cruz 시음권에 15유로 인데 offley 는 자체 영어 투어 있고 porto cruz 는 self 시음만 있는데 다른데들 보다 괜찮은거 같아요 ㅎ추천 !

Nous avons passé un séjour parfait dans cette appartement. À notre arrivée nous avons été reçu par une personne de Oporto. Il a pris beaucoup de son temps pour nous montrer tous les endroits intéressant et qui valent le coup, sur la carte. 
L'appartement est en plein centre et vraiment bien situé. Juste à côté du tram. 
L'appartement était propre. 
Rien à redire c'était parfait.

The apartment is located in a central part of the city. It is close to a metro station and you can access all of the city's attractions either on foot or by subway. The hosts were very friendly and willing to help me with anything. The area where the apartment is located is ideal for someone who wants to combine relaxation and holiday together. I recommend it unreservedly
The apartment is lovely and Alex gave us great tips and advice and help during our stay...thank you!!

Het was een top appartement op een top locatie, alles was binnen loopafstand. Het apparement was schoon, groot, mooi en cool. De communicatie met ORM verliep hee soepel en makkelijk. Zeker een aanrader!

We stayed there for 4 nights. The location was perfect and walking distance to every major sights in Porto. Pastelaria A Serrana a few meters away is great for breakfast and to begin the day. The appartment was great and well furnished. It was also very clean and full of light. A member of the ORM team provided usefull informations when we arrived. The only downside was the construction next door wich seems to be ending soon since they unassembled the scaffolding the day before we left early in the morning.

El apartamento está en perfecto estado y es muy bonito, tal como se ve en las fotos. La ubicación es muy buena y para 2 personas es perfecto. La agencia está en todo momento disponible y si tienes cualquier duda responden al momento. La persona que nos recibió nos recomendó además donde ir, comer, comprar etc...y nos fue muy bien. Hay que tener en cuenta que no hay lavadora.

Oporto Rental Management's place was truly a gem! Our stay with them was excellent: the place was tidy and very well located, everything was clean and recently renovated, and Alex, our host, provided wonderful recommendations and assistance throughout our stay. We would definitely stay again next time we're in Porto!

The house is nice, is located in an old building recently restored and is provided with everything you may need. It is very near to São Bento station and the center of the city, so the location is great. The street however is a bit noisy at night. The hosts have been very nice in every aspect of our stay. There was a problem with the toilet flush, but the hosts managed to repair it in a few days.

We spent there 2 weeks and are very satisfied. On the whole, we recommend the house.
Nice place

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour dans cet appartement récemment refait. Alex nous  a accueilli avec sa gentillesse et nous à présenter les incontournables de Porto, et le tout en français. Il nous a été proposé également la livraison du petit déjeuné, tout arrive à l'heure voulue (café, croissant, pain, jus d'orange). Une bonne idée.
Au final, nous recommandons cet appartement et cette agence ORM pour son sérieux et professionnalisme.

Nuestra estancia en este bonito apartamento no podría haber sido mejor. Tanto desde nuestra llegada como a nuestra salida el personal se ha mostrado increíblemente amable y atento. 
El apartamento en sí, es tal y como se ve en las fotografías: bonito, de tamaño medio y limpio. Está ubicado en pleno centro histórico de la ciudad,ñ y se tiene la ribera y el puente Luis I a 5 minutos a pie.
Muy recomendable.

We had a really good time in ORM‘s apartment during our stay in Porto. We were welcomed when we first arrived and got offered several services (taxi from the airport, optional breakfast, arrival basket, etc.) 
The apartment was clean and equipped with everything you need. It is located between Porto Cathedral and Batalha Square and you reach São Bento (train station, metro) within a few walking minutes. All in all it’s very close to the city center and to several shops, cafés, etc. You can reach everything by foot easily and don’t need to take the metro when exploring the city. 
The booking procedure and contact with ORM ran smoothly, they were always available for our question and replied quickly. 
We would recommend this apartment and would definetly book it again.

My husband and I loved our stay here. The apartment itself was clean, with a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious bathroom with shampoo and shower gel provided. The bed was super comfortable and we loved the simple but chic decor. Location is also fantastic. A short walk to Sao Bento train station, the cathedral, Dom Luis bridge, and really most sites. Not to mention great food and shopping all within mostly a 10 minute walking distance. Communication before our trip was quick and thorough, and we were greeted at check-in by Bruno who was very helpful and gave us an overview of the city as well as his own recommendations for what to see and eat. Would stay here again and definitely recommend to others!

This is a great space, lots of light and air. It is only 5 mins walk from Sao Bento station and handy to everything. Plenty of cafes, restaurants etc around within a few minutes. It has everything you need for a great stay in Porto. They had arranged a taxi to pick me up from the airport which was great and the breakfasts delivered every morning were also wonderful.
L'appartement correspond exactement à sa description. Il est situé au centre du Porto historique et à distance de marche de tous les édifices. La literie est très confortable.

we have welcomed by Bruno, a pleasant and smiling man. he took time to explain us all the details of the flat and to comment the town, the main points to see and the places to eat, the stops to have a drink in typical ambiance. About the flat, it is realy near of the beating center of the town. about 10 minutes from the Rua Ste Catherine, 5 min from the square that is “the place to be” at the end of the day, 1 min of the Cathedral and the Rua das flores. well equipped and bright this appartment is confortable and very clean. To recommend to friends.

Très bel appartement pour séjourner plusieurs jours, il est lumineux, moderne, bien équipé et situé dans une résidence toute neuve (les photos reflètent bien la réalité). 
L'équipe ORM est très réactive. Le jour de notre arrivée nous avons reçu un accueil chaleureux de la part de Alex qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer les bonnes adresses de la ville.
Nous avons été ravis de séjourner dans cet appartement bien situé pour découvrir la jolie ville de Porto.

숙소가 정말 깨끗하고 좋아요! 위치는 상벤투역에서 조금만 걸으면 금방이고, 다리도 5분 내로 갈 수 있어요. 포르투 자체가 작아서 걸어다니기 좋지만 그중에서도 여기 위치는 정말 좋아요. 숙소는 인테리어도 예쁘고 요리하는데에 문제 없었어요. 포르투에 5박예정이었는데, 숙소도 정말 좋다보니까 하루 더 늘렸어요. 에어비앤비 처음 써보는데 여기 정말 좋습니다 충성충성^^7 아 다만 쇼핑거리로 나가는 길이 두 곳이 있는데 왼쪽으로 가는 길은 해가 지면 조금 무서웠어요ㅠ 근데 오른쪽으로 가면 괜찮아요ㅎㅎ
Trato excelente y la ubicación inmejorable
ORM was very kind. It was a wonderful apartment. The apartment was clean and spacious than the photo. The location is also close to the station. Everything is perfect!

O apartamento corresponde às fotos apresentadas. O check-in foi tranquilo e a comunicação com o Alex foi muito fácil e directa. O apartamento tem tudo o que é necessário para umas férias confortáveis. Está localizado no centro, junto à Batalha e uns 2 minutos a pé da ribeira e da Ponte D. Luís. Voltarei e irei recomendar.
Gostei muito do apartamento, era muito bonito. Quando voltar ao Porto irei certamente alugar o mesmo apartamento. As pessoas que trabalhavam para a empresa eram super simpáticas.
Nous avons passé un superbe séjour dans cet appartement ! Très agréable à vivre et chaleureux accueil d'ORM. Je recommande!!

Ubicación perfecta para un apartamento inmejorable. 
Muy buen trato y disponibilidad total por parte de los dueños. 
Totalmente recomendable.
Un alojamiento 100% recomendable, ideal para parejas, cuidando todo tipo de detalles, limpio, bonito y muy bien situado. Para poder ir a pie a cualquier punto turístico de Oporto.

Superbe appartement extrêmement bien placé. Bâtiment ancien complètement rénové. Accueil chaleureux et personnalisé, treees apprécié. Nous recommmandons vivement cet appartement à ceux qui veulent explorer Porto à pieds ! Très belle vue de l appartement aussi et beaucoup de goût dans le design intérieur, c est vraiment agréable d y passer du temps ! 
Enfin, la literie est excellente et permet un vrai repos
Réparateur après de belles journées d exploration de la ville. Bref, coup de cœur assure !!!

first of all, recommend ORM to all who travels to Porto.

We stayed for 2 nights and the place was clean, tidy and well located in the town.   near S.Bento train station(3minutes walk) and the beautiful bridge. and also near a very good restaurant which named tapabento, we had have two dinner there, restaurant needs reservation.

communicated well with ORM, and they gave us local tips about restaurant and sights.  we checked out at 12.00, but they let us left our baggage to 15.00 (we had our flight on 17.00) it was very kind. 

anyway, had a good time in Porto.

I had a great experience in ORM's apartment. The whole team are young, friendly and professional. The apartment is bright and clean, also very near to the city centre and metro station
Porto is a beautiful city, and ORM is a great team. Highly recommend!

Excelente apartamento, muito bem localizado (gostamos particularmente da proximidade à ponte d.luis e ao funicular), tem o tamanho ideal para passar uns dias a visitar o Porto. A recepção foi cinco estrelas e o escritório é muito perto, sendo que estão disponíveis sempre para qualquer questão. Foram super receptivos também com a nossa cadelinha. Nada de mau a apontar, foi uma estadia 5 estrelas.

The apartment is very modern and well equiped.
It is very close to the center of Porto.
A nice guy showed us the map of Porto and adviced us of what we had to visit in Porto.  His advice were very trustful. 
The company proposed extra service for food but we thought that it was a bit expensive because it was less expensive to eat in restaurants (even for breakfast). 
We recommand this apartment with no hesitation !
Great location and a very nice building renovation. Good space and communication during check in and check out. Everything was easy.

Thank you for the great tips and the friendly apartment tour. The apartment was perfect for a few days in Porto. It was located in the centre. All the attraction were within walking distance. Just an advice for future guests: if you have a light sleep, don't forget earplugs :-) I really appreciated the great and outstanding quick communication!
Sin duda cumple lo que promete. Gran comunicación y perfecto para escapada de unos días. Los anfitriones siempre atentos y ayudan en cualquier cosa que puedas necesitar.

Good location. Walking distance to most sightseeing places but yet away from all the buzz. 
The place was clean and well designed, simple yet stylish. The host was very nice and offered many suggestions.

Excellent apartment! Well furnished, with all facilities you need:) Thanks of sofa in living room suitable also for two companions of trip, not only for couples;) Very clean, in perfect location- just a few minutes walikng from Sao Bento Central Station and Se do Porto (Cathedral). People from ORM Team extremly nice:) allways helpful and very good english speaking.They helped us with our plane check-in and printed our board cards. 
And Porto- even with bad weather- amazing:)
I truly recommend it :) !!!
Alojamiento y ubicación perfectos, mejor imposible. Muy atentos y siempre dando respuesta rápida. Sin duda repetiremos!!!

Situé à deux pas du pont Luis I (tablier supérieur que vous pouvez emprunter à pied) et de la gare Sao Bento (train et métro), cet appartement, propre et spacieux, a répondu entièrement à nos attentes. Hôte à notre écoute et attentionné, se tiens à notre disposition si besoin. De ce lieu nous avons visité tout Porto à pied (pensez aux baskets car ça monte et ça descend). Le plus : vue dégagée des trois fenêtres de l’appartement ce qui est appréciable, bonne luminosité et aucun vis à vis direct.  
Aucune hésitation à avoir pour réserver.

Great communication, punctuality, beautiful apartment - these are the three basic advantages of this apartment and the team that manages the apartment. It is extremely tastefully and functionally furnished. We lived well, although I must mention the only drawback. If you want to relax (in the literal sense of the word), maybe you should choose another apartment from the ORM offer in a different location. Unfortunately, there is a pub on the ground floor of the neighboring building, and just below the window - a small square, where people party all night long, effectively preventing a good night's sleep. But if you want to party up to 3 in the morning or you're able to fall asleep amid the loud noises from the street - you will not find a better place in Porto; the flat looks exactly like in the pictures or even better :)
Very central studio apartment , perfect for a couple visiting. It is few minutes from the central train station and most sights in the city. Our host gave some helpful tips once we arrived.

The apartment is greatly located and has everything you need! It's managed by an agency. It is really comfortable for a couple.
We also really enjoyed the good tips and advice for Alex!
I recommend this place!
Ideales Appartement, um Porto zu erkunden. Alles zu Fuß zu erreichen.  Sehr freundlicher und unkomplizierter Empfang.
The apartment  was super clean, modern and close to everything! It was also super spacious and Alex was very helpful in giving us great places to see and eat! We enjoyed our stay very much!
Really good place. It’s clean and cosy. The location is perfect to visit the city.

Apartment is just as depicted in the pictures, very clean and comfortable. Check in/out very easy. Location is very central, close to metro and very walkable to points of interest around Porto. Highly recommended.

Die Wohnung war einfach fantastisch! Sie war super ausgestattet und hat einfach eine perfekte Lage um die Stadt zu erkunden. Wir hätten uns unseren Urlaub in Porto nicht besser vorstellen können. 
Auch der Check In hat super funktioniert. Da unser Flugzeug erst 23:30 Uhr gelandet ist kamen wir erst sehr spät am Apartement an. Aber wir wurden herzlich begrüßt und bekamen einige Tipps bezüglich der Stadt.
Alles in Allem ist die Wohnung unbedingt weiterzuempfehlen. Wir kommen gerne wieder!!

We had a great time at Porto, last but not least beacause of our nice apartement. Alex gave us a warm welcome with a lot of recommendations. The place is nicely decorated and includes all the useful stuff to prepare yourself a nice meal. Location is great for exploring the city.

Dear ORT-Team

They stay at your place was an amazing experience!
Great location and wonderfully and tastefully renovated apartment!!
Thanks also to recieve us so well eventhough we arrived late (2am) and all your tips! Great and helpful team..

Abraço
Cláudia e Fabian
L’appartamento è bellissimo e dispone di tutto quello che serve. Inoltre la posizione centrale ci ha permesso di arrivare ovunque senza dover prendere i mezzi. Lo consiglio vivamente.

SIMPLEMENTE GENIAL!!! 

Alex nos recibió en el apartamento en cuanto llegamos! Muy amable, nos había preparado un mapa con varias indicaciones y lugares de interés. Nos fue genial ya que habíamos planeado poco el viaje. 

El apartamento muy limpio, la decoración moderna, tal y como sale en las fotos. No hay ascensor pero no fue ningún problema para nosotros ya que no son muchas escaleras. 

La zona es perfecta, muy céntrico, no tuvimos que coger transporte público prácticamente. 
Alex nos recomendó ir a las zonas de playa fuera de Oporto (Matosinhos y Madalena), la verdad es que fue una gran idea, cogimos bicis y tuvimos un agradable paseo. 

Si volvemos a Oporto sin dudarlo volveremos aquí! Gracias Alex por tu atención y trato EXCELENTES
Best place to visit Porto. Everything is at walking distance and they helped us find the best restaurants/attractions. Definitely recommend + the appartment is awesome!!

Great, modern apartment very close to restaurants, shops and attractions. Everything was walkable and we loved the neighbourhood. The staff were also super friendly and gave us a great bunch of tips for sights and restaurants on a map upon check in.
The apartment was very clean and a modern, spacious design.
We had to change our dates when we arrived and the staff were very understanding and allowed us a full refund for the days we left early which we were very grateful for. We couldn’t fault them. We had an amazing stay and would recommend this apartment to anyone coming to Porto!
Appartement ultra bien situé face à une fontaine. Pas de vis à vis ce qui est rare à porto. Très design et propre. bien aménagé au calme.

Una buena opción de alojamiento si vas a Oporto. El apartamento está bien ubicado y cumple con las expectativas. 
Si vas en coche tienes el parking Batalha cerca a un buen precio (10€/día).

I had an excellent stay with ORM! Porto is such a great city and this apartment is located right by the city center and historic train station. It is also located very close to the bridge over to Gaia. This made getting to the wine cellars and the beautiful view and restaurants by the water quick and easy. 

When I checked in Filipa showed me the place and walked me through all the restaurants and food I should try. I’ve found the food in Portugal to be very hit or miss, but the places she recommended were excellent! She clearly knew the local spots and it was the best food I had on my trip. She also gave me recommendations for things to see and do. ORM offers a special 15€ deal that includes a Port tasting and a boat ride on the water. This was a great deal and a very fun excursion for my friends and I.

The apartment was very clean with modern amenities and a beautiful interior. The view was also quite nice.  They were quick to respond with questions and very helpful. Overall this Airbnb deserves a 5-star rating and I would definitely recommend staying here :)

This was a great apartment to stay in as it is centrally located and not far from bus and train stations. We were met promptly on arrival and shown the apartment. Local recommendations were shared/ proved to be good ones and we absolutely enjoyed staying there. If you prefer a local neighbourhood feel then this is the place (with the bonus of being able to walk everywhere.) Highly recommend this air bnb! A great find for Porto.
L'appartamento corrispondeva alle foto, posizione centrale anche se la via non era bellissima.

This was a great apartment in central Porto.  The location made it super easy to walk everywhere, the space was beautiful, spacious, clean, and stylish.  We were greeted by Alex who was super friendly and helpful, made sure we were comfortable, and gave us great recommendations for our stay.  Communication before our stay was great and super quick responses which made it very easy to plan our stay and make any arrangements we needed.  Would definitely stay here again :)
Excelente estancia, muy buena comunicación. Piso muy bonito y muy bien ubicado. Cerca de todo. Muy recomendable
Very clean and in a great location.
El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, precioso, limpio y muy bien ubicado. Cerca de todos los puntos de interes. Ademas la comunicacion con ORM ha sido perfecta. Lo recomendamos 100%

My boyfriend and I loved staying here in Porto, and we were astounded how close we were to everything, the cathedral was literally 2 minutes down he road, the bridge was 5 mins, bars 7 mins, and main shopping streets were about 5 minutes too... definitely the highlight of our stay. We felt safe in the apartment and we loved the Nordic design, as well as all the recommendations that the team gave us when we arrived :) thank you very much

This apartment has a cool circular layout and has everything you need for a short stay in Porto. It was clean and comfortable. Plus it is located in the old city, walking distance to many sights, shops and restaurants.
The location is great, it is at the center of all the key tour points!
상벤투역과 가까워요. 언덕이 조금 있으니 무거운 짐이 있다면 우버이용을 추천합니다. 관리자도 친절했으며 집이 넓고 매우 쾌적했어요. 다음에 포르투에 온다면 또 이용하고 싶은 곳입니다.

Beautiful, clean and stylish apartment! Great location and we got some awesome tips from our host when we arrived. 

Good place to explore Porto, with everything in walking distance! We had a great time.

Possibly one of the cleanest Airbnb I have ever stayed with, no strange smell, perfectly clean air. Location is very central, also easy to get to from the airport via public transport. Well designed apartment with great view. Shower is hot and comfortable. Check in is easy, will absolutely recommend.
Great location and the place was very clean. Bit noisier of a street that was difficult to sleep through though

❤️Porto est une ville extraordinaire et ORM à la hauteur de toute cette beauté! 
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié et aimé l’appartement! Bien insonorisé, lit confortable, eau chaude à profusion et plein de commodités pour cuisiner. Literie et serviettes blanches très propres! L’aménagement intérieur est fait avec goût et la lumière naturelle abondante! 
Vous serez à quelques pas derrière la gare, près du pont du marché et du métro ( São Bento)pour prendre votre vol de retour ou repartir pour l’aéroport.
En ce qui nous concerne Maria qui nous a accueillis a été des plus efficaces, nous pointant tous les centres d’intérêt historiques, restos hors circuits et lieux touristiques. Elle a répondu à toutes nos questions et nous a même transmis le courrier que nous attendions venant de notre pays.
Que de bons souvenirs de ORM qui n’a rien à voir avec certains hébergements où on ne fonctionne que par codes de façon anonyme! Leur service est très personnalisé!
ORM est un plus!  Le meilleur Air B&B que nous ayons trouvé depuis que nous sommes membres!

The place is immaculate and the hosts were more than hospitable. We had fast communication with ORM from the moment the place was booked until we left. They were willing to allow us to check in early, if planned in advance. When we arrived in Porto they provided us a couple of ideas for things to do while we waited for the apartment to be cleaned. Bruno met us at the apartment and provided a small tour of the very clean and modern space. Then sat with us, answered any questions we had about the city and our stay, and provided suggestions of things to do and see. He also marked them on a map. Everything is within reasonable walking distance from the apartment. The apartment itself is a quick 5 minute walk from the São Bento train station, so if arriving by train this is a bonus. When we checked out, ORM offered to let us leave our bags in the apartment while we explored the city and waited to go to the airport. Definitely recommend!
Very friendly atmosphere and nice place to stay
Prima ingericht zeer centraal gelegen appartement. Uitstekende plek om Porto te voet te ontdekken, echte aanrader!
The apartment was fantastic, definitely worth the price, the hosts were helpful, it was clean and had everything you needed. I recommend it to anyone traveling to Porto

위치도 내부도 너무 좋았어요!!
제일 맘에 드는 숙소였어요 강추합니다:-)

Estudio sencillo, diáfano, muy luminoso, práctico y limpio.
La ubicación es perfecta.
La ciudad estupenda.

El apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las imágenes. Nos recibieron de ORM muy amablemente a pesar de llegar tarde y nos recomendaron muchos sitios donde ir.
La ubicación es perfecta, en 1 minuto estás en la catedral; aunque la zona puede parecer algo insegura, porque hay edificios abandonados y un comedor social muy cerca, no hemos tenido ninguna mala experiencia.
Nos hemos sentido como en casa.

El estudio es practicamente inmejorable. Todo nuevo, limpio, con vistas, cerca de todo y perfectamente comunicado. La agencia nos recibió con amabilidad y nos aconsejaron qué hacer, cómo ir de un sitio a otro e incluso dónde comer. Nos dejaron botecitos de gel y champú, café y tés para las cuatro noches que pasamos allí. Pequeñito pero totalmente recomendable!
엘베없이 이층까지 손수 짐을 들어올려야 하는 것, 소음이 심한 것만 빼면 참 좋은 숙소입니다.

name: Spacious and Clean Get Away
summary: Well lit, private house that sleeps plenty, with space. Great for families. Full size eat-in kitchen with french doors to let in gorgeous natural light.  Central Air for air condition in hot months and heat during the winter. Three TVs, along with cable and wifi with strong connection. Landline, fax machine and desktop for leisure or even work purposes. There are plenty of outlets for charging mobile devices. 40 min bus to city, 25 min walk to beach
space: Outlets are accessible, no need to charge a mobile device across the room.  We have Xbox 360 with games, board games, cable tv and a desk top. French doors with natural light while you have lunch in a full size kitchen.
description: Well lit, private house that sleeps plenty, with space. Great for families. Full size eat-in kitchen with french doors to let in gorgeous natural light.  Central Air for air condition in hot months and heat during the winter. Three TVs, along with cable and wifi with strong connection. Landline, fax machine and desktop for leisure or even work purposes. There are plenty of outlets for charging mobile devices. 40 min bus to city, 25 min walk to beach Outlets are accessible, no need to charge a mobile device across the room.  We have Xbox 360 with games, board games, cable tv and a desk top. French doors with natural light while you have lunch in a full size kitchen. You'll have access to the entire house as well as yard with grill and garden. The house is 3 floors with plenty of space. I am only a call away if you need anything. Minutes away from the longest suspension bridge in the U.S, The Verrazano Bridge. The house is located close to not only Brooklyn but also Manhattan with bus, t
neighborhood_overview: Minutes away from the longest suspension bridge in the U.S, The Verrazano Bridge. The house is located close to not only Brooklyn but also Manhattan with bus, train and ferry options for transportation.
notes: The kitchen is well stocked with seasoning, spices and all the dishware, pots and pans that you need. It is also equipped with a dishwasher that is easy to use.
transit: Only 4 blocks away you'll find main buses to bring you to any destination.
access: You'll have access to the entire house as well as yard with grill and garden. The house is 3 floors with plenty of space.
interaction: I am only a call away if you need anything.
house_rules: - recycle garbage strict please take out garbage for pick up so other guest don't have your trash. - no events 500.00 charge for noncompliance NO Parties This is a quiet part of the world ,so please be respectful towards neighbors. - no moving furniture - no eating in basement, We don't charge fee for cleaning but if it is left too dirty and there would be 100.00 fee, No extra guest without consent

host.host_about: I am middle age . I worked as a registered nurse for 23 years . I love meeting new guest and people .

reviews.comments: Wonderful! This place makes me feel like home. Everything is here, parking, fastest internet.... We had good rest at this place. The host is really nice and considerate. Definitely recommend to my friends.
Maria is a wonderful host. The house is fully equipped with everything. We stayed 3 nights and we had a great time

Maria's home is beautiful and spacious! It is a clean home and accurate in description! The price is more than reasonable for the stay and number of people that the home can accommodate! We have rented three homes in NY and Maria's home is by far the best stay.
Maria is very accommodating! Our family attends the Macy's Day Parade annually and Marie made sure to provide us with information about meals and made sure to check in with us prior to our visit to allow us 
to ask any questions that we may have had! It is by far the best stay we have had in NY! I strongly recommend her home!!
Great place for the family. very clean and welcoming, it literally had everything we needed in the kitchen, rooms, washrooms etc.. it is definitely the better option than a hotel. Loved it!!

Staying at Maria's house was the best decision we made on that trip!! It comfortably accommodated our large group, it was amazingly clean and beautiful! We had 3 boys and they were in love with the den downstairs, playing video games at night. Maria literally had everything, from spare blankets, to menus of nearby restaurants, to extra heaters. I definitely recommend anyone this place!! Thank you Maria for making this trip a memorable experience for me and my family.

Maria went out of her way to take care of us. By far the best host we've ever had on Airbnb or VBRO. We were blown away with her generosity and thoughtfulness. Thank you for a wonderful experience in NYC!

Maria was really accommodating to our group's travel plans. She also had a binder full of useful information ranging from where to eat and how to get to our travel destination. The house is large and is also clean.

I couldn't have asked for a better vacation. This was the perfect home for me and my family...a beautiful home that was extremely well furnished, emmaculate, and our hosts were great! Maria went above and beyond to make our stay amazing!

Maria ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Das Haus war super und hat viel Platz geboten. Es war alles im Haus vorhanden. Unser Flieger hatte 2 Stunden Verspätung und wir sind spät abends angekommen, Maria hat schon auf uns gewartet mit Pizza und Limo. Der Garten ist wunderbar und mit sehr viel Liebe angelegt. Als wir ein Problem mit dem Grill hatten hat Maria innerhalb von 5 Minuten reagiert und Hilfe geschickt. Gerne wieder alles super.

Maria has a lovely home on s quiet street on Staten Island. Coming from Northern NY, access was simple. All needed amenities are provided in this clean and tidy home. Anything you do not have is a stone's throw away in a local grocery, bakery and restaurants. There is quick access to the Staten Island Ferry and Wadsworth Park at the base of the Verrazano Narrows bridge is just around the corner. Wonderful evenings were spent in the back yard grilling and relaxing with friends. Hope to return to Maria's home when plans bring us back to Staten Island.

This was our first time using Airbnb and it was a great experience. Maria’s place was nice convent and just what we needed coming to the Island for our sons graduation. We had 2 of our elderly parents and it was perfect for them. We will definitely rent again from her when we return to the city. I just loved all her personal touches she did for graduation ❤️

My sisters and I had a really good time.  The house was lovely with plenty of room.  The host, Maria, left us a gorgeous center piece in the dining room of fresh flowers, giving it a special touch.  She told us that we had access to everything in the house, which was nice to know.  It was like being home away from home.  The outside deck was really nice, even though I did not get a chance to enjoy it.  We basically were in and out, enjoying NYC.  Again, thank you Maria for everything.

Maria was very hospitable and greeted us when we arrived with snacks and a warm welcome. That was very much appreciated. We had a nice, comfortable stay and really appreciated the quick communication and large home for our whole family to stay in. I would definitely recommend to other large families or groups looking to stay local to NY.

Me and my family came to visit some family in NY and I'm so glad we chose Maria's beautiful home to stay in. She was very welcoming, the house was clean and located in a quiet side of town. You have access to the whole house and she has a book of helpful information about the area. Me and my family really enjoyed the backyard. I highly recommend her home.

Great place to stay in Staten Island. Plenty of room for larger families, close to shopping and restaurants, easy access to the city. Best feature was the fenced in backyard area with patio tables, benches, wonderful landscaping...just a gorgeous area to relax in and enjoy the weather. Maria is an excellent host who goes above and beyond to make sure her guests have a pleasant stay. She added some personal touches for our stay as well which made the house seem more homey. We had a great experience and would definitely stay here in the future!!
The house was immaculate and comfortable.  Maria was exceptionally thoughtful and helpful.  There is a great back yard and lots of room in the house.  This was a perfect find for us!

Maria was extremely nice and very welcoming. The house was very spacious, and she added personal touches. We loved the patio area. We traveled by ferry every morning and night. This provided beautiful sites of the Statue of Liberty and Lower Manhattan. The commute takes about an hour from the house to actual Manhattan.

These accommodations were simply perfect.  A wonderful home, bright, clean, with all the amenities and well-situated for Staten Island.  Access to walkable restaurants and groceries.  basement tv room was fabulous.

Host was very responsive, answered questions quickly and was all-around a pleasure to work with... I can’t say enough good things about our experience, and honestly can’t think of anything I would change.  Enjoy!!

Host

name: HOUSE WITH GARDEN AND SWIMMING-POOL
summary: 3 bedrooms, 3 couple beds, 2 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen. Sheets and towels included. Barbecue. Shared swimming pool.  3 quartos, 3 camas de casal, 2 casas de banho, cozinha totalmente equipada. Inclui lençóis e toalhas.  Churrasqueira. Acesso a Piscina no Jardim dos Proprietários.
