reviews.comments:
Buena experiencia, un sitio tranquilo, cómodo y bastante grande. El único problema es que la piscina estaba al otro lado de la finca, no al lado de la casa. 
La aconsejo

Sikke en fantastisk velkomst vi fik. Vi fik introduktion til huset, haven og poolområdet af ejeren. Det er et hus med en historie, hvor huset tilhører en gammel vingård. Huset er autentisk trods nænsom restaurering - det klassiske udtryk er bevaret - alligevel med moderne faciliteter. Det var helt over vores forventninger.
Man går gennem en lille lund tilhørende ejendommen på vej til poolen - en oplevelse i sig selv.
Poolen er næsten en lige så stor oplevelse som huset. Med klar varm vand og med en størrelse, der gør det muligt at få en reel svømmetur.
Vi siger stor tak til Mathilde og familien for den store graciøsitet, hvor vi følte os meget velkomne og havde en rigtig dejlig ferie.

Nous avons passé 3 jours dans ce fantastique logement, nous en gardons un très bon souvenir.
Nous avons été accueilli chaleureusement, malgré notre retard de près d'une heure !... Le logement est très agréable et le site très calme. Nous avons notamment beaucoup apprécié la cour fermée, la piscine, le barbecue, le verger et ses prunes succulentes !
Acceuil  très agréable, descriptif du logement très réel ;  tout le confort dans cette maison très typique et très calme.

Une vieille maison très bien rénovée avec beaucoup de charme. Très belle piscine, très propre. Tiago a tout fait pour rendre notre séjour le plus agréable possible.
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.

Uma semana fantástica passada num ambiente bucólico.
Ares frescos e uma paisagem idílica.
Um conjunto de qualidades que nos trarão óptimas memórias.
Obrigado à Matilde e família pelo acolhimento, disponibilidade e simpatia.

Accueil formidable, avec boisson fraîche et gâteaux.
Superbe maison et jardin avec une grande piscine très propre, c'est un endroit rêvé, excellent séjour en famille
Demeure magnifique  et l'environnement est très beau , Mathilde et Tiago sont très gentil , je recommande ++++++

The house is very well renovated and contains everything needed for a comfortable stay. It corresponds well to the description, but we were surprised that there was no separation between the two sleeping areas on the lower level. We did ask about sleeping facilities before booking, so something definitely got lost in translation. That said, this did not detract from us having a very pleasant stay. This location is excellent for those wishing to "do Portugal", since within 90 minutes (by car) one can be in Viana do Castelo, Braga, Guimaraes, Vila Real, Porto, Viseu and Coimbra, to name but a few places to visit. Finally, many thanks to Tiago who came to our rescue when we got lost in Vale de Cambra upon arrival.
The host canceled this reservation 173 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay and rural experience at  Matilde and Thiagos house. They made us feel very welcome! At first we thought that the pool was to far from the mainhouse but it turned out that we enjoyed the short walk through a beautiful forest and the fact that there is both lovely barbecue and toiley facilities means you Can stay by the pool in the natural surroundings a whole day. We definately recommend!

We had a wonderful stay at the house! The house is fully equipped for a stay with the family. It is a quiet location in a village environment. However, it was very easy to also visit the coast and Porto!

un havre de paix 
si vous recherchez le calme l'authentique et la serenité la casa dos namorados 
la maison des amoureux est pour vous 
nous avons passé une semaine merveilleuse chez Mathilde et Tiago 
idéalement situé entre Porto et Aveiro cette maison est un havre de paix ou il, fait bon vivre et tiago fait tout pour que le séjour soit parfait
une excellente semaine 
nous recommandons pour une famille ou un couple

Tivemos a necessidade inesperada de uma estadia na cidade e o Tiago conduziu o processo de forma rápida e eficiente, possibilitando nossa entrada imediata no apartamento. Além disso, foi super atencioso e prestativo com nossas demandas. O apartamento é confortável, limpo e bem equipado. Nota 10

Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour chez Thiago, super accueil !! Belle maison en pierre, endroit très calme et reposant. Petite promenade agréable en forêt pour aller à la piscine !! Nous reviendrons..

la casa dos namorados est un endroit authentique à la décoration soignée. le gite est bien aménagé,  il ne manque rien. le petit plus : le tes de chaussée avec ses 4 couchages est indépendant de 1er étage donc avec des ados c'est bien bien car ils ont un peu d'indépendance.  Tiago est un hote très prévenant et discret.

A very nice and authentic place to stay and get some rest. the house if fully equipped an not far from shops, restaurants,... The host is also very friendly and can give nice tips in what you can do in the surrounding area. We certainly would come back if we could.
bonjour Tiago, merci pour votre accueil, nous avons passé de super vacances moi et ma famille, à refaire et à conseiller aux amis.
Tiago nous offre un lieu plein de charme où le calme et la beauté sont les points forts de cet endroit.

Très bien pour voyager à plusieurs. 
Les extérieurs sont juste à tomber... 
Les équipements dans l'ensemble étaient très bien et Tiago nous a extrêmement bien accueillis avec des présents très attentionnés.
Je recommande à 100%
Un lugar con encanto

name: Loft au centre-ville de Montréal
summary: Superbe loft au coeur de Montréal et de ses activités. Stationnement publique intérieur disponible à quelques mètres pour 20$ par jour ou 10$ apres 18h.
description: Superbe loft au coeur de Montréal et de ses activités. Stationnement publique intérieur disponible à quelques mètres pour 20$ par jour ou 10$ apres 18h.
house_rules: The building had a noise rule, people have to be quiet after 23h. No loud Music playing. No party. Check in usualy between 6-9pm.

host.host_about: originaire de la gaspésie, j'aime voyager, le sport et la musique

reviews.comments: Yves was a great host. He kept in near constant touch with me via airbnb and email before our stay, and during our stay was always reachable by cell. He has a beautiful apartment in a great part of the city. Yves was a great host as well. We had a great time talking with and getting to know him during our stay in Montreal. He gave us some great recommendations on places to go and things to do. The next time I visit Montreal, I hope I'll be lucky enough to stay with him again.

Yves and his friend Nadine were very hospitable.  Communication was spot on.  Upon arrival we were greeted with quality complementary chocolate , red wine, and OJ. The apartment was plenty large for my wife and I.  Location was very convenient as it was one block from the pics and food on st denis, but was also isolated from the late night noise. 

A nice benefit is roof access.  We had a nice brunch on the roof with some take out from one of the local cafes.

I would return again.

L'appartement d'Yves est super bien placé au coeur du quartiers des spectacles, il y a tout ce qu'il faut autour de chez lui pour profiter de Montreal de jour comme de nuit! Son accueil a été plus que chaleureux, un grand sourir, une super joie de vivre et de quoi faire un copieux petit dejeuner (pain de mie, fruits, jus, ferrero rocher...)!! Aller chez Yves c'est s'assurer un bon séjour à Montreal, en profitant d'un appart ou il y a une vie, après tout c'est ce qu'on aime chez airBnB!! Vous pouvez booker les yeux fermés!

Yves loft was exactly as he described it, it was clean, tidy, an spacious. He was kind enough to leave food, coffee, drinks, and snacks for us. His place has everything that we needed, and was located in a convienient spot. I would definitely recommend Yves and his loft, and I hope to rent it out again.

We had a great stay at Yves' flat.  We booked at the last minute and were unable to get there in time to meet Yves in person (he had a flight to catch), but his communication was excellent and we were able to get into his place with no problem.  The location was great - near the metro, walking distance of Old Montreal, Mont Royal, etc, tons of places to eat on Rue St. Denis and in the surrounding neighborhoods.  His flat itself was just as described and very clean. We would certainly stay again.

Both Yves and his loft were awesome! Met me at the loft, was very communicative. Left wine and chocolates, amongst toiletries and other things for my wife and I.

Fantastic location, about a 1 minute walk to Rue Saint-Denis, full of restaurants/bars and great nightlife. Parking is super easy, two cheap garages in walking distance.

L'expérience du loft de Yves commence à l'accueuil.  Yves est un hôte très sympatique et sait vous mettre en confiance dès votre arrivée, avec en bonus quelques grignotines, jus, café moulu et vin rouge. Venant moi-même de Montréal, le loft est stratégiquement positionné. Vous êtes à quelques minutes à pied de la station de métro Berri, centre de la ville et des rames de métro.  Vous êtes dans le quartier des spectacles, au coeur de la vie artistique et des terrasses, mais on n'entend aucun bruit malgré la proximité de la dynamique rue St-Denis. Le lit est très confortable, l'endroit TRÈS propre. Vous venez l'été? Ventilateurs et air climatisé garantissent une nuit fraîche.   Le building est très sécuritaire avec un système de clefs moderne avec code à la porte. En bonus il y a un petit café à la sortie de l'immeuble. Fatigué? Envie de voir un film? Le cinéma Quartier latin est à 20 mètres de votre porte.  J'ai enfin trouvé ma place de choix lors de mes visites à Montréal.   Simon D Scott

I booked the listing last minute on my way to Toronto from Halifax. Yves has made necessary arrangements  to have the keys delivered on a late check in 8pm( Thanks to his charming friend). Although I didn't get a chance to meet him , he welcomed me with chocolate , snacks , and a few drinks . His loft is  bright,spacious and clean; I was intrigued by the beautiful decors, cool artistic pieces and overall flow. I enjoyed the location , close to many book stores , music shops , restaurants , boutiques, transit. In brief , I didn't really have to go past 1km to find everything that I needed.
Yves is a superhost. I highly recommend his place.

Yves was a lovely host. He made arrangements for us to drop off our bags even though we arrived several hours before check-in, left snacks and drinks, and was overall very gracious during our stay. The place was perfectly clean, spacious, beautiful, and centrally located. It was extremely close to a number of bars and restaurants, as well as the metro and bus stations, not to mention a short walk from Old Port and the rest of downtown Montreal. We would highly recommend this location! Thank you for a wonderful weekend! Best, LeeAnne and Alina.
location is great and very nice apartment. highly recommended!

I would highly recommend staying at Yves's apartment. I was traveling in Montreal for the weekend with my girlfriend and Yves was a terrific host: he was very friendly and accommodating in terms of check-in and check-out time, he was very communicative before / during / after our stay, his place was clean and in a very fun area on rue St Denis and he even bought us some snacks & wine so we would feel at home.

Yves' places was as beautiful as the pictures and very centrally located! He is a gracious host who is very flexible and accommodating of your needs. We had an awesome time exploring Montreal! Also, his building has an amazing rooftop you can hang out on. Would highly recommend!

Awesome host.  Great place lots of style and close to restaurants and the village.  Rooftop patio to chill on and watch the sunrise and sunset.  If your a photographer or enthusiast it's worth the price of entry alone.  Merci Yves!
The host canceled this reservation 128 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

One of the best experience ever! 
Great location and Yves is super nice.
The house itself is very nice and comfortable.
Will contact him again if i need to stay again in Montreal, highly recommended.
Thanks for everything 
Filippo
Très bon hôte et séjour. Le loft est conforme aux photos et le quartier est idéal. Nous recommandons vraiment Yves.
Great location, nice loft. Exactly as described. Yves was very accommodating. Merci
Great stay in a perfect location. Just what is advertised! Thanks Yves!
Super apartement situé dans le quartier latin à 2 pas des restos et bars
Great location. Looks just like the pictures :)

While we never met Yves, we felt like we got to know him through his personality-filled apartment. It was beautiful and well equipped. He even left us milk and juice! There are good places to eat right out the door and a very affordable parking lot literally on the block. He was easy to communicate with as well. Would stay here again!

Yves has such a cool space -- sunny, comfortable, and, as many others have pointed out, extremely stylish. 

The location was perfect. Not only was there plenty to do in the neighborhood, but the apartment was very conveniently located with respect to public transit. 

We didn't meet Yves in person, but a neighbor very kindly let us into the apartment. Many thanks to both of them for a lovely stay!
Hip & cozy apartment, central to Montreal's Latin Quarter.  Comfortable & very clean, would recommend to family & friends, & would be glad to come back again.
Yves' place was as advertised and he was easy to contact and communicate with. Had a great experience and would visit again!
Host is very attentive. The place was perfect for our trip. The description is accurate, as are the pictures.

Very safe and cozy place with all the amenities! Yves is very friendly and easy to deal with. Great central location. Nightlife and restaurants right out the front door! It was perfect for the International Jazz Festival! Thanks!

This was my second airbnb experience, but my first for Montreal.  After years of doing hotels, I've decided to use Airbnb when I can.  I've heard great experiences and horrible experiences, so I was apprehensive once again.  I was so pleasantly surprised with Yves's place.  After a few hours of being in someone else living space, I felt very comfortable.  I didn't meet Yves, but check in and entry was very easy and convenient, which is what I need and want.  Great location..just minutes walk to one of the main transit stations.  Very cool location, and very clean, tidy and uncluttered loft with character.  Yves prepares for his guests, which was very welcoming and appreciated..... milk, juice, snacks, tea/coffee, essential toiletries, tourist/travel info, ....and for me wine.  For 4 days, I felt very comfortable in having my own personal space, which surpasses the hotel experience.  Thanks again, Yves

name: Private Room Couch close to Central Park
summary: My place is close to Museum of the City of New York and Central Park Conservatory Garden. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the location, and the people. There is amazing cuisine all around this neighborhood including Patsy's where Dean Martin and Frank Sinatra used to eat! There are small cafes as well as full on restaurants.  The subway is just blocks away which is great if you are planning on traveling around the island. I am offering up my couch to Female guests.
space: I am offering up my couch to Female guests.  Its an open space, wonderful light and has a fan.  The couch is very comfortable.  There is a closet in the room as well.
description: My place is close to Museum of the City of New York and Central Park Conservatory Garden. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the location, and the people. There is amazing cuisine all around this neighborhood including Patsy's where Dean Martin and Frank Sinatra used to eat! There are small cafes as well as full on restaurants.  The subway is just blocks away which is great if you are planning on traveling around the island. I am offering up my couch to Female guests. I am offering up my couch to Female guests.  Its an open space, wonderful light and has a fan.  The couch is very comfortable.  There is a closet in the room as well. The bathroom is down the hall, the kitchen is also open access.  We have 2 grocery stores within 2 blocks so you are welcome to buy any food and store it in the fridge. I am available for any questions and if I have something going on, you are more than welcome to come along. There is amazing cuisine all around this neighborhood including Patsy's
neighborhood_overview: There is amazing cuisine all around this neighborhood including Patsy's where Dean Martin and Frank Sinatra used to eat! There are small cafes as well as full on restaurants.
notes: i do have a roommate so I ask that you respect their privacy as well.
transit: I am 2 blocks from the subway, I also have access to bus stop just across the street from the building. Cabs are always available as is uber.
access: The bathroom is down the hall, the kitchen is also open access.  We have 2 grocery stores within 2 blocks so you are welcome to buy any food and store it in the fridge.
interaction: I am available for any questions and if I have something going on, you are more than welcome to come along.
house_rules: - Female Guests only

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am new to Airbnb and I am just learning all the ins and outs.  I love New York!!  I am looking forward to helping more folks fall in love with this city.  If you are looking for a place to lay your head down while you visit then my couch is the place for you.

I can be an introvert or extrovert so I think that makes me the perfect host.

reviews.comments: Thanks for having me and being a great host!

Doe’s place was perfect for my stay in Nyc , it is in a super convenient location close to restaurants, Randall’s island and east side. Doe was a very helpful and lovely person and communication was easy as. Thank you

Does is a great host, the location is good and close to subway station.
She gave me recommendations and was always willing to help. 
It was in a private room and was confortable 

Totally  recommended!

Does place was honestly better than I had expected. I was a bit nervous about a common space but it truly played like a private room. She was very respectful of my introverted nature and didn’t push socialization on me but did check in with me to make sure I was comfortable. The place was extremely accessible , the place was extremely clean and she was such an amazing hostess. I will definitely use her in the future if needed !

This is a great place if you are just trying to crash in a private room. Doe is great with knowing how to get around safely. Comes with a/c but it might be a little loud at night with the trash truck, sirens and cars noises outside. I would recommend it to my friends who can sleep through anything.
Does was a great host, giving you all the privacy you need but being at the same time attentive to your needs. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

Doe's place is a decent value for the price she is charging, as the living room is basically a private room.  It is a crash-on-the-couch deal (so don't expect to have space to unpack your suitcase for long stays), and the kitchen and bathroom are basic and functional.  The place is on a busy intersection, so not for light sleepers, but it is quick by local bus to the museums, and the neighborhood is otherwise tranquil with quite cheap and good groceries.  Doe is very responsive and pleasant.
I stayed with Doe for 2 weeks while working in NYC.  This was a great location and she was an amazing host!
The host is kind, close to train station in a family oriented neighborhood, & the couch is very comfortable! Would definitely stay again!

I had an amazing 5 days in New York staying at Does place. The space was much bigger than I expected. The couch was extremely comfortable and the linens were clean. Doe was a really great hostess. She went out of her way to help me in any way possible, she even walked with me to the subway and helped me figure out better routes to where I was going. I would highly recommend any female who wants a nice place to stay, very close to the subway, to stay here. I felt safe and secure. I loved my trip to NYC! Thanks Doe for everything!

Really like my stay at Doe’s house! She is very kind and warm host. 
It’s very close to the subway station and Central Park. Calm and quiet area. 
Good room with space.
Thank you!

It was a great place just to sleep for the night. A really comfortable couch & good linens, just wish I would have seen the space heater  Doe was also really flexible as I switch my plane last minute and we were able to work out the check in situation. Doe was also really helpful in giving me some good pointer for navigating New York. If you're looking for a nice and budget-friendly place that's not too far from Manhattan, this is a perfect place to stay!

name: Vintage paradise
summary: Mon appartement est idéal pour un petit séjour à Montréal en solo ou en couple. Situé sur une petite rue tranquille de Rosemont, on retrouve une piste cyclable juste devant en plus de toutes les commodités nécessaires : épicerie fine, SAQ, pharmacie, fruiterie, borne Bixi ainsi que plusieurs restaurants et bars branchés de la ville.  Si vous voulez découvrir Montréal pour la première fois ou simplement y passer quelques jours, cet appartement est parfait pour vous.
space: Il y a beaucoup d'amour dans mon logis et on s'y sent automatiquement chez soi. L'appartement est personnalisé et très bien équipé (surtout si vous aimez cuisiner). Fonctionnelle et accueillant, vous profiterez de la vie de quartier comme de vrai Montréalais !
description: Mon appartement est idéal pour un petit séjour à Montréal en solo ou en couple. Situé sur une petite rue tranquille de Rosemont, on retrouve une piste cyclable juste devant en plus de toutes les commodités nécessaires : épicerie fine, SAQ, pharmacie, fruiterie, borne Bixi ainsi que plusieurs restaurants et bars branchés de la ville.  Si vous voulez découvrir Montréal pour la première fois ou simplement y passer quelques jours, cet appartement est parfait pour vous. Il y a beaucoup d'amour dans mon logis et on s'y sent automatiquement chez soi. L'appartement est personnalisé et très bien équipé (surtout si vous aimez cuisiner). Fonctionnelle et accueillant, vous profiterez de la vie de quartier comme de vrai Montréalais ! L'appartement se retrouve au deuxième étape d'un duplex. L'étage complet est privé et vous avez aussi accès à un balcon devant et derrière. Petit quartier résidentiel très actif et rempli de beaux commerces. Épicerie, boucherie, poissonnerie, fromagerie et SAQ se retro
neighborhood_overview: Petit quartier résidentiel très actif et rempli de beaux commerces. Épicerie, boucherie, poissonnerie, fromagerie et SAQ se retrouvent à moins de 10 minutes de marche. Même chose pour les pharmacies, dépanneurs et boutiques de vêtements.
transit: Tous types de transports accessibles à moins de 15 minutes à pieds (autobus, métro et Bixi). Près de la ligne orange qui amène au centre-ville en 25 minutes de transports en commun.
access: L'appartement se retrouve au deuxième étape d'un duplex. L'étage complet est privé et vous avez aussi accès à un balcon devant et derrière.

host.host_about: Étudiante montréalaise je suis hôte et voyageuse Airbnb depuis 5 ans.

reviews.comments: Laurence was away during my stay. Before leaving, she reached out to me and left me very detailed instructions on how everything worked. I did not need to reach out to her at all during my stay. The apartment was clean and welcoming. It felt homie. I could feel the personality of the host in the space she had created. The neighborhood is safe and beautiful. Coffee shops, restaurants, grocery stores are all walking distance away. There is a frequent bus that brings you directly to the metro. All in all, great experience. Thank you Laurence.
Laurence's place was so cozy! Great sushi place right around the corner, and very convenient to the bus/metro.

L'appartement est très bien situé et les communications avec Laurence se sont très bien déroulées.  

Par contre, un petit bémol concernant la propreté : c'était poussiéreux (j'ai été très allergique) et la literie n'avait pas été changée avant notre arrivée.
Clean, well situated, overall very good.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place was clean, spacious, comfy bed, Netflix, Wifi. Quiet area. I totally loved my stay at Laurence's place and recommend it to anyone single or a couple that want to visit Montreal, don't want to sleep downtown but is still close by with bus and Metro
Laurence's place was very cozy and welcoming. Great living space and big comfy bed. The kitchen is very cute and unique. Great way to spend our gateway
Vraiment bien!
Vraiment surpris sur toute la ligne. Je le conseil à tout le monde. Qualité prix exceptionnelle.
Great place to stay, the AC was amazing.
Good space. Very close to bus station. Very stylish.
Quartier agréable. Appartement impeccable.

Laurence’s apartment is just gorgeous and in an incredibly convenient and central spot in Montreal! The street is beautifully ivy covered and quiet (with balcony’s on the front and back!) but an easy walk or bus ride away from so many amazing neighborhoods! Loved the cozy vintage style of the apartment, super comfy bed and massive kitchen! Would love stay again thanks Laurence!!
Wonderful space and very clean!

This place is great! There are several good places to eat nearby, a Tunisian place a block away and the best vegan pastries ever (and I'm not vegan) at Cafe dei campi on Rosemont. The metro/bus system is very easy to get around even though the place is a little far from most of the touristy stuff. The bathroom was clean and towels/toilet paper/etc were provided. Washer/dryer in unit, which was nice when we spent all of the first day outside in the rain.
Great place for a couple to stay - Montréal is a lovely city, would come back again

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. I live in this lovely 2 bedroom, I make one room available only for AirBnB when my daughter and I are traveling, so there's a chance you get whole apartment to yourself

It is a non-smoking building. - No partying in the condo - No overnight guests besides those booked with guest - No pets - Please turn-off AC and all lights when leaving the apartment Use common sense re noise and al. :-)

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Raed"s flat is perfect for a stay in Montreal (I spent 1 week in there). Very clean, all equipments required, big bath + shower, very central location. Very nice shared terrace on the roof. I also rented a bicycle and their a safe place to park it. 
When so I haven't met Raed during my trip, as he was abroad, he was very welcoming and read to provide help and tips when required. I can then strongly recommend Raed's place.

Apartment is in a fantastic area, two seconds to the Metro, walkable t o the plateau and downtown. Bixi bike stop right beside the Metro as well.
I was extended for work and there were literally no hotel rooms that met my work cost guidelines. Raed's apartment was cheaper and infinitely better than the room I was staying at and was closer to the metro too.

Raed made check in a breeze and worked with me when my plans changed for checkout. He was available via text and phone and helped me all the way through.

Next time I'm in Montreal, this will be my first choice for accommodation.
Logement fantastique! Il est situé en plein cœur du Quartier des spectacles, très sécuritaire et lumineux. L'hôte Raed a été très facile à joindre, prévenant et attentionné. Une perle.
The apartment is in a great location and Raed was an accommodating host. Great place to stay.

This is a great apartment and Raed is a very nice and accommodating host. However, I had a couple issues with this trip. This is nothing against Raed or his place. Both the apartment and the host are great. Just a few logistical, subjective-comfort, and communication related things. 

When asking Raed about potential noise in the apartment, before I booked, he said "this is all very subjective... it should be fine." When I got to the apartment, there was major construction (which begins at around (8-9AM) surrounding the apartment (the apartment is on a right angle on a major intersection near Place de Arts) and the music from nearby festivals (very loud) begins in the afternoon and ends late at night at around 11PM-12AM. 

I was aware of how close the festivals were, but based on Raed's comment, I figured it would be relatively quiet and didn't anticipate such loud music and construction. I was a bit annoyed when I got to the apartment and for the first few days, I was bombarded with construction early in the morning and then blaring music for most of the day. This may have been miscommunication, or maybe it is a new issue, but I felt somewhat misled. Now this might not bother anyone else, which is fine. But I did ask about the noise level before I booked. And yet, the experience I had wound up contradicting what I had been told by the host. So make sure you ask specific questions if you have specific concerns. And if you are looking for quiet during the day — good luck!

There was also some initial confusion when trying to book the apartment because the dates that were listed as available were not actually all available. In fact, I had to change my reservation from June 12-26 to June 12-20 because Raed had his own plans with the apartment from the 20th onward but this was not reflected on AirBnB and it wasn’t until after I booked my dates that I found out the the apartment wouldn’t be available after the 20th. This lack of clarity in communication was pretty inconvenient for me. Plus, I had to wait to hear back from and constantly inquire with Raed when trying to find out the actual available dates to see if the apartment was going to be available or not. Even after I booked, the dates listed as available remained inaccurate. If I didn't keep contacting him, I'm not sure how things would have turned out. This put a some stress on my travel plans, which were admittedly very last minute. I realize Raed was probably very busy, but it's always the little, logistical things that matter.

Despite these relatively minor issues, I must state that Raed was very accommodating and responsive during my actual trip, very friendly, and in the end - he was very considerate by allowing me to check out a few days early.

Great apartment. Great host.

The place is ideally located right on the Place des Arts and the flat itself is very enjoyable to live in. And above all, Raed is an extremely kind and attentive host. Overall, I very highly recommend both the flat and its host. Definitely my go-to place for my future journeys in Montreal.
Great place. Amazing location, very close to everything. The common area is big and comfortable. There is a lot of natural light which i liked. Raed was nice and fast in communication.
Raed is helpful, friendly and patient. Although my stay was somehow short, the house was super clean and prepared for me.

The apartment is as appears on the picture. Clean, cosy, and with a  pleasant ambience and all basic facilities such as towels, kettle, toaster, iron, etc There's a coffee place downstairs, metro right opposite, grocery store 5 minutes away and within easy walking reach to the heart of downtown Montreal and Mcgill university. The hosting service was awesome. We were granted early check in and easy access into the building which was great after our 17 hour journey. I would definitely recommend it to friends and will look out for it on my next visit.

It is a wonderful apartment. I enjoyed it a a lot. It is very good located and everything you need is close. I would choose it again if I will come back to Montreal some day. 
Eric

This was a beautiful stay, much appreciated.  Raed and Hidaya were accommodating in every way, kind, generous, and flexible.  The home was immaculate, better than a 5-Star Hilton.  Its proximity to the Hyatt and the downtown area, transit, restaurants, everything was ideal.  There wasn't a single thing that could be improved upon.  Special thanks to Raed and Hidaya for being such great people.
love this place.  perfect spot downtown montreal,  close to everything and i would love to stay here again in august when i go.  love it.
Would recommend to travellers who like to be in the middle of what’s happening in town. Easy access to main tourist attractions.

The location is phenomenal.  You could honestly park your car and toss your transportation passes.  This place is close to everything.  The host was mostly responsive.  

Only issue I had was not having access to the rooftop for the entire 7 days I stayed.   The nice rooftop is included in the description for this place, so that was a major selling point for me to book the space, making it simply disappointing that I didn’t have access.  The host was not able to provide an answer on how to get acesss to the rooftop.   Finally, I booked the entire apartment, and it was listed as full apartment access.  The room you actually get is the smaller room with the bed that looks more slim and less comfortable.  I had a good rest in the room I slept in, but I assumed that having the apartment to myself would allow me to sleep in the nicer room that is actually pictured on the website.  Not sure why it is pictured if it is not available to potential guests.  

Outside of those things, Raed was very quick to respond and good to work with.   

I would return to this Airbnb, unless a place with proper rooftop access is available.  

Cheers
Great setup, nice place.
Appartement bien situé, idéal pour un 1er séjour à Montréal.

I very much enjoyed my return to Montreal. Hidaya and Raed's place is very lovely, with great lighting in a great location as you're close to downtown, the Plateau, Old Montreal or wherever else you want to go on the island. I would definitely stay again. Thank you!

We will prepare coffee, tea, croissant and delicious cookies for you. Located in Sunnyside Gardens, one of the city’s most treasured historic districts. The apartment is 2 blocks from 7 train, 15 minutes to Midtown, convenient to large variety of stores, cafes and restaurants.

reviews.comments: Esther and Robert made us feel welcome from the first moment that we arrived at the flat! They were really kind and helpful during our stay in Barcelona! Esther contacted us 1 day before arrival and explained the way from the train station to their apartment. Our private bathroom was fully equipped. The neighborhood was calm (which I really appreciated), but nonetheless the flat was located perfectly for exploring the city. Both hosts always were available for questions and we also sometimes sat together and had nice conversations! I can really recommend staying at their place!!
Excelente atención, Esther y Robert son demasiado atentos y hacen de tu estadía muy placentera. La habitación cómoda con un bueno baño privado.

Tuvimos una gran experiencia con Esther y Robert. Estar con ellos es como sentirse en familia. Estan siempre dispuestos a aconsejarte sobre la ciudad de Barcelona en todos sus aspectos, medios de transporte, lugares turìsticos, incluso en una oportunidad, nos llevaron en su coche. Son anfitriones de primera, que desempeñan su rol con gusto. Desde detalles como toallas, productos de higiene, limpieza inmejorable, hasta gratas charlas de mùsica

Nice and quiet place. Very kind, pleasant and helpful people. Not big but big enough for a pleasant stay. Private bathroom attached is clean and useful. Metro is just 50m away. Lots of places for breakfast in the street. No sounds from the city in the room. realy can recommend it.

Ester and Robert were very welcoming and accommodated all our needs including laundry and storing luggage. We enjoyed their company. The private bathroom was great however the room was quite small and the bed is not a double bed as we expected but a single with a trundle underneath that one slides out to accommodate the second person. The location, very near Poble Sec, was excellent and overall it was great value.
És tracta d'una habitació amb bany propi, que compleix estrictament les funcions de dormitori. Situació cèntrica i ben comunicada. El tracte amb els amfitrions és ben cordial.
Was easy to get around. Quiet neighborhood suitable to walking. Host was very nice and went out of her way to aid us in getting around. Prefer the place to a noisy hotel .

Die Lage ist zentral in Barcelona. Das Zimmer ist recht eng, aber mit eigener Dusche und sauber.  Esther ist freundlich, hilfsbereit, eine zuverlässige Gastgeberin.

Nuestra estancia en este sitio ha sido muy acogedora, siendo un espacio idoneo para alojarse de forma comoda, 
ya que es un sitio calido, cuenta con baño privado lo cual considero un punto a favor muy importante y la disposición de los anfitriones en atendernos fue excelente. Lo recomiendo
Super einfaches gutes zimmer, nette leute, super gelegen.
Esther and Robert are great hosts who share their experience and knowledge about the city.

Très bon accueil de la part d'Esther et Robert, ils ont pris le temps de nous donner toutes les explications nécessaires à notre séjour. L'appartement est bien situé et au calme, la chambre n'est pas très grande mais la salle de bains privative est un vrai plus. je conseille ce logement.
Hote disponible et chaleureuse.  Appartement  très  bien situé  et proche  du  métro.  Sommes ravis  de notre WEEK-END

Esther und Robert haben sich sehr bei allen Wünschen um eine Lösung bemüht. Das Zimmer ist sehr klein und wirkt abgewohnt. Fenster nur zum Lichtschacht. Für den Preis kann man nicht mehr erwarten. Die Lage ist gut.
Good  location,but fairly minimal room, helpful advice from the hosts.

У дома хорошое расположение. Все в пешей доступности. Метро в 3 минутах от дома. Кафе есть прям у дома. 
Хозяин очень отзывчивый. В любое время рад ответить на все ваши вопросы, прийти на помощь. 
Комната и ванная были чистыми и хорошо подготовленными. 
Лишь один минус - у нашей комнаты окно было во внутренний колодец дома и как следствие мы слышали всех соседей. Шум - единственный минус данного жилья.

Esther y Robert son encantadores, tienen la mejor predisposición y trato a la hora de consultarles algo. El apartamento está bien ubicado, carca de una parada de metro (Poble sec) que conecta con los puntos más importantes de la ciudad en sólo minutos. No es un apartamento muy amplio, pero sí en buenas condiciones. Ideal para descansar y salir a recorrer la ciudad.

The building is very noisy. The private room has a window that is combined with the outside which makes it extremely easy to listen to your neighbors. Las Ramblas is about a 25-30 minute walk, not necessarily close to the apartment. Our check out time was 11am yet they told us to leave at 9:30 because people were on their way to come to our room. They gave us a feeling that they just wanted the money, they charge 25 euros to get driven back and fourth from the airport but if you choose to stay at this house I would suggest to take the bus for 2.15 euros per person instead. Other than the stay, Barcelona is a beautiful city and i can't wait to come back to visit.
La estadia fue aceptable, solo para dormir y marcharse sin mayores pretenciones, la ubicacion es buena
El departamento de Esther esta bien ubicado. Estacion de metro a media cuadra. Plaza España y barrio gotico cerca. Buena estadía

We spent 2 days in Esther's apartment.  It's in a nice part of town (plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars very nearby) and the apartment was very clean and comfortable. Esther and her partner were very sweet and helpful - we had a lovely stay in Barcelona. Cheers guys!

Steve

Esther and Robert were so kind, helpful  and welcoming. One of them is always available. The area is fairly close to the Ramblas but has a great choice of local bars and restaurants that are not as expensive! Also a short walk to the light show in Plaza Espanya which was amazing. Loved our stay at Barcelona and many thanks for being wonderful hosts. Chris and Scarlett.

Appartement bien situé que je ne recommande pas pour la chambre mal adapté pour une location 
AirBnB n'est pas assez vigilance sur le niveau de confort des chambres dont elle se porte quelque part garant

To be completely honest, our stay wasn't a good one. Checking in was no issue, but the room was incredibly small and was blazing hot. We were offered 1 fan that was pretty useless. 

Secondly, after our 2nd night, we were threatened to be removed from the apartment due to "noise". Our first night consisted of soft music played low on our phones and our 2nd night's noise was a quiet phone conversation, which was interrupted by a loud bang at the door from I  Esther. We essentially had to not make a single noise on our 3rd night to ensure we would remain in the apartment. I get that everyone has annoying neighbors who will complain about most things, but if that's the case, either let us know well in advance, or don't post your place on airbnb. Don't wait until the neighbors to put pressure on you to the point where you tell your guests they can't come back into the apartment and have to make other plans.

Also, take it from someone who's lived in Barcelona, this is certainly not the "most cool area." Easy access to Placa Espanya is great, but for a more enjoyable time you would want to stay further into Eixample.

Nonetheless, they don't seem like bad people, just on edge because Barcelona doesn't like airbnb.
Room very. Very small for two people.
Very helpful and in a great location right next to the metro and 24hr parking

Good location and the host was very accommodating even though I arrived before check-in. The host helped with planning transport routes and had no issue with me returning to the room in the early hours of the morning. Would recommend!

Esther and Robert were fantastic hosts - they were friendly and helpful every single day, and also gave us the space necessary to enjoy our downtime at the Airbnb. The place had everything we needed for a short trip in Barcelona, and the location was perfect - close to the Metro, buses, and an easy walk away from many of the attractions. Would recommend!
friendly host, good location, tidy room with private toilet

Accurate as described, bed was comfortable and had private bathroom, wifi was good.  Clearly some issues with the neighbours not being comfortable with Airbnb as we experienced a very awkward encounter as we tried to enter the building.

Era nuestra primera experiencia Airbnb y nos ha encantado. Esther y Robert han sido unos grandes anfitriones, muy simpáticos, animados, conversadores... Todo un lujazo haberlos conocido. En cuanto a la habitación es justo lo que ofrecen, una habitación con cama doble y un baño privado y funcional. En caso de volver a Barcelona, repetiré con ellos.

It was our first Airbnb experience and it was fantastic. Esther and Robert had been excellent hosts, very kind, cheerful and talkative people... was a pleasure to met them. As to the room, it's just like they offer. A double bed room with a functional private room with a shower. If we return to Barcelona, sure we'll repeat with them
에스더와 로버트는 정말 너무나도 친절합니다. 집은 조용하고 깨끗합니다. 저희가 쓴 방은 개인 욕실 겸 화장실이 있었고 상당히 따듯하고 통풍도 잘되었습니다. 지하철역과 상당히 가깝고, 밤 11시까지 방에 들어와야 하는 주의사항이 있습니다.
Gran hospitalidad la de la anfitriona.
절대 절대 가지마세요. 혼자 온 여자를 새벽 2시에 쫓아냈어요. 그리고 환불도 안 해줌

Ha sido una muy buena experiencia, Esther y Robert son muy buenas personas, inteligentes, acogedores, amigables, hospitalarios y atentos.
 La habitación genial con baño privado incluido, excelente para descansar y una ubicación inmejorable.
 Si tuviera tiempo disponible me quedaba más días.  Altamente recomendable.
Excelente lugar, céntrico y cómodo para conocer la ciudad, Esther y Robert son muy amables y nos hicieron las cosas muy fáciles durante el tiempo que estuvimos ahí, muy limpio y ordenado
Recomendable
Esther is very helpful and friendly! Flat is well located! I can recommend this apartment!
bien situado
Esther y Robert son muy buenas personas, el servicio fue inmejorable. Super recomendados.
Nice location with metro within 2 minutes’ walk. No heater inside so a bit wet in the room.

Vivamente Consigliato. Camera come da fotografia, pulita, con tutti gli accessori segnalati dall'host. Massima elasticità su TUTTO, ottima la connessione col centro di Barcellona, la fermata metro è a pochi minuti a piedi. Nella Zona si trovano diversi locali notturni e market aperti 24/24. Ester e Robert, squisiti! Un'accoglienza calorosa ed inaspettata. Che sia una vacanza in coppia o da single, grazie all'ambient potrai approfittare di una vacanza all'insegna dello scambio culturale, della condivisione, dell'empatia. Un abbraccio E&R.

Pessima esperienza nel B&B! 
Come da accordo preso precedentemente avevamo prenotato una stanza nel B&B della signora Esther. Eravamo in 4 ragazze, due sarebbero dovute restare nel B&B di Esther e altre due in un altra stanza abdicata a 3 min a piedi in un altra stanza. Appena arrivate ci ha accolto Robert. Non parlava inglese ne spagnolo e ci ha dato il permesso di salire tutte e 4 perché gli abbiamo spiegato che avevamo una valigia comune che dovevamo aprire per dare le robe alle due ragazze che alloggiavano li. Arriva Esther, la padrona di casa. Senza neanche ascoltarci ha iniziato ad urlarci dietro come una matta che non dovevamo stare li tutte e 4. Abbiamo cercato di spiegare con tutta la calma possibile che solo DUE DI NOI DOVEVANO ALLOGGIARE nel suo B&B. Eravamo salite tutte e 4 solo perché avevamo una valigia comune con le piastre dentro e le scarpe. Dovevamo solo dare alle due ragazze che dormivano ospiti nel B&B le loro cose, dopo saremo andate. Ci ha accolto urlando che non potevamo stare lì tutte e quattro e ha zittito Robert che ci aveva permesso di salire per dividere la roba che si trovava nella valigia comune. Urlando e sbraitando, ci ha buttate fuori casa senza neanche ascoltare cosa avevamo da dirle!!! Così ci siamo trovate dalle 13 alle 17 di pomeriggio a cercare un appartamento in zona. Ci ha rovinato tutto il primo giorno di vacanza che lo abbiamo passato a cercare case invece di visitare. Mi dispiace per chi alloggerà di nuovo in questo B&B. Mai trovata così male.
Trato inmejorable,muy atentos y hospitalarios. Lo recomiendo

Esther and Robert were very helpfull and very friendly. Very clean and lovely place. Walking distance to most "must visit" places in Barcelona. 1 min to Metro station.  It was a pefect stay in your place. Thanks Esther and Robert!!!

El hospedaje cumplió mis expectativas.  Especialmente que cuenta con servicio sanitario privado.  Es tranquilo, aseado,  Esther ofrece su cocina, utencilios,  refrigerador.  La habitación apenas para lo que necesitamos.  No se cierra con llave la habitación,  pero nosotras no tuvimos ningún inconveniente y para entrar al piso se debe utilizar el timbre e intercomunicador para que le abran, con este tema no tuvimos tampoco ningún problema,  siempre está Esther o Roberth para abrir y para recomendar lugares. En mi caso estuvimos de paseo el mayor tiempo. Gracias
Great Location, no problem with the check-in and check-out. Esther is a great host and the room was according with I expected.
Everything was good!
educados y correctos, zona muy céntrica, pero con dificil acceso en coche y para aparcamiento

Nuestra estancia en el alojamiento de Esther ha sido perfecta.  El alojamiento es tal cual se describe en el anuncio.  Para destacar la amabilidad de Esther y su esposo y la buena ubicación del piso. Sin duda repetiría

Excelente ubicación, a pasos de estación de metro Poble Sec,  con varios lugares para comer y comprar en sus alrededores.
Esther es muy amable y dispuesta a ayudar con lo que se necesite.
La pieza es pequeña, muy limpia. Sin aire acondicionado, pero dispone de un ventilador que ayuda en los días de verano. Colchón muy blando.
Çok misafirperver birev sahibi. Ev metroya 1 dk.  Şehrin göbeğinde. Temiz ve güzel.

A small private room in a small apartment with other rooms for rent. It is perfect for only one person. Forget about make a nape during the day because TV is always on because the owner likes to watch televesion during the day. It is not possible to cook in kitchen.
Esther’s place is wonderful, its location, its cleanliness and everything! Robert and Esther are really nice hosts too~ highly recommend this place! 房子舒适安静整洁,这个价格还有独立卫浴十分划算了~很推荐!

The room is located in a nice area close to plaza Espana and next to a metro station. Ester and Robert are quite friendly and helpful. the room has no AC which is quite a problem especially during  summer season since the window is overlooking the inside walls of the building and there is no ventilation. Ester had set up a fan in the room but it was of no use as it was unbearably hot. you don't get a key but there is someone at the apartment all the time.  this wasn't a problem for us as we were getting back to the place around 23h but I guess it can be a problem for party goers that tend to stay out till late hours. The room is around 6m2 and furniture is rather old and there were some issues with the water drainage in the toilet as water tends to remain on the tiles after shower. Overall the biggest problem for us was the unbearable heat and if you are staying over the summer maybe consider getting a place with AC.
Personnes très accueillantes et sympathiques, appartement bien situé dans la ville. Airbnb conseillé pour un séjour à Barcelone.
Muy buena zona cerca del centro de la ciudad. Esther y si esposo fueron muy amables y nos permitieron dejar nuestras maletas en el piso antes de la hora del checo in
Todo bien, la estadía mejoraría si se pudiese usar la cocina.

L'alloggio consiste in una piccola stanza con letto matrimoniale, dotata di ventilatore e bagno personale. Il posto è molto pulito e accogliente. L'unica pecca è che non c'è la possibilitá di cucinare, solo per la colazione si puó utilizzare la cucina, tuttavia questo è scritto nel regolamento quindi è espresso al momento della prenotazione. La camera è all'interno di un appartamento abitato dalla stessa Esther, che peró è cordiale, disponibile e discreta. Ottimo soggiorno.
L’appartamento è ben posizionato. In pochi minuti a piedi sei in centro e a pochissimi metri c’è là metro. Camera ottima per passare 1/2 notti.
Great hospitality ! She was so nice and caring for our situation . Very helpful and answered our every question . Over all you were very generous Esther !
Ambiente muy familiar, compartes la casa con Esther y Robert, ubicación central, limpio, acogedores y siempre disponibles
Rien
Very good for low cost vocation, owner  was good but share room is not for me .....

Esther & George we’re both wonderful and very helpful.  I couldn’t have asked for a better stay!! They left keep out packs at their flat on the last day so we could go explore a little easier without them.  I hope to come back and stay with them soon!

reviews.comments: Apartamento ótimo, confortável, arejado, de qualidade, num condomínio e bairros maravilhosos, tranquilo para caminhar a pé e com lugares bons para comer. Se for para o Rock in Rio ou para algum evento na cidade olímpica, não há lugar melhor! Super indico!

Ótima localização com fácil acesso! Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Carla. O apartamento é ótimo, com utensílios domesticos, tv, ar-condicionado e etc. Dentro do condomínio há restaurantes, padaria e farmácia bem pertinho.

O apto é ótimo! Tem tudo o que se imagina!  É limpo, modermo e organizado. O prédio e comércio local também têm tudo! Fomos  recebidos com extrema gentileza, o que nos fez sentir muito bem durante a estadia. Voltaremos!

Carla's place is great especially for a family with kids. The condo has all the greatest amenities of a resort so you really don't have to leave if you don't want to. The location is a bit of the path in Barra, but is very well known and a quick and cheap uber ride takes you to the beach and everywhere else. We had a lot of fun at the pool and cabanas, the restaurants outside the building a good and convenient, also a pharmacy and bakery right across the street. We will def stay here again on our next trip to Rio. The apt is spotless and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Highly recommended.

reviews.comments: O anfitrião me fez sentir a vontade devido a resposta imediata das mensagens envidas, primeiro pelo site da Airbnb e depois via WhasApp. Em nenhum momento fiquei sem comunicação.  Logo quando cheguei falei que gostaria de deixar o carro numa garagem e eles procuraram vaga de garagem, quando não acharam, deixaram o carro de um dos familiares dormir na rua para o meu carro ficar na garagem. Agradeço por isso! A proposta era ficar com um quarto privativo mas me deixaram como a casa inteira, sala cozinha e quarto com ar condicionado, senha de wifi. Superou todas as expectativas.

Apartamento limpo, organizado, bem equipado, cozinha e área de serviço equipadas, TV a cabo, WIFI funcional, quarto com AC, privacidade, região segura e calma, mercado próximo, estacionamento na rua seguro, fiquei 10 dias sem nenhuma ocorrência ou incomodo. Recomendo.
Lugar agradável e anfitriões prestativos!

O espaço tem todos os utensílios necessários para uma estadia confortável. Os anfitriões Igor e Taís foram super receptivos e hospitaleiros, em nenhum momento tive dificuldades de comunicação. Eu e meu namorado tivemos um problema com o celular e eles nos ajudaram muito tentando resolver nosso problema! Preço justo, estadia próxima a estação do metrô, restaurantes, fast-foods, farmácias e supermercado! Nada para reclamar. Recomendo!

name: LUXICO - Principino
summary: Sweeping views to the Sydney Opera House and Bridge will make your Sydney stay ever so special at Principino. Gated and private from the street, this beautifully presented home features 4 bedrooms, multiple living areas and pool and is just a short walk to the shops.
space: Set in manicured gardens, this home is ideal for families and designed over three levels to make the most of the incredible views. Upstairs is a large open plan living area with contemporary kitchen, extensive living and dining area and separate TV cinema room. An enormous terrace is ideal for entertaining. The middle level also boasts incredible views from the main and second bedroom. Two other beautifully furnished bedrooms are light and bright. The main bedroom is enormous and has its own ensuite while the second and third bedroom share a large two way ensuite. A large rumpus room or retreat sits on the lower floor and comprises a kitchenette and is fully contained. The space overlooks the pool and garden.  This property comes complete with secure off-street parking for two cars in a stunning Sydney location. Home Truths :  Bedroom #1: King Bed w/ ensuite bathroom (shower) + shared balcony w/ bedroom #2 Bedroom #2: 2x King Single Beds + shared balcony and large two-way ensuite bathr

neighborhood_overview: One of Sydney’s grandest suburbs, Mosman is located just 8kms from the CBD over the Sydney Harbour Bridge. It’s a suburb many aspire to live in and once you’re there, there’s little reason to leave, with plenty of shops along Military Road, stunning scenery and even the iconic Taronga Zoo to keep you amused. Balmoral Beach offers a more relaxed atmosphere, with parks, swimming and beachside cafes. It’s tempting to stay at home and get lost in the harbour view from your balcony, but at some point it’s important to leave the house. A walk through Mosman is an excellent workout due to the inevitable hill-climbing challenges. There’s a community bus for short trips and plenty of buses into the CBD; or the ferry if you prefer a water crossing. Small clumps of village shops include delicatessens, bakeries and specialty gift stores, while the major shopping precinct is located on Military Road.
notes: Bookings made via AirBNB are subject to the standard booking terms and conditions displayed on the Luxico Holiday Homes website.  You must be over 28 years old to book this property. Please contact us if the majority of your guests are aged under 28 to confirm suitability of this property.  Parties are strictly prohibited. Payment of your deposit constitutes acceptance of our terms and conditions. Please contact us if you would like a copy of these terms prior to booking.  For security reasons, a copy of your Australian Drivers License or International Passport is required prior to check-in along with confirmed names for all guests staying at the property along with a signed Booking Agreement before access details can be provided. This is not negotiable! Please don’t book with us if you are not comfortable providing this information.
access: All Luxico guests receive a bottle of bubbles in the fridge plus a gourmet welcome hamper including tea, coffee, jams, muesli, milk and some tasty treats.  We supply luxury toiletries and towels and our beds are made up with top quality linen ensuring a comfortable stay.
interaction: One of our superhosts will meet you at the property to hand over keys and answer any queries you may have about the home. Our 24/7 concierge team are on hand to help you with any special requests during your stay.
house_rules: - STRICTLY NO PARTIES.  $5000 PENALTY (refer to terms and conditions) - No smoking inside the house - Please respect our neighbours. Fines may apply for excessive noise if reported - If you break something, please let us know so that we can replace it for the next guests

host.host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

reviews.comments: El apartamento de Ana es un apartamento muy comodo en una zona de categoria como Ipanema a una cuadra de la playa. Es un apartamento en una zona accesible cerca de supermercados, restaurantes que posibilitan una estadía en familia por periodos prolongados. Sin embargo, el apartamento carece de algunos elementos como cubiertos, vasos suficientes y en condiciones como se describe en el anuncio supuestamente para  ocho personas. Pequeños elementos que no implicarian gran costo para el dueño. Por otro lado, el tema de la limpieza si bien no está sucio podría mejorarse sobretodo abajo de las camas y ropa de cama.

Um ótimo apartamento, uma localização excelente, próximo a restaurantes, supermercado, farmácias, banco, praia. Tranquilo de andar pelas ruas, além disso, tem transporte público bem perto. Recomendo a todos.

El departamento de Ana tiene una muy buena ubicación. Es amplio, cómodo, luminoso, en especial el living. Se encuentra intermediado por una empresa de alquileres temporarios (Ipanema Flats), Ana responde las consultas rápidamente, pero el contacto directo es a través de un encargado. Al llegar, uno de los aires acondicionados no funcionaba, se lo hicimos saber al encargado que inicialmente no reconoció ese desperfecto. Le escribimos a Ana y al otro día, el aire fue reemplazado satisfactoriamente y no tuvimos más problemas. En general, el departamento se encuentra en buenas condiciones, aunque tiene detalles que podrían mejorarse: el baño se encuentra -en relación con la foto de referencia- ya algo desgastado por el uso (en el piso, el mueble y los azulejos de la bañera), sería deseable una mejor disponibilidad en cuanto a la vajilla y utensilios de cocina; una de las puertas de un dormitorio no cierra bien y en el otro, hay un arreglo en la pared que no tiene pintura. La televisión y WIFI funcionaron sin problemas (aunque en una de las fotos figura una televisión en el dormitorio y eso no es así, se encuentra en el comedor). El edificio aunque antiguo se encuentra en muy buen estado y la atención de los porteros es impecable y siempre muy solícitos. Más allá de todos estos detalles, nuestra estadía fue confortable y cumplió con el objetivo de descanso, cubriendo nuestras expectativas, en especial debido a la ubicación del departamento, a camino entre las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema, con todo tipo de negocios disponibles, en un barrio tranquilo y agradable.

Para quem busca passar tempo de qualidade com amigos ou família ,decidir por este tipo de acomodação sem duvida foi a melhor decisão, nao esta demais mencionar que o apto tem tudo o que voce precisa, o lugar e aconchegante, e  bem decorado, bonito, a localização fantástica, sem duvidas voltaria me hospedar lá, recomendo.
Un departamento hermoso para alojarse en esa increíble ciudad. Cercano a las playas, supermercados, negocios, lugares de interés.
El apto esta muy bien ubicado y la atencion del host impecable. Muchas gracias!

name: Kit net Gracinha in Copa
summary: The flat is located at Nossa Senhora de Copacabana Avenue, 4 blocks away from the beach, close to Posto 4. A short walk along the beachfront will take you to Leme, where you can fird street markets and expositions. On the other side, if you keep walking you’ll get to Pedra do Arpoador, famous for its gorgeous sunset. Later all you have to do is go back to the flat and plan a night out at the famous and full of life Lapa neighborhood, situated very close to the flat.
space: The flat is a “kitnet” (kitchen, bathroom, bedroom-living room, 27m2 in total) recently fully refurbished (2016) to make sure everything works perfectly (including electrical installations) and to provide a very comfortable stay for our guests. All the equipment and items in the flat can be used: fridge, toast grill, hot plate (electric stove), pans, electric shower, cupboard and wardrobe, air conditioner, small fan, washing machine, bed linen and towels and Wi-Fi. We don’t offer breakfast but the building is located next to a bakery/pizzeria, full of very tasty food! The building is located in a kind of “hideaway”, Travessa Angrense (total comfort and silence, since the main entrance of the building is not via the very busy Nossa Senhora de Copacabana Avenue), having a beautiful flower shop in the entrance. The building is fully equipped with security items such as cameras in the entrance and elevators, fire extinguishers, stairs and a doorman 24h a day.

Me encanta a troca de experiências sobre viagens. Fique a vontade para bisbilhotar as fotos do charmoso apartamento.

name: Bushwick Suite
summary: Great, older space close to The J train station and various eateries like McDonald's, Carrizal Bar & Grill, Bedstuy Fish Fry. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings and the location. Minute from lower Manhattan. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: This is an older, more vintage apartment in a private Bushwick "red"stone. The space is a large suite with private fridge, dining and living area, as well as closet! The a/c works but is a bit noisy.  In addition, there is a private hair salon on the premises, on the lower level, servicing all hair needs for men and women!

neighborhood_overview: This is a great neighborhood because it is pretty assessable to many things! It's an area that has a lot of life but is quiet at the same time! There are many eateries in and around the neighborhood from Spanish to African, Jamacian to Chinese, Haitian, Italian, various cafés, etc. Bushwick is also very close to lower Manhattan and the J subway station is right around the corner!! 15 mins to the city just over the Williamsburg bridge!
notes: This is a great space for those who want to have a nice cozy, at home away from home feel! Though this is a double occupancy, this suite can sleep up to four adults (additional fees apply). There is plenty of natural light that flows through the space! It is mostly quiet in the apartment for those who enjoy sleeping in late. It is a good transient area to explore Brooklyn and the city of New York!
transit: Lots of means of transportation in the area. Just two short blocks away from the J train and right across the street from the B-52 bus that takes you downtown Brooklyn. Also the B-47 bus, one block away, takes you straight to one of Brooklyn's famous malls Kings Plaza.  One of the best things is that it is very easy to get to many different places! B-47 or B-52, 38 to the malls, Q-24 to Queens, NY. The B-15, 7 blocks away, takes you straight to JFK airport.  For more private means of transport you can take one of many car services in the area.
access: All guest have full access to the kitchen (fully  equipped: full fridge, stove/oven, microwave, pots and pans, etc.).
interaction: There will not be much interaction with the guest(s). Though I will be there, I am always working and busy. I will be available to my guest(s) when they need any assistance!
house_rules: - Guest must recycle bottles and cans. In addition, if daily entry to room is not allowed by host, then all guests are required to leave all garbage and recyclables outside of your door for daily pick up.

reviews.comments:
Dee was such a wonderful host! She made sure I had everything I needed. She was welcoming, warm and we had a good time chatting.

The listing was more spacious than I expected. It was perfect for what I needed, cute, spacious, clean and I definitely enjoyed my stay! I will be back to stay with Dee!

Dee is really a great host! I truly appreciate her hospitality. She is kind and caring. I felt at home when I talked with her and her mother. Dee did a perfect job in balancing respecting a guest's privacy and giving warm hospitality. I love the spacious private room and extended my stay. I was there almost two weeks and miss the quiet residential area (and the clear sky!) in Bushwick. The location is super convenient and it is just 1-minute walk from the nearest station. You can get delicious sandwiches at nice cafes in the neighbourhood and enjoy good supper at an Indian restaurant. A laundry shop is 3 or 4 minute walk and the price is amazingly reasonable. Wonderful host, great house, nice neighborhood, and cute dogs! You cannot expect more. I will defenitely come back when I stay in Brooklyn next time. Thank you so much!!

Dee was super friendly and hospitable. The place was clean and spacious and the bed was super comfy. About a two minute walk to the J train Gates Ave station, so it was really convenient to access Manhattan if need be. The room was huge-in addition to the bedroom (with a large flat screen TV), there was a nice sitting room with two small sofas situated off the bedroom. 

Next time I visit NYC, I'll definitely try to stay at Dee's place again.

Very safe neighborhood, right next to Gates Ave. Station (JZ subway line). Transfer availability at Essex-Delancey St. station to the BDFM; 30 min to midtown Manhattan. Dee was great and communicated well. Apartment was clean with plenty of privacy. Would book again if I was in the area.

reviews.comments:
Ich durfte für einen Monat in der Wohnung von der Catarina übernachten und bin absolut zufrieden. 
Seit dem ersten Schriftwechsel ist Catarina als eine sehr offene, sympatische und vertrauenswürdige Person aufgetreten, weswegen sie mir sowohl die Anreise erleichtert hat als auch dafür gesorgt hat,das ich mich in der neuen Umgebung wohlfühle. 
Von der Ausstattung her ist alles so wie beschrieben. Einzige kleine Abänderung war eine Art Holzwand die zwischen dem eigenen kleinen Wohnbereich und dem Bereich für alle gezogen wurde. Dadurch wurde zwar der Aufenthaltsbereich verdunkelt aber ich hatte dadurch auch mehr Privatsspähre. 
Die beiden Frauen auf die ich dort getroffen bin, sind auch mega nette Leute, mit denen ich mich vom ersten Tag an sehr gut verstanden habe.

Alles in allem habe ich eine sehr schöne Zeit gehabt und kann die Wohnung definitiv weiterempfehlen.
The host canceled this reservation 41 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Luxury 3-Acre Garden Eco-Estate 10 min to Kona
summary: 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, Private Pool, Pool Pavilion, WiFi On 3 Secluded Acres Of Gardens, 10 min to Kona airport, Kailua Kona, Beach
space: THE LOCATION: Welcome to Kaloko Gardens Retreat, a secluded 3-acre eco-estate overlooking Kona on the slopes of Mt. Hualalai.  Just ten minutes from the airport, town, and beaches, this luxurious, solar-powered sanctuary was created to provide an unforgettable personal or business retreat experience.  Here you will encounter the heart of Hawaii, a place of quiet and beauty in nature. Enjoy hundreds of botanical specimens of tropical flowering plants throughout the estate. Stroll through the orchard and the gardens. Explore the native Hawaiian forest to discover rare and endangered species. Enjoy complete seclusion with incredibly convenient, ten-minute access to all that Kona has to offer, from best restaurants to beaches. THE RETREAT: Designed in classical Hawaiian style, with high ceilings and spacious lanais, and built with local hardwoods, the house features a modern gourmet kitchen with granite countertops and new energy-efficient appliances, a complimentary business center, large

reviews.comments: This place is amazing and the hosts are incredibly communicative and welcoming.  A pair of beers, fresh cream, Kona coffee and some other snacks.welcomed us on our arrival.  I would absolutely stay here again.  Highly recommended!
Great location, beautiful property. Would recommend to others
Great house
Really great space in a frog sanctuary
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this fabulous house.  Would highly recommend to those looking for a luxurious stay.
Ideal Location for Ironman World Championships

We loved everything about this special property. The house was spacious and airy and adorned in true Hawaiian style with gorgeous wood floors and furniture, and large lanais on every side. Morning and afternoons we spent lounging at the pool or on the main lanai overlooking the beautiful gardens, or wandering the many pathways near the house to explore the exotic trees and plants and smell the enchanting orchids. This is a true paradise away from the bustle of the beaches and Kona town, which are just moments away. We appreciated the seclusion and privacy after a busy day at Hapuna Beach, especially the outdoor shower and the large sliding wood doors opening the house to the cool air.  The gourmet kitchen had everything we could possibly need including high-end appliances, and with Costco and several other stores just minutes away it was easy to grab some groceries at the end of the day and enjoy relaxing cocktails and dinners on the lanai while watching the sunset. The house itself is spotless and the beds were dreamy; we slept well each night with the windows wide open. The library was a special place for quiet moments to peruse books on exploration and adventure, and gave a warm feel to the house and a personal connection to the owner. Hard to believe a better place can be found that is so close to town and the beaches and the airport, yet just moments up the hill is complete seclusion and relaxation. This is a true paradise and highly recommended for anyone looking for a luxury garden retreat!

This is a truly unique and special home.  The lush surroundings filled with flowers and tropical fruit trees were a true delight to all.  Our family of three adult couples and one baby slept very comfortably and enjoyed cooking together in the well stocked kitchen  and poolside grill.  We especially loved  the outdoor shower, the inviting pool and the attached yoga deck. The house is well located to visit the entire island, downtown Kona, and to access many stunning beaches.   The local manager was very helpful and responsive.   We all hope to return someday soon!

If you are looking for the tropical Hawaii experience, this place is it. Beautiful gardens. Great lanai. Perfectly situated close to town and the beaches. About 5-10 degrees cooler due to the altitude. Perfect after a hot day at the beach. You won’t believe the sounds of the frogs at night and the birds in the morning.

Stop looking and book this now! You won't regret it. It's truly a jungle paradise. We had 2 adults and 3 older kids and it was perfect for us. Our favorite little touches: beach towels available, pool toys, good shampoo and bath products, fresh fruit and flowers, french press and coffee, gorgeous decor, all the big sliding doors opening up to the Lanai, and the list goes on. We were curious if the sink in the 3rd bathroom area was really open to the outdoors and it is - so wonderful. Only 10-15 minutes to town and beaches. A great coffee farm & tour is only 7 min up the hill as well. Everyone we communicated with was super helpful and accommodating as well. It was a dream.

Einfach toll! Diese Ruhe (außer die Vögel am Abend :-) ) und Natur! Sehr tolles Anwesen! Mit ganz viel liebe zum Detail! Man muss sich aber darüber bewusst sein, dass man eben in der völligen Natur ist und mit jedem Tierchen zurecht kommen. Von den Moskitos bis zu den Vögeln. Und hat es sehr gefallen. Die Ausstattung des Hauses lässt nichts zu wünschen übrigen und wenn doch was nicht geht (wlan), dann eine kurze Nachricht und es wurde sofort geholfen. Vielen Dank auch für die nette Begrüßung und das Welcome-Paket (Wein, Kaffe, Obst, Wasser). Waren tolle 5 Tage nur hatten wir etwas Pech mit dem Wetter und könnten daher den Pool nicht nutzen. Vielen Dank nochmals! Mahalo!

I am so enamoured by the stay we had at this place, my whole spirit has protested at having left it, ever since arriving back home.

Mark has created a gorgeous, natural home, set in lush gardens of both bold and delicate tropical trees and plants. Can not recommend it highly enough.

This entire property is breathtaking! Perfect amount of space for my family of 6 and a gorgeous, lush setting for getting ready for my destination wedding in Kailua-Kona. It's ~15 minutes from downtown and at a higher elevation, so even though there was no AC, it was a solid 10 degrees cooler than the notoriously hot and humid coast in early August. Host was super responsive, informative, and accommodating and was quick about fixing a broken sliding door on the lanai. Tons of space (the grounds were especially big) with extra cots/sleeping pads that were actually pretty comfortable. And the plants/foliage! Definitely a highlight for us. It was so beautiful, and the more remote location gave the property a serene feel.

Tip: wear bug spray! Lots of mosquitoes, which really shouldn't have surprised us at all given how tropical the climate is. In addition, don't be surprised if you see some other bugs crawling around because that's pretty much inevitable.

Overall, we absolutely loved our stay here and highly recommend it. Thanks again to Mark and Jacqui for accommodating us!

This home is magical! You should not hesitate to book it. Especially wonderful if you prefer an authentic Hawaiian home experience over the tourist trap feel of the other spots on island. It's only a 5 min drive to the beaches and all the comforts of town - shopping/coffee/restaurants etc. The views, garden and home are truly special. I felt transported. It was so nice to sit on the porch in the evenings and watch the sunset, have a glass of wine. Outdoor shower is an nice perk:) Owner is very accommodating and place is impeccably clean.

Property was gorgeous! A jungle paradise! There were Tons of extra amenities like: coolers, beach chairs, tons of cooking utensils, extra towels and bed sheets they even had robes! The house was incredibly unique in the architecture and had a HUGE wrap around deck that was fully covered if you encountered a rainy day. There was no “living room” with a couch but there was no false advertising at all in the ad, just something we thought might create more of a family atmosphere. However the host made up for that by providing plenty of board games for families to enjoy and get some quality time instead of TV time. I would love nothing more then to come stay here for months on end. A real gem!!!

The house and property are amazing.  So worth it to be a little away from the beach- in exchange you get cool breezes, wild but friendly pheasants, and a nightly chorus of peeper frogs.   I felt I was living in an episode of Blue Planet!
