Additional amenities: Free WiFi, 32 inch flat-screen LCD TV, AC unit & heating, Washer & Dryer on premises, Door buzzer w/ intercom, book library, Clean apartment w/ fresh linens & towels, Family & kid friendly.
interaction: Very minimal if at all. Unless the guests are in need of any assistance.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a DJ/deli owner in SoHo.

reviews.comments: Steven was very responsive and flexible, and the apartment was comfortable and as advertised. Late sleepers might want to note that major construction on this block of Mulberry Street gets started early, but I'm an early riser and it didn't bother me.

Appartement très bien placé, dans le quartier de NY qui est maintenant mon préféré. De nombreux bars, resto très sympa et pas trop chers. Steven est très agréable et se rend disponible au moindre problème (on n'en a eu aucun, impeccable pour le retour des clés, wifi marche parfaitement). Petit moins sur la deuxième chambre un peu petite et le passage obligé à coté du lit pour accéder aux toilettes. La chambre avec lit 2 places est au calme (je dormais la) et très spacieuse.
Je conseille les yeux fermés pour les familles

Exactly what's great about Airbnb. Steven was super friendly and accommodating. We got into town quite late on a Saturday, just after 11pm, and he gladly met us at the apartment with keys.

It's a nice, little apartment. In a brilliant location. And, it's very clean, and functional. 

In regards to location, the Nolita location is actually just as well situated for getting to and from the heart of the LES (let's say, Ludlow and Rivington) than an number of the LES apartments on here which are in the very lower LES or Chinatown.

One small note - you have to walk thru bedroom 2 to get to the bathroom. So, if you have any sort of bathroom anxieties maybe that would bug you.

Anyway - great host, cool place and would gladly stay there again.

This was our first time using AIRBNB and it could not have worked out better.  Steven's place was ideally located and he was very flexible regarding check-in/check out times. We will definitely consider staying again on our next trip to NYC.

Good size apartment in great location. Steven was very flexible and easy to get along with. Fully equipped kitchen a real plus, living spaces comfortable, apartment functional and clean with great artwork, we were very happy with our stay!
Great flat great location great host! Loved it! Thanks Steven

The place was awesome and the location was amazing. A ton of great places within blocks and easy access to the subway. It was a bit cozy, but we managed just fine with four of us (brought an air mattress). Not that you would want to hang out in an apartment when you are visiting NYC, but even when we did have a bit of downtime sitting around or getting ready in the mornings we were not tripping over each other. I would highly recommend the place and definitely hope to stay here again.

Friendly host and a nice apartment that was just perfectly sized for our group of three adults and a baby with her own small travel bed. The kitchen was perfect for cooking something small for breakfast. Very nice beds.
The location is superb with a variety of shops, restaurants and cafés nearby and several subway stations around. Definitely my favorite neighborhood in the city: lively but still peaceful. Next time when going to New York, I'm definitely going to stay in the same neighborhood and would stay in Steven's apartment again.

Steven was easy to work with from the beginning. He responded to questions and made the booking process seamless! Had a wonderful week in NY!! The location was perfect for us, (3 people) close to restaurants and transport.  Safe and secure building. Steven met us on arrival and gave us all the information we needed for the WIFI and area. He allowed us to have a late checkout since our flights were in the evening. The apartment was clean and comfortable with chocolates waiting for us and breakfast provisions in the refrigerator. Highly recommend staying here you will not be disappointed .

Steven was the perfect host!  He was kind, flexible and easy to get in touch with.  Apt. was exactly as described.  Excellent location, super clean, very comfy beds.  Would highly recommend and stay there again myself!
Steven was very helpful and met us at the apartment.  He left maps, and useful information and was always available when we needed anything.

Steven is a great host -- friendly, helpful, and responsive. He welcomed us on arrival and offered to help us with our bags. 

His place is just as described and is very clean. The location is unbeatable, very cool with lots of great shops, bookstores, and restaurants just out the door, and I can't emphasize enough how quiet it is, which is really hard to come by in New York. 

There were three of us and there was plenty of room. I'd definitely stay here on a future visit.

Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt. Gemütliche Restaurants, Lebensmitteladen, Buchladen, Bäckereien und unzählige Shoppingmöglichkeiten sind problemlos zu Fuss erreichbar. Ebenso die Subway. Steven ist unkompliziert und sehr hilfsbereit. Wir reisten erst spät abends an, was kein Problem war. Auch betreffend Check-out war Steven sehr flexibel. Die Wohnung reicht gut für 3 Personen und hat schätzungsweise 30-40 m2. Sie war sehr sauber und für New York erstaunlich ruhig. Kleines Manko: Es gibt keinen Esstisch sondern nur einen Couchtisch. Ich kann die Wohnung nur weiter empfehlen. 
Daniel

Steven's place was perfect for 3. My wife and I and my buddy were comfortable there. The only minor issue is that you have to go through the smaller bedroom to get to the bathroom but if you all are friends it's not a big deal. The location of this apartment is perfect. Close to tons of restaurants, bars, coffee, boutique shops. The street is relatively quiet too which was nice. I'd stay here again next time for sure.

BED BUGS. BED BUG BITES and ITCHY BURNING HORRIBLE RASH. Unfortunately this is my lasting impression of this apartment. Steven, the host was not interested in our plight, which became apparent as we were leaving. I would never stay here again and would never recommend it. I also feel uncomfortable about being asked by Steven to tell his neighbours I am his aunt. I have stayed at other Airbnb apartments and never been asked this. Is this legal? I guess the host got his money, and couldn't care less about his guests. Don't stay here.

Steven was a great host. ..friendly and incredibly responsive to our needs and requests. The apartment was perfect for 2 in a great location and I would have no hesitation in recommending it to any couple looking for a good central to everything apartment. The fact that access to the toilet and bathroom is through the small single bedroom was a problem for us as my daughter is a very light sleeper so only in some cases would it work for 3 people. All in all though we had a wonderful week.

Pros: Great host. Impresively well equipped and clean apartment. Very comfortable and warm. Good location very close to the subway, restaurants and minimarket. The shower had good pressure.
Cons: Fourth floor and with no elevator. The washing machine wasn't working OK. 
Thank you Steven, we had a great time in your apartment.

Very good community, nice location near 3 metro station (prince st, spring st, broadway-lafayette). Little Italy is just a couple of minutes walk. Steven is a great host. He helped us with luggage, and kept very smooth communication. We enjoy staying here. Strongly recommend.

Steven is a considerate host and made us feel very welcome. Arrangements for key pick up etc. were easy and flexible.  The apartment is comfortable and clean and in a great location - close to several subway lines and lots of great places to eat.  The only minor problem is that the bathroom is accessed through the small second bedroom - but nothing that can't be worked around.  Would happily stay there again!
Great location, we really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is well appointed and very comfortable. When you get your new air conditioner you will be set for summer. Thanks again Steven

Met By Steven at the apartment. Easy to communicate with prior and during our stay very accommodating with regards arrival and departure time.
Apartment suited our needs
Fantastic location.

Steven is a considerate host and made us feel very welcome. Arrangements for key pick up etc. were easy and flexible. We got some recommends for Halloween hot spots. So there was a lot of fun. The apartment is comfortable, clean and the location was "primeur", close to hot spots and subway lines. There were a lot of small, fine restaurants around - also for vegetarians. So in any cases - we can recommend Steven as a host. We would happily stay there again.

Steven was really great to deal with online - we didn't get to meet him personally as he was away. Pick up of the key was arranged and was easy. Steven's apartment is in an absolutely fantastic location - great shopping, great dining - in what seems like an older part of town. 

Steven's apartment is quite small (but normal for NY standards) with the spare bed in the corridor to the bathroom. Lucky our 9yo child is a good sleeper. 

I didn't realise Steven was a smoker, and so the smell of the cigarette smoke in the apartment really affected us. The listing is correctly labelled, this was just an oversight on my part. The bathroom and kitchen were clean enough, but there was a fair amount of grime around the light switches and doors. This, combined with the heat of summer with limited ventilation was a little too much for us.

This location in NYC is close to multiple subway stations as well which made sightseeing a breeze.

Steven welcomed us to New York and maintained contact through out our stay.  The location was great!  Market, bookstore, coffee and terrific food, all within a block of the front door!
Thank you,  Diana and Jeffrey
Steven is a smoker and the entire apartment reeked of cigarette smoke and was unbearable.

Steven was a great host. Easy check-in and very helpful. Great location. Just the right amount  of space for a trip. The Airbnb was smoky smelling though, so if you have asthma like me- do not stay here. There is no washer and dryer so if you are staying awhile pack accordingly.

name: SUPERHOST-LARGE&CLEAN-Near Pierloti
summary: You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul I'll help you all your travel. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport,taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi, Big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7. Towels, shampoo
space: I tell you all the Mosques,Churches,Sinagogs,Palaces,Turkish baths, museums and  how you can travel easily and cheaply. Sometimes, if you want  I can joined you. I'll say you the best and the  cheapest restaurants where you'll have  the most delicious Turkish foods, all kinds of  fish and Turkish delıghts. If you want to know more about natural life of Turkey,  Turkish  culture, some places of ınterests ask me.  Once you arrived in Istanbul you are in my responsibility. My home is as clean as how  all girls want. Si estas buscando un piso en alquiler, lo puedes encontrar agui. Tengo para vosotros dos habitaciones amplias. Una de ellas de matrimonio, la otra individual, el salon amplio. Un baño completo, la cocina totalmente equipada Si quieres puedo acompañarte en tu viaje en Estambul We would lıke to welcome you as our guest. It is our pleasure to make you feel comfortable. The apt has everything you  need for  staying. clean located place Refrigerator( for you) 24 hours hot water Bat

neighborhood_overview: You can find all kind of the Turkish foods. The prices are  affordable than the other areas.
transit: Metro, bus, minibus and tramvay, in front of home there is main bus station and 15 minutes far there is metro station.
access: You can stay in living room,you can use the  kitchen refrigerator washing machine dishwasher ,Wi-Fi. You can sit in the living room until you fall asleep.
interaction: Every night i make black tea or rosehip tea or coffee. You can eat fruits, regional Turkish foods, desert  free !!
house_rules: You can smoke and drink everywhere

host.host_about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.comments: Kubilay K. est une personne tres aimable vous etes chez lui bien plus que chez vous. Cette experience a ete un vrai plaisir et je repartirais chez lui des que possible. Il prend soin de vous sur tous les plans. En plus le logement est dans un quartier tres vivant et anime. Ce sejour a ete une reussite et je me demande comment voyager sans airbnb. Si vous venez a Istanbul allez chez Kubilay et vous toucherez du doigt cette realite.

Kubilay is now my best friend in Turkey :) I can't exagerate for his hospitibilty. Despite of my insistance he paid for my dinner, dessert a nice tea afterward and paid for the minibus to the shisha place. Frankly, it might have exceeded the rent I paid. I wanted to go to Kurdistan but non of information was available in English he called the bus company for me and then he came with me to the bus terminal then he barganed on my behalf and I got a cheaper ticket as the result. He didn't leave until he made sure I went on my bus safely. In my return also his friend came with me to Taksim to make sure that I'm getting the right bus to Sabiha airport. I highly recommand him if you want a host who is also your tour guide and freind. Also the prices in the shops are considerably cheaper near his place rather than touristic area like Taksim and you are a 2 TL away from Taksim, so his place is ideal in any sense.

Большое спасибо Кубилаю от всей нашей семьи за тёплый радушный приём, удивительную прогулку по Стамбулу, щедрость, внимательность и гостеприимство! Мы очень хорошо отдохнули в его чистой, светлой квартире. Если получится, с радостью приедем ещё раз.

Kubilay. Thank you very much from all of my family for the warm welcome, amazing trip through Istanbul, generosity, care and hospitality! We really enjoyed our time in your clean and cozy apartment. If this works out, happy to come again.

Oleg, Alena and Egor.

Kubilay est un hote tres agreabe, qui se soucie de vous, vous donne de bon conseil. Il nous avait prevu le petit dejeuner et tous les soirs nous etions acceuillis par du the et des fruits secs.
il est tres facile de se rendre dans les differents lieux interessants de la ville.
a ce prix la, nous ne pouvions rever mieux. n hesitez pas a le contacter.

If you choose an apartment Kubilay - you heard right!
Kubilay a wonderful person with a big heart!
Our little son really loved it!
He has prepared for us a wonderful breakfast! :) Helped us to find the way to the historic center of Istanbul, gave us IstanbulKart to travel around the city.
In his apartment, we feel at home :)

We stayed at Kubilay's home for 3 nights with my boyfriend.
Kubilay has been a great host, very kind and helpful, he made us tea, breakfast and we even had dinner with (so we could discover some delicious specialities).
It's a very nice person and he makes his best to make you enjoy your stay.
The room is very clean and tidy, the bathroom too, nothing to complain about.
The flat is not in the center of the city, so you'll have to take the bus for 15/20 minuts to get to Sultanahmet, but it's worth it because Kubilay's neighborhood is nice, not turistic it's more like a typical turkish area, so you can taste real turkish food (and it's really, really cheap, and delicious).

We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul, don't hesitate and book this room!

Woooooowww!!! Kubilay is the best host you can find in Istambul, we spend a great time in his house and in the city. He´s so kind, attentive and you can talk any topic with him. Also his breakfast and teas are the best, considering we went in winter. We ask a lot of things and he always  help and response us what we need. We highly recommend 100 % to stay with him. Kubilay, the best experiencie,  thanks for everything!!!!

W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) wwww!!! Kubilay es el mejor anfitrion que puedes tener en Estambul, pasamos un agradable tiempo en su casa y en la ciudad. Es muy amable, atento y ouedes hablar de cualquier cosa con el. Sus desayunos y sus tes son lo mejor, considerando que fuimos en invierno. Le preguntamos un monton de cosas y siempre nos ayudo y nos respondio lo que necesitabamos. Recomendamos 100% alojarse con Kubilay, la mejor experiencia! Gracias por todo!!!

Kubilay is really good host! Welcoming, gentle and polite. Our baby loves to play with him!:) The apartment itself is clean and calm. It takes a bit time to get to the city centre (Taksim or Eminonu) but it's ok for us. I definitely would recommend everyone to stay with Kubilay.

anyone going to instanbul and looking for a beautiful place to stay at and make a friend then please stay at kubilay HIGHLY RECOMEND
EVERYONE to stay at his place thanks a lot kubilay u r the best if u ever come to visit punjab please stay with us

The stay at Kubilays place was very nice. Everything was clean and the check in worked very good. Kubilay is very nice and helpful. A perfect opportunity to visit a non touristic part of Istanbul. Thank you.

Host: Kubilay is an easy-going & really nice guy! That translates to a host that's pretty much as relaxed & helpful as u want him to be. And he gives u space if u want it too.

House and room: Kubilay pretty much opened the house to u. Room is basic.

Location: a good suburb about 30-40mins bus ride away from Taksim, depending on traffic. Pretty convenient; 1 direct bus to the Spice Bazaar. 1 direct bus to Taksim.

Highly recommended to those who wants to experience local living.
Kulibalay it's a very good Guy and i have spent a very good travel in this apartment. If You have some question kulibalay can explain you how discover the city.
Very nice room in a good location. Kubilay is also very accommodating. Would stay here again

Kubilay is a very warm, friendly guy that you will feel confortable to get along with. The apartment is well equiped and in good transport connection to hot spots in Istanbul. It's my first time to stay in a host family but honestly this experience is very impressive and I think his hospitality will never fail you. 
在房主請求下寫中文給華人朋友作為參考哈
房主非常友好 warm而且樂於助人 剛來到伊斯坦布爾有什麽不懂的都可以請教他 住宿條件不錯 位置雖然離市中心有一段距離但是交通非常便利 家門口就有兩路巴士直達市中心和景點區不用轉車他還會提供交通卡給你使用 他還會請你喝土耳其的茶還有土耳其特色的早餐 去旅遊有當地人熱情幫助感覺非常棒 你可以跟他用英語交流 還可以問他一些日常的土耳其語怎麼講 在你下一次還去他那裡住的話 他還會給你特別的優惠 我下次再去土耳其還會選擇他的住宿 這是一次非常棒的體驗

Kubilay is a really sweet guy and a great host. He pointed out landmarks on our way to the apartment so we wouldn't get lost when we ventured out on our own.  He answered a thousand questions about Turkish politics and life in Istanbul.  He is really considerate of guests with maps, keys to the apartment and  an Instalbulkart  in the guestroom.  The apartment is really clean and is in a great location. Everything you need is nearby. The bus is close by and is easy because the stop is one end of the line and Emminou is the last stop at the other end.  It's a very nice place to come home to after a day of being a tourist.

It was a pleasure to stay at his. He helped me out with busticket, brought me for dinner and then tea with his mate. The room is ok and the flat is clean and peaceful. I would highly recommend stay at Kubilay's.

I and my wife stayed at Kubilay's for 4 nights and are really glad we did. Kubilay is a wonderful guy who'd go extra mile to make sure you are comfortable. He gave us Istanbul kart (public transport card in Istanbul). He even woke up at 4 in the morning to make sure our early morning Taxi has arrived on time. He provided pointers for places to visit and eat. He recommended a restaurant nearby and we had the best Iskinder kebab there!

Gaziosmanpasa bus stand is few minutes walk from Kubilay's place. Gaziosmanpasa has direct buses to Taxim Square and Eminönü (all the main tourist destinations are near this stop). 

If you want to stay in a non-touristy place, eat best food, want to do some shopping at local price, want to experience Turkish hospitality definitely stay at Kubilay's.

Thanks for wonderful time Kubilay!

I had a great time here! Kubilay is a really great host who provides you with a nice room, great company, and great conversation. The apartment is also nicely located in a place where Taksim and Eminonu are just a bus ride away, respectively. I stayed for 5 nights.

Kubilay is a helpful and caring host. He gave us clear instructions on how to get from the airport, met us at the metro station and took home. A nice variety of fruit and nuts was offered for breakfast. He provided my mum and her friend with a nice room with two single beds, they had also had a choice to sleep in separate rooms. The accommodation is clean with everything you need. It's quite close to the city center and cheap to get there with a transport card that Kubilay provides. Kubilay is an open-minded well-travelled person who will give you all necessary information on sightseeing and not only. Though my mum doesn't speak English, he managed to explain to her where to find traditional hammam and massage so she and her friend were very happy. Thanks for a great stay, Kubilay!

Замечательный заботливый хозяин! Четко объяснил, как проехать к нему от аэропорта, встретил у метро, был все время на связи. Комнаты чистые со всем необходимым. Кубилай предоставил моей маме и ее подруге выбор: спать в одной комнате с 2-мя кроватями или в разных комнатах. Несмотря на то, что моя мама не говорит по-английски, Кубилай сумел объяснить ей, где находится хамам и массаж, чем она была очень довольна! Расположение квартиры удобное, добираться до центра легко и недорого с транспортной картой, которую предоставляет Кубилай. На завтрак Кубилай предложил нам фрукты, орехи, сыр и вкусный чай со сладостями. Спасибо ему большое за радушный прием, информационную поддержку и готовность помочь в любую минуту!

We couldnt have asked for a better host! It was our first time in Turkey and we were pretty nervous esspecially since our flight arrived at 1 am. Kubilay met us at the Mcdonalds nearby and walked us to the apartment. We felt very safe. We wished we could have stayed longer. Kubilay is a great guy!
Kubilay was really friendly and welcoming. He's trustworthy and truly caring. All in all, it was a great experience.

Our room was really nice and tidy at Kubilay! Kubilay is very friendly and open. He was always available if we had something to ask. We learned a lots about dicounts & Turkish specialties from Kubilay. We had no trouble to reach the main attractions and sites in the Central area from our accomodation, the transportation is excellent

Kubilay was very helpful since the day I arrived in Istanbul. He is very friendly and fun host. His rooms were very clean and very clean bathroom and kitchen. I enjoyed my stay with Kubilay. If i come back to Istanbul i would definitely stay with Kubilay again

Our stay with Kubliay was really great.He gave us detailed directions of how to get from the airport to taksim. He then came to pick us up personally and took time off from work to get us and accompany us home and get settled. The room was clean and comfortable and every morning he left us fruit and sweets for breakfast.  Kubilay was a very kind and caring host. He checked in regularly with us, gave us an Istanbul bus card, and gave us ideas of places to visit. He even accompanied us twice on visits in the town to very beautiful places  in ortokoy and sultan ahmet. My mother and I really appreciated kubilay's kindness and stay. The location, while about 30-40 minutes away from Istanbul by bus, is a very animated and non touristic neighborhood that gives you an idea of real Turkish lives. We have fond memories of Gaziosmapasa and our stay with Kubilay!
Kubilay is a very good host, he offers information about the city, the public transport and tips, where to eat. The room is clean. Public transport is nearby.

친절하게 구시가지와 신시가지 가는 법도 알려주시고 픽업도 와주셔서 정말 헤매지 않고 잘 다녀서 좋았습니다. 다만 구시가와 신시가로는 버스를 타고 꽤 가야하는 거리라는 점이 아쉬웠지만 그외에는 다 좋았어요! 집 시설도 좋고 과일이나 터키 전통과자도 주시고 하셔서 참 잘 지내다 왔습니다~ 호스트가 장말 친절하셔서 좋았어요!! 공항에서 집가는 공항까지 신경 많이 써주셔서 정말 감사했습니다~ 터키에 오래 여유있게 여행하신다면 여기에서 좋은 시간 보내실 수 있을거예요. 교통비도 별로 안들어요. 버스 멀미만 없으시다면 추천합니다~

It was a pleasure to stay at Kubilay's apartment. You have very comfortable room with comfortable bed, there are also kitchen, bath and all you need in house. It is very easy explained how to reach house from airport. The host is very hospitable and kind guy, who will try to help with the questions related to Istanbul. He also treated us with tasty Turkish delights :)

Огромное спасибо Кубилаю за отличный день, проведенный нами в Стамбуле. Кубилай встретил нас днем, провел к дому. По дороге показывал места, где можно поесть и что можно посмотреть в городе. 
Квартира очень уютная, в хорошем доме. В комнате нас ожидали сладости от Кубилая :) , чистое белье и полотенца.Нам все очень понравилось) Кубилай замечательный, добрый и отзывчивый парень! 
Спасибо ему большое!

Nice appartment which is easy to reach by public transfer. Kubilay is very helpful with everything. The downside is sometimes the bus trip to the center is very warm crowded and sweaty and takes 30 minutes. The neighborhood can feel a bit creepy in the evening but the good thing is that there is a little bakery just around the corner. 
We liked our stay and this is a nice budget option if you don't mind being out of the centrem.

We had a great time in Istanbul! Kubilay is a really kind and helpful guy. When we needed him, he was always available for information. Besides, we had some really nice chats about Turkey, its culture and his family. The room was nice and clean, the fridge was filled with food and we could take whatever we wanted. The bus to the main sights was a 5 minute walk and there is a nice bakery at the end of the street. Thanks Kubilay for being our host!

Staying with Kubilay had been a very wonderful experience; he's so sincere and always so concerned about your needs and well-being, and he's genuinely interested in learning about other cultures. :) he has interesting and broad perspectives, i really learned a lot about Turkish cultures and some other very insightful matters from conversations with him. And he will always always try his best to make you comfortable with your stay, right from your arrival. He's a really nice person, with a place that's very proper and fully functional for a family/group of travelers to stay in. It's not just another room. It feels like being at home with a friend. I definitely would stay at his ppace again and recommend Kubilay's place, especially for lone female travelers. You'll always feel/be safe under his care! :D

Thank you so much, kubilay!!
We had such a nice time.
We are two girls but it was really safe. He came up to the station when we came back at night.
We wish we could stay more longer....

I and my wife had a very pleasant stay in Istanbul for 7 nights. During that time, Kubilay had been very friendly and helpful.

As a host, Kubilay is a perfect one. He took care of us during our stay. He picked us up from the shuttle-stop, helping me in carrying our luggage, providing the Istanbul card, the maps, and so many information about that beautiful city. He also spent his time as a guide, showing the Suleymaniye Mosque and a very nice terrace for some tea and dinner. He gave clear information about the simplest way to reach destination.

He is also a very nice guy with warm hospitality. We sometimes spent time talking about cultural things in our countries. With such warmth, I consider him a very good friend.

Regarding his apartment, it is a good one. What we saw are the facilities better than what is described in the airbnb page. It is a very clean and nice apartment. The location is near the bus station, makes it very easy to reach various destinations. More importantly, it is a very safe location. I felt very comfortable walking to his apartment even in the late evening.

Finally, in summary, I would recommend him as a host. If I would have a chance to visit Istanbul again, I would like to stay in his apartment again.
Kubilay is a kind host. His appartement exceeded my expectations. Thanks for the surprise breakfast!

Thank you for part of our great rest! We are very glad that choose exactly this house. House's location is very good: there are buses to main areas of European part, middle markets and small stores around where you can buy all what you need. Way from bus stop to home is very easy and impossible to get lost. House isn't close to the road and no noise from outside. 
We were happy to meet with Kubilay: he is every time care about his quests and can answer to your question about Istanbul and help with way, transport etc. He was very hospitable and regales us various Turkish delights. 
Flat and room were quiet and cozy, in the house there the necessary utensils, big kitchen and balcony.
We have a positive experience when were staying in this house. 
Have a host more guests and good luck!

Traveling alone in Istanbul has been easier with the help of Kubilay. I arrived on the 15th October and he was not around to meet me up but he did ask the help of his nephew. His nephew showed me around and gave me Istanbul card (transportation card) to help me settle in. 

The house is situated nearby to the bus station and it's easy for me to get around by myself. I'm impressed with the public transport service because it really gets you around and it's there around the clock. 

I met Kubilay on the fourth day I was there and he brought me around to the non tourist spot and we shared stories and I learnt things I didn't know about Istanbul and the people. And don't forget about the weekend breakfast with him! I enjoyed his company and he is willing to go to the extra miles for his guest. Not to forget the company of his dear friend, Orhan. 

His house is comfortable and is safe to walk around night or day. If you are traveling alone you don't have to worry much as it is a safe area for you to walk and wander around.

Terrific host and location. Gaziosmapasa is a fascinating neighborhood, with a very convenient and quick transport to all major Istanbul centers. The room and apartment are very clean, warm and quiet. Kubilay was a wonderful host - generous, kind, welcoming. 

Thank you Kubilay!
Marija & Danilo

Il mio volo era stato annullato e pertanto sono arrivata in aeroporto all'una di mattina e a casa di Kubilay alle 3. Era ad accogliermi sorridente, mi ha offerto di mangiare. Inoltre ha parlato con il tassista che dall'aeroporto di portava a casa sua in modo da insegnargli la strada e non farmi imbrogliare. Inoltre mi ha messo in contatto in Italia con un ospite precedente che mi ha informato in modo splendido su quanto mi poteva essere necessario ed ha fatto da ponte traducendo a Kubilay alcune mie richieste. Insieme mi hanno assistito in modo molto carino ed efficiente. Inoltre il mio ospite mi ha fatto trovare al mattino una colazione superba andando in pasticceria a pigliare dei dolcetti. Mi ha accompagnato in città, insegnato i mezzi di trasporto dicendomi inoltre che per qualunque necessità avrei potuto contattarlo. E' stato molto gentile e discreto e anche una persona della mia età si è trovata a proprio agio. Anche per la partenza è stato disponibilissimo: ho dovuto alzarmi alle 3 di mattina e alle 4 mi ha chiamato un taxi per andare in aeroporto. Le prossime volte che tornerò ad Istambul, da sola o in compagnia gli chiederò di ospitarmi e consiglierò il suo nominativo a quanti fossero interessati. La casa è molto pulita, il riscaldamento efficiente, ed è a piano rialzato, quindi comoda anche quando si è stanchi per il lungo camminare. E' una persona discreta e disponibile. Roberta

Kubilay is the perfect host that anyone could ever dream of! The room was clean and warm, and the bed was comfortable. Kubilay has done a great job maintaining the house! What's more, he had made my first time in Istanbul an experience that I will cherish for a lifetime! We spent nights chatting in the living room while enjoying his famous home made tea and gormet snakes that his mother made. One day it was my birthday, he met me after work for dinner and took me to his "secret base" in TakSim. The place was very nice and I bet you can never find it just by yourself. There we were enjoying tea and Kurdish music, Kubilay taught me to play Persian chess. He explained the tips and tricks carefully and patiently and now I'm addicted to it! He took me for a walk to the peak where you get to see the skyline of whole Istanbul. We sat down and enjoyed the beautiful view while tasting tea... He knows lots of places that are not written in any of the travel guides. You shouldn't hesitate to ask him for suggestion. He is more than nice and kind. To me he is more like a long lost friend. You know, when you are alone in a foreign land, a host like Kubilay would not only ease all your anxieties and bring you a sense of safety, but also make the trip a meaningful experience. He has made Istanbul my home. There is no need to mention that he allowed me to use everything in his kitchen and insisted that I didn't need to wash them after use. I would definitely come back to visit him and stay at his place again! Thank you Airbnb for giving me the chance making this life-long friend!

Well, you can never dream of having such a great host like Kubi. Prior to my arrival, communication was great. Kubi is very flexible with your arrival and departure time. Should he's not available to receive you upon your arrival, he will make arrangement with his friend to fetch u. Kubi is never a host to me cause He's such a Great Buddy to everyone. A friend in need is a friend indeed. You can give him a ring or txt him at anytime and he will be so glad to assist you. He will always make himself available 24/7. He will always respond very fast to any of your queries. Indeed,he's a true friend. He has go beyond e status of just a host. Kubi willingly share any knowledge w you be it politics, turkish language or even "culinary skills".  Its definitely your loss not to stay with him! Thanks Kubi for everything.

Very nice hosting during holiday in Istanbul. Very helpful. I remember that he contacted me at (Hidden by Airbnb) and described good information by phone. You can find bus stop, small turkish restaurant, ATM, minimarket, and traditional market (on wednesday). And the most important: the heater helped me during winter season. Never switch off by landlord.

The room was very clean and its located in a really safe district.
Kubilay is a very nice guy who's easy to communicate with. Since it was my 1st time in Stambul I've got a lot of useful info from him....how I can save a lot of money on typical things like attractions and food, the best places to visit, the quickest and cheapest ways to get where I needed etc. 
Essentially I just had a great time without any headaches related to foreign countries. 
T8 a lot!!!

Kubilay is an amazing host!!! He is very helpful with anything you need, I definitely recommend his place to anyone. He also has a series of maps and is always willing to tell you or even show you personally where to go eat and how much to spend so you don't get ripped off

Kubi is amazing! Extremely helpful from start to finish, went out of his way to make sure we had a good experience of Istanbul (special thanks for the Turkish snacks!) I'd recommend anyone to stay there; it's an infinitely better experience than going to a Hotel! The only downside is how far out it is. If you're going to see the main sights, transport into the city takes up a lot of time.

Well, what could I say...
I confirm most of comments below are true.
During my trip in Istanbul happened things that was caused by my lack of caution.
Without Kubilay, i would couldnt do anything for them.
I am very grateful and sorry for inconvenience I caused.
Kubilay bend more than he ever have to but do not show It to me and stay calm all the time. His nerves are made of steel.
Really great guy!
And really great host!
House was nice and It was easy to go see places you want.

I was made to feel very welcome by Kubi, nothing was too much trouble and he came out to came out to meet me at 6am and came out one evening to show me a part of Istanbul i would have not known of (Pierre Loti is worth a visit, day or night) The room is exactly as described, very large and definitely big enough for two.
Thanks Kubi

He is a very cheerful person. Travelers from all over the world had come to stay in his guest house. Exchanges and they had a lot of fun. You can eat a homely Turkish cuisine at his house. He is familiar with Cappadocia thing because it is a professional guide
I was made very welcome and Kubilay was very helpful with information as necessary.
Kubi excellent

Kubilay was a great host: he made sure we felt like at home and provided us maps of Istanbul and tips to visit the city. He also took time to show us his favourite places, which we could´t have found by ourselves! He is nice, polite and reliable.

我一直认为对一个陌生城市最好的最快的最深入的了解,就是住在当地人家里｡所以第一次的土耳其之旅,第一站我就选在了Kubi家｡Kubi真的是一个非常非常nice的男生,从订房之前就开始解答我关于旅游行程的问题,在其他地方旅游的时候我有问题也依然向他咨询,他热情､耐心,帮我翻译了很多我看不懂的土耳其语｡我们订了一个独立房间,结果一层楼他都给我们使用了!房间干净舒适,周围很安全很安静,床超级舒服!交通也很方便,家门口的公车站是始发点,很快就可以到各个景点｡我们每天逛完景点,会在家门口的面包店和水果店买各种吃的,放在冰箱里,就像回到自己家一样｡和住酒店是完全不一样的体验!It is the best department in my travel in Turkey!
Great guest and location

Kubilay is a great host, he came to pick us from the local square, he is very friendly and polite person, he helped us to get around the city and we also went out for a dinner. The apartment is great, just as it looks on the pictures (new, clean, spacious, equipped...). It is located in the center of the neighborhood and everything you need is around (like McDonalds, banks, bakeries, shops, public bus station, the square...). The neighborhood (in my opinion)  is one of the best in Istanbul, close to the center of Istanbul and yet not too crowded, with free parking places around. I would definitely choose this place again. I am sorry that my stay was short so i wasn't able to hang out more with Kubilay, but i thank him and hope to see him again!

What can I say about my mini trip...?Amazing city, wonderful staying, a host with a huge heart. Unfortunately a very short travelling. But not too short time for understanding Kubi, like a person. A smart, intelligent, helpful, kindly human. Willing to meet new people, to learn others country customs, to taste new national food. It was a pleaser to have such a quiet and reserved person as a host. He met me , showed me all the sightseeing, told about (Website hidden by Airbnb) on, with satisfaction, because he respects his guests and  adores his city. A perfect location of the apartment with lovely bedrooms for renting. I am not sorry neither for destination Istanbul no Kubilay's room staying in. For the next my trip in Istanbul (that time not so short), I am totally sure it would be the same Kubi's house. I hope that he would meet me with the same warmth. I already miss the Istanbul life:))

Kubilay is a nice and very friendly guy.His flat was quiet und we really liked to stay there. Altough he was not in town, he sent some very helpful friends to pick us up at the shuttle and to give us a introduction to the place and city. We had food on the terrace with a fantastic view over Istanbul with him. Thanks for your hospitality!
Highly recommended to stay there!

Really nice house! Really nice landlord~
I ordered for my collegues,but I can really feel his kindness and warmth although we never met each other.
He is really responsible for everything.And my collegues also said so. 
Thanks a lot.I wish I could come to your house someday in person.
Best wishes.

Great stay. The place is very nice and clean and I really got some good sleep.
Although Kubilay was not there, he and his friend/girlfriend really helped me a lot. They assisted me with every question I had and Kubilay sometimes texted me, just to ask, if everything is okay. They even made tea for me and I really felt at home. Thanks a lot!

Kubilay made us feel extremely welcome, was there to pick us up at the bus stop from the airport and even showed us around Istanbul himself. 
He offered us a tea from a nice little place he knew - in short Kubilay was a great host all around. The appartment is nice, in a residential area.

stay here to feel like a local Istanbul person. Kubi is so polite and helpful. it is like staying in a brother's home. he text me to ensure that I'm all good in Istanbul.

he brought me out for dinner with his friend at his favourite base in Istanbul with incredible view. a restaurant i wouldn't have known or could find. also some spots such as local bazaar and Suleimaneye mosque.

he also suggested a place called Pierre Loti quite near to the apartment. it is recommended, beautiful view, spend your whole day picnic there. there's cable-car ride up to the top of the hill. (for Muslims, there is Ayep Sultan Mosque nearby which has relations with history of Prophet Mohammad)

Kubi was very warm with the hospitality, he offered me turkish snacks, dried fruits & a turkish dish which was made by his father.
i felt very comfortable at his apartment & neighbourhood. i recommend anyone who wants a good and unique Istanbul experience to stay at his place. please stay longer because i personally feel my 5 days was tooooo short. :))

and i enjoyed all the conversation topics we had, something that interests me. i still have many questions to ask as i'm very interested in social, politics & culture of Turkey.

Facilties:
-clean and spacious
-the wifi connection was very good.
-he provided towels, toothpaste & shampoo
-the shower heater was available all time

Neighbourhood:
-i travelled alone & often return to the apartment around 11pm or later and felt very safe. don't worry.
-there are dessert shops, marts, money exchange, ATM cash machines, cafe and restaurants to go to. and best of all, the prices are local prices means cheaper than touristic areas.

Location, Getting Around:
-on first day of arrival, Kubi or his friend/nephew will meet up with u at the nearby square and show you the way. 
-Kubi provided me with an IstanbulKart (a public transport card) to use while in Istanbul, hence all you need to do is top-up the card and ready to go. getting to main tourist attractions are only 30mins bus ride away, 
use an App called ""Trafi"" it will suggest routes & prices on public transports. by traveling by bus, i really felt like local :D

This was my very first Airbnb experience and Kubilay had made it amazing. The apartment is situated in a lovely residential neighborhood where buses run frequently downtown (approx. 20 minutes journey time to Taksim/Eminonu). 
The room provided was spacious and clean and we were constantly reminded by Kubilay to treat the whole apartment as our own! He knows Istanbul inside out and provided us with all the sightseeing tips.
Kubilay is truly polite, kind and intelligent and I've had the pleasure to exchange certain ideas and views with him. On my last night in Istanbul, Kubilay brought me to Pierre Loti and the views were absolutely splendid.
The house was very good .kubil was nice person and helpful . The house location is very good to all the activity areas in the city ... Thx kubilay

Kubilay is a great host and he helped me with some good piece of advice about where to go . I've enjoyed a lot my stay in Istambul. The flat is located in a local and friendly neighborhood. P.S: Don't miss beautiful PIERRELOTI. Thank you Kubilay for your hospitality!!!!

The owner of the place is nice and quick to respond, but the location and state of the actual listing are less than desirable. The towels were a little sour and linens were sticky. The kitchen was kind've clean, the bathroom was definitely very outdated and no hot water. The location was very far from everything and if you don't speak good Turkish or Arabic you'll definitely not feel too comfortable. Okay If traveling on a dime but there are better more central places to choose from. I would not stay here again.

Kubilay's place is quiet, which I suspect is quite a rare thing in Istanbul. The man himself is incredibly helpful, he met us in the square nearby at 0400 when we arrived and helped us find parking for a very large car plus motorcycle trailer. Great place, great host.

If I become rich one day that I could afford $100 per night hotels, I would still prefer to stay at Kubilay's place.
The homely environment, nice Turkish tea, all markets near by, super local transportation, amazing host, a friend I would say now.

Highly recommended, enjoy Istanbul.

I loved staying at Kubilay's apartment., it was very warm and welcoming. I felt very at home there.
The apartment is quite away outside the touristy area  of Istanbul so locally you will experience 'real' Turkey however it is only a 30 min tram journey into the city. centre. For me Kubilay's place was a perfect location.
His apartment is very comfortable, especially the bed. I was provided with plenty of clean towels and the shower is amazing! His girlfriend Deniz cooked a very delicious and more than substantial breakfast every day. 
Kubilay was extremely helpful with directions whilst I was out and about, which I really appreciated.
I would hope to stay here again if I return to Istanbul. Thanks Kubilay, I really appreciated all your help

This is my first time for me to try AirBnb. What a nice stay ? .
I wish my future stays with Airbnb will be as good as my stay at Kubilay's home.
The room is spacious. The whole flat is clean and has all you may want including well equipped kitchen,  WiFi , washing machine ..
Etc.
Kubilay is very helpfull.
A specail thanks to his freind Deniz for being so hepful and welcoming.
For me  this AirBnb experiene is far more better than a stay in a Hotel.
You can feel the "warmth of a HOME".
During my 3 days stay i knew my neighbour guests in the flat :
Lynne, a nice English lady, Hussine a Lebaneese youth and a persian guy, besides Kubilay and Deniz.
What a nice experience.
I would love to do it again.
.
I recommend Kubilay's home for any one visiting Istanbul.

Nevertheless Kubilay was not in the city, he gave me a hand in any situation! Thanks for that! As for the place, it is clean and comfortable enough for travelers! Bus station to any part of the city is some 3 minutes away!
One of the best host I've had Kubilay is no:1 such good conversation and time spend..

地点很合适的土耳其本地住家,厨房热水都很好用周边生活设施完备,停车是在路边,免费,很方便,既避开了闹市区,又拥有一个小小的一应俱全的副市中心,ET肉店､甜品店､烤肉店都值得推荐,逛街美食美景步行范围内都有,这个区域没有游客,本土生活与本土价格,非常合适懂得旅行意义的旅行者,Kubilay是一个当地旅行与美食达人,可以解决你的所有问题,也非常热情友善,如果回到Istanbul有时间的话,我非常愿意再去看看他｡
One of the best airbnb you can find in Istanbul. You feel like you are in your house. Kubilay is a really nice person, kind and helpfull when need. The place is pretty well situated.

Kubilay was a great host. The room is nice and close to public transport, which can be a bit difficult to figure out - but Kubilay explained everything to me. He was a very inviting host and I enjoyed my stay.

Thank you Kubilay for sharing your  home with us. It felt like visiting a really nice, hospitable relative. :) Truly a superhost with a big heart! Highly recommended stay for future travellers. Easily the best experience we've had with Airbnb so far. He not only served us but even taught us how to make Turkish tea which is pretty amazing! Helped us with translation, navigation and some nice local recommendations. His profound insights on Turkish culture and politics were impressive. Our kids grew very fond of him in a short time. We really appreciate Kubi going out of the way to make his guests feel at home!

Чудесная теплая квартира с приятной атмосферой и хорошим расположением (рядом с автобусной станцией и недалеко от метро). 
Кубилай - очень добрый и тактичный человек, идеальный хост, который всегда поможет, всегда на связи и всегда открыт к общению.
Если я снова вернусь в Стамбул, то непременно остановлюсь здесь.
Всем мира.

Kubi 超级热情,超级绅士｡我飞机延误到凌晨2:30落地,他一直没睡等我,还来小广场接我,回去又陪我聊天到快四点｡中间有一天我问他什么土耳其啤酒好喝,我买点回去一起,他推荐了之后抛下正在聚会的朋友赶回来陪我｡还带着我买去 efes 的大巴票｡他的英语不错,交流很顺畅｡虽然房子的位置离老城区有一点远(公交车40分钟),但是这能让你看到不一样的伊斯坦布尔｡房子里的东西都能用,kubi 在周末还做了土耳其早餐给我们,平时可以自己做东西吃,有现成的面包｡阳台的窗户是不关的(但是门会是关着的),会有流浪猫跳进来要吃的,晚上就睡在阳台上的纸箱里或者猫咪房子里｡我后面会回伊斯坦布尔转机,kubi 还说我可以回房子里,当时我已经把钥匙还给他了,他说到时候他会让他的朋友给我｡真的感觉 kubi 不是在做生意而是在认真交朋友｡住在这里的体验非常好｡土耳其的第一站对我可以说是完美的 :)

Je suis resté 1 mois chez Kubilay. 
Kubilay est une personne sociable, agréable,  gentille, toujours prête à aider son prochain.  
Le quartier où se trouve son logement est 100% local, super occasion de sortir des zones touristiques.  Cependant, à deux pas de l'appartement,  il y a le metro et de nombreuses lignes de bus qui vous emmèneront en moins de 30 minutes à Taksim, Eminönü etc.. 
Je dois ajouter que la nuit on y dort super bien, c'est silencieux ! 
Pour conclure,  si vous souhaitez séjourner à Istanbul chez une personne de confiance, foncièrement bonne, dans un appartement remplie d' énergies positives. Ne cherchez plus, vous l'avez trouvée!

Kubilay gerçekten çok çok teşekkür derim!
O Kubi é um ótimo host. Ajuda com todos os tipos de informação, mostra lugares bacanas e é sempre muito solícito. Recomendo!
Kubilay es una persona muy atenta, que está siempre dispuesta a ayudar, recomendamos 100% su alojamiento.
The place is convenient and quite, the host is very helpful , he picked us up from a close by square to the apartment.

It was a great stay at Kubilay's place. Away from hustle and bustle of central Istanbul, yet get there easily by public transport.  Great hospitality by Kubilay. You can experience real turkish life, life as a local in that area.  I highly recommend this place.

Kubilay est une personne extraordinaire. A premier coup, on pourrait rejeter son aide. Par crainte que la facture va exploser. Mais.. du tout! Il est naturellement bon et serviable. Il attend rien en retour. Il veut vous mettre à l'aise, dans un pays où l'Anglais et le Français sont étrangères à 85% de la population.

Kubilay is the best Airbnb host we had so far during our 10 days stay.We felt very much at home at his place in GAZIOSMANPASA,Istanbul.His place is the best for travellers who wish to live like a localite in Istanbul.We ate almost all dinners together at Fantastic local places around.We were lucky to be there during Ramadan.Special thanks to Kubi's friend Meyra for preparing delicious Turkish dinner for one of the evenings.Kubi is extremely accommodative.He was our official tour guide :)).We explored great parts of Istanbul with him e.g.Besiktas,Pierre-loti,Asian side etc.

The neighborhood is completely non-touristic,we were the only tourists around ,we felt :).Shopping,eatingn,connections to the center all within proximity (few mins walk)

Kubi's apartment is very spacious.Our room was big and bed,quilts very very comfy.We felt very lazy sometimes because of the bed haha.
Shower had hot water all through.Fresh towels and toiletaries were provided.Breakfasts materials were there including fresh fruits,eggs. And turkish tea,coffee.Wifi worked fine all days.
Overall we had a great time with Kubilay,his friend Meyra (and her sweet cat Bitter:),and his other Airbnb guest Sue from Taiwan.We made great friends.

It was very nice to stay at the Kubi house! Kubi was always in touch, gave clear explanations on how to get to the meeting place with his friend Meira, who helped us to get to the apartment, had a delicious lunch and made coffee!Meira was also kind and ready to help and answer all our questions. Kubi was Pawel fruit, baklava and a delicious tea. Kubi gave us a map of what is and written bus numbers, which helped us a lot! All our stay at Kubi's house, do we have any questions! It was easy and pleasant to communicate with Kubi!I recommend You to stay in the house of Kubi!


Было очень приятно остановиться в доме Куби! Куби всегда был на связи, дал четкие разъяснения как добраться до места встречи с его другом Меира, которая помогла нам добраться до квартиры, угастила вкусным обедом и приготовила кофе!Меира так же была добра и готова помочь и ответить на все интересующие нас вопросы. Куби угащал нас фруктами, пахлавой и вкусным чаем. Куби дал нам карту где что находиться и написаны номера автобусов, что нам очень помогло! Все наше пребывание в доме Куби, он  есть ли у нас какие то вопросы! С Куби было легко и приятно общаться!Я рекомендую Вам остановиться в доме Куби (Website hidden by Airbnb)

This was my second experience with Airbnb, and it was dope. I really liked it and Kubi the Host - awesome guy! Very helpful, he gave me best tips and recommendations, where to eat good and which places to visit when. My one week trip was awesome because of his guidances otherwise it would have been just ok or good, I guess if I stayed at a hotel. 
All in all it was a superb trip in Istanbul. Kinda hot doe - first week of July. 
BTW - Kubi has a very nice and helpful friend, which came sometimes and visited us. 
Only one suggestion I would give Kubi is - maybe having a fan because it really can get hot during the nights.
Thx again Kubi for everything, I appreciate your time and your hospitality.

Kubilay n'était pas présent lorsque nous avons séjourné chez lui, c'est son amie Humeyra qui nous a accueilli. Et quel accueil ! Ponctué des pleins de petites attention (petit-déjeuner, conseils sur les sorties, les lieux à visiter, les bons plans), notre séjour à Istanbul fut excellent en grande partie grâce à elle !
Kubiley is friendly and a welcoming host. The place is clean and 5 mins walk from a very happening area.
Kubilay is a very kind.patient.generous man who always treats the passengers like friends
이스탄블 관광지와 떨어져 있지만,조용하고 휴식.취하기 좋은 곳임.특히 호스트와 펍에서.생맥주 한잔!좋습니다.

L'hospitalitat del Kubilay és immillorable, ens hem trobat com a casa. En Kubi ha estat molt atent amb nosaltres, ens ha solucionat tots els dubtes al moment, ens ha assessorat sobre llocs on canviar, on menjar, com moure'ns per Istambul, què visitar. Hem après moltíssimes coses de la ciutat i de Turquia i ens emportem un molt bon record de la nostra estada.

------

Kubilay's hospitality is unbeatable, we found like at home. Kubi has been very friendly with us, he has fixed us all the doubts at the time, he has advised us on places where change, where to eat, how to move in Istanbul, what to visit. We have learned many things about the city and Turkey and we take a lot of good memories of our stay.

Our stayed 5 nights at Kubilay house was great, its such a good place, surronding by many clothes shop, bakery and also restaurant and a few minute walk to the bus stop. Kubilay was very kind, generous and passion Man, he gave us suggestion the place to visit and also explained how to get the place by bus with every detailed. He also accompanied us to go to nice Pierlotti Garden and have Kunefe at Night during our stayed there. Kubilay is very kind and caring to his guess. Kubi likes our personal travel advisor.

Kubi Also provided many fruits and the sweet the kitchen.
Me, my mother and my friend Vivi were enjoyed stay at Kubi House, we felt like home sweet home stay there that we can cooked and we can used washing machine also. Kubi also helped us to ordered big car to the airport.

Thanks Kubilay for our stayed at yours and you made our wonderfull holiday in Istanbul. We will back again when we visit Istanbul.

As a solo, female traveller,  I was initially hesitant to visit Istanbul  but I'm delighted I did so. This city is beautiful, safe and very modern :) with Kubilay as my superhost, I had an amazing time! The apartment is located in a safe, lively district, a short bus ride from Taksim square. There aren't as many tourists and this lends to the advantage of exploring the city as a true local and paying less $ as opposed to the more touristic hub.

The apartment has everything you will ever need, and  for breakfast there are a million things to choose from! Kubilay is beyond generous allowing use and access to almost anything in the house.I felt as if I was staying at my friend’s home and  this is what he has since become, my friend. I was very well cared for and for this I am truly grateful. I ate most of my meals (the best food I’ve ever had in my life) with him,most of which he even paid for. He even took me along with his friend to catch some breathtaking views of the city and at night we discussed the best routes and places to visit the following day. He provided plasters for the blisters on my feet, on my departure he accompanied me to the bus stop and helped me with my heavy luggage.

There are countless other nice things he did for me and many other reasons why you should stay at this  Airbnb. The most important  to me being Kubilay himself  because his kind heart shines even brighter than beautiful  Istanbul.

Thank you for everything Kubilay, I will never forget your kindness and I hope to see you again some day ئیشاڵا
Kubilay es muy amable esta presto a ayudar en todo, una se siente como en casa.

Едва мы прилетели в Стамбул, почувствовали себя как дома. На выходе из аэропорта нас встретила Мейра, чудесная подруга Кубилая. Путь до дома занял всего около 20-30 минут. Все это время мы тепло общались с Мейрой, она показывала и рассказывала нам про город, на что стоит обратить внимание. Так что время пролетело незаметно. Кубилай встретил нас в квартире и помог заселиться. Он сделал все, чтобы мы почувствовали себя комфортно. Квартира располагается в отличном месте - рядом есть магазины, несколько автобусных остановок, метро. Так что в любой момент можно добраться в каждую точку города. Не стесняйтесь задавать вопросы Куби и Мейре. Они обязательно Вам помогут и подскажут - как лучше добраться до интересующего Вас места, где лучше покупать или не покупать товар, который Вы хотите. Они прекрасные собеседники, всегда открыты и готовы помочь.

Самый лучший хозяин однозначно Кубилай . Не смотря на позднее время Мейра меня встретила и привезла на квартиру . Такого хозяина я не встречала , объяснил как и добраться куда мне нужно , дал проездную карту , сопровождал до остановки , все что хочешь есть дома покушать , фрукты ,орехи, чай . Все удобство для хорошого проживания есть , так что не зря Кубилаю дали статус Супер Хозяин . Рекомендую не пожалеете!
Kubilay is quick in his response when you need it . Guides you accurately.
Kubi is an incredibly kind and generous man who did everything he could possibly do to make me feel safe and welcome.
I had good time at Kubilay's, great hospitality although i arrived late at around 2 AM he was waiting. All what a guest need is available in the house. Thanks Kubilay!

We were so lucky and pleased to stay in Istanbul with Kubilay in his wonderful house! Everything was great: the accommodation, our room, the hospitality of the host, the local dinner at our arrival and Humeyra’s meeting at the airport!!))) all the days of our stay we were surrounded    by Kubilay’s care and attention! We were feeling at home and Istanbul didn’t seem to be so huge and unknown to us))) Kubilay helped us a lot, gave very helpful tips and even organized a special evening with watching whirling dervishes, it was really marvelous!)) Kubilay is not just a wonderful host, a man with the kindest heart and the most beautiful soul, but one of the greatest sights of Istanbul!) My 6 years old son is also impressed by staying in Kubilay’s flat))) everything was super-super!) thank you a lot!))
War alles in Ordnung
Very nice and hospitable guy!

name: Studio + Terrace @ Historic Centre!
summary: Fully equipped studio with Wi-Fi and AC,  located in Porto historic center.  From here you can walk everywhere! And the terrace...have a look!! :) 6452/AL
space: The studio has 45 square meters and a terrace with a view over the Douro River and the city. It's a 3rd floor, NO elevator. Ideal for 2, but accommodates up to 4 people! FULLY EQUIPPED APARTMENT • king Size Bed (160 cm x 200 cm) • double Sofa Bed (140 cm x 190 cm) • 40'' LCD TV, cable TV with international channels, DVD Player (and movies as well) • free Wi-Fi • kitchenette with electric oven, electric stove, microwave, fridge with a small freezer compartment and dishwasher.   small appliances such as coffee machine, kettle, toaster, sandwich maker, electric squeezer, handheld blender. • eating table with 2 chairs (and 2 folding stools also available) • bathroom with shower (hairdryer available)  • bed linen and towels included • small laundry with washing and dryer machine, iron/iron board and a drying stand that you can use indoor or in the terrace. • air conditioning (heating and cooling) and a portable handheld scale are available LARGE TERRACE WITH AN AMAZING VIEW On the upper flo

neighborhood_overview: LOCATED IN PORTO HISTORIC CENTRE  Located in Porto historic center, in an area classified as UNESCO World Heritage in 1996. From here you can walk to the most important touristic spots!  Good restaurants and bars are just around the corner as well! :)
transit: São Bento metro stop is 650 meters away. Bus 601 (from/to the airport) is 350 meters away. I will send you detailed information for the arrival day.
access: Full access
interaction: I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me.
house_rules: 1. I really care about the apartment, so please take care of it like it was yours.  2. Parties are not allowed 3. Pets are not allowed, sorry! 4. Smoking inside is not allowed.  5. The "official" check-in time is after 14h00 and the check-out time is maximum at 11h00, but if the apartment is available other arrangements can be made. I am flexible with this! 6. I am obliged to communicate your stay to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), so I will ask some Passport or ID Card details (like in any hotel).

host.host_about:
Hey!
My name is Raul and I live in Porto, the best city of Portugal and the World! :)
I like to walk outdoors, have a beer and a good chat with my friends and I love "Francesinhas" (you will discover what that is when you visit my city).

I love to travel and I am lucky to do most of the trips with my long time girlfriend, who became my wife in 2014! 
Together we have already traveled in Argentina, Austria, Belgium, Bosnia, Brazil, Bulgaria, Croatia, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, USA and are always looking for the next destination. 

And now we have a baby daughter, born in November 2016! :)

I will be very happy to welcome you in the lovely Porto!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Raul was a great host! The flat is beautiful! Great location! Raul showed all The places to visit, transports...everything you need to have a great stay in Oporto! You have everything you need nearby and you can go everywhere by foot from the apartment! Definitly a place to stay when other friends come to visit the city!

Raul is a perfect host, ready to help you in everything need. We discover the best places to visit and the best restaurants thanks to him. The flat is also awesome, with everything you need for a great stay in Oprto center. The icing on the cake is the terrace on the top floor, where you can enjoy a delicious Port Wine glass. We recommanded absolutely the stay there!

We had a perfect stay at Raul' apartment and the last day we did not want to leave! The apartment was perfect in every possible way: close to the city center (everything is close in Porto), VERY clean, great bed, shower, kitchen, etc. etc. The private upper terrace is just lovely, above all at sunset. I would definitely recommend staying here to everyone and I will stay here again if I come back to beautiful Porto. Also, you can park your car in the door of the building for free during your stay. 

Raul was really helpful and he is there to greet you personally, his service is incredible. He is very knowledgeable and will help you get the most out of your stay in Porto. Raul has thought of everything from toiletries to cold beers in the fridge. Really, really nice! Oh and he also speaks Spanish perfectly! Also, don’t forget ask him about francesinhas! Muchas gracias por todo Raul :)

What a wonderful studio! The highlight is the staircase in the middle of the room that takes you to the spacious 50 square meter terrace, with even an outdoor shower. The location was perfect, close to the Douro and the famous Torre dos Clérigos just in front of the door.
Raul was very helpful and made sure our stay was perfect!

Werkelijk een fantastisch mooi en smaakvol ingericht appartement op een toplokatie in Porto. Het is in een oud gebouw op de hoogste verdieping (ruim traphuis, geen lift) maar helemaal modern opgeknapt en nog steeds met enkele oude details. Het dakterras is de kers op de taart, echt fantastisch mooi aangelegd met houten vlonders en kunstgras en een panoramisch uitzicht over de stad inclusief de Douro en de Vila Nova de Gaia. Voldoende restaurants, winkels en bars op loopafstand. Belangrijke bushalte praktisch voor de deur, metro 5 tot 10 minuten lopen. Raul is ook een aardige en zeer informatieve gastheer en reageert zeer snel op emails en smsen. Ideaal appartement voor 2 personen, partners of zeer goede vrienden want het is een studio, dus alles in één ruime ruimte. Volgende keer Porto verblijf ik zeker weer hier als het appartement beschikbaar is.

Raul is a fantastic host who can tell you all the best places to visit and more importantly to eat, especially francesinha.  The apartment was immaculate with all the comforts one needs.  The location is fantastic with everything well within walking distance.  Bonus points for being right across the street from O Melhor Bolo de Chocolate do Mundo!  The hidden gem of Raul's apartment is the rooftop terrace where one can relax on lawn chairs and stare off at the Porto skyline as the sun sets and you enjoy a fine glass of Port wine to finish off your night.  Thanks for hospitality Raul!

Raul's Studio was really nice. Exactly as seen on the pictures. Very clean and the terrace was simply amazing. Raul provided us with a map and loads of useful information about Porto which really helped us make the most of our short stay. We can absolutely recommend his place.
it was just perfect, what a wonderful place and host!

We had a wonderfull stay in Oporto and Raoul's flat was the best place to discover the city! The terrace offer an incedible view on the historic center and on the douro! We were welcome very friendly by Raoul's Brother, who explain us everything we need to know to enjoy our stay, Thanks Bruno, thanks Raoul! :)

Had such a great experience staying at Raul's flat in Porto. 
The apartment itself is really beautiful and the roof garden is absolutely wonderful! 
Raul is one of the kindest people you could ask to meet. He helped us with everything we needed during our time in Porto.
Such a great AirBnb experience. If I could give it 10 stars I would. 
Thanks for everything Raul!

Nous avons beaucoup aimé cet appartement agréablement placé à proximité du centre ville de Porto. L'appartement était très propre et confortable, assez bien agencé avec toutes les fournitures nécessaires à un agréable séjour.
 
Evidemment, la terrasse sur le toit est un "must" que nous avons beaucoup apprécié avec une vue panoramique sur  les environs de Porto. L'environnement est plutôt tranquille. La ville, très pittoresque et pleine de surprise, est facile à visiter à pieds depuis l'appartement.
 
Raul , qui parle très bien en anglais et en français, nous a très sympathiquement reçu et nous a donné beaucoup d'informations sur la ville. Nous avons apprécié sa disponibilité et sa gentillesse.

Superbe séjour dans une ville qui mérite le détour.

L'appartement de Raul est impeccable et son accueil particulièrement chaleureux.

La terrasse sur le toit offre une vue magique sur la ville.

We stayed two nights in Rauls appartment! It was really awesome and Raul helped us with many hints and Information of the City!
Thanks again, really a great experience!
Axel

Pour tous les français désireux de découvrir porto : l'appartement de Raul est le meilleur endroit de la ville !! Le quartier historic!! Et proche du centre ville et fleuve le "duro" ! Un appartement contemporain tous confort avec une terrasse sur les toits fantastique nous offrant une des plus belle vue de la ville!! 
Quant a Raul c'est un hôte parfait : disponible, soucieux de bien faire, et a notre disponibilité ! Merci a lui!! Nous vous recommandons cet appartement!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour et découvert une ville charmante et attachante. Raoul nous a particulièrement bien reçus et conseillés. L'appartement est idéalement situé, très bien aménagé, les équipements de très bonne qualité et neufs et ... la terrasse est tout simplement superbe : c'est un réel "plus" ; on y découvre une vue à 360° et l'apéro de fin de journée y prend une toute autre saveur ... Nous recommandons vivement ce logement. Encore Merci Raoul.

Super appartement, qui donne sur les toits et s'ouvre sur une terrasse fabuleuse.
Tranquillité, espace, propreté, un véritable nid d'amour
Déco alliant modernité et ancien, nous avons beaucoup aimé l'encadrement des fenêtres en granite et la vue sur les toits de porto et le douro.
Raul est un hôte charmant et attentionné toujours disponible pour nous conseiller sur un restau ...

This was one of the best places I've stayed at via AirBnB. The flat looks exactly as in the photos and the roof terrace is amazing! Raul was very kind and helpful and Porto itself is a lovely town. I'll be back!

Weekend de rêve dans l appartement de Raul .
Idéalement placé nous avons parcouru tout porto à pied :) une ville si magnifique 
Raul a été un hôte d exception il nous a reçu comme des rois!
Merci encore Raul !!!

Raul's apartment was beautiful and Raul as a host was amazing. He provided all necessary info and great suggestions from reaching his apartment to exploring Porto.

The apartment was in a great location, close to the metro and landmarks.
Raul's place is awesome and beautiful! He was very kind and helpful for everything we needed or thought about. Thanks you so much for a beautiful experience of Porto!

Just GREAT! very beautiful apartment in an incredible city!!
everything was perfect, confortable and very warm.
I really recomend the apartment and the city!!

P.D: i can't forget the espectacular view of the terrace!
Excelent apartment with an awesome view of Porto! Raul is an extremely helpful and energetic host. Utterly recommend!

The wonderful appartment is perfectly located in the old town, everything is so close. Raul is a perfect host. We spent amazing days in Porto, it is the appartment to be in Porto! The kitchen is fully equipped, the flat suited our wishes at best.

The apt was impeccable & perfectly located in the old historic centre.  The building itself was a very historic and impressive one as well, which my friend and I enjoyed very much.  Great lighting, spotlessly clean & comfortable and made us feel at home, despite unending rain.  Thanks Raul for perfectly arranging everything for us. I would definitely stay there again when returning to Porto!

Raul is a great host making sure everything is super ready for your stay. The apartment was very well furnished with all the accessories you would need for either a quick visit or staying one or two weeks with some nights easily spent at the apartment enjoying one of the many available cable channels, dvd movies, board games or even websurfing with a great dsl connection. The apartment is great for a couple although it can accommodate 2 more people if really needed. There is a terrace above that is simply amazing in the morning or late afternoon  with its stunning views over the River Douro and Alfandega neighbourhood, shower and a relaxing area where you can either lie down or sit with friends.
Location could not be better, right in the center of beautiful Porto with the main trendy bars and casual nightlife area 200m away. Also the area is well connected with bus, tram and train to take you to other parts of the city. I would definitely recommend this option for a stay exploring Porto. Raul is a welcoming host who likes to make you feel comfortable and be sure you'll explore the best places in town, giving you some recommendations right at the start, a map, a timeout guide to explore and the traditional Portuguese hospitality!
Thank you Raul!

Me ha gustado mucho el apartamento de Raul, es muy espacioso, limpio, con lo necesario para la estancia, la terraza es muy agradable aunque no pudimos disfrutarla por la lluvia y Raul es una persona encantadora.

We spent a weekend in Porto, at Raul’s place. He was really kind with us from the first time. He recommended some places to go for a walk, where to have dinner, etc. 
The situation of the apartment was perfect and every detail in it was thought, two welcome beers and even the torch for the roof terrace, awesome! 
We really enjoyed it and recommend it. We’ll go back again for sure.

It's a fancy apartment in an amazing location, both quiet and close to everything. The flat is very clean, spacious, and has anything one might possibly want. The host is super nice and helpful. The next time in Porto, we're not looking for a different place to stay.

Hi, We had a wonderful stay at Raul's flat. It was my first time using AirBNB and the experience was brilliant. Raul, was welcoming, organised and very helpful. The flat is as good if not better than the photos which you can see. It is amazing to have the outside terrace and space with fabulous views of the city. The location is perfect, next to downtown porto but only 5 euros to the coast. There is also a wonderful little resturant opposite which has just opened... cute bistro place with tapas to die for...... Everything worked was super comfortable... This was my second time to Porto and if you are wondering where to stay you can not go wrong with this little gem. Have fun. Jo

Raul's Studio is as impeccable, light, wonderful, spotlessly clean, comfortable and complete as on the photos and in a beautiful historic building. Above all it's situated on an 'A' location to stroll and discover Porto on foot. And there is this lovely little tapas restaurant right across the street, very good food and friendly hosts.

Raul really thought of everything you might possibly need. The perfect host, very welcoming and helpful.

Unfortunately the weather was not good enough (January) to enjoy the amazing view on the terrace, we have to come back.
Next time in Porto we know where to go!  Thx Raul.

Raul is very cordial, helpful host. He was very welcoming and gave us a perfect first intro to his lovely accommodation and the charming city of Porto. Rauls appartment is a super cosy and stylish place! One deep breath and the great view from the terrace on the rooftop and we were just ready to start a wonderful time in Porto. Anything is very well-kept. The kitchen was also well equipped. Perfectly located in Porto  - Thank you very much for your kind welcome and your friendly help, Daniel and Anna

Come on, hurry up ! The flat, in a good location, is spotlessly clean, comfortable... Exactly as seen on the pictures and a quiet place.
And Raul is nice and welcoming.

Allez y, foncez ! L'appartement, bien situé et calme, est impeccable, confortable... Exactement comme sur les photos.
Et Raul est sympathique et accueillant.

Raul it`s a really nice guy, absolutely friendly and very helpful. The apartement is spotless clean and decorated with love. We had such a great time in this amazing apartement. Hurry up and enjoy the stunning view from this beautiful terrace. I guess it`s the best place to stay in Porto. I highly recommend Raul as a host.

Très beau studio, très spacieux et confortable. Décoré avec goût, parfaitement propre et très bien équipé. Magnifique terrasse, dont nous avons profité, même en février!
Très bien situé, nous avons pu visiter le centre historique à pied.
Raul est très accueillant et sympathique, et répond très rapidement aux mails.

The best BnB in Porto with the best host, Raul! Beatufilly designed apartment with everything you could need while travelling. Raul was the perfect host and a super nice guy! The best feature of the apartment is the roof top patio where you overlook the beautiful Douro river. Would stay there again for sure.

The apartement is clean, comfortable and perfectly located in historic center. We appreciate the beautiful terrace, the amazing view and the host. Raul it`s friendly,  helpful, he give us fantastic tips ... including where to eat the best Francesinhas.

I highly recommend this appartement and to conclude "City of Porto without Raul is like Christmas without a tree, it doesn't make sense" ;-)

Our experience at Raul's apartment was wonderful and I would 100% recommend his place and I would return in an instant.


1. Location is perfect, you can walk everywhere and the nearby tower (Torre de Clerigos) is a great landmark to help you find your way home at the end of the day.


2. The apartment is equipped with everything you can possibly need, Raul has thought of anything a traveler may need, from a Porto guidebook, an adapter, an umbrella (which we made good use of!) hair dryer, coffee maker, extra blankets and towels etc. 


3. This is possibly the cleanest and tidiest apartment I have ever seen. Everything was beautifully set up, so clean, new and shiny! Yet the place has character and is well decorated. As other reviews mentioned, the rooftop terrace is  beautiful if it does not rain your entire trip of course! The apartment is very bright with lots of natural light and plenty of space to put your belongings and your suitcases. You could easily have three or four people stay here and still have room.


4. The bed is very comfortable, and the bedding seemed new and even the towels smelled great!

5. Raul is such a kind, helpful host, he helped us with the purchase of train tickets prior to our arrival, immediately answered any questions we had and even had Portuguese beer waiting for us in the fridge. He helped us get our bearings on a map and recommended many places too. Could not think of a nicer host!

6.
