Things to be aware of depending on your circumstances; there is no elevator in the apartment building (you may need a hotel if this is an issue) and the hot water is not endless (as we are used to in some countries). The apartment is quiet in regards to street noise etc, however there are very noisy seagulls right by the windows. We used our earplugs so we were fine. We did want to shoot the seagulls by the last day though! They seem to never sleep....

In conclusion, despite the seagulls and short showers we LOVED our stay here. Don't even hesitate and just book Raul's place!

The apartment was perfect and feels very cozy. The view from the roof terrace is very impressive and Raul was a perfect host and gave us good tips for restaurants and other places to go. If I ever come back to Porto I would definitely stay here again.

Raul was awesome. Was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived (via very detailed and simple directions from Raul). Showed us all the features of the unit, highlighted by the fantastic rooftop deck and provided us with lots of very good information about Porto. Most of all he made sure we tried the  famous franceshina. They're even better than they sound. Overall the place exceeded our expectations. Both Raul and Porto are awesome!

Raul is a very welcoming host : he will explain you everything about the city and is always available if you need anything. The appartment is very nice, clean, bright and the location is perfect ! The terrace has an amazing view on Porto. So everything was perfect and we had a very pleasant trip in Porto !

EXCELLENT! Best Airbnb experience so far. Raul is a very nice guy and made a very helpful introduction to Porto with restaurants etc. 
Water in the fridge, map and guidebook was available and made us feel very welcome.

We spent a great time in Porto at Raul 's place. The appartment is very well located near touristic places and cool restaurants and bars. Raul is very easy going. Everything was perfect, the terrasse is amazing! I really recommend it!

My husband and I stayed for a week in Porto. Raul was very helpful and easy to reach before and during the trip. He was also very accommodating with our arrival and departure. The apartment is wonderful, the terrace is amazing and the view is beautiful. The location is perfect, close enough to the center, yet far enough so it wasn't noisy at night. everything is within walking distance.  The apartment has everything one would need, including umbrella and a converter so we could use our American phones and cameras. I would definitely return there. We had amazing time.

perfect place for staying when visiting Porto :)
will definitely want to be there again because of the cozy apartment!

Magnifique studio au cœur de Porto.
Le studio est très propre et très bien équipé, Vous ne manquerez de rien.
La terrasse est très agréable quand il fait beau.
Raul est un hôte accueillant et serviable. Il répond rapidement à vos demandes. Il est très disponible.

We spent a marvellous weekend in Porto. Raul's place is fantastically located near the historical center as well as the streets where it "happens at night". But still very quiet and with a gorgeous view, especially from the breathtaking terrasse located on the roof top.

The appartment is fully furnished, modern and clean. The stairs, in the middle of the room, makes the flat very original and unique. 

Raul behaved on a very friendly way when we arrived and gave us all the informations required for our stay. $

A very nice, charming and unique place to stay in Porto.

We spent a few days in Raul's very beautiful apartment, which is situated just perfectly close to the historical centre (you can reach everything important by foot, even the bars. ;)) The apartment was also very well equipped and view from the terrace was just amazing.
Raul was very flexible, friendly and helpful with his hints. 100 % recommendation!!

Thanks again for everything.

Excellent stay at Raul's apartment.

The location is perfect, the flat was beautiful and the terrace unforgettable.

Raul is an excellent host and even gave me a very cute birthday gift !

I would recommend this apartment for your stay in Porto.
Wonderful flat, amazing rooftop, we spent 4 days really nice under the sun of Porto  ;-) Raul gave us some tips to visit the city, thanks again!

une rencontre inoubliable et une disponibilité extraordinaire ! Raùl a été un hôte merveilleux, ses conseils ont été précieux et nous les avons suivis à la lettre, c'était génial ! rien ne manquait, les attentions, les plans, les réponses aux questions, le sourire sincère, le suivi, les échanges avant notre rencontre, l'envie de nous faire aimer cette ville formidable ...maintenant, une seule envie : revenir, et dans cet endroit, parce qu'il est unique.
de plus l'appartement est idéalement situé. on ne peut pas faire mieux !
We had a very nice stay.

The apartment was perfect! The roof deck was a dream and the apartment was very well set up. Raul has offered everything including guidebooks, instruction manuals, and a blow dryer (this last one was a great surprise!). Perfect!
Wir haben uns in allem sehr wohl gefühlt alles war super!

Everything was magnificent. especially terrace. Arrangement 5*. Raul was very hospitable prompted as where it is possible to look and try. In studio there was all that even the umbrella and sun-protection cream only can be necessary: ) . Raul thanks.

We had a fantastic time in Porto. Raul's place was amazing, in fact it was one of the best and most well organised airbnbs we've ever stayed in.

The terrace is magical and the location is so perfect and central. Would highly recommend it.

Raul is an excellent host and has taken many extra steps to make his wonderful studio as hospitable as possible (e.g., welcoming beverage, sunblock, luggage weigh scale, etc.).  He was also generous in sharing his views on which of the wonderful Porto sights and restaurants we should take in.  The rooftop deck is truly exceptional and added to the delight factor.  I have already started recommending Raul and his studio to my family and friends!

We stayed at Rauls apartment for 4 days, and we loved it.
When we arrived Raul was already waiting for us giving us a warm welcome.
He gave us a brief introduction to all the basic things in the apartment and took the time marking places on a map where we should go out for dinner and drinks.
The apartment ist just amazing, located in the beautiful old town of Porto. Very clean and in good style. The rooftop terrace is second to none. A fantastic view over the river and the famous portwine cellars.

We can highly recommend Rauls place, it hast all the amenities you need (even a hairdryer :-) )

Cheers
Melanie & Alex

The loft is really nice et the rooftop is just gorgeous. Nothing more to say than: go for it!

Raul is very welcoming. Beautiful stay! 

Enjoy

Quelle super expérience que ce séjour à Porto ! Nous avons été superbement reçu par Raul qui a pris le temps de tout nous présenter, de nous donner des conseils et de nous parler de sa ville et tout ça avec le sourire. Probablement un des meilleurs hôte que j'ai pu voir et très conciliant sur les horaires d'arrivée et de sortie. L'appartement est encore mieux que sur les photos et si vous le choisissez vous ferez le bon choix, à pied on est à proximité de tout et tout se fait très facilement. L'appartement est calme, en trois jours pas de bruit. Le grand plus c'est évidemment la terrasse sur le toit qui donne une touche d'extraordinaire à cette expérience.

One word to describe my experience with Raul and his apartment: perfect!

Staying in the apartment in Porto for 5 nights was a blast. From our arrival up to the departure Raul has been setting new records regarding hospitality and kindness. Even when it came to problems (airline lost baggage) he never hesitated to help us out as much as possible.

The apartment itself was perfect for 2 persons and the terrace amazing (due to the nice weather). Nothing to complain about regarding the cleanness or the interior either. We will be back!

We had a wonderful time in Raul's Flat.
The geographic position is just perfect, between the old city and the new commercial one. Easy to move from one desire to another.
The area is quiet, flat is design and perfectly clean and the terrace is just the perfect place to relax after a day walking in the area.
The equipment is large enough to spend a whole week just feeling at home.
Raul was just perfectly friendly and gave us good advices to have a good time in Porto.
I'll recommend it to my friends and family !
Thank you Raul !

Raul is possibly the best host you can find in Portugal. His place was very stylish and cosy. The terrace is just incredible. Apartment was very clean and Raul thought of each and every small detail to make you feel comfortable; from Dvd movies to cold beers to welcome you. 
He explained us where to go, what to eat, the best routes and everything about Porto for at least an hour. He alse called us a taxi early in the morning.
His place is very well located. Don't even hesitate to book Raul's apartment if you're visiting Porto.
Thank you very much Raul!

Perfect location: not far away from the most important touristic sights, beautiful roof top terrace, nice restaurants in neighbourhood and fully equipped apartment. Raul was a perfect host: fast in his responses, tips and tricks, he even came to get us at the airport very late! Really top! And Porto is so beautiful!!!! Recommended!!!!

Raul is an incredible host, he had yogurth water and beer waiing for us in the fridge! His place is unbelivable, I can't picture a better place to stay! It's super comfortable and stylish, moreover the location is perfect and the view is incredible! This place would for sure give you an amazing stay in Porto :)

Nous avons passé 3 jours à Porto et résidé dans l'appartement de Raul.
Il nous attendais lors de notre arrivée, il a été très chaleureux, nous a présenté l'appartement et sa superbe terrasse. Il correspondait tout à fait au descriptif (décoré avec goût, calme, très bien équipé notamment une literie de qualité et joui d'une situation centrale).
Raul a pris le temps de nous conseiller les lieux incontournables et nous a donné ses meilleures adresses de restaurants, bars, caves à Porto, shopping. Nous les avons toutes testées.

What an amazing host! Raul was more than perfect with his advise and an incredibly friendly guy too! The location is so central and the apartment is amazing! The roof top private terrace is unreal!!! We enjoyed the sun whilst showering up there!!! If you're thinking of travelling to Porto STAY HERE :)

We had a great stay in Porto also thanks to the very warm welcome of Raul, who had very helpful hints for us concerning his hometown, the most important sights, good places to eat etc. The flat is also awesome. Well equipped with a wonderful terrace and view over the city and the river. And there is a bakery next door, so best possibilities for having pasteis de nata every morning.. ;) All in all: go there; you'll have a very good time!

Très bon accueil, appartement exactement comme sur les photos, notamment le roof top incroyable avec vue sur Porto.
Raul s'est rendu disponible pour notre arrivée et nous a expliqué en détails les points à visiter et les lieux d'interet.

Great location, great apartment! Everyting was clean, and even though Raul couldn't meet us in person at the apartment, he was really welcoming and made sure everything went well. He even wrote us a letter!

Raul avait réservé notre taxi depuis l'aéroport et nous attendait devant l'immeuble.Le logement  comme décrit , était dans le quartier historique de Porto à 2 pas des commerces et des monuments.
Lors de notre arrivée dans l'appartement tout était conforme aux photos.Raul nous a guidé à travers le plan , pour trouver les commerces , les transports et les restaurants .
Des boissons étaient dans le réfrigérateur ce qui est appréciable.
Rien ne manque dans l'appartement tout est neuf propre, et la terrasse vraiment un plus nous avons même manger dessus un 30/11..
Je conseille vivement cet appartement car très agréable et surtout bien placé!! Merci à Raul pour sa disponibilité, sa gentillesse, sa rapidité à répondre aux mails. kti
It couldn't have been better. The flat is beautiful, it's in one of the best neighborhoods in Porto, and the host makes sure you have everything you need. Perfect.

Amazing apartment and facilities in a perfect location. Had a brilliant weekend in a great city.
Thanks!

Raul is an amazing host. I spent 5 days in Porto, at Raul’s apartment. He left the letter & maps and gave me great advice on places to see and nice restaurants in Porto. And Raul promptly responded if I had any questions. His apartment is perfect : it is quiet, modern, clean, functional and everything you might need. The bed was comfortable, terrace was wonderful! The apartment is exactly how it looks in the pictures. 

It's ideally situated in the center of the city, at walking distance from the Ponte Luis I, Livraria Lello, Avenida dos Aliados, many viewpoints(maybe Raul will tell you...^^), the metro station, supermarkets, bars&restaurants. 

Strongly recommended ! I don't hesitate to say that this was the best accommodation expeience that I have ever stayed! 

Thanks a lot Raul!!

Me and my boyfriend stayed in the apartment for one week and that's really a great memory for us. The apartment is located in an excellent location which takes only 3 mins walk from the centre, easy to get to any famous location just by walking. The environment is very quiet, leisure, and with a lot of restaurants around. What's more: Our host is a super great guy!
Talking about the apartment, it is exactly as what is shown and personally, it is much more beautiful that the picture, the view of the terrace was amazing, as a astronomy lover, I am sure the night view will definitely give you a unforgettable experience. The apartment is clean and there are many windows which allow sunshine to get into the home. The cooking equipments are great and possible for us to cook any kind of food. The wifi is very fast and covers the whole place. Overall, despite the hot water is not enough for us to take a long shower, this apartment meets every needs we asked for.
In the communication with our host, Raul, it is effective and I can always get instant feed back. I really appreciate Raul, who explain everything in detail and create such a wonderful place. Thanks a lot.

Raúl est un hôte formidable.,  prévenant,  patient. Il a eu l'extrême gentillesse de venir à notre rencontre car nous étions totalement perdus car  on s'était trompés de sortie sur l'autoroute !
Son studio est très grand (environ 80  mètres carrés ?) lumineux, original, très propre, jouit d'une belle vue. La décoration est très soignée, c'était son appartement personnel avant qu'il se marie
Il y a une épicerie à deux pas,  des cafés et des restos tout près.
Attention supplémentaire,  eau minerale et bières avaient été mis au frais.
 Quand on arrive tard,  fatigué, on apprécie d'avoir de quoi se faire un café (dosettes) ou du thé,  de pouvoir laver son linge (et de le sécher dans la foulée)
Notre meilleure adresse airbnb à ce jour. Impression d'être reçus chez un ami.

El apartamento de Raúl es simplemente ideal! Esta justo en el centro para disfrutar caminando de todo. Y al final del día diafrutar de la maravillosa terraza. Sin duda el mejor alojamiento para visitar Oporto. Raúl es encantador y nos dio las mejores recomendaciones, atentó siempre a lo que pudiemos necesitar
Great place in a great city. The terrace is superior! Raul gave us some good tips for the must-sees around Porto. I would really rent it again.

Wonderful apartment and what a view from that amazing roof! Could see every Port Cellar across the river beautifully lit up at night. Cosy place and just a 10 minute stroll to the centre of town. Raul also offered to pick me up from the airport - couldn't have been better.

Quelle belle expérience!
L'appartement de Raul est exactement comme décrit sur le site, très propre, confortable et fonctionnel.  La cuisine est petite mais très bien équipé, le lit est haut et confortable et cette terrasse est juste magnifique ! L'emplacement en plein centre, très pratique pour profiter de la ville. 
Raul a été un hôte très souriant, c'est une personne qui a envie qu'on passe un bon moment et qu'on se sente bien dans son appartement. Ses conseils pour visiter Porto ont été très utiles pour nous. 
Je vous recommande cette appartement, nous ne serez pas déçu.

Raul est vraiment un super hôte. L'accueil rien à dire. Si je retourne à Porto je sais où sera mon pied à terre! Et la vue du toit magnifique!
Raul is really a great guest. For the first contact? Nothing to say! I know where my second room! On the roof just a word incredible!
Raul é um bom é um bom anfitrião! Recepção: nada a dizer. Quando eu vou de nova na Porto, eu sabe onde eu vai dormir! A vista de cima é muito linda!

Raul est l’hôte parfait! Il nous a cherché à l'aéroport puis nous a indiqué des adresses et bons plans dans Porto. Quant à l'appartement, il est très propre, tout équipé (comme si on dormait chez des amis), et la terrasse est exceptionnelle!!
En prime, 2 bières et des bouteilles d'eau nous attendaient dans le frigo. Nous y retournerons assurément lors d'un prochain séjour à Porto!!!
Merci Raul

Wir hatten eine großartige Zeit in Porto, die Wohnung ist super, voll ausgestattet und wunderbar gelegen! Die Altstadt ist traumhaft! In der Wohnung war alles sauber, alles funktionierte gut, Raul war immer erreichbar und super nett! Absolute Empfehlung für die, die Frühstück auf Dachterassen lieben und eine Unterkunft suchen, die zentral gelegen ist! DANKE an Raul! 

We recommend this great place to stay: We spent one week in this apartment, everything was clean, very good equipped and very nice! Its terrace was amazing and with a great view! Everything was like you can see it on the pictures! No problems, everything was fine and in case of problems or questions, Raul was always reachable. He was always prepared! :) thank you so much!!!
 Great place in a beautiful city!

The best place to stay in Porto and the best host! A beautifully designed space with everything you could ever imagine needing. The rooftop patio is the best spot in Porto! Raul is an incredibly nice guy who makes you feel at home. This was our second time staying there and would stay there again! Highly recommended!

It's the first time I have used airbnb and after this experience in Raul's apartment, I'm not sure that I would ever stay in a hotel again! Everything about this property has been carefully considered from the decoration to the amenities provided in order to give each guest the best possible experience in Porto. And that's even before I talk about the stunning view from rooftop terrace! Raul is a superb host who is more than happy to help with any requests. Thank you so much.

Raul is a fantastic host. He has a great apartment very well located and equipped. Raul was very helpful when we arrived and gave great instructions. He has been very thoughtful in what he provides. The roof top deck is a lot of fun. Would definitely recommend.

Raul was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived in Porto. He welcomed us warmly and gave a thorough tour and explanation of the apartment. Everything in the apartment was as described, very clean and well thought out. The location is very good for exploring all areas of historic Porto and the rooftop terraces full beauty cannot be captured in pictures. This place is a real gem and we felt lucky to have found it. Thanks Raul for the enjoyable stay and great airbnb experience.

Raul est un hôte exceptionnel, à notre arrivée, il a pris plus d'une heure à nous montrer l'appartement et à nous indiquer les endroits à visiter sur la carte...  Il nous aussi indiquée leur localisation à partir de la terrasse...  Il a eue la délicatesse de nous laisser des rafraîchissements au frigo...
De plus, dans la première semaine de notre séjour, Raul a communiqué avec nous pour savoir si tout allait bien...  Nos avons gardé le contact par SMS et nous avons reçue des réponses quasi immédiates à nos interrogations...
L'appartement était tel que mentionné sur l'annonce, le lit confortable  et, le tout, d'une propreté impeccable...

Les sites à visiter étaient à proximité et les transports en commun très efficaces...  Beaucoup de restaurants a proximité... 

Nous aimerions retrouver un tel environnement lors de nos prochains voyages..

Michel et Francine, Québec, Canada

Accueil formidable, hôte incroyable, vue splendide!!! Que dire.... si ce n'est que du bon que du bon!!!!
L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter la vieille ville de Porto, tout peut pratiquement se faire à pied mais prévoyez de bonnes baskets, les rues de Porto sont très escarpées.
En tout cas l'appartement est splendide, très lumineux et vraiment fonctionnel... Petit bonus, la "cantine" San Antonio en bas de la rue, qui fait de la bonne cuisine locale et pas chère!!
Je vous laisse découvrir le toit terrasse... fabuleux!!!

Merci pour tout Raul!!!
_____________________________________
 
Amazing home, incredible host, splendid view !!! What can I say .... 
only good things about our trip....!!!!
The location is ideal for visiting the old town of Porto, you can visit almost everything on foot, but wear appropriate shoes, the streets of Porto are very rugged.
Small bonus, the "canteen" San Antonio down the street that serves verry good and cheap local food!!

In any case the apartment is gorgeous, very bright and very functional ... I let you discover the fabulous roof top ...  AMAZING!!!

Thank you for everything Raul !!! We will come back!!!

Dear Raúl,
as I already told your brother Bruno we enjoyed the 3 days in your Porto aparment very much! The reception was very nice and warm and you had already given us so many advices - we had a great time! The apartment is absolutely wonderful, luxury and situated within the historic center. It was a pity that we could nearly use the wonderful roof terrace, because of the 3 days is was raining 2 1/2 ... :-( But this has not been your fault! Thanks again for everything and we would recommend your apartment to everybody - I think it is one of the nicest ever in Porto!!!
Bettina and Willi (Germany)

Nous utilisions cette formule pour la première fois. Les premiers échanges avec Raoul, avant notre arrivée, ont été très courtois. Il n'a pas pu nous accueillir et s'en était excusé auparavant -il avait délégué son frère qui nous a gentiment présenté l'appartement- et nous avait laissé un mot avec quelques conseils et coups de cœur.
L'appartement est fort bien équipé (y compris en produits de première nécessité), très agréable à vivre, lumineux, et très central (sans être bruyant). La terrasse est un vrai plus ! Merci Raoul....

Raul can not be recommended highly enough. And his flat as well :-) Seriously: excellent location, beautiful flat, near the highest point in Porto so excellent - no - *breathtaking* views from the roof terrace. Plenty of space for 2 people, even modcons like a washing machine. But  it was the personal touch that really differentiates Raul. Available to our schedule, extremely helpful and took the time to annotate a map of all the worthwhile sites as well as his personal eating recommendations (worth following, very good!). This was the killer move: I asked him when we booked if he had any way of making an iphone connect to a stereo so we could listen to music, exchanged a few emails at the time and left it at that. When we arrived he showed me the brand new bluetooth portable speakers he'd specially bought for us! (They also work really well have great bass sounds for such small speakers). Such hosts should be singled out for special awards in my opinion. We would come back tomorrow if I could!
Raul has thought of everything in his perfect apartment with all the accessories for a perfect stay. The rooftop balcony is amazing. His hospitality gave us a warm welcome and we hope to visit again.

Apartment very well located and perfect for 2 or 4 people. The area is perfect for exploring Porto and close to all the attractions. Raul is an amazing host that has to be available to us even before we were in her apartment. He is always ready to give advice or places so that your trip goes as smoothly as possible. And WHAT A TERRACE !

Our stay at Raul's studio was amazing. Perfect location you could walk everywhere! We were impressed with how clean and new everything in the apartment was. Raul has thought of every detail to make your stay at his studio perfect. When we got there he gave us a map of the city, explained how to get to the main sights and even suggested some local favorite spots and restaurants. We would definitely stay there again!

Our experience at Raul's place was awesome. The location is central to everything you need to get to in Porto by foot. Excellent Cafés and bakeries nearby. Near all local shops and attractions. The view and all amenities were excellent.

Raul was incredibly easy to work with since booking.  He was able to answer any question I had about the area, this being my first trip to Porto.  Raul was able to recommend his favorite cafes, restaurants and sights that were 'must sees' during our visit. His apartment is in a great location and was exactly what we were looking for.  Large windows kept the apartment full of light and cool in the heat of the day.  The terrace is the best part of the apartment with great views of the city!
Fabulous apartment and fabulous city. Would highly recommend :)

Raul est très gentil et aux petits soins. Il aime sa ville et prend le temps de vous expliquer les différentes choses à voir à Porto. L appartement est très bien placé , très propre et fonctionnel. Le plus de cette location est la terrasse avec une belle vue, pour prendre le petit déjeuner et le soir après avoir marché dans la ville. Tout était parfait. Proche de tous les commerces, cafés et restaurants. Wifi fonctionne très bien.

Raul est vraiment très sympathique, il nous attendait lors de notre arrivée et a pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y avait à voir dans cette très belle ville.
L'appartement est hyper bien placé et conforme aux photos. C'est notre première fois avec Airbnb et cela donne envie de recommencer.
Nous conseillons fortement cet appartement et nous remercions encore Raul.

Super accueil de la part de Raul  qui nous a fait une visite de l'appartement qui est fidèle aux photos et même mieux encore ! Appartement très bien équipé et super vue. Raul nous a également indiqué les endroits sympa à Porto où sortir le soir ou les sites majeurs à visiter. Super séjour !!!
Nice flat, with a perfect location, clean and equiped.

Raul was a fantastic host, super friendly and gave us loads of tips for places to eat and things to do. The flat is lovely, clean, spacious and stylish and the views from the roof are awesome. Can't recommend this one enough, had a great time in Porto, will definitely be back.

Raul is an excellent host and made us feel at home immediatly. His tips were very useful . The appartment lives up to the expectations made by the pictures. There is a little restaurant/cafetaria right next door where you can start the day with good coffee and some breakfast. We will be back some day !

Raul was a perfect host! Not only was the apartment beautiful, he has provided us with everything we could possibly need including speakers to use on the rooftop! There were four of us and we felt there was plenty of room, it certainly wasn't a shoe box studio. 

Raul was kind enough to provide us with detailed directions to the flat, as well as meeting us on arrival and suggesting different places to visit and eat at. All of which were amazing ! I would 100% recommend staying here!

We loved staying in Raul´s apartment! Raul was super helpful and friendly. Arrival was no problem, he was there to greet us, help us with our bags, show us around the amazingly well equipped apartment, and  give us a map marking all the best places to visit. 
The apartment itself is perfect. Location is great, the rooftop and view is amazing, and the decor is new, very clean and tasteful. Everything you could think of is there - not only the standard things, but the finer details like bluetooth mini-loudspeaker, sun chairs, coffee machine with capsules, dishwasher & washing machine with detergent, shampoo, sunscreen, herbs & olive oil etc etc. 
We would happily return! Thanks Raul!

Raul's apartment was the perfect place to explore Porto from. It's an easy walk to everywhere and the apartment was very well equipped and of course had the wonderful roof terrace... great views and being south facing gets lots of sun.

Raul himself was a brilliant host. He was kind enough to pick us up from the airport as we were arriving very late and he gave us lots of information about the best places to go and how best to get about. Couldn't recommend him or his apartment highly enough.

Nice apartment in centre of porto. Amazingly a quiet street. 3rd floor but no elevator, so you keep in good shape. Raul is a friendly guy that provides you with all the info you need on  porto. Apartment is fully equiped. Superb terrace with nice views on the city. Only point of criticism: buy abigger cover for the matress. If you lie on this one with two persons, it keeps flipping off. Otherwise very good place to visit porto.

Fantastic apartment in perfect location. Comfy bed, all the essentials and great roof terrace to retreat to at the end of a sunny, early autumn day. We also got lots of information beforehand. I would highly recommend this apartment, host and lovely city.

Merci à Raul qui nous a parfaitement accueilli, souriant et de bonne humeur! Il nous a expliqué les choses à faire sur Porto et bien renseigné sur les restaurants à faire (un délice!). L'appartement est nickel, la terrasse est superbe. Merci (on reviendra) !!

Wow!!! The flat is fantastic! 
The place, the view, the roof where you can spend time, the furniture, the design - everything is on the top level. 
And Raul is soooo attentive!  We were absolutely amased =)

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Raúl qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer le fonctionnement et les principales visites à faire sur Porto.
Appartement très bien placé, avec une terrasse ayant une superbe vue sur la ville. L'appartement est très fonctionnel et Raúl a pensé à tout (notices explicatives, plans, parapluie au cas où ...). Super.

Nous avons aimé le quartier, l'appartement ainsi que l'accueil irréprochable et sympatique de Raul. L'appartement est très bien équipé, propre et confortable. Nous pourrions relouer le même endroit sans aucune hésitation.

Raul was an exceptional host, his apartment was impeccably clean and well equipped with everything you could need. He was vey thorough in explaining all the functioning aspects and providing a well detailed itinerary of great things to do in Porto. We very much enjoyed our stay and would recommend the apartment to our friends.

Beautiful days. Would like to come back very soon.
Raul is a wonderful person!!

Everything was perfect, past reviews and photos are (Website hidden by Airbnb) fact our expectations were exceeded.  Raul met us at the apt with a smile, helped us with luggage, and explained everything to us about the apt, surrounding area, and the beautiful city of Porto.  We felt right at home immediately.  In fact we invited some people we met on a tour for wine and appetizers up on the rooftop deck, we felt like it was our own (Website hidden by Airbnb) proud.  Raul was always available via email and very responsive.  Location fantastic.  And we certainly got our exercise walking up the stairs to the apt, and the streets of Porto.  Lovely people, great food, incredible history...a wonderful memorable vacation.  Thank you Raul!

L'accueil es la disponibilité de Raul a été génial.
Son appartement correspond exactement à la description qui est faite sur le site, mais en vrai il est encore mieux.
Arrangé avec gout et il laisse tout ce qu il faut pour être tranquille le temps d'un we.
La terrasse est juste magique, et tout le centre de Porto est à 5 min à pied.
Encore Merci à toi Raul
L'appartement correspond aux photos, il est propre, lumineux et bien situé. Raul a été un hôte parfait, du début à la fin.

Raul gave me accurate and easy to follow instructions on how to get to his apartment via public transport. He was very receptive and easy to contact. He took the time out to show me on a large map where all the cool stuff was and instructions on how to get to these places easily. The apartment is very modern and cool, comfortable with a good shower tank, and a rooftop terrace to boot. Fantastic. Would stay there again next time I am in Porto, and recomend to anyone looking for a great host.

Raul a été un super hôte. Il nous a fourni toutes les informations nécessaires avant notre arrivée : trajet depuis l'aéroport, que faire à Porto.
L'appartement est à la fois très bien situé, près du centre mais au calme. Il était très bien équipé pour nous trois (un couple + un enfant de quatre ans). Nous avons même pu profiter du toit terrasse et de sa superbe vue lors de notre week-end en décembre.
Nous recommandons vivement cet endroit et son charmant propriétaire pour un séjour à Porto. :-)

A brilliant landlord & a wonderful trip in Portal!
I'm sure the following tenants will find life is really easyXD 房东人超级超级好房子也超棒的!

Raul a été un hôte parfait.
L’appartement est exactement comme sur les photos juste magnifique,très propre et super bien placé.
Que demander de plus !
Merci à Raul.

Ausstattung:
Das Studio ist sehr gut ausgestattet: 
- Küche, in der man sich selbst etwas zubereiten kann
- Waschmaschine und Wäschetrockner, Bügelbrett, Bügeleisen 
- Flatscreen TV
- Free Wifi
-  Die Dachterrasse mit Blick auf den Duoro Fluss ist das Highlight. 
- Die Ausstattung ist modern und für zwei Personen ist die Unterkunft perfekt. 
Lage:
- Die Lage ist super. 
- Es ist ruhig und nachts hört man kaum etwas von der Straße. 
- Zu Fuß sind die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten und gute Restaurants in wenigen Minuten erreichbar. 
- Für alle, die nicht kochen wollen, gibt es unten im Haus ein Cafe, in dem man günstig frühstücken aber auch zu Mittag essen kann.
Sauberkeit:
- Alles prima. 
Sonstiges:
- Die Essenstipps des Gastgebers sind sehr empfehlenswert:-)
Great location. Lovely flat.  Extremely helpful host.  Perfect.

This appartment was absolutely perfect for our trip. It is located close to everything you need: all the sights in Porto, several metro stations and to the river as well. Inside the appartment you found all you could need in any way. From the terasse you had an absolutely stunning view at the River Douro and where you could enjoy sunsets and sunrises.
At our arrival, Raul was there to explain all from the appartment and he gave us many tips about what wo do and what to see in Porto. He responded always very quick and helped us too to organise a taxi to get to the airport early in the morning. And he sended us before our trip perfect informations how to get there!
We can truly recommend you the appartment! If we will go to Porto again, we will definitely go to Rauls appartment again! :)
It was simply amazing! The flat is incredibly nice and cozy, especially the roof. Raul is the perfect host. We also very much liked his restaurant advices!!! We will definitely come back :)

Bel appartement, spacieux, propre et bien équipé.  Tres bien situé pour tout faire à pieds. Vue imprenable sur le douro du haut de la terrasse tres appréciable meme en hiver. Raul est tres accueillant.
Wonderful apartment and a wonderful host. Everything was perfect!! The roof top terrace was so lovely that my boyfriend even proposed to me up there :) Thanks again Raul!
Tout était juste parfait!  Appartement super équipé et vue magnifique!  Bons conseils de visite et surtout d un petit resto au bout de la rue " taberna de sant antonio" cuisine familiale garantie!

Raul nous a très bien accueilli. Appartement magnifique, très bien situé pour visites du vieux porto, balades à pied. Terrasse sur le toit, avec vue sur le douro et la ville. Nous avons adoré cette escapade sous le soleil.
Great spot in super location. Raul, was an excellent host.

De communicatie via e-mail met deze verhuurder was meteen perfect.
Goede tips over gebruik OV en een goede beschrijving om bij de locatie te komen. De ontvangst was hartelijk inclusief een welkomstdrankje, goede uitleg over de woning en de apparatuur in huis, inclusief goede tips voor de bezienswaardigheden.
De ligging is perfect, vlak bij het fotografie museum en vlak bij het paleis van justitie ( met pin- automaat.)
De studio is recent verbouwd, dus alles is anno nu.
Mooi stucwerk, functionele keuken met vaatwasser.
Het bed slaapt heerlijk, en van de omgeving hebben we weinig gehoord. De studio hebben we superschoon aangetroffen, en alles is aanwezig, zoals stofzuiger en andere schoonmaakhulpen.
( we misten een trekkertje om de douchedeur droog te maken, maar wie doet dit?) 
De houten luiken dienen als gordijn, waardoor je iets langer neigt door te slapen omdat het daglicht zich nauwelijks laat zien.
Het is heerlijk om na een forse stadswandeling boven op het dakterras in het zonnetje te relaxen!!! Heel bijzonder bij deze studio.
De trap naar het dakterras vereist de nodige voorzichtigheid, maar dat spreekt eigenlijk voor zich. De studio bevindt zich tussen 2 kleine winkeltjes met levensmiddelen, dus voor kleine boodschapjes hoef je niet ver te lopen. In de straat zelf zijn 3 restaurantjes te vinden. In Porto spreken velen goed Engels, en zeker in de horeca kan je met de Engelse taal goed uit de voeten.. 
Heeft de studio ook nadelen? Nee, eigenlijk niet.
Als we weer een bezoek zouden brengen aan Porto zouden we weer deze studio willen huren. Ook bij vrienden/kennissen zullen we dit appartement aanraden.  
Belangrijk bij een bezoek aan Porto zijn je schoenen.
neem goede wandelschoenen mee, want de straten zijn vaak steil, en de trappen zijn lang.
Een cave bezoeken is een absolute must. Wij hebben het porthuis van Ferreira bezocht, op advies van de verhuurder.
Wij hebben ervoor gekozen om ook een middag te fietsen langs de rivier, naar het strand. We hebben gegeten in matosinhos, waar de barbeques gewoon op straat staan ( leuke belevenis )
De fietsen hebben wij gehuurd bij Vieguini, we werden goed geholpen!  
Kortom, Porto is veelzijdig, gastvrij en leuk om te doen en de studio is geweldig!
Indem er uns wie Familienmitglieder begrüßte.
Had a great 3 days at Raul's place over Easter. It's very conveniently located, clean and has a fantastic terrace. Raul is super organised and has helpful tips about what to do in Porto

C'est de loin le meilleur Airbnb et hôte que nous avons eu. Raul s'est montré très attentif et très sympatique. Un chauffeur privé nous attendait à l aéroport et Raul nous avait également mis à disposition au frais 2 bouteilles d'eau et 2 superbock. L'appartement est très bien situé. Tout est à proximité et le rooftop est superbe. Attention tout de même aux mouettes qui sont sur les toits voisins. Éviter damener à manger sur le toit  ;) Raul a été de très bons conseils. En résumé parfait  !

Very helpful and welcoming host. Excellent studio flat - very well equipped. Loved the roof terrace with its wide views over the city. Also liked the location - quiet but with many city sights within easy walking distance. Pleasantly surprised to find several good small eateries very close by, although some need reservations at weekends if you want to get in.

Raul is  fabulous host.  His apartment is very comfortable.  He has provided anything that an apartment would want.  The apartment  is in a perfect location for exploring Porto.  We would highly recommend it for accomodation in Porto.

Awesome flat with a central location. Clean, nice and a beautiful terace. Raul is a really good host, he take time to show you the flat and what to do in the city. I recommend this flat without hesitation!

Raul est vraiment un hôte parfait, aux petits soins et très accueillant!
L'appartement est superbe, bien équipé, très propre et bien situé pour visiter la ville! Que dire de la terrasse, avec une vue exceptionnelle sur Porto! Idéal pour passer de très bons moments!

Raul is the really really perfect host. And the room is clean and comfortable. I would say this is the best room among I stay for many years. Everything in the room looks like NEW thanks to his efforts. And the hospitality makes us at home. Thank you Raul!
Perfect location and an excellent host! This was our first experience with air b&b, but this won't be the last. The best view of Porto!
It has been a great experience and Raul was a wonderful host.

The best location in Porto and the best view from the amazing roof terrace. The apartement was spotless and super clean with gorgeous furniture and a really comfy bed and couch. Raul was super welcoming and gave us great tipps. We would highly recommend it as the best accomodation in Porto.

Raul has been very helpfull with everything! 
The flat is clean, the localisation is perfect and the terrasse is amazing.
I definitely recommend this appartment!
Heel vriendelijke verhuurder die de tijd nam om ons wegwijs te maken in het appartement en in Porto

Raul is a really nice guy and a perfect host! We felt very welcome from the first moment on. The apartment is super clean, very well located and had everything you need!! Raul showed us everything and gave us perfect tips for visiting Porto! We can really recommend a stay in this wonderful apartment! Thank you, Raul for hosting us!!
The apartment was great, exactly like the pictures. And Raul was the perfect host, very helpful and available. I definately recommend!

I recommend the studio and Raul in 100%. Raul made is feel welcome, everything was as described, he was helpful with any question we turned to him. The apartment was well equipped, including beers and water, coffee capsules en spices, conveniently located in the city centre. We have enjoyed our stay a lot!
Very nice place, great location and roof terrace.  Raul was very helpful.  A great place to stay!

Une nouvelle fois un grand merci pour l'accueil de Gina et Franck, ils ont passé un très gréa le séjour dans ton appartement et à Porto. Tout était parfait. Merci Raul et à bientôt.
David

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l appartement de Raul. Il est idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto. La terrasse est magnifique. A notre arrivée tardive, notre hôte nous as merveilleusement accueillit avec des explications sur les lieux à visiter dans Porto. Je recommande vivement cette location à tous les visiteurs de cette belle ville.

Host, Raul, was great. Helpful and provided all that was needed to have a great stay in Porto. The appartment was brilliant. Absolutely everything you would need. Location also fantastic. One of the best places that I have ever stayed. 
Highly recommend

Wow......we loved our stay at Raul's beautiful studio.  Raul greeted us upon our arrival and showed us round the studio and up to the amazing roof terrace.  His restaurant recommendations and ideas of how to spend our time were also great and much appreciated.  This was our first experience of using Airbnb and I hope it's always this amazing. I would thoroughly recommend Raul and his studio if you fancy a break in the beautiful city of Porto.

We had a great time in Rauls modern apartment in a renovated townhouse. The view from the terrace ist amazing. The apartment has all amenities you need for self catering but of course there are many of really nice restaurants around, alone two in the same street! It is situated in walking distance of Portos attractions which Raul kindly showed us on the map at our arrival. 
There are plenty of stairs to climb if you want to reach the top, perhaps bear this in mind if you are a bit infirm ;-)

The house is special. You have a good loft with amazing views very functional and confortable, very well equipped. But the best is when you access to the roof and you are on the top of Porto. You feel there just "special". No many people can have something like that.

Very very recommended to come and enjoy Porto.

Raúl is the best owner posible. Lots of useful information and always there for whatever you need. Great.

Raul's flat was great.  Right in the heart of old Porto!  It was within walking distance of everything.  The flat was very clean, and neat.  It has every amenity that you will need on your travels.  Lots of small markets to purchase food if you want to cook at home.  Raul took the time to go over Porto with us.   What we should do, where we should go.  Loved the Taylor's port tasting, thank you!  Highly recommend this flat!

Raul is a superhost: very friendly, well organized and efficient.
The appartment has everything you need even a refreshing shower on the rooftop. Moito obrigado, Raoul. All the best from Jeannine, Klemens and Marthe

This is the perfect place to enjoy a fantastic holiday! We would definitely recommend it and would revisit. We stayed for one week whilst on our 'mini-moon'!  

From the first time I contacted Raul, before booking, he was polite, helpful and really friendly. Raul was more than happy to answer any questions proir to our stay and when we arrived he was the perfect host! We cannot sing his praises enough! 
As for the apartment it has everything you need; it is modern and clean which for us is very important. Although it is a studio apartment, it doesn't feel small as the kitchen has everything a large kitchen has (microwave, cooker, dishwasher, toaster, coffee maker etc). The wifi was really strong and the TV has lots of channels (English and Portuguese) and a DVD player with a few DVDs provided but you could bring your own. The bed was really comfortable with a selection of pillows. The best feature has to be the roof terrace, wow what a view! It has table and chairs, along with sun loungers and a shower. 
The location is perfect too, it is minutes walk from shops, cafes, restaurants and tourist attractions. It is nice and quiet at night as it isn't next to any noisy bars etc, but if you wanted to experience the night life then it isn't far at all. 
We would recommend Raul, as a host, and his apartment, along with Porto. 
Thank you for everything Raul :)

Je ne peux que confirmer les précédents commentaires : logement impeccable avec vue imprenable dans le centre historique, accueil irreprochable et très bon contact avec Raul depuis la réservation sur le net jusqu'à notre arrivée. Quelques petites attentions très appreciables nous attendaient dans l'appartement (bière pour nous et lit tout fait pour notre bébé ). Un grand merci pour tout... Allez y les yeux fermés.

We felt veeery comfortable in Raul's apartment.
At first Raul was very helpful and kind.
He has send us helpful informations about how to find the apartment and about Porto in general.

Arrived at the apartment, we really liked the furnishing. Very modern. A good taste! Nothing was missing. Very good equipped.
And the view from the rooftop was just amazing!! :-D
The pictures did not promise too much!
Dreamlike!

The location was also very good.
We had a fantastic time in Porto.

We would come back at any time...
Thank you, Raul!

Communication with Raul was great from the beginning. The apartment is very nice, in a great neighborhood. The terrace is the best part. The apartment is easy to find, and very centrally located. Raul's recommendations were appreciated.

Wir haben uns in Rauls Apartment sehr wohl gefühlt.
Die Dachterrasse ist wirklich besonders. Raul hat sich perfekt um uns gekümmert. Er hat das Apartment mit viel Verständniss dafür, was ein Reisender benötigt ausgestattet. 
Besser gehts nicht, wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder.

Raul est un excellent hôte très accueillant, un sourire à l'arrivée, de bons conseils le top! Les informations pour trouver le logement reçues avant notre arrivée sont dignes d'un guide touristique. Merci Raul l'appart est très sympa, bien situé et le roof top fantastique !

Raul is an outstanding host.
We never had such a detailed and welcoming introduction concerning the apartment and the city.
We enjoyed our time in Porto and already plan to come back.
The appartment is very nice. The best thing in this apartment is, the terrace. u have a very nice view.

Raul was an unusually engaging and helpful host.  Although we saw him only on arrival he was readily available and answered our single text question very promptly.  Beyond that he went well past the second mile in assisting us with travel arrangements of an unusual nature on departure; arrangements which went off perectly even though far from Porto.  He was even so kind and concerned as to text me during our travels to confirm that this had succeeded.  I cannot say enough in his behalf.
Raul nous a donné de bons endroits à visiter et de restaurant à tester.

Appartement incroyable: parfaitement situé, extrêmement bien équipé et cosy, café, thé à disposition, bière et eau au frais ! 
Un grand merci à Raul qui nous a accueillies chaleureusement malgré une arrivée très matinale. Les indications détaillées pour prendre le métro nous ont même permis de renseigner d'autres touristes ! Et le plan d'accès à l'appartement est fourni avec photos, impossible de se perdre. Sans oublier les bons plans indiqués par Raul. The best Airbnb !
Joli petit appartement pour une famille avec un enfant bien situé dans un quartier tranquille et avec une super belle terrasse pour contempler Porto.

Raul's Apartment ist absolut toll, ich bin ganz begeistert und kann es nur weiterempfehlen! Super zentral gelegen und doch ruhig, sauber und sehr gut ausgestattet. Die Dachterrasse ist absolute Spitze!
Raul ist sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und hat alles perfekt vorbereitet für einen unkomplizierten, reibungslosen Aufenthalt!
Top!!

Appartement très bien placé, très bien équipé. La terrasse est vraiment superbe.
Tres bon accueil de Raul qui n'a pas été avare de conseils qui se sont révélé excellents.
Wonderful location and place. The roof terrace is great, just as the host. Amazing experience, would love to come back again.

Very nice apartment. extremely well located. Super clean and well equipped. Very welcoming host. He gave all the required information and recommendation. No possibility to keep the luggage in the apartment after 11am (obligation to let them to a deposit 8 minutes walk away.

Raúl es un excelente anfitrión, nos recibió puntual y nos dio todo tipo de facilidades y consejos prácticos para nuestra estancia en la maravillosa ciudad de Oporto. El apartamento es una pasada y esa terraza maravillosa, da gusto pasar unos días fuera de casa si es bajo estas condiciones.

Had the most wonderful stay at Raul's apartment, it really is just beautiful! There is a lot of space, the high ceilings and big windows give a perfect view and it had everything we needed - comfy bed,  extra pillows, great shower. The private rooftop is just stunning - we used it every day. The location is perfect for exploring by foot. Raul met us on arrival and was a wonderful, informative and gracious host. Huge thanks Raul!

Raul est vraiment un hôte parfait: gentillesse, disponibilité, conseils sur la ville au top!
Tout est comme sur l'annonce et c'est encore mieux de le vivre en vrai!!!

Nous avons passé un agréable moment dans l'appartement de Raul. La vue sur la terrasse est magnifique, l'intérieur meme de l'appartement est bien pensée et très agréable .
La communication avec Raul fut parfaite et très complète .
Un modele de Airbnb dans tout les sens du terme .
Endroit unique, bel espace très lumineux avec un escalier qui mène à une  terrasse qui embrasse le Douro en contrebas, et qui donne également sur un campanile. On touche le merveilleux

Everything perfect!!! 
El apartamento de Raul es tal y como veis en las fotos, no hay trampa. Luminoso, bien ubicado, pequeño pero espacioso y muy limpio. Tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar. La terraza es estupenda. Una alternativa perfecta para descubrir Oporto. La comunicación con Raúl ha sido fácil, os recibe con toda la información que necesitéis. Un gran anfitrión.
Great host & great Appartment. Had a really good stay in Porto

Raul's flat is perfect in every possible aspect. Clean, comfortable, perfect location...and the roof top terrace is to die for! The area is clean and safe as well...Just perfect. I have been to Porto several times, and this place is by far the best that I have been to. I miss it already! Raul is a perfect host... Quick to respond, very informative, and very kind! If visiting Porto, this is the place that you want to be. Best view in all of Porto!

Excellent Excellent... Raul is a great host. Kept in touch before and during stay, met us at apartment and showed us around, great intro for what to see and where to go for our first time in Porto.
Apartment is excellent, very well equipped for self-catering, very comfortable bed, fast internet... Just great all round.
The best bit of all is the view from the roof terrace... Fantastic view across city and out towards the sea.
Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family.
Great location and lovely city.
Big thanks to Raul
Great place at the heart of the historic downtown. Raul was a great host, giving attention to details and allowing a great stay

The Apartment from Raul is very, very beautiful. We had a really good Time in Porto. Everything is clean, modern and in a fantastic shape. The bed is very comfortable and the Apartment is quiet. The view from the terrace is great and exclusive. You can look over half of Porto. Raul is a perfect host. He give us a lot of Information before we arrived about Porto so we had a really good and relaxed Start in our Holidays. Jederzeit wieder-everytime again!

L'appartement est parfaitement situé pour découvrir tout Porto et nous avons pu profiter des conseils de Raul qui a été un hôte très accueillant. Tout est parfait dans l'appartement super bien décoré et très bien équipé. La terrasse permet une belle vue même si nous n'avons pas pu trop en profiter à cause du temps.

Porto est une ville magnifique. L'appartement est superbe...fonctionnel. Le (Website hidden by Airbnb) terrasse et sa vue magnifique. Raul est adorable. Nous avions communiqué avant le départ,ainsi aucune mauvaise surprise. Tout était parfait. À refaire très vite

El apartamento es una maravilla, con una gran situacion y con u a terraza que tiene una vistas geniales. Todo estaba super limpio y nos ha encantado pasar unos dias en Oporto. Decir que Raul es una persona muy agradable y muy simpatica.
Recomendable cien por cien.

Super appartement, très confortable et très bien équipé.
Lumineux, agréable à vivre avec une très belle terasse.
Raul est un très bon hôte, super sympathique et qui sais vous mettre à l'aise. Ils vous envoient un plan très bien expliqué pour trouver l'appartement, et cela à grandement facilité notre arrivées.
Allez y les yeux fermés,
Vous ne serez pas déçu. P

Raul's flat is absolutely wonderful ! View from the terrace is to be enjoyed during a sunny breakfast or a night with a glass of wine. The city maps, the tips, the movies, the equipment, the cleanliness, the comfort of the bed (!) and Raul himself.. It was brilliant ! Thanks so much ;)

Raul's apartment is the #1 accommodation in Porto. Beautifully designed, with all the amenities you need. Features a stunning roof-top patio that offers amazing views of the city. Located in a great neighbourhood that is close to everything: downtown, shopping, train and metro station, waterfront.
Raul is the best host in Porto! We have stayed in his apartment 3 times now. He is super-friendly and welcoming and gave us lots of excellent suggestions for going out in Porto. Obrigado Raul!
A really great place to stay!

Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Porto! Bei Raul fühlten wir uns gleich herzlich aufgenommen und waren von seiner perfekten Organisation ganz beeindruckt. Er ist sehr hilfsbereit und hatte viele Tipps für uns. Seine Wohnung ist tipptopp. Sie liegt sehr zentral und ist mit der Dachterrasse natürlich ein Traum. Wir haben die Zeit in Porto sehr genossen und können Raul`s Unterkunft wärmstens empfehlen! Muito obrigado!

Raul's flat was perfect for a short stay in Porto. The flat is cozy and beautifully decorated with everything you need! Raul gave great tips and we appreciated all his advice. We were able to walk everywhere in Porto from this location. Our only complaint was that rain prevented us from using his amazing outdoor patio! Highly recommend this flat.

Wir hatten eine super Zeit in Porto, die vor allem durch Rauls Wohnung abgerundet wurde. Wir haben schon mehrmals über Airbnb gebucht aber noch niemals war an alles so gedacht wie bei Raúl. Seine Einführung zu Beginn unseres Aufenthaltes in die Wohnung und die Stadt war einfach großartig. Nicht zu toppen an der Wohnung ist vor allem die Dachterrasse. Bei schönem Wetter macht sie es sehr schwierig überhaupt die Wohnung zu verlassen :)! Hoch verdiente 5 Sterne!
Very good place to discover porto. Clean and well designed appartment conform to the photos. Thanks to raul for welcoming us with smile and good advices. Calm.
Raul est vraiment un hôte exceptionnel. L'appartement est vraiment bien. Bière et eau au frais dès notre arrivée, le top. Merci pour tout encore une fois.
Très bonne expérience: un logement agréable, propre, bien équipé... et un vrai plus la terrasse sur le toit ! Raul nous a donné de bonnes adresses pour manger: parfait !

appartement très bien situé , très bien aménagé , lit très confortable .juste prévoir boule quies pour les ,mouettes rieuses et de bonnes baskets pour monter et descendre les -à marches avis au sportifs !! Raul est très accueillant merci

This flat really is the perfect place from which to explore the city! The roof is clearly a big plus, but the flat itself is also airy, clean and comfortable. The sofa bed is very comfortable to sleep on and little extras like the coffee machine make it. The location of the flat couldn't be better (including lots of great local restaurants), and Raul's city-tips and availability for check in (and general questions on the city!) made a big difference. No need to keep searching, pick this one!

Apartamento incrível e super bem localizado. Perto de vários restaurantes e dentro do centro histórico. Uma linda vista do por do sol que pode ser visto do terraço. O Raul foi muito atencioso e nos recebeu MUITO BEM. RECOMENDO!!!

Raul was great even before arriving. We were quickly  reassured about how to get to the flat. The flat is well situated, every place to visit is very easaly reachable. The flat was perfectly clean, we felt at once very confortable in the flat. The view from the terass is a must, it almost made us forget to visit the city ;-). Raul gave us nice hints for visits and places to eat or go out. Don't resist, just book the flat! :)

Great location and easy to get to from the airport on the 601 bus.  Long climb up to the 3rd floor but the roof-top view is worth every step.  Raul provided lots of useful info when we checked in.  There were no surprises or issues with the flat, which is just how it should be.

Raul's apartment is great. He was there to meet us and full of information that we used a lot. The apartment is in a really interesting location - up a hill yes but that's Porto. Good restaurants and supermarket nearby and sitting on the deck when it's cooled down a bit is gorgeous.  Highly recommend this apartment.

Fantastic spacious apartment! Loved the location, 7 min to metro, 8 min to the river, 5 min to bars. 

Roof top terrace great for breakfast and despite occasional rain we (2 of us) enjoyed our stay very much. 

Great explanation by the host of the area and connections. 

Towels, soap, shower gel, coffee, tea, fridge etc all provided in the room. 

Highly recommended!!! Thanks very much!

Raul's apartment was fantastic. It was our first time in Porto and the apartment made a perfect base to explore the beautiful city. Everything is within easy walking distance (although some roads are steeper than others!) and you're right in the heart of the historic part of town.

The apartment itself was clean, cool and had everything we needed - from an iron and hairdryer to a portable speaker and coffee machine. The pictures of the roof terrace don't quite do it justice, it has amazing views and we were lucky enough to have great weather so spent a lot of time up there. Really great addition to the apartment.

Raul was super friendly and helpful upon our arrival, allowing us to drop our bags off before check in so we could get out and explore. He also gave us a whole load of recommendations for restaurants and things to do, and all those we had time to  try didn't disappoint. He made us feel really welcome and made our stay all the better.

Die Unterkunft ist spitze. Schon die malerische Lage mit Blick über die Altstadt von Porto bis zum Meer ist traumhaft. Mit dem Bus vom Airport in kaum einer halben Stunde und die Bushaltestelle keine 10 Minuten von der Wohnung weg, auch als wir um 04.00 Uhr den Bus zum Airport brauchten, kein Problem, nachts fährt er alle Stunde ab. Direkt vor der Haustüre ein super Bäcker und ein kleiner Kaufladen - perfekt für ein frühes Frühstück ab 06.00 Uhr oder noch für den Abend einen Käse und eine Flasche Rotwein. Raul ist super pünktlich und das  Ein-/Auschecken war unkompliziert. Tolle Hinweise und persönliche Tips von Raul und er ist auch für Rückfragen immer und gerne bereit - einfach toller Gastgeber. Wir kommen sicher wieder und haben auch schon unseren eigenen Kindern und Bekannten die Wohnung dringend empfohlen.
Great spot, amazing host!
Die Unterkunft hält, was die Beschreibung verspricht. Die Dachterrasse ist toll! Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und alles hat bestens geklappt

This apartment is perfectly located in the historic city and convenient to base all your city site seeing from. The apartment is very close proximity to various modes of public transport. The apartment is
Super tolle Wohnung. :)

Rauls Appartment ist ausgesprochen geschmackvoll und modern ausgestattet und verfügt über eine Dachterrasse mit einem tollen Ausblick über Porto. Die Lage in der Altstadt (nahe der Universität!) ist für Stadtbummel und Besichtigungen ideal.
Raul ist ein ausgesprochen freundlicher Gastgeber, sodass ich einen Aufenthalt in seiner Wohnung nur empfehlen kann!
Terrific apartment  in a perfect terrific location with the very best airbnb host you could wish to meet.  What more could you want? I wouldn't hesitate to return. Thanks Raul.

Raul's flat is even better then described. He is a kind host, and he gave us some helpful tipps to discover the city. Also the communication between us was always friendly and he replies very quickly. ( We have forgotten a jacket in the flat and Raul managed the shipping immediately)
The flat is more than well equipt, there was for example enough toilet paper, kitchen towels, garbage bags and so on which was quiet nice because the next bigger supermarket is 10min walking distance. The flat looks as good as on the pictures but the roof terrace is amazing and definetely a highlight! Raul's flat is easily to reccomend for your trip to Porto!
Great central place ro explore Porto. Rooftop deck is a massive MUST have!
Nice place to stay, well decorated, with a beautiful terrace overlooking Porto. Walking distance from all main attractions.

Raul's place is nothing short of stunning. The apartment is spotless, very well-equipped and maintained, and feels a lot larger than its dimensions due to 3 huge windows which let in abundant natural light. The flat also features super high ceilings and some gorgeous inlaid stonework in the walls - it felt like living in a loft. I was instantly comfortable. 

The roof deck, of course, speaks for itself. You'll watch the sunset over the Atlantic every night, a unique experience that I didn't see mentioned in any of the other reviews for this place and which I was truly not expecting. The views of the river and the opposite bank are second to none. 

The place is situated in a lovely neighborhood just apart from the tourist hordes of Ribeira. I found myself sharing the sidewalks with true Porto natives rather than tourbus riders with selfie sticks. And there are some absolutely wonderful little restaurants and tapisco joints just steps down from your front door. The rest of this lovely city is immediately walkable beyond there. 

And of course the best part is having the opportunity to meet Raul, a thoroughly delightful and professional host who takes such evident pride in the apartment. As far as I'm concerned he's the gold standard for AirBnB hosts. 

I've had the great good luck to staying some truly phenomenal AirBnB places over the years - and I have to say that Raul's apartment now sits at the very top of that list.
Grand studio au coeur de Porto à réserver les yeux fermés.
Best airbnb we ever went. Best host. Very nice flat. We will come back with pleasure. Thanks!

Raul was the perfect host! We were a little late arriving and he was able to accommodate us without complaint. He is very knowledgeable when it comes to Porto and all the things it has to offer. The space is just as described and the rooftop terrace is amazing. I would definitely recommend staying here and if I ever return, I'll be contacting Raul for sure.
c'était bien et sympa, au centre de la ville et bien pratique pour se ballader.
Well located, spotlessly clean. Slightly quirky, but well equipped. The arrival instructions were outstanding and the briefing was just right

Le logement de Raul est parfait à tous points de vue!
C'est propre, bien équipé avec tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour passer un séjour confortable et pouvoir profiter pleinement de chaque moment passé au logement ou à visiter les alentours. Vous pouvez tout faire à pied et c'est absolument magnifique. Le lit est confortable, la cuisine fonctionnelle, les explications de Raul sont claires et pratiques, la terrasse sur le toit est magnifique. Rarement je pense retourner au même endroit puisque j'aime découvrir du nouveau, mais cette fois je crois bien que lorsque je retournerai à Porto ce sera à l'appartement de Raul!
Merci pour tout!!!!
Greet apartment on a perfect spot visiting Porto. Raul is a great host.

Raul is very friendly! He provide very detail information about how to arrival and where must see and eat! He is just like our friend advised us to avoid the thief carefully! We really thanks for having the chance to live in his house, highly recommend!
Excellent accueil et bel appartement. Très bien situé avec une belle terrasse. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.

This is a fantastic apartment! The rooftop is amazing. The location is perfect. All the amenities are there. Raul is a gracious and accommodating host. If you are going to Porto, this is the place to stay!

From the first second onwards I started to really like Raul and his lovely (Website hidden by Airbnb) flat is everything one needs and taking into consideration the balcony it is far more than that.The view and the high walls inside are outstanding.On top of that,I rarely got to know a host who is that well organized and always on the phone or in the near when having any issues.The perfect place to stay in Porto!
Very hospitable host, nice and cosy appartament

Best Airbnb EVER! Book this place or you will be missing out! Large floor plan, stylish, and AMAZING rooftop views of city and river. Better views than pics show. Super clean, great amenities, super nice host, and perfect location walking distance to river, bars, restaurants, shops, and historical landmarks. Can't get any better than this! Thank you for great memories! You made our stay in Porto so special!!
Amazing house, perfectly located to walk everywhere in Porto. And the rooftop was probably my favourite thing in the house, one of the best views I've ever had in a airbnb!
TOP

Raul is the consummate host: prompt communication, detailed explanation of the neighborhood, and isn't shy to share his local recommendations for things to do, see, and eat.

The apartment was imbeccably clean and the panoramic rooftop view does not disappoint. Good hot water and kitchen, and a comfortable bed. Easy access to Clerigos Tower and Porto's night life. About half mile walk to The garden of the crystal palace. Fantastic stay.

This was one of the best flats we have stayed in through Airbnb. Raul is a thoughtful host who had quick communication and good recommendations. The flat was clean, in a good location, and the roof top terrace was a great place to sit and enjoy the sunset. We would stay here again or in another property of Raul’s.

It's absolutely fantastic place to stay in Porto. The apartment is very clean, spacious. And there is anything one you might possibly want here. The rooftop terrace is amazing, it was very pity that Porto welcomed us this time with fog and drizzling. Highly recommended for stay in Porto

The place is amazing:
- quiet
- spaceful
- very clean
- the rooftop is amazing 
- perfect localisation

Raul is very welcoming, Nice and offers his help kindly! I recommand!!!

I liked Rauls apartment that much that when I came to Porto a second time I couldnt think of another place to stay. Everything was as great as during my first stay- the furniture and decoration is very well-chosen, and the kitchen/bathroom has all the equipment that is needed. Also the washing machine can be very handy in case of a longer stay. The greatest advantage of that apartment is surely the rooftop.Usually I am not a very romantic person,but with that view I couldnt resist to watch the sunrise and the sunset as often as I could make it :) Last but not least any communication with Raul could not be easier and quicker.For me it is still the best place to stay in that fabulous city.
The flat and Raul were top !!!
Outstanding apartment with an outstanding host Raul, don't hesitate to book.
La casa tiene mucho encanto, y la terraza del ático es genial.

Merci Raul pour l'accueil que vous avez fait à mes parents.
L'appartement est magnifique avec une vue à couper le souffle !
Il est également hyper bien situé, tout est faisable à pied. Le métro est également à coté si besoin.
Super séjour, très bon hôte, je recommande à 100%

We stayed at Raul’s place for 3 nights, the place was perfect! Raul has thought of everything and is a great host. It rained but for us but we were still able to use the amazing rooftop for a little bit, I would definitely recommend to stay here
Malgré l'annulation de notre vol et par voie de conséquence de notre séjour à Porto, je recommande chaudement Raul dont la réactivité et la prévenance en amont a été remarquable.

Raul’s apartment with rooftop terrace is one of the best spaces you’ll find in Porto. Located in a quiet neighbourhood that is five minutes walk to subway station, train station, downtown and waterfront. Raul has provided every amenity thinkable, making our stay always a perfect one. This was our fourth time renting his apartment and we will come back again next time!
The apartment is just great. It was clean, cozy and there was everything I needed. I absolutely loved the rooftop!!! Thumbs up and thank you!

Superbe studio extrêmement bien équipé, fonctionnel avec terrasse vue sur Porto. Le logement est idéalement placé dans le vieux Porto proche de nombreux sites touristiques.L'accueil, les conseils et l'aide de Raul nous ont été très précieux   encore merci    Seul petit bémol, des travaux dans l'appartement voisin peuvent occasionnés une petite gêne (travaux indiqués sur l'annonce)  nous recommandons vivement
Raul was probably the best host that I've encountered through Airbnb. The space was exactly what I expected and the location was perfect. I couldn't have asked for a better place and host in Porto.

We had a fantastic experience staying in this adorable apartment in Porto. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures and feels even more spacious. Raul met us for check-in, he is so kind and gave us great advice on how to best enjoy the city.

The location couldn't be better, the bed was very comfortable, and the space has everything you'll need. We highly recommend wandering around the neighborhood and finding some cute local places to eat and drink. The roof deck is also amazing, even in the rain!

The apartment was just as described. It was clean, neat, stylish, and in a great location. Everything worked and the kitchen contained the basics we needed. It was great to have a washing machine too. Raul was very friendly and helpful with directions and where to park. He also provided great tips on restaurants. Just down the hill, Taberna Santo Antonio, was outstanding and so reasonably priced.  We stopped by at lunch time to reserve a table for dinner because it gets very busy and is small . The apartment location was great for touring Porto. We walked (or climbed) everywhere from the apartment. The roof deck is really cool too - especially to watch sunsets. There is also a small market a few doors down and a couple of cafes just downstairs. 
The huge windows were amazing for views. We used a small fan at night to keep the air cool at night - it worked out just fine in April.  The apartment may be warm in the summer months. 
We would definitely recommend the apartment to anyone visiting Porto!

Raul's apartment in Porto is great.  It is in a great location and great neighborhood.  Very easy to reach from the airport.  It is walking distance to everything in the historic area of Porto.  The upstairs balcony is reason enough to stay here, but it was a very comfortable and clean apartment as well.

Raul was very flexible on check in time as our flight was delayed.  He took time to meet  us and give us some great tips for restaurants and sights in Porto.

Thank you Raul!

Amazing view, great space for a couple. We had breakfast and sundowners on the roof daily. Explored the city all day which is totally doable on foot from this apartment (note: Porto is hilly). Raul's hospitality was exceptional, couldn't recommend highly enough - would happily stay again (wish I was still there!).

The beautiful place made the stay in Porto even more fantastic. 
Thank you Raul for being a great host.

Raul is an excellent host. Caring and available, he made sure everything was alright throughout our stay and, though unable to welcome us personaly, was very (very) careful to our welcoming. He had prepared a map and a short « guide » with his favorite places which proved very useful. 
His place is perfectly clean, ideally situated (at a 5 minutes walk from the main spots) and his terrace (large with a nice view on the town and the Douro) is definitely the place you want to have a drink on before going to the restaurant for a great « Polvo a lagareiro ». 
I definitely recommend him as a host.

La casa es perfecta, se puede ir a todos sitios andando.
Raul se preocupa antes de tu llegada y una vez estás en oporto te facilita información útil de la cuidad 
SOBRESALIENTE!!!
Stay here! Beautiful apartment and wonderful host. Porto is the best and we loved the terrace and location at this apartment

Raul was excellent in communication both before and during our stay. He gave us suggestions for some great local restaurants, and even circled the must-see attractions on a city map which he had thoughtfully provided himself. He also stocked the fridge with some water, fruit juice, and beer, plus some coffee to get us started. 
The apartment is lovely, just perfect for two people. And the rooftop and view were a wonderful bonus. We enjoyed a rooftop cocktail each evening before setting out for dinner. 
We had a rental car, and on Raul's suggestion, found it very easy to park for free in the same street as the apartment. Porto is a very walk-able city, and Raul's apartment is in a perfect location for exploring.  We had a wonderful stay and would definitely return to Raul's next time we visit Porto.

Raul’s apartment was perfect in every way. Amazing central location, everything you could possibly need in the apartment, and the most incredible views from the rooftop deck. Raul was a fantastic host and provided tons of recommendations for local restaurants and things to do. We’d stay here again in a heartbeat!
Super locatie in centrum, mooi appartement op derde verdieping. Niet voor kinderen geschikt wegens trap naar prachtig dagterras. Verzorgd en proper. Vriendelijk ontvangst.

Raul was super nice and explained us everything, we had to know for our trip. The appartement is absolutly brilliant. Especially the beatuiful terrace, were we had nice evenings enjoying the view above the roofs of Porto. 
Thanks Raul!

Os moradores do Porto são gentis e acolhedores, e Raul se destaca nessas características.  O apartamento é funcional e agradável, com um terraço muito especial. Está a uma distância abserbpercorrida a pé das principais atrações do Porto, mas mantém a tranquilidade. Recomendamos.

Wir haben unserer Tage in der tollen Wohnung von Raúl über den Dächern von Porto ausserordentlich genossen. Raúl ist ein sehr zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Die Kommunikation war stets unkompliziert und speditiv.
Die Lage der Wohnung sehr zentral und trotzdem ruhig und die Dachterrasse einfach der Hammer. Die Wohnung ist mit liebevollen Details gestaltet und hat sehr viel mediterranen Charme und Stil. Wir würden jederzeit gerne wiederkommen und danken Raúl für sein Vertrauen und seine wertvollen Tipps. 
Yvonne und Familie

Raul’s place is in a great location, lots of nice bars, restaurants and all the sites are in walking distance of the old town. The apartment is very nice with amazing views of Porto from the terrace. Raul was very friendly and helpful, with some good recommendations. We had had a great time in Porto.
Mooie Airbnb op centrale plek aan de rand van het historische centrum op loopafstand van veel bezienswaardigheden. Complete inrichting, netjes en mooi uitzicht vanaf het dakterras.
Raul est très accueillant et très disponible, son appartement est très bien situé et très propre, je recommande vraiment cette adresse !
This is a fabulous apartment - great location, lovely roof terrace - and Raul is a brilliant host - incredibly helpful and kind. We had a really wonderful weekend
Raul ist ein sehr netter und zuverlässiger Host. Seine Wohnung mit Dachterrasse ist super und liegt ideal im Zentrum Portos. Sofort wieder.

This apartment was perfect during our stay in Porto! Great location close to everything, huge private terrace with amazing views, clean, 5 star hospitality, quick communication, easy check in. Very comfortable place, highly recommended. Thank you!

Raul was highly recommended by a friend who has rented his place on Airbnb 4 times, so that is evidence of what an amazing host he is. Upon our arrival, Raul was warm and welcoming by personally greeting us, and it was obvious that he loves his city. He took the time to give us many great suggestions on how to appreciate local life off of the tourist map. The location is incredible and the rooftop terrace is amazing to watch sunsets. The apartment had everything we could imagine anyone would need as Raul is thoughtful of every detail.  Also need to mention that it was very clean on our arrival.
