We will definitely stay at Raul’s place when we return to Porto!

Great place to stay, bright, spacious, central but quiet. The roof top garden adds an extra living space with wonderful views. (But you  need to be steady on your legs to make it up to the roof as steep steps.) The bed is super comfortable and having a washing machine makes traveling easy.
Raul went out of his way to ensure we had a great stay and organised alternative transport for us to the train station while the taxis were on strike. A very thoughtful and caring host.
Highly recommend Raul’s place!

This was one of the best Airbnb places we have stayed- perfect location, comfy bed, clean, and the rooftop terrace is breathtaking! We stayed in 4 different places on our honeymoon and this one was the best!
Good location, everything was as described. Really enjoyed the terrace. Raul met us in person and was very friendly and helpful.

This place was an absolute gem in Porto. Raul’s space was thoughtfully designed and accommodated a hotel-like experience. He was very detailed and clean which we are very greatful for.
 It is also an ideal location for anyone who is traveling to Porto for the first time. It’s within walking distance to the Livreria Lello, Clerigós Tower, the Douro River and the most amazing little restaurant around the corner called Taberna Santo António (recommended by Raul). 
This place was an extension of how amazing our trip was on our first time visiting Porto. I would definitely recommend this place, it was the best Airbnb we have stayed at.
Wat een geweldige accommodatie is dit en wat een fijne man is Raul. er is niets gelogen aan alle positieve reacties en de communicatie vooraf is top.

First of all the communication was top notch every request answered almost immediately.  Location could not be better best coffee next door, best Fado across the street!  Close to everything don’t need a car at all!
Porto is fantastic and if you see this place is open , book it!
had a great time staying at Raul place. great location and close walk to everything. rooftop had a great view which was amazing. Would definity recommend to stay here.

Très bel appartement, extrêmement bien situé.
Raul est un hôte très accueillant, n'hésitez pas à lui demander des conseilles pour votre séjour, ceux-ci ont été pour nous, très avisés (restaurants, visites, parcours).

The apartment and Raul live up to all of the glowing reviews.  Yes, there are a lot of stairs (which was tough for us to navigate with a stroller and a baby) BUT the extra exercise pays off.  The apartment is delightful.  Raul is a very kind and helpful host.  We really loved our stay.
Una terrazza  con i gabbiani
Muy céntrico, todo a un paso andando. El ático de cine.

Nous avons passé un moment exceptionnel à Porto grâce notamment à Raul, cet appartement, le rooftop, la douceur et le soleil..!! 
L’appartement est idéalement situé, très calme, un moment unique à partager en amoureux!
Do not hesitate to book this apt. The location is perfect! The apt is stylish and clean. The rooftop balcony was amazing and the views were beautiful. I would stay there again.
Todo bien, la casa genial y la azotea una maravilla. Exactamente igual que en las fotos, y Raul da facilidades para todo.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is rich in nature and culture. Community Gardens and trees are among the residential areas while the Highland Park and cemeteries are distant closer to the highways. Also our well preserved Ridgewood reservoir is an amazing spot of well-kept nature where you can take a break from the heavy air polluted from Manhattan.  Traditional Brooklyn area which will soon disappear due to the new developing wave coming from Downtown Brooklyn. In this wonderful area of Brooklyn you can always find parking since it is a family oriented area with more 1-2 family houses rather than buildings.  The freedom of religion is very well expressed by the presence of old- constructions of a Russian and Spanish Catholic church among other American contemporaneous churches.  This neighborhood is rich in diversity. You will find all kind of residents from around the world. Our diversity is shown in our Chinese restaurant, Spanish and Venezuelan restaurants (Popular “arepas” = corn cake delicatess
notes: Iron and hairdryer are available upon request. A set of keys will be in your room. I would either get the door for you or leave a key that you must NOT take with you for self access.
transit: Free parking on the street. Read the cleaning-days signs. Please read the House Manual for more info.
access: Please read the House Manual for easy access and extra info.
interaction: Whenever needed.
house_rules: 1. No visitors, other than discussed before the reservation. If there are extra guests found to be in the unit that you have not registered, there will be a $30 charge for each. 2. The guest who made the reservation must be who checks in, and will need to provide a Government ID. 3. Keep the place clean 4. Please turn off AC and light when you are not around. 5. Smoking is under no circumstances allowed inside the unit. You can smoke at the front house, as long as you clean up any mess / butts. Anyone caught smoking in the unit will be charged an extra $50 cleaning fee. Thanks and looking forward to your stay!

host.host_about:
I cannot live without food. The beach is my favorite place to relax. I  like a bit of everything. Love to try foods from all around the world which actually can be found in NYC!
I can be the social or just respect your privacy.  Love to give people their own space whenever they want it. Friendly and peaceful as anyone can be.
And oh and I am saving money to put out a music album ;)  Youtube: Si Ludi, (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Don't forget to subscribe :)

Booking tip: I encourage you to book asap if the days in calendar are open or as soon as I reply to you. I don't know how the guest part system works. But I've had people who send inquiries to whom I've sent pre-approved responses. This doesn't mean anything until you actually book (make the payment). During this time I can still pre-approve other people and even other guests can go ahead of you and our previous conversations and book! They will actually get the booking. Sorry in advance for any inconveniences, but at least I am giving you heads up.
Best,

Silvia

reviews.comments:
Silvia y Andi han sido unos anfitiones estupendos. Desde el primer momento nos ayudaron con recomendaciones de cómo tomar el metro, lugares que visitar, dónde sacar dinero.. en fin, todo aquello que un visitante necesita saber. Nos llevaron a comer al lugar más rico y barato de todo NY, comida casera y de verdad de la mejor mano latina. Tienen una casa muy acogedora, limpia y cómoda.
El único "pero" es la primera impresión de Brookling. Como nos explicó, la zona es al final muy tranquila y nunca pesó nada. No os dejéis llevar por la primera impresión ;) Los recomiendo sin lugar a dudas. Gracias por todo, amigos!

Very kind, helpful and friendly people in NY. They helped us in every thing we needed. Always there if something necessary at home. The hause is clean, cozy and commfortable. Very recommended! Thanks a lot guys!
Staying at Silvia's home was an amazing experience , 5 stars all around .

Wonderful!! Silvia and her husband are wonderful hosts. As if I were visiting old friends. Very polite, friendly and hospitable. Although I've lived in New York many years ago. They where readily available to give any good suggestions to local eateries and places to rediscover. I'm am so thankful. They made my trip to New York a very pleasant and memorable one. Thank you so very much!
Great host, very accommodating and willing to work with my unpredictable schedule.
everything was perfect, I was 4 days in new york and i felt comfortable everyday in that place!

Silvia and Aldy were very gracious hosts. They are very helpful and very accurate with all the information relevant to my stay at their place as well as the areas that can be explored in New York City. The neighborhood was very peaceful and it had shops that provided basic amenities which were open for 24 hours just one or two blocks away from Silvia's place. The couple were always available for queries and their place had the amenities that will make one's stay cozy and comfortable. The other guests were also very nice. Silvia knew exactly how to vet for her guests. The house was very safe and accessible to major points especially when you wish to go to Manhattan or JFK Airport.

Lovely bedroom, lovely flat,easy to get to (3min walking from a subway station ),clean. Had a great welcoming, Silvia and her husband are nice people who are willing to help and provide directions and good place to visit.we enjoyed it ! All the best Silvia
I'm happy to return in a few days ☺ Everything was as advertised!
I definitely enjoyed my stay with Silvia and Aldi! Clean space, comfortable bed and neighborhood, and great hosts! I'd recommend their place to my friends who use Air BnB most definitely!

Silvia and her husband were amazing hosts, and went above and beyond to make sure my friend and I had everything we needed during our stay in New York. The room was exactly what we needed: a clean spacious bed with a tv, and a spacious closet. The house was only 2 short blocks from the C line to Manhattan. I wouldn't walk around the neighborhood alone at night, but my friend and I had zero issues during our multiple walks to and from the subway. Overall, I'd say skip the hotel and stay here. You can't beat the price.
Well organized and a pleasant company!
Great people, great stay.  I would come back again and again. :)
good and friendly host . the house is close to subway station.
Great people who provide a warm welcome in Brooklyn - definitely recommend
Muchas gracias a los huéspedes! El lugar hermoso para alojarse en Nueva York.
I had a lovely stay, and felt very welcome. The neighbourhood is sweet and so close to the subway. I would happily stay there again.

Host was really friendly by texting, I didn't get to know her in person but she left somebody in charge.
House was really nice and is as directed in pictures and description, the location is the best, as you have J and Z and even closer C that takes you to vast majority of NY tourist attractions. 
Is a great place for an amazing price for well known expensive city.
Its ok, cant complain anything
This was my second stay with Silvia and Aldi. Like the first, it was wonderful. They keep a clean and friendly place. Always welcoming and helpful.
I had a great stay with Silvia and Aldi. My room was clean and comfy and the TV was a great bonus. If I'm back in town I'd definitely stay with them again!

I hereby recommend this place. 
It was a great pleasure for me to stay at Silvia´s apartment. 
She and her husband were very nice and courteus.  The house was really clean,  tidy and very close to train. You have different lines to go to Manhattan and other cities. 
Thanks Silvia for everything! It was a great experience. 
A Big Hug 
Sofia

Todo excelente en casa de Silvia, ella y su esposo fueron súper amables. La habitación es bastante cómoda y es más grande de lo que parece en la foto, la casa está muy cerca del metro y cerca del aeropuerto JFK :)

This place is perfect when you want to stay outside of Manhattan. 
It is close to 3 subway stations that take you straight to Manhattan. 
Small stores are around the corner. 
The hosts are super friendly and helped me whenever i had a question. 
The room is 100% clean, just as the bathroom & kitchen. 
I am glad i had such great hosts & a place called home away from home. Thank you.

I can only recommend this stay! Silvia is extremely friendly and open, she was very flexible with check-in and check-out times, the room was beautiful and clean and she helped me a lot by explaining the subway routes and showing me which places were worth a visit on the map. The only downside is being not that close to Manhattan but there's a lot to see in Brooklyn and the express subway line takes you to Manhattan in about 25 minutes. I didn't feel too sure about the neighbourhood at first but Silvia assured me it was safe and I can only confirm that as I arrived home late every night and never had any issues. I felt like a part of the family as soon as I arrived, thank you Silvia for making me feel so welcome!

Had a great stay at Silvia's! She and her husband were very welcoming and super helpful with tips and tricks for tourists. The apartment is not too central but the subway brings you straight to all major places you can think of mostly without switching. More than perfect for that price!

Silvia and Aldi are so inviting and friendly, and they maintain a comfortable, private and peaceful home. 

I arrived quite late at night, Silvia stayed up to show me around and tell me the best ways to get around New York. 

I stayed in the private room towards the back of the house which was quiet, spacious and comfortable. It was a good base to have while I explored NY. Netflix was also a bonus on cold, rainy days!

Would recommend this place for solo travellers, especially if you don't stay at home too much.

Silvia ist eine sehr offen, freundliche und Kommunikative Person. Bei fragen stand sie uns immer zur Verfügung und ermöglichte uns einen angenehmen Aufenthalt. Unser Zimmer war für uns zwei vollkommene ausreichend, durch einen eigene Schlüssel, durften wir kommen und gehen wie es uns eben passte, dass war sehr super. Das Bad wurde jeden Tag von Silvia gereinigt. Diese Unterkunft empfehlen wir gerne weiter (:

The place is very cozy and really close to train stations. It's clean and very organized. Silvia is a great host, she made me very comfortable at the very first day. The area is nice and you can find everything very easily. You can get food very close to the apartment. I would not hang around or walk alone at night. Overall, my stay there was great!! I recommend te place and I would stay there again.
Good value and good host. On an easy subway line.
Great host, easy to communicate with and made me feel at home.  Made accommodations for me with no hesitation. The place is very clean and easy to get to the subway.  Definitely would stay again!

Si trova a Brooklyn in una zona molto caratteristica, a me è piaciuto moltissimo! Si respira l'aria di periferia.
È un po' lontano da Manhattan, ma è collegato benissimo con tre linee della metropolitana e la fermata è davvero vicina. 
Silvia, è un'ottima padrona di casa, disponibile e molto gentile e la stanza molto confortevole e pulita.
Il mio è stato un ottimo soggiorno ;)

It's was exactly what it's says Minimalist. Close to the train but it's about 40min to an hour ride. It is simple and if that's what you need then look no further but if you want to hang out all night I might find something closer.

I came with my 15 year old daughter for a few days and had a great time visiting New York. Silvia was very helpful in answering any questions we had prior to our visit. Her place was as described. It was very clean. The subway was a block away. We had a great time and are happy we stayed at Silvia's.

Silvia's home is a perfect place to stay, very comfortable room with TV and clean linens, spotless bathroom and very close to the train station.  The neighborhood is also safe. I am definitely staying again and recommending this cozy minimalist room!
Great location, right by the train station and there are shops near by for groceries. Very clean and Silvia had some great recommendations of things to do in the area.

Silvia and Aldi are amazing people and are really responsive to your needs. The house is really near the subway station and there is a grocery shop and laundromat near the station if you need anything. Takes around 45 mins-1 hr to reach manhattan midtown area, the roommates can get noisy at times and because I was staying in the room facing the street it was noisy as well on some nights where parties are held in the neighbourhood on public holidays. The room is has all the necessary things you need for a short stay, bathroom and kitchen is shared with other guests. Other than that, the hosts were really the highlight of my stay there, they were very nice people and I highly recommend you get this place if you don't mind the travelling time to manhatten. You can transfer to an express train in a few stops to get you to manhattan faster should you feel the need to.

Silvia is very nice and a great host, but at some points i felt uncomfortable, cause the neighborhood was really not nice. as a white girl i never wanted to be outside when it was dark and i was nearly the only white person. i always came home before 6pm or 8pm cause i was scared. felt a bit like ghetto, cause i am used to european standards. cause of this i was very sad that i never saw NYC by night. 
the other ppl(other airbnb users maybe?) in the flat can be very loud. also the street and the cars(with booming sound) are very very loud too. i felt like i needed to hurry to the flat each time i left the metro station. aaand last but not least i saw a dead cat on the pavement when i left. nice clean room and nice host, but that's all, the rest was not enjoyable. sry.

Clean and enough space. Plus Netflix on TV in the room!
Takes about half an hour to Downton Manhattan by Subway

Silvia was very friendly and accommodating. The room is exactly as described and the house was nice. The neighborhood is a rough area of Brooklyn (although changing), so at night I would say it's best to take a cab or Uber. Otherwise great place with a very nice host.

GOOD  CLEAN room as advertised and has all the basics needed. Silvia and her husband were pleasant, responsive and helpful. Although they had other guests I enjoyed privacy and quiet surroundings. The location was average but I had no problem whatsoever.
Great place! Close to metro station C and J.

The place was great, just a few steps away from any food or subway. The room was nice and clean and perfect. It never got too noisy outside to sleep at any hour and great amenities. Definitely would recommend to anyone coming to NY for the first time or anytime.
The best one in Brooklyn
We loved our stay here! Silvia was so kind and very good at communicating. It’s super close to the train and everything touristy is within a 30 minute train ride. We will definitely stay here again!
Great place for the price! Very clean and close to train. Silvia was a great host and provided information about activities in the area and attractions in Manhattan.

Silvia and her husband were very nice.
House is clean.
2 blocks away from Train 3 station.
Area was ok, went out for groceries nearby at night.
few restaurants around, no much options.
Quiet place.
Alway clean bathroom and kitchen, although it was shared with other 2 people.
Nice affordable spot near the train stations and the rest of Brooklyn. Great host, Netflix on tv. Pretty nice set up for air bnb.
Sylvia's place was great. Just a short walk from A-C train. The room is as described, very simple but that is all that I needed. The neighborhood was and felt safe walking it at 3-4 am.

SILVIA is very nice and friendly.  The room was very cozy and clean as well as the kitchen and the bathroom with an affordable price. The location is very close to the subway station. Most helpful thing is that there's a second bathroom and shower for the emergency. Even if you're in a hurry,  no worries.
Silvia was an amazing host. Her tips on directions and the area was really detailed and helpful. The house was clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay here anytime I am in NYC.

A great experience!
I totally recommend the place and Silvia and her husband as a host...Thank you so much guys...
Great appartement, perfect area to stay, great host! Everything was just perfect!
这个房间很不错啊在纽约,这个价格也合适,同时离地铁站很近很近的｡ 屋子里各种设施做的也很好,真心干净,我这个洁癖都觉得已经不错了｡
Basic but inexpensive and in a good location close to several different subway lines. Heater in the room was having some issues but this was quickly fixed by Silvia.
Totalmente recomendado, buena ubicación y gran host !

Silvia is an outstanding guest. She will ensure that you're comfortable and have everything you need during your stay.  The room is big an clean, the kitchen seemed ready to cook anything you needed (though I didn't use it because I stayed for a short period), and the bathroom is clean and organized.

Thank you for your hospitality Silvia!

3 minute walk to subway. Quiet and safe neighborhood. Clean and comfortable room. Very comfortable bed. Netflix on the TV and strong wifi. Clean bathroom (although shared with other people, much cleaner than most!) Shower has excellent water pressure. Kitchen and refrigerator are clean and decent. Silvia and her husband are very friendly and welcoming. Enjoyed and appreciated my stay!
La estancia en la casa de Silvia es cómoda, limpia y tranquila. Queda muy cercano al metro que comunica fácilmente con los sitios turísticos de ny. Silvia es muy amable y respetuosa
I had a great time at my stay at Silvias home. She and her husband are very friendly and gave good tipps for everything. Enjoyed my stay.

Great Host. Very helpful and welcoming. Located two blocks from the A/C train with express or local stops all the way to Manhattan. Near shops and stores to buy snacks, food or drinks. Had a great time on my trip and would recommend Silvia’s place to anyone looking to travel to NY and not spend an arm and a leg in downtown. Thanks again to Silvia!

Der Aufenthalt in Silvias und Aldis Haus war sehr gut. Wir haben uns im Haus sehr wohl gefühlt. Es ist sauber, komfortabel, hat eine vernünftige Gesamtausstattung und für die heißen Tage eine Klimaanlage. Der Kontakt mit Silvia war gut, auch mit ihren anderen internationalen Gästen. Sie gab uns hilfreiche Tipps, die wir direkt umgesetzt haben. Der Weg zur Subway ist kurz, der nach Manhatten ebenfalls (ca. 25 Min). Im Viertel  gab es alles was wir brauchten (Einkaufen, Essen, Kino, Flughafenbus, etc.) Das Viertel ist lebendig und vital, allerdings auch direkt vor der Haustür. Man sollte als Besucher nicht allzu geräuschempfindlich sein. Ich würde wieder kommen und gerne wieder bei Silvia und Aldi wohnen. Vielen Dank für den schönen Aufenthalt!
Silvia is a lovely host - she was there to greet me despite me getting in rather late. She also gave me some great tips on places to eat and see locally. A very pleasant stay.

I would highly recommend reading her house "manual" before you decided to stay with Silvia. The location is in a janky part of Brooklyn close to two closed businesses and in a strange neighborhood. I stayed with Silvia for five days, tried to cancel the fifth day before the check-in time, and was declined for no reason but got a lecture on opportunity cost (which I already knew from business school).

The room is not functional for anyone who wants to get some work done in the building as there is often noises outside during the day and night. Window seals are not tight (I got attacked by a mosquito in my room with the windows closed). The bathroom is small, inconvenient, well organized, and lacking in basic toiletries (toliet paper). I would highly recomend looking elsewhere if you have any intention of getting stuff done inside the Airbnb.

The only benefit of this location is it's proximity to public transit, cost, and working AC.

Silvia and her husband are nice people, they responded quickly to my messages.The bedroom is like in the picture and the room was tidy and clean.I would recommend them and come back next time I'm in NYC.
Great host!
Silvia and her husband are definitely superhosts! Really friendly and accommodating and you can’t beat the price! This place is really closed to the subway which takes you to Manhatten easily.

Silvia and her husband were just great! Their hospitality and good will towards their guests is outstanding! The provided directions for subway stations, with connections very close to the room, and good places to go and visit. The room was great, as described in picture with plenty of space and privacy. The neighborhood is not the greatest but, let's face it, who goes to NYC to stay at his/her room? 
I would definitely stay again here if need be!
Room si very nice. Home away from home. Close to the beach. And Silvia and her husband are very nice and friendly hosts. ❤️

Silvia's place is in the heart of Brooklyn, which provides a place to sleep at affordable costs while exploring NYC. Her and her husband were fantastic hosts and allowed me an early check in, which was much needed after 3 hours sleep. The room is sparse, but well sized and fantastic wifi. Must be noted this is a house that seems to have most if not all the rooms rented out, so you at the whim of the other guest. I had no issues, and was happy for what I paid for. Only issue I would say, is that if you coming to NYC as a tourist, its a bit far out. i.e. will generally take you 40min or more by subway to get from central Manhattan to the airbnb.
La casa es muy linda y cómoda, las habitaciones son grandes, limpias y cómodas, el wifi funciona perfecto. Tiene una estación de metro a dos cuadras que lleva directo a Manhattan en unos 40min aprox.
Close to the metro station but kinda far from central city areas. Appreciate the organization of shared space in room numbers :)
Great location near Train lots of stores around. In room TV. I loved it.
hosts are great/ location for me was perfect and of course the price. would recommend even to my enemies never mind my friends.
I enjoyed my stay. Everything was so clean and fresh it made coming back from along day out very enjoyable and I was able to relax.
Сильвия всегда ответит на все вопросы, подробно расскажет о местоположении всех достопримечательностей.
De lo mejor la estancia, más de lo que esperaba y muy buena ubicación y cómodo

This is very much like a hostel but with private rooms.. It's very convenient. The air con works well, showers and kitchen are good and location is 2 mins walk from Van Siclen Station which is on a line that goes straight to Manhattan so its perfect
Thank you so much for the stay! I had a great time and the maps and helpful tips came in handy. You have a wonderful place! Thanks again! 5 stars and will definitely recommend to friends in area!
es un gran lugar para quedarse, son muy amables y reciben a sus huéspedes de una muy buena manera, la habitación es tranquila y en el metro en 40 minutos estas en Manhattan, totalmente recomendable

Propreté, marques d'attention, réactivité... J'ai tout trouvé chez Silvia, et plus encore ! Je me suis vraiment sentie chez moi dans cette petite chambre douillette. Seul bémol : on entend les bruits de la rue depuis la chambre ( celle dans laquelle j'étais en tout cas) , mais après des journées bien remplies, je n'y prêtais plus attention .  Je reviendrai, c'est sûr !
Had a nice stay at silvias place. The bed was comfy and the apartment clean. Easy to reach by train. Would recommend.

Fantastic value & a very welcoming host. This was my first trip to New York and it was great to have any questions I had helpfully answered by Silvia & her husband during my stay. Really enjoyed my stay here and would 100% recommend to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient base while exploring the city.
great place in East Brooklyn!
Nice place for a stay in New York, clean and comfy and just 2 min walk from the train station. It exceeded my expectations, I'd recommend this place to anyone.
The host was great and responded very quickly for any questions and the stay was great and worth the price
It was a nice stay at Sylvia's place. If you are looking to travel NYC on a budget and need a place to crash in, this can be a good option. it's close to the subway.

This place is good if you are staying around NY for few days. Nothing fancy, extra or more than the expected. But all the essentials are included. Apt and items were clean. I would not recommend going/walking around the neighborhood. But this apt is a block away from the Train C and A to get you anywhere in NY and around. It was very convenient to catch a train anytime during day/night. Price is very good for the room.

They helped me with the early check-in. I appreciate that. Also I met one of the hosts , he was very nice and explained me things inside the apt and food around the neighborhood.
Flexible check out and great communication with hosts.
Cerca de comida y metro, tranquilo

Had a very pleasant stay here, the room was as described and all the amenities were as described. The building is close to a metro station and has places to eat nearby. Great value and I would visit again.

A great & affordable option for everyone! This is my second time staying here & I have always been well taken care of by Silvia & her husband. They are both very kind & gracious hosts, who prioritize their guests. Their home is located close to two different trains & is situated in a fairly quiet neighborhood. The room is very clean with nice additions like a closet organizer, some shelving, air conditioner/heater, flat screen tv, and a desk. I would very happily stay here in a heartbeat again!

Very simple room but a very comfy bed. The station is close but you need to plan in around an hour to get to Central Park. The conversation with Silvia was good and the Check in easy. The bathroom was not the cleanest but okay. If you are travelling alone you might want to ask Silvia how safe the area is.. just in case. I was travelling alone and felt a little uncomfortable but nothing bad happend

name: Modern and Safe Place,Free Wifi
summary: Affordable Amazing Apartment Situated in an  Central Location With a Walking Distance To Most Attractions!
description: Affordable Amazing Apartment Situated in an  Central Location With a Walking Distance To Most Attractions!

name: Huge rm in 1500sq ft loft w/lots
summary: Huge rm, share w/lots of lite, in 1500sqft Loft. 3 rmmates (1 gal, 2guys). Smokers welcome.  Huge communal living rm and kitchen. The apt's is drama free. Loc in the middle of the LES, very happening night life w/many resturantes, bars, shops & near FBDJMZ &6 trains.
space: The room easily accommodates 2 people.  The Loft itself is huge, and basicly it will feel like its your own place, because the other roommates are always doing there own thing, either work or play and they are extremely cool and open minded and know the city extremely well if you need advice on where to go or to have a night cap.
description: Huge rm, share w/lots of lite, in 1500sqft Loft. 3 rmmates (1 gal, 2guys). Smokers welcome.  Huge communal living rm and kitchen. The apt's is drama free. Loc in the middle of the LES, very happening night life w/many resturantes, bars, shops & near FBDJMZ &6 trains. The room easily accommodates 2 people.  The Loft itself is huge, and basicly it will feel like its your own place, because the other roommates are always doing there own thing, either work or play and they are extremely cool and open minded and know the city extremely well if you need advice on where to go or to have a night cap.  Full access to living room and kitchen. I have 3 roommates, Orit, in her early 30's from Israel really gd person, has lived in NY for 10yrs. Admit also in his early thirties, from Houston Texas, has lived in NY for 6 yrs very laid back and lastly Pat, mid twenties, from Chicago been living in NY for 2yrs.  Everyone gets along like fingers on a hand, they're open and friendly, and are always willi
neighborhood_overview: The Lower East Side (LES) is the most desired neighborhood in the city, it's hip and cool and still has the feeling of old Ny, with plenty of galleries, resturantes, bars, shops.  Borders The East Village, Nolita and Chinatown.
notes: This is a smoking apartment, so smokers are welcome.
transit: 2 blocks to all major trains, F,B,D,J,M,Z and 6 trains
access: Full access to living room and kitchen.
interaction: I have 3 roommates, Orit, in her early 30's from Israel really gd person, has lived in NY for 10yrs. Admit also in his early thirties, from Houston Texas, has lived in NY for 6 yrs very laid back and lastly Pat, mid twenties, from Chicago been living in NY for 2yrs.  Everyone gets along like fingers on a hand, they're open and friendly, and are always willing to help in anyway if they can.  Everyone works on different schedules so it's rare to ever see everyone at once and sometimes it may seem as if anyone else lives there at all.  It's a nice flow in the apartment, that's about all I can say.
house_rules: Just respect the house.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Native NYer, use to own a partybus company, now bartending

reviews.comments:
Perfect place to stay in lower east side, for people who love a genuine NYC.
Recommended

name: Cozy 4 beds, Free Ferry to Manhattan.
summary: My place is close to restaurants and dining, art and culture, banks, supermarkets, and family-friendly activities. Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. clean, spacious, & cozy, Very accessible to the five boroughs of NYC. Safe, quiet, friendly neighborhood. access to Internet, unlimited movies on Netflix, Hulu, Amazon. 25 Minutes to Manhattan. Private apartment, entire floor. Apartment has everything you need in a house. It will feel like home.
space: The room is totally set up to accommodate 5 guests. There's a TV with Netflix, Hulu, amazon, and HBO Now connected to the TV. There's also a window AC in the window if needed. If you must use the AC in the summer time the fee is $10 per night for each ac. You must turn it off when you are not home. if left on while you are out, we will turn it off for you, but you will have to let us know when you get back for us to turn it back on.  The apartment is not shared it is totally private.  I do keep some food and items in the kitchen and refrigerator sometimes. I don't use the kitchen to cook. I have my own kitchen upstairs where my family and I stay.
description: My place is close to restaurants and dining, art and culture, banks, supermarkets, and family-friendly activities. Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. clean, spacious, & cozy, Very accessible to the five boroughs of NYC. Safe, quiet, friendly neighborhood. access to Internet, unlimited movies on Netflix, Hulu, Amazon. 25 Minutes to Manhattan. Private apartment, entire floor. Apartment has everything you need in a house. It will feel like home. The room is totally set up to accommodate 5 guests. There's a TV with Netflix, Hulu, amazon, and HBO Now connected to the TV. There's also a window AC in the window if needed. If you must use the AC in the summer time the fee is $10 per night for each ac. You must turn it off when you are not home. if left on while you are out, we will turn it off for you, but you will have to let us know when you get back for us to turn it back on.  The apartment is not shared it is totally private.  I do keep some food and items in the k
neighborhood_overview: We live in a very quiet and safe neighborhood with lots of stores for groceries, banks, deli"s, located in the area.
notes: We try to keep our place clean and comfortable, so we asked all guests to take off their shoes upon coming into the house. We also stress on guests ckeaning after themselves especially in areas that are shared.
transit: Getting around from my place is very easy and convenient. we're right in the middle of 6 local buses. express buses takes you straight to Manhattan. Bus # 53 that goes to Brooklyn is 1 block away from my place. Bus to and from the ferry is right on the corner from my house. Two car rentals & Taxi service not far away.
access: Guest have own entrance to house and own keys to their private apartment.
interaction: We try our best to make our selves available at all times for our guests, excepts during times when we are in bed asleep. if you need us. especially in the case of an emergency you can call or just knock on our door. We don't  know everything but we know a lot about NYC & surrounding areas so feel free to ask. Can advice on places of interest, and easy ways to get around with and without a car.
house_rules: - No illegal drugs  - No loud music. -  Check in's, during Sabbath hours  are  AVAILABLE ONLY BY SELF CHECK IN.  Which starts from Friday evenings sunset to Saturday evenings sunset. I will not be available during these hours. Please take note of that when sending inquiries during these times. I will respond to your inquiries after sunset Saturday evenings. Any questions about this please contact me and I will be happy to explain. Thanks. _ Guests must sign a waiver for the pool to get in. - Cleaning fee is a one-time fee for cleaning of the place after you leave. example: cleaning the shower, laundering sheets and towels, mopping floors, making up beds etc. Guests are expected to clean after themselves, leaving it just as they met it.  And making sure they respect and take good care of the space. No sleeping on the living room couch. - No shoes allow in the space. slippers will be provided. - Smoking is not allow anywhere on the property. That includes backyard, sides, and front of th

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Tout un étage à 30 min en ferry de Manhattan, avec des petits déjeuner à tomber !
Un super accueil d Eddie et Lois , des hôtes plus qu accueillants.
Encore  merci et à bientôt !
It was fantastic. I liked everything, but most the hospitality. Everything was as in description and better actually. I would go again with pleasure if I go to New York again.
Very satisfied. Esfecially, the woman host is very kind and nice. Plus a good cook. Thanks a lot
We had beautiful time with Luis.  Apartment is spacious and cozy and Luis breakfast is delicious.

My family and I loved our time w Eddie and Lois enjoying their Airbnb! First of all, the rooms are spacious and inviting. Plenty of room for all 4 adults to spread out, haha. It was so nice to have a sitting area and kitchen, with the ability to close off the bedroom area when one of us succumbed to exhaustion from walking Manhattan or Brooklyn! The space is clean, and Lois does a great job with providing the little things that are quite a pain to do without when traveling, like iron and toiletries, etc. Oh, breakfast was great! Such a selection and she even accommodates your schedule! The most important thing though, is the graciousness of both of them!! They are lovely humans, haha, and it permeated all they did for us during our stay. I guess the highest endorsement is that I am about to book another stay with them
Louis was very kind and helpful and would come back just for that

Eddie and Lois were very nice hosts. Lois was very responsive via chat or text. Their apartment looked just like the pics. The queen size bed was firm and the whole place was clean. We enjoyed our stay and would stay again.

Lois went out of her way to make us welcome.  The place looked exactly like the pictures.  Maybe a little bigger. There were ample towels, sheets and slippers. (No shoes in the apartment) We ended up parking on the street, but that wasn't a problem. 
We were disappointed that the kitchen did not have a coffee maker as we had to get going a little earlier than we would have preferred. We had a key to our flat, but not the outside door. Friday night we  got locked out and had to bang on the door at 2:00am. Lois was very apologetic for the inconvenience.  Saturday night, after an exhausting day in Manhattan we came back early and  in her zealousness to accommodate us, Lois woke us at 10:30pm banging on the door to drop off the towels she had laundered, which was not necessary as there were plenty in the room.
Everything was great, Louis is magical woman. I'd love to visit this place again.

Lois was unbelievably sweet and accommodating from my first email until my departure. The apartment was perfect for the four of us, a cute cozy apartment and warm breakfast and a smiling host, What more can you ask for? The price made this the best deal in New York!! I look forward to referring my friends and staying here again!
It was a great vacation. We loved the location and especially Lois and Eddie. We had wanted a quiet but fun family vacation and that's what we had. We will definitely be coming back!

Lois was very gracious! We felt very much at home. The images are exactly what you get, clean and comfortable. The Bus to get the Ferry is literally less then a minute walk.  We had a great stay and are very thankful for all the extra time you put in for us organizing bus routes and restaurant menus!!!  Thank you again! Love the Morgans xoxo
Lois made me feel like I was at home, the location was great for transportation getting to the city. When I come back in the spring I'll def be staying here.

Lois and Eddie are probably the sweetest people you would ever meet.  They go out of their way to help you out.  I could not ask for better hosts.  The place is clean and very spacious and all amenities are complete.  I highly recommend staying at their place if you need to stay in the area.  You will not regret it!

La descripción de la casa es con lo que nos encontramos allí, las fotos son totalmente verídicas. Respecto al barrio, es una zona tranquila muy bien comunicada con bus directo (enfrente de la casa) hacia el Ferry.
En cuanto a Lois y Eddie, son encantadores, siempre están pendientes de todo, interesándose por los huéspedes. 
La verdad que lo recomendaría sin duda.

Eddie and Lois were great host! Be ready for stairs as it is on the third floor. However, the apartment has every thing you need they were right there to give us a tour and right there when we arrived and ready to leave. I felt very safe leaving my truck there for the day to take he bus 20 steps away to the free ferry. To grab a metro ticket for the bus it was only a block away. Then you can use the same ticket to access the subways in NYC. I have already recommended this apartment to friends! Thanks again!

This place is very cozy and nice. Lois keeps it very well clean. She is very communicative and helps out however. She is always available and makes it known. The apartment itself is very clean and cozy, and you get to feel like you're living in NY instead of just visiting. I definitely recommend this to everyone who is interested.
Great place. Extremely clean and in an excellent location to get out and about. I will definitely come back. I recommend it to anyone and everyone
Absolutely amazing host.  Couldn't have asked for a nicer, caring, and loving host. Highly recommend.

We had a great time in the apartment.  Lois was very helpful and really kind with us. The buses to the ferry are next to the door and the free ferry is an excellent way to visit New York : every day a marvelous skyline!
The apartment was very clean and it was a great location! Lois was a great hostess! She was very helpful and always accessible if needed!
The apartment was so clean and well equipped. Lois and family were responsive and welcoming!  Overall, it was a pleasant stay. Highly recommend!
Great Hosts!
Great place and great hosts.

We generally enjoyed our stay at Eddie & Louis's place. The apartment is spacious, reasonably clean, has comfortable beds with good quality cotton sheets. We felt it was a good value. The host cleaned the bathroom and changed bedsheets/towels after 3 days which was a nice gesture. We were always able to find street parking next to the house.

On the other hand, a few things did not sit well with us.

To start out, the host somewhat distrusted us. Lois requested to see the whole family upon arrival at 1 am before giving us keys, so I had to go to the car and pick up my sleeping daughter (5 years old)/wake up the boys 10 and 11 and then all of us had to spend 15 minutes listening to house rules (may be a better would be to just provide instructions on the Airbnb site like other hosts). 

The bedroom was drafty, the wind coming through the window next to the bed was so strong that you could see the curtains move, even though windows were closed.

The master bed is placed on a pedestal - it can be seen in the pictures - that has sharp metal edges, it can be an issue for families with kids: my child fell off a bed and hurt his back on that metal edge.

I also felt the hosts were not fully comfortable with families that have young children. Even during message exchange prior to arrival Lois indicated her concern about the kids being noisy. Upon our departure she sent a flurry of very emotional messages blaming us for a scratch on the counter and a chip in the enamel on the stove. We tried to explain that we were not doing anything that could have possibly caused that kind of damage. She said that it might have been our kids playing with sharp objects. 

Finally I was surprised to see the hosts storing a lot of their own items outside of "private" areas. There was a drum set by the kitchen, the fridge had a lot of hosts' food and there was a host suitcase next to one of the beds.
Bien de acordé al precio.
Eddie and Lois were great hosts. The highlight of our entire stay was the free ferry ride from Staten to Manhattan. Definitely going back!
Spacious place with great amenities. Very nice and hospitable hosts. We thoroughly enjoyed our time there. Highly recommend!
Logement très bien situé, dans un quartier calme et très bien desservi. Lois et son mari sont adorables et toujours disponibles.
I had a great time here with my friends from Japan.

Rapport qualité/prix impeccable. Le bus 44 est à l'angle de la maison ce qui est très pratique pour accéder au Ferry (gratuit) qui nous amène à Manhattan tous les jours. Ricky est très serviable et arrangeant. Il vient vous chercher et vous ramène à l'aéroport. Si vous avez le moindre problème sur place, vous pouvez l'appeler, il saura vous rendre service.

Lois and Eddie's is like home away from home. Lois was a great host. It was our first time in New York and she wa very helpful. If you are looking to see the city but would also like to have some nice a quiet after a long day of sightseeing and picture taking, their place is perfect.

We didn't actually get to meet eddie and Lois as we got to Staten Island around 2 in the morning. It was a little complicated finding the train to the ferry and then the ferry ride is about 30 minutes long to Staten Island. As far as the house goes it was cozy and very clean. The only thing that I would have made the stay better was if they had bottled water instead of just the tap. :)

The house was clean and comfortable. It is a one minute walk to the bus and the bus to the ferry is a very easy ride. There are several stores in the area to pick up anything you might need. Overall, a good place to stay. Lois is very kind and quickly got back to me with any questions I had.

It was great to have a home base while exploring NYC that felt like a home. We were very comfortable at Eddie & Lois's place, it felt natural to just relax! It was a quick trip this time but everyone we met was so very friendly and kind. Great communication, safe, quick bus ride to the Staten Island ferry, delicious bagel shop just a few blocks away (check out their rainbow bagels!!) lovely stay, Thank you!!

Eddie and Lois are very nice, family-oriented people.  This is a great location to get in and out of NYC easily.  Free parking is everywhere here.  The living room is quite large and we were able to place a large board game on the floor and spread out as a family.  There is also great coffee (Fab Coffee is an easy walk), diner (Kings Diner), pizza and bagels.  The zoo is a very short distance and the kids had a great time.
Their place was cozy and as described.

The space was comfortable and clean, and Lois was extremely reachable and thoughtful through our entire trip. A couple things to note before you book, though: I didn't realize how far Staten Island is. My fault-- but it made for very long days during our trip. Yes, the ferry is free, but you will need to take a bus or Uber to the station. (There is a bus stop right around the corner, so this is easy, but does take 10ish minutes.) The ferry ride takes about 30 minutes. All in all, plan about 1 hour to get into or out of Manhattan. Second: Lois is not fooling around with rules. They are extremely strict about everything in the house manual, including no shoes, no using the desk unless you're a business traveler, etc. I completely understand why they're in place, but it's a lot to remember and just more intense than I have usually experienced at an AirBnb. I was very embarrassed when we forgot to take off our shoes for just a few minutes after returning late one night (it's easy to forget-- there aren't any seats in near the door), and we got a message (kindly) reminding we needed to take them off. Lastly, I was surprised to find that all of the cabinets, drawers, and fridge were full of the hosts' personal items. It was a little unclear where the boundaries were between what we could use and what we were supposed to leave alone, which was kind of stressful because after the shoes incident I was on high alert to be following the rules. There was a designated chest of drawers in the bedroom, but we weren't quite sure where we were supposed to put our bathroom or food items.

Wonderful place to stay! Clean and Eddie and Lois we were so helpful, along with their brother Ricky. He made us feel so welcomed and even took us on our way back to the airport to an Italian ice place called "Ralph's"! So sweet and amazing! Thank u for ur wonderful hospitality!!

Wonderful couple and incredibly helpful. They let us leave our bags before our check-in time to accommodate our plans in the city, which helped us immensely! It was clean, nicely sized, and taking the ferry into the city made it easy. The bedroom had a separate a/c unit which was nice bc it did get warm throughout the day. Lois and Eddie were very responsive to any questions that I had prior to our stay and they offered us transportation back to the airport upon our departure. Highly recommend a stay at their place!!

We had a great time in Lois and Eddie's place. The space for the guests is so great. Lois was close to us all the time and her help was great to move around the city. It was perfect for our needs. Thanks guys!

My sisters and I had an awesome time in New York and Eddie and Lois' place was a great value for our travels.  The place is very clean and spacious.  Lois is very welcoming and made us feel right at home.  I will definitely stay here in the future and I recommend it to any traveler who doesn't mind the commute in and out of the city.  We actually enjoyed the free ferry ride back to Staten Island at night time.  It was relaxing and a great way to view the city lights at night.

Great value for the New York area.  Exceptionally nice family who are so gracious and accommodating.  Comfortable space with everything you need and easy access to bus which takes you right to the Staten Island ferry over to Manhattan.

Meine drei Kind (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) und ich haben es genossen, jeden Morgen aus der Ruhe auf Staten Island aufzubrechen und abends dorthin zurückzukehren. Die 25 min auf der Fähre inclusive Aussicht auf Manhattan und umgeben von tollen Menschen scheinen zwar aufwendig, aber allemal lohnenswert. Die Busse fuhren verlässlich und pünktlich bis in die Nacht hinein. 
Dafür erwartet einen ein ruhiger Rückzugsort mit viel Platz, gut gekühlt und wunderbaren hilfsbereiten Menschen als Gastgeber. 
Jederzeit wieder.

The place is situated in a quiet part of Staten Island. (Expensive) shops but also dunkin donuts etc. are nearby. We liked that there was air conditioning, a clean pool, Netflix etc., a lot of food and of course really helpful and nice hosts! We also had everything we needed to cook.

Only the kitchen could be cleaner and the fridge more tidied up!

With waiting for the ferry it took about an hour to reach NYC for 2,70$.

To sum it up, it was a really nice stay and I would definitely recommend it!
You did a really great job!
They were very good and helpful. The bus transit was also close by.
Very nice appartment. Lois has been very nice to us. Staten island is still quite far from Manhattan you can't come back for a shower and head back to town! But the ferry ride is very nice :)
Overall a great place to stay. Just took longer than expected to get to the city (little over an hour). Eddie and Lois were very nice and accommodating!
Amazing hospitality.  It was like staying with family.
Place was a great, easy to get to, was very clean, would stay there again!

The place is actually far from New York City. You will need to take at least 15minute bus ride then a 30mins ferry ride to New York. The price of the accommodation is cheap and the room is nice too. But, it's a bit time consuming to travel around New York City and the transportation fee is a bit expensive. Usually the checkout time is flexible, but for my case the owner didn't let me know in advance that I need to checkout earlier and it is very hectic for us to pack and call uber. Besides, we had few warning messages from the owner saying that our footsteps are too loud and we keep making noises in the middle of the night. I understand that there's no party policy in the house so me and my friends we didn't even organised any parties and we tried to minimise our voices and movements.

We had a late flight. Arrived at the home around 11 pm. Lois did great accommodating with that. We got settled in the home, listened to the house rules. About 20 mins after being there we saw a bug that looked like a roach. Asked Lois if it was a roach and she denied that and said she does not have roaches here. Lois tried to kill it but I believe it went under the radiator. Lois left. Then one of my friends saw the roach on top of her luggage. And killed it.I woke up the next morning to a text from Lois admitting that it was a roach, advised her that we had killed it last night. Accidentally left the AC on while we were out. Homeowners came while we were away to turn it off, never got to meet Eddie but Shaun and Lois were very nice and accommodating. Commute to Manhattan was apx 1 hour by transit. Cute little shops nearby.
Great easy stay very cooperative
Great place-great host - safe- private and beautiful people - quick transportation to City- plenty of places to eat around neighborhood- I loved the place
Muy cómodo, los anfitriones con excelente atención, buena ubicación
So great! They were very communicative and everything was easy to understand and navigate!
Great and spacious place. Very nice hosts. However commute to Manhattan was longer than expected (45 minutes minimum).    Eddie had been very kind to us.
The hospitality and space is so great. Definitely recommend!

Our experience in Eddie & Lois’s Home was simply wonderful. The home is located in a very safe part of Staten island. Lois & Eddie greeted us with a smile and walked us through any questions we had about venturing around NYC for the Macy’s Day Parade. Lois had her cellphone on her at all times to assist us if we needed to get a hold of her. The apartment was spacious, clean and very comfortable. The beds were a dream to sleep on! The apartment was warm and cozy after a long day in the city. It was like coming home. I look forward to returning to NYC and staying with Lois and Eddie again. We couldn’t have ask for better host!! We give this couple a five star rating! Thank you again! Blessings.
It was a very nice and quiet space. We didn't stay there much (mostly to sleep), but we were very comfortable and it was easy to get around the city.

Beautiful, secured space! We felt safe and comfortable staying here and absolutely loved the home. Lois was very helpful and kind. My family took Uber to the ferry terminal for simplicity, so it ended up being about a 45 minutes ride into the city.

While we liked our host, we were disappointed in the place.  Our check in was rocky and scattered.  The place was not as warm and inviting as the pictures portray.  The kitchen was under stocked with cooking utensils.  There were pantry moths and a lot of food in the cabinets and fridge. There were broken drawers and banged up furniture.  The whole
Place smelled like perfum from plug ins.  Overall, we needed a place to sleep and make breakfast, which this place did for us, but had we needed to stay in more, it would not have fit our needs.  We didn’t feel like it was worth what we paid, and would not stay here again.
Great space, close to metro stops, and quite neighborhood.
The room was very clean and comfortable.

Eddies and Lois' apartment is in every sense of the word perfect! It had everything you need and more. Eddie and Lois were the best hosts you can imagine, so helpful and kind, taking care of us as if we were family.  We loved our stay there and would always come back if we can and highly recommend it to anyone! It takes some time to get to downtown Manhattan if you use public transportation, but it was always a nice trip with the staten island ferry and totally worth it considering what a beautiful apartment it is and therefore very cheap. It was in a really nice neighbourhood, with everything you need close by.  The apartment itself is very spacious and light, you just feel like home immediately, it is even prettier than in the fotos! Eddie and Lois are easy going, gave us valuable advice and  were always there  for us instantly.  We could have not been happier with our stay!
This is a great place to stay at..... the place looks a lot better in person.
Not what it seems to be from the pictures
Great place to stay in Staten Island! Lots of space and great amenities around including YMCA and the Bus Stop being at your door. Highly recommended!

C'est un bel appartement très bien situé, l'arrêt de bus est juste à côté de la maison. De bons commerces de proximité pour faire ses courses alimentaires. Le ferry pour se rendre sur Manatthan est gratuit et offre la vue sur la ville, ses gratte-ciels et la statue de la liberté.
Great family. Super friendly and helpful. Would stay again

Eddie and Lois's place was a great value. It's about a 15 min. drive to the ferry. We took cabs but we could have just as easily drove and parked closer to take the ferry which is free. It was a great location for us since the bike ride we participated in ended in Staten Island. There is a great brunch place down the street called Bruno's that is an Italian Bakery. They serve you fruit and baked goods before they bring out your meal, it was delicious!

Host's were very gracious and polite and it was a great value for the Staten Island. Two colleagues and I stayed in the unit and were more than comfortable. I would suggest doing a bit of essential food shopping before coming so that you can have breakfast,coffee,etc at home. I would stay again.

Eddie and Lois’s place was so spacious and homey! They provided clear instructions and everything we needed for a wonderful weekend stay. My friends and I had never stayed on Staten Island before, and Lois gave us tips on navigating the bus system and getting to the ferry to Manhattan. We would stay here again anytime we come to the city. We loved it!
The place was comfortable and beautiful.  Lois took care of us and responds quickly whenever we were in need.
Great host, great communication and very helpful. I would definitely stay with them on my next trip to Staten Island.

We had a nice stay! Very nice people and a cozy upstairs floor. Very close to the bus that takes you to the ferry in 15 mins. Affordable alternative to Manhattan. Thanks for everything and all the best to you.
Wonderful people and wonderful place. It beats staying in Manhattan which is too noisy 24/7.
Home away from home.  Comfortable,  accessible,  a real delight to experience.   You can't do better.  ♡

I booked this room as a cheaper alternative to staying in Manhattan. We took the ferry to the city everyday and there is a bus to the ferry right by the house which is extremely convenient. Traveling to the city was very easy from this location. The room itself was very spacious and clean. Lois is friendly and quick to respond to any questions or concerns. Overall it was a great trip!

Lois was very nice. She made checking in/out very easy. They made sure that the climate in the room was comfortable for us.  They were great hosts and I would use them again in the future if I ever take another trip to New York.

Had an okay stay at this place, although there were many many mosquitoes. Eddy and Lois couldn't help this ofcourse, but an itchy trip is not an amazing trip. When we were leaving, I had some trouble with Lois over how we left the place. It is resolved, but you should know that this is not a good Airbnb if you are messy or very forgetful.
Wonderful Host, Lois and her family were very helpful and gave a very warm welcome to their home! The place is great and is perfect for getting to NYC!
Good hospitality. But far way from downtown.
The apartment is utilitarian and useful if you need a stopover in Staten Island. The sheets were clean and the beds comfortable.

The apartment is exactly as advertised. Very spacious-we particularly liked being high up in the house, affording us lots of privacy. 

I particularly liked the Queen Bed on the raised platform in the bedroom. I felt like a Queen, sleeping up there. 

Being without shoes on that lovely wooden floor also felt nice and cozy-not at all a hassle-even for my husband who is an In-the-House-Shoe Guy. 

Enjoy your stay at this Cozy Hideaway.

This is a great place to stay when visiting NYC. Bus stop to the free ferry is right on the corner. My three friends and I felt safe walking around the neighborhood at night. The apartment was nice and clean and the check in was a piece of cake. They are great hosts and responded quickly to any questions! Thanks for an awesome stay!
Location is nice, hosts are friendly very helpful with information about getting around city.

propre, bien situé pour faire du touriste à Manhattan.  le bus est au coin de la rue. par contre si vous prévoyez partir la journée avec un déjeuner au logis. il vous manquera quelque article de bas, comme exemple , un grille pain ou tout simplement des tasses pour un café. 
dans l'ensemble c'était bien.

name: Apartamento familiar a estrenar
summary: Apartamento familiar de 100 m2, con dos dormitorios, al lado de la Sagrada Familia, en una zona turistica de dia y familiar y tranquila de noche, con agradables terrazas donde sentarse o pasea. A pocos minutos del centro mediante metro o autobús
space: Fantastico apartamento, con numero de registr(phone number hidden), con dos dormitorios de 90 m2, ubicado en el Eixample derecho, al lado mismo de la Sagrada Familia y del Hospital de Sant Pau, declarados Patrimonio de la Humanidad por la UNESCO.  Apartamento con dos dormitorios, uno con cama doble y otro con dos camas que pueden unirse para convertirse en doble. Habitaciones muy tranquilas ya que dan a un patio interior.
description: Apartamento familiar de 100 m2, con dos dormitorios, al lado de la Sagrada Familia, en una zona turistica de dia y familiar y tranquila de noche, con agradables terrazas donde sentarse o pasea. A pocos minutos del centro mediante metro o autobús Fantastico apartamento, con numero de registr(phone number hidden), con dos dormitorios de 90 m2, ubicado en el Eixample derecho, al lado mismo de la Sagrada Familia y del Hospital de Sant Pau, declarados Patrimonio de la Humanidad por la UNESCO.  Apartamento con dos dormitorios, uno con cama doble y otro con dos camas que pueden unirse para convertirse en doble. Habitaciones muy tranquilas ya que dan a un patio interior.  Salon-comedor exteriores equipados con sofá, tv y vistas al mar.  Cocina equipada con horno microondas, cafetera, nevera, tostadora, exprimidor, batidora, .... Baño completo con ducha. El apartamento dispone de calefacción. Muy bien ubicado en la misma esquina de la Avinguda Gaudí y al lado mismo de la Sagrada Familia.  A 50
neighborhood_overview: Muy bien ubicado en la misma esquina de la Avinguda Gaudí y al lado mismo de la Sagrada Familia.
notes: Adecuado para familias, grupos de amigos o parejas.  El barrio del Eixample es tranquilo y perfecto para moverse por la ciudad. El apartamento está cerca de los puntos más interesantes y la estación de metro puede llevarte a cualquier punto de interés en 5 minutos. Aquí puedes encontrar bares, restaurantes, tiendas y todo lo necesario.
transit: A 50 metros dispones de estación de metro y parada de autobuses. muy bien conectado con el centro de la ciudad (L2 y L5). puedes acercarte al centro en un paseo de 15 minutos, o ir en metro en 5 minutos.
access: Salon-comedor exteriores equipados con sofá, tv y vistas al mar.  Cocina equipada con horno microondas, cafetera, nevera, tostadora, exprimidor, batidora, .... Baño completo con ducha. El apartamento dispone de calefacción.
house_rules: No hay normas especiales mas la de ser responsable, no molestar a los vecinos con música alta, ruidos, etc.

host.host_about: Madre de familia, licenciada en pedagogia terapeutica, trabajo en el mundo de la educación

reviews.comments: We stayed in Nuria & Elio's apartment in April 2014 and we were delighted. Elio was waiting for us when we arrived, he showed us everything and he even helped us with our holiday plans in Barcelona. The apartment was lovely, modern, comfortable, scrupulously clean, spacious and had everything we could possibly need. It is located in a very nice residential neighborhood which is a very short walk to the Sagrada Familia (one block across and two/three blocks down, 5mins walking). This also meant that the hop-on hop-off tour bus was conveniently located nearby and also there was a metro stop only one block away. We would highly recommend it to anyone staying in Barcelona.
Els nostres amics d'Alemanya han estat molt a gust al pis. És un pis silenciós, que està molt ben situat i es troba en molt bon estat. Gràcies per tot.

We really liked this apartment. Everything was perfect! 
Very good stylish apartment in quite peaceful place near with the Sagrada Familia (approximately 3-5 minutes on foot).
The furniture and the styling were very nice. All new furniture is from IKEA.
The apartment has all the facilities for a good staying. Excellent equipped kitchen.
Just across the road you can buy fresh food and everything you need for your cooking. 
Very close to the apartment there are supermarket, restaurants and cafes. Just around the corner there is Metro station, connecting you with the most popular places. 
We found this ideal: quiet and not too crowded by tourists.
We really recommend this apartment! If you like to stay in a calm place but close to all the popular sightseeing, this apartment is the perfect stay.
Nuria & Elio are very nice and attentive people, they tried to make our staying more comfortable, helped us with advice. 
We will recommend their apartment, and hope to return again!

I'd like to first thanks Nuria for the thoughtfulness in making sure that our stay (between 8-12 May) was comfortable and welcomed. There were maps and tourist spots leaflets in the apartment, and Nuria also provided us with the neighbourhood introduction.

The apartment is located behind the metro station 'Sant Pau/Dos de Maig' on L5 (red line - towards Vall d'Hebron). Also, the apartment is 5 mins' walk away from La Sagrada Familia.

Between the the apartment to La Sagrda Familia there are many restaurants and bistros which are open throughout the day. On the same block to the apartment, there is a 'Pans and Company' sandwich/fast food shop.

There is a chain supermarket right outside the metro exit which is very convenient to get bottled water and groceries. If that's closed, there are several mini-market like shops that sells basic groceries, cigarettes and alchohol, opening until late at night.

The apartment was spotlessly clean and gives a homey atmosphere. We felt like home there.

The apartment (and the rooms) are spacious. Apart from clean towels were supplied, iron and ironing board was also available.

Although the apartment doesn't have a washing machine, there is a laundry shop right opposite the bus stop, behind the apartment building.

Anyways, I'll definitely recommend this apartment to other visitors to Barcelona, and will definitely stay with Nuria in the future.

: )

Nuria and her husband are just excellent hosts. Nuria's husband met us at our arrival and he was extremely patient in giving practical directions of places of interest to us. 
The apartment itself is just fantastic and in a great location. It is very near to the Sagrada Familia and connects with two metro lines.  
The apartment is newly renovated and is designed and decorated with great taste. It is a large and spacious place with bedrooms, a very nice living room. The bathroom and kitchen are fully furnished.  Generally, it can house 6 people. 
It was extremely clean and had everything one could possibly need or expect. I have recommended the apartment to my friends and, in fact, I will definitely use it next time I am in Barcelona.

The location of the apartment is really good, within walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. It is clean and quite well-equipped. Nuria's husband is very friendly and helpful to our problems. All in all a good place to stay in Barcelona :)

Excelente AAA+++. El depto es super completo, tiene todo lo que podes pedir,  es para  4 personas comodos. Es grande luminoso, todo nuevo. Ademas Nuria y Eloy su marido, son unos divinos. Nos prepararon una cuna, una sillita para bebe y lo mejor de todo juguetes para mi hijo de 
2 años. Nos recibio Eloy, es muy atento, nos dio todas las indicaciones del depto y de los lugares turisticos. No dejes de alquilarlo lo vas a disfrutar. Super recomendable !!!!

Excelente departamento! Muy cómodo, muy bien equipado, muy bien ubicado, entre la sagrada familia y el hospital sant Pau. 
Eloy nos explicó todo, fue muy amable. Le agradecemos mucho. 
El mejor lugar para estar en Barcelona, la independencia de un departamento y en excelentes condiciones!

L'accoglienza è stata molto puntuale e gentile. Abbiamo ricevuto tutte le informazioni necessarie per un buon soggiorno. Il posto è molto confortevole, appartamento nuovo e finemente curato, vicinissimo alla Sagrada Familia . Zona tranquilla e ben servita sia per i negozi, supermercati sia per la metro.

I felt comfortable at the apartment. It's a nice place near the subway. It was like been at my own home. 
Eloi showed us everything and helped us about the neighborhood. Eloi and Nuria think about the minimun details

bon accueil; beaucoup de documentation à disposition;
appartement propre; café, thé, eau à disposition
We had an amazing stay at Nuria's place! Everything, from beginning till end was wonderful! The apartment is very clean, large and well located! Thank you! We will definitely be back soon!

Hemos estado muy a gusto en el piso: los propietarios muy atentos, piso limpio y con todo lo que se necesita para estar cómodos. Ubicación estupenda en cuanto a transporte público y servicios. Definitivamente volveremos a contactarlos cuando volvamos a Barcelona.

We had a wonderfull stay at Nuria's place ! Incredibly clean and a lot of small details that make you feel like home !
Close to the Sagrada familia, it's just a perfect spot ! Also Nuria and her husband were extremely kind with us. Unfortunately we had to arrive realy late during the night and they were still here to great us ! Thank you again for everything ! It was such a wonderfull weekend !
Piso muy cómodo y bien ubicado, los anfitriones siempre disponibles para cualquier problema

My husband and I had a wonderful stay in Nuria and Eloi's apartment. It is well appointed, very clean and comfortable. Eloi was able to meet us late. The location is excellent. The neighborhood is close to the metro. Getting to all the sights is convenient. Coming home to a nice neighborhood at night was very relaxing. Having a full kitchen was a nice break from restaurants.  We would like to return and stay here again!

El barrio es espectacuar, con todo a la mano.
Nuria y Eloi son muy serviciales y colaboradores. El piso es muy agradable y amplio, sobretodo para dos personas. Se siente uno como en casa. ¡Que diferencia con un hotel!

El piso es muy bueno y en una zona genial, ni muy ruidosa ni muy alejada. Eloi nos recibió y estuvo disponible en todo momento por cualquier imprevisto. Lo único malo fue el internet, la seńal fue siempre demasiado baja y teníamos que estar pegados al router en el living. En el resto de la casa no hay internet. Pese al esfuerzo de Eloi en solucionarlo, la señal siguió siendo muy baja
Awsome place, big, clean and excellent location, would definitely stay there next time!
A very lovely apartment in a great part of the city, Nuria and her husband were very friendly and welcoming, would happily stay there again.

Nuria and his husband are really kind and professional, they wait for our late arrival for showing us the apartment.
The house was renewed and comfortable, very clean.
The position is really good, near Sagrada Familia and metro station.
We enjoined our staying!

Recomendamos el departamento para una buena estadía en Barcelona. Cuenta con todas las comodidades necesarias y su ubicación es ideal para trasladarse por la ciudad caminando o mediante el metro que está a una cuadra. Se encuentra cercano a La Sagrada Familia y varios lugares para salir a comer.
Nuria y Eloy fueron muy amables y atentos. Nos contactaron con anterioridad a nuestra llegada para coordinar el encuentro y una vez en el apartamento nos brindaron mucha información útil para movernos por la ciudad.
What a wonderful location. So close to major attractions yet so peaceful. The flat was clean and modern and well equipped. Couldn't recommend highly enough.

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, a 5 minutos caminando de la sagrada familia, barrio seguro, tranquila, cercano a dos metros. 

El departamento muy limpio, bien equipado, tal como se ve en las fotos. 

Nuria y Eloy fueron muy preocupados en todo momento. 

100% recomendable

Grand appartement très confortable à la propreté irréprochable , très calme et très bien chauffé avec un système qui permet de moduler au degré près . Situation à 5' à pied de la " Sagrada Familia " et 2' d'un métro pour rejoindre aisément le centre ville . Très bon accueil . Hôtes très arrangeants pour le jour du départ . A recommander chaleureusement

La estadía en el apartamento fue muy cómoda. Es amplio, camas cómodas, baño límpio y la cocina cuenta con todos los utensilios necesarios. Además de esto, está muy bien ubicado. Cuenta con 2 estaciones de metro cercanas, está a 5 minutos caminando de la Sagrada Familia y del Hospital Sant Pau. El barrio es tranquilo pero no le falta vida, ya que cuenta con bares, cafés, y restaurantes variados. Mercados y lavandarías tambien están en las cercanías. 

Muy recomendado.

100% recomendado. Los anfitriones son excelentes, te hacen sentir como en casa, son muy amables. Los servicios impecables, muy buena ubicación y bien rodeado de mercados o cualquier cosa que puedas necesitar. Volvería todas las veces. 

¡Muchas gracias de nuevo por todo!

Excelente lugar em Barcelona, muito bem situado e com excelente atendimento da Nuria e do seu marido. Ótimo apartamento e localização ideal para se deslocar por Barcelona. Lugar com bons restaurantes e bares próximos. Supermercados e padarias disponíveis nas quadras onde se situa o apartamento.

La casa di Nuria e Eloi è un gioiellino. Pulitissimo, situato a 5 minuti dalla Sagrada Familia, quartiere tranquillo è pieno di localini con buon cibo e supermercato di (Website hidden by Airbnb) comunicazione con gli host è stata impeccabile e precisa.appartamento molto grande e silenzioso. La cucina ben attrezzata e con una moka all’italiana! Bagno grande e una bellissima doccia. Sicuramente ci ritornerò.

생각했던 것보다 훨씬 더 완벽한 숙소였습니다.  4살 아이와 함께하는 가족여행이라서 숙소에서 음식을 자주 해먹었는데, 주방조리시설이나 식기류가 완벽했고 주변에 큰 슈퍼마켓이 있어서 요리가 너무 즐거웠습니다.  특히, Nuria가 아들을 위한 방을 꾸며주셔서 무척 감동 스러웠습니다. 또 장난감과 식기류까지 준비해주셔서 아이가 무척 좋아했고, 머무르는 동안 편안하게 잘 지낼 수 있었습니다.  
숙소는 깨끗하고, 넓고, 지하철과 5분 정도 거리여서 교통이 좋았습니다. 특히, 사그라다 파사밀라와  아주 가까워서 산책겸해서 자주 구경하고 숙소로 돌아오곤 했습니다.  아쉬운 점은 오래전에 지은 건물이라(내부는 완벽하게 개조되었지만) 엘레베이터가 좁고 세탁기가 없는 점이 아쉬웠지만, 가까운 곳에 빨래방이 있어서 이용하시면 크게 문제되지 않을 거예요.    훌륭한 숙소와 시설 그리고 Nuria의 세심한 배려가 있어서 특히 가족 여행을 떠나신다면 강력 추천합니다.
Wonderful apartment near La Segrada Familia with everything you need. I would recommend

We really enjoyed this apartment. Nuria and Eloy made everything easy. The flat was well-located, very well kept, and perfect for us as a family. The bedrooms were quiet at night. They even had a crib, a booster seat, and toys for our 1-year-old! The one thing guests should keep in mind about this apartment is that it does not have air conditioning. That can be hard in July and August, though they did provide several fans. But if we come back to Barcelona between September and May, we will definitely try to stay here again.

Sehr sehr gute Unterkunft, perfekt ausgestattet und gepflegt, Top-Lage, für den nächsten Barcelona-Aufenthalt können wir uns die Suche nach Alternativen sparen. Nuria und ihr Ehemann haben höchstflexibel auf unseren genauen Anreisezeitpunkt reagiert und waren zudem immer umgehend erreichbar. So wünscht man sich Airbnb.
Highly recommended space. Very spacious, nice views, very clean. The host also provides many small items that make the stay extra special. I would definitely come back
We have a great time inBarcelona at your Airbnb. Your place is very clean. Great location, close to the sagrada
깔끔하고 세심한 배려가 보이는 숙소였습니다. 만족합니다.

We absolutely loved our stay at Nuria's. The apartment is huge, really clean, and well located in the beautiful area near Sagrada Familia. Additionally it had all the amenities you would want, from a fully equipped kitchen, to a bathroom with all the toiletries. We'd definitely come back!
Very well-located and clean flat. Close to a metro station and Sagrada familia.

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.
space: Here are a few of the highlights of The BEACHFRONT Apartment: THE APARTMENT The building only has 7 apartments in total. Your new neighbours are lovely. They all enjoy spending time at the beach and they are mature enough to avoid late nights and loud parties so you won't be disturbed. THE BALCONY It wraps around the front of the building and gives you a huge entertaining space. From the balcony you stare straight at the water and out to the horizon. It's stunning! INTERNALLY We have furnished the apartment using light and bright colours to capture all of the sun that pours into the rooms throughout the day. There are three different eating areas - the dining table, the breakfast bar with views out to the beach and an outdoor table and chairs (where you'll probably spend most of your time) ENTERTAINMENT If you want to, you can sit inside and watch the huge 54" TV and use the DVD player or you can walk to Bondi and watch some real life entertainment at any one of the bars, clubs or live
description: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach.
