It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony. Here are a few of the highlights of The BEACHFRONT Apartment: THE APARTMENT The building only has 7 apartments in total. Your new neighbours are lovely. They all enjoy spending time at the beach and they are mature enough to avoid late nights and loud parties so you won't be disturbed. THE BALCONY It wraps around the front of the building and gives you a huge entertaining space. From the balcony you stare straight at the water and out to the horizon. It's stunning! INTERNALLY We have furnished the apartment using light and bright colours to capture all of the sun that pours into the rooms throughout the day. There are three different eating areas - the dining table, the breakfast bar with views out to the beach and an outdoor table and cha
neighborhood_overview: Tamarama is the younger, arguably prettier, sister to Bondi Beach. It's a relatively quiet beach where locals spend hours bathing in the sun. There is a park here with BBQs, toilets, changing rooms and a large grassy area to make a picnic. GREAT OCEAN WALK While you're in the area, you must take the Great Ocean Walk. It's a pathway that hugs the coast line all the way from Bondi to Coogee beach. Thankfully, it crosses your doorstep. Just join the throngs of people making the pilgrimage every day. SCULPTURES BY THE SEA Every year artists erect a series of sculptures along the Great Ocean Walk. It's a magical display set against the ocean views along the walk and it attracts thousands of local people and others from around the world. This year it is happening from 24 October - 10 November.
notes: FREE BOTTLE OF CHAMPAGNE We want you to have a great time when you stay at our place. We like the idea of you sitting out on the balcony celebrating something and admiring the view. So, anyone that books for 3 nights or more will find a bottle of Veuve Cliquot in the fridge upon arrival. SAVING LIVES We are really thankful to live by the beach and it's a stunning beach. One of the things that makes this beach a great place to swim and have fun in summer are the lifesavers who volunteer their time to look after the people who use the beach. Chances are that you've chosen our place partly because of the beach out the front. So to thank the guys that look after the beach for us, 10% of everything that you pay to us will be given to them as a donation. It's the least we can do for the guys that keep the beach safe. We'll send you a copy of the receipt and any comments that we get from them in thanks.
transit: BUSES The local area is serviced by buses that will take you to other transport hubs that will take you anywhere you need to go or you can catch a local bus directly to the CBD and be there in about 15 minutes. You'll have access to the internet from the computer set up for you in the apartment. Just either call 131500 and ask them for help or search 131500 on a search engine and you'll find a website showing all the timetables. You're not too far from anywhere!
access: All guests will have free access to all the amenities and facilities in the Apartment. This includes a coffee machine, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, 434 litre fridge, a complete library of books, 54" TV & DVD Player, wireless broadband internet, sound system and an intercom / security system. TRANSPORT Once you arrive at The BEACHFRONT Apartment you probably won't want to leave. But should the need arise, there is transport immediately out the front. The #361 bus stop is across the ride and it will take you to Bondi Junction or Bondi Beach. From the Junction you can catch buses and trains to the city. The bus is handy, however, most things are within walking distance anyway.
interaction: Unfortunately, we don't get to meet the guests. We leave keys outside in a 'lockbox' which allows you to collect them whenever you arrive. We usually stay nearby and are available in the event that you need help with anything.
house_rules: Please be mindful of our neighbours and leave our home as you found it :)

host.host_about:
Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

We've done quite a lot of share living both at home and abroad so we'd like to think we know what makes a good environment in a home.

Hope to meet you soon!

Wayne and Kate

reviews.comments:
The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's place. We travelled to Sydney for a family long weekend and from the moment we opened the door we felt at home. Their home is open and airy with a fantastic view of the beach. The location is perfect, we went on walks along the "ocean walk" to Bondi and the opposite direction to Coogee and Bronte. It was great sitting on the balcony looking out at the beach and the many energetic people pounding the pavements and in the water enjoying the waves. Wayne and Kate were great hosts emailing and messaging us with directions to their home and suggestions of places to visit. Nothing was too much trouble. The champagne and chocolate they left for us was also well received . We can not wait to return. Thankyou Wayne and Kate for sharing your beautiful home with us.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!

We had a great time staying at Wayne and Kate's place. It is an absolutely beautiful apartment in an amazing spot. It was great to fall asleep listening to the sea.
Me and 5 girlfriends stayed for a weekend and we were all blown away. The apartment had everything we needed, we just added a few bottles of champers to sip on the balcony and soak up the Tamarama atmosphere. 
Thanks Wayne and Kate :)

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!

We had a wonderful stay at Wayne and Kate's Tamarama apartment. Excellent communication and experience from the very start. Checking in was simple and we arrived to a lovely bottle of bubbles! The view and location are absolutely unbeatable, and the apartment is terrific. The photos do not do justice - it's an amazing apartment! Great lighting, very comfortable, and well furnished. The flat has all the amenities you need and truly makes you feel at home.  

We had a very small issue with the internet dropping out periodically but Kate went above and beyond to ensure things were fixed.  And… left us another bottle of bubbles for our troubles, which was so incredibly nice!

The apartment was a short walk to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  The walk from Tamarama to Bondi is breathtaking.  We were lucky enough to catch the Sculptures by the Sea the week of our stay.

Our experience was outstanding and highly recommend Wayne and Kate’s place. We did not want to leave! We look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate’s in the future. Thanks again for everything, Wayne and Kate!  :)

Fantastic spot although the weather was not on our side!

I arrived late on the weekend, so Wayne and Kate were super accommodating with my friend John. Place is very secure, has an amazing outlook over the beach. Café’s and restaurants are a short walk away, and transport easily accessible. 

Great experience and would love to stay there again!
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
Wayne and Kate's apartment is in a fabulous location right on the beach of Tamarama. It is clean, well maintained and suited our needs with 2 teenage boys. Thumbs up!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana

Absolutely perfect place to stay in Sydney! The beach is quite literally, across the road! The views are to die for day and night. Short and beautiful walk to Bondi or Bronte for restaurants, bars and bigger beaches if you want them. The apartment is clean and very comfortable,  it has everything and more you could want. And the hosts are extremely kind and accommodating. We had a ball staying here!

Wayne and Kate’s beachfront apartment is simply amazing. From the moment we made an inquiry about the place, Wayne and Kate went above and beyond when responding to our questions and requests regarding the place – even replying within minutes when we sent a message at midnight!

Stepping foot into the place, you might have to take a second to realise that you’re not actually in a designer home magazine. All of the amenities are in great condition and all three of the bedrooms were large with the beds comfortable and extremely clean.

After settling in and making a cup of tea and coffee with the stocked kitchen, we decided to take a look at the lengthy list of activities that Wayne and Kate had compiled just for us. You can never undervalue local knowledge!

While Wayne and Kate’s place is extremely fun, it’s also the perfect place to get some work done. We popped down to Tamarama Beach Café (across the road!) and bought back some coffee and sat and worked at the breakfast bar overlooking Tamarama Beach with our laptops – using the speedy wifi that was provided, of course.

Simply, Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts and their stunning apartment is perfect for work, play and everything in between!

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!
Beautiful location, nice hosts, close to Bondi and Bronte for cafés and restaurants. We had a great time! Thanks Kate and Wayne.
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

Hi Wayne & Kate. We had three couples staying at the apartment for the weekend attending a wedding nearby.  We had a great time in the apartment and enjoyed the generous living space that you don't get in a hotel room. The view of the beach was awesome. Thanks for leaving everything so clean and tidy.
I'll definitely be back
cheers
Tony & Stef James

Had a fantastic weekend in this beautiful beach front apartment, hosts were great and helpful and the apartment was just as pictured if not better.
I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone who loves the beach and an apartment that has everything you would need.

We stayed here with my parents and our family for our holiday in Australia.  Location was absolutely fabulous - so close to the beach and in the middle of the beach walk so we could do our morning walks either south to Bronte/Clovelley or north to Bondi.  Once we figured out the bus system, it was easy to get back and forth to downtown Sydney from here.  The apartment was spacious, comfortable and we enjoyed our meals on the large balcony looking at the beautiful ocean and coastline.  Had a great time in Sydney - our visit coincided with Vivid Live which was amazing.  Wayne and Kate are awesome hosts - loved the champagne and would highly recommend this place for a family holiday.  House has everything you need.

I did not meet Kate and Wayne but all the arrangements to access their apartment and when leaving worked smoothly.  They responded to all notes and met all requests. The apartment is in a beautiful spot with direct access to the beach and a view from the balcony to die for.  All round a very enjoyable experience.  Thanks.

Absolutely fantastic place. Location is breath taking& the view is mind blowing.
Would highly recommend this place and many thanks to the hosts for their quick, kind response..
We had a gr8 time & look fwd to returning some time soon.
Thanx again

Apartment is in a fantastic location with beautiful views. We loved the coastal walk and were lucky enough to see whales. The kitchen is very well equipped. The apartment worked well for an adult group but would also suit a young family. Parking was not a problem in winter. Public transport to city is very easy. Wayne and Kate were very welcoming hosts.

Kate and Waybe were extremely accommodating and very responsive to my emails. The location is excellent literally the road between you and the beach. A lovely beach stay that I would highly recommend to others.
L'appartment est tres bien situe a Tamarama. La chambre principale est spacieuse avec baie vitree. L'interieur de l'appartement est spacieux et clair.
Wayne and Kate were very welcoming.  We didn't select the best day as it was very rainy but it was nice to get away.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's beachfront apartment. The location is incredible. You just have to step outside the front door, cross the road and you are at a beautiful beach. A short walk along the beautiful Australian coast brings you to Bondi where there are lots of cafes, restaurants and shops. 

The apartment is warm and welcoming with modern and bright decorations. It was also clean and had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable. It was lovely going to sleep with the sounds of the waves crashing. Plus, Wayne and Kate donate money to the Tamarama SLSC on behalf of the guests which is a really nice and important gesture. As an added bonus, Wayne and Kate gave us a surprise late check out so we could enjoy the area a little bit longer. 

I would definitely stay again.

Out-of-towners and Sydney residents alike loved this apartment and its location. I don't think anyone took their eyes off the ocean. We even had a whale watching session one afternoon, counting about 4 or 5 humpbacks making their way back down the coast for summer.

It's an easy walk to Bronte and Bondi, but with Tamarama beach right out front you don't feel like you're missing out on anything. I was coping with some jetlag, but the others were keen to explore. The apartment proved to be a valuable centre point as people did what they wished and then met up again.

The apartment itself is clean and well appointed. Definitely somewhere I'd like to spend a lot more time. We had a family gathering for my 30th birthday one night and hired a chef. He was able to deliver a number of courses from the kitchen without any worry.

We were a little worried about finding parking, but I don't think we ever failed to find a spot out front.
We had a lovely two days staying at Wayne and Kates' place. Wayne was both helpful and welcoming throughout the entire experience. A lovely apartment in a truly stunning location!

Wayne and Kate's apartment is in an amazing position across from Tamarama Beach. It's spacious, clean, airy and peaceful, it was the perfect getaway for my dads 70th. Their instructions were clear and everything was perfect. Thanks so much for making our dad's bday a great one. He had a blast.

Wonderful location, it could not have been more perfect.  Great apartment, light, clean, well appointed, homely.  It was a group of adult friends that stayed and we were very comfortable.  Hosts were very responsive  and friendly.   Great experience.

We had a fantastic time! The house is ideally located and very spacious to accomodate the group.
Thanks so much :)

Accurate description of property and located in a wonderful area - directly opposite an iconic beach! Great welcome pack with clear instructions on utilities. No problems with local parking. Easy access to beach and local shops. Great location for runners, surfers and sun bathers alike! Our boys wanted to move in!!

Highly recommended and may consider a return in the near future!! Loved it!

What a lovely welcoming apartment 
Great location overlooking the beach
Champagne on arrival and lovely touches like coffee machine were an added bonus
Loved going to sleep hearing the roar of the ocean and enjoying the sea breeze
Would definately stay again

Beautiful view. The apartment is spacious and right next to the beach.  But I'm confused why we received the keys in a coded box when it seems the hosts were staying close enough to the apartment to watch us and count how many people we had entering the apartment. We had a lunchtime BBQ with family from the city and were trying to take advantage of a beautiful spot but were interrupted on two occasions by the hosts driving to the apartment to tell our friends and family to leave the premises. We had no intention of breaching the six sleeper agreement and can't understand why a group of up to 15 people having a BBQ in the middle of the day is inappropriate or warrants the hosts' interruptions . If the hosts intended on being so strict with the number of people visiting, it would have made more sense for them to have advised us of their concerns when handing over the keys.

We spent a week in Tamarama and it was wonderful ! The appartment is really nice and ideally located with a stunning view on the ocean. It was so good to wake up in the morning and to hear the swell ! On top of that,  Wayne's organization has been perfect and everything worked well.  If we return to Sydney one day, which I hope, we'll definitely come back to Wayne and Kate's place !

Thanks so much
Pierre

I went to Sydney on a business trip and decided I wanted to get a taste of the coast rather than city. Best decision I ever made. The property is right on Tamarama beach, walking distance from Bondi and Bronte and 20 mins from the city center. The property itself was immaculate and very tasteful. Highly recommend.

Wayne and Kate are the most amazing hosts - from the moment we booked with them until we left, our experience was outstanding.  The apartment is wonderfully spacious, clean and well equipped and has the most stunning views of Tamarama.  We found it very difficult to tear ourselves away from the balcony and the beach to explore other areas!  The local tips they gave us for food and coffee were spot on.  Highly recommended!
Awesome location, awesome host. Cannot fault this listing, simply a wonderful experience and a delight dealing with Wayne and Kate.

We found the hosts, Wayne & Kate very accommodating.  They were always very quick to respond to our queries and the unit was as described.  Very good position, spacious and comfortable.  The extra touch of a bottle of champagne was a very thoughtful gesture.  Street parking was not a problem.  There is a cafe directly opposite on Tamarama Beach or a short walk through the park to a strip of cafes at Bronte Beach.  Also a nice 15 min walk around the coast to Bondi.

Simply amazing hosts. Every question was attentive and every request was accommodated. Cannot speak more highly of Wayne and Kate. We would rent from Wayne and Kate again in a heartbeat and would host them anytime, simply a delight to deal with. High quality, top shelf people. Cheers Wayne and Kate!
Wonderful location right on the beach.  Spectacular views from front balcony and study.  Bottle of champagne on arrival a lovely touch from Wayne and Kate to make us feel welcome.
Appartement fonctionnel pour une famille ou entre amis, terrasse donnant directement sur la plage. Même s'il est loin, Wayne vous aide  si vous avez des questions ....

Wayne and Kate are wonderful hosts and extremely welcoming from the very beginning!  Place was immaculate and wine and chocolates were waiting on our arrival.  Our holiday started off perfectly!  

Then Mother Nature showed up.  Unfortunately, we happened to visit Sydney during "the wettest April in 26 years" according to news reports.  Winds were howling and there was even a hail storm.  Exciting, but not what anyone wants of plans for on vacation.  And nothing anyone could control.  

Wayne and Kate went out of their way to make sure we were safe and comfortable.  They checked in on us several times.  Made sure we had food (there were weather advisories, trees were down, Uber was overwhelmed, and we didn't have a car).  Loaned us their rain gear.  Even dropped off pastries.  No one could have predicted such wild weather conditions.  But we were determined to see Sydney and they were determined to make sure we were comfortable, dry, and safe.  Wayne and Kate went above and beyond to help make our holiday a resounding success even in the midst of a wild storm.  

Their spot in Tamarama is iddlic!  They have thought of everything.  Kitchen was well equipped and there was lots of reading available for those rainy days.  The views are more amazing in person.  The storm was fascinating to watch and the little beach cafe/park across the street is delightful.  Their apartment is on the coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee - loved this walk!  Fairly easy walk to Bondi (maybe not for a 3 year old or the elderly, but for most adults).  

As stated, weather can't be controlled of predicted.  But these two really went all out for us.  Their care and concern help make our trip so much more enjoyable.  I feel like we not only had a great vacation, but we made some friends.

I would definitely recommend this apartment and these hosts!

The location is absolutely perfect!

Other great things about this place:
> The shower had excellent water pressure
> The views were outstanding, we especially enjoyed watching the surfers and waves while eating breakfast in the study nook.
> The location was perfect for easy access to the beach and to coastal morning runs. 
> The kitchen was well stocked with all the equipment one needed.
> The bed was very comfortable, and we enjoyed waking up to the sound of waves.

After my original accommodation was cancelled 2 days prior to my wedding I urgently needed to find alternate accommodation for my bridal party.
Wayne and Kate made this possible.
Their apartment is clean, tidy and has all of those little bits and pieces that you need for a nice weekend away.
Thanks again guys!

Had a fantastiic stay at Wayne and Kate's place. 

We arrived on Friday night in windy and rainy conditions, but were soon cosy in the apartment with the girls snuggled in the provided blankets, and with the heaters on!

Everything that we needed was provided for and the hosts quickly answered a couple of texts I sent with questions about the apartment. 

Waking up to blue skies and the sight of the ocean on the Saturday morning was awesome. 

Would love to come back and experience the place is summer! 

Thanks to the hosts

We had a wonderful 'Girls' Weekend' at Tamarama. Our hosts were most helpful emailing us lots of local information and recommendations. The apartment is in a superb position overlooking the famous Tamarama beach. We were able to watch from the balcony as locals played beach volleyball or walk down to the beach kiosk for a coffee and watch the passing whales!  Just cross the road and you are on the Bondi to Coogee walking path - great walk to Coogee and back.  The apartment is cosy and accommodates six people easily. The sound of the surf will lull you to sleep.

Wayne and Kate's apartment is a wonderful getaway - the view is breathtaking, the area is peaceful, and the decor of the apartment is charming yet practical. We travelled as a group of 4 girls and found the space very sufficient. The layout of the home is also very convenient for travelling as a group of friends as we all had enough personal space! Wayne and Kate also provide a great set of speakers and very thoughtfully included an iphone4-to-iphone6 converter! Everything was clean and ready for us when we arrived, and all the amenities were great. 

On top of that, Wayne and Kate were very responsive whenever we needed help with preparing for our trip, checking in to the apartment, and figuring things out in the apartment. We were trying to figure out the dryer quite late one night, and got really stuck, but Wayne and Kate were able to reply to our message immediately - we really really appreciated how quick they were with messaging! 

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend the apartment for sure.

Very nice apartment, was right next to the beach just like the picture shows.  Bus stop nearby and the UBER service us widely used in Australia for private car service. We loved the apartment, traveled with 2 adults and 4 kids.  Wife wanted to take the bedding home because it was so comfortable! We just came off a 18 day cruise so we had a ton of laundry there was a dry cleaner that did it for $50 AUD nearby or you can do it in the apartment with the washer and dryer provided but we had too much.

The host was very involved prior and during our stay, they asked us what our interests were prior to coming and gave us some recommendations.  While there they checked on us several times to be sure things were working to our satisfaction and even offered to pickup our laundry and take them to the dry cleaners because we had too much for their unit to handle.  We also accidentally left a iPad there any they are being very helpful in getting it back to us, all we have to do is pay the cost of the until and they are packing it up and taking it to the local DHL office..

Very nice experience! Thanks!

All of our queries prior to arrival were happily replied to very promptly. Wayne and Kate emailed us a list of attractions / activities that may have interested us during our stay. On arrival we were presented with a nice bottle of champagne which we certainly appreciated.

Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts. Their enthusiasm, genuine care and willingness to go above and beyond was very much appreciated. If you are looking for an authentic Sydney experience, this is it! Would definitely recommend their beachfront home to anyone.

outside of building is rather old and worried bit but description is accurate and interior is beautifully done, location is great for relaxing weekend.

As I came back from overseas without sleep all night, we had
mixed up where key is.  Kate took taxi from her work to delivery the key and Wayne came to drop bottle but we got delicious croissant!
for their apology.  it is very relaxing cosy place

Wayne and Kate were friendly hosts who remained easy to contact throughout our stay. The location of the apartment was fantastic - just across the road from Tamarama beach. You can hear the waves crashing on the beach as you fall asleep. We had some noisy neighbours on the Saturday night (that was obviously no fault of the hosts) but otherwise it was a very enjoyable stay. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking, and the apartment was comfortable for the 6 of us. We were lucky to have warm winter weather when we visited and thoroughly enjoyed the beach track walks to Bondi and Coogee.

Wayne and Kate were great hosts from the very first inquiry. Their responses were very timely, in some cases instant, and extremely informative.

Their property is ideal for a relaxed getaway and the views across Tamarama beach from the balcony, study and the main bedroom are stunning... it was very hard to leave! 

Great cafes and parks are within walking distance either way - around to Bondi or Bronte. Bus stops are are five minute walk and in most cases, we could jump on a bus within a few minutes that took us straight to Sydney's CBD. 

Inside the unit Wayne and Kate have thought of everything! We wanted for nothing and could find everything easily. The unit is light and bright and well suited for a family or a group friends.

The champagne on arrival blew us away and the donation from our accommodation fee to the Tamarama Surfing Life Saving Club was so touching, that we all said we would definitely stay there again!

We went to Sydney to participate in the City to Surf fun run and ended up having one of the best long weekends ever!

Thanks Wayne and Kate!

Wayne and Kate made us feel incredibly welcome even before we arrived. They were very helpful giving us great advice on surfboard hire and local eateries which were easily accessible in this beautiful neighbourhood. The apartment itself lived up to all our expectations. It was light-filled, clean, warm and welcoming with stunning views and provided ample space for the 6 of us (two grandparents, us and our two kids) to relax. Going to sleep with the sound of the surf was so restful and the beds really comfy. And the chocolates and sparkling were a lovely touch! Thanks Wayne and Kate. We loved our stay and would definitely return.

Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts, and communicated to us on a regular basis both before and during stay. The apartment is modern, clean and has a great view as per the photos of the beach. Would definitely stay here again, and the best host experience we have had since joining airbnb!

We loved our weekend at Wayne and Kate's apartment. The view was amazing and the apartment was well presented and had everything we needed. The bottle of champagne left for us was a lovely surprise too. 
We would definitely stay here again.

We had a wonderful stay and the view was most definitely the highlight. What a spectacular aspect this apartment has. Great people watching! We were lucky enough to have wonderful weather for our stay and to sit out on the gorgeous balcony and people watch whilst drinking wine and eating seafood -- well you can't get much better than that! The apartment was very spacious and the kitchen was packed with great cooking materials/utensils etc. It was a comfortable stay and we thoroughly enjoyed it.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful hosts. The apartment was clean and as the pictures depict.  The location was phenomenal and the bottle of champagne a delightful bonus...The amount of thought that has gone into making guests welcome and having all things available was very much noted and appreciated.

We had a lovely stay at Kate and Wayne's place. The view couldn't be better!  The apartment is a lovely space to relax in and well equipped. Wayne and Kate were great at getting back to us really quickly. Would highly recommend.
Beautiful views and closed to bondi beach, very easy-going. Close to city too.
Wayne & Kate we had a wonderful stay in your apartment, the view was amazing, close to everything the unit had everything we needed, thank again we will be back Tony & Geraldine

Couldn't have been happier staying at Wayne & Kate's. It's in the perfect location - right across from a beautiful beach and a close walk to everything. We felt very welcomed and they were easily accessible to answer any questions. The walk along the beach sidewalk is worth the visit alone. Wasn't sure I'd be interested in returning to Australia again until this visit - now I'd definitely like to make it back and would be happy to stay at their place in Tamarama again. It's a beach house - not 5 star pristine hotel conditions - and we totally enjoyed it!
Great place to stay with fabulous views and great beaches at your doorstep

Wayne and Kate were so helpful,efficient and responsive from my first request. The apartment was great and in a fantastic position. Everything we needed was supplied including a bottle of champagne to welcome us - we are here for a family wedding so the best way to start. The balcony is a joy and such a social area.   If we ever have the chance would certainly book again.

We stayed here with our kids and my mum and everyone had a great time.  

Literally across the street from an amazing beach and park - which contained a very nice coffee shop.  

Wayne & Kate were great.  

Super helpful, very responsive and really great positive Aussie attitude.  

I'd highly recommend this place.

Hosts could not have been more welcoming from the goodies to the lovely bottle of champagne which was a lovely surprise after such a long journey they were also most accommodating with the key pick up location could not have been more perfect we all loved it the perfect hosts and perfect location hopefully we will make it back sometime

Couldn't recommend this property more highly. Hosts were attentive, lovely and on the ball. Apartment was light, spacious even for two adults and three big boys! The absolute highlight though was the view of breathtaking Tamarama and being able to step across the road and into Sydneys' incredible beach culture. We felt like locals and will be back for sure.
Wayne and Kate were very helpful hosts, and their apartment is in the best spot! Great holiday location, highly recommended.
Wayne&Kate's house is amazing! Everything are same as photo on the web,location is excellent.and hosts are very welcome!

The location of Wayne & Kate's place seriously couldn't be more perfect!  You overlook beautiful Tamarama beach, which is right between Bondi and Bronte (both within walking distance).  The decor is simple and clean and the apartment was outfitted with just the right stuff (champagne and a nespresso machine :). The hosts were very accommodating and available to help with anything you need. Highly recommend this location for a base in Sydney.

Wayne and Kate are super hosts who were really easy to communicate with and very accommodating. We loved the apartment, its beautiful and in the most wonderful location. We would recommend staying here to all our friends and family and hope to return one day. Thank you Wayne and Kate for making this a truly special stay for us all :)

Der Kontakt zu den Gastgebern hat  sehr gut funktioniert. Wir hatten das Gefühl, dass unsere Gastgeber wirklich daran interessiert sind, dass wir einen schönen Urlaub haben und uns in der Wohnung wohlfühlen. Unsere Fragen wurden immer sofort und ausführlich beantwortet. Die Wohnung entspricht den Beschreibungen und Bildern.  Sie ist sehr komfortabel und geschmackvoll ausgestattet, so dass wir uns gleich wie zuhause gefühlt haben.   Der Balkon hat einen  tollem Blick auf den Strand, den wir gern und oft genutzt haben, da er schattig war und immer ein kleiner Wind für Erfrischung gesorgt hat.

Wayne and Kate are actually the ultimate, best hosts we've ever ever had - and their place in Tama is absolutely amazing. Clean, modern, so super comfortable - and the views! We were made to feel so super welcome. 

We loved the fact that Wayne and Kate donate some of their proceeds to the Tama SLSC - so very important to us. Wayne and Kate respected our privacy but were also extremely hospitable if we ever needed anything - and are also really warm people. Nothing was too much of an ask, and we had such a relaxing getaway because of it. 

Their home was so easy to relax in, and that balcony served as our main living space for our entire stay - it was hard to resist.

Wayne & Kate are such wonderful hosts, we'd jump at the chance of staying there again on our next stay, if they would have us.

Thanks Wayne & Kate - you're absolute legends!

Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and provided great communication about their apartment and the local area.  Their apartment is in a sensational location, impeccably presented and had everything we needed. We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend. Thanks again.

Wayne felt us very welcome and was great at communication and giving advice.  The apartment was clean and tidy and perfect for our stay.  The view was outstanding and we loved sitting on the balcony enjoying the sound of the sea.
Amazing place, great location, perfect weekend getaway spot. Great hosts!

This place was charming, well kept and spacious with the most scenic views. Wayne and Kate were very accommodating and had thought about all the finer details to ensure we had a lovely visit. 
Would definitely recommend to others.

We had a great time at Wayne & Kate's apartment. The communication prior to and during our stay was fantastic, with everything we needed provided and clearly explained  The view over Tamarama beach is stunning, and we loved listening to the ocean at night.

The location is amazing, with many beautiful beaches within walking distance (we'd highly recommend the walk to Coogee). Thanks again for a wonderful stay.
The apartment is every bit as good as it looks. The location is amazing. The place is so homely. We had the most fabulous time and would definitely stay here again.

Such a beautiful house with a gorgeous view right on the beachfront!! House had everything we needed,beds were comfy, huge TV, nice living area for us all to relax in! Walking distance to Bondi, free parking, perfect location! Wayne and Kate were so welcoming and provided clear information regarding keys and use of facilities and lots of info about the area. They checked in mid stay to see if anything was needed and always responded promptly! 
Thankyou for sharing your beautiful home with us!!

We stayed at Wayne & Kate's for a long weekend and it was amazing !!!
The location was perfect right across the road from the beach easy walk to Bondi or bronte,the apartment was beautifully decorated ,beds were super comfy ,great kitchen.
wayne was a pleasure to communicate with providing easy direction & key info & touched base a day into our trip making sure all was well .
I can't imagine a better place to stay if a beach holiday in the heart of Sydney is what your after
Thanks Wayne & Kate we really appreciated all your efforts
Julie
Wonderful spot. Great hosting.

Wayne and Kate's place is why I love Airbnb. Coordinating our arrival and check out was a breeze - and the apartment was everything it promised - big, sunny and right on the beach. I hope we get to return soon.

Wayne and Kate were really nice and available to answer all our questions within minutes of asking them. The apartment is basic, but it had everything we needed, was clean and the location and views were amazing!

An amazing experience 
Place looks even better in real life
Best Airbnb hosts I've ever had 
view is magical and house is perfectly equipped

We had an amazing time staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful home. The location could not have been better, if what you're wanting is Sydney beach living. While our first choice was to stay directly on Bondi, much to our surprise this Tamarama location was so much better and away from the chaos on Bondi. 

This three bedroom home was clean and looked exactly like the pictures. Will definitely book this place again if I ever find myself in Sydney.
Best Host ever... left my electric toothbrush and they delivered it to where I was staying next in another area.. nothing but Love.

Wayne was in constant communication to make sure our arrival was seamless his service was excellent, also the listing description was spot on and the area is  pure gold one of the nicest places you will ever visit.
Great communication again

Wayne & Kate stayed in contact and made sure we had all the details for arrival and a lovely welcome package at the apartment. The apartment is bright, comfortable and has sweeping views of the ocean which is right outside your window. We were also really surprised at how quiet the building was at night. The apartment is in a great location close to transport, beaches and shops. Thanks Wayne and Kate we would certainly choose to stay at your Tama pad again.

Great location right on the beach. Champagne and chocolates on arrival a surprising touch. Fantastic sharp knives in the well equiped kitchen with a Nespresso and a good supply of pods to keep us caffeinated!
Parking on the street only an issue during the day in the busy summer holiday period but ample spots after hours.

Wayne and Kate's place is amazing, bright and spacious and right beside the beautiful Tamarama beach. It is just a short walk into Bondi along the coast and going in the other direction to Coogee passing some other fabulous beaches. The house has absolutely everything you need and beds are really comfy. Check in and check out were easy. Would certainly recommend staying here and would love to return ourselves one day.

Wayne and Kate's place is everything that we imagined. We stayed there for 5 nights and wished we could have extended our trip! 

First of all, Wayne and Kate are wonderful hosts. They were very responsive and was happy to answer all of our questions. They were also very accommodating and allowed us to check-in earlier and check-out later to match our flight schedules. Checking in and out was super convenient as they left us with very clear instructions. A manual regarding the apartment was also given to make navigating around the place easier. They even left us coffee and a bottle of bubbles to welcome us! 

Their apartment is right on Tamarama Beach (2 mins walking), and about 15-20 mins walk from Bondi Beach making it very convenient to go shopping, have a coffee or breakfast! 

The apartment itself was very clean, and all toilet amenities (including shampoo, conditioner, hairdryer, clean towels etc) were provided. 

Even though they didn't have air conditioners, they provided us with huge fans that kept us cool throughout our stay. 

I highly recommend their place, can't wait to visit again!
We absolutely loved our stay - it was everything we hoped for and more! And to be just across from the beach was incredible. Thanks Wayne and Kate

Wayne and Kate's property in Tamarama far exceeded any expectations we had.  This was our first airbnb stay, but from just a few minutes after we made the booking, Wayne and Kate ensured this experience would be fantastic for us.

The apartment is in an amazing location - literally 50m from the beach and 100m to a beautiful cafe where we enjoyed breakfast each morning.  It's just a short and picturesque walk to Bondi beach, and close to lots of great shops and restaurants.

The apartment is very clean and homely.  It has three bedrooms - one with an ensuite - a nice lounge, a fully equipment kitchen, a laundary and a large balcony overlooking Tamarama Beach.

The apartment had everything we needed including linen and wifi.

We had six adults staying and there was more than enough room for us all, but this location would also be perfect for families of all ages.  We will be bringing our two young children back soon!!

We caught a cab to from Sydney airport to Tamarama which cost about $80 each way in a Maxi Taxi.

I can't recommend Wayne and Kate's apartment enough.  It's perfect for individuals, couples, families and everyone else.  I'm looking forward to coming back!!

Wayne and Kates place was great!!! The location was awesome and within walking distance to all the main beaches. They were extremely accommodating with all of our request and even suggested things for us to do when the weather wasn't great. We had a great time and would totally recommend them!! Thanks Wayne and Kate!

Kate and Wayne are the absolute best hosts! Accommodating, warm, friendly and always on hand to help whenever we needed. 

We've stayed at their beachfront place in Tamarama before, and didn't hesitate to stay there again. 

A++ Would stay again, in a heartbeat.

Thanks guys!

Wayne and Kate's house was everything we'd hoped for, and a lot more. The view is simply spectacular, the house itself tastefully decorated comfortable, and the little touches that make all the difference put the icing on the cake. You must stay here if you're looking for a little hidden beach oasis in Sydney's eastern suburbs.
Amazing views of the beach and really easy to get to other local beaches. Would definitely stay again!
Wayne and Kates place is in a great location looking straight out onto Tamarama beach. Accomodation is good - beds comfy, good kitchen and bathroom. Would stay there again. Jeff and Fran.
This place is in an amazing location. The beaches are at your doorstep. The hosts were very helpful and thoughtful. Definitely worth a visit!

Great view, its all about the view. Over looking Sydney's best beach. Perfect. Transport is a little hit and miss, it always is for the bus but an Uber is only $30 each way from the apartment to the city. Easy stroll along the cliff top to Bondi and all the eating and drinking it offers. Great location for a short break in beautiful Sydney
Amazing space, lots of light and the best views of the beach. Wayne is a great host and we would definitely stay again.

Hi, 

We really enjoy the beach view in front of the building.  I think the next tentant will definitely love the Nice home and the local life.

Cheers,

A very lovely, tastefully and comfortably appointed apartment in a beautiful location. The view is amazing and you can hear the ocean :). It's a moderate walk to food/shops, but through a very nice area. Would happily stay again.

Wayne and Kate's apartment is a fantastic place to stay, in so many ways. 
The location is second to none...right across from the beach, good coffee nearby and bondi beach is a short stroll away. Parking looks like it might be tricky, but we never had a problem. There is one flight of stairs to walk up, but even my bad knees coped and it's worth it for the view anyway!
The apartment itself is gorgeous. Beautiful views, comfy beds, a well appointed 'library',  a selection of toiletries, lovely lamps, vibrant art and everything easy to find and operate thanks to a small information leaflet, or even a quick phone call...Wayne and Kate were both readily contactable and quick to help when we got a bit stuck at check-in!
The apartment is very clean...and I'm pretty fussy when it comes to accommodation cleanliness. The linen is fresh, there are towels aplenty, blankets, pillows, complete kitchen...everything you need to be comfortable. 
I would highly recommend this apartment for up to 6 (Website hidden by Airbnb) a gem.

Wayne & Kate's place was a great experience. The location is great and the view from the balcony was sensational. They made it a really easy with everything set out and done for us with a whole list of things to do in the area. I highly recommend this place as I hope to be returning whenever I'm in Sydney. Very fun weekend over all. Thanks guys !
The place is as advertised. Clean and with an absolutely beautiful view. Perfect access to our favorite beach in the area with an amazing walk/run/activity trail. Would go back in a heartbeat!!

Wayne and Kate's place was exactly as expected. Bright and airy and with views to die for. It has everything you need for a short stay and in a great location. Only a short walk away to Bondi but if you don't fancy venturing out there's no need to. 
Wayne was always quick to respond to questions prior to our stay and left a very handy manual with everything you could need to know about the apartment. The Street parking can be tricky at peak times but is untimed all day which is rare so close to Bondi. A great stay!

We booked Wayne and Kate's place in order to be close (but not too close) to our daughter's wedding venue in Bondi!  It was perfect!!! The sunroom with its amazing view was the perfect place for hair and makeup to be done.  The apartment was spacious enough to give us all plenty of room and the relaxing vibe was just what we needed to keep us calm! The sound of the ocean and comfy beds ensured a great night's sleep.  Wayne and Kate are so thoughtful and accomodating, and their communication is brilliant. We would love to return for a longer and more relaxing stay next time! Highly recommended!!

The photography is misleading on two areas, they show a nice ambience inside but there are no photos of the exterior and of a building which is outdated and in need of significant repair.  The building is a serious disappointment.  Secondly the interior photography is selective in as much as it doesn't show details including aspects of disrepair.  The paint on the front door chipped and damaged, carpets are grubby and stained, the window coverings are damaged, their is rust on the internal hinges, windows fittings are corroded; laundry bench cracked,  all matters that can easily be addressed.  A major disappointment other then location.  A very positive aspect was the owners commitment to sharing the daily tariff with the local surf life saving club.

This is the second time my family and I have stayed at Wayne and Kate's apartment in Tamarama. It really is that fabulous. A beautiful apartment to stay in, in the most fabulous location, and the most wonderful hosts you could imagine.
Wayne and Kate's Tamarama beach apartment is a treat to stay. Excellent location and fantastic property. We loved every minute of staying here.
Great location, clean and comfortable home, accurate listing, accommodating hosts.  You can't go wrong staying at Wayne and Kate's place.

Wayne and Kate's place was amazing.  It's the perfect location on Tamarama beach (beautiful beach between and a short walk to Bondi and Bronte).  The house is fully stocked with amenities, beds were very comfortable, and spaces bright and cozy.  Highly recommended.

Wayne and Katie's place is amazing, perfect location on Tamarama beach with the Bonding to Coogee clifftop walk right on your doorstep. Wayne and Kate were perfect hosts, very easy to deal with and clearly are thoughtful and generous people. If we come back to Sydney we will have no hesitation in staying there again.
Wayne and Kate are truly super hosts and the view from the apartment speaks for itself.

We had a great time at Wayne & Kate's apartment. The location was amazing - we could get to three different beaches, all within walking distance, and the views from the apartment itself were unparalleled. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Amazing location right next to the Tamarama beach. The view is fantastic and the hosts have been great with all our questions! Really enjoyed our stay and can’t recommend it more :)

Location Location Location! Absolutely loved this apartment. Balcony with amazing view over the beach. A short walk to Bondi or Bronte with amazing cafes, restaurants etc. The host was really flexible and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone!

Wayne&kate's place was great, we really enjoyed our stay. 
great space, very clean and tidy.
Special note on communication, they were a great host, very quick responses. They provide complete information about our stay, pretty much everything we need to know about the place.
Very recommended!

We had a lovely stay at Wayne and Kate’s apartment. The apartment is very comfortable, Wayne and Kate take a lot of care to make their guests feel welcome. The beds are incredibly comfortable, we hade everything we needed and the view is to die for. Watching the ocean from the balcony was both calming and rejuvenating. The cafe on the beach opposite serves great food and coffee and our kids loved the beach and the playground. Thank you Wayne and Kate for being so attentive and thoughtful, we had a wonderful time.

Couldn’t rate it highly enough. Great place, great location, great hosts. 
It’s a ripper.

Wayne and Kate's place is ideally located with views over Tamarama beach. Very comfortable space and beds.  Quiet despite so close to everything.  Bus is 150m down the street. Very enjoyable long weekend stay. Excellent hosts with great and prompt communication

This is our second time staying at Wayne and Kate’s place and once again it was a wonderful stay. The house is in a great location and wonderfully equipped. You can’t complain waking up to views of Tamarama beach! Beautiful! 
Their communication is second to none. They provide full information on check in /the house, how to use everything and are quick to respond to any questions! 5 stars!!
Perfect spot above the beach with fantastic views.
Wayne and Kate, what a knockout location! Your apartment was lovely and all that we hoped for. A pleasure to deal with you and a terrific place to stay. Kate and Richard & Co.
Fantastic spot and views. Perfect for a Sydney coastal getaway.
This was a great place to stay! Amazing views and very comfortable.
Absolutely stunning location!
Beautiful apartment great location, spacious with all amenities we needed. Beach is lovely. Wayne and Kate communicated wonderfully. We had gloomy weather and the view and location was still enjoyed.

View is amazing, location is perfect. Unfortunately it was very windy while we there and the windows rattled quite loudly. Also, neighbors decided to have a large party and noise went on until early in the morning.
Outstanding accommodation, extremely clean, comfortably furnished , beautiful outlook over tamarama beach.  We loved it here!

Wayne and Kate's place was perfect for a beachside weekend. There were three of us and the space was just right. Close to restaurants (about 15 minutes walk to Bondi) and overlooking Tamarama. Beds were comfortable and space to prepare meals if you are so inclined.

name: Spacious 3BR Duplex Apt + Loft in Gramercy NYC
summary: This spacious 3BR duplex in Gramercy has a unique layout with high ceilings and a lofted area containing a futon. Located less than a 3 minute walk from the 6 train, 10 minutes from the NWR train, and there are plenty of nice restaurants and bars close to the apartment! Walking distance from Gramercy Park, Madison Square Park, Eataly, and the Flatiron District!!!
description: This spacious 3BR duplex in Gramercy has a unique layout with high ceilings and a lofted area containing a futon. Located less than a 3 minute walk from the 6 train, 10 minutes from the NWR train, and there are plenty of nice restaurants and bars close to the apartment! Walking distance from Gramercy Park, Madison Square Park, Eataly, and the Flatiron District!!! Gramercy Park, Flatiron District, Kip's Bay
neighborhood_overview: Gramercy Park, Flatiron District, Kip's Bay

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
The flat is a very nice place, inside but also outside in a good street as the flat is very near by everything, not only touristic areas but also shops to buy food or anything needed, even parking places at 5 min walking distance.
I recommand this, even for family since it is equipped with 3 real bedrooms plus sofas.

5 hour

Shampoo

Hey Mike, no problem 8p is fine. Shoot my roomate rob a text a little before your arrival (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 

The apartment was very spacious and comfortable equipped with 3 bedrooms each with a queen size bed as well as a loft with a futon.  The location was perfect. Right next to a lot of great restaurants and the subway.  Justin and his roommates were very flexible with checkin/checkout times. Highly recommended.

This bnb was everything my friends and I needed for our weekend in New York. The bnb was in a prime location close to every where we wanted to go. The pictures are great in reference to what is actually in the bnb.

Justin's place is in a great location. It felt like a college apartment, which was great for a few guys. He was really helpful with suggestions of where to head for food and drinks. Bonus that there were air conditioners in two of the rooms!
great stay recommend
Justin was a great host.  Very accommodating.
Great place. Great host. Close to majority of places.

Great host. Very responsive, honest, and provides some great details and recommendations for your stay. The apartment is clean and comfortable with plenty of room. No surprises. Had a great stay. Thanks!!
The host was pleasant and responsive. Key handoff and return went easily.

Amazing location and spacious apartment!. Fits perfectly five people. Very Close to Subway, restaurants, markets and shops. Justin was available all the time, was courteous and checked on us regularly. 
A really good bang for your buck!!

name: Beautiful apartment by Pl Catalunya
space: Completely refurbished, conditioned to enjoy your stay, it is perfect for family holidays, with friends, for business by education or work, you will feel like HOME. Located in beautiful glass building with elevator, along Pl Catalunya two minutes from Las Ramblas and close to the beach. Completely refurbished, high, bright and comfortable furnishings. VERY QUIET BUT CENTRAL. Apartment for up to 5 people, consisting of; ROOM with beautiful high beamed ceilings, balcony. Furnished with comfortable sofa bed for 2 people, sofa-bed, furniture shelves, flat screen TV, extendable table with chairs, etc.. Open designer kitchen fully equipped with washing machine, fridge, freezer microwave, coffee maker, juicer, kettle, hob, toaster, vacuum cleaner, crockery (cups, plates, pots, cutlery, etc.) everything for 5 people. Large bedroom with double bed, 2 bedside tables and large wardrobe, bed linen and towels. Design bathroom with sink, WC and shower cubicle plate equipped with towels and hairdryer
description: Completely refurbished, conditioned to enjoy your stay, it is perfect for family holidays, with friends, for business by education or work, you will feel like HOME. Located in beautiful glass building with elevator, along Pl Catalunya two minutes from Las Ramblas and close to the beach. Completely refurbished, high, bright and comfortable furnishings. VERY QUIET BUT CENTRAL. Apartment for up to 5 people, consisting of; ROOM with beautiful high beamed ceilings, balcony. neighborhood_overview: El apartamento esta situado en un barrio céntrico de Barcelona. muy bien comunicado con transporte publico, varios supermercados cerca y muchos restaurantes.
transit: Dispone de una estación de Metro justo al lado, también autobús, tren, etc. Junto a una parada de autobús directo a la playa. También puede ir a la playa en Metro.
access: - WIFI - Toallas y sabanas. - Cunas y tronas. - Taxi. - Limpieza. - Canguro. - Tour Turístico. - Parking publico con descuento. - Cámara de vídeo vigilancia.  - Ascensor de cristal.
interaction: Claudia y Oriol ofrecen atención telefónica las 24h del día, usando aplicaciones como (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Si tienen alguna duda, problema o necesitan algo solo tiene que hablar con nosotros. - Mejores sitios para visitar? - Donde puedo encontrar otra toalla? Lo que necesiten allí estaremos. En frente del apartamento hay un parking público con descuento para nuestros huéspedes. Solo tiene que avisarnos y le informaremos al detalle.
house_rules: - Por favor deje el apartamento ordenado y limpio. - Respete el vecindario, no se permite música fuerte ni fiestas después de las 22h (puede ser motivo de expulsión). - No fumen dentro del apartamento, por favor usen el balcón o la ventana. - Contacte con nosotros si hay algún problema o tiene alguna duda. - El horario del check in es de 13h a 21h, mas tarde de las 21h se cobra un suplemento de 20 euros. - Las reservas para solo un dia reciben un recargo de 20 euros de limpieza Si desea entrar mas pronto consúltenos, KONIBarcelona es flexible y se adapta a las necesidades que usted tenga. - En el apartamento encontrará dos juegos de llaves, si usted pierde una llave se le cobrará un recargo de 60€. ------------------------------------------------------------- - Please leave the apartment tidy and clean.  - Respect the neighborhood, no parties or loud music is allowed after 22h (may be grounds for expulsion).  - No smoking inside the apartment, please use the balcony or window.  - Conta

host.host_about: Hi im Oriol
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments:
Great location near Pl.Catalunya.
Apartments are beautiful, fully equiped.
Claudia, thanks a lot for your help and hospitality.
Totally recommend!!
Very nice apartment with a very good hostess! Very convenient location! Let's go back to these apartments!

Excellent apartment! very convenient location, beautiful, clean, well equipped and with a very good hostess. If I ever have to go back to Barcelona again I'll definitely come back to this apartment.  
Raquel

Fantastic location. The apartment is very cosy, very well equipped. The Bathroom is large and very convenient. Claudia is a very friendly person, who is always ready to help you. I definitely recommend this place if you want to book an apartment in Barcelona. 
Fabien

We stayed in this apt for 4 days. The location was great,it s 5- 7 min walking to Placa de Catalunia, which is the center of Barcelona,with a lot of department stores restaurants. 
The apt is as well close to the Urquinaona Metro, just 2 mins walking. 
The apartments were clean, cozy, well equipped. There are  one bedroom with double bed and a living room with a big sofa. 
Claudia is a very friendly person, was always ready to help. I definitely recommend this place if you want to book an apartment in the center of Barcelona.

Great location, and clean, cute apartment! Functioned well for 2 adults and college-aged child for weekend trip to Barcelona.

Building has one elevator, but it did not work most of the weekend so beware if you depend on an elevator; do not take the risk of having to climb 5 flights of stairs, especially with luggage!

Bathroom toiletries were used (apparently shared with other previous occupants) which was very unappealing. Fortunately, we had brought all of our own toiletries and did not need to rely on 'shared' ones.

Koni was very responsive to questions prior to and after booking, and available via email & phone to answer questions during our stay.

All in all, a good experience except for the elevator and used/shared bathroom toiletries!

Beautiful apartment where everything feels new and clean. Claudia was very helpful when we needed to book last-minute accommodation and Carlos was a very warm and welcoming host. The apartment is located in a terrific position: central and within walking distance to many sights. It is on a busy street, but the double-glazed balcony doors provide excellent sound-proofing from the street below. There are a number of cafés and restaurants close-by that provide wifi.

Hem passat el cap de setmana a Barna i la tria d'aquest apartament, a tocar de la Plaça Urquinaona, ha estat un encert total:
Espaiós, silenciós, ben equipat, molt nou, molt net i , sobretot, molt ben situat, 
Es pot anar a peu a la zona més centrica de Barcelona: La plaça Catalunya, les Rambles, el Gòtic, el Born... i  per si vols anar més lluny, hi ha una boca de metro i la parada de moltes línies de bus a la porta mateix .

Les persones de contacte, Claudia i Carles, molt professionals i molt amables. En la mesura de les seves possibiltats ens han facilitat molt l'estada. 
Quan tornem a Barcelona repetirem.
Piso céntrico, completamente equipado, cualquier incidencia resuelta rápida y eficazmente...para repetir!!
El piso es genial! Muy céntrico, silencioso y agradable. Si vuelvo a hospedarme en Barcelona sería mi primera opción
Great location. Nice apartment. It was easy to go around so we didn't even use the subway because everything intersting for us was at walking distance.

The Appartment is very nice, cosy and clean, so you can feel at home. And it is well equipped.
The Location is great, too. It takes a 5-minute walk only, to get to the city center, so there is no need to go by bus or metro.
We can highly recommend this flat!
Appartamento centrale pulito accogliente comodo per il centro e negozi silenzioso e ben attrezzato lo consiglio a tutti coloro che desiderano una buona sistemazione in città .
Very nice apartment, excellent staff

Nous avons passer un week-end à barcelone dans l'appartement de Pisos Koni ,.
L'appartement est trés bien situé à coté d'une bouche de métro, de passage de gracia, de la Rambla  en plus très bien équipé, très lumineux; on le recommande  vivement.
Merci .

J'ai passé 5 jours et 4 nuite à Barcelone avec 3 amies. L'appartement était très bien situé, très calme malgré la chaussée bruyante, il y a donc une très bonne isolation. L'appartement était très propre, bien éclairé et bien rangé. Il n'y avait par contre pas de savon ni dans la salle de bain ni dans la cuisine, ni assez de papier toilettes, ce qui nous a amené à avoir des dépenses supplémentaires. Mais sinon je recommande sans hésitation cet appartement qui convient autant pour des couples, pour des jeunes ou des familles.

Was perfect ! The flat is clean, new, in the centre : very nice and cosy. It was like being at home.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement : tres bien situe, propre  & excellent accueil !

No duden en alojarse en este apartamento A 2 minutos de plaza Cataluña, de Las Ramblas, de Paseo de Gracia, del Portal del Ángel! Ubicación inmejorable. Perfecto para 4 personas. Muy acogedor, limpio y con todo lo necesario para cocinar. Sobretodo nos encantó la decoración. Todos  los detalles  muy cuidados. Te sientes como en casa,. Agradecer la atención de Claudia la anfitriona.
great position.. lovely house.. helpful staff.. a perfect Holiday!!

After booking this apartment, Koni had to switch us to this https://www.airbnb.no/rooms/2131496?s=8GqE apartment in stead. The two apartments is in the same building with the same layout.

We were three people and there was plenty room, a bed had been set up next to the sofa. The apartment looked newly refurbished and with nice furniture and a nice bathroom. We were all very happy with the apartment. 

The location is excellent, within walking distance to many sites and there is a metro station at the corner if you need to go further. There is a nice little bakery just out the door and to the right and a 24 hour shop just across the road. There is an elevator, but it only takes 1/2 persons at the time. 

We only had some very small issues with the power going out with use of the water-kettle. But the person meeting us at arrival spoke very little English so we got little information and the person we delivered the key to spoke no English. So we felt a little uncomfortable not having really spoken to anyone as we left. 

Otherwise we had a terrific time! This was our first experience with airbnb, we will use the site again and we recommend Koni if you are staying in Barcelona.

Excellent stay!  Newly refurbished, and she has sound-proof windows and exterior metal shades which block the sound and light very well.  Only minor complaints are that the shower drained very slowly and there was only 1 roll of toilet paper (which she apologized for and said would fix).  Also, the internet stopped working for 1 day, so we had to go to Starbuck/McDonald's to use the wi-fi.  Great experience overall though - highly recommend!

Great communication from Claudia after booking and during our stay.  The apartment was not ready for our arrival, however Claudia let us put our belongings into the apartment so we were not held up by it.  The apartment is absolutely beautiful, exactly as described, and finished to a very high standard.  Much more kitchen equipment than I expected and it really does have everything you could possibly need. Downsides are, lack of washing up liquid and toilet paper.  There was half a roll in the bathroom (for 2 people and 2 day stay) and enough washing up liquid for 3 meals. There is a nightclub directly across the road which was incredibly noisy until around 6am, not music but people gathered outside shouting, drinking and singing. This only happened on Friday night, Saturday night was quiet. Obviously out of Claudia's control, which is appreciated. If going back to Barcelona, I'd only be too happy to stay here again, it was extremely comfortable and a lovely host.

The apartment was perfect, well located in the center, clean and comfy, you feel like at home. If you come by car, it's very easy to park, there is a parking just in front of the flat. The only thing is that there is a disco club just in front of the flat, so if you come by the end of the week it can be noisy. I really recommend this place to stay in Barcelona.
Excelente ubicación y una atención especial. Viajé con mi madre y le encantó el apartamento.

Hola Koni!
Nuestra estancia en tu apartamento fue fabulosa!
No solo la excelente ubicacion, sino los detalles. Por ejemplo: el costurero! o los condimentos para cocinar! o los juegos de naipes y los libros sobre Barcelona para planificar los paseos!
Gracias Koni por habernos dado la oportunidad de disfrutar Barcelona del mejor modo: sintiendonos en casa.
Esperamos volver pronto!

This apartment was in the perfect location and was so comfortable. Everything was kept up well. It was exactly what we needed for our stay. I cannot say enough good things about this apartment or about Koni Barcelona. I will most definitely use them again.
Great location in Barcelona with easy access to everything we wanted to do!

Cuando llegamos al piso Oriol nos recibio muy bien, el piso para nuestra familia (3 niños) era muy limpio, confortable y corresponde muy bien a las fotos. Oriol se ocupo muy bien de todo, si necesitabas algo o alguna pregunta cualquiera, te contestaba lo mas rapido posible. Una silla y una cuna para mi hijo chico fue un servicio gratis que pusieron a nustra disposicion, habia solo que pedirla. Todo lo que puedo decir es que si quieres ir a barcelona y disfrutar de un piso a 2min a pie de la plaza catalunya (pleno centro) y bajando de casa tienes el metro, o sea lo tienes todo, no tienes que buscar mas, aqui lo tienes !
Volveremos a este piso la proxima vez con mucho gusto y sin pensarlo 2 veces :)
Muchas gracias por todo Koni, hasta la proxima :-)

We stayed at Koni's place and its an excellent apartment  in a great location. Very easy to reach by aerobus and just a short walk from bus turistic hop on hop off which will get you to all turustic places in no time. The apartment is clean and modernly outfitted. The twin bed could be a bit bigger for above average size people, no big problem though. Check-in is easy and good communication (just a bit spanglish) We would book it again on our next visit to Barcelona, A++ apartment!!

The apartment is lovely. The location is perfect. The apartment was fully stocked from linen to kitchen consumables. It was very pleasant. 

The lift is tiny, but that is the building design. Nothing can be done to that, but accept it. It is manageable. 

Only downside, on the last evening, the wifi stopped working. If you travelling from other countries and your phone is not set up for call and text roaming, this could be an issue. 

All in all, a pleasant stay, wonderful host who really helped us. Highly recommended if you planning on visiting Barcelona

Koni's appartment was perfect! The flat was very nice, very clean and very conveniently located, close to metro, shops and restaurants. Koni was easy to communicate and very helpful to us. I highly recommend this appartment.
Thank you Koni!
Lovely apartment, perfect for two people, a little small for three. Great location too - perfect for exploring Barcelona.

Clean, comfortable rooms and beds, equipped kitchen, clean bathroom. Not a huge flat, but quite enough, very nice and friendly. 
We really enjoyed to stay here and I highly recommend it to anyone!

Building was quite, the street a bit busy during a weekday - it's close to city centre, so don't expect "country-side silence", but we spent the day walking around in the city, so was not a problem.
Good location, near to city centre, about 5 minutes walk from the Aerobus bus stop at Catalunya. Metro station is close too. 
A nice bakery right next to this building, shop on the other side of the street. 

Koni was very friendly and helpful! 
Recommended!

Thanks for everything!
amazing, modern, safe and quiet flat. perfect location and well-equipped. appreciated the lift! thank you Koni <3

Our experience in this flat couldn't be better. The flat is bright, cosy and comfortable. The location is rather convenient cause you've got P. Catalunia a few meters far. 
And all the facilities written in the description have met with our expectations. I strongly recommend staying there. Plus, there is a delicious bakery next door.

Ottima casa e soprattutto in ottima posizione per visitare Barcellona, sia a piedi che con i mezzi pubblici.
Tre giorni bellissimi.
Grazie

Very nice, cosy appart! Great communication with the hosts, keen to provide support if necessary. Some elements were missing (iron) but very quickly Koni found a solution. Photos and description are 100% real. Moreover, despite a very noisy street, the appart is well soundproofing.

Claudia was very friendly, welcoming and kind. We were with 6 month baby and it was most convenient part of our trip. The room was fully ecquipped, including a baby bad, and fast wifi. The location could not be better than that. Thank you very much, it was wonderful!!!

Appartement  bien équipé et de plus , aménagé avec beaucoup de goût . Ambiance trés agréable . 
Une condition : tenir les fenêtres fermées ( bruit extérieur ) 
Si autre occasion , prêt à l'occuper à nouveau.
Precioso apartamento, muy céntrico y bien comunicado. Sin duda recomendable.
It was a good location, very clean and well suited for 3 people (as long as 2 don't mind sharing a bed).  Just what we needed for a whistlestop tour of Barcelona. Felt safe.
Wir hatten das Apartment für 6 Tage gebucht. Die Buchung, Check In, etc. hat super funktioniert. Das Apartment liegt zentral und ist sehr gut ausgestattet. Jeder Zeit wieder dieses Apartment ;-)

Super nice apartment, probably the best one that i have ever had from my Air Bnb experience. Super clean, convenient and strategically located. There was a small misunderstanding at the beginning about the charge per person but Koni decided to not charge me for additional person because the information that i received from Air Bnb mobile app was different than the website version. Anyway, super recommended!!
La descripción era correcta y la anfitriona Claudia nos recibió muy bien y nos hizo sentirnos a gusto.

Very nice flat and great experience with Koni. The host was very responsive and gave clear instructions for finding the apartment. Everything was done with access codes, so it wasn't necessary to meet with the host in order to obtain a key and enter the building, which was much more convenient for me. The apartment itself was great; charming design and furnishing, clean (emphasis on clean), modern amenities, nice bed, and overall very comfortable. The apartment I stayed in is ideal for a couple looking for a romantic retreat in beautiful Barcelona. Highly recommend.

This place was just perfect-- centrally located, close to morning coffee shops, and walking distance to almost everything you'd want to see in Barcelona. It was really charming and felt nice to come home to in the evenings to cook something for dinner. I felt like communication was easy with the host given I only speak English, and the place is even cuter than the pictures!
Great flat! Very central. Uriol has been so helpful! Thank you!!!!!!!
Koni was very friendly and helpfull! We had an excellent time in a clean and really good located apartment! We definitely would recommend this location!

Sehr schönes und sauberes Apartment, nur zum weiterempfehlen! Das Apartment liegt 2 min. von der Placa Cataluny entfernt. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und für 4 Personen gut geeignet. Koni war immer erreichbar und sehr hilfsbereit!

There was festival going on the day we arrived so Koni couldn't come to the place for check-in but we had no problem getting in. The apartment was easy to find and Koni provided all the information we needed. It was very cozy and clean place. I slept on the safa bed and it was comfy enough. The location was perfect too. It was a good choice to stay in Koni's apartment. We had great tiem :)
The apartment was just as described and was so well equipped!  It is in a perfect location close to the Gothic Centre and Las Ramblas with lots of great restaurants nearby.
The apartment was lovely, clean, centrally located, and Claudia was a wonderful and helpful host. I would definitely book with Koni again and I highly recommend booking a vacation with them.
