La experiencia ha sido genial, el mejor apartamento que hemos alquilado en airbnb, perfecta ubicación, flexibilidad para chek in y check out y muy buena predisposición del anfitrión...recomendable sin dudas.

Great stay in this apartment. Looked just like the pics, great location close to everything! Koni was a great host, easy to contact, responded timely and left direction on how to get to into the apartment.

The apartment is as described and shown in the picture, clean and great location.  A good breakfast place is located a couple of meters from the building entrance. 

Had difficulty unfolding the sofa-bed, needs repair and adjustment. The unfolded sofa-bed occupied the living room space all the time, unable to folded back due to a faulty mechanism.

Communication was reasonable, in English, there was some difficulty, and response was acceptable.
nous avons passe un excellent sejour. l appartement est tres bien, idealement situe dans le centre de barcelone.

Beautiful apartment in a fabulous location. The club across the street is a bit loud, but the beauty and comfort of the apartment is worth a little noise. Also, Koni made check in, etc. easy. Would definitely stay here again!

This was a great little apartment for a visit to BArcelona. Very close to everything and oddly quiet. 
The pull out couch was not comfortable for sleeping but everything else was just delightful.

Le logement est parfaitement situé, et tout à fait conforme aux attentes.
Ce fut parfait !
Muchas gracias
Thierry

O apartamento é ótimo, a localização é ótima, fomos muito bem acolhidos pela proprietária.
Vale a pena conferir!
Abbiamo passato presso PisosKoni un bel fine settimana, l appartamento  é bello ed giusto 5 minuti a piedi dalla Rambla.

El piso está perfecto, tal cual lo describe en la página de Airbnb.
La ubicación es estratégica para disfrutar de Barcelona.
Oriol es muy amable y nos ha faciliytado una cuna y la trona para nuestra bebé.
La próxima vez que vayamos a la ciudad condal, esperamos poder ir de nuevo a este piso.
Great appartment, clean, Good Location, no problems, stores close by.

Abbiamo soggiornato comodamente in 4 (due adulti e due bimbi piccoli) in questo appartamento, moderno e luminoso come descritto. Molto centrale rispetto alle principali vie della città, c'è una stazione della metro appena all'angolo della piazza, una farmacia, due coffe shop e un market a 5 minuti da casa. Al nostro arrivo sapevamo che non ci sarebbe stato nessuno, ma ci sono state fornite tutte le indicazioni per arrivare e accedere all'appartamento: siamo sempre stati in contatto con Oriol, che è stato super disponibile e gentilissimo per ogni nostra richiesta di aiuto e chiarimento.
The apartment was lovely and very central. Our host was very helpful. Thank you.
Хорошие апартаменты в отличном районе. Так как на полу плитка и нет подогрева, то зимой квартира очень холодная.

Encantado con el departamento. Éramos 4y nos pareció muy cómodo. Es muy lindo y la ubicación es excelente. Llegamos antes y el departamento ya estaba listo. Lo recomiendo totalmente. Cuando vuelva a Barcelona sin dudas iré nuevamente a este departamento.

La estancia ha sido perfecta, el apartamento esta muy bien ubicado, es bonito y agradable, la finca tambien esta muy bien, todo limpio, con estilo. La llegada fue comoda y rapida y lo mismo al salir. Me comunique por mensaje y la respuesta fue muy rapida. Recomiendo el apartamento, seguro que volvere!

We had a great experience and would definitely stay here again. The place is as described. It's very nice, clean and in a great location. There are some nice extras like heating/air conditioning, hair dryer, washer/dryer etc. We also loved the fact that the key to the apartment is in a lock box outside the apartment, which the host provides the code for. This way we did not have to worry about checking in or out at a specific time. It made check in / check out very smooth and hassle free. The one downside was that the hot water in the shower only lasted about 3 min. We just sucked it up and took really quick showers as we didn't want to go through the trouble of having the issue addressed, but the host was very responsive to all our communication so I'm sure she would have been happy to address the issue if we'd asked. Overall it was a great stay and we'd return.

Muito bem localizado, estação de metrô quase na porta do apartamento. Tudo foi bem explicado para a chegada no apartamento, e um apartamento realmente muito bonito. Excelente comunicação e ajuda em todo e qualquer problema ou dúvida que aparecesse.

The appartment was well located near the Catalonia sq. Koni proposed structured and simple instruction about getting to appartment. The appartment is one-room flat separated by a wall to get 2 separate rooms.

We recommend staying at this appartment

Apartamento muy acogedor y muy bien situado. No se echa nada en falta excepto algo mas de caleffaccion en los dias muy frios. En general el diseño y la comodidad estan muy bien cuidados y la zona y comunicaciones no podrian ser mejores
Todo estaba perfectamente organizado a la llegada

Superbe appartement, très propre et très bien placé dans la ville.
Proche de la place Catalunya, station métro Urquinaona à proximité et très chouette endroit pour prendre un bon petit déjeuner juste en bas de l'immeuble.

We had a very good stay in the flat. Everything was nice and clean! 
Getting the key was really comfortable because it was possible to take the key out of a small locker next to the flat. 
We will come again :)
Thank you!

This was a beautiful flat and looked exactly like the pictures - rustic charm in the heart of the city!  It is in one of the best areas, perfectly located within walking distance of Eixample, Born and Gotico and more and 10 metres from a very useful metro station! In a beautiful apartment block with great security.  The apartment was spotless and we had plenty of towels and linen.  The beds were very comfy and the apartment had everything we needed, including a kettle.  The wifi is very good as well. We had a really lovely stay and definitely recommend the flat for anyone looking for a beautiful place in Barcelona.  Oriol was very helpful and we had no problems! Thank you very much Pisos Koni!

Absolutely amazing place with absolutely amazing location. 10 on 10 in every aspect.. Be it cleanliness, location, amenities  or ease of check in. Claudication was very helpful and promptly responded to queries.  Would more than love to come back.  Strongly recommended.

Grande piso, bien equipado y muy bien situado! 
Un piso perfecto para una estancia perfecta
非常温馨的房间,地理位置也很好,房间设施很齐全,入住过程非常顺利｡房东人很好,提出问题很快回复,入住过程中要增加毯子等,房东很快给我们送去了,非常舒适的旅程~

3歳･6歳の子どもと一緒に3泊滞在しました｡ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅのとても便利な場所にあり､周囲の環境もとてもよかったです｡ｽｰﾊﾟｰﾏｰｹｯﾄがちかく､お隣はかわいらしいｶﾌｪ!ｽﾍﾟｲﾝでの滞在をたっぷり楽しむことができました｡
部屋のｲﾝﾃﾘｱもとてもかわいらしかったです｡

Haben zu zweit ein Woche in diesem schönen Appartment verbracht und waren rundum zufrieden. Alles ist sehr sauber und gepflegt und es ist alles vorhanden, was man für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt braucht.  
Die Lage fast unmittelbar an der Placa Urquinaona ist super, da man die U-Bahn praktisch vor der Haustüre hat und auch verschiedene Buslinien direkt vor dem Haus vorbei kommen. Außerdem kann man sehr viele Sehenswürdigkeiten und die Altstadt zu Fuß erreichen,  was wirklich klasse ist.  Allerdings hat die zentrale Lage natürlich den kleinen Nachteil, dass es viel Verkehrslärm gibt. Die Fenster sind aber gut gedämmt, so dass es mit geschlossenen Fenstern in Ordnung war.   
Der Zugang zum Haus wird über einen Code geregelt, sodass wir keinen persönlichen Kontakt zu den Vermietern hatten.  Alles war aber bestens organisiert und die Vermieter haben immer sofort per Mail oder SMS reagiert, wenn es eine Frage zu klären gab.
Die Vermieter waren auch so freundlich uns  früher als üblich einchecken zu lassen, weil die Wohnung an dem Tag schon frei war.
Gerne empfehlen wir diese Wohnung und die Vermieter weiter -  war alles bestens - kommen gerne wieder.  Gracias.

Convenient, clean, and modern. The location is perfect for taking the hop n hop off bus, walking to several restaurants and fairly quiet as its on the 4th floor. 
I was travelling with my parents who are senior citizens. They had no complaints, except for a very small elevator.
Lastly, there are very minimal rations of food left in the kitchen and this maybe due to the fact that it is run by a company rather than a person.we had to buy our sugar, coffee n milk.

This apartment was absolutely perfect. We were so delighted when we walked in as it looked just like the pictures! It was a brilliant location, five minutes walk from Placa Catalunya, from which you can hop on a bus to anywhere in the city. Claudia was there to meet us when we arrived and showed us around. I can't thank you enough for a wonderful stay!

The apartment is lovely, in a great part of Barcelona, walking distance of the old town, the port, the beach, Sagrada Familia, Pl Catalunya and easy access to all transport, and lots of lovely restaurants and bars.
Beautiful comfortable apartment, very clean, in a great location near all sights and transportation. Couldn't be better.

Myself and my two grown up children were looking to book an apartment for a long weekend in Barcelona and this one turned out to be a perfect fit for our stay. Once booked the hosts couldn't be more helpful with information about the apartment and making themselves available if we had questions. The apartment looks exactly the same as the photos and was in a great location, a short walk from the old town, and to La Rambla which lead to the sea front. The only issue we had was a shortage of hot water but besides that we had a very good stay.

우리는 모든것에 만족했다
좋은위치에 교통도편하고 잘정리된 깨끗한방이 아주마음에 들었다
충분히 걸어서 요소요소를 둘러볼수있었고
관광을 마치고 돌아와서 편하게 쉴수있었고
주변소음도 거의 없었다
호스트도 매우 친절했다
누군가 이지역을 여행하고 숙소가 필요하다면 이곳은 좋은 대안이 될것이다

I booked the apartment for my parents and they really loved it! The location was just perfect as they could walk to almost any sightseeing attraction. The apartment is nice, bright and clean which was highly appreciated by my parents. I definitely would recommend staying there.
Wonderful location, apartment very comfortable with everything we needed.  Lovely cozy decor.  Communication excellent. Would definitely recommend.

It is very convenient location
And good for traveler

This flat was absolutely amazing. The location could not have been any better, as it is was a short walk to the Plaza Catalunya, the Arc de Triomf, and the Cathedral. The views were gorgeous and the room in wonderful condition. The flat is located on the 4th floor, however there is a lift to help with baggage. I would strongly recommend this place to anyone, not only was the flat nice, but the hosts were willing to assist with anything and everything we needed.
Our stay in Barcelona was perfect! the apartment is very well located and everything was as the announcement!I recommend it to everyone!

Beautiful apartment in a perfect location! The apartment was very clean, comfortable and easy to find. Our host made regular contact via email and text message to ensure that everything was okay and to welcome us on our stay. We would love to stay here again and are looking forward to our next trip back to Barcelona.

We had a very pleasant stay in this appartment, everything was clean and the arrival was wel organised. We were with 3 persons, and only problem - which we should have mentioned after the first night, is that the matrass of the sofa bed was too thin, especially for two adults. The street is noisy, but the doors are well isolated of the noise. and there is airco. The location is ideal, close to the plaza de Catalunya, where the busses to the airport arrive and leave. We will be back, thank you Claudia!

Très bel appartement conforme aux photos. L'appartement est très propre et bien aménagé. De plus il est extrêmement bien situé avec un accès au métro au pied de l'immeuble et un accès à la Plaça Catalunya et Las  Ramblas à 2mn a pied. Le seul point d'amélioration est le confort du canapé lit qui n'est pas excellent mais reste correct. L'organisation pour la récupération des clefs a été bonne et la communication avec notre hote a été parfaite avec des réponses claires et rapide. Si nous revenons sur Barcelone, nous choisisirons cet appartement sans hésiter.

Debo decirles que mi experiencia en este apartamento ha sido maravillosa, es muy bonito, prolijo, moderno, amplio, con todas las comodidades, con una ubicación excepcional, cómoda y estratégica para acceder a todos los puntos de interés. El apartamento se encuentra bien equipado. Mi estancia fue excelente. Asimismo, cabe destacar que los anfitriones fueron amables, serviciales, atentos, siempre presentes y en todo momento se encontraron dispuestos a proporcionar soluciones. Desde ya volvería sin dudarlo!! Gracias Koni.
It was very nice

Such a great apartment: we loved the location, very close to everything in city center, easy to walk places, cool restaurants close by. Very easy to check in and out - great setup where you don't even have to meet anyone, you just get the code and the keys. So much easier than trying to coordinate a time to meet with the host to get the key. 
Metro station, 24 hour convenience store, and bus from the airport are all close by. Highly recommend this apartment!

Beautiful flat in Barcelona. Easy waking to many parts of the city. The flat has lovely decor and very clean and feels like home. Many bars and cafes located a long the street. We received great directions to retrieve the keys Oriol was on hand to validate our parking ticket. Highly recommend!
Such a great location and the apartment was incredibly cosy and clean. My friends and I loved staying here!

Great location, lovely and spotlessly clean apartment, but bring your earplugs if you want to sleep.
Because you are right in the center of town there is a lot of traffic noise in the daytime. At night there is a nightclub that attracts a lot of noisy young people who stand on the sidewalk until 5 AM with loud talking and shouting. When I return to Barcelona I would stay in a quieter place.

It was a fantastic apartment in the center of bcn. Everything was fine & clean and i'm looking forward to my next trip. Definitly in the same apartment!
Thanks for everything...

We spent two nights in this apartment, it was just a beautiful and modern apartment. We didn't get to meet our hosts, but they provided us with all the information we needed plus codes etc to get into the apartment ourselves. 
The apartment was gorgeous, with a modern kitchen and bathroom, comfortable bed and everything we needed! We arrived on Saint Juan Day, and thankyou to our hosts for messaging us as we had no idea what all the bangs were in the neighbourhood! Turns out that it was fireworks, and the air was alive that night with children and adults alike setting off fireworks and firecrackers! We had an absolute ball in Barcelona, it certainly is a city worth visiting - we loved our time here! By the way, downstairs is an amazing bakery cafe- cheap super yummy food and amazing orange juice! Worth a visit!

Excellent location and beautiful apartment. Close to tourist attraction and bed was comfy. We didn't use the kitchen but it was fully equipped.
Shower was very nice and good communication with host.

We just spent two nights in this beautiful apartment and had a great time. Although we never ended up actually meeting ours hosts they left great and clear instructions on how to get in and where the apartment was and we had absolutely no trouble getting the keys at all. The apartment itself was beautiful and really clean and had everything we needed. There were three of us and when we arrived the sofa bed and appropriate sets of towels were already set up and laid out for us. We had a really wonderful time and the apartment was in a great location. The next time I come to Barcelona I would defintely stay here again!
This place was clean, cute, and comfortable- what more could you ask for?! And the host was very, very nice and helpful.

The flat is adorable and perfect for my two teenage daughters and me. Its location is ideal as well..we walked everywhere. The host is most helpful...answering texts about a variety of things in a timely manner. She even bought an adaptor for us to use since we forgot one. We would definitely stay here again. Love love love Barcelona!
We had the most wonderful stay in this beautiful apartment. I highly recommend this flat as it is close to all main attractions, it is absolutely gorgeous and the host is very kind and welcoming.
Todo muy limpio, propio y en orden. Un piso muy bonito a 3 minutos andando de la Rambla.

A great apartment with all the modcons. Looks great, and it's a great block to stay in.
Also a fantastic location, no more than half an hour walk to all of the main sites. There is also a metro directly across the street, if walking isn't your thing.
Appartement hyperbien place et très (Website hidden by Airbnb) le conseille vivement pour  visiter Barcelone

Couldn't have asked for a better location!  Walking distance from most of the sites; La Rambla, Gothic district, and a short cab ride away from Barcoleneta. Checking into the apartment was smooth and easy, the hosts were really good about communicating prior to my reservation. Another bonus of this listing is the 24 hr market across the street. My friends and I walked and cabbed throughout our stay but, the train station is conveniently located around the corner. Other highlights include the elevator and the AC unit--it's in then living room though but, still nice to have.  For the price of the listing, definitely worth it.
Logement ressemblant aux photos. Tres propre et avec un hôte tres sympa. Bien situé, proche du centre.

Had an enjoyable time at Oriol and Claudia's place! Location is the best! Easy journey to all of Barcelona's major attractions and the place was very clean and lovely. The apartment is right in the middle of everything, but also very quiet and secluded. It has the best of everything. Close to the nightlife but quiet for a nice rest after a long day of seeing all of Catalunya. Access to the apartment was easy and Oriol met us at the apartment when we arrived. Smooth check in and check (Website hidden by Airbnb) was everything we needed and asked for.
Perfect apartment very well located in beautiful Barcelona

來巴賽隆納七天都住在這個公寓,非常漂亮的裝潢方便的地段(鄰近市中心要去哪裡都非常方便),重點是房東人真的太友善了!各種疑難雜症都幫我解決了!真的非常非常感動及感謝!
真的很謝謝PisosKoni!!!!
Muchísimas gracias!!!!!
Thank you so much we love your apartment !!!

Great apartment in a superb location. The apartment is true to it's description on the website. It is very close to La Rambla and Gothic quarters. The hosts made sure that the apartment was ready when we arrived and everything was clear in terms of instructions. We asked for some assistance with gym & parking etc and that was promptly provided.

Great location and beautiful aesthetics make this stay a wonderful experience.  A well supplied kitchen made cooking here a good experience and many tourist sites were within walking distance or a short metro ride.

I really enjoyed my stay at this place. It was perfect for me as a solo traveller but in addition it had everything I needed. I did not use the parking facilities but I noted there were some available. It's near urqinanoa which is two metro stops from the beach and one stop from placa Catalunya/ las ramblas. I didn't cook there but there was a lovely cooking area available. I would definitely recommend this place to stay.

Oriol and Claudia's flat is ideally located - very central and within easy reach of everywhere you'd want to visit in Barcelona. The flat is modern, clean, nicely decorated and a great base for exploring the city.  They have also stocked the flat with a wealth of maps and information on things to see/do in Barcelona. 

Oriol and Claudia were communicative and quick to respond to any question or inquiry we had. They made it easy to check in to the flat on arrival and in general are fantastic hosts. 

We loved staying here - I would highly recommend it to anyone.
El piso es justo como viene en las fotos, bonito, compacto, recién remodelado y con la mejor ubicación para visitar Barcelona! La pasé muy agusto!
정말위치도 최고!숙소도최고!엘레베이터까지 있어서 최고최고!

El departamento es muy acogedor, está muy bien ubicado, muy céntrico. Es igual a lo que se muestra en las fotos. Oriol siempre fue muy amable, atento y siempre estuvo en contacto cuando lo necesitamos. Tiene fácil acceso a muchos restaurantes, al metro, de las Ramblas y supermercados. Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable, si regresamos a Barcelona seguro será ahí.

This was a cute little apartment right by the city center, perfect location and easy to get anywhere (right by the metro station). Oriol was very accommodating and welcoming. We were able to leave our bags early before check in and he helped me when I had lost bags I needed to get from the airline. The host was very gracious and helpful. The apartment was very cute - it was a little cramped with 4 girls with a lot of stuff but would have been great for a couple or 2 people. We loved our stay here!

We had a great time staying at this apartment. The host was very attentive making sure everything was ok. The description is accurate and the apartment had great wifi. The apartment was very clean. Checking in was very easy because we were given the information before arriving. Location was great close to the metro and walking distance to Pl Catalunya. We will definitely stay here when we come back to Barcelona.

Beautiful apartment. Very central to all things necessary. Cafes in all directions. Tapas in all directions plus a super helpful 24 hr store across the street! Very clean and very beautiful apartment!!
Tout était juste parfait! Localisation, appartement, juste tout! Merci beaucoup, nous avons vraiment apprécié rester avec vous, c'est à refaire sans aucun doute :)

The apartment is very well located and perfect (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very convenient to walk to the main attractions and the Aerobus station.We two people had very nice 2 nights in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) and checking-out is also very convenient.Although we didn't see the master, she responded my questions very quickly and helpful by mobile phone.Thanks very much!
This is a great apartment!! It was very clean and nice. We enjoyed the central location and felt it was very safe!

We loved our stay at the apartment. Location was just perfect, it's within walking distance to many attractions and only a stone's throw away to the metro and the airport shuttle.  Couldn't ask for anything better!!!

Wir haben Claudia leider nicht persönlich kennen gelernt, da man den Schlüssel mit einem Code sich selber und komplikationslos holen konnte. Aber den Kontakt, den wir mit Ihr per Telefon oder Whats-up hatten, war sehr nett. Das Apartment war sauber und gemütlich und ist sehr gut gelegen.

Just as in the photos. Great central location easy to get to from the airport and with straight-forward instructions for getting keys. Some traffic noise, so bring earplugs if you are a particularly light sleeper.

La casa è molto confortevole e perfetta sia per posizione che per confort. Siamo una coppia con due gemelle di un anno. Abbiamo trovato a casa tutto quello che ci serviva per stare con le bimbe, i seggiolini, alcuni giochi e le culle. La casa si trova a pochi passi da piazza Catalogna ed è perfetta per girare a piedi.

The apartment was excellent, and the description and photographs are very accurate. It was nicely decorated and was cheerful, modern and inviting. The owners/managers were also very thoughtful - there were a few very nice touches, including for the kids. It was also child-friendly, and my infant had a good time walking around. 

    The location is perfect. It is a minute away from the nearest metro station, and fiv-seven minutes walk to Pl. Catalunya, from where you have an even wider range of buses, metro lines, the Aerobus, tourist buses, etc. Also very centrally located. The 24 hour market opposite is convenient, and there are many cafes and other supermarkets around. 

Accessing the keys to the flat was very smooth and convenient. 

Communication by the hosts was excellent. Most queries were responded to within minutes. They were very helpful in helping with booking a taxi from the airport at arrival.

This is a lovely place and in a very central location.  The flat was just as it was described. Claudia was ever so helpful--from sending detailed maps and instructions to reserving a taxi from the airport. I will definitely stay here again if I visit Barcelona again.
Great stay here.  Central location, easy walk to all the main attractions: Gaudi buildings, ramblas, beach, etc.  Fold-out sofa bed was a nice feature as well.
Very convient and cosy. A little noisy but not big deal. Claudia is very helpful and responsible. Definate a good choice.

El departamento es muy lindo, tal cual se ve en las fotos. Oriol respondió a todas nuestras consultas con muchísima amabilidad y nos facilitó el ingreso al parking que se ubica enfrente, que si bien no es gratuito, está muy bien para los precios de Barcelona (nos cobraron 50€ por 3 días). La ubicación es inmejorable y las instalaciones también. Sin dudas regresaríamos a este apartamento.

The booking process and any subsequent enquiries were dealt with swiftly and accurately. The apartment is somewhat small but the location is fantastic and within walking distance (even with a preschooler and a toddler in tow) to a lot of key sightseeing venues, restaurants and so on. Lots of details in the apartment to keep the little people entertained: puzzles, colouring book (we ended up buying one exactly like it because our son loved it so much) & crayons, games. Tons of guide books and reading books on the shelves. Baby cot with little blanket and highchair were also put in the apartment at our request. Overall, very professionally handled.
Nous avons passé un bon séjour à Barcelone. Logement très central et très pratique.

El Apartamento es precioso, limpio y en muy buena zona, los anfitriones nos proporcionaron todo a tiempo y muy accesibles, son amables y muy al pendiente de cualquier necesidad, con mucho gusto volvería y recomendadisimo para una estadía en Barcelona.

Great location, apartment has everything you need.  We were pleased to find there was a lift as the apartment is on the 4th floor.  apartment was very clean and comfortable.  Would defiantly stay again. Great communication and organising a taxi to pick us up was very much appreciated.
Appartement sympathique et bien placé, transport à proximité et lieux propres. Une adresse à recommander.

The apartment was well kept just as in the picture. Such easy instructions getting inside the building and apartment. Walking distance to everything. Big enough for a traveling couple or a small family. There was a good selection of restraunts and cafes around. The 24hour supermarket across the street had good basic stuff to buy. Definitely recommend the apartment to travelers heading to Barcelona.
We had great days in Barcelona! The Apartment was well located, very clean and friendly. PisosKoni was very friendly and it was easy to organize everything. I can reccomand this place for 100%!
very well designed and comfortable flat with everything you need! Location is great, walking distance to almost all sight spots. Landlord is very helpful and quick response.
Everything was great. Lacation really nice to look city around. Room so beautiful. Also, she is so helpful. I can  recommend this place to others. Thank you very much.
Très bien placé, propre, bien équipé, efficace, je recommande à tous le logement de Claudia!!!

The appartment was great, no difference form the images and the description, clean and well equiped. It was ideal for small family stay, and very well located - close to transportation and walking distance from beautifull borne and gothic neighbourhood.
Claudia repsonded to the question timely! Highly recomend the place for 2 to 4 tenants.

This is a perfect apartment. It's clean, cosy, and very centrally located. There was plenty of information about sightseeing and whatnot available in the apartment, and it was very easy to locate/get into. We loved our stay!

El departamento es bello. Buena zona, buen precio y cerca de muchas cosas interesantes.  Es exactamente como en la foto y muy limpio y ordenado. Nuestra estadía ahi fue exquisita. Definitivamente volveremos si coincidimos en la fecha para rentarlo. Super recomendado!!!
非常好的位置,出门就是各种餐厅,交通也方便,房间也很整洁,房东有问必答,很好
It was a nice stay in the appartement. Everything was in there and the location is very good. We have a great time and when we are in Barcelona once again we will book this appartement for sure.

虽然没有和房东见面｡但是入住过程非常顺利｡房东也一直和我们保持联系｡位置很好｡从加泰罗尼亚广场出来一直走五分钟就到了｡房间干净整洁｡好评!

译 文
Although not to meet with the landlord. But the check-in process very smooth. The landlord has been keep in touch with us. Location is very good. Out of the Catalan square has been about 5-10minutes' walk. The room clean and tidy. High praise!
Nos sentimos muy a gusto.  Ya que cumplía con todo lo que decía el anuncio.

Appartement en plein centre ville,très jolie décoration dans immeuble de standing.
Idéal pour famille de 4 personnes,pratique pour faire la cuisine et visiter la ville.
Systéme de clé disponible sans rencontrer le propriétaire trés pratique et sécurisé.
Un peu bruyant le matin(au dessus d'un feu tricolore près du centre)

This apartment in Central Barcelona is full of character and ideally located to the main sites and shoppping areas in Barcelona. There is plenty of restaurants/cafes/bars situated very close and a 24hr supermarket directly across the road. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone travelling to Barcelona.

It is good location. One stop by Catalunya, but really closed. You can go there 5~10 minutes by walk, and other famous place is also closed. 
The apartment is very clean and interior is nice. It provides everything for stay, even something like book, cards, crayon for kids. Actually my daughter loved them. 
It is easy and fast to communicate with the host(Oriol) by (Hidden by Airbnb) .
If I were to point out anything at all, instruction how to use washing machine. But he let me know it kindly on (Hidden by Airbnb) .

Der Gastgeber war sehr aufmerksam und hat sicher gestellt, dass alles zu unserer Zufriedenheit ist. Die Wohnung war sehr zentral gelegen und perfekt wenn man mit dem Flugzeug anreist, da der Aerobus Shuttle ganz in der Nähe seine Endstation hat. Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral und an einer Hauptstraße gelegen, daher Nachts auch etwas lauter. Die Wohnung war sehr aufgeräumt und absolut sauber.

Generally the apartment worked very well for out three night stay in Barcelona. There are great restaurants within easy walking distance. La Rambla is also a short walk away. Our only caution: the dance club across the street was annoyingly loud Sunday night to 4:00 AM. Weekend noise can be a serious issue. All other aspects worked very well. We would return as we loved the neighborhood
最初の日だけでしたがﾎｽﾄが説明に来てくれました｡快適に生活できました｡  街歩きに大変便利な場所です｡

The flat was exactly as described, directly in the city center and very well kept. The flat was very modern and was complete with every ammenity we needed including guide books. Would definitely recommend to friends.

Nos gustó mucho el piso, está céntrico y bien conectado con el metro, autobuses o para ir paseando a la zona centro de Barcelona. Está muy bien cuidado y tiene lo imprescindible para pasar unos días.
El lugar me pareció bastante seguro.

We had a great experience with this apartment in the central of Barcelona. Oriol was easy and pleasant to communicate with. The apartment was well-decorated, comfortable and had all the amenities and appliances that we could have possibly wanted. The balconies were great to hang out on during the day. The lift in the building was nice to have for luggage and long days of walking. This was a great experience and we would stay here again!
Nous avons reçu des messages réguliers de notre hôte, nous permettant de sécuriser notre arrivee

My husband and I had a wonderful stay in the apartment! We were able to check in early (Oriol actually met us to make sure we had everything we needed). The apartment is beautiful, clean, and comfortable. We had everything we needed for our stay. We especially appreciated the umbrellas, as it was a little rainy during our visit. The location was convenient and within walking distance to everywhere we wanted to go. I would definitely stay here again next time I'm in Barcelona and would highly recommend it to anyone else!

La description est conforme, l'appartement est parfaitement situé.
Les commerces aux alentours sont très pratiques, particulièrement la boulangerie juste au pied l'immeuble ou les croissants sont excellents.

Great place, great location, clean, large apartment with large windows that open, easy to get into without waiting for someone to meet you. Right next to the subway. One of our favorite places so far!
Really nice ! We loved it!

Very nice and convenient place to stay,  very near to all the important places to see in Barcelona. Apartment is equipped with all the necessary things to make the stay comfortable.  Would strongly recommend this place

El piso está muy bien situado, cumplió con todo lo que describía en la página 
La llegada fue sencilla, todo lo tienen muy organizado y no ves a ninguna persona en todo el proceso de entrada y salida
Quizá eche de menos lo que he experimentado e otras estancias como la cercanía del anfitrión .
Es un sitio ideal para una ciudad como Barcelona

Very clean and neat place in the heart of Barcelona. Close to everything with an innumerable amount of sights to see within walking distance. Provided with a printout of places to see and clear departing instructions. Owner was very helpful and responded immediately to all questions. Will definitely stay here next time in Barcelona!

Such a great flat and in a brilliant location. it was so easy to check in and we had two sets of keys so we could easily explore the city together or independently. I went with three friends and the four of us fitted comfortably in the flat, it was a bit cosy but really great with a double bed, a sofa bed and a single fold out chair-bed which was really comfy. 

Would definitely stay here again.
Amazing stay! Everything just as you see in the pictures ! They where very helpfull and nice ! Thank you!!
Lovely little apartment

Die Vermieter waren sehr freundlich und haben uns ständig mit Informationen zur Anreise, der Lage, einer Karte der öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel, etc. versorgt. Außerdem waren sie rund um die Uhr erreichbar.
Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und super geeignet um die Stadt zu erkunden. Der Place Catalunya ist 5 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. 
Wir waren zu viert und die Größe der Wohnung war für drei Nächte gut geeignet. Es war sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Handtücher und Bettwäsche war vorhanden. Das WLAN funktionierte einwandfrei. 
Den Lärm der Straße hört man im 4. Stock leider sehr deutlich, ebenso die Partygäste des gegenüberliegenden Clubs. Wenn man einen leichten Schlaf hat sollte man Ohropax mitnehmen.

Super séjour à Barcelone
L'appartement est très bien situé c'était très pratique. La remise des clefs était très pratique! Les infos étaient claires...
Merci pour ce séjour...
Par contre le matelas du clic clac était très inconfortable. 
Bruyant le soir (car nous étions sur une rue principale je pense)

My husband and I stayed here in late June 2016. This apartment adequately satisfied our needs and the location can't be beat. Clean, good sized apartment for us. The shower has good water pressure and gets hot quickly. The space is also QUIET, which surprised me, given we're close to a street. This is due to good window coverings -- once the windows/doors were closed, we couldn't hear the outside. And it's air-conditioned, so we didn't need to leave them open, which we appreciated. The shutters on the windows also keep the room DARK -- so much so, that we had to crack the shutters open a little bit or we would have slept til noon! The bed is a double (important to note for us Americans..), and the mattress was firm, which I liked because I have back issues. Towels were decent size and quality, but no washcloth. Would rent this apartment again!

Perfect apartment close to Plaza Catalunya. We had an absolutely grand time staying at this apartment.  The apartment is very clean, well furnished and easily accessible to most major tourist spots. The metro line is a few steps away and tons of restaurants nearby. Our host was easy to contact and she made sure we had everything we needed.  Would love to stay again in the future.  Thank you Claudia for all your help:)

Lovely apartment right in the centre of town. We could walk to everywhere that we wanted to see, and the apartment was situated right next to a metro station so travel was not a problem. The hosts were helpful upon arrival and told us everything we needed to know. We had a very pleasant stay, however after the first night we received a message from the host saying that the CCTV cameras had caught us throwing a party and making too much noise which we definitely didn't do, and that certainly affected our enjoyment of the holiday. (There are also eight pieces missing in the Micky Mouse jigsaw).
Buona e puntuale l' accoglienza! Appartamento situato in zona centrale e comoda!

Wow what a gem. I don't want to leave such a great review because I want to keep this place all to myself. Oriol was very communicative before we arrived and the place was beautifully set up for us. I loved the location of the apartment as it was very convenient to everything. The washer/dryer were a nice luxury after we had been travelling for a week when we arrived, and the rooms and bathroom were spacious. The unit is located near the top of the building, but there is a lift that can take 1-2 people up depending on weight. We were barely in the apartment as we spent most of our time in the city, but I would highly recommend this place to anyone. Thank you!!
We had a lovely stay and enjoyed our flat. It was easy to get everywhere we wanted to go from there and it is close to great restaurants, etc.
Wonderful apartment with perfect location in Barcelona. Good communication with landlord who always replied fast. Would definitely stay here in the future!

The apartment was very clean and looked exactly the same as the photo. Very convenient location, only 3 mins walk to bus station which has direct bus to airport, and place de catalunya. Metro station is just downstairs. Koni always responded fast and she was very helpfully! Definitely recommended!

Appartement très bien situé (central et à proximité du métro), propre et agréable : une très bonne expérience pour notre voyage en famille, mis à part une mauvaise isolation des bruyants voisins du dessus apparement venus pour faire la fête !...

A gorgeous apartment that feels very safe and secure. Very clean with everything you could need for a short break. We had a wonderful trip to Barcelona and would definitely recommend this apartment. Oriol provided all the information for a smooth arrival and was very helpful throughout the stay. We will be back!
A pesar que nunca nos vimos, todo fluyó super bien, Siempre contestaron mis mensajes con prontitud. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, a una cuadra de la Plaza de Cataluña. Tal cual descrito.
amazing, light, and airy apartment in Barcelona! clean, organized, and an awesome host!! couldn't ask for better!!!
Good location, just by Plaza Urquinaoa. There's a 24h supermarket at the other side of street. We can find whatever we want.

The location is perfect and within walking distance to most things. The place is perfect for Four people, nice and clean. Easy end very helpfull communication. We would recommend this place to anyone visiting Barcelona. Next time i visit Barcelona i will stay here again.

L'appartement est très bien situé et proche de toutes commodités et attractions. On a adoré la propreté et la décoration ! On s'y sent chez soit. L'hôte à fait tout pour faciliter notre séjour. Je recommande !

3일숙박했는데, 위치가 람브라스거리애서 걸어서 10-15분이여서
왔다갔다 하기에는 좋았어요~ 집도 깨끗하고 호스트와 연락도 잘되는 편이였습니다.
다만 도착했을때 밤이었는데, 엘레베이터 고장나서 4층까지 짐들고 힘들게 갔어요. 고쳐준다고 연락받았고 숙박동안 문제 없이 잘 다니다가 또 체크아웃할때 엘레베이터가 고장나서 짐 옮길때마다 고생했네요. 호스트가 미안하다고 타월 한번 교체해줬어요~
지하철역이 바로 앞이라 이동하기 편했어요~

Good location, easy to get to subway, well organized, clean~
This is a lovely apartment in a great location! We walked everywhere we needed to go. The hosts were very organised and responsive, we had everything we needed.
The place was great and in conveniently located. Communication was easy which made checkin easy. Only drawback during our stay was the washing machine was not functioning.

No he tenido un contacto directo con el anfitrión, ya que se maneja con un sistema de autogestión  del checkin (portero eléctrico de ingreso y retiro de llaves con claves ),  no obstante las consultas que efectuamos por mensajes fueron contestadas inmediatamente, por lo que no hubo inconvenientes.
El departamento se corresponde con el aviso y fotos publicadas. Es muy limpio, moderno y con todo el equipamiento necesario para una buena estadía.
La ubicación es muy buena ya que está cerca de los principales lugares de interés y con todos los medios de transporte a mano. Si bien es una zona de mucho movimiento eso no se notaba en el departamento lo que permitía un buen descanso.

Oriol made sure we were able successfully check into the apartment and verified with us if anything was missing from the apartment. Unfortunately the laundry machine door was broken, but the laundry machine was still perfectly functional. Oriol provided pictures on how to open the laundry machine door, but if you can't figure it out, there are plenty of youtube videos that teaches how to open a broken laundry machine door. 

The apartment is located in a very convenient location. it is only a few meters away from the exit of the metro, a few blocks away from Passeig de Gracia, and a few minutes walk to the A1 and A2 buses that take you to and from the airport. The apartment faces the street which is very noisy, but to my surprise the windows block out the noise extremely well. I am very sensitive to noise when I sleep, and I didn't have any trouble sleeping at night. The apartment is beautiful, clean, and spacious which made our stay very comfortable.

Highly recommended!

Ubicación perfecta! A dos cuadras de la plaza catalunia, ramblas y parada del aerobus. El apartamento es tal cual como se muestra en las fotos. Oriol tuvo en todo momento una excelente comunicación y disposición. Sin duda un lugar para repetir!!
Our stay in Barcelona was truly memorable and the apartment was a great central place to stay. Would recommend this place!
Everything about this home was great. Would recommend.
Adoramos o ape, super bem localizado, com metro e padaria do lado. Foi tudo muito bem organizado e passamos a nossa estadia com total tranquilidade.

Sicuramente 5 stelle con lode per la posizione. Praticamente vai a piedi quasi ovunque, la metro è sotto il palazzo ed hai bar e market h24. Ottima l'assistenza ma non il massimo i letti che sono un po' scomodi.

Brilliant location - everything is walkable and very central. Check was really easy, all communication through (Hidden by Airbnb) . Only slight complaint is think bedding could be updated as a bit worn.

Fantastic location. Easy to walk everywhere and the subway is at the corner of the street. This is a really lovely area, lots of coffee shops and fab restaurants within walking distance. The apartment had everything in it we needed, looks exactly as it does in the pictures. Our only complaints were that the bed linen did not appear overly clean and the bathroom had a smell of damp, hoping this gets sorted as otherwise a great spot!!
Our host Oriol was wonderful! Extremely kind and courteous Oriol promptly answered all our questions right away! The apartment is lovely, very clean and centrally located... it was a great stay!

The location of this apartment was really fantastic! The directions for check-in were clear and concise which made it easy to find and get into the apartment. The metro stop was located just around the corner which was super helpful in getting across the city, but was within walking distance to corte ingles and other convenience shops. 

One of my complaints would be that the noise from the street was louder than expected as there is a nightclub across the street. Additionally, the couches had some dust and hair on the surface, but was easy enough to wipe off. One other thing was we found spots on the sheets so wondered if these had been changed from the previous stay. 

Overall the apartment was nice and the pictures will give you and idea of the layout, however the apartment has wear and tear on it, such as scratches on the walls from suitcases/travelers, the pillows were a little flat (for my liking) and the light switches for the lamps were finicky. I would suggest thing apartment if you are looking for a great location and don't mind some street noise! 

Had a great stay in Barcelona!
Great location and great place just as described.

The flat is in an amazing location and is very easy to get into. We did not love the bed/bedding and felt it smelled damp and tired. Also the pull-out bed from the couch was particularly bad (I know pull-out beds are usually uncomfortable but this one felt worse than sleeping on the floor). The bathroom was good and we didn't use the kitchen.

I think if they do something about the bedding it is an awesome place to stay but otherwise I cannot recommend it.

The apartment was located close to Plaza Cataluna and supermarket. I think that was a good part of this flat. The washing machine was out of order and we had to wait until Claudia showed us the other machine to wash. Flushing button is fallen apart from the wall and the basin was leaking and I found the bathroom floor was wet when i woke up in the middle of the night. Although the leaking basin was fixed on the same day I reported. The wifi was very slow and most of time it got disconnected which was quite annoying. The kitchen utensils were quite old, especially the chopping board and sofa bed was really uncomfortable. I mistakenly booked two nights instead of three nights but I am quite glad to move to the hotel.

La casa está muy céntrica. Estaba limpia y cuidada. La comunicación de normal era rápida y pudimos dejar las maletas un rato más ya que nuestro tren salía tarde. 
Se la recomendaría a cualquiera ya que no hay ningún problema y todo es como dicen.

This was a great place for a weekend gateway with friends! It was very close to major attractions - walking distance of 20-30 minutes. It was nice, clean, and comfortable for 4 people. The host was very accommodating and easy to communicate with- making the entire experience very easy and enjoyable! If i'm ever in Barcelona again, I would definitely try to stay at PisoKoni's place :)

Very central location, close to everything ( museums, touristic places, bar, restaurant cafe...). The flat is very clean with everything you need. It felt very nice to come back home to a welcoming flat after a long busy day. 
The flat is great but, being so central, it also have few downside. The main road is quite busy so the windows have to be kept shut at all time. The flat is opposite a nightclub that, as we discovered, shuts at 6am on Saturday and Sunday morning.  It might be a good news if you are in Barcelona to go out late but could also be something you like to know before booking. We didn't mind to much but were wondering what this crowdy noise was the first time we heard it.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Le logement est parfaitement situé, l immeuble tres beau et agreable. L'appartement est en tres bon etat et propre. Seul petit bemol, la literie d'appoint.
事前にﾒｰﾙで詳しくﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの仕方を説明してくれて､わかりやすかったです｡24時間ｽｰﾊﾟｰと駅が近くとても便利でした｡

L'appartamento è ben attrezzato e confortevole, molto luminoso, in posizione centrale, facile da raggiungere con i mezzi sia dall'aeroporto che dai luoghi da visitare e piacevole da ritrovare dopo aver camminato tutta la giornata

Muy buen servicio y comunicación. La ubicación es perfecta para un viaje de vacación con familia, cerca de puntos históricos importantes de la ciudad, tiendas, restaurantes, etc. Bonita zona, fácil acceso. Altamente recomendable
Lovely place with everything near by and the host is so lovely and very approachable and always ready to help. Will come back here for sure

Very good location 
Dirty bed sheets on the sofa bed 
Uncomfortable Sofa bed, has to be changed absolutely!!
Shower drain not working
Very noisy due the discothèque just in front of the apartment
Place was really central
Very nice and warm place, close to main attractions and public transport.
Un très bel appartement, très confortable en plein centre de Barcelone, le meilleur emplacement pour visiter la ville. Tout confort, facile d'accès. Les enfants y sont bien. Un plaisir !
Piso muy bonito, bien equipado, céntrico, cerca de zonas turísticas del barrio de Born y Gotico.

Très bon séjours dans cet appartement très bien situé.
Beaucoup de contact par message et tout était préparé pour notre arrivée.
Je recommande cet appartement !
Emplacement idéal!

Io e 4 amici abbiamo appena trascorso un week end spettacolare a Barcellona. L' appartamento è davvero perfetto!si trova a soli 5 minuti a piedi da Placa Catalunya, comodo per la metro e fermate autobus. È arredato con ottimo gusto, pulito e accogliente. Le indicazioni di Claudia sono state chiare e  precise!Disponibile per qualsiasi necessità!assolutamente consigliato!
The place is situated in a lovely area with lots of Cafes nd wonderful streets. There was always useful advice from PisosKoni nd we definitely would return at any chance
Très bon rapport qualité prix. Emplacement central à proximité de la rambla. Bâtiment propre et appartement en excellent état
El piso está fenomenal, limpio y (Website hidden by Airbnb) ubicación excelente.

PisosKoni provided us a real cosy house also we haven't seen each other. It is very convenient to use the key box. The location is really good. We can walk to every place that we want to visit in 15 minutes. And the room is quite tiny. It is so comfortable living here.

Très bon emplacement; appartement propre et confortable.
Attention en revanche, il ne s'agit pas d'un appartement d'un particulier mais d'un appart hotel.
Super séjour à Barcelone! Un très bel appartement, très confortable et en plein centre de Barcelone. On a adoré la propreté et la décoration. Je recommande ce logement!

Lovely and clean flat, very close to the tube and central areas. 
Communication was excellent, important information (how to find flat and enter etc) was given before our arrival, during our stay hosts were available 24/7 for any needs. 
Highly recommended :)
So lovely and beautiful the apartment is, and the host is very kind and friendly. Definitely worth recommending to friends.

Easy check-in procedure and everything ready in the place. Location is very close to restaurants and public transportation. Bedding could be improved (not enough pillows and felt somewhat skimpy). Otherwise great place and perfect for our trip!

The flat was very nicely decorated, very clean as well. No water or toiletries provided, and granted, its not their obligation but its the little things, especially coming from other airbnbs where hosts make a "connection". This felt a lot more business. Nothing wrong with that though.

The location is very good and central. Very close to La Rambla and several attractions. They left some information about tours. I did not get to meet anybody as the key was in a lock box.

The only down thing was the bed and pillows. They are below standard and they felt like they have been used for over 10 years. For such great taste in decorations and furniture, I would advice to invest in something better.

It was so bad that I slept both nights in the sofa bed and felt much better.

Other than that a great stay.
Die Lage ist perfekt, dadurch leider auch etwas laut. Es hat uns aber auf jeden Fall sehr gut gefallen.

Great apartment in fantastic location! This apartment is in such a great spot! Just minutes from placa Catalunya or Barcelona Nord for arrival/departure ease. Metro lines right there too. The location makes everything easily walkable. The people running this spot have made check in super easy! This would be an ideal spot for longer visits as well as so much room. Very clean & comfy, I had great sleeps in the bed. If noise sensitive then ear plugs are a good idea as in pretty much anywhere in city. I def recommend this place!

Appartement conforme aux photos, très propre, super bien placé nous avons tout fait à pied,mais quelques nuisances sonores de nuit dues à la rue et aux voisins de dessus.(Nous habitons à la campagne!)
Great place and great host in a fantastic location!
Alles Bestens :))
非常棒的住宿点,就在市中心, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都很方便｡机场大巴到酒店,只需步行4到5分钟｡感谢｡

We LOVED this apartment.  It was actually nicer than we expected.  It was like brand new.  It was very clean, well kept, and equipped.  The location was great; only a short walk to everything we wanted to see.  The building was only a few steps from green space where we could take our dog to go potty.

The only issue was that the holder for the hand shower was broken, so we had to hold the hand shower to take a shower.  Hopefully, that is a minor issue that will be fixed soon.

Otherwise, this apartment was PERFECT.
까탈루냐광장에서 가까워 쇼핑을 하거나 지칠때 집에 다녀가기 편했고, 가격대비 시설이나 청결도 등 모든면에서 만족했다. 엘리베이터도 있어서 캐리어 운반하기에도 최적임. 호스트의 친절도는 말할필요도 없이 최고
PisosKoni's apartment is in a good location for exploring the city. Walkable to most locations and very close to public transportation. Cafe's, restaurants, bars and shopping are all just steps away.

We had a wonderful stay at PisosKoni's apartment. The location was great, it was easy to check in, and communication was clear. Stellar host. We enjoyed Barcelona very much and we look forward to visiting again soon!

Really nice place. Everything was as described. You can reach a lot of places on foot or use Metro right on corner. I definitely recommend this accomodation to everyone a will stay here again once I am in Barcelona in the future.
The flat was the perfect size for 2 people and in a great location. She was very accommodating and helpful with our requests. The flat was also very clean and neat. Highly recommended.
Very easy check in and check out, clean and central apartment

O apartamento é muito bom. Fica bem no centro, muito fácil de achar. Pegamos o AeroBus do aeroporto e descemos na Praça Catalunha. Caminhamos uma quadra com as malas e pronto. Prédio seguro, próximo aos locais turísticos. Próximo à linha turismo (indicada), pois você compra um bilhete, pode passear pelas várias rotas.

Location, location, location and comfortable.  We only stayed 2 nights but would have no problem staying 2 months.  Apartment was just as advertised.  Great communication and easy to access.  10 star experience.
Un apartamento muy cómodo, es lo que muestra y súper bien ubicado.
Bel appartement au centre Ville. Spacieux..
Apartamento simplemente hermoso confortable y al alcance de todos los lugares turísticos !!!
很好,交通方便,机场A1直达,门口就是地铁,各大景点步行到达｡房间也很干净漂亮,功能齐全,出门就是面包店,对面就是24h超市,房东人也很好,沟通及时
Alles war SUPER !!! Außer die Diskothek auf der anderen Straßenseite, war nachts etwas laut.

This apartment really was the perfect location! Walkable distance to so many places. Perfect location to go off and explore on foot! The hosts were attentive to our needs, checking we were okay. There is a supermarket across the street but if you walk down towards arc we triumphe, there is a local supermarket which is cheaper (less than 5 min walk). There were no surprises either, the apartment is exactly how it is featured. There is a bar next door which was great for us but no disturbances. Yes there is a club across the street but it didnt phase us at all. We would definitely come back and stay here again.
Nice and clean. Very quiet place. Great place for a stay in Barcelona. Walking distance to everything and easy commute to airport. Would reccomend.
I
Excelente! El departamento es muy lindo y limpio, bien situado. Los dueños son muy amables y nos ayudaron a tener un precio mas economico para el parqueo.

Super place. Location couldn't be better. Host is totally on top of the communication and very proactive. If I only had to flag something slightly more negative, I would say that it's not the largest apartment and that for 2 adults and 2 kids, it's already borderline. The pull out couches are not the most comfortable but the master bed is fine. But if that is fine with you, you really can't go wrong with this place.
Très bel appartement bien placé et proche du métro. Je le recommande.
Appartement très bien placé, idéal pour une famille souhaitant découvrir Barcelone

Piso's apartment was beautiful! It was very homey and comfortable! It was really centrally located and easy to get to places. Communication with the host was great and I really enjoyed staying there! Definitely book here if you want somewhere that's close to shopping, restaurants, etc.
Ich empfehle mich Ihnen diese Air B&B, weil dieses Haus super schön ist. Host ist nett unf freundlich.
Great location and great communication - made everything easy for us.
Thank you! Lovely apartment, even better than the photos. Great central location, highly recommended !
Very recommend! Apartment is very clean, decorated stylish. It's very good situated, 3-5 minutes from Plaza Catalunya. Koni was very helpful! Thank you, dear!

Great location right near plaza catalunya where the bus from the airport goes. Walking distance to all the main sights and close to many good restaurants. Apartment was spacious for 2 people and had no issues with check in or out. We even we able to check in early. Would highly recommend!
In the heart of the city.

I didn't end up being able to stay at Koni's place because of getting sick. However, I want to say that Koni was very helpful throughout the preparation process. She kept good communication with us. Hopefully next time we can actually stay at her place!

We found the location of the apartment ideal as we had only one night in Barcelona between flights and it was so easy to get to and from the airport. It was also a great location for an ideal last night at in Spain. The neighbourhood has so many great bars restaurants and cafes. We just wished for longer to spend. The apartment is very well appointed with all you could need and we found it very comfortable. 
Our host was very helpful with clear instructions on finding and accessing the apartment. I would recommend

La comunicación fue buena y fluida, los anfitriones muy atentos; el piso es tal cual las fotos; excelente ubicación, piso tranquilo, sin ruidos del exterior.
Muy buena estadía! Sin duda recomendaría el lugar.

the location is super great. located in the center of barcelona. and overally clean and modern flat. satisfied with it. but chair cushion was dirty and its unpleasing to sit on it. and washing machine was out of work. not knowing that, i ran the machine and went out. the water leaked out even under floor, and some of my thing on the floor got wet. unhappy situation. but the host was kind, and she tried to solve the problem as soon as she could do.
El piso hermoso, perfecta ubicación, Koni excelente!! Volvería sin dudas!!!

Realmente un departamento excelente por su ubicacion y su calidad y veracidad con las fotos publicadas
Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una estancia comoda y agradable en Barcelona 
Cocina muy bien equipada dormitorio y resto de las dependencias excelentes
Totalmente recomendable!! Gracias Claudia y Oriol!!

Magnifique appartement idéalement placé: métro, shopping, market, lieux culturels. Top idéal pour quelques jours à Barcelone. Les parapluies accrochés au portemanteau sont une attention agréable ! 
Le tout petit bémol, c’est le bruit de la rue à toute heure car rue très passante, mais on est en ville, alors si on ne supporte pas on reste à la campagne. Mais là clim permet de fermer les fenêtres! 
À recommander !

We loved our stay here. It was a great location and easy to find from the Subway station after we flew into Barcelona. The host provided us with great instructions also.

I'd come back here again!
Super locatie en heerlijk plekje. Absolute aanrader!
Excelente ubicación, muy buena comunicación con  los que manejan el lugar. Ideal para tres personas. 100% recomendable

位置很好,交通便利!地铁就在家门口｡而且步行5分钟就到中国城,如果你与我一样有个中国胃,那么我强力推荐你住这里,而且房东人很好!
Highly recommend!!!

Super localisation. Super appartement. Cosy et agréable. 

Je le recommande

The apartment is very central; an easy walk to tourist hot spots, great food, public transport and convenience stores. It was clean and cosy, with all the amenities we needed, including a washing machine and detergent, which was greatly appreciated. The hosts were helpful and communicative, and checked in with us regularly to see whether we needed anything. They gave us tips about how to get to and from the airport, and maps and directions for the official luggage lockers for our last day (as we had a long gap between check out and our flight). Check in was extremely easy too, as the hosts sent us helpful photos to guide us through the process.
Very central to attractions, nightlife, and good restaurants.
Emplacement idéal au centre de la ville , avenue un peu bruyante la nuit

Very nice place, excellent location, easy and quick communication with Koni ! Great place to enjoy Barcelona.
It’s noisy indeed but it’s indicated in all comments so no surprise.
The apartment can be a bit cold so the reversible AC and the heater in the bedroom are very useful. 
The kitchen has all appliances, the bathroom as well (except shower gel but no big deal)
I highly recommend it !!
Thanks again Koni !
Great location and clean apartment in elevator building. Koni was responsive and helpful during our short stay. Thanks!
Very clean and spacious apartment. And. prompt reply as well. Thank you!

Oriol is a very great host, replying things very quickly and being really nice. The house is perfect. My parents and I had a great staying. It is clean and well-equipped with almost everything we need. It is also located in a very convenient place, close to transport. And walking distance to some tourist attractions and shopping stores. Definitely recommend!

My stay at the apartment was wonderful. It was in a perfect location, there were many places within walking distance. Koni was good at communicating and with responses. I would definitely stay again when I am in Barcelona.

This apartment was fantastic! The location was incredible. We walked almost everywhere and found plenty of great restaurants and shopping nearby. It was very clean and fully stocked with towels and essentials. The extra sofa bed was also nicely made up when we arrived! There was a little noise from the street but I slept great after closing the shutters. I’d stay again in a heartbeat. Thanks!
位置非常好!就在加泰罗尼亚广场附近,交通购物吃饭都很方便!Koni非常友好!非常喜欢这个房子!推荐给大家
the club is opsite the building every night is noise

Location perfetta per ogni spostamento sia a piede che con i mezzi pubblici. Appartamento luminoso e nonostante il grande traffico sotto casa anche silenzioso grazie ai doppi vetri. Nessuna difficoltà all’arrivo e la proprietaria disponibile e puntuale ad ogni nostra richiesta. Anche il nostro piccolo bassotto e’ stato molto felice di poter stare qualche giorno con noi in questa meravigliosa città dove ci rechiamo spesso. Sicuramente ci torneremo!! Grazie Koni per tutto!!!
Great little space in an unbeatable location. Two blocks from Plaza Catalunya and has the Urkinaona metro stop 50 feet away.

Great central location. Easy access to public transport if you are planning destinations further away, otherwise easy to get anywhere by foot. There are 24/7 shops all around, even one on the other side of street. I recommend the bakery downstairs just next to the flat – really good with great coffee.

We never met the host in person but she was offering to assist in case we needed anything.

The flat itself looked like in the pictures but cleanliness could be improved. Bathroom showed signs of dump and was “used” if you know what I mean. Floor wasn’t clean either – could not walk around without shoes. The bed matters was used and should be replaced. Flat advert mentioned that smoking is allowed but we couldn’t notice smell of cigarettes which was good.
La ubicación del depto de koni es fantástica! Muy atento a los detalles, la verdad nos gustó mucho nuestra estadía ahí. Nos gustaría volver!
The appartment is really comfortable with a really good location. It was really perfect for the two days we stayed in Barcelona.
The place was in the perfect location. I would definitely book here again if I were to return to Barcelona!
Would highly recommend this place, was so comfortable and homely and in a brilliant location!
Perfect localisation!! 5min from plaza catalunya! It as clean and quiet. We were 4 and it is juste perfect. Transport is really easy. I highly recommend it!!

We had a great time at Koni’s! The apartment was the perfect size for our weekend get away. The location was great as well. The sites and bus were very close. We rode the aerobus in from the airport and left our luggage at luggage locker on Sunday before flying out. Super convenient and close by. We also walked everywhere while staying in Barcelona. The host was always quick to respond as well. We were traveling with our 7 month old son and she had a crib and high chair for him to use. Thank you Koni for a great stay!

Koni’s place is extremely central to all Barcelona points of interest. The metro station is across the street (Uriquiaona/L4 line is your stop), the flat is on the 4th floor offering a sunny view, sits above a cafe offering delicious pastries and coffees, and is within walking distance of a quite a few places. After walking the city all day, you’ll be surprised to realize how close the flat is; always felt like we were one stop away- and after a long day, you take the ride rather than walk back. 
We would definitely stay here again.

overall a good stay with great transport links, nice and clean, good area, lovely building and comfortable apartment.

the issues we had:
-noisy club people located opposite making noise at 4am at the weekends only
-sub par mattress with spring sticking out the sides
-poor quality and just 2 pillows

aside from the 2  issues which i believe are easy solvable we really enjoyed our stay and would gladly return once they have been rectified
A very nice apartment.

Koni responds to messages fast and the place was great! It was close to public transport which made it easy for us to get around the city. Some of the tourist spots are easily walkable. The place is also near restaurants, fast food chain and a 24 hr convenient store which was great! Would definitely stay in Koni’s place whenever I’m in Barcelona.
Excellent place. Particularly helpful with check in and bags.

Lovely apartment in a very nice location. Local cafes etc on same street and 24 hour shop came in handy. Not too close to Touristic areas but within walking distance to all. Apartment was clean and as discribed, would of been nice to have some extra clean towels for long weekend stay but wasn't a big issue. Great communication and details prior to arrival. Will recommend to others. Thanks again
Отличные апартаменты ,суперхозяева,чистота,расположение просто фантастическое-в самом центре,не шумно,все необходимое рядом!

The house was amazing, we loved it - all the decor, we had extra blankets, pillows; the kitchen had everything and the bathroom as well; and the cleaning was impeccable which I think is very important!
Very easy to find and to get around town, close to everything.
Always ready to help, very good host!
We recommend this house and when we come back we know where to stay again!
Great location
The apartment is ok condition and is much smaller than I expected. Very good location and friendly and flexible host

Hermoso piso en Barcelona. Cerca de todo. Silencioso a pesar de estar en una zona céntrica. El contacto con Oriol fue siempre inmediato. El acceso al piso por códigos en ambas puertas hacen que uno pueda llegar a cualquier hora sin pensar en que le está haciendo perder tiempo al anfitrión. Sólo le falta una lavadita de cara a las paredes del interior para estar igual a las fotos. Salvo eso todo perfecto. Volvería sin dudas.

Logement très bien placé dans le centre de Barcelone dans un super quartier.
La décoration est très sympa et les équipements convenables convient parfaitement pour voyager avec un bébé.
Petit bémol rue assez bruyante surtout le vendredi samedi (discothèque en face de l’appartement)
The perfect location to see Barcelona on foot. Centrally located between La Sagrada Familia and Barrio Gótico, it was a breeze to see all the sights.
The house is gorgeous in a central area from which you can reach all Famous places. It is great for a family, good space and very comfortable.
Great apartment in an amazing location. You cannot get closer to the city than this and Koni was great to deal with! Thank you.

Non ho avuto di conoscere Koni personalmente,ma la comunicazione tra di noi è stata veloce ed efficace. siamo stati li con un altra coppia di amici e un bimbo piccolo di 3 anni. gli spazi sono giusti. forse l'unica nota negativa,era la rumorosità di notte della strada e  dei locali, ma che i realtà era anche una nota positiva in quanto si era in pienissimo centro , a 4 minuti da placa de catalunya. l' appartamento era molto pulito e confortevole.. consiglio vivamente a tutti di soggiornarvi... SUGGESTED

This apartment was in the best location! close to everything central but not surrounded by tourists. I would say this is a great value and was a very clean and tidy apartment. Would definitely recommend to friends staying in Barcelona.
Ubicacion excelente parada de metro bajo. Tienda  24 horas enfrente. La casa genial muy comoda y limpia.
접근성이 무척 좋고 깨끗한 집인데 밤에 좀 시끄러운게 단점이에요. 창문을 좀 이중구조로하면 좋았을텐데.. 하지만 다른건 전부 두말할것없이 좋았습니다!

Muy buen lugar! Cerca de varios servicios como restaurantes, farmacias y bares, hay de todo en el lugar, y si te gusta caminar nosotros lo hicimos hasta las ramblas, sagrada familia incluso hasta la playa. Tiene todo lo necesario y es muy cómodo y acogedor, y Coni siempre atenta y respondiendo nuestras inquietudes. Lo recomiendo.
Toplocatie! Alle voorzieningen in appartement aanwezig! Supermarkt (24u open) rechtover app. Bakkerij en lekkere tapasbar naast app! Vlotte communicatie zowel voor als tijdens de reis! Aanrader!

This place is seriously one of my favorite Airbnbs. It was in the perfect location (placa catalunya, metro stop, and las ramblas). There was a grocery store and plenty of restaurants near by. The place itself is very spacious, clean and modern. It was an easy check in process as well. I studied abroad in Barcelona for the semester and this was the best way to end my stay. It is a block away from my favorite bar (George Payne) as well as a short walk from the Arc and the Sagrada. The host is very friendly and did his best to make us feel welcome. He provided accurate directions to the apartment and there were very nice touches (shampoo, soap, detergent, towels, etc) I HIGHLY recommend staying here.
El departamento es muy comodo y amplio para dos o mas personas. Esta situado en una zona que te permite acceder a diferentes lugares caminando o en metro. Lo recomiendo.

Le logement est bien placé et la communication facile. Mais nous avons été déçues du logement après avoir vu les photos du site airbnb. Quand nous sommes arrivées, deux lits d'appoint avaient été montés dans le salon, prenant tout l'espace, alors que nous pensions simplement déplier le canapé lit au moment de dormir. Il manquait la table basse, le tapis, les coussins sur le canapé. Les draps de la chambre étaient dépareillés et anciens. La poignée de la salle de bains était cassée. Il y avait des moutons de poussière dans le salon.  Enfin, le checkin devait se faire à 13h. A 14h30, les agents de nettoyage étaient encore en train de faire le ménage. Nous ne sommes revenues qu'en fin d'après-midi.
great location
It has been a nice stay in Koni's place. The home is very stylish and had all amenities for a comfortable stay. The location was good, close to city center.
Great apartment with a great location. Walking distance to restaurants and areas to explore the city. Apartment was equipped with all we needed ! We enjoyed our stay at Koni's place
Superbe appartement , très bien situé.
Apartment is functional and conveniently located

Appartement propre et super bien situé. Il y a tout l’équipement nécessaire. En plein centre et proche de tout. Super bon rapport qualité prix. 
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.  Je le recommande !

The appartment is very clean and tidy. Very well situated in the heart of Barcelona. 
I can fully recommend this appartment.

Excellent location, nice space. Was surprised that there was no hand soap - would have been a nice touch. Bed is not very comfortable, but you get what you pay for and for the low nightly price  this apt is a good value.
We didn’t spent much time in the apartment as we were always out and about. Close to major plaza and shopping areas. No more than 4 people. I would book again at this location, Highly recommended.
Wonderful flat, very close to everything and beautifully decorated!  We will stay again!
Very central, easy walking distance to everything! Very comfortable space

The location of the apartment is great, with good restaurants and cafes within close walking distance.   The size of the apartment and layout of beds is best suited for groups of 4 or less.  We had several text exchanges with the host and he was prompt to answer but his responses were not appropriate for our concerns.
Fantastic location, well managed apartment that was clean and easy.  Enjoyed my time there.

The apartment is really nice, we can find everything we need. And it’s so convenient for us to go shopping and visit the city. Both checkin and checkout is self-service,and the guidance in the apartment is very helpful.
Highly recommended!

My husband and I truly enjoyed our stay here. We could walk or access the metro to get wherever we wanted to go. There are so many great places to eat in the area and so much. To see and do. The apartment is in a safe spot and very comfortable.
Ubicación excelente

The location was outstanding. We were just a couple of blocks from the airport bus, steps from the old town, and with easy access to the Passeig de Gracia. This meant that we could get just about everywhere we wanted to go on foot. Apartment amenities were basic, but we had everything we needed. Communication and logistics were clear and easy to manage. Overall, just what we were looking for.
Great Location! Easy check in and check out! Highly recommend!
The apartment provided is very clean and comfortable, so that our family can enjoy a wonderful holiday just like living in our own home. We will come back again !
Very central place. Apartment has no many space, but for short visit of the city it is very good choise. Recommend!

This is the perfect place to explore Barcelona. Easy to access but totally secure in the heart of the city the apartment is super comfortable with everything you need .. loved opening the shutters to watch the street scenes below. Fantastic bakery next door.
Highly recommend this place
Piso es muy lindo y cómodo. Muy bien ubicado a 3 cuadras del inicio de la Rambla. Todo funcional y con estilo.
Location idéalement située près de la rambla ; commerces à proximité.

The apartment is in a fantastic location near Placa de Catalunya. Oriol and Claudia were always very quick to respond to questions and were helpful in providing suggestions. They have a great instruction booklet set up with pictures that makes it easy to figure things out in the apartment. The apartment is newer inside and clean. We enjoyed our stay. There is a great bakery/coffee shop called 365 next door which made for a cheap and easy breakfast and lunch.

Die Wohnung ist in einer super Lage um die Stadt zu erkunden. Das Apartment ist sehr schön eingerichtet und hat eine Klimaanlage! Wir waren mit fünf Erwachsenen im Apartment, wofür es zu klein ist. Es handelt sich um ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Doppelbett, sowie ein Wohnzimmer mit einer Schlafcouch, einem Schlafsessel und einem Klappbett. Für drei Personen ist es super geeignet. Solange die Fenster geschlossen sind, ist es sehr ruhig für eine Stadtwohnung. Da eine Klimaanlage enthalten ist, kann man auch gut bei geschlossenen Fenstern schlafen. Einziges Manko war der Duschkopf, der dringend mal erneuert werden sollte, sowie die Handtücher, die uns nicht so richtig frisch vorkamen. Die Kommunikation mit Oriol lief hervorragend und durch eine kleine Schlüsselbox an der Tür ist man auf keinen Zeitpunkt zum Treffen angewiesen. Mit weniger Personen, immer wieder gerne.

Very good location whilst still being quiet because with air con you can keep the windows closed. very clean, lots of towels and linens provided. We had our 16 month old with us and it was safe for her to explore the apartment and even some crayons provided. A great base for a few days in Barcelona.

Excelente apartamento, maravillosa ubicación!!!
Anfitriones muy atentos y cordiales. 
Sin duda, volveríamos a quedarnos en este apartamento!!!
Great location, close to major tourist areas. Perfect for our needs! Thanks again.
Hemos pasado una estancia muy agradable. Aconsejamos el piso a todos los que desean estar en el centro, a proximidad de los lugares turísticos, bar y restaurantes.
Oriol’s place was really easy to get to an very convenient. It was spacious and clean. We had a great time walking around the gothic quarter.

Oriol's place is an excellent place to stay if visiting Barcelona. The location is right in the centre and can't be beat. Despite being central there is no road noise with the windows closed. The airconditioning is excellent and means this is possible in the heat of summer. The apartment is small, but even with two extra beds in the living room there was plenty of room for 4 adults. Oriol's wasn't there for check in but his instructions were super clear so we didn't have any issues. The kitchen is sufficent for preparing light meals. Wifi is good and easy to log on to. There was some noise from the neighbors as expected in an apartment block but this stopped at a reasonable hour. All in all are great airbnb, I would be happy to stay again.
Nuestra estadia en Barcelona fue muy agradable, el departamento lindo y muy limpio, gracias, y guardo la direccion para mi familia y amigos, ya sabemos donde volver a hospedarnos sin ninguna duda
Great appartment in Barcelona, with lot of shops, restaurants and things to see closeby. Not disappointed!

We stayed 2 nights and enjoyed it. the apartment is in an excellent location, walking distance to everything and especially the bus to and from airport. The apartment is also spacious and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this place.
公寓就在加泰罗尼亚广场附近,去到名品街和市区的景点都很方便｡楼下就有地铁和公车,公车可以直达海边｡挺精致的小公寓,打扫的很干净,出入都有门禁,很安全~不过希望房主还是提前把被子准备好,就不用我们再找被子了｡
