Good location, metro, buses, cafes, and bars nearby.  Nice walk to the Gaudi apartments and old town.
This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona. Overall, this is good option, but the place is pretty basic.

Thank you Koni for a great stay in Barcelona! The central location of your place is ideal for exploring the city, it was perfectly clean, nicely decorated and the instructions on how to use everything in the apartment were very helpful. Self check in is so convenient as well!

Fantastic option for staying in central Barcelona.  As well as being a very clean and simple apartment, there are two advantages relative to others: very efficient air conditioning, and great double glazing meaning the apartment is both cool and quiet.  Good night's sleep guaranteed!
Cute apartment in a very convenient place to explore Barcelona from. Enjoyed a festival with food trucks along the park nearby!!
Overall, we had a very good experience. The place was very clean, and the location was great. We would definitely stay here again.

This was a nice place and great location in Barcelona- very close to everything. We appreciated the elevator, easy check-in and stylishly cute apartment. Nice bathroom and kitchen. Private bedroom was nice. The bed was a little too firm for our liking and pillows very small. Street noise was distracting for sleeping, but luckily there was a fan to plug in for white noise. Communication was extremely minimal with host/owner and felt very impersonal. I felt it was maybe slightly overpriced.
Great location. Close to the attentions. Lots of restaurants nearby.

The location was great! Apartment was clean and looked exactly like the pictures. The hairdryer and shampoo and soap in the bathroom were a nice touch. I do wish there was hand soap in the bathroom though, since this is often something you don’t travel with. Thanks for a great stay in Barcelona, Koni!

Checking in was easy and the location of this place is SUPER PRIME. It’s literally nearby a popular neighborhood El Born, and in between the center point of everywhere you should be, Passeig de Gràcia, etc. This is my second time in Barcelona so I really loved the location. Another plus is how secure this place is, equipped with cameras in the lobby and the apartment door has a triple door bolt lock. The apartment itself is very standard and equips just good enough for what you need. Only complaint was how thin and cheap the pillows were, as well as blankets were (felt thin as a towel) and the actual bath towels were also very thin and rough. Also wish there was actual hand soap in the bathroom... I had to take the dish soap from the kitchen to move to the bathroom to use as hand soap.
Excelente ubicación muy cerca de metro urquinaona, caminando se llega a todo. Sólo incluiría mas limpieza y detalles de parte del anfitrión hacia su huéspedes.

The location was GREAT.  Very central to many sites and attractions.  Close to public transportation and Plaça de Catalunya.  We were a little concerned about noise but other than the first Friday night (minimal noise), it was very quiet.

If this is your first time, or tenth time in Barcelona, I highly recommend Koni's place. it was centrally located to all major sights and very close to a metro stop for those further away. Koni was very responsive to any questions we had and made sure everything was perfect. The apartment was  very tidy and cute! They had a lot of appliances and items that might make your stay a little more comfortable! I highly recommend.
Good location to stay in Barcelona

Das Apartment von Koni ist sehr zentral gelegen und ideal um Barcelona zu erkunden. Die Metro sowie ein 24 Stunden Shop ist in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Wir haben zu dritt 3 Nächte dort verbracht und die Größe dafür ist passend. 
Der Check -In mit Schlüsselcode hat ohne Probleme funktioniert. 
Das Apartment ist sauber und alles Notwendige ist vorhanden.
Die Mikrowelle war nicht funktionstüchtig (sofern wir nichts falsch gemacht haben ;)
Auf alle Fälle würden wir das Apartment empfehlen und wieder kommen!
Convenient location and nice room
Koni is a superhost easy to communicate with. The apartment is supernice with perfect location. Highly recommended. Thank you Koni.

Everything was perfect, clean and confortable. The apartment is only 5 minutes away from La Rambla, 1 minute away from train station. A big plus is the elevator, for lazy people like me  
I highly recommend it!!!
Would highly recommend. Host is very communicative and the apartment was very beautiful and very clean. Location was great.
Koni's place is very nice and comfortable. The location is perfect for exploring Barcelona and his communication is excellent. Highly recommended.

La ubicación excelente, al lado del centro plaza Cataluña y parada urquinaona abajo. El apto espacioso y correcto. El colchón un poco incómodo y algo pequeña la cama d matrimonio (1,35). Sartenes y toallas muy viejas. El resto ok y cómodo todo, tb atención del anfitrión en todo momento.
Perfect location, nice style, towels didnt smell well, bed not very comfortable and small for two people.
The apartment location is fabulous . Near plaza Catalunya, the metro, nice restaurants. We have enjoyed a lot our staying .

Nous n'avions pas de chauffage il faisait froid dans l'appartement. Nous étions deux le lit était petit. il n'y avait pas de couverture pour la personne qui dormait dans le salon.  Pas possibilité de prendre un café à notre arrivée. Si non Koni était très réactif à la demande de réservation. L'appartement est très bien situé. Je recommande cet appartement.

Great place! The apartment is incredible and clean, the location is amazing—so central, and the host is extremely accommodating and communicative and helpful! I will definitely stay here again in the future!
Koni's has a very nice apartment in a very good location. In addition, Koni was an excellent host.
Oriol was a great host. Great location,  nice and clean apartment, big enough for us 3 adults and 2kids. There was everything we needed and it was just perfect! Thank you very much!
Oriol was a great host and very responsive. This is a great option for those looking to stay in Barcelona. Great location and very clean place.

Koni's apartment is in one of the best locations to walking anywhere in the city! It was a 5 min walk to Las Ramblas and many great restaurants.  The neighborhood is pretty quiet at night but you can hear some noise from neighbors so if you're a light sleeper, heads up! If you are looking for an apartment in one of the best locations in the city, then this is your place!

위치가 아주 훌륭합니다. 초역세권!이고 중심지라 이동하기 편했습니다. 따듯한물 잘나오고 체크인이 쉬워서 좋았습니다. 와이파이가 빠른편입니다.
다만 옆집? 윗집? 소리가 잘 들립니다. 방음 약한거 빼고는 좋습니다. 맽으리스가 조금 꼬졌는지 중간중간 꺼져있습니다.

Esta en el centro de Barcelona cerca del Catedral de Barcelona. En camino ay muchas tiendas de marca y restaurantes de todos tipos. También atrás del catedral esta en barrio gótico y mucho más. Este lugar fue perfecto si estás aquí por 2-5 días.
Great location, highly recommend for a mini break in Barcelona
Cute place, clean and good location. The host made the entire process easy.

Highly recommend this place!  It was charming and spotlessly clean.  The location was amazing (just a couple of blocks from Plaza de Catalunya, where the Aerobus dropped us from our trip into the city from the airport - only 5,90 Euros each).  Two Juliette balconies for looking down on the city street.  There was also a book of helpful information in the place, and the self-check-in was a breeze!
Easy check-in, clean flat and really good location.
非常方便的地理位置!机场A1直接到达广场,走大概5多分钟就到房子了,旁边就是地铁口,楼下有便利店和餐厅,有电梯,非常完美｡全程自助入住,入住流程非常详细和简单!另外推荐一家餐厅,ARUME｡从这里出发走路的话大概在10-15分钟吧~巴塞罗那是个很美丽的城市,圣家堂还没有完全竣工,下次一定还会再来的,这个房子是个不错的选择!
Absolutely central, steps away from the metro and really close to all attractions in Barcelona. The house is big enough for 3 or 4 and it even has a washing machine. Smooth check in and helpful host!
The flat is very well located. You can go by walk to many famous places around. We enjoyed the stay here.

name: Terrace Appartment
summary: Apartment in the top floor of a residence building with a front terrace and a back balcony.Located in a central zone of Porto it features easy, fast access to the city center: 13 minutes walking to the pedestrian zone  or 4'  to metro station   Apartamento no último andar de um prédio de habitação com um terraço para a frente e uma varanda nas traseiras. Localiza-se numa zona central: 13 minutos a pé  até à  zona pedonal da Baixa, 4 minutos a pé   até à estação de Metro (tempos da GMaps)
space: É possível guardar o carro na garagem do prédio. Parking in the building.
description: Apartment in the top floor of a residence building with a front terrace and a back balcony.Located in a central zone of Porto it features easy, fast access to the city center: 13 minutes walking to the pedestrian zone  or 4'  to metro station   Apartamento no último andar de um prédio de habitação com um terraço para a frente e uma varanda nas traseiras. Localiza-se numa zona central: 13 minutos a pé  até à  zona pedonal da Baixa, 4 minutos a pé   até à estação de Metro (tempos da GMaps) É possível guardar o carro na garagem do prédio. Parking in the building.
house_rules: - Não são permitidas festas ou eventos. - Não é permitido ruído das 21:30h às 9:30h

reviews.comments: The accommodation was much nicer than we had anticipated, too big for two people (and hence more expensive) but perfect for us because our grandchildren came round on several occasions.  It was clear that Alexandra had spent much effort (and money) to make the place really nice, but there were minor problems with the area (workshops at night and a noisy lift in the early morning) that might deter the very sensitive and light sleeper.  The beds were very comfortable and the shower room and (2) toilets immaculate

Alexandra was so friendly and helpful, she really made us feel very welcome! She went above and beyond to make us feel at home at her place. The apartment itself is beautiful, clean and a great space with everything you need. There is a gorgeous view of the city from the terrace. The city is easily accessible by metro or 30 mins walk. We had a great stay, thanks Alexandra!

Tivemos um excelente estadia! O apartamento é exactamente como está nas fotos. Todo o espaço está muito cuidado. A Alexandra foi uma excelente anfitriã, respondeu sempre muito rápidamente às mensagens e facilitou a nossa chegada ao apartamento. Recomendo!
Casa muito bem localizada, fui muito bem recebida e a Alexandra foi muito prestável. Recomendo a quem quer passar uma otima e agradável estadia no Porto.

The apartment had evrything we needed , it was nice to be able to sit out on the terrace at sunset .
Apartment was extremely clean 

Recycling facilities on the street are limited , and we were noit sure where to take recyclable items

Alexandra s'est montrée disponible (accueil à minuit) et très prévenante. Elle parle un français parfait ce qui est un plus. Elle partage ses bons plans (cafés, restaurants..) avec joie. 
L'appartement est clair, spacieux et agréable. La rénovation est soignée. 
Chacune des deux chambres dispose d'un lit double et de sa pièce d'eau : WC et lavabo pour l'une, salle d'eau et WC pour l'autre. Deux couchages supplémentaires (deux lits simples) sont installés dans le salon-salle à manger. 
La cuisine est moderne. Elle permet d'y préparer et d'y prendre ses repas à deux personnes. Pour davantage de convives, la terrasse nous tend les bras. Le tout est d'une propreté impeccable.
Deux points moins favorables : un ascenseur bruyant qui ne permet ni les endormissements sereins, ni les grasses matinées ; et un emplacement un peu excentré. Il faut compter une petite trentaine de minutes pour aller dans le centre à pied : prendre le métro, tout proche, dès que l'on peut, parce que ça monte au retour.
Le quartier est calme et plutôt résidentiel, en cours de réhabilitation.
Un mini-supermarché très économique (Dia) et un boulanger se trouvent à proximité.
Nous n'avons pas regretté notre choix!
Encore merci Alexandra.
Fantastic place to relax after exploring Porto - not one but two balconies and very nice furnishings too! Would highly recommend.

Excelente Apartamento no Porto. Espaço bem confortável, com ótimas instalações, banheiro e cozinha renovados e com ótimo aspecto. Ainda há um ótimo terraço para passar um tempo observando a v do bairro. A localização também é boa. Há uma pequena distância a pé do centro e servida por uma linha de metro. Recomendo. 5 estrelas!
Just a couple of stops on the Metro from the centre of everything. Very comfortable. Good communication. Alexandra was very easy to deal with.
El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario y una bonita terraza.

Spacious and beautiful flat with huge balcony and sun in the evening.
Very nice introducion from Alexandra to describe Porto.
Very helpful and fast in responsing.
Nice trip to Porto :) Thanks for that.

This apatment is vell located, near 100 m from metro station. Around this place you can find many shops for food, cafe etc. The rooms are very clean, good furniture inside, there are two toilet room that is very comfortable if you stay here with children or two or more pairs. Very large terrase and balcony are very useful if 3 or more people live in this apartment.  Friendly and sociable nature of the mistress of the house. Full satisfaction!
O apartamento é central. Próximo de restaurantes e de transportes públicos. Recomendo.

Casa bella pulita confortevole . La signora Alexandra disponibile e gentilissima come tutti i portoghesi che abbiamo incontrato. Consigliatissimo. 
Grazie di cuore per aver reso speciale la vacanza.

Alexandra e seu apartamento são mais que 5*. Incrível hospitalidade, apartamento amplo, limpo, funcional, muito bem localizado. E com uma terraça incrível. Nos proporcionou uma ótima experiência na cidade do Porto. Recomendado 100%.

Alexandra's apartment was really lovely and neat.It had everything we needed for a great stay in (Website hidden by Airbnb) was only a short walk to the market around the corner, which was great as we did a lot of cooking, in her well equipped kitchen
The train station was only 5 minutes walk away which made for easy connection to the airport 
Overall we had a fantastic stay at Alexandra's apartment, far better value than a hotel.
Highly recommend to others.
Thank you Alexandra, for being a great host and for all the information on Porto, hope to see you again some day!

Merci pour tout Alexandra, très bonne accueil et magnifique appartement. Nous étions idéalement situé à la fois près du centre ville et proche aussi du stade du Dragao. Les lits sont confortables, vous avez une belle terrasse pour prendre votre petit-déjeuner sous le soleil de Porto. Pour les fans de foot vous êtes à 15min du stade du dragao. Tout cela pour dire que je suis plus que satisfait de mon séjour. Je recommande chaudement cet appartement en cas de visite de porto.
La casa es espaciosa y amplia para 6 personas perfectamente, cerca del centro y con una anfitriona maravillosa, repetiría sin dudar, Alexandra es muy atenta y se portó muy bien con nosotros.

Apartamento exatamente como está nas fotos, limpo e boa localização.A Alexandra foi uma excelente anfitriã e fomos muito bem recebidos ! 
Foi uma estadia muito bem passada. Recomendo
Alexandra gave us tips and information of where to go in Porto was always at the other end of the telephone to answer any questions we had. All in all a very considerate, welcoming, interesting host.
Casa acogedora, limpia y completa facilidad para ir al centro andando y Alexandra muy atenta en todo momento. Muy recomendable
Recomendo a todos não só em relação a Alexandra como também o apartamento em si. Obrigado.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour à Porto. L’appartement est modeste mais propre dans un quartier ouvrier, bien situé et proche des moyens de transport pour faciliter la visite de Porto. Nous nous attendions à ce que le bruit de l’ascenseur soit réglé....mais il persiste toujours c’est une question structurelle de l’édifice.

We really enjoyed our stay in Alexandra's apartment! The apartment is big, clean and has everything you need! Also, it is very nicely located which makes exploring Porto very easy. We were able to check-in at a later hour which was great! Would definitely recommend staying at Alexandra's apartment!

sehr schönes Apartment.
die Gastgeberin ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett, und ein Wohnzimmer wo zwei Schlafcouchen stehen. die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und es ist sogar eine Waschmaschine vorhanden.
die Lage ist nicht im Zentrum aber man kann ohne Probleme in 10-15 Minuten die Altstadt mit  all ihren Sehenswürdigkeiten erreichen. zudem ist eine Metro Station nur ein paar Minuten entfernt von der aus man alles sehr gut erreichen kann. auch Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in direkter Nähe. ich würde das Apartment sofort wieder mieten und ohne Vorbehalte weiter empfehlen.

Very nice apartment.
The hostess is very friendly and helpful. There are two bedrooms with a double bed, and a living room where there are two sofa beds. The kitchen is well equipped and there is even a washing machine available.
The location is not in the center but you can easily reach the old town with all its sights in 10-15 minutes. Moreover, a Metro station is only a few minutes away from which you can reach everything very well. Shopping facilities are also in the immediate vicinity. I would immediately rent the apartment again and recommend without reservation.
logement très bien situé à 5 minutes du métro et spacieux

Alexandra is such a great host: she was very kind, thoughtful and let us feel at home the second we arrived. The communication was great, it was super easy to get in touch with her and she replied really fast. She even send us information about ongoing events in Porto around the time we were there. The apartment was a great place to relax, there are two supermarkets within a 5 minute walk and the station Marques. So you can either walk downtown (20-25 minutes) or take the metro (5 minutes). We'd definitely come back to Alexandra the next time we stay in Porto!

Alexandra was a great host! The appartment was very clean and spacious, as well as well equipped and well located. It is 15 minutes away from the center by foot and very close to a metro and bus station. The check-in and out timing was flexible, which was a plus to the excellent welcome we received with a pleasant talk and some suggestions and recommentations. I encourage you to stay in Alexandra's flat and enjoy a wonderful trip in Porto!

Alexandra was really responsive in communication, and was there to check us in when we arrived, with plenty of information about sightseeing, local restaurants etc. The apartment is spacious, well-equipped, clean, quiet, and has TWO amazing balconies. Note that while the apartment is very central in Porto, it's not *right* in the touristic center. You can walk to the Ribeira neighborhood in about 25-30 minutes (passing lots of restaurants, shops, churches) - and the apartment itself is in a very residential, non-touristy  part of the city, which is exactly what we were looking for. Porto is very hilly (gorgeous!) but plan accordingly for distance AND elevation changes!

Ótimo espaço, amplo, limpo com tudo o que se pode precisar para uma estada de vários dias, bem localizado, próximo ao metrô e ônibus. Da varanda se tem uma vista incrível do por do sol. Ficamos no apartamento por 16 dias e não sentimos nenhuma falta de carro. A Alexandra é uma pessoa muito simpática, gentil e sempre esteve pronta a responder aos nossos questionamentos, tanto antes quanto durante nossa estada. Só temos a agradecer e, numa próxima viagem ao Porto, com certeza esta será nossa primeira escolha.

Lejligheden er perfekt til en tur til Porto. Den ligger meget centralt til de fleste ting, der er værd at se. Lejligheden har en perfekt størrelse til en familie, og altanen er perfekt til at sidde og nyde sine måltider på, kort sagt en perfekt base for et ophold i Porto.

Appartement très propre, il est situé à 15 min à pied du centre de Porto. 
La terrasse est le gros plus de cet appartement.

Logement spacieux et impeccable proche de toutes commodités et du centre animé de Porto.... Belle étape pour les amoureux du Portugal où il fait bon séjourner, dormir (literie exceptionnelle !) et profiter de la grande terrasse !
Merci à Alexandra pour son accueil chaleureux et son français parfait !
Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir !
Nathalie et Nicolas (mère et fils)

Really nice place. The furniture is amazing, there is a lot of rooms and the tarrace was our favourite. Kitchen has everything you need. The place was very clean. Localization is great, a lot of caffes, stores and a park nearby, city center within walking distance. The owner is a very kind and patient person, she was very helpful. The only downside of the place is really slow wifi. Also, be careful of the self locking front door.
All in all, an amazing place I'd recommend to anyone :)
Everything was OK, we had a perfect time at Porto. Many thanks to Alexandra!
Everything was fine, it's a really nice place to stay while you're in Porto, is a 15 minute walk to get to the center of the city.

L'appartement est conforme à la description. Le quartier est calme. Métro, commerces ( dont poissonnerie et boucherie) sont proches. Le balcon à l'est et la terrasse à l'ouest permettent de pouvoir toujours profiter du soleil. Il y a un cabinet de toilette avec WC en plus de la salle de bain. Le séjour et la communication avec Alexandra ont été très agréables. Seul inconvénient : le bruit de ascenseur.
Very nice and calm place, highly recommended
Great apartment, well located with great outdoor space, on a calm street... Alexandra was a great host :)

name: Oceanfront Beach House Makai
summary: Please look for Airbnb numb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) to book with us.  We do not take bookings through this one.  It is live for others to read reviews.  Oceanfront home on private, gated property.  This unique property offers year-round swimming, private beach access and astounding ocean and mountain views.  Traveling with a large group? Another 3 bedroom home is available for rent on this spacious property. Visit https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15073739 or contact us for more information.
space: This unique, private and spacious property is 39,000 square feet and offers magnificent ocean, mountain and sunset views.  As one of the largest oceanfront properties on the North Shore, the large grassy lawn is perfect for  games, yoga or relaxing in the sun.  Less than 2 miles away is Turtle Bay Resort featuring world class dining, bars, golf, tennis, fitness center, spa, horse back riding, surfing, and bike rentals.  From the tranquil, secluded beach you can often swim with sea turtles, watch monk seals basking in the warm Hawaiian sun, spot whales breaching off shore in winter months, and catch glorious sunsets. With no public beach access you are guaranteed a private and relaxing Hawaii vacation.  Traveling with a large group?  We have a second 3-bedroom home available for rent on the same property at https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14827972 Amenities Include: * Large lanai complete with an Outdoor BBQ Grill  * Brand new, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances  * Cabl

host.host_about: North Shore residents for 23 years now.  Love where I live and enjoy sharing the special place I call home!

reviews.comments: Fabulous views, beautiful renovation, great kitchen facilities, spotlessly clean, private and relaxing.
Amazing home in fantastic location. Exceeded already high expectations. Clean, modern, comfortable, oceanfront, semi-private beach, great hosts.

Fantastic home - perfect location sunsets were amazing- private yet accessible- host was fantastic with communication- showed up within minutes when we needed a jump- but left us to total privacy in general. It's a very open home with ocean sound all day and night - perfect spot on North Shore - I have traveled a lot and this was a special and unique spot with a great vibe. Highly recommended Aloha
We had a great stay here. Pictures and description are totally accurate. Location is good and right in the middle of a ton of beaches within a short drive if you want to go away from the house.
We had a great time staying here. The house is lovely, and the location is amazing. Every sunset blew us away. Will definitely be back.
Stunning location.

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!
space: Very high ceiling, full of cachet. The first bedroom has its own office space. There is another desk in the guest room as well.  Laundry (washer/dryer) is the apartment.  Fully-equipped kitchen, with bar stools. Cozy living room/dining area. Cute, quiet balcony in the back.  The bathroom is rather small but convenient. Self-check in, which allows for more flexibility.
description: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome! Fully-equipped kitchen, with bar stools. Cozy living room/dining area. Cute, quiet balcony in the back.  The bathroom is rather small but convenient. Self-check in, which allows for more flexibility. This is a three bedroom apartment. Guest are welcome to use the first bedroom and the guest room - the second one will be made available shortly as we
access: This is a three bedroom apartment. Guest are welcome to use the first bedroom and the guest room - the second one will be made available shortly as well, but for now, guests are ask not to use it. Check back for the updated listing soon!
interaction: You have the whole place to yourself, but I will be nearby. Don't hesitate to contact me if you need anything, regarding the appartient or cool spots to explore in the city!

host.host_about: I’m a bilingual (French/English) Montrealer passionate about social justice, anthropology, playing the piano, and meeting cool people from near and far.

reviews.comments: Really great place ! Super close to the metro station and many restaurants. Host was amazing with communication and check in was smooth.

On a passé une merveilleuse experience dans l’appart d’emilie. Endroit magnifique avec beaucoup d’espace et un balcon ensoleillé et tranquille. Emilie est très arrangeante. Merci! On reviendra avec plaisir!
Super apart bien placé
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, great stay!
Appartement tranquille, bien situé c'était parfait !
I highly recommend Emilie's place. Its super convenient and 10 min drive to downtown. If you are lucky you can find a parking spot right by her apartment. Its clean and comfy.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sight-seeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location
Le logement est idéalement placé pour visiter Montréal.

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!
Great place, in a great location. Emilie was quick to respond to any questions.
Rapport Qualité prix parfait, appartement bien situé (metro et épicerie à 3-4 min) propre et charment.

name: BARRA 3: Excelente quarto perto do Rio Centro.
summary: Temos um restaurante no próprio condomínio e uma ampla área de lazer. Ficamos a 10 minutos de carro para a praia, temos todo comércio a volta além de transporte público. Meu espaço é bom para aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios. Ficamos também muito perto do parque Olímpico e a 7 minutos andando para o pavilhão do Rio Centro. O café da manhã está incluso no valor.

host.host_about: Sou carioca, escritora, mãe de dois filhos e esposa de Hugo Breves. Moro em Braga, Portugal, e sou apaixonada por esta terra.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Villa 3 chambres a 5 min de l aéroport de Porto
summary: Mon logement est proche de l'aéroport et les transports en commun. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour le quartier, le confort et la luminosité. Mon logement est parfait pour les familles (avec enfants) et les grands groupes.
space: Dans le calme village de Crestins, grande villa 3 chambres, très lumineuse située a 10 minutes à pied de l aéroport.  Le métro situé à 5 minutes à pied vous mène en 10 minutes au cœur de la ribeira de Porto. Les plages de Matosinhos sont située à environ 15 minutes.

name: 100 steps to Poipu Beach! - Hale Kahana'lu
summary: The perfect location! Only 100 steps to Poipu Beach and air-conditioning in the bedrooms makes this the most ideal property!
space: Only 100 steps to Poipu Beach and Brennecke's Beach Restaurant.  This two bedroom is fully furnished with 2 queen beds, air conditioning in the bedrooms, TV in every room, FREE Wi-Fi, and fully stocked kitchen.  This  is the perfect vacation rental for singles, couples or small families.  The complex offers shared BBQ area and laundry facilities.  Location: 20 minutes from Airport 100 steps from Poipu Beach and Brennecke's Beach Restaurant and Deli 10 minutes walking distance to Marriot's Waiohai Beach Club and Beach Bar 18 minutes walking distance to Kauai Hyatt Resort 20 minutes walking distance to Kauai Sheraton TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Check in time is anytime after 3:00 PM Occasionally we accommodate checking in at other times, if you contact us S
neighborhood_overview: Only 100 steps to Poipu Beach!
notes: If you are looking for Concierge services or have any real estate interest, please call or text Kahea at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  House Guidelines: Please remove your shoes upon entering and make every effort to keep sand and dirt outside. Please use the outdoor shower for rinsing off after a day of hiking or enjoying the beach.  Please notify the property manager immediately of any problems with the house so we may quickly address it.  Our home is in a residential area. Please be a thoughtful neighbor and keep noise, music, etc. to a minimum between 9:00 pm and 9:00 am. Wrap, store or refrigerate all food and drinks to discourage ants, roaches and mice.  Rubbish should always be bagged tightly in plastic bags and deposited in the trash cans. Trash needs to be taken to the street on Wednesday Night.  Please feel free to do laundry while you are here. Washing towels and linens helps out during your stay.  This is a non-smoking home. If your home offer air-conditioning, we kindly
transit: We highly recommend a car.  While most neighborhoods are walking friendly, most likely you will need a car to adventure to other areas of the island.
access: There is a lockbox containing your house key We will email you the access codes prior to your arrival. Check in time is anytime after 3:00 PM Occasionally we accommodate checking in at other times, if you contact us Should you have any questions or concerns regarding your property please call your on island host.
interaction: Each of our homes comes with a property manager. Should you need assistance please feel reach out to the home manager.
house_rules: House Guidelines  1. Please remove your shoes upon entering and make every effort to keep sand and dirt outside. Please use the outdoor shower for rinsing off after a day of hiking or enjoying the beach. 2. Please notify the property manager immediately of any problems with the house so we may quickly address it.  3. Our home is in a residential area. Please be a thoughtful neighbor and keep noise, music, etc. to a minimum between 9:00 pm and 9:00 am. 4. Wrap, store or refrigerate all food and drinks to discourage ants, roaches and mice. 5. Trash should always be bagged tightly in plastic bags and deposited in the trash cans. Trash needs to be taken to the street on Wednesday Night. 6. Please feel free to do laundry while you are here. Washing towels and linens helps out during your stay. 7. This is a non-smoking home. 8. If your home offers air-conditioning. We kindly ask that your turn off the units when you are not occupying the rooms. Please let your property manager know should an

host.host_about: Kahea Zietz is the Broker for Hawaii Life Vacations, a local real estate company offering vacation and long term rentals.  We are based on Kauai with rentals and real estate on all islands. We offer island hosts, property managers and offices statewide. Our rentals are professionally managed and each home comes with complimentary concierge services. We look forward to hosting you.

reviews.comments: All in all, we had a wonderful stay here. The location is excellent and the room was private and quiet. We had a few bumps with checking in, but Jason the property manager was very quick to fix the problems and follow up with us when finished. FYI- the air conditioners are portable window units, so it can get very hot in the unit rather quickly if not turned on. The kitchen was fully stocked and we were even greeted with tea, cookies, and cold drinks in the fridge. Great amenities like candles, wifi, Netflix, and a double shower head (though the hot water tends to run out very fast that way). We also were directed to download an app which didn't seem entirely necessary (and pretty difficult on an island with limited service), as the same info was found in the confirmation email and by asking Jason for the wifi password. With all that, we'd definitely stay here again if we return to Kauai.
Great experience
This home was a great place to stay and we enjoyed our time on the south shore immensely while here.

The place was fantastic and exactly how it was featured. It was easy to find and was in an amazing location in PoiPu beach. There is a restaurant next door, a place to rent water gear, and amazing snorkeling literally 100 steps from the place! I will definitely come back to Kauai again and hope that this place is available! Thank you!!

Well, this is way overpriced. It is very clean, has a good kitchen and the location is good, BUT very small, 3rd floor no elevator, no pool, a really noisy air-conditioner that you can't turn off because it gets really hot in minutes. The host did not send the locker combination and did not respond for another 30 minutes, we had to wait. So, not my best experience with Airbnb (

100 steps to Poipu was average. We enjoyed our stay here. Pros: This was a good location to the beach, restaurants, running paths and outdoor activities. The location felt safe; unit was clean; had coffee pods waiting for us to use, and water in the fridge. Cons: we never received a welcome packet, so there was no instructions for entry, internet use, or check out procedures; the AC was off when we arrived and took forever to cool down the unit; the bathroom smelled like sewer, which never diminished; washer and dryer situation was sketchy: one washer was inoperable, the other was partially taken apart; Kahea, the property manager was minimally responsive, and seemed annoyed when contacting her for entry and internet use instructions. Overall, I would say that cost of the stay was a good value.

The location was great - less than 100 steps to beach and very close to a surf shop. Also a 3min drive to the closest shopping center with food and general store. The house was also very clean with enough space for 3 ppl and maybe even more. Good kitchen but there were no cooking essentials - oils etc. 

Bad part - I didn't know this property is on the 3rd floor and it was a hassle to bring our luggage up. Also, the condo does not have good ventilation so it gets hot very easily. We had to have the AC most of the time which was a bit loud. The property manager also warned us not to use the hair dryer when the ac is on. 

Besides that, the house had beach chairs, umbrella so it was great to not spend money on that. I liked this place but would have been great to have the disclaimer about the 3rd floor beforehand. Thanks for a great stay!

Worked out ok, very close to the beach. Hated that we were told to download an app. I said I couldn't (or wouldn't) download it and was sent email directions for check-in, internet, etc which was much better. Check-in/internet/check-out was very easy and I didn't have any issues. There were beach towels, beach chairs, a cooler, basics for the kitchen like salt, oil, cooking spray, and a lot of cleaning supplies (we gave the place a once over to keep it neat during our stay and was nice to have all of that available to us). Area was safe, neighbors were friendly and was close to a lot of neat things to walk to. 

Because of the name we counted the steps and its over 200 steps to the grass park BEFORE the beach for our 5'1 traveler and over 160 steps for our 6'3 traveler and that's is starting counting after you leave the 3rd floor condo and walk down stairs and to the street. We stopped counting at the grass because it wasn't close to 100. :)

Personally, I would not stay here again with 4 people because if you are going to the beach a lot there is no good place to hang up wet things to dry out for the next day. Parking is also not a lot of fun if there is a tenant in 8; its just harder to get out. Also, there was no table to eat at with family, just two counters for 2 people to sit at. And there is no coffee maker, there is a keurig but no actual coffee maker (we had two coffee snobs in our group so it mattered to them). Otherwise location was great and if those things (table, coffee maker, and a deck or place to hang wet things) don't matter to you its a great place to stay. 

I agree with other reviews that is was very very hot/stuffy when we got there. The main room is south facing and gets a lot of sun/heat especially if the windows are closed it gets extra stuffy. We stayed at a different location the week prior to this and it was always nice and cool with no AC. Here we needed the AC for the first 2 days, we tried without it and opening all the windows but the circulation wasn't great. Day 3 we felt we were on top of the stuffiness and in the evening turned it off and worked out great with windows open.
Very cleanly, had everything we needed from beach towels, beach chairs and cooler! Enjoyed how  spacious and great of a location it was! Will definitely recommend!

Everything was excellent, thoughtful, and thorough. Best part of all was the brief walk to the beach/park. The condo was very clean and orderly upon arrival, there are AC units in each room, Netflix on the TV, beach towels, beach chairs, fully stocked kitchen utensils, and comfortable beds. We couldn't ask for anything more and had an excellent stay.

The condo was very nice and a good size for our family of five. We were able to fit our pack and play crib easily into the bigger bedroom. It was a plus to have a tv in each room- and they were all equipped with Netflix, etc. it was just down the street from the beach and there is a small convenience store within a short walk. The views were beautiful and there were enough dishes and pots/pans to live and cook comfortably. One drawback was not having a dishwasher- so we had to hand wash everything after each meal. From other reviews, I expected trouble with he A/C. It wasn't a huge issue, but it was definitely very hot and humid by midday and into the night. We had the fans and all three A/C units running and by the middle of the night it was cold- we turned them off in the middle of the night and were comfortable through the morning of the next day. We used the laundry facilities- make sure you have quarters on hand when you go down there. Parking was a little tight as you are in the very last stall and wedged between a car behind and the building to your left- take caution when pulling in and out. We really appreciated the beach gear (umbrella, chairs, towels, cooler) available for guest use! Overall, we were very happy with our stay. My only real complaint Is that Kahea seemed preoccupied and was not good at responding to questions or concerns-  we didn't have any major concerns, but if we had, I would have been out of luck. She seems to be unavailable or unwilling to help guests after booking.

We loved our stay, and are sad to leave. The condo is nicer than the photos and the location is amazing. Would stay again!!! Bring snorkel gear because there is great snorkeling just a short walk away!

Excellent value at top notch location.  Further from the beach than 100 steps but still really close.  The condo was really hot and stuffy when we arrived and it kind of remained that way the whole time we were there but was not a deal breaker.  It was updated and clean.

This unit is decorated nicely and is in a good location. We greatly appreciated the use of beach chairs and umbrella.  Due to issues such as consistent sewage smell in the bathroom, cockroach issues and ineffective means of cooling the unit I would not stay here again.

Perfect, super close to a white sandy beach for all ages, surfing and restaurants. Still quiet (except for unavoidable roosters) clean, safe and easy. All the things you need. It has AC in all the rooms but we turned it off as soon as we arrived, windows and fans in every room was just what we wanted. So close to the beach you can hear the waves crashing.

Das Appartement ist nur wenige Meter vom Poipu Strand entfernt. 
Es ist sehr schön eingerichtet und war sauber. 
Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist top. 
Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und würden jederzeit wieder zurückkommen.
Great apartment. Super clean! Would highly recommend.
Stay was great
Great place, great location, best beach on the island (in my opinion). Loved the stay, my wife and I got married here and couldn't be more happy! Thank you!
Very nice place; everything needed for a beach stay provided. The condo is new, very clean and comfortable. AC provided in all rooms a big plus.

Great little condo, would rent again when we go back. All rooms have portable A/C units. No patio, but we truly only slept here, otherwise we were out exploring. Some coffee, beach towel, beach chairs and snorkel gear provided.

Nice place.  Perfect for our needs.  We stayed with 3 people.  Quiet residential location.  Walked to very nice beach park Walked to Waiohai resort where other family was staying and is the main reason we chose this place.  Walked to Breneke's restaurant too.

This place is a must.  Only 2 drawbacks were being on the 3rd floor, and a/c units need to be emptied every 8 hours by the occupant.  If you're not home, you come back to a hot house.  No other complaints, and everything on the profile was accurate.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

great location, extremely close to the beach, place as per photos, great place to stay.
 only thing to note is that the air conditioning is very loud.
This was the perfect location! Just steps from one of the best beaches in Kauai! This condo was super clean and even had amenities that were were not expecting. We would definitely stay here again!

Very clean, updated and great location. The AC was also a benefit of this place. Convenient that it has designated parking and access to a shared laundry unit. We appreciated the beach gear and stocked kitchen as well. Would recommend this place to friends and stay here again!

A great place to stay, the effort of walking up all those stairs is worth the view.  Sitting at the kitchen bench eating breakfast while looking out the window is very relaxing.  Being able to walk to the beach is a big plus, the snorkeling is great, and we saw seals and turtles almost every day.  Access to the laundry is unreliable.  Other top things to do from here are the drive up Weimea Canyon, and kayak up Wailua River with a hike to the Secret Falls. We had a very relaxing week here.

This is an amazing apartment that is truly only steps away from a very nice beach. It was super clean and very well equipped. There is also lots of beach equipment. We called the service company a few times and they were very responsive - for example, they helped us find a great babysitter for our daughter one evening. 

Would definitely recommend this place!

This place lived up to all the great reviews and more.  This was our first time to the Island and I picked this location because it was 100 steps to the beach but ended up getting so much more.  The home was clean and inviting.  It had A/C and Tv's with internet in every room.  The Kitchen had everything you need to cook meals and had a coffee maker and a Keurig.  The location is prime and has multiple restaurants you can walk to in 2-10 minutes.  We rented a car but after a couple of days driving around came to realize we were on the best part of the Island and stayed at the Condo most the time.  The communication with the host was quick and easy.  There is a washer and dryer on site and shower to rinse off after you return from the beach.  They provided 2 laundry tabs, dish soap, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, beach towels, towels, and toilet paper.  They also had some 2 beach chairs, body boards, snorkel gear and some flippers.  You will not be disappointed at all.  I think my only caution would be to someone with conditions that would make going up and downs stairs an issue.  It is on the 3rd story of the complex but the view out the windows every morning and evening is worth the stairs.

name: 纽约之家(SunnyHome3)

reviews.comments: Very good
good
Great stay! Thank you!
It was a great stay. I will definitely stay here again when I come back to flushing.
特别好!接待我们的是房东的爸爸妈妈,人超好!!住的地方干净整洁~

The time I arrived at LGA, I called the host several times but I couldn't contact her. I didn't know how to get to the place, either. The weather was really cold in New York. Finally, I got in touch with the host after half an hour later, they came to pick me up to the place. That was really horrible.
Its a wonderful house and good bedroom. Neat and clean. Quiet place, heater works well.
还好
第二次住了,房东人很好,房间环境也不错｡
床和床上用品比我自己在这边的都舒服 拖鞋也给准备好了 床头有充电的地方 很方便 和图片一模一样
Nice dig. Close to public transportation and grocery shopping. It would be better if the thermostat was not locked within a small cubic plastic box.
Again, great stay!
good
good
Wonderful!Highly recommend!Will be here the next time.
Amy's house is very clean. Room is big and very comfortable. The price is good and especially with off street or front door free parking space!!!Highly recommended!!!!
Good, clean and simple

It's 20 minutes walk from Mets-Willet point station via Queens Park (Kinda scary at night when you walk alone but the park police patrols all the time.

The room was good, the house was clean, and the hosts were really friendly. We even didn't notice when the heater wasn't turned on and they offered us heater.

It's kinda difficult to talk with the father since he is not very good in english, but he was really helpful. If he doesn't understand what we want to say, he will call his son to communicate with us.

Thank you very much for hosting us.
Great hosts! Quick & responsive for a last minute request on my behalf. Easy directions and lovely place. Thank you for being so accommodating for my mom!
No problem with the room. Very comfortable, thanks.
Great place to stay. Friendly hosts are so nice.
Great place at Amy. Would stay again.
房东非常好,我们到达较晚,房东耐心讲解屋内设施使用 ｡房屋干净,每天及时更换垃圾袋,地理位置不错,乘坐公交比较方便｡

It is not a good place for a nice trip. The room is small, the bed is small.many guests live in the house.the most terrible thing is the noise from both the air conditioner inside and air planes outside together.
Great host!!

If you just want to find a place to have a sleep, this house is reasonably priced. But there are too much planes flying in the air which brought a lot of noise.
It is convenient which is near the public transportation. It's mostly like a hotel than a home. The host is easy to communicate.
Very nice place for the price. I arrived pretty late and the host waited for me,  super nice! I would definitely recommend this place.

quick reply, very responsive host. 
location is good. house is nice. room is standard and basic, meets the need. 
they have parking spot which is really helpful for us. 
the drawback was that they didn't provide drinking water or any supplies. there was no cups or other supplies. 
overall it's a nice place to stay for the budget.

Amy's place is pleasant & had all I needed. They checked on the place daily collecting trash & making sure was clean. I was there 3 weeks; they changed the sheets & checked to clean the room during my stay. There was anything I needed within walking distance. I would stay again if in the area.
great people, very easy to work with. Im strictly business im in and out, they mad it fast and simple for my check in and check out.
Great neighborhood, clean and well put together
La casa está muy limpia, las camas muy cómodas, repetiría sin dudarlo. Merece la pena que no estar en el centro, el barrio es muy tranquilo y a la vez está bien comunicado.
It was not same room in pictures but it was clean and okey.
Very nice room,clean and quiet
Nice place near LGA, very convenient, easy to communicate, highly recommend
Everytime I stay its like home to me.  Great ,host o will come again

Very decent experience, I stayed for a prolonged period and Amy was very helpful throughout the stay. She responded to everything very quickly, we asked for a microwave and she installed it immediately, we had a few problems with the fellow airbnb guests and Amy spoke to them immediately. Great location too, close to the bus which takes you to the station. My only recommendation is to apply some bathroom mats otherwise the bathroom remains wet for a prolonged period of time. Overall, wonderful experience !
Great place to stay!
This was my partner and I’s first airbnb stay. It was great! The hosts were nice, the location was walkable from Flushing, and the room was big and clean.
I recommend to other travelers
Okay place to stay for a night
Easy communication, simple check in, clean and convenient.
Easy check in. Would come back again
Great place to stay for US Open

nette Unterkunft. Preis/Leistungsverhältnis sehr gut. wir waren da wegen den US Open und das war perfekt. Kurzer Weg. 
Das Haus hat 3.Wohnungen die vermietet werden. wir haben ganz oben bei den Eltern der Gastgeber gewohnt. Sehr nett aber spricht kein Englisch. 
Alles zusammen: gut für eine Nacht.
房东非常贴心,房子很干净,走十分钟全是中国美食,地铁也在附近,可直达时代广场｡因为开车来的,车子一直停在房东楼下很安全,纽约交通很堵,全靠地铁出门｡性价比超高
Nice people in a strategic location.  A clean but modest bedroom, within a lived in Chinese family apartment.  Friendly, charming, courteous and accommodating, but the residents have little English.
Good place!
Always a pleasure staying here
不错的选择

Amy's house is located in a quiet place, near the subway. The bed on my room was so great. The house was very clean. The last day of my visit, I had the oportunite to met a famous chinise sculture artist.

name: BEST AREA IN CHELSEA. MODERN. COMPACT. HIGH LINE!!
summary: Charming modern studio close to High Line, Chelsea Pier Park, Art Galleries. You’ll love the place because of its proximity to train station, restaurants/bars in Chelsea, and beautiful street block. The place is good for solo business traveler/adventurer/nomad/someone who wants to be in the nicest part of Chelsea. It's a small compact minimalistic studio with lots of light day time, that has everything you would need and doesn't have anything you won't need
space: Small Compact Modern Studio. It's approx. 400 sq ft but has everything nicely fit in. Sparkling clean. Exposed brick wall. Classic Manhattan style building. Beautiful street block. Great neighborhood.
description: Charming modern studio close to High Line, Chelsea Pier Park, Art Galleries. You’ll love the place because of its proximity to train station, restaurants/bars in Chelsea, and beautiful street block. The place is good for solo business traveler/adventurer/nomad/someone who wants to be in the nicest part of Chelsea. It's a small compact minimalistic studio with lots of light day time, that has everything you would need and doesn't have anything you won't need Small Compact Modern Studio. It's approx. 400 sq ft but has everything nicely fit in. Sparkling clean. Exposed brick wall. Classic Manhattan style building. Beautiful street block. Great neighborhood. Because I will be traveling, you will get to enjoy the place. (!!!) NOTE: If you are looking for a budgeted long-term stay, please, also check our second listing close to Manhattan: https://abnb.me/VDRyaKagiS I am always available on the phone  24 / 7. neighborhood_overview: Chelsea. High Line. FIT. Chelsea Pier Park. Best bagels at Brooklyn Coffee & Bagel. Lots of Restaurants. Chelsea Art Galleries. Coffee Shops.
notes: Please note I keep price low to accommodate solo traveler’s budget and the place is great for one person. I travel alone a lot and feel unfair when one person has to pay the price of two people. Two people; two budgets. So, there is a small extra guest charge for 2nd guest, so please make sure you select the appropriate number of guests at booking as if it will be noted that there are two people instead of one your deposit will have to be claimed.
transit: Short walk for a train station

I tend to travel a lot so my availability is not that great but I'd be happy to chat in person if you'd like  when I'm around - just let me know a little in advance so I could make plans accordingly. I put together a first time user DISCOUNT refereed codes in case if you'd like to take advantage of them: AIRBNB ($40 off):  https://www.airbnb.com/c/ginas1359?currency=USD UBER ($5 off): p9xaa UBER eats ($5 off): eat-p9xaa LYFT ($10 off): regina (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) SEAMLESS ($7 off): (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Groupon USA ($10 off): (Website hidden by Airbnb)
